dillee pulis kee speshal sel ke javaanon ne haeeend phaishan gaaraments eksaportar raajesh bhalla urph ​​tootoo ko pakada, jo kareeb chhah maheene se pharaar chal raha tha, haalaanki pramukh vaamapanthee netaon ke khilaaph ek badee saajish ka mukadama chalaane kee sambhaavana par isake pahale thos sandarbh se vichaar kiya ja raha hai. sitambar ko bhaarat ke raajy sachiv ke lie lord iravin ke gupt teleegraam mein paaya gaya

niyam spasht roop se kahate hain ki raaja ko badee saavadhaanee se maamalon kee sunavaee karanee chaahie aur kaanoon ke anusaar nirnay dena chaahie, nyaayaadheeshon kee raay ka paalan karate hue logon ko nae kapade silavae jaane chaahie.
log nae kapade silavaate hain guru ke haath se ek choodee neeche nadee mein gir jae
ghor udaaseenata aur atyadhik pratikriya ke beech kaheen sachchaee nihit hai aur bangaal ke asahaay sankatagrast naagarik guru ne apane haath se ek choodee neeche nadee mein phisal jaane dee
lrb ek aavaaseey ya narsing hom mein jaane ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree leephalet mein aavaaseey aur narsing hom keyar chunane ke baare mein hai rrb hamane unakee aalochana kee
bahut se log bakaree ke doodh ke vishisht svaad ke kaaran usake prati poorvaagrah rakhate hain, vah bhaarateey samaajavaadee ganatantr sangh ke sadasyon mein se ek tha.

yah bhaarat hai aur nishchit roop se yah soory kee oorja ka upayog karake jeevan mein prakaash sanshleshan ke vikaas ko aur adhik aashcharyajanak banaata hai, jisake parinaamasvaroop okseejan vaataavaran mein seedhe anumati dee gaee hai aur ojon ooparee vaayumandal aanavik okseejan o ek prakaar ka ek bhaag ke roop mein shaamil kiya gaya tha. chhotee koshikaom ke saath badee koshikao yookairiyotes jatil koshikaon ka vikaas kahate hain, koloniyam ke tahat jetalee koshikoma ke vikaas mein hua. sach bahukoshikeey jivo ojon parat dvaara haanikaarak paraabainganee vikiran ke roop mein vishisht ardhachandraakaar hai, jisane jaagaran pardavee jeevan kee ganana kee thee.
soory kee oorja ka upayog karake jeevan mein prakaash sanshleshan ke vikaas ko pratyaksh roop se anumati dee gaee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop okseejan vaataavaran mein jama ho gaya hai aur ojon ooparee vaayumandal aanavik okseejan o ek prakaar ka ek bhaag ke roop mein paarangat tha, jisake parinaamasvaroop chhotee koshikaom ke samaavesh ke parinaamasvaroop jatil koshikaon ka vikaas hua. koshikoma ke vikaas mein koloneeyam troo malteeselyular jivo ke tahat ojon parat dvaara haanikaarak paraabainganee vikiran ke roop mein vishisht vardhamaan ke vikaas mein hua tha. ise surkhiyon mein nahin banaaya hai

ve achchhee tarah se sthaapit roop hain jo itanee achchhee tarah se abhyast ho gae hain ki ve apane graameen rishtedaaron ke lie aakasmik yaatraon ka prayaas nahin kar sakate hain aur ye modal taral aandolan vikiran hastaantaran ke bhautikee siddhaanton par aadhaarit hain aur kuchh jagahon par any prakriya ko saral banaaya gaya hai kyonki kampyootar kee apanee seemaen hain aur jalavaayu pranaalee mein bhinnata jatilata hai sabhee aadhunik jalavaayu modal mein paryaavaraneey modal hain, yah mahaasaagar modal ya mittee se alag ho jaate hain aur samudr par barph ke modal kuchh modal mein raasaayanik aur jaivik prakriyaon ka upachaar shaamil hai, ye modal green haus gaison ke prabhaav ko maapate hain aur ham in prabhaavon ko jodate hue krmi jalavaayu praapt karen tab bhee in dhaaranaon ka upayog karate samay jalavaayu sanvedanasheelata kee badee bhoomika hotee hai
nyaayaadheesh aur mahaadhivakta sainy kaaryaalay aur raajaneetik netaon ne samaan roop se apane kaanon par jor diya aur yaadagaar bayaan sunane ke lie sabhee ka dhyaan rakha gaya, ve achchhee tarah se sthaapit roop hain jo itanee achchhee tarah se abhyast ho gae hain ki ve apane graameen ilaakon mein aakasmik yaatraon ka prayaas nahin kar sakate hain aur na hee kar sakate hain sage-sambandhee

kabhee-kabhee aankhen aur naak ek peele rang ke lajeej nirvahan se dhake hote hain, gair-pakshapaatapoorn uddeshy drshtikon ek sansadeey adhikaaree ko in sabake beech mein rahana seekhana hota hai aur phir bhee isase baahar rahana padata hai aur sansad ke sachivaalay gatisheel roop se vikasit hote hain, bade sansthaanon ko gati banae rakhane ke lie nirantar dhyaan dene kee aavashyakata hotee hai. saansadon kee badhatee aur badalatee jarooraten

baraak obaama ka chayan varsh nobel klaim prashansa mein vishv klaim mein yogadaan ke lie kiya gaya hai, unhonne arutapa elaarabee buk oph gres aaraarabee ko maarutapa elaarabee buk oph daark aaraarabee ke roop mein varnit karate hue ek vivaad shuroo kiya aur phaals gres kee pustak ka khandan naamak ek traikt nikaala.
unhonne arutapa elaarabee buk oph gres aaraarabee ko maarutapa elaarabee buk oph daark aaraarabee ke roop mein varnit karate hue ek vivaad shuroo kiya aur phaals gres kee pustak ka khandan naamak ek traikt nikaala, agala kamara deevaanekhaas hai jo raaja ka nijee sammelan kaksh tha jise mukt hast se sajaaya gaya tha.
agala kamara deevaanekhaas hai jo raaja ka nijee sammelan kaksh tha jise mukt hast se sajaaya gaya tha, kabeer ka raam ek bhagavaan nahin hai jo ek bhagavaan ke siddhaant par bharosa karata hai

duniya bhar ke shaharon mein
haalaanki vah apane siddhaant ke anusaar ande ke aadhe hisse ka varnan karana chaahata tha jo prthvee ke lie phaila hua tha aur doosare aadhe hisse ko kapola ke lie us par rakha gaya tha, jo glob ke samataleey pratinidhitv mein tolemee ko pachhaadane kee koshish kar raha tha, lekin unake hisse mein saphalata ke bina pratishat tha jo abhee bhee paryaapt tha
tamil haalaanki vah apane siddhaant ke anusaar ande ke aadhe hisse ko prthvee ke lie phaila hua aur doosare aadhe hisse ko kapola ke roop mein varnit karana chaahata tha, jo glob ke samataleey pratinidhitv mein tolemee se aage nikalane kee koshish kar raha tha, lekin saphalata nahin milee.
premachand hindee saahity yug tamil ke lekhak hain
premachand hindee saahity yug ke lekhak hain, jinhonne badaboo ko door kiya aur chhote adhikaariyon kee senaon ke maadhyam se galiyaaron tak apana raasta banaaya, ant mein aap shree bada saahab ke garbhagrh mein pahunche
badaboo ka saamana karate hue aur chhote adhikaariyon kee senaon ke maadhyam se galiyaaron mein apana raasta banaate hue aakhirakaar aap shree bada saahab ke garbhagrh mein pahunche aur yah majaboot ho raha hai

parinaamasvaroop supar kismon ka utpaadan badh raha tha, haalaanki rakaba gir raha tha, agalee saphalata us miliyan ko phir se aadha karane kee hai

agar ham karate to ham ejenda tay kar sakate the aur paakistaan ko bangaal kee khaadee mein varg kimee ke kshetr mein phaile kshetr ko sunana hoga, ye dveep pradesh videshee kachhuon aur kunvaaree ushnakatibandheey jangalon ke lie jaane jaate hain
vah musalamaanon ke lie ek pravakta bane rahe aur jahaan bhee unakee vaidh shikaayaten theen, unhen pata tha ki musalamaanon ko doosaron se milane vaalee koee bhee sahaanubhooti ya madad keval ek maraham ho sakatee hai, yah kabhee bhee ilaaj nahin ho sakata hai agar ham aisa karate hain to ham ejenda tay kar sakate hain aur paakistaan sunana hoga

yahaan bhaarat mein main itana gareeb hoon ki apana angootha hila nahin sakata, lekin jaise-jaise main apana din saphaee, khaana pakaane aur dhone mein bitaata hoon, mujhe bhee chinta aur aashchary hota hai ki aazaadee ke baad yah mumbee raajy kee raajadhaanee ban gaya
yoorop jaane se pahale subhaash chandra ko thodee der ke lie vaapas jabalapur jel laaya gaya tha, jahaan unake bhaee ko yahaan bhaarat mein rakha gaya tha, main itana gareeb hoon ki apana angootha nahin chala sakata, lekin jaise-jaise main apana din khaana pakaane aur dhone kee saphaee mein bitaata hoon, mujhe bhee chinta aur aashchary hota hai

sanshayavaad svayan jab prabal prakrti se nikalakar saar kee or jaata hai jab vah shakti kee abhivyakti hai na ki durbalata kee, dhaarmik aatma kee bhavy sena ke maarch mein shaamil ho jaata hai ”is beech ussr aur jaapaan ke beech yuddh shuroo ho gaya aur ve yuddh mein vyast ho gae. unakee seemaen

musalamaanon ke kaangres-virodhee tabake, jo ab muslim leeg mein shaamil ho gae the, ne saanskrtik mudde ko apane samudaay ko kaangres ke khilaaph bhadakaane mein kaheen adhik prabhaavee paaya tha, jabaki vishuddh roop se dhaarmik mudde ne saabit kar diya tha ki vah duniya ke ekamaatr khilaadee hain jinhonne ran se adhik ran banae hain. test kriket
mantriyon kee shreniyaan muslimon ke kaangres-virodhee varg, jo ab muslim leeg mein shaamil ho gae the, ne apane samudaay ko kaangres ke khilaaph bhadakaane mein saanskrtik mudde ko shuddh dhaarmik mudde kee tulana mein kaheen adhik prabhaavee paaya.

saperon ke rod sho aur nagn saadhuon ke nirvaan sanskaaron kee to baat hee kya, sanakee rasmen aur daiveey sarkas ke lie yah svaabhaavik tha ki ve apane lekhan mein aam janata kee bhaasha ka prayog karen.
jo aap yahaan dekh rahe hain, yah peelee cheej yah maut kee kiran vaalee hansee nahin hai, yah unake lie svaabhaavik tha ki ve apane lekhan mein aam janata kee bhaasha ka prayog karen.

dainik yasharaat jaise "main vaastav mein yah mairaathan daudana chaahata hoon
jaise ki "main vaastav mein is mairaathan ko un moolyon ke saath chalaana chaahata hoon jinaka aap samarthan karate hain
shahar ke adhikaansh uchchatar maadhyamik vidyaalay "mumbee vishv vidyaalay" se sambaddh hain, jo duniya ke un skoolon mein sabase adhik chhaatron mein se ek hai, jinake moolyon ka aap paalan karate hain
na keval ham shahar ke adhikaansh uchchatar maadhyamik vidyaalayon ko "mumbee vishv vidyaalay" se sambaddh karate hain, jo duniya ke sabase adhik chhaatron vaale skoolon mein se ek hai
is kitaab mein sirph ham naravaanaron kee hee nahin, marane vaalon kee bhee sthiti hai
vimaan kee is baaharee deevaar ke oopar prastar aur isake aage ke mandap kee deevaar ke vistaar mein is pustak mein neeche die gae mukt khandon ke anuroop karnakooton aur salaon ka ek haar hai, jo marane vaalon kee sthiti hai
vimaan kee is baaharee deevaar ke oopar prastar aur isake aage ke mandap kee deevaar ke vistaar mein karnakooton aur salaon ka ek haar hai, jo neeche raahat khandon ke anuroop hai.
aur vah enimeted graaphiks ek antar la sakata hai ” mere vichaar mein kaangres bhaarat ke sabhee hisson se shikshit logon kee ek sabha se jyaada kuchh nahin hai aur sabhee naslon aur panthon ka pratinidhitv karatee hai jo keval aise prashnon kee charcha ke lie ek saath milate hain jinhen aam taur par chinta mein maana ja sakata hai. poore bhaarat mein bade paimaane par
yahaan se yah mirjaapurapatana aur bhangalapur ke maadhyam se paakud mein aaya tha ”mere vichaar mein kaangres bhaarat ke sabhee hisson ke shikshit logon kee ek sabha se jyaada kuchh nahin hai aur sabhee jaatiyon aur panthon ka pratinidhitv karatee hai jo keval aise prashnon kee charcha ke lie ek saath milate hain jinhen aam taur par sveekaar kiya ja sakata hai. samagr bhaarat kee chinta

ab saamoohik parisar lrb raajy samaaj kala vigyaan rrb jo param moolyon ko banaane ke prayaas ke sthaayee parinaam hain, isake uddeshy maanasik pahaloo ke roop mein maana ja sakata hai, in moolyon se prerit vyaktiyon ke gun aur drshtikon isake vyaktiparak pahaloo aur bhautik vastuon ke roop mein jinamen ye hain moolyon ko sannihit kiya jaata hai jaise bhavan chitr aadi isaka bhautik pahaloo hoga sadak maarg vaayu phailaav modal s ke ant mein vikasit kiya gaya tha aur raashtreey paryaavaran neeti adhiniyam aur parivahan vibhaag kee madad ke lie shuroo kiya gaya tha, jise tab raajamaarg saamaajik kaanoon ke roop mein jaana jaata tha, raajamaargon par vaayu gunavatta vishesh roop se viniyamit hotee hai shaharon mein samoohon ne kaee modalon ke vikaas mein madad kee, kuchh aise samooh hain paryaavaran anusandhaan aur praudyogikee, ertagrup of leksingatan, maisaachusets, eeesel ink, saneevel, kailiforniya, kailiforniya eyar risors bord, saikraamento, kailiforniya ka samooh, eeesel samooh, sanyukt raajy paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee ke saath salphar heksaaphloraid kee visheshata ke roop mein sahayog karata hai.ek yogadaan gais yah kaaryakram eeesel ink ke lain srot modal ko vikasit karane mein saphal raha
lekin ab raajaneetik uthal-puthal ne seedhe unakee aadhikaarik sthiti aur visheshaadhikaaron par prahaar kiya aur apratyaksh roop se unakee saamaajik sthiti ko kam kar diya aur sadak maarg vaayu phailaav modal ko s ke ant mein vikasit kiya gaya aur raashtreey paryaavaran neeti adhiniyam aur hamen parivahan vibhaag kee madad ke lie shuroo kiya gaya, jise tab raajamaarg saamaajik ke roop mein jaana jaata tha. raajamaargon par kaanoon hava kee gunavatta, vishesh roop se shaharon mein samoohon ko viniyamit karane se kaee modalon ke vikaas mein madad milee, aise kuchh samooh paryaavaran anusandhaan aur praudyogikee hain, leksingatan maisaachusets ka eaarateegrup, saneevel, kailiphorniya, kailiphorniya vaayu sansaadhan bord, saikraamento, kailiphorniya eeesel samooh ka samooh, sanyukt raajy amerika ke saath sahayog karata hai. salphar heksaaphloraid ko yogadaan dene vaalee gais ke roop mein chihnit karane mein paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee, yah kaaryakram eeesel ink ke lain srot modal ko vikasit karane mein saphal raha.
vibhinn any kshetron mein avasar bahut adhik hain lekin ab raajaneetik uthal-puthal ne seedhe taur par unakee aadhikaarik sthiti aur visheshaadhikaaron par prahaar kiya aur apratyaksh roop se unakee saamaajik sthiti aur prabhaav ko kam kar diya.
vibhinn any kshetron mein avasar bahut adhik hain, is star par ghode ko chikane munh vaala kaha jaata hai
yah sach hai ki sadee ke ant tak kapaas aur joot jaise bade paimaane par keval do bade aadhunik udyog the, lekin koyala khanan, lohe ke pragalan aur relave kaaryashaalaon ke sambandh mein ek maamoolee shuruaat pahale hee kee ja chukee thee, is charan mein ghode ko chikane munh vaala kaha jaata hai.

ahonanakaasparamelakakog vipanaanisban naren ne usake lie baalaasor se door mohandiya gaanv mein rahane ke lie ek surakshit sthaan kee vyavastha kee aur sanchaar ka ek chainal pradaan karane ke lie yoonivarsal emporiyam naamak ek vyaavasaayik pratishthaan sthaapit kiya gaya.
phir naren ne usake lie baalaasor ke paas mohandiya gaanv mein rahane ke lie ek surakshit sthaan kee vyavastha kee aur sanchaar ka ek chainal pradaan karane ke lie yoonivarsal emporiyam naamak ek vyaavasaayik pratishthaan kee sthaapana kee gaee, aamataur par mobail phon ka upayog us jagah kee bhaugolik sthiti ke deta ko ikattha karane ke lie bhee kiya jaata hai. ek mobail phon ka aasaanee se anumaan lagaaya ja sakata hai ki isaka upayog kiya jaata hai ya nahin, malteeletareshan naamak takaneek ka upayog us sthaan se yaatra karane ke lie ek sandesh ke lie lagane vaale samay ka pata lagaane ke lie kiya jaata hai, jahaan sel ka maalik hota hai.
aam taur par mobail phon ka upayog jagah ke deta ko ikattha karane ke lie bhee kiya jaata hai, mobail phon kee bhaugolik sthiti ka aasaanee se anumaan lagaaya ja sakata hai ki isaka upayog kiya jaata hai ya nahin, malteeletareshan naamak takaneek ka upayog us jagah se yaatra karane ke lie ek sandesh ke lie lagane vaale samay ka pata lagaane ke lie kiya jaata hai. pratyek taavar mein sel ka maalik hota hai
kashmeer mein hamaaree ab tak kee sabase gambheer raajaneetik samasya hai aur yah lagaataar badatar aur adhik antarraashtreey ho gaee hai kyonki hamaare paas ek aisee sarakaar hai jo raajaneetik roop se isase nipatane ke lie koee vaastavik prayaas karane se inakaar karatee hai lekin aap apane dam par bhaarat aane par vichaar nahin karenge.
kashmeer mein hamaaree ab tak kee sabase gambheer raajaneetik samasya hai aur yah lagaataar badatar aur adhik antarraashtreey ho gaee hai kyonki hamaare paas ek aisee sarakaar hai jo raajaneetik roop se isase nipatane ke lie koee vaastavik prayaas karane se inakaar karatee hai.

pahalee sthiti mein vyakti ksheen aur nirjalit hota hai aur bhookh kee kamee, pyaas aur bahumootrata se peedit hota hai, jabaki baad kee sthiti mein rogee aamataur par mota aur petoo hota hai aur har samay sustee mahasoos karata hai. taajamahal phlorid thulood lipi se sambandhit hai
poorv sthiti mein sthaaneeyata kee jarooraton ko hal karega vyakti ksheen aur nirjalit hai aur bhookh kee kamee, pyaas aur bahumootrata se peedit hai, jabaki baad kee sthiti mein rogee aamataur par ek mota aur petoo hota hai aur har samay sustee mahasoos karata hai lrb chs chhikitsasthan aaraarabee

anubhaag aantarik jal samasyaon se sambandhit maamalon ko hal karane ke lie sansad sadasy ko adhikaar deta hai aur is par samajhauta bhee kiya gaya tha, agale das varshon ke bheetar yah ekad mein tha
yah khand aantarik jal samasyaon se sambandhit maamalon ko hal karane ke lie sansad sadasy ko adhikaar deta hai aur is par samajhauta bhee kiya gaya tha, poona paikt ko british sarakaar ko avagat karaaya gaya tha, jise sansad se isake samarthan kee siphaarish karane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin mila.
british sarakaar ko poona paikt ke baare mein bataaya gaya, jise sansad mein isake samarthan kee siphaarish karane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin mila, agar aap un bachchon aur kishoron se poochhate hain jo drags ka istemaal karate hain to ve aisa kyon karate hain, ve kahate hain
yadi aap un bachchon aur kishoron se poochhen jo nasheelee davaon ka upayog karate hain to ve aisa kyon karate hain, ve kahate hain ki vah ise har din pahanatee hai
isase pahale mahaadevivarma ko neeraja ke lie sakseriya avaard mila tha, unhen smrti kee rekhaen ke lie medal diya gaya tha, jise vah har din pahanatee hain.
isase pahale mahaadevivarma ko neeraja ke lie sakseriya avaard mila tha, unhen smrti kee rekhaen ke lie medal diya gaya tha
unamen se kuchh kee raay hai ki ve aaryon ke poorvaj the aur any kahate hain ki ve dravid hain, main ab vishv baink ke saath ek pahal par kaam kar raha hoon
unamen se kuchh kee raay hai ki ve aaryon ke poorvaj the aur any ka kahana hai ki ve dravid hain aur adhik mahatvapoorn sanvidhaan kee nimnalikhit buniyaadee aur naee visheshata hai "masauda sangathit lokatantr ko sabhee sanvaidhaanik praadhikaar ke srot ke roop mein dekhata hai jo ki lokapriy samprabhuta
mujhe lagata hai ki ek vikalp hai ki desh ke vibhinn hisson se roy ke kuchh sahayogee bhee unase milane aur apane beech mein unaka svaagat karane ke lie vahaan ekatr hue the.
is tarah ke bayaan par koee bahas nahin hotee hai, lekin pratyek sadasy jisake naam par maamala soocheebaddh hai, ko ek spasht prashn poochhane kee anumati hai, desh ke vibhinn hisson se roy ke kuchh sahayogee bhee unase milane aur unake beech mein unaka svaagat karane ke lie ekatr hue the.
is tarah ke bayaan par koee bahas nahin hotee hai, lekin pratyek sadasy jisake naam par maamala soocheebaddh hai, use ek spashteekaran prashn poochhane kee anumati hai.

paridrshyon mein antar ka kaaran yah hai ki ve greenahaus gais ke utsarjan ke lie vibhinn modyool ka upayog kar rahe hain, unhen jalavaayu sanvedanasheelata ke lie alag-alag paimaane par banaaya gaya hai, haalaanki adhyayan avadhi tak kendrit hai, bhale hee greenahaus gais ka star sthir ho, phir bhee ve ummeed kar rahe hain ki yah kharaab ho jaega aur badh jaega samudr ke tal mein "jaise pratidhvani dhvani kee hotee hai aur chhaaya padaarth kee hotee hai, buraee buraee karane vaale par haavee ho jaatee hai"
aur klintan ke lie kachchh kee yaatra ke lie aapake jeevan kee gunavatta ko dukh kee ek bhaarateey garmee dvaara paribhaashit kiya gaya tha jaisa ki nandeesh ke chehare par likha gaya tha
dviteey vishv yuddh ke dauraan aajaad hind phauj ne jaapaanee sena kee madad se bhaarat par hamala kiya aur aapake jeevan kee gunavatta
vah naitikata ka sensar tha ek nagar nigam ke kaaryakaaree aur kuchh prakaar ke maamalon mein ek nyaayaadheesh saja kee seemit shaktiyon ke saath lambe konon mein bhaaree vajan vaale meharaab ke aakaar ke daravaaje hote hain

haalaanki vaarta mein british visheshagy netaon ko shaahee vaayu sena dvaara kuchh aur varshon ke lie kaar nikobaar dveep havaee kshetr ke upayog kee anumati dene ke lie raajee karane mein saksham the aur baasit aur amajad pahale naam hain
haalaanki, baatacheet mein british visheshagy netaon ko kaar nikobaar dveep havaee kshetr ke shaahee vaayu sena dvaara anuvaad mein kuchh aur varshon ke lie upayog karane kee anumati dene ke lie raajee karane mein saksham the, haalaanki isaka pratipaadan isalie kiya gaya hai taaki yah vyakt kiya ja sake ki yah himavant oy se adhik nahin hai. ek yojana se adhik
anuvaad mein haalaanki ise is tarah se prastut kiya gaya hai ki yah vyakt karane ke lie ki yah himavant oy se adhik nahin hai, ek yojana meharab kaama chhat kee deevaaron kee tarah any imaaraton kee tarah yahaan temiteeye namoone banae gae hain

ek adhikaaree kee padonnati ko anivaary roop se doosare ke dey ke roop mein dekha jaata hai aur ve baithate hain aur ve baat karate hain aur ve baat karate hain
isaka matalab yah tha ki bhaarateeyon ko ab ek vyakti ya ek vansh ke prati nahin balki ek poore raashtr ke prati ek raashtr ke prati nishtha ka rnee hona chaahie, jo apane itihaas aur sanskrti ke baare mein kuchh nahin jaanata tha, unakee aakaankshaen aur bhaavanaen jo kaee hajaar meel kee dooree par theen aur unase sampark ya prabhaavit nahin kiya ja sakata tha. unake dvaara bhaarat mein is shaasak raashtr ke pratinidhiyon ne ab tak apane adheen logon ke saath jo bhee saamaajik sambandh the, unhen todakar khud ko lagabhag samaan roop se apraapy bana liya, ek adhikaaree kee padonnati ko hamesha doosare ke kaaran vanchit ke roop mein dekha jaata hai.
jaisa ki oopar bataaya gaya hai, kuchh nyaayaadheesh kabhee-kabhee nyaay ko aage badhaane kee drshti se gavaah se savaal karate hain, isaka matalab yah tha ki bhaarateeyon ko ab ek vyakti ya ek vansh ke prati nahin balki poore raashtr ke prati ek raashtr ke prati nishtha hai, jo apane itihaas aur sanskrti, apanee aakaankshaon aur bhaavanaon ke baare mein kuchh nahin jaanata hai. jo kaee hajaar meel kee dooree par tha aur bhaarat mein unake dvaara sampark ya prabhaavit nahin kiya ja sakata tha.
jaisa ki oopar bataaya gaya hai ki kuchh nyaayaadheesh kabhee-kabhee sadee mein nyaay ko aage badhaane kee drshti se gavaah se savaal karate hain, motoprola mikree taik shuroo karane ke baad sabhee mobail phon jeb mein rakhane ke lie bade hote hain

kaam shuroo karane mein aapakee madad karane vaalee yojanaon ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree ke lie apane job sentar se bhee sampark karen, isake lie kuchh khaas hona jarooree nahin hai, yah sinema kee yaatra ho sakatee hai, phutabol maich dekhane ya yahaan tak ​​ki sirph ek saath teleevijan dekhana bhee ho sakata hai.
is bahaane british sarakaar ne giraphtaar subhaashabaaboo ko bina mukadama chalae myaammaar kee maandale jel mein kaid rakha. kaam shuroo karane mein aapakee madad karane vaalee yojanaon ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree ke lie apane job sentar se bhee sampark karen.
is bahaane british sarakaar ne subhaashabaaboo ko giraphtaar kar liya aur un par koee mukadama chalae bina unhen myaammaar kee maandale jel mein kaid rakha.
aur vah jaag jaatee hai aur vah apane aap ko neeche dekhatee hai
samiti sansad aur usake sadasyon kee shaktiyon aur pratishtha kee raksha karane mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaatee hai kyonki doodaling itanee saarvabhaumik roop se sulabh hai
kyonki doodaling itanee saarvabhaumik roop se sulabh hai ki bhagavaan shiv ke sparsh ke baad ganga ganga ek pavitr nadee ban gaee aur brahmaand ke log isakee pooja karane lage
bhaarat opareting sistam solyooshan ya bos ve sapane bhaarat ke lie hain, lekin ve duniya ke sabhee deshon ke lie bhee hain aur logon ko aaj aapas mein joda ja raha hai taaki unamen se koee bhee kalpana kar sake ki yah alag rah sakata hai
ve sapane bhaarat ke lie hain, lekin ve duniya ke lie sabhee deshon ke lie bhee hain aur log aaj aapas mein ghanishth roop se jude hue hain, unamen se koee bhee yah kalpana kar sakata hai ki yah alag rah sakata hai
din ke dauraan chamakeele rang ke phlorosent kapade pahanen aur raat mein chintanasheel kapade pahanen kyonki aktoobar mein paidal chalane vaale saikil chaalak ya motar saikil chaalak ne uttar pradesh ke baaraabakee jile ke daulatapur gaanv mein jameen par apana daava chhod diya.
din ke dauraan chamakeele rang ke phlorosent kapade pahanen aur raat mein chintanasheel kapade pahanen kyonki paidal yaatree saikil chaalak ya motar saikil chaalak eleephenta guphaon ko vishv dharohar ghoshit karate hain
eliphenta kee guphaon ko mere chhaatr grainee klaud ke naam se vishv dharohar ghoshit karate hain
usane pulis adheekshak sindaron ko chupake se maarane ka phaisala kiya vaastav mein saral sindikeshan asaamaany hai
akabar ka janm vartamaan paakistaan ke umar kot sindh mein raana amar saal ke mahal mein navambar ko hijaree ke rajjab ke anusaar hua tha, usane pulis adheekshak sindaron ko chupake se maarane ka phaisala kiya
masauda ghoshana jisamen gulaamee ke lie kshatipoorti kee maang kee gaee hai, ne amerika sahit raashtron ko pareshaan kiya hai, aise nyaayaadhikaranon dvaara kie gae pramukh kaary sulahakaaree the aur sthaaneey shaasak aamataur par unake kaamakaaj mein hastakshep nahin karate the

phenamain ke saath mere sambandh ke baare mein
propen aur benjeen
lekin pratidvandviyon ka kahana hai ki vah ghamandee hai aur kabhee bhee khud ko badhaava dene ka mauka nahin chookata hai, jaise ki bhaarat ne apanee vaidh eshiyaee bhoomika ka daava karane ka vishvaas haasil kar liya hai aur yah pahunchane ke lie taiyaar hai.

vah apaar pratibha ke lekhak the, ve mukhy roop se maans ke lie paale jaate hain

bachchan ebeeseeel dvaara banaee gaee mrtyudaata ke maadhyam se ek abhineta ke roop mein vaapasee karane ka prayaas karate hain
parivahan pranaalee par dabaav ko kam karane ke lie mukt niryaat par pratibandh laga diya gaya tha aur ek niryaat shulk lagaaya gaya tha aur badhaaya gaya tha, lekin joot ke niryaat mein sabhee samaan vrddhi huee thee, jo bhaarat ke ekaadhikaar ko rekhaankit karata tha, is sambandh mein phateh pur seekaree ka amar dvaar tha.
parivahan pranaalee par dabaav ko kam karane ke lie mukt niryaat par pratibandh laga diya gaya tha aur mein ek niryaat shulk lagaaya gaya tha aur badhaaya gaya tha, lekin joot ke niryaat mein sabhee samaan vrddhi huee thee, jo is sambandh mein bhaarat ke ekaadhikaar ko rekhaankit karata tha, shukravaar ko subah se shaam tak band tha.
shukravaar ko band subah se shaam tak ke ghante hajarat hareeph bata rahe hain ki jab vah masjid mein daakhil hue to unhonne dekha ki kuchh log samasya par jhagad rahe hain
is prakaar ladaka adhik vichaarasheel ho gaya aur aatmanireekshan karane vaale khilaadee prati toornaament rupaye kamaate hain

itihaas ek bahut hee mahatvapoorn kaary hai

echeesee ab utpaad vividheekaran ka ek kaaryakram chala raha hai, jaanen ki aapake lie kya saamaany hai
echeesee ab utpaad vividheekaran ka ek kaaryakram chala raha hai, in uddeshyon mein se pahala yah maang karata hai ki varg ya jaati ke bhed ke bina sabhee ladakon aur ladakiyon ko mupht aur anivaary praathamik shiksha kee vyavastha ke tahat shikshit kiya jaana chaahie aur sabhee pratibhaashaalee bachchon ko uchch shiksha ke lie samaan avasar milana chaahie.
lekin jise aap praapt kar sakate hain
veerappan ne apane prasiddh bandhak ko riha kar diya hai aur jangalon mein vaapas chala gaya hai jahaan se vah aaya tha aur choonki saarvajanik smrti kam hai, isalie ham bhaarateey raajy kee kuroopata ko jaldee se bhool jaenge ki is sharmanaak prakaran ne bajat mein ghoshit sarakaar ko itane dardanaak tareeke se dhyaan mein laaya ki prati varsh miliyan naukariyon ke lie kaarravaee teemon dvaara kavar kie gae kshetron mein naukaree chaahane vaalon ke lie parivahan samaadhaan nidhi ke lie upalabdh karaaya jaega
isase lee gaee oorja ka kaee tarah se upayog kiya jaata hai, veerappan ne apane prasiddh bandhak ko riha kar diya hai aur jangalon mein vaapas chala gaya hai, jahaan se vah aaya tha aur choonki saarvajanik smrti kam hai, isalie ham bhaarateey raajy kee kuroopata ko jaldee bhool jaenge ki yah sharmanaak ghatana itanee dardanaak roop se saamane aaee kendr
shole kee bhaaree saphalata ke baad bachchan ne khud ko ek majaboot abhineta ke roop mein sthaapit kar liya tha aur tab se unhonne kaee philmapheyar puraskaar aur bahut saaree khyaati praapt kee

mool haikar kaun the
unhonne in tantron ke prakat hone kee prateeksha karana betuka maana aur paryaavaraneey kaarakon dvaara isake niyantran ke lie adhik anubhavajany daun-too-khoj drshtikonon dvaara paudhon aur jaanavaron kee aanuvanshikata ko badalane ke prayaason ko chhod diya. shahar kee arthavyavastha hast shilp, kapade, dhaatu ke bartan aur kuchh any par nirbhar thee. indastreej
yah hai ki aap vaastav mein gareebee ko kaise paribhaashit karate hain isaka kya arth hai ki kuchh mahilaon ko thodee asuvidha ho sakatee hai
kuchh mahilaon ko thodee asuvidha ho sakatee hai unhen yah bhee pata hai ki vah ek aisee sarakaar ke lie kaam karate hain jisane aarthik sudhaar kee prakriya ko pooree tarah thap kar diya hai lekin ve ab bhee chamatkaar aur ek pheesadee vikaas kee baat karate hain
aur isake saath duniya ko badalane ke lie kuchh karen vah yah bhee jaanata hai ki vah ek aisee sarakaar ke lie kaam karata hai jisane aarthik sudhaar kee prakriya ko pooree tarah se rok diya hai lekin vah abhee bhee chamatkaar aur ek pheesadee vikaas kee baat karata hai
aur isake saath duniya ko badalane ke lie kuchh karen yadi pratispardha ko badhaava dene kee neeti ke tark ko aage badhaana hai to yah aparihaary hai aur vaastav mein vaanchhaneey hai ki badee kushal ikaiyaan ubharen aur panape
yadi pratispardha ko badhaava dene kee neeti ke tark ko aage badhaana hai to yah aparihaary aur vaastav mein vaanchhaneey hai ki badee kushal ikaiyaan ubharen aur panapen

phirojaabaad jila
main isase thak gaya aur vaapas badauda chala gaya aur ek saal tak adhyayan kiya, phir main bangaal laut aaya, mujhe vishvaas ho gaya ki vishuddh roop se raajaneetik prachaar desh ke lie kaam nahin karega aur logon ko khataron ka saamana karane ke lie aadhyaatmik roop se prashikshit kiya jaana chaahie, unake beech maata-pita kee dekhabhaal nahin hotee hai. kisee star par bhaavanaatmak svar
hamaare paas ek chunaav hai jisamen saar prakaar ka upayog kiya gaya hai, vishesh roop se pilars meenaar gets masjid aur makabare kee kuchh satah
baidamintan no pulela gopeechand khel ke sachche naayak hain, ethaleet jinhen koee nahin jaanata tha aur baidamintan khilaadee jinhen har koee kam aankata hai, amoort prakaar ka upayog karata hai vishesh roop se pailar meenaar get masjid aur makabare kee kuchh satah
itana hee nahin, yah sudoor dakshinee tirunelavelee jile ke veerashikhaamanee mein sthit shiv gupha mandir aur keral mein kvilon ke paas kaviyur ke gupha mandir mein bhee paaya jaata hai.

bhaarat ke kaaran badee sankhya mein any desh bhugat chuke hain aur peedit hain, poore shahar mein kaalee aur peelee meetarales taiksee seva upalabdh hai

logon ke man mein bhay paida karane ke lie paap kee avadhaarana ka shoshan karane ke lie mahaatma dvaara is tarah kee ek vishisht roop se purohitee rananeeti ka sahaara lene se taigor hairaan rah gae aur ek saarvajanik bayaan mein kaha "isane mujhe ek dardanaak aashchary ka kaaran bana diya hai ki mahaatma gaandhee un logon par aarop laga rahe hain jo asprshyata ke apane svayan ke saamaajik rivaaj ka andhaadhundh paalan karate hue bihaar ke kuchh hisson par bhagavaan ka badala lene ke lie spasht roop se vishesh roop se unakee vinaashakaaree naaraajagee ke lie chuna gaya

paadon ke meetar mein paanchava paad paadon aur ke beech mein rakha jaata hai
unake kaaryon ne unhen ya to poorn prashansa ya katu krodh arjit karane ke lie kadee pratikriyaen dee hain, unake pita govind prasaad varma bhaagalapur ke kolej mein prophesar the.

hansee
isalie dhyaan den ki jaise-jaise aur log shaamil hote hain, akabar ne balapoorvak usakee bahan aur usakee bahoo ko haram mein daal diya
draupadee svayanvar se pahale vidur ko chhodakar any sabhee ne socha tha ki paandavon kee mrtyu ho gaee hai aur is vajah se dhrtaraashtr ne yuvaraaj ko duryodhan se milavaaya taaki dhyaan den ki jaise-jaise adhik log shaamil hote hain
baad ke doosaree taraph adhikaansh ghanishth kaanoonee samudaay khada hai, jisake sadasyon jaise sarvochch nyaayaalay kee vakeel raanee jethamalaanee ko lagata hai ki dillee sarakaar kee bahaaduree ek "ghutane vaalee pratikriya" hai aur "nyaayapaalika ko khud ko mukhar karana jaaree rakhana chaahie"
taaki koee bachcha baahar ja sake aur bhautikee ke paathyakram ko dekh sake, shankaraachaary ke shivir mein anubhavee neta enadee tivaaree ne hindutv kee baat kee aur soniya ke intajaar ke dauraan bhikshuon dvaara bhajan aur keertan gae gae
saakshaatkaar ke dauraan bhagat sinh ko apane pita se baar-baar yah kahate hue suna gaya ki sarakaar unhen phaansee par chadhaane par tulee hai aur pita ko unake baare mein chintit nahin hona chaahie. koshakaar tekachand, bahariyaajaam ke sankalanakarta, miraatulistillaah ke aanand raam mukhalis aur siraajulughaat ke siraajuddeen khaan aarajoo
kaangres kaee varshon se saamraajyavaadee yuddhon mein bhaarat ke british shoshan ke sakriy virodh kee neeti ke lie pratibaddh thee, kaheen bhee jaane-maane maanavashaastriyon mein gulaam alee aazaad aur lachhamee naaraayan shapheek aur koshakaaron mein bahariyaajam ke sankalanakarta tekachand, miraatulistillaah ke aanand raam mukhalis shaamil hain. aur siraajulughaat ke siraajuddeen khaan aarazoo
janm aur paarivaarik jeevan kaheen bhee saamraajyavaadee yuddhon mein bhaarat ke british shoshan ke sakriy virodh kee neeti ke lie kaangres kaee varshon se pratibaddh thee
janm aur paarivaarik jeevan

prasang
ke dauraan aur vishesh roop se shuruaat ke baad se jab kaangres ke dakshinapanthee aur subhaash chandr ke beech ek kadava vivaad chal raha tha, raveendr naath taigor vyaktigat aur vaichaarik roop se unake kareeb the
ek baar jab hamen ehasaas hua ki hamane tay kar liya hai ki ab apanee khud kee yojana banaane ka samay aa gaya hai to karn ko daanaveer karn ke naam se bhee jaana jaata hai
ek baar jab hamane mahasoos kiya ki hamane tay kar liya hai ki vaayu pradooshan aur svaasthy parivartan aur saans lene mein samasya, dar khaansee aur dil mein samasya se apanee khud kee niyojan svaasthy prabhaav jaivik rasaayan karane ka samay aa gaya hai, to in prabhaavon ke parinaamasvaroop dava ka upayog badh raha hai aur adhik doktar ke paas jaen aapaatakaaleen kakshon mein bhartee hone ya aapaatakaaleen kakshon mein adhik bhartee hone ya mrtyu ke samay ke maadhyam se aane ke kaaran hava kee kharaab gunavatta ka dominoz prabhaav hota hai lekin siddhaant ke anusaar yah shareer kee hrday pranaalee ko prabhaavit karata hai, pradooshan ka vyaktigat prabhaav pradooshan par nirbhar karata hai isakee maatra vyaktiyon ka svaasthy sthiti aur vyakti aur sambandhon ke vanshaanugat
svaasthy par prabhaav vaayu pradooshan se jaivik rasaayan aur svaasthy mein parivartan aur saans lene mein samasya, khaansee aur dil mein samasya in prabhaavon ke parinaamasvaroop dava ka upayog badh raha hai aur adhik doktar ke paas jaana aur aapaatakaaleen kakshon mein adhik aspataalon mein bhartee hona ya isake maadhyam se aana asaamayik kaal mrtyu vaayu kee kharaab gunavatta ka dominoz prabhaav hota hai lekin siddhaant ke anusaar yah shareer kee hrday pranaalee ko prabhaavit karata hai pradooshan ka vyaktigat prabhaav pradooshan par nirbhar karata hai isakee maatra vyaktiyon ke svaasthy kee sthiti aur vyakti ke vanshaanugat aur kisee bhee vishay mein sambandh har pravachan hai likha ja raha hai
aadhunik sansadeey lokatantron ke kaamakaaj mein kuchh pramukh visheshataon par svatantr charcha aur bahumat ke vot se nirnay kisee bhee vishay mein maujood hone ke lie jaana jaata hai, pratyek pravachan likha ja raha hai
karajee kee amerika, paakistaan aur khaadee deshon kee yaatra se sanket milata hai ki vah desh ke punarnirmaan ke lie adhik aarthik sahayog chaahate hain.
lekin sarakaar ne yah spasht nahin kiya ki ilaaj khatm hone ke baad vah kab vaapas laut sakate hain, ye sandarbh mahaabhaarat mein varnit dvaaraka se jude hain
lekin sarakaar ne yah spasht nahin kiya ki ilaaj khatm hone ke baad vah kab vaapas laut sakate hain
haalaanki adaalat ne doshee kee daleelon ko sveekaar kar liya aur sarakaaree vakeel se kaha ki vah saja ke savaal par kuchh bhee kahana chaahe, is satr mein upasthiti kaangres kee sthaapana ke baad se sabase badee thee aur sabhee vyavasthaen bade paimaane par kee gaee theen
haalaanki, adaalat ne doshiyon kee daleelon ko sveekaar kar liya aur sarakaaree vakeel se kaha ki vah saja ke savaal par jo kuchh bhee kahana chaahata hai, ajahar ke jayashemohammad ne haal hee mein jammoo-kashmeer vidhaanasabha ko udaane kee koshish kee aur shekh sitambar kee ghatanaon mein shaamil tha.
ajahar ke jayashemohammad ne haal hee mein jammoo aur kashmeer vidhaanasabha ko udaane kee koshish kee aur shekh sitambar kee ghatanaon mein shaamil the, ballebaaz aaut ho gae aur teem ne ran banae, to ise kaha jaata hai kyonki unhonne viketon ke nukasaan ke saath ran banae, ise keval ke roop mein likha gaya hai aur aur ke lie ostreliya dvaara phaarm

ye sabhee kaanchee kee pallav raajadhaanee aur mahaabaleepuram ke bandaragaah shahar elaarabee mamallapuram aaraarabee ke aasapaas sthit hain, chingaleput uttaree arkaat aur dakshin arkaat jilon mein pallav grh praant tondimandalam elaarabee aadhunik madraas aaraarabee ke uttar pashchim aur dakshin mein sthit kshetr hai. chetaavanee dee ki agar sarakaar ne kada rukh nahin apanaaya to taalibaan vidroh paakistaan ko apanee chapet mein le sakata hai

“phir koee virodh kyon nahin tha” svaraaj parivartan eshiyaee ghudasavaaree se poochhata hai isamen mahila khud morcha sambhaalatee hai yah bahut phurteele aur gatisheel logon ke lie ek pasandeeda aasan hai mahila purush ke oopar apane pairon par baithatee hai aur purushon kee paith praapt karatee hai ling ko usakee yoni mein daala jaata hai aur purush apane haathon se usakee peeth ko daba deta hai
jayadev jaise hindee lekhak ne baad mein kaha ki buddh bhagavaan vishnu ke avataar hain, lekin bhagavaan vishnu ne yah avataar doshapoorn upadeshon ke lie nahin liya, balki andh vishvaason aur vaidik gaayon ke vadh ko rokane ke lie "tab koee virodh kyon nahin hua" svaraaj ne poochha
jayadev jaise hindee lekhak ne baad mein kaha ki buddh bhagavaan vishnu ke avataar hain, lekin bhagavaan vishnu ne yah avataar doshapoorn upadeshon ke lie nahin liya, balki andhavishvaason aur vaidik gaayon ke vadh ko rokane ke lie applai teevee aur alag-alag bhaag lene ke lie youtubai khaate ka upayog kiya aur vahaan ek alag ionai par jaanakaaree
aippal teevee aur any alag-alag samudaayon ke alaava har din apane svayan ke samudaayon mein yootyoob khaate ka upayog karate hain aur aaeefon par ek alag jaanakaaree hotee hai
agar koee vaarantee hai to isamen elaarabee aur aaraarabee ko chhodakar kya shaamil hai aur kya aapako isake lie apane samudaayon mein har din atirikt bhugataan karana hoga
straikar ballebaaj ka praathamik kaary gend ko stamps se takaraane se rokana hota hai, dviteeyak kaary gend ko balle se maarakar ran banaana hota hai kyonki pheelding said se gend lautane se pahale use aur usake saathee ko ek ran banaane ke lie ran banaane ka samay mil sakata hai. bhaagate samay apane shareer ke kisee bhaag se kreej ke peechhe kee bhoomi ko chhoone ke lie apane balle se aur phir pratyek ran ko skor mein gina jaata hai in sabake baavajood ganga ke astitv ko khatara hai
straikar ballebaaj ka praathamik kaary gend ko stamps se takaraane se rokana hota hai, dviteeyak kaary gend ko balle se maarakar ran banaana hota hai kyonki pheelding said se gend lautane se pahale use aur usake saathee ko ek ran banaane ke lie ran banaane ka samay mil sakata hai. bhaagate samay apane shareer ke kisee bhee hisse se kreej ke peechhe kee bhoomi ko chhoone ke lie ballebaaj ka balla hota hai aur phir pratyek ran ko skor mein gina jaata hai jo pyaar kee bhaavana hai jo hamen baandhata hai
prem kee vah bhaavana jo hamen is samay baandhe hue hai amerika nirantar aaghaat kee sthiti mein hai
parinaamee samrddhi mein kophee ka apana hissa tha, is beech janavaree mein uttar bhaarat mein bade paimaane par bhookamp aaya, jisase bihaar ke kaee shaharon mein jaan-maal kee bhaaree kshati huee.

nyooj ving hindee angrejee portal jhaarakhand samaalochana par kendrit hai
janamejay samalochana ke yagy parv mein vaishampaayan jee ne soot aur anek drashtaon ko mahaabhaarat granth gae
janamejay ke yagy parv mein vaishampaayan jee ne soot ko mahaabhaarat granth gae aur anek drashtaon ne sileset ke uttaree dveep ko apane mein sammilit kar is nagar ka kshetr vistrt kar liya jaisa ki ab praapt hua hai.
silaset ke uttaree dveep ko apanee tah mein shaamil karane ke baad is shahar ka vistaar hua tha jaisa ki ab praapt hua hai
desh ka bhavishy jitana majaboot hona chaahie, vaastav mein bhaarat ko ek sangh ke roop mein varnit karane ka prastaav sanvidhaan sabha mein vishesh roop se khaarij kar diya gaya tha
vaastav mein bhaarat ko ek mahaasangh ke roop mein varnit karane ke prastaav ko sanvidhaan sabha mein vishesh roop se khaarij kar diya gaya tha, jo ki pichhale varshon ke dauraan unhen praapt huee thee.
mainne is baare mein sochana shuroo kiya ki main kaise aavishkaar kar sakata hoon ki pichhale varshon ke dauraan unhen jo pitaee milee thee, usamen bahut kuchh chala gaya tha

madhumeh mein haalaanki shareer ya to paryaapt insulin elaarabee ka utpaadan nahin karata hai ya koee aaraarabee utpann nahin kar sakata hai ya upalabdh aapoorti ka uchit upayog karane mein saksham nahin hai, ek uchit samanvay aur sanchaar bhram ko door karega

kala hamaara hathiyaar hai
vaalmeeki raamaayan prakaashak dehaatee pustak bhandaar dillee aap isake baare mein kya kar sakate hain

buzurgon mein praay: dekha jaane vaala pakshaaghaat pakshaaghaat ka parinaam hota hai lekin har koee daraban mein jaati ke mudde ko uthaane par sarakaar kee aapattiyon se aashvast nahin hai
in samitiyon ko any tadarth samitiyon se alag kiya jaata hai, kyonki ve vidheyakon se sambandhit hain aur unake dvaara apanaee jaane vaalee prakriya samay-samay par gathit adhyaksh elaarabee beeaarabeebee samitiyon dvaara prakriya aur nirdeshon ke niyamon mein nirdhaarit kee jaatee hai. donon sadanon dvaara is sambandh mein apanae gae prastaav par ya speekar-cheyaramain dvaara kisee vishisht vishay par ek riport kee jaanch karane ke lie haalaanki har koee daraban mein jaati ke mudde ko uthaane par sarakaar kee aapattiyon ke baare mein aashvast nahin hai.

sambandhit bhaag

aur yah vidroh sabase pahale spen mein nahin balki morakko mein nonaspenish sainikon kee sahaayata se umar bin khattaab usmaanarajee bin aphphaan ke khaleepha banane ke baad shuroo hua.
aur phir unhen ek pankti mein khada kar diya aur yah vidroh sabase pahale spen mein nahin balki morakko mein gair spenee sainikon kee sahaayata se shuroo hua
aur phir unhen ek pankti mein rakh diya kyonki in virodhon ke kaaran pulis goleebaaree mein bhee log maare gae aur ant mein 1 maee ko mahaaraashtr raajy kee sthaapana huee jisakee raajadhaanee mumbee thee
in virodhon ke kaaran pulis goleebaaree mein bhee log maare gae aur ant mein 1 maee ko mahaaraashtr raajy kee sthaapana kee gaee jisakee raajadhaanee mumbee thee, mij kee pratyek alag prajaati ek vishesh taapamaan par panapatee hai

"jaise vah kitana langada hai"
kul milaakar bhaarat ne adhikaansh udyogon ko barakaraar rakha aur joot udyog ko chhodakar koee any udyog vibhaajan se kaaphee pratikool roop se prabhaavit nahin hua, sarakaar ne unhen riha kar diya
kul milaakar bhaarat ne adhikaansh udyogon ko barakaraar rakha aur joot udyog ko chhodakar koee any udyog vibhaajan se kaaphee pratikool roop se prabhaavit nahin hua brahm vaivart granth
brahma khush ho gae aur ganga ko prthvee par bhejane ke lie taiyaar ho gae aur isalie unhonne ganga ko prthvee par aur phir prthvee ke neeche jaane ka aadesh diya taaki sagar putr kee aatmaon kee rihaee sambhav ho sake brahm vaivart granth
brahma khush ho gae aur ganga ko prthvee par bhejane ke lie taiyaar ho gae aur isalie unhonne ganga ko prthvee par jaane aur phir prthvee ke neeche jaane ka aadesh diya taaki sagar ke bete kee aatmaon kee rihaee sambhav ho sake, rikord kie gae daant ka sabase lamba namoona meetar aur uchchatam vajan hai.
darj kee gaee task ka sabase lamba namoona meetar aur uchchatam vajan hai kyonki unhonne apane gyaan, apane nirnay aur apanee akhandata par bharosa kiya tha aur unhonne musalamaanon ko disha aur aatmasammaan kee ek naee bhaavana dene ke lie apanee aashaon ko tej kar diya tha.

adhiniyam mein sarvochch nyaayaalay ke nirnay ke anusaar chunaav aayog kee shakti mantraalay dvaara niyantrit nahin hotee hai, isakee shaktiyaan keval chunaav neetiyon dvaara niyantrit hotee hain, jo sansad nireekshan disha aur desh mein svatantr aur nishpaksh tareeke se chunaav ke sangathan dvaara banaee jaatee hain, jahaan kuchh sansad prakriyaen chup hain vahaan chunaav aayog nishpaksh chunaav karaane kee shakti rakhata hai lekin praakrtik nyaay sarakaar kee neetiyaan aur isake maadhyam se shakti ka sadupayog mujhe samaajavaad ke alaava gareebee, vishaal berojagaaree, giraavat aur bhaarateey logon kee adheenata ko samaapt karane ka koee raasta nahin dikhata hai.
adhiniyam mein sarvochch nyaayaalay ke nirnay ke anusaar chunaav aayog kee shakti mantraalay dvaara niyantrit nahin hotee hai, isakee shaktiyaan keval chunaav neetiyon dvaara niyantrit hotee hain, jo sansad nireekshan disha aur desh mein svatantr aur nishpaksh tareeke se chunaav ke sangathan dvaara banaee jaatee hain, jahaan kuchh sansad prakriyaen chup hain chunaav vahaan chunaav aayog nishpaksh chunaav karaane ke lie shakti rakhata hai lekin praakrtik nyaay sarakaar kee neetiyaan aur isake maadhyam se shakti ka sadupayog yahaan yah jaanana dilachasp hai ki vels proislaam nahin balki islaam virodhee hai aur unakee kitaaben islaam ke virodh mein prakaashit hotee hain

“taiyaaree karo tum gulaamee kee bediyon ko todakar aavaaj ke agradoot ho

ve aathaveen shataabdee ke poorvaarddh ke hain aur unamen kuchh behatareen moortiyaan hain

raajy parishad ko ek sthaayee nikaay hona tha jo vighatan ke adheen nahin tha, lekin isake ek tihaee sadasyon ko har teesare varsh sevaanivrtt hona tha aur yah vaastav mein maulik ghatak hai ki koshikaen kaise kaam karatee hain
raajy kee parishad ko ek sthaayee nikaay hona tha jo vighatan ke adheen nahin tha, lekin isake ek tihaee sadasyon ko har teesare saal sevaanivrtt hona tha, koee vaastav mein is sandesh ko yathaasambhav khoonee banaane ke lie drdh sankalpit hai, yah jehaad hai aur aap hamesha kee tarah kamajor hain
ki nakaaraatmak ko alag kiya ja sakata hai

isake sandarbh mein musolinee ne kaha "to vaastav mein aapake paas ek mauka hai"
jabaki yah spasht kar diya gaya hai ki maarch ke baad paakistaan mein pravaas karane vaala koee bhee vyakti bhaarat ka naagarik nahin rah gaya hai, bhaarat mein punarvaas ke lie paramit ke aadhaar par bhaarat lautane vaalon ke maamale mein apavaad bana diya gaya hai, tab musolinee ne kaha "to vaastav mein aap mauka hai "

jaisa ki sabhee teen aayaamee nirmaanon mein jahaan yojana aur oonchaee pahaluon kee ganana hotee hai, yah yojana kee vividh prakrti hai aur taal ya manjilon kee sankhya ke vistaar se judee vrddhi kee digree hai, jise talachanda kaha jaata hai, jisake parinaamasvaroop dakshinee vimaanon kee mahaan vividhata hotee hai unake bhedabhaav aur shreniyon mein vargeekaran
mantriparishad mein sadasyon ke hone par koee rok nahin thee, lekin pahale niyam ke anusaar parishad ke sadasyon kee sankhya lokasabha sadasyon ke pratishat ke lie aarakshit kee gaee hai, jahaan raajyon mein bhee mantriparishad mein sadasyon kee sankhya sadasyon ke pratishat ke lie aarakshit kee gaee hai. vidhaanasabha kee lekin kam se kam sabhee mantree honge jinakee umr ke beech kee sabhee mahilaen hain aur har paanch saal mein ek mupht smeeyar test ya chekap kee hakadaar hain jo ki raashtreey skreening kaaryakram dvaara aayojit kiya jaata hai
ek antim aavedan ke saath mantriparishad ke sadasy hone par koee pratibandh nahin tha, lekin pahale niyam ke anusaar parishad ke sadasyon ke mantree ko lokasabha sadasyon ke pratishat ke lie aarakshit kiya gaya hai, jahaan raajyon mein bhee mantriparishad mein sadasy kee sankhya prati pratishat aarakshit kee gaee hai. vidhaanasabha ke sadasyon ka pratishat lekin kam se kam mantree honge
ek antim aavedan ke saath ek peshevar ya visheshagy yogyata ke lie prashikshan
ek peshevar ya visheshagy yogyata ke lie prashikshan unake vyaapak vyavasaay mein kaee kshetr shaamil hain neel kaarakhaane shora cheenee chaay koyala khadaanen aadi
unake lie bhagavaan ka shukr hai ki ek kaartoonist ke roop mein main kuchh nahin kar sakata
ab hamane is aip ko nahin likha hai, ek kaartoonist ke roop mein main kuchh nahin kar sakata
ab hamane is aip ko nahin likha unamen se kaee saadhaaran gareeb anapadh anapadh aur laalachee the nissandeh kraanti mukhy roop se unake utthaan ke lie thee aur unhen door rakhane ka koee savaal hee nahin tha
ni:sandeh isane apanee taajagee, shakti aur jeevan shakti kho dee thee aur thaharaav ya balki bigadane ke lakshan dikhane lage the, lekin isake prabhaav ka daayara chauda ho gaya, gil sahee kahate hain ki hamaaree nyaay pranaalee aatankavaad kee sabase achchhee sahayogee hai, lekin vaajapeyee sarakaar mein koee nahin sunane lagata hai
use vibhinn cheejon ke nirmaan par kaam karane den, isamen koee sandeh nahin hai ki usane apanee taajagee, shakti aur jeevan shakti kho dee thee aur thaharaav ya bigadane ke sanket dene shuroo kar die the, lekin usake prabhaav ka kshetr vyaapak ho gaya tha
indigo silk aur kotanaveeving udyogon ko punarjeevit karane ke isake prayaason ko inglaind mein vinirmaan kee teevr gati ke saamane koee mahatvapoorn saphalata nahin milee, jise ek anukool tairiph neeti dvaara samarthit kiya ja raha tha, jisase vah alag-alag cheejon ke nirmaan par kaam kar sake.
parampara indigo resham aur kapaas bunaee udyogon ko punarjeevit karane ke prayaason ko inglaind mein vinirmaan kee teevr gati ke saamane koee mahatvapoorn saphalata nahin milee, jise ek anukool tairiph neeti dvaara samarthit kiya ja raha tha.

taaliyaan bachche aksar likhane ke lie utsuk hote hain
bachche aksar likhane ke lie utsuk rahate hain yah un anyaayee aur utpeedit naagarikon ke lie ek vaastavik varadaan saabit hua hai jinake lie anyatr koee upaay ya raahat upalabdh nahin hai
yah un anyaayee aur utpeedit naagarikon ke lie ek vaastavik varadaan saabit hua hai jinake lie koee upaay ya raahat kaheen aur upalabdh nahin hai, kuchh skool jaane vaale bachchon ke lie subah subah khulane se lekar shaam ko dopahar tak vistaarit dekhabhaal kee peshakash bhee karate hain.
kuchh skool jaane vaale bachchon ke lie subah mein khulane se lekar shaam ko dopahar tak vistaarit dekhabhaal kee peshakash bhee karate hain
kuchh any log bhee hain jo jaanch ke prati patanaayak ke prem se prabhaavit nahin hain aur isaka uttar dena atyant kathin hai
doosare log bhee hain jo patanaayak ke jaanch ke pyaar se prabhaavit nahin hain, poore shahar mein kaalee aur peelee meetar vaalee taiksee seva upalabdh hai
usake ghar par daun pement lagaane ke lie poore shahar mein kaalee aur peelee meetar vaalee taiksee seva upalabdh hai
vishamayugmajee elaarabee aa aaraarabee keval aadha raktaheenata hai
dvaarapaal ya to saamane kee or munh kie hue hain ya semeeprophail mein hain ya mandir ke daravaaje kee or aadhe mude hue hain aur ek sarp dvaara ulajhe hue ek vishaal klab par aaraam kar rahe hain, isane svatantrata senaaniyon ko angrejon ke khilaaph unake sangharsh mein ekajut kiya.
bahut se samakaaleenon ke lie taitainik ka sabak dvaarapaal ya to saamane kee or munh kie hue hain ya semee-prophail mein hain ya mandir ke daravaaje kee or aadhe mude hue hain aur ek vishaal klab par aaraam kar rahe hain jo ek sarp se juda hua hai
jahaan bhagavaan shiv paarvatee ko yah kahaanee samajha rahe the, vahaan ek kaue ka ghonsala tha aur us ghonsale mein ek kaua bhee kahaanee sun raha tha, yahaan kya karana hai, yah dekhane ke lie ki kya ham koee raasta nikaal sakate hain
jahaan bhagavaan shiv paarvatee ko yah kahaanee samajha rahe the vahaan kauve ka ek ghonsala tha aur us ghonsale mein ek kauva bhee kahaanee sun raha tha saapekshata kahatee hai ki aantarik gati bahut dheemee gati se chalatee hai
saapekshata kahatee hai ki aantarik gati bahut dheemee gati se chalatee hai

jo mukhyadhaara mein kabhee nahin lae gae jab unhen pata chala ki buddh apane math mein varsha rtu bitaane ke lie ja rahe hain to unhonne unhen maarane kee saajish rachee.
jab unhen pata chala ki buddh apane math mein varsha rtu bitaane ke lie ja rahe hain to unhonne unhen maarane ka shadyantr racha.
jab ek mahaamandaleshvar saamant ek yuddh haar gaya, to use turahiyon, ghadiyaal aur oboj ke apane panch vaady pahanaave ko vijeta ko saumpana pada
bhookh na lagana lekin bhale hee prastaavana ko ab sanvidhaan ka ek anullanghaneey hissa maana jaata hai, yah bhee ek tathy hai ki yah na to kisee shakti ka srot hai aur na hee isakee koee seema hai
hamaare patrakaar mitron ko videshee shabdon aur vaakyaanshon ke arth kee paravaah kie bina shaabdik roop se anuvaad karane kee aadat hai aur phir ye dheele shabd vartamaan sikka ban jaate hain aur vichaar kee gadabadee paida karate hain
ki eeraanee mahilaon ko ek naee aavaaj mil gaee hai
sanvidhaan mein sanshodhan karen aur shabd seema ko hata den ve seekhate hain ki shabd banaane ke lie akshar kaise judate hain
khagoleey aakaar tak phaila hua tha aur ve utaar-chadhaav sanvidhaan mein sanshodhan karate hain aur kaaryakaal kee seema ko hataate hain
khagoleey aakaar tak phaila hua tha aur ve utaar-chadhaav vaastav mein vaishveekrt vyavasaay hain
vaastav mein vaishveekrt vyavasaay hai lekin butaparast aasaanee se apane pain se alag nahin honge jeevan ke premee anany bhakti kee praphullit tapasya ke lie apane kaee pyaaron ko aasaanee se nahin chhodenge
lekin butaparast aasaanee se apane pain se alag nahin hoga jeevan ke premee ek anany bhakti kee praphullit tapasya ke lie apane kaee pyaaron ko aasaanee se nahin chhodenge, nirnay lene se pahale mujhe kya pata hona chaahie
paar karane ke lie ek surakshit sthaan khojane ka nirnay lene se pahale mujhe kya pata hona chaahie aur phir rukana chaahie
paar karane ke lie ek surakshit sthaan khojen aur phir apane aarthik vikaas ke baare mein ruken
sangh aur samoohon ke gathan mein ek praavadhaan hona chaahie jisase koee bhee praant apanee vidhaan sabha ke bahumat se das saal kee praarambhik avadhi ke baad aur usake baad das saal ke antaraal par sanvidhaan kee sharton par punarvichaar ke lie bula sakata hai. vikaas
peeech taral ke haidrojan aayan saandrata ka ek soochakaank hai, sangh aur samoohon ke gathan mein ek praavadhaan hona chaahie jisase koee bhee praant apanee vidhaan sabha ke bahumat se ek praarambhik ke baad sanvidhaan kee sharton par punarvichaar ke lie bula sakata hai. das saal kee avadhi aur usake baad das saal ke antaraal par
isakee sanskrti, isake raajaneetik moolyon ke kaaran, nainistars kee parishad kee salaah par vidhaanasabha ka vighatan raashtrapati dvaara kiya jaata hai, jisake dvaara vidhaanasabha ka jeevan samaapt ho jaata hai, is aam chunaav ke baad keval vighatan ke baad lambit muddon ka sanchaalan kiya jaata hai. vidhaanasabha poorn ho jaatee hai lekin ooparee sadan ke saamane lae gae bil poore nahin hote hain aur lambit rahate hain aur raashtrapati ke paas sameekshaadheen bil bhee poore nahin hote hain ya raashtrapati vidhaanasabha ke vighatan se pahale sansad ke donon sadanon kee baithak bula sakate hain
vidhaan parishad kee salaah par vidhaan sabha ka vighatan raashtrapati dvaara kiya jaata hai jisake dvaara vidhaan sabha ka kaaryakaal samaapt ho jaata hai is aam chunaav ke baad hee vidhaan sabha ke vighatan ke baad sabha ke samaksh lambit muddon ko poora kiya jaata hai lekin vidheyakon ko pesh kiya jaata hai ooparee sadan poora nahin hota hai aur lambit rakha jaata hai aur raashtrapati ke paas sameekshaadheen vidheyak bhee poore nahin hote hain ya raashtrapati vidhaanasabha ke vighatan se pahale sansad ke donon sadanon kee baithak bula sakate hain.

haalaanki, choonki dava ek uttejak kee tarah kaam karatee hai, jo hrday kee sthiti, uchch raktachaap ya mirgee ke dauron ya kisee bhee prakaar kee maanasik beemaaree ke adheen hain, ise oopar se upayog karane se bachana chaahie, yah spasht hai ki andamaan mein ekaant kaaraavaas kee vyavastha ke abhaav mein bhaaree samasyaen paida huee hain.
haalaanki, yah dava ek uttejak kee tarah kaam karatee hai, jo hrday kee sthiti, uchch raktachaap ya mirgee ke dauron ya kisee bhee prakaar kee maanasik beemaaree se peedit hain, unhen isaka upayog karane se bachana chaahie, ham aapakee shikaayat praapt karane ke kaary divason ke bheetar javaab denge

aagara ek aitihaasik shahar hai, isake agrabhaag ke saath-saath kalamandakam rudravaleeshvaram vasanteshvaram ke mandir aur mahendravaadee aur maamandoor ke vishnu gupha mandir lagabhag poorv kee or hain, jabaki mandaagapattoo vilaapakkam aur siyaamangalam ke mandir lagabhag pashchim kee or hain.
isane ek tark diya aur aksar unhonne makka ke logon par hamala karane kee koshish kee, aagara ek aitihaasik shahar hai
lekin ladakon ke lie naukariyon ke baare mein aap kahenge ki vah apane raashtreey lokataantrik gathabandhan ko ek saath kaise rakh sakate hain yadi vah paartee ke netaon ko mantree nahin bana sakate hain to doosara aur bahut bada petrokemikal parisar thaane elaarabee bombe aaraarabee ke paas raashtreey jaivik rasaayan udyog limited dvaara sthaapit kiya gaya tha.
gahare dhyaan mein jaane par yah suna ja sakata hai ki neshanal orgenik kemikal indastreej limited dvaara thaane elaarabee bombe aaraarabee ke paas doosara aur bahut bada petrokemikal kompleks sthaapit kiya gaya tha.
aur hamane pahale hee khand do par nirmaan shuroo kar diya hai, hamaare dukhee hrday shraddha aur prem ke saath aapakee udaatt tapasya ka anusaran karenge ”
aur hamane yah anubhav karane ke lie khand do par nirmaan shuroo kar diya hai ki baal majadoor hone ka kya matalab hai
teem kachche maal ke prasanskaran, nirmaan aur vitaran se lekar khapat ke bindu tak sabhee charanon mein bhojan se jude sambhaavit khataron kee pahachaan karatee hai, in khataron ke hone kee sambhaavana ka aakalan karatee hai aur unake niyantran ke lie aavashyak nivaarak upaayon kee pahachaan karatee hai taaki anubhav kiya ja sake ki isaka kya matalab hai. baal majadoor
yah deevaar meel kimee lambee hai aur isakee oonchaee nadee ke kinaare se pheet meetar shahar se pheet meetar lambee hai. teem kachche maal ke prasanskaran, nirmaan aur vitaran se lekar upabhog ke bindu tak sabhee charanon mein bhojan se jude sambhaavit khataron kee pahachaan karatee hai. in khataron ke hone kee sambhaavana aur unake niyantran ke lie aavashyak nivaarak upaayon kee pahachaan karata hai

aur homo sepiyans banane tak paakistaan par arab amerikee dolar kee denadaaree thee jise amerika ne hee sangathan ke vibhinn maadhyamon se aur rn raashi ko maaph karake kam kiya tha
aaparaadhik prakriya sanhita mukhy roop se prakriya ka ek vastunishth kaanoon hai aur homo sepiyans ban jaatee hai

ghaana ke ek vishvavidyaalay se paakistaan ko ek majaboot samajh hai jisane gauree kee kilomeetar renj vaalee misail ka pareekshan kiya tha, jo shaaheen ii naamak thodee lambee dooree kee misail lonch karake shakti pradarshan par jaane ka phaisala kar sakata hai.
ghaana ke ek vishvavidyaalay se ek majaboot bhaavana hai
ki kahaaniyaan hamaara manoranjan karane kee hamaaree kshamata se pare jaatee hain aur main ise spasht karane ke lie do tvarit kahaaniyon ke saath samaapt karana chaahata hoon
jab aphreeka kee garmiyon mein jin chhotee bakariyon ke saath ham khelate the, aarthik duvidha ko galat tareeke se phansaaya jaata hai
is haalat mein kendr raajy ko usake kharch ke baare mein disha-nirdesh de sakata hai jab ham garmiyon mein chhotee bakariyon ke saath khelate the
aisee sthiti mein kendr raajy ko apane vyay ke sambandh mein disha-nirdesh de sakata hai, main karata hoon
khair, main yah karata hoon
ham is kaaran se bhee apane sangrah tak adhikatam pahunch banaana chaahate hain yadi kisee any sansthaan ka shodhakarta hamaare namoonon ka upayog kar sakata hai to aage ke udaaharan ekatr karane kee aavashyakata nahin hogee
aisee hee ek kahaanee ek yuva aur usake pita ke baare mein ek khushahaal parivaar kee kahaanee bataatee hai, jo samudr mein machhalee pakadane gae the aur ek toophaan mein phans gae the aur unakee naav palat gaee thee, unhonne svadeshee koyale kee gunavatta sthaapit karane ke lie pareekshan shuroo kiya tha.
aisee hee ek kahaanee ek khushahaal parivaar kee kahaanee bataatee hai jo ek yuvak aur usake pita ke baare mein hai jo samudr mein machhalee pakadane gae the aur ek toophaan mein phans gae the aur unakee naav palat gaee thee aur unhonne prakrti ke bahut saare veediyo post kie the.
aur vaastav mein unhonne prakrti ke bahut se veediyo post kie the
bachche pataakhe jalaakar mastee karate hain any aatishabaajee unake chehare par ek badee muskaan thee jo us samay asaamaany thee
jaisa ki hamane dekha hai ki koyala utpaadan haalaanki tejee se badh raha tha, poorv varshon ke dauraan maang ke anuroop nahin tha
ham usake pradarshan se adhik khush hain ”yah maanate hue ki aaryon ka vaastavik sthaan kaispiyan saagar ke dakshinee aur uttaree bhaag mein hai jahaan se ve eeraan yoorop aur bhaarat pahunche
yah maanate hue ki aaryon ka vaastavik sthaan kaispiyan saagar ke dakshinee aur uttaree bhaag mein hai, jahaan se ve eeraan, yoorop aur bhaarat pahunche
saarvabhaumik hai
lekin isamen bahut achchhe nahin the
main chaahata hoon ki aap shapath len ki aapake paas is dhvaj kee raksha karane ke lie paryaapt shakti hogee aur aap svatantrata ke lie apane praanon kee aahuti dene ke lie taiyaar hain
isalie ham stainaphord mein ek alag selph draiving kaar banaane ka phaisala karate hain, mera matalab hai ki ye bachche bina niyantran ke hain
mera matalab hai ye bachche bina niyantran ke
ek baar jab vah unake shelida estet mein atithi ke roop mein rah rahee thee, to jab ve shaam ko hausabot ke dek par baithate the to vah jor detee thee ki vah use ek kahaanee sunae
yah maarketing hai, yah raajaneeti hai, mainne unhen bataaya ki bhaarat aur hindustaan kya hai, kaise yah vishaal bhoomi uttar mein kashmeer aur himaalay se lekar dakshin mein lanka tak phailee huee hai, kaise isamen panjaab aur bangaal aur bambee aur madraas jaise mahaan praant shaamil hain.
mahaabhaarat mein ek kahaanee hai jo kahatee hai ki jab devataon ne chaaron vedon ko ek taraajoo ke ek palade mein rakha aur bharat mahaakaavy ko doosare palade mein bharat ne mahaakaavy ""bhaarat"" kee is mahaanata ko dekhate hue chaaron vedon kee tulana mein adhik taula. ise ""mahaabhaarat"" naam diya aur manushyon ke beech bhee is kahaanee ke kaaran yah ""mahaabhaarat"" naam se lokapriy huee.
ebeeseeel kampanee ka rananeeti lakshy bhaarat mein manoranjan vyavasaay ke sabhee kshetron ko sevaen pradaan karane ke lie prodakshan banaana tha taaki mera dil doosaron ke lie khul sake.
abchl kampanee ka rananeeti lakshy bhaarat mein manoranjan vyavasaay ke sabhee kshetron ko sevaen pradaan karane ke lie nirmaan karana tha
duniya bhar mein vyaapak shodh chal raha hai yah pata lagaane ke lie ki saamaany koshikaen kainsar kyon ban jaatee hain yah ek aisa ped hai jise kaalaateet hona tha
aur ab ve bas yah kar sakate hain ki saamaany koshikaen kainsar mein kyon badal jaatee hain, isaka pata lagaane ke lie pooree duniya mein vyaapak shodh chal raha hai
ki is tarah kee koshikaen hamen ilaaj khojane mein madad karengee aur ab ve ise kar sakate hain
unase khuraan mein pae gae bhroonavigyaan ke baare mein apane vichaar vyakt karane ke lie kaha gaya
teesare din haddiyon aur raakh ko haridvaar ke pratidvandviyon jaise sar ya maanasarovar jaise pavitr sthaan par visarjit kiya jaata hai, hamaare paas saarvajanik roop mein intaranet tha
inamen se rebeej ke kaaran ek dheemee yaatanaapoorn maut mar jaatee hai tejee bachchan ne harivansh raay bachchan ke maadhyam se sheksapiyar naatak par kaam kiya hai
tejee bachchan ne harivansh roy bachchan indiyaana ke jarie sheksapiyar draama par kaam kiya hai
na hee vah lambe samay tak anapadh raheen, lekin jab vah bahut hee charam ilaake ka saamana karatee hain
lekin jab yah ek bahut hee charam bhoobhaag ka saamana karata hai
sveedan ko kabhee nahin dekha shuroo mein baratee gaee kuchh samajhadaar saavadhaaniyon ka matalab achchhee tarah se kharch kie gae paise ya barbaad hue paise ke beech ka antar ho sakata hai
lekin is beech sanyantr ko kuchh samajhadaar saavadhaaniyon ka laabh mila hai, isaka matalab yah ho sakata hai ki paisa achchhee tarah se kharch kiya gaya ya paisa barbaad ho gaya
lekin paudhe ne is beech basava kee prasiddhi ko pavitr vinamrata aur mahaan bhakti ke vyakti ke roop mein door-door tak phaila diya tha.
mrnaal sen ne premachand kee kaphan kahaanee par aadhaarit oka uree katha naam kee ek philm banaee, jisane sarvashreshth telugu philm ka raashtreey puraskaar bhee jeeta.
mrnaal sen ne premachand kee kaphan kahaanee par aadhaarit oka uree katha naam kee ek philm banaee, jisane sarvashreshth telugu philm ka raashtreey puraskaar bhee jeeta.
unhonne apane dam par koee granth nahin likha, unhonne abhee-abhee kaha aur unake shishy ne likha ki manushy ko pata chalega ki usaka vaastavik mooly usake karmon se tay hota hai na ki usake janm se
us aadamee ko ehasaas hoga ki usaka vaastavik mooly usake kaaryon se tay hota hai na ki usake janm se gairakaanoonee sanyukt mukti morcha asam elaarabee ulpha aaraarabee ne pratishodh ke saath vaapasee kee hai
gairakaanoonee yoonaited libareshan phrant oph asam elaarabee ulpha aaraarabee ne pratishodh ke saath vaapasee kee hai
yuddh ke samay bhaarat mein bade paimaane par udyogon ka vikaas hona chaahie lekin chhaatron ka na hona mere lie samasya agyaanata nahin thee
lekin chhaatr vahaan nahin hain mere lie samasya poorv bhaarateey bhojan kee agyaanata nahin thee
poorv bhaarateey bhojan
yah prakrti kee ek ajeebogareeb rachana hai jo ki madhy mahaasaagar mein bhayankar das digree chainal ke kaaphee kareeb sthit hai aur antarraashtreey samudree maarg ke bhee kareeb hai, ve sabhee kakshaasan ya leenabaik rest vaalee seeton se jude hue hain jaisa ki chaaluky sanrachanaon mein aam hai.
yah prakrti kee ek ajeebogareeb rachana hai jo madhy mahaasaagar mein bhayankar das digree chainal ke kaaphee kareeb sthit hai aur antararaashtreey samudree maarg ke bhee kareeb hai
jo log is siddhaant ka paalan karane mein viphal rahate hain, yadi aap apane ghar mein bargalar alaarm sthaapit karane ja rahe hain to allaah usaka koolha tod dega
jo is siddhaant ka paalan karane mein viphal rahata hai, allaah usaka koolha tod dega
apanee aankhon ke maadhyam se apanee indriyon ke maadhyam se
itaava jila
raajyon aur kendreey shaasit raajyon mein yah kishor aur preepubartal mein haanirahit hai
in muddon par prakaash daalane ke lie ya yadi aap ek shikshak hain to aap yoonesko aadi ko pasand karenge
ya yadi aap ek shikshak hain to aap yoonesko se pyaar karenge aur isee tarah unhen aisee kisee bhee cheez ke baare mein bataen jo skool mein aapake bachche ke kaam ko prabhaavit kar sakatee hai aur yadi aap apane bachche kee pragati ke baare mein chintit hain to unase baat karen.
praarambhik avastha mein atirikt insulin lene se taral padaarth ka sevan behatar hota hai aur avakshepan kaaran ka ilaaj is sthiti mein sthiti ko kam kar sakata hai, pragati kee nigaraanee karane aur mootr ketons aur rakt glookoj kee jaanch karane ke lie kisee kareebee ko hona chaahie, agar koee nahin hai to aspataal mein bhartee hone ka nirnay liya jaana chaahie sudhaar ke sanket ya chetana mein aise parivartan hain jo tejee se pragati karane lagate hain
heraakols ne kaee shaadiyaan kee theen aur kaee bachchon ko janm diya tha
na hee vah daarshanik gady ke vichaarak aur lekhak ke roop mein kam pratishthit hain
taaliyaan bajao ki bhaarat abhee bhee ek vikaas aapada hai
vaahavaahee
yah shakti bhee nyaayaalay dvaara sameeksha ke adheen hai lekin shakti ke durupayog ka durbhaagy us vyakti par padega jo is chunautee ka saamana karane ke lie adhyaadesh la sakata hai aur aapaatakaal ko dekhate hue sansad satr ka satraavasaan kar sakata hai aur sansad ke roop mein kadam utha sakata hai. adhyaadesh par vichaar karane ke lie samay lena raashtrapati kee vaidhaanik shaktiyon ke tahat aata hai, haalaanki vah kendreey kaibinet mantriyon kee salaah se jaata hai aur jab sansad kisee adhyaadesh ko manjooree nahin detee hai to yah nukasaan hoga lekin niyamon ke tahat koee bhee kadam uthaaya jaata hai. adhyaadesh asanvaidhaanik nahin hoga, phraans mein googal ka lakshy dainik gati jaise veediyo saajha karane vaalee vebasait hai, isase mukaabala karane ke lie sthaaneey teleevijan steshan em aur phraans ne teleevijan saamagree ke saath veediyo prasaaran ke lie kaanoonee samajhauta kiya hai
enoteshan fraans mein googlai ka lakshy dainik gati jaise veediyo saajha kee gaee vebasait hai, isake saath pratispardha karane ke lie jrasai sthaaneey teleevizan steshan m aur fraans mein teleevizan saamagree veediyo prasaaran ke saath kaanoonee samajhauta hua hai
tippanee
raajaneeti ke savaal se grah ka chehara mita diya
yahaan raajaneeti ke savaal se bhee dekhen
koee bhee gendabaaj aise viket par achchhee gendabaajee kar sakata hai jo use madad karata hai lekin bahut kam log ek bekaar viket se jaan bacha sakate hain aur gend ko yahaan bhee dekh sakate hain
koee bhee gendabaaj ek viket par achchhee gendabaajee kar sakata hai jo use madad karata hai lekin bahut kam log ek anupayogee viket se jaan bacha sakate hain aur jab mainne apanee maan ko voshing masheen lod karate hue dekha to gend bolatee hai
jab mainne apanee maan ko vaashing masheen mein sooraj kee roshanee mein khaana pakaate hue dekha to paaramparik eendhan kee bachat huee
sooraj kee roshanee se khaana pakaane se paaramparik eendhan kee bachat hotee hai, haalaanki mrtyudaata bachchan kee chhavi ko ek ekshan heero ke roop mein lautaane kee koshish karate hain, lekin ebeeseeel vaalee philm ka udyam bhee asaphal hai, lekin aarthik roop se gambheer hai, ebeeseeel mis varld mein bhee aayojit hai bengaluroo mein saundary pratiyogita, lachar prabandhan ke kaaran ye the mukhy praayojak, karodon rupaye ka nukasaan
haalaanki mrtyudaata bachchan kee chhavi ko ek ekshan heero ke roop mein lautaane kee koshish karate hain, lekin ebeesee vaalee philm ka udyam bhee viphal hai, lekin aarthik roop se ek gambheer hai, ebeeseeel mis varld saundary pratiyogita mein baingalor mein bhee aayojit kee jaatee hai, ve mukhy praayojak the kyonki kharaab prabandhan ke parinaamasvaroop karodon bhaarateey rupaye ka nukasaan hota hai, unake lie adaalat kee koee phees nahin hotee hai
unaka laabh adaalat ke lie koee shulk nahin hai
pemaastar ke anusaar eyarabas e aur yah kaaphee vishaal hai, jab pustak likhee gaee thee tab ped kee trijya pheet aur shaakhaon ke aasapaas thee
kya yah ek tathyaatmak daava hai yadi aap kisee cheej ko ghumaate hain to vah ud jaatee hai
is paartee kee sthaapana unake pita julphikaar alee bhutto ne kee thee
manch uttar dakshin mein donon or sthaapit hai aur teesara aur antim mugal raaja bahaadur shaah jaaphar dvaara banaaya gaya tha
kamare kee pratyek deevaar dido bes rileeph ko laipidaree aur shuddh sulekh bord se sajaaya gaya hai jo baaharee kaam ke udaaharanon ko baareekee se dikhaata hai
ek pratibandhit vastu kee tarah mujhe deta hai kuchh aisa ki aap botal mein paanee daalate hain to vah botal ban jaatee hai
is samay ke dauraan dakshin bhaarat mein dravid sabhyata phal-phool rahee thee, isalie mujhe vahaan kuchh draiv maunt karane den
to mujhe vahaan par jaane ke lie bas kuchh draiv maunt karane den
yah unakee kahaanee hai gaingreen elaarabee nas aaraarabee ke bajaay dhamanee se takaraane se aur ghaav ke sankramit hone ke kaaran rakt vishaaktata
vaastav mein koee bhee jimmedaar vyakti sau saal se adhik puraanee un sandhiyon ke peechhe aashray nahin le sakata hai
vah raam ke haathon se mar gaya lekin phir bhee marate samay maareech ne apanee aavaaj ko raam ke roop mein badal diya aur lakshman ka naam chillaaya yah sunakar seeta dar gaee aur lakshman ko raam ko dekhane ke lie bheja
raashtrapati ne svayan bhaarat ke kattar samajhauta na karane vaale raashtreey kraantikaariyon ka pratinidhitv kiya, jo sahee samay aane par saamraajyavaad par antim aur bade hamale aur satta kee jabtee ke lie taiyaar the, balla bahut chauda ya bahut lamba nahin hona chaahie
raashtrapati ne svayan bhaarat ke kattar asambaddh raashtreey kraantikaariyon ka pratinidhitv kiya jo sanvidhaan mein sahee samay aane par saamraajyavaad par antim aur bade hamale aur satta kee jabtee ke lie taiyaar the sansad sarakaar ka pratinidhitv bataaya gaya hai jisaka gathan kuchh apavaadon ko chhodakar samoohon mein hoga
hamane aur kuchh nahin samajha" sanvidhaan mein sansad mein sarakaar ka pratinidhitv bataaya gaya hai jisaka gathan kuchh apavaadon ko chhodakar samoohon mein hoga
hamane aur kuchh nahin samajha” khetee ka bada hissa bihaar aur bihaar tak hee seemit tha, jahaan upaj kam thee
khetee ka bada hissa yoopee aur bihaar tak hee seemit tha, jahaan paidaavaar kharaab draeekleening taral padaarth thee
aage ve aadhe ko svarg ke beech mein chadhate hue kahate hain aur doosare aadhe hisse ko prthvee ke dhanu yaanee dhanush ke neeche utarate hain
ab vah phir se koshish karata hai aur vah kaam nahin karata
rangolee utsav
chunaav aayog kee kaary pranaalee mahal kee poorvee deevaar ke mrt kendr mein ek sajae gae sinhaasan kee ek eev banaee gaee thee

chaalukyon ke pallav paandyon aur dakshin ke any samakaaleen raajavanshon ke baad ke gupha mandiron mein donon tareeke vikasit pae jaate hain, unase neetiyon aur sansthaanon ke baare mein baat karate hain
mittee ka ghada ek aisa vaady yantr hai jo lok aur shaastreey sangeet donon mein lokapriy hai, unase kis tarah kee neetiyon aur sansthaon ke baare mein baat karen
saalon baad jab main bada hua to ek aadamee doosare ladake se lad raha tha aur ham beech mein phans gae
netavark ke baahar sthaanon ke vyaapak taane-baane ke bheetar
yah aaradeepee dvaara apane udghaatan sammelan mein sveekaar kie gae athaarah siddhaanton par aadhaarit hai aur isake baad se lokapriy hua, isake baad unhonne vibhinn dhaarmik siddhaanton raajaon aur mahaan santon par dhyaan kendrit kie bina ek pady kavita kee rachana kee aur ""bhaarat"" kavita kee rachana kee.
yah aaradeepee dvaara apane udghaatan sammelan mein sveekaar kie gae athaarah siddhaanton par aadhaarit hai aur tab se ise lokapriy banaaya gaya hai ki apeel kaise karen
apeel kaise karen gambheer beemaaree ya samay se pahale mrtyu ke pramukh kaaran hain
gambheer beemaaree ya jaldee maut ke pramukh kaaran hain
haalaanki neerad bhee usake saath gupt roop se pyaar karata hai, lekin vah usake khulepan se chaunk jaata hai aur gusse mein use chhod deta hai, keval apane dost kamala ke pati dvaara maara jaata hai, jise sandeh hai ki vah apanee patnee ko bahala-phusalaakar le jaega, jise prasavottar raktasraav kaha jaata hai.
isamen kachara elaarabee rasoee apashisht khaady apashisht aaraarabee kachara saamagree jaise pepar cheer kaanch kee botalen dhaatu ke dibbe plaastik phaibar ghar ke eendhan ke avashesh sadak kee saphaee imaarat malabe malabe aur parityakt vaahan kriket shahar aur desh ke sabase pasandeeda khelon mein se ek hai
kriket shahar aur desh ke sabase pasandeeda khelon mein se ek un dinon mein jab parivahan suvidhaen aparyaapt theen, vaaraanasee aur raareshvaram jaisee jagahon par teerth yaatra par jaana ek saahasik aur jokhim bhara tha
phir se un dinon mein jab vaaraanasee aur raareshvaram jaise sthaanon kee teerth yaatra par jaane ke lie parivahan suvidhaen aparyaapt theen, ek saahasik aur ek jokhim tha, shukravaar ko saubhaagy se upahaar dena saraasar sanyog hai
main phraide ka aakasmik upahaar mahaj sanyog hai gretar naagaalaind koee raashtravirodhee maang nahin
"gretar naagaalaind teen poorv pepail karmachaariyon dvaara pharavaree ke madhy mein ek raashtr-virodhee maang nahin hai. yotyoob ko sain broono-aadhaarit seva vishay dvaara banaaya gaya tha, jisamen moovee klip, teevee klip, edapanna, edob phlaish aur sangeet veediyo, upayogakarta dvaara utpann saamagree shaamil hai.
kya paakistaaniyon krpaya bas khade ho jao krpaya madhy pharavaree mein teen poorv pepail karmachaariyon dvaara yotyoob ko sain broono aadhaarit seva vishay dvaara banaaya gaya tha jisamen moovee klip, teevee klip, edapanna, edob phlaish aur sangeet veediyo upayogakarta dvaara utpann saamagree sahit veediyo saamagree ka upayog kiya gaya tha.
kya paakistaanee krpaya krpaya khade ho jaen
sadak maarg se yaatree yaataayaat kee yojana banaane ke pahale do dashakon ke dauraan paryaapt roop se relave ke saath daava samaanata mein vrddhi ke saath shuruaat kee gaee jabaki sadak maarg se maal parivahan mein kaaphee vrddhi huee
yadi ve uchit samay par aisa karate hain to yah kahana ek raajaneetik halachal thee
aur isalie sangharsh mein elgoridam kee mrtyu dar mein kamee aaee
yah madhyavargeey buddhijeeviyon ke lie naukariyon ke lie sangharsh tha
sandarbh dhanyavaad
dhanyavaad
bhaarat ke vibhaajan aur bade paimaane par palaayan ne naagarikata nirdhaaran ke lie bhaaree samasyaen paida keen
kaam mein adhik mahatvapoorn cheejon mein se ek durbhaagy se unake upakaran mein kamajor drshti aur kharaab svaasthy bhee shaamil tha, ek baadha jo kabhee-kabhee unhen lambe samay tak kaam karane se rokatee thee
durbhaagy se unake upakaranon mein kamajor drshti aur kharaab svaasthy bhee shaamil tha, jo kabhee-kabhee unhen lambe samay tak kaam karane se rokata tha, jab tak ki saur chamak nahin aa rahee thee, tab aap raaste se baahar nikalana chaahate the.
isee ka parinaam tha ki 3 maarch ko bhagat sinh ko unake saathiyon raajaguru aur sukhadev ke saath phaansee par lataka diya gaya, jab tak soory kee kiranen nahin aa rahee hain, tab tak aap raaste se hatana chaahate hain.
isee ka parinaam tha ki bhagat sinh ko unake saathiyon raajaguru aur sukhadev sahit teesaree maarch ko phaansee de dee gaee.
vah dillee se naagapur mein sangh ke paaramparik mukhyaalay par dhyaan kendrit karenge
meree maan ne nairobee kenya chhod diya ham apanee aasha kee abhivyakti ke saath samaapt karana chaahate hain ki aap lambe samay tak apane kaaryaalay ke jimmedaar aur kathin kartavyon ka nirvahan apane aap ko shrey aur bombe preseedensee mein mahaamahim ke sabhee vishayon kee santushti ke lie jaaree rakh sakate hain.
yah us dabaav se bachane ka bhee tha jo vah apanee maan par daal raha tha jo nairobee kenya chhodakar chalee gaee thee
yah us par daale ja rahe dabaav se bachana bhee tha
lekin surasaavalee mein kavi ne krshnon par likha hai ki aap sheeghrata se kaary karake parinaamon ko rok sakate hain
surasaavalee mein kavi ne krshnon par likha hai
aur jaise neeche aa rahe the
hansee deshee gaayon par jarsee bail ke upayog se praapt pahalee peedhee kee santaan ke doodh kee upaj mein unake baandhon kee tulana mein lagabhag dhaee guna vrddhi huee hai.
deshee gaayon par jarsee bail ke upayog se praapt pahalee peedhee kee santaan kee doodh kee upaj unake baandhon kee tulana mein lagabhag dhaee guna badh gaee hai.
yah jhanda pashu chikitsaalay ke theek saamane lahara raha hai
doston ka ek samooh tha jo vahaan pahunchata tha kyonki main skool se nahin nikal paata tha main skool se joojhata tha

aur sadiyon se is sandesh ne aadaton ke ek samooh mein kristaleekrt kiya tha jo na keval mahilaon ko tatkaal parivaar ke baahar kisee bhee purush dvaara dekhe jaane se rokata tha balki kabhee-kabhee unhen apane parivaar ke daayare se baahar bhee mahila mitr hone se rokata tha, aam taur par bil kee pratiyaan hotee hain. sadasyon ko us taareekh se kam se kam do din pahale upalabdh karaaya jaata hai jis taareekh ko ise pesh kiya jaana prastaavit hai
