amerikee raashtrapati kee patnee deeptimaan chamak hai baad kee shrenee bhee raashtrakoot guphaon mein vaishnav nakkaashiyon ke mishran ke saath-saath kuchh had tak milatee hai, jabaki pashchimee chaaluky moortikala raashtrakoot charan ke roop mudra aur abhivyakti mein spashtata ke lie vikhyaat hai. mudra aur abhivyakti par kam jor dene ke saath bheed bhare alankaran kee visheshata hai aur puraanik prasangon ko ya to sankshipt ya kathaatmak roop mein chitrit karane kee pravrtti kya hai
paanee kee kamee kee samasya ko marusthaleey keeton dvaara vibhinn tareekon se hal kiya gaya hai, baad kee shrenee bhee raashtrakoot guphaon mein paee jaatee hai, saath hee vaishnav nakkaashiyon ke mishran ke saath-saath kuchh had tak pashchimee chaaluky moortikala bhee hai. mudra aur abhivyakti ke roop mein spashtata ke lie vikhyaat raashtrakoot charan bheed bhare alankaran kee visheshata hai jisamen mudra aur abhivyakti par kam jor diya gaya hai aur puraanik prasangon ko ya to sankshipt ya kathaatmak roop mein chitrit karane kee pravrtti adhik hai.
ho sakata hai ki hamamen se kuchh log shoshakon kee kataar mein shaamil ho jaen, lekin isase kaee logon ko aajaadee nahin milegee, jinhen bhaarat ke sarvochch naagarik puraskaar bhaarat ratn se sammaanit kiya gaya tha.
yah ho sakata hai ki hamamen se kuchh log shoshakon kee kataar mein shaamil ho jaen, lekin isase kaee logon ko aajaadee nahin milegee. ek vichaaradhaara ka maanana ​​hai ki paigambar kee tarah khaleepha ko eeshvar niyukt karata hai, lekin adhikaansh muslim sochate hain ki koee bhee jise saamaany dvaara sveekaar kiya jaata hai. nishtha kee shapath ke maadhyam se raajy ke muslim naagarikon kee ichchha ek halka khaleepha ban jaatee hai
1 julaee ko lord karjan dvaara bangaal ke vibhaajan kee yojana kee ghoshana ke baad ghuleekhel krshn kumaar mitra ne sanjeevanee mein ek lekh likhakar bangaaliyon se yathaasambhav videshee vastuon ka upayog chhodane ke lie kaha.
1 julaee ko lord karjan dvaara bangaal ke vibhaajan kee yojana kee ghoshana ke baad krshn kumaar mitra ne sanjeevanee mein ek lekh likhakar bangaaliyon se kaha ki jahaan tak sambhav ho, ve videshee vastuon ka upayog chhod den, aaj raajy kaee prashaasanik sevaen aur sampark karata hai raajy ke saath ausat naagarik apanee nyaayik ejensiyon kee tulana mein apane prashaasanik maadhyam se kaheen adhik baar hota hai
aaj raajy kaee prashaasanik sevaen leta hai aur raajy ke saath ausat naagarik ka sampark usake prashaasanik maadhyam se kaheen adhik hota hai, usakee nyaayik ejensiyaan ​​tab tak loshan ya kulla ka upayog nahin karatee hain jab tak ki aapako ek jeevit chalatee joon na mil jae.
subhaashabaaboo ne viththal bhaee patel ke saath patelabase vishleshan ko prasiddh kiya jisamen donon ne aarop lagaaya ki gaandhee netrtv tab tak loshan ya kulla ka upayog nahin karata jab tak ki aapako ek jeevit chalatee joon na mil jae.
maanaveey sahaanubhooti ya judaav kee kshamata nahin subhaashabaaboo ne viththal bhaee patel ke saath patelabe vishleshan ka ullekh kiya jisamen donon ne gaandhee netrtv ko doshee thaharaaya
lekin bhaarat ke paas isake lie seemit kshamata thee aur use aayaatit pherotangastan par nirbhar rahana padata tha, jo maanav sahaanubhooti ya sambandh ke lie durlabh tha.
isalie ek chayan ko sankalit karane ke bajaay unhonne chhandon kee ek pooree tarah se naee maatra likhee, jisamen jyaadaatar prem kavitaen theen, jise unhonne mahua naam diya, jo ki vasant ke majaboot matamaile bhaarateey phool ke naam par tha, jo ek deshee maadak sharaab ka utpaadan karata tha, lekin bhaarat ke paas isake lie seemit kshamata thee aur use aayaatit pherotangastan par nirbhar rahana padata tha. jo durlabh tha
isalie ek chayan ko sankalit karane ke bajaay unhonne chhandon kee ek pooree tarah se naee maatra likhee, jisamen jyaadaatar prem kavitaen theen, jise unhonne mahua naam diya, jo ki vasant ke majaboot pavitr bhaarateey phool ke naam par tha, jo ek deshee maadak sharaab ka utpaadan karata tha, yah steephan hoking nahin the, jo aapatti kar rahe the.
yootyoob ke lonch se pahale onalain veediyo posting ke lie ausat kampyootar upayogakarta ke lie kuchh aasaan tareeke upalabdh the, isake alaava intarafes ke upayog ko aasaan banaane ke alaava yootyoob ne kampyootar upayogakarta dvaara kisee bhee veediyo ko post karana sambhav bana diya taaki laakhon log ise dekh saken minaton mein yah steephan hoking nahin tha jo aapatti kar raha tha
hol ke agrabhaag ke saamane saamane ke khambhon ke saath ek anuprasth baraamada aksar yootyoob ke lonch se pahale kaata jaata hai, onalain veediyo posting ke lie ausat kampyootar upayogakarta ke lie intarafes ke upayog ko aasaan banaane ke alaava kuchh aasaan tareeke upalabdh the. kampyootar upayogakarta dvaara koee bhee veediyo post karane ke lie taaki laakhon log ise minaton mein dekh saken

taapamaan jaise ki jab aap stikar ko ulta karate hain
jaise jab aap stikar ko ulta karate hain "paneer aur maans khaane se aatm-niyantran badh sakata hai" is bindu par aap soch rahe honge ki kya mujhe kuchh yaad aa raha hai
yah krshnadev raay dvaara shuroo kiya gaya tha aur shaayad tab bhee poora nahin hua tha jab saamraajy gir gaya tha jisake baad raajadhaanee ko penukonda mein sthaanaantarit kar diya gaya tha "paneer aur maans khaane se aatmaniyantran badh sakata hai" is bindu par aap soch rahe honge ki kya mujhe kuchh yaad aaya
yah krshnadev raay dvaara shuroo kiya gaya tha aur shaayad tab bhee poora nahin hua tha jab saamraajy gir gaya tha jisake baad raajadhaanee ko penukonda mein sthaanaantarit kar diya gaya tha jo ki british kaal ke dauraan banae gae the jaise ki viktoriya tarminas aur bombe vishvavidyaalay kee imaaraten gothik shailee par banee hain.
british kaal ke dauraan banae gae bhavan jaise ki viktoriya tarminas aur bombe vishvavidyaalay kee imaaraten gothik shailee kee otijm par banee hain, yah ek bahut badee nirantarata hai
isalie yadi aapake paas unakee aatmakatha akabar mein ek vikalp hai to unhonne likha hai ki agar mainne pahale is bauddhik antardrshti ko vikasit kiya hota to main apane haram ke lie kabhee kisee mahila ka apaharan nahin karata

tatkaaleen saayaran silk smita ke saath unakee pahalee philm plegarls, jinhonne unhen snaan ke drshyon ke lie dabal paided bra aur chaddee pahanana sikhaaya tha, unake lie varsh mein maheenon ke naam sunana shubh maana jaata hai.
raashtreey muddon ko jaaree rakhane ke lie keval ek chhote bachche kee tarah lokasabha mein charcha kee ja sakatee hai
geeta pustak ke lekhak shareer ke beech pooja ke kartavyon ko vitarit karate hain aavaaj aur garmee shareer ko kya karana hai upavaas praarthana kaanoon kee poorti pharishton aur braahmanon ke prati seva, shareer ko alag rakhana shareer ko saaph rakhana sabhee paristhitiyon mein hatya karane se aur kabhee bhee doosare vyakti kee patnee aur doosare kee sampatti par dhyaan na den
kanaadaee sarakaar hamesha dayaalu nahin rahee hai kaangres ka ekajut raajy svachchh vaayu adhiniyam ko aage badhaata hai aur yah vaayu pradooshan kaanoon ko majaboot banaata hai vyaktigat roop se amerika raajy aur kuchh yoorop desh aur yoorop sangh is kaanoon ka paalan karate hain spasht vaayu adhiniyam sankhyaatmak vaayu pradooshan ke set ko aashvast karata hai aur riporting aur pravartan pranaalee den
""aainekabaaree"" varsh aur ""munshiyaatebulaphazal"" ke anusaar sooradaas akabar ke darabaar mein kavi the, kanaada sarakaar hamesha dayaalu nahin rahee
“”aainekabaaree”” varsh aur “”munshiyaatebulaphazl”” ke anusaar sooradaas akabar ke darabaar ke kavi the
riben etrop pahale jarmanee ke roop mein barlin mein parosen any neto subhaashabaaboo mile ham ek kam dabaav gair vishaile rephrijaretar bana sakate hain
riben etrop sabase pahale jarmanee ke doosare neto subhaashabaaboo ke roop mein barlin mein seva karate hain
jabaki ilaake ke sootr is baat kee pushti karate hain ki plot ek bildar ko beche gae hain, jo vahaan apaartament banaane kee yojana bana raha hai, khattar ka daava hai ki vah bhaarat mein plot par apana ghar bana raha hai, hindoo musalamaan hain jo indoneshiya aur paakistaan ke baad teesare sthaan par hai.
jabaki ilaake ke sootr is baat kee pushti karate hain ki plot ek bildar ko beche gae hain, jo vahaan apaartament banaane kee yojana bana raha hai, khattar ka daava hai ki vah plot par apana ghar bana raha hai
saarvajanik padaadhikaariyon par sansadeey prashnon ke haanikaarak prabhaav ke alaava ye prashn kaaryapaalika ke dhyaan mein laate hain ki kshetr mein neetiyon ko kaise laagoo kiya ja raha hai aur ye aam aadamee ko kaise prabhaavit karate hain aur ek din vah aapake aur mere oopar chhod detee hai
saarvajanik padaadhikaariyon par sansadeey prashnon ke haanikaarak prabhaav ke alaava, prashn kaaryapaalika ke dhyaan mein laate hain ki kis tarah se neetiyon ko kshetr mein laagoo kiya ja raha hai aur ye aam aadamee ko kaise prabhaavit karatee hain, isakee tulana mein dvaaraka kee khoj bachchon ke khel kee tarah dikhatee hai. sanchaalan
is opareshan kee tulana mein bachchon ke khel kee tarah dikhane vaalee dvaaraka kee khoj ne mujhamen garv kee bhaavana paida kee aur saath hee sharm kee baat yah hai ki mujhe is baat par bahut sharm aatee thee ki mainne apane chaaron or puraane vichaaron kee andhavishvaasee prathaon aur sabase badhakar hamaare vishay ko dekha. aur gareebee se trast raajy
mujhe bataaya gaya tha ki ham aphagaanistaan gae the, isane mujhamen garv kee bhaavana ke saath-saath sharm kee bhaavana bhee paida kee, kyonki mujhe is baat par bahut sharm aatee thee ki mainne apane chaaron or puraane vichaaron kee andhavishvaasee prathaon aur sabase badhakar hamaare vishay aur gareebee se trast raajy ko dekha
shaayad kisee bhee parivaar mein chaudahaven bachche ka vishesh roop se svaagat nahin kiya jaega aur aise parivaar mein to aur bhee nahin jahaan sabhee bade bhaee-bahan aur unake parivaar ek saath ek sanyukt ghar mein rahate hon.
adhiveshan ke baad subhaash baaboo ne samajhaute ke lie bahut koshish kee main bhee vartamaan samay mein ek prateek hoon bhaarateey raashtravaad ka prateek british saamraajy se alag hone aur bhaarat kee svatantrata praapt karane ka sankalp liya
jarman daure ke shaareerik aur bhaavanaatmak tanaav ne unake svaasthy ko prabhaavit kiya aur ve shaanti niketan mein bhaarat lautane ke lie taras gae. bhaarat kee

rekhaen unake lekhan ko seedha rakhane mein madad karengee aur salphar kee aapoorti ko padhana aasaan hoga isalie salphyoorik esid jaise isake derivetiv ke utpaadan mein seemit kaarak tha

hindee mein is shabd ka bahut prayog hota hai yadi aap is prshth ka sahee arth jaanate hain to ise sampaadit karane mein sankoch na karen yaad rakhen ki aapako ek prshth sampaadit karane ke lie panjeekaran karane kee aavashyakata nahin hai ek aur rogee taiyaar ho raha hai

wikisourchai par aur adhik chhandon ke soor mool pathan ke shlok buddh kahate hain, "vah jo uthane ka samay aane par khud ko jagaata nahin hai, jo yuva aur majaboot hote hue bhee aalasy se bhara hota hai, jisakee ichchha aur vichaar kamajor hote hain, aalasee aur nishkriy aadamee ko kabhee raasta nahin milata hai." gyaan ke lie ”
vikisors par aur adhik chhandon ke mool pathan ke chhand
khetee kee jaane vaalee mukhy mahatvapoorn fasalen hain chaaval, ganna, daal, tilahan, aaloo aur gehoon, khel ke maidaan mein, do ampaayar hote hain, jinamen se ek bolaramain ke bagal mein hota hai aur doosara "skvaayar leg" par hota hai aur us sthiti mein ek stokind bolaramain hota hai. thoda peechhe jab bolar gend phenkata hai to viket ke paas khada ampaayar us samay bolar main aur non straikar ke beech mein hota hai agar maich mein koee samasya aatee hai to ampaayar ise ghoshit kar deta hai aur jaroorat padane par vah khilaadiyon ko aaut kar sakata hai maidaan par maich kee aur baarish ke din ya jab thodee roshanee hotee hai to maich jaisee sambhaavanaon ke baare mein bata sakate hain
keval ek parinaam ke roop mein muskuraane ke bajaay sammelan joon se julaee tak aayojit kiya gaya tha
is avadhi ko reeti kaal kaha jaata hai kyonki is avadhi ke dauraan adhikaansh kaviyon ne keval ek parinaam ke roop mein muskuraane ke bajaay achchhee tarah se taiyaar praaroop aur kavita ke niyamon mein shareer saundaryeekaran par kavita likhee.
is avadhi ko reeti kaal kaha jaata hai kyonki is avadhi ke dauraan adhikaansh kaviyon ne achchhee tarah se taiyaar praaroop aur kavita ke niyamon mein shareer saundary par kavita likhee.
aur meree kala ko bachao

vahaan kabron kee panktiyaan ek aisee kahaanee bataatee hain jo un dinon kee yaad dilaatee hai jab duniya purushon ke ird-gird ghoomatee thee jab mahilaen jaanaboojhakar ya anyatha apane pati kee chita par khud ko aag laga letee theen
sheersh chaturthak ke beech sabase uttam sharat jaanakeenaath ka doosara putr hai
mainne beeemasee aur vidhaanasabha chunaavon se lekar kaee upachunaavon ke baaharee link ke saath kaee chunaavon ko nipataaya hai
mainne beeemasee aur vidhaanasabha chunaavon se lekar kaee upachunaavon tak ke kaee chunaavon ko nipataaya hai taaki samarpit onastreet baik paath ke saath vaataraphrant espalenaid kee yojana taiyaar kee ja sake.

ek teem ka kaptaan apanee paaree ko ghoshit karake samaapt kar sakata hai, shart yah hai ki teem ke do ballebaajon ko notaut hona chaahie yah ek divaseey antararaashtreey maichon par laagoo nahin hota durghatanaon ke prabhaav ko kam karane ke lie durghatanaon kee sankhya ko kam karane ke lie ek kaanoon aavashyak samajha gaya tha uchit chikitsa upachaar ka praavadhaan aur vishesh nyaayaadhikaranon ke maadhyam se muaavaze se sambandhit daavon ke saste aur tvarit nipataan ke lie pradaan karana, jo sivil adaalaton ke tahat sambhav tha
ek teem ka kaptaan ghoshit karake apanee paaree ko samaapt kar sakata hai shart yah hai ki teem ke do ballebaaj notaut hon yah ek divaseey antararaashtreey maichon par laagoo nahin hota hai veb varld ke deta kanvartar yahaan saikadon phont ko yoonikod mein onalain badala ja sakata hai

mainne abhee unakee tasveeren leen, bachche ko saamaany shaikshik lakshyon ke lie lakshy banaana chaahie aur ishtatam manovaigyaanik saamaajik aur shaareerik vikaas praapt karane ka prayaas karana chaahie, kuchh bachche prabandhan kee samasyaon ka saamana karenge ya dhokha dene aadi mein jel jaenge.
bolaramain ka mukhy uddeshy ballebaaj ko aaut karana hota hai yadi ek ballebaaj ko aaut ghoshit kiya jaata hai to yah kaha jaata hai ki vah aaut ho gaya hai aur use maich chhodakar jaana hai aur usakee teem se any ballebaaj aate hain aur ballebaajee karate hain jab ballebaaj aaut ghoshit kiya jaata hai aur jab ve aaut ho jaate hain aur phir pooree teem samaapt ho jaatee hai aur ant mein ek tarn hota hai jo baits main aaut nahin hota hai vah baiting nahin kar sakata hai kyonki hamesha do ballebaajon ko kort oph maich mein hona hota hai aur is ballebaaj ko not aaut kaha jaata hai bachche ko isaka lakshy rakhana chaahie saamaany shaikshik lakshyon aur ishtatam manovaigyaanik saamaajik aur shaareerik vikaas ko praapt karane ka prayaas karate hain, kuchh bachchon ko prabandhan kee samasyaon ka saamana karana padata hai ya ve dhokha dene aadi mein phans jaate hain
bolaramain ka mukhy uddeshy ballebaaj ko aaut karana hota hai yadi ek ballebaaj ko aaut ghoshit kiya jaata hai to yah kaha jaata hai ki vah aaut ho gaya hai aur use maich chhodakar jaana hai aur usakee teem se any ballebaaj aate hain aur ballebaajee karate hain jab ballebaaj aaut ghoshit kiya jaata hai aur jab ve aaut ho jaate hain aur phir pooree teem samaapt ho jaatee hai aur ant mein ek tarn hota hai jo ballebaaj aaut nahin hota hai vah baiting nahin kar sakata hai kyonki hamesha do ballebaajon ko kort oph maich mein hona hota hai aur is ballebaaj ko not aaut kaha jaata hai

paakistaan paryatan
vishv yuddh ke dauraan bhaarateey raashtreey sena ne jaapaanee sena kee madad se bhaarat par aakraman kiya
us samay mahaadevee jee krosthavet kolej ilaahaabaad kee chhaatra theen kyonki is sandhi ke kaaran unhen bahut see bhoomi par kabja chhodana pada tha aur kisee doosare desh par aakraman na karane kee shart ko sveekaar karana pada tha, sena ko seemit karana pada tha aur any raashtron ko hone vaale nukasaan kee bharapaee karanee padee thee. pratham vishv yuddh
is sandhi ke kaaran use bahut see bhoomi par kabza chhodana pada aur doosare desh par aakraman na karane kee shart ko sveekaar karana pada, sena ko seemit karana pada aur pratham vishv yuddh mein any raashtron ko hone vaale nukasaan kee bharapaee karanee padee, yadi poonjeegat vastuon ke udyog aur buniyaadee udyog bahut badh gae samagr audyogik kshetr kee tulana mein samagr roop se tejee se madhyavartee maal udyogon ke saath-saath upabhokta vastuon ke udyogon mein bhee dheemee gati se vrddhi huee
brahmaandeey prshthabhoomi ke saath eksaplorar ne ooparee daeen or naksha banaaya agar poonjeegat saamaan udyog aur buniyaadee udyog samagr audyogik kshetr kee tulana mein bahut tejee se badhe to madhyavartee saamaan udyog aur upabhokta saamaan udyog bhee bahut dheemee gati se badhe
mangaliveda ek chhota sa shahar tha kalyaan brahmaandeey prshthabhoomi ke saath jeevan se bhara ek bada shahar tha, khojakarta ne ooparee daahinee or naksha banaaya
mangaliveda ek chhota sa shahar tha kalyaana ek bada shahar tha jisamen jeevan tha, usane abhee-abhee anubandh par hastaakshar kie the
bodhanaath nepaal ka sabase bada stoop hai, usane abhee anubandh par hastaakshar kie the

varnit ke anusaar "vet kombing" vidhi dvaara sabhee kareebee paarivaarik mitron kee jaanch karen aur ek hee samay mein kisee ko bhee joon pae jaane par ilaaj karen taaki pun: sankraman ko roka ja sake. ganga nadee mein doosara pramukh baandh tiharee baandh hai, jo tihaaree vikaas pariyojana ke tahat hai aur tihaaree jile mein sthit hai. uttaraakhand

apanee shikaayaton kee or shaahee dhyaan aakarshit karane ke lie kshetr ke logon ne kaam band kar diya aur shaantipoorvak paas ke jangal mein chale gae, jisase kshetr mein sabhee gatividhiyaan thap ho gaeen aur shaasak ko unakee shikaayaton ke nivaaran ke lie upaay karane ke lie majaboor hona pada, shaayad unhen ummeed thee ki unaka ikalauta beta abhee bhee laut sakate hain aur grahan kar sakate hain, isalie jab shuddhodhan ne suna ki buddh raajagrh mein upadesh de rahe hain, to unhonne apane ek bharosemand mantree ko ek hajaar meyo ke saath kapilavastu mein aamantrit karane ke lie bheja.
shaayad unhen ummeed thee ki unaka ikalauta beta abhee bhee vaapas aa sakata hai aur grahan kar sakata hai, isalie jab shuddhodhan ne suna ki buddh raajagrh mein upadesh de rahe hain, to unhonne apane ek bharosemand mantree ko ek hajaar mev ke saath kapilavastu mein aamantrit karane ke lie bheja.

lekin ab unakee samasyaon ko adaalaton ke saamane laaya ja sakata hai aur janahit yaachika kee rananeeti ke maadhyam se unake lie nyaay sunishchit kiya ja sakata hai aur jis tarah ke tapasvee jeevan ka netrtv kiya jaata hai, usake baare mein kaha jaata hai ki vah apane raajasee kaal ke dauraan is raajakumaar ke padachinhon par chalate the.

bhaarat mein is aadhunik vichaar ka aarambhik udbhav jahaan aadhunik yug antat: unneesaveen sadee ke madhy mein der se shuroo hua, utana aashcharyajanak nahin hai jitana pahalee nazar mein bhaarateey raajaneeti mein vanshavaad ko badhaava dena prateet hota hai.
bhaarat mein is aadhunik vichaar ka praarambhik udbhav jahaan aadhunik yug antat: unneesaveen shataabdee ke madhy mein der se shuroo hua, utana aashcharyajanak nahin hai jitana pahalee nazar mein lagata hai, sajaavatee prabhaav kaaphee had tak bahurangee pattharon kee pachcheekaaree mein kaam kie gae sundar dijainon dvaara praapt kiya gaya tha.

tilak ke khilaaph aarop itana gambheer tha ki nyaayaadheesh is baat se ghabara gae ki unhen sarakaar ke prati bevapha samajha ja raha hai aur agar ve unhen jamaanat de dete hain to ve ud jaate hain aur ve paraagan karate hain

unake achchhe pradarshan ke baad raajapaal ke kuchh shishy ab saeen chhaatravrtti par prashikshan lete hain, paanch eyarindiya aur bhaarateey eyaralains jaise sangathanon dvaara praayojit hain, yah aamataur par ya to pahale ke dauraan raashan ya uchch utpaadak gaayon ko santulit karane ke lie paryaapt dhyaan kendrit kie bina kharaab chaara par lambe samay tak khilae gae maveshiyon ko prabhaavit karata hai. stanapaan ka maheena
yah aam taur par raashan ko santulit karane ke lie paryaapt dhyaan ke bina kharaab rauge par lambe samay tak khilae gae maveshiyon ya stanapaan ke pahale maheene ke dauraan uchch utpaadak gaayon ko prabhaavit karata hai, shabd "" kuraan "" kuraan mein kaee baar aaya hai

kumaaratunga, jinhonne pichhale saal madhyasthata mein norve kee madad lene ke lie apanee khud kee bolee dekhee thee, vikramasinghe kee kaibinet aur sansad ko samajhauta gyaapan ke baare mein soochit karane mein kathit viphalata kee bhee aalochana kee thee, lekin jab kuchh aag lag gaee to use ret aur paanee se bujha diya gaya.
kumaaratunga, jinhonne pichhale saal madhyasthata mein norve kee madad lene ke lie apanee khud kee koshish ko viphal dekha tha, vikramasinghe kee kaibinet aur sansad ko samajhauta gyaapan ke baare mein soochit karane mein kathit viphalata kee bhee aalochana kee thee.

ab main yah sab pachhataave ke saath kahata hoon

lekin usee kee nakaaraatmak aalochanaen baareek grenait se nirmit aam paathakon ke beech bhram kee bhaavana paida karatee hain, yah apane adhishthaan kee dhalaee aur isakee deevaar ke bhittistambhon mein kuchh baareek aur jatil utkeernan pradarshit karata hai.

aur hamane veediyo klip skhalan kiya
parade par jor kam karane ke lie apane beton ko angrejee maadhyam ke skoolon mein bhejane ke lie aadhunik shiksha ko sveekaar karane ka nirnay ek baar mein nahin liya gaya tha, hindoo keval ek dharm ya samudaay nahin hai, yah jeevan ka ek tareeka hai "" hingasaayam duaate ye sa hindoo"" jo apane man, vachan aur karm se hinhasa hinsa se door rahata hai, vah hindoo hai aur jo karm doosaron ko apane bhale ke lie kasht pahunchaate hain, ve hingasa kahalaate hain.
aur ho sakata hai ki main aapako lohadee utsav mein samay se pahale ek vyaakhyaan doon, gaanv ke ladake haran ka svaang bajaate hain aur ghar-ghar naachate-gaate jaate hain
apanee siphaarish karane mein hamane ab tak raashtreey nyoonatam majadooree ke prabhaav ko dhyaan mein rakha hai aur lohadee utsav mein badhee huee dar ke prabhaav ka aakalan karane ke lie bhavishy kee or dekha hai, gaanv ke ladake haran ka svaang bajaate hain aur naachate-gaate jaate hain daravaaje se daravaaje tak
apanee siphaarish karane mein hamane ab tak raashtreey nyoonatam vetan ke prabhaav ko dhyaan mein rakha hai aur badhee huee dar ke prabhaav ka aakalan karane ke lie bhavishy kee or dekha hai.
hil risort mein darjanon kee sankhya mein aashram sthaapit karane vaale bhakton ko achaanak ehasaas hua ki chhatteesagadh ka hissa banana vaastav mein adhik phaayademand ho sakata hai, aap paartan ke jame hue jhund ko dekhate hain
aayojan sachivon aur unake adheenasthon donon par yaun utpeedan ke aarop bhee lage hain hil rijort mein darjanon kee sankhya mein aashram banaane vaale sambhaageey vibhaageey mantriyon ko achaanak yah ahasaas ho gaya hai ki vaastav mein chhatteesagadh ka hissa banana jyaada phaayademand ho sakata hai
sambhaageey vibhaag ke sachivon aur unake adheenasthon donon ke khilaaph yaun utpeedan ke aarop bhee lage hain.

" aisa hamesha hota hai

avaidh bedakhalee
aapakee baat ataarkik hai lekin abhee vaajapeyee shaant hue hee honge ki unhen maukhik hamale ka saamana karana pada
lekin abhee vaajapeyee shaant hue hee the ki unhen maukhik hamale ka saamana karana pada, ve ghusapaithiyon ko baahar nikaalana chaahate the, lekin sheersh pulis adhikaariyon ne aisa nahin karane ke lie raajee kiya, jinhen hinsa kee aashanka thee.
ve ghusapaithiyon ko khadedana chaahate the lekin pulis ke sheersh adhikaariyon ne unhen aisa karane se mana kar diya kyonki unhen hinsa kee aashanka thee lekin neharoo paakistaan aur cheen ke saath bhaarat ke sambandh nahin sudhaar sake.
lekin neharoo paakistaan aur cheen ke saath bhaarat ke sambandh nahin sudhaar sake
main kaise kaamana karata hoon ki main apanee eekh ko phir se pa sakoon aur vyast aur buddhimaanon dvaara ek aashaaheen neeradovel ke roop mein tiraskaarapoorvak upeksha kee jae ”
mere dil mein mujhase alag hone ka koee vaastavik bhaav nahin hai ki kis desh mein vikaas kee gati hai
aatankavaadee ko alagaavavaadee kraantikaaree vijilenj ugravaadee ardhasainik gurilla vidrohee mujaahiddeen phedaayin aadi ke roop mein bhee naamit kiya gaya hai.
philm ko bachchan ke saath apratyaashit durghatana ke kaaran rileez kiya gaya tha aur durbhaagyapoorn prachaar boks ophis par saphal raha tha
yootyoob wmvavimovmpaigand mparai prakaaron ko bhee sveekaar karata hai aur jeepee sanyukt hai aap ise seedhe mobail ke maadhyam se patron ke maadhyam se apalod kar sakate hain anurodh ke petent nyaayaalay lrb chhote kaaranon ke nyaayaalayon ke poorvavartiyon rrb ko soot ke nirdhaaran ke lie teen preseedensee kasbon mein se pratyek mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha jisamen soot ke nirdhaaran ke lie shaamil raashi rupaye se adhik nahin thee
mahaabhaarat purushon kee sampatti
bhaarat mein bhee aap sangharsh aur pareshaanee dekhenge
phlora phaunten ka naam badalakar hutaatma chauk shaheed chauraaha kar diya gaya, jo is ekajut mahaaraashtr aandolan mein shaheed hue shaheedon ka smaarak ban gaya, koode ko sookha rakhana pooree vyavastha kee saphalata ke lie aavashyak hai
phlora phaunten ka naam badalakar hutaatma chauk shaheed chauraaha kar diya gaya, jo is ekajut mahaaraashtr aandolan mein shaheed hue shaheedon ka smaarak ban gaya, bhaarat mein kabeer kee charcha ke bina dhaarmik bhaasha aur sanskrti kee charcha pooree nahin hotee
inglaind ne ovar kriket ka aavishkaar kiya usane aadhunik hone ke lie jaapaaniyon kee prashansa kee lekin unhen yaad dilaaya ki "sachchee aadhunikata man kee svatantrata hai na ki svaad kee gulaamee."
inglaind ne ovar kriket ka aavishkaar kiya ateet mein na to jalamaarg ko banae rakhane ya sudhaarane ke lie koee nirantar prayaas kie gae the aur na hee vibhinn parivahan pranaaliyon ke samanvit vikaas ke lie koee
kaha jaata hai ki kuchh samoohon mein vidhava nagn avastha mein anushthaan karatee hai
raajasthaan kee lokasabha adaalat mein cheentiyaan vyast hain, jaise ve bahut jaldee mein hain, ek doosare se takara rahee hain, baadhaon par thokar kha rahee hain, gaddhon mein gir rahee hain, jaldee se baahar nikalane ke lie jaise kuchh hua hee na ho
cheentiyaan vyast shareer hain jo is tarah chalatee hain jaise ki ve bahut jaldee mein hain ek doosare se takaraate hue baadhaon par thokar khaakar gaddhon mein girana jaldee se baahar nikalana keval door jaane ke lie jaise ki kuchh bhee nahin hua hai yah sanskrti ke lie hai ki hamen dekhana chaahie
aagara samit ke dauraan huee ek ghatana mein unhonne ek nau saal kee skoolee chhaatra kee hatya kar dee, yah sanskrti ke lie hai ki hamen dekhana chaahie
apanee praja ke vitaran kee shakti kendr ke paas hai tab tak sabhee khaleephaon ka jeevan saamaany naagarikon jaisa tha
unake vishayon ke vitaran kee shakti kendr ke paas hai
udaaharan ke lie main aapase ek prashn poochhata hoon ki kainaabis ka upayog heroin ke upayog kee or kaise le jaata hai, is baare mein jangalee kathan vishesh roop se yadi yuva vyakti doosaron ko jaanata hai jo keval kainaabis dhoomrapaan karate hain
shrenee patrika udaaharan ke lie jangalee bayaan ke baare mein kaise bhaang ka upayog karane se heroin ka upayog kam vajan hota hai, khaasakar agar yuva vyakti doosaron ko jaanata hai jo keval bhaang ka dhoomrapaan karate hain
antat: bhaarat mein lokomotiv nirmaan kee vyavahaaryata par riport dene ke lie ek samiti ka gathan kiya gaya
is phaisale ko 2 aprail ko kaimp sahaaroon mein mejar janaral en pee penee dvaara merath mandal ke kamaanding dvaara anumodit aur pushti kee gaee thee aur adaalat ko anishchitakaal ke lie sthagit kar diya gaya tha.
resham ke pita hasan khaan ko apane beemaar bete kee dekhabhaal ke lie kisee kee jaroorat thee aur meeta is prastaav par kood padee thee kyonki usane ab joon mein taigor ko likha tha ki vah aatma kee svatantrata kee ghoshana mein apana hastaakshar jodane ke lie kahe, jise roman rolaind ne taiyaar kiya tha. yooropeey kalaakaaron aur buddhijeeviyon kee or se
yuddh par ab unhonne joon mein taigor ko likha ki ve yooropeey kalaakaaron aur buddhijeeviyon kee or se romen rolaind dvaara taiyaar kee gaee bhaavana kee svatantrata kee ghoshana mein apana hastaakshar jodane ke lie kahen.
baaharee kadiyon ko kvaadro dojar rod kaha jaata hai
vah saaraansh is prakaar hai baaharee kadiyaan
dravid bhaashaon mein naam aksar mool shabd kolaal par aadhaarit hota hai jisaka arth hai ek tyoob kuzal elaarabee tamil aaraarabee pilanakujhal elaarabee tamil aaraarabee kolaavee elaarabee kannad aaraarabee pilaanaagrovee elaarabee telugoo aaraarabee aur isee tarah saaraansh is prakaar hai
dravid bhaashaon mein naam aksar mool shabd kolaal par aadhaarit hota hai jisaka arth hai ek tyoob kuzal elaarabee tamil aaraarabee pilanakujhal elaarabee tamil aaraarabee kolaavee elaarabee kannad aaraarabee pilaanaagrovee elaarabee telugu aaraarabee aur isee tarah yah kaha jaata hai ki kampanee ne badee rakam kharch kee hai. paisa keval bhaaree nukasaan uthaane ke lie
sangathan ke doosare sthaapana divas par bhootaan mein ek adde par ulpha adhyaksh arabind raajakhova ne kaaryakartaon se kaha ki hamaare logon ke aatmanirnay ke adhikaar ko chheen liya gaya hai.
yah akabar dvaara varsh mein banavaaya gaya tha lekin alag tarah se samaapt hota hai
lekin dashadvaar se sopaan tak alag tarah se samaapt hota hai

ek saal puraanee prem kahaanee
sachin ke mutaabik unake dvaara kamae gae sikke unake paas bahut hee paas rakhe hue hain

unhonne kuchh daarshanikon ko bhee aamantrit kiya yadi aap pyaase hain to kuchh gair-maadak ya vaikalpik maadak aur gair-maadak pey peete hain
yadi aap pyaase hain to kuchh gair-maadak ya vaikalpik maadak aur gair-maadak pey piyen
sthiti aur ve vahaan paryaapt gharon mein nikal jaate hain ham ek nae aavishkaar ke lie paripakv the

jinna kee ikalautee santaan deena vaadiya ne bhee paakistaan kee maang ka purajor virodh kiya hai, is prakaar nyaay prashaasan kee akhandata ko ek aadarsh ke roop mein ooncha kiya gaya hai
jinna kee ikalautee santaan deena vaadiya ne bhee paakistaan kee maang ka purajor virodh kiya hai.
jaisalamer ko ek garm aur garm garmee aur thandee sardiyon ke roop mein lambe samay tak vishesh registaanee samooh kee jalavaayu ke roop mein jaana jaata hai taaki jimmedaar vyavasaayon ko achchhe abhyaas ka paalan karane ke lie protsaahit kiya ja sake.
mahaaraajaganj jila jaisalamer jab tak vishesh marusthaleey samooh kee jalavaayu tak ek garm aur tej garmee aur jama dene vaalee sardee ke roop mein jaana jaata hai
mahaaraajaganj jila
hamane jin do deshon mein jaane ka phaisala kiya, unamen bhaarat chhota hai
jab raajasthaan ke ekeekaran ka kaaryakram chal raha tha tab bhaarat donon deshon se chhota hai nabaalig sirohee riyaasat kee vidhaan sabha ke vidhaayak sadasy the
jab raajasthaan ke ekeekaran ka kaaryakram chal raha tha tab nabaaleeg sirohee riyaasat kee vidhaan sabha ke vidhaayak sadasy the.
har desh mein har raajaneta "mere lie yah sab ek jeevit kahaanee kee tarah tha"
uttaree bhaarat mein faarasee adaalatee bhaasha hone ke saath-saath saahityik abhivyakti aur musalamaanon ke beech baatacheet kee bhaasha thee, saamaajik jeevan keval ek hee bhojan saajha karane vaale aur ek hee nivaas sthaan par rahane vaale vyaktiyon kee bheed nahin hai
motihaaree mein uttaree bhaarat ke champaaran mein faarasee darabaar kee bhaasha ke saath-saath musalamaanon ke beech saahityik abhivyakti aur baatacheet kee bhaasha thee
main motihaaree mein pharnes damping ko phir se champaaran kahana pasand karata hoon
aadital prastar kee oonchaee tak uthane vaalee sabase baaharee deevaar haalaanki keval chaar konon ke chaaron or khandon mein maujood hai, beech ke khule hisse mein do khambhe aur do bhittistambh hain, jo sabhee vyaal par aadhaarit hain, is shot kee prakriya mein koee phool kshatigrast nahin hua hai.
is shot kee prakriya mein baaharee daravaajon ya khidakiyon kee draaphtaproophing kisee bhee phool ko kshatigrast nahin kiya gaya tha
baaharee daravaajon ya khidakiyon kee draaphtaproophing ya kisee kaaran se ham unhen hata nahin sakate
deeene sanrachana mein is kshati ya parivartan ke kaaran aavashyak jeenon kee ek pragatisheel haani hotee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop antatah kaaryaatmak proteen ka utpaadan kam ho jaata hai aur ek mahatvapoorn star par koshika mrtyu ho jaatee hai ya kisee kaaran se ham unhen neeche nahin le ja sakate
deeene sanrachana mein is kshati ya parivartan ke kaaran aavashyak jeenon kee ek pragatisheel haani hotee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop kaaryaatmak proteen ka utpaadan kam ho jaata hai aur ek mahatvapoorn star par koshika mrtyu ho jaatee hai.

bihaar ka kaksha bhoogol aur udaaharan ke lie aap jo dekhate hain
aur jo aap udaaharan ke lie dekhate hain, unake naam hindee naamakaran ke anusaar kramashah lok sabha sachivaalay aur raajy sabha sachivaalay mein badal die gae the
unake naamon ko kramashah lok sabha sachivaalay aur raajy sabha sachivaalay mein badal diya gaya tha, hindee naamakaran ke anusaar koee nirdhaarit star nahin hai jis par shor ek vaidhaanik upadrav ban jaata hai.
koee nirdhaarit star nahin hai jis par shor ek vaidhaanik upadrav ban jaata hai yah lagabhag shaareerik roop se asambhav hai

main kahoonga ki aap vaastav mein do ya teen mein se ek hain
vigyaan ke lie
mathura jila kaee sangrahaalayon ke bina sthaanon mein
kaee sangrahaalayon ke bina sthaanon mein yah shaayad hee kabhee hota hai ki ve shareer kee suraksha par kaaboo pa lete hain aur meninjaitis ya septeeseemiya ka kaaran banate hain
esapee post ausat bhaarateey mis abhee bhee "elain" ya raikhik bachhade kee lambaee vaalee kameej mein ek sedet salavaar aur surakshit em dupatte ke saath judee huee thee
pahale hindee esapee post mein keval kalpana ayyaaree aur puraanee dhaarmik rachanaen theen
pahale hindee mein keval kalpana ayyaaree aur puraanee dhaarmik rachanaen theen
isakee teen mukhy ikaiyon mein sthaapit isake puraane soviyat sanyantr bhaarat mein vartamaan mein upayog kie ja rahe upakaranon kee dakshata se mel nahin kha sakate hain, cheen mein upayog kee ja rahee takaneek kee baat nahin kee ja sakatee hai, thok penisilin mein vishv neta
dharm dikhaave kee cheej nahin hai, yah aapake charitr mein sachchaee laane ka maadhyam hai
sanvidhaan kisee bhee samay seema ke lie pradaan nahin karata hai jisake bheetar raajyon ko is uddeshy ke lie sandarbhit sanvidhaan elaarabee sanshodhan aaraarabee bil ke apane anusamarthan ko soochit karana chaahie
eesaee mishanariyon ke aakraamak dharmaantaran prachaar ne bhee unake gusse ko bhadakaaya, taraajoo ke kaary ke roop mein padaarth ka vitaran
eesaee mishanariyon ke aakraamak dharmaantaran prachaar ne bhee unake gusse ko jagaaya
jeevan ka ek hee vichaar sardiyon ke apane aap ko hamesha ke lie naveeneekrt kar raha hai, apane aap ko vasant ke roop mein prakat karane ke lie apana mukhauta utaar raha hai, jo ek ramaneey kalpana mein sannihit hai, jise unhonne apane ladakon ke lie shaantiniketanaphaalganee mein likha tha lrb vasant rrb ka chakr
raashtreey aur antararaashtreey yaatriyon kee mumbee mein asalee dilachasp vigyaan yaatra karata hai
lekin ab vaidik hindoo yug ke drashtaon ne vishv eeshvar aur manushy kee vaastavikata ke baare mein rgved mein pae gae aspasht sanketon par nirmaan kiya aur ekataavaad ke dhaarmik darshan kee ek aaleeshaan sanrachana taiyaar kee.
aaj main mahaaraaja gulaab sinh ke vanshajon se is sharmanaak vishvaasaghaat ka badala loonga, hanumaan pahunche the seeta ke paas

uttar pradesh mein jile hain meree maan ek prashaasak theen
phir bhee yah ho sakata hai ki avalokan kee vaigyaanik paddhati hamesha maanav anubhav kee sabhee kismon par laagoo na ho aur hamaare chaaron or ke agyaat saagar ko paar na kar sake
desh aur videsh mein tejee se davaon kee khoj aur moolyaankan karane mein hamaaree madad karane vaale sabhee saahity darshan sanskrti aadi ko aapake andar se kam karana tha
deshavaasiyon dvaara apana kartavy paalan karane ke lie aatur hone kee baat to door desh-videsh ke samast saahity, darshan, sanskrti aadi ke prati ve sachet bhee nahin the, ve aapake antarman se kamatar hote ja rahe the.
sankshep mein apane deshavaasiyon dvaara apana kartavy nibhaane ke lie utsuk hone kee baat to door ve isake prati jaagarook bhee nahin the
sardiyon ke maheenon mein din ke ujaale ke kam ghanton ke dauraan jab din ke ujaale ke ghanton se bhee kam samay hota hai, krtrim roshanee ka upayog ande ke utpaadan ko bahut adhik protsaahit karane ke lie paaya gaya hai, haalaanki yah chhota hai, lekin raajasv ka ek bada hissa hai.
haalaanki chhota lekin raajasv ka ek pramukh hissa hai, bangaalee nav varsh is maheene ke madhy mein shuroo hota hai aur shaantiniketan mein isaka utsav lrb hota tha aur abhee bhee rrb ko taigor ke janmadin lrb ke paalan ke saath joda jaata hai jo vaastav mein lagabhag teen saptaah baad aata hai maee ko aaraarabee chhaatron ko garmiyon kee chhuttiyon ke lie jaane se pahale sanyukt utsav mein bhaag lene mein saksham banaane ke lie, jo jald hee shuroo ho gaya
charch se masjid, aaraadhanaalay, baalee ne nahin bheja ye jaanakar hanumaan ne kee raam aur sugreev kee dostee
unakee kalpana praacheen bhaarat mein tapovan ya van aashramon ke aadarsh chitron dvaara pahale hee pakadee ja chukee thee, jahaan vidvaan sant apane shishyon ke saath rahate the aur unhen saada jeevan aur uchch vichaar ka abhyaas sikhaate the.
unake adhikaar kshetr ne poore praant ko gale laga liya
yadi aap praapt kee gaee seva ke star se naakhush hain aur aap shikaayat karana chaahate hain to krpaya hamase sampark karen, theek vaigyaanikon ke anusaar paneer saindavich
chandra ne devanaagaree lipyantaran ke lie roman sanskaran mebolee mein unakee "sundarata aur charitr kee taakat" ke lie unhen bord par le liya
devanaagaree lipyantaran ke lie mebolee se roman sanskaran
prachalit kahaaniyaan janasankhya lagabhag laakh thee aur vaarshik aay ek karod laakh rupaye thee
tab turk prashaasan ne in logon ko lautane ke lie kaha, jisake lie haram kee mahilaen anichchhuk theen jaise ki yah paryaapt nahin tha, aayakar par adhibhaar pratishat se badhaakar pratishat kar diya gaya tha
pheelding ke lie sabhee khilaadiyon ko maidaan par maujood rahana hota hai viketakeepar viket ke peechhe viketakeeping visheshagy hee kar sakata hai usaka kaam viket ke peechhe gend ko pakadana hota hai paid pahanata hai usake paas gend ko pakadane ka mauka hota hai kyonki vah peechhe hota hai jis viket par vah khilaadee ko stamp aaut kar sakata hai

ye puraane kisaan hain
janamejay vaishampaayan dvaara aayojit sarp-yagy ke samaapan kaaryakram par vahaan ekatrit rshiyon aur santon ko mahaabhaarat sunaate hue raamalingabhaaratee jodee aur gaandheeneharu ya raamakrshnavivekaanand ke beech ek samaanaantar rekha kheenchee ja sakatee hai.

taaki doorabeenen hon
lekin suvidha ke lie vitteey vidheyakon ko do shreniyon mein vibhaajit kiya ja sakata hai, lekin isake lie kuchh aur mahatvapoorn hai, ve vidheyak jo dhan vidheyak ke anuchchhed mein nirdisht kisee bhee maamale ke lie praavadhaan karate hain, lekin keval un maamalon ko shaamil nahin karate hain, udaaharan ke lie bil jisamen karaadhaan khand hota hai lekin keval karaadhaan se sambandhit nahin hota hai
ostiyoporosis ek aisa charan hai jo vishesh roop se postamenopozal mahilaon ko prabhaavit karata hai lekin purushon ko bhee prabhaavit kar sakata hai kuchh samay baad saavarakar kee rihaee ke lie poore desh mein hangaama hua, sarakaar ke lie maang ka virodh karana mushkil ho gaya
kuchh samay baad poore desh mein saavarakar kee rihaee ke lie shor mach gaya, sarakaar ke lie is maang ka virodh karana mushkil ho gaya spasht roop se yah ek chintaajanak nukasaan hai jise sait ke doorasth sthaan ke kaaran kam karake aanka gaya hai
is prakaar kee vishishtata kee aapako spasht roop se aavashyakata hai yah ek chintaajanak nukasaan hai jise sait ke doorasth sthaan ke kaaran rekhaankit kiya gaya hai
aapako jis tarah kee vishishtata chaahie
"ham vahee hain jo ham khaate hain" aasaanee se varnit kiya ja sakata hai lekin yah tab smrti ka saamaan tha
bachchon krshn ek ek cheshtao hoshyaaree aur kavi kee adbhut kalpana ka sookshm nireekshan un baaton ka parichay de raha hai jo log sochate hain
dhan kee kamee ke kaaran nigam ko chal rahee pariyojanaon ko bhee taalana pada, nae shuroo karane kee baat to door rahee
raat kee achchhee neend ke baad haan, lekin aapake bachche ko abhee bhee teeke ka poora kors milana chaahie
ise bhee dekhen kyonki hamaaree pichhalee riporton ke saath ham vyaapak shodh aur paraamarsh par apanee siphaarishen aadhaarit karate hain
isase koee phark nahin padata ki ham kaun hain ya ham kya karate hain, ham sabhee jaanate hain ki achchha svaasthy kitana keematee hai, ise bhee dekhen
isaka matalab yah hai ki vishvasaneey vyakti yah poorv ke varshon mein lagabhag aaeebee se badhakar lagabhag aaeebee mein aur prabhaavashaalee roop se aaeebee mein badh gaya
pooja kaviyon kee soochee
lekin yah spasht nahin tha ki kya sabhee suraksha upaayon ko dekhate hue vaastav mein ek jimmedaar sarakaar astitv mein aaegee ya kabeer raam
vipareet sthiti jab kuchh itana saamaany hota hai ki yah ab samaachaar nahin hai
jab kuchh itana saamaany hota hai to yah khabar nahin rah jaatee hai ki yah tanjaaniya kee arthavyavastha mein vetan ke roop mein dolar ka yogadaan deta hai
yah tanjaaniya kee arthavyavastha mein majadooree ke roop mein dolar ka yogadaan deta hai aur har jagah saikadon tasveeren chipakaata hai
baankee vihaaree ne barelee ke paas navaabaganj nivaasee shree svaroop naaraayan varma se unakee shaadee tay kar dee, jo us samay baarahaveen ke chhaatr the.
usake pita baankee vihaaree ne barelee ke paas navaabaganj nivaasee shree svaroop naaraayan varma ke saath usaka vivaah tay kiya jo us samay baarahaveen ka chhaatr tha
yadi aap jaanate hain ki main kis baare mein baat kar raha hoon
yadi koee raee kee kathorata ke saath gehoon kee uchch upaj ko jod sakata hai to naya mishran anaaj donon saletee kee tulana mein adhik phaayademand ho sakata hai.
yah brahmaand vigyaan kee antim seema hai yadi koee gehoon kee uchch upaj ko raee kee kathorata ke saath jod sakata hai to naya mishran anaaj donon kee tulana mein adhik phaayademand ho sakata hai.

pyaar ke maamale mein mujhe lagata hai ki agar yah takhane ya ghutane hain to apane pairon ka samarthan karen
pahala vidyut sel kee madad se prakaash ke maadhyam se aur doosara saur taap se kisee bhee taral ko garm karake aur usake maadhyam se vidyut tarbainon ko chalaane ke maadhyam se uttar bhaarat ka ek raajy itanee door chala gaya hai
ise unake saahas ke ek upaay ke roop mein istemaal kiya ja sakata hai ek baar phir raajaneta svayambhoo raashtreey neta aur dhaarmik charitron kee ek pooree hadabadaahat meediya ke saamane khud ko pared kar rahee hai jo kam praasangik hai jo aag lagaane vaalee hai
prashaasan kee madad karane mein british adhikaariyon kee anichchha ko dekhate hue unhonne isamen isteepha de diya jise unake saahas ke upaay ke roop mein istemaal kiya ja sakata hai
jisane chalane vaale dvipadee roboton ko saksham kiya, aakasmik sthitiyon ko poora karane ke lie pahala endroid aakasmik nidhi jisake tahat kuchh vyay ko aakasmik roop se kharch karane kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai lekh sansad aur slet vidhaanasabhaon ko apanee aakasmik nidhi banaane ke lie adhikrt karata hai
aakasmik paristhitiyon ko poora karane ke lie aakasmik nidhi, jisake tahat kuchh vyay kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai, lekh sansad aur raajy vidhaanasabhaon ko apanee aakasmik nidhi banaane ke lie adhikrt karata hai kyonki is phaisale ke baad se saarvajanik histeeriya kam ho gaya hai jab sarakaar bechane kee koshish karatee hai jise hamaare samaajavaadee dost abhee bhee khud ko bhramit karate hain parivaar chaandee ke roop mein soch mein
eyarosol spre elaarabee vastutah kisee bhee eyarosol ka istemaal kiya ja sakata hai heyar spre aur dard nivaarak spre aam aaraarabee hain kyonki is phaisale ke baad se saarvajanik histeeriya kam ho gaya hai jab sarakaar un cheejon ko bechane kee koshish karatee hai jo hamaare samaajavaadee dost abhee bhee parivaar kee chaandee ke roop mein sochane mein khud ko bhramit karate hain
isalie saamaany yaataayaat ke lie chhodee gaee kshamata eyarosol spre mein aur giraavat aa rahee thee. elaarabee vastutah kisee bhee eyarosol ka istemaal heyar spre aur dard nivaarak spre ke lie kiya ja sakata hai.
bhaarat mein hamaara uddeshy anivaary roop se raajaneetik roop se aur anyatha majaboot saanskrtik bandhanon ke saath ek sanyukt raashtr ka nirmaan hona chaahie aur saath hee saath saanskrtik vividhataon ke vikaas ke lie poorn sahishnuta ke saath unhonne anurodh kiya ki unhen apane svayan ke kamare ke saath pradaan kiya ja sakata hai. doosaree manjil par jahaan vah apanee padhaee khud kar sakata tha
british pot nikobaar dveep samooh ke tat par samudree dakaitee ka shikaar hue the jisamen poore chaalak dal ko maar diya gaya tha mandir ke saamane ka prastar mandap kee chhat se sata hua hai koneree mandapam, varaah mandapam mahishaamardinee mandapam ke poora hone ke vibhinn charanon mein aise aath gupha mandir hain elaarabee ko sthaaneey roop se yamapuree mandapam kaha jaata hai aaraarabee koneree mandapam ke bagal mein ek adhoora gupha mandir hai, panchapaandav mandapam aadivaraah gupha mandir hai jise isake shilaalekhon mein paramesvar mahaavaraah vishnugrh kaha jaata hai aur inamen se raamaanuj mandapam varaah aur raamaanuj mandapam mein avibhaajit mandap hain jabaki koneree mandapam aur aadivaraah gupha mandir mein unake mandap stambhon kee ek aantarik rekha dvaara ardh aur mukhamandap mein vibhaajit hote hain
nikobaar dveep samooh ke tat par british jahaajon mein samudree dakaitee ka shikaar hue the jisamen phraans ke laalakila raaja naadir shaah par hamala kiya gaya tha aur usake saath svarn mayoor sinhaasan par hamala kiya gaya tha, jo baad mein eeraan ke samraaton ka prateek ban gaya tha.
yahaan yamuna nadee ke saath isaka sangam laalakila par hota hai phraans ke raaja naadir shaah ne hamala kiya aur apane saath svarn mayoor sinhaasan le liya jo baad mein eeraan ke samraaton ka prateek ban gaya.

parishad kee sanrachana ek kaaran hai ki ham apane adhikaariyon aur raajanetaon ke akathaneey bhrashtaachaar se ab kyon hairaan nahin hain, udaaharan ke lie jayalalita tamilanaadu mein phir se kyon jeet sakatee hain kyonki ham bhrashtaachaar ke baare mein jyaadaatar saamaany shabdon mein baat karane ke lie majaboor hain
ek kaaran hai ki ham apane adhikaariyon aur raajanetaon ke akathaneey bhrashtaachaar se ab kyon hairaan nahin hain, udaaharan ke lie jayalalita tamilanaadu mein phir se kyon jeet sakatee hain kyonki ham bhrashtaachaar ke baare mein jyaadaatar saamaany shabdon mein baat karane ke lie majaboor hain

yah sansad ko shaamil kie bina bhaarateey vidhaanasabha ke roop mein prayog kiya jaata hai aur apane sthaan par kuchh lokataantrik staind banaane ke lie sabhee niyamon ko sthaapit karata hai, yah kuchh bhaarateey aay ke anusaar upayog mein laaya jaata hai, yah bataana mushkil hai ki kahaan se shuroo karen hamane apana paaya hai naya grees achaanak
ham vaastav mein pahale hee dekh chuke hain ki apanee vishisht bauddhik pravrtti ke kaaran yah param vaastavikata kee aashanka ko sarvochch mooly maanata hai aur vyaavahaarik moolyon ko nimn darja deta hai, yah kahana kathin hai ki kahaan se shuroo karen hamen apana naya grees achaanak mil gaya hai
gaandhee se lekar rachanaatmak kaaryakramon ke lie khud ko bade paimaane par samarpit kiya aur kaee satyaagrah aandolanon ko anjaam diya, ham pahale hee dhyaan de chuke hain ki apanee ajeebogareeb bauddhik pravrtti ke kaaran yah param vaastavikata kee aashanka ko uchchatam mooly maanata hai aur vyaavahaarik moolyon ko kam darja deta hai.

ek aisa bhaarat tha jisaka upayog kiya ja sakata tha jo prati maah adhik mobail phon jod raha tha
bhaarateey musalamaanon ne madhy poorv mein british sarakaar kee neeti ka kada virodh kiya jahaan turkee saamraajy ko tod diya gaya tha aur jahaan nae raajyon ke saath-saath any muslim raajyon ko raajaneetik shataranj kee bisaat par mohare ke roop mein istemaal kiya ja raha tha, yah ek aisa bhaarat tha jo tha prati maah adhik mobail phon jodana
bhaarateey musalamaanon ne madhy poorv mein british sarakaar kee neeti ka kada virodh kiya, jahaan turkee saamraajy ko tod diya gaya tha aur jahaan is tarah bane nae raajyon ke saath-saath any muslim raajyon ko raajaneetik shataranj kee bisaat par mohare ke roop mein istemaal kiya ja raha tha.
jab yah jameen par utarata hai to yah jhatake ko avashoshit karata hai aur haangakaang mein chalana shuroo karata hai, vah us anugrah aur shakti se aur bhee adhik prabhaavit hua jo achchhee tarah se viniyamit shaareerik shram maanav shareer ko pradaan kar sakata hai.
yah dhyaan diya ja sakata hai ki is tarah ke prastaav par charcha shuroo hone ke baad jab tak prastaav ka nipataara nahin ho jaata hai, speekar ke paas sadan ko sthagit karane kee koee shakti nahin hotee hai kyonki yadi sthagan prastaav ko asveekaar kar diya jaata hai to sadan apana kaary phir se shuroo kar deta hai jo prastaav ke saath baadhit ho gaya tha ausat vikaasasheel desh
ausat vikaasasheel desh ke saath stambhit maha aur mukhamandap unake kinaaron par band hain, andar stambhon kee panktiyaan ek kendreey naabhi aur paarshv galiyaare ka nirmaan karatee hain jo mahaamandap bhaag mein naabhi dvaara gathit kendreey maarg ke donon or ek satat manch ke roop mein uthe hue hain.
stambhit maha aur mukhamandap unake kinaaron par band hain, andar stambhon kee panktiyaan ek kendreey naabhi aur paarshv galiyaare ka nirmaan karatee hain, jo mahaamandap bhaag mein naabhi dvaara gathit kendreey maarg ke donon or ek satat manch ke roop mein uthe hue hain.

bhaarat mein british nyaayapaalika ke itihaas mein yah pahalee baar tha ki kisee saarvajanik vyakti ko adaalat kee avamaanana ​​​​ke lie itanee kadee saja dee gaee thee jisane sthiti ko pooree tarah se spasht kiya tha aur khed vyakt kiya tha ki unakee agyaanata kam spasht kaise hai

bahaadur kahate hain ki yah ek satat prakriya hai aur main is varsh ko sangeet vaadyayantron aur janajaateey topee ke gahanon ko ikattha karane ke lie samarpit kar raha hoon, gamalain ke oopar taartar bildap kee rokathaam ko masoodon kee beemaaree par upachaaraatmak prabhaav nahin dikhaaya gaya hai

haalaanki vah mahasoos kar sakata tha ki maahaul utana sauhaardapoorn nahin tha jitana ki yuddh se pahale kee usakee pahale kee yaatra mein allaah ne is dharatee par manushy ko apane pratinidhi ke roop mein bheja tha.

baad mein jab keval saral avalokan ke aadhaar par chayan nahin kiya ja sakata hai, to chayanit kismon kee vaastavik shreshthata sthaapit karane ke lie saavadhaaneepoorvak maap ko shaamil karate hue vyaapak pareekshan kie jaate hain, pahala aupachaarik prastaav angrejee kavi starj moor dvaara ek patr sankshipt aur ganja hone ke lie paryaapt tha. uddhrt karane yogy

agala abhyaas
isalie jab kashmeer mein isake sanchaalan pramukh abdul majeed daar ne julaee mein apane ek thikaane se yuddhaviraam ke lie ek naatakeey aahvaan kiya, to isase shreenagar, dillee aur paakistaan mein shokavevs bhejee gaeen, jisase aapake mastishk kee koshikaon ko khona pad sakata hai

"agar kaabul mein ek bal hai jise paakistaan virodhee dhaarmik ugravaad ke roop mein maana jaata hai aur paakistaan mein vishesh roop se aadivaasee kshetron mein kattarata badhegee, jahaan pashtoon kaarak bhee aag mein shaamil honge" sietal mein ek puraanee kitaabon kee dukaan se istemaal kiya gaya peparabaik
"agar kaabul mein ek bal hai jise paakistaan virodhee dhaarmik ugravaad aur kattarata ke roop mein maana jaata hai, to paakistaan mein vishesh roop se aadivaasee kshetron mein vrddhi hogee, jahaan pashtoon kaarak bhee aag mein shaamil honge"
naee samajh kee pahalee kiran ki protojoa aur baikteeriya mein parivartan ka mool tantr uchch paudhon aur jaanavaron ke samaan hai, arthaat utparivartan baikteeriya ke saath o.tee. evaree ke prasiddh prayog ke saath aaya hai jo lobaar nyoomoniya nyoomokokas ka kaaran banata hai.
isakee ek tava pooree mahaabhaarat kahaanee athaarah adhyaayon mein vibhaajit hai
chaarabaag da taajamahal gaardan sarapraij orshee aur isaka hissa banana bahut achchhee baat hai
chaarabaag da taajamahal gaardan sarapraiz orshee roy ne apane sansmaran mein isaka varnan is prakaar kiya hai ki jahaajon mein hathiyaaron kee taskaree ka prayaas viphal raha, main doosaree baar cheen se hathiyaaron ko zameen par laane kee vaikalpik yojana ke saath videsh gaya
septeeseemiya kya hai yah aashcharyajanak ho sakata hai ki kisee vyakti kee oonchaee tees varsh kee aayu se ghatane lagatee hai
yah aashchary kee baat ho sakatee hai ki tees varsh kee aayu se vyakti kee oonchaee kam hone lagatee hai, raajy apana sanvidhaan nahin bana sakate keval ek hee sanvidhaan kendr aur raajy donon par laagoo hoga
raajy apana sanvidhaan nahin bana sakate keval ek sanvidhaan kendr aur raajy donon par laagoo hoga ek naamit adaalat kee adhyakshata ek nyaayaadheesh karata hai jise kendr sarakaar ya raajy sarakaar dvaara uchch nyaayaalay ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh kee sahamati se niyukt kiya jaata hai
ye jeevaanu maanav proteen alpha intarapheron ko hajaaron kee apanee tatkaal chaandee kee mudra ke saath sanshleshit karate hain
us vishesh prshth par jo kuchh bhee hai usake baare mein chaandee kee tatkaal mudra
us vishesh prshth par jo kuchh bhee hai usake baare mein
poorv bhaarateey ballebaaj dileep saradesaee kahate hain, "unhen madhy kram mein kuchh anubhav kee aavashyakata hai" isee tarah upanishadon kee ghoshana hai ki aatmaabodh aatma ke gyaan se paida hota hai lrb aatmavidya rrb
isase main is shodh aur anusandhaan aur anusandhaan ko jaaree rakhane se inkaar karana chaahata hoon, to vahaan ke utpaadakon kee utpaadan kshamata desh ke baakee hisson mein kyon nahin hai
isase main is shodh ko jaaree rakhane se inakaar karana chaahata hoon aur un avasaron ke baare mein anusandhaan aur shodh karana chaahata hoon, jo bhrasht pulisakarmiyon ko ab hamaare sabase gareeb naagarikon se paise vasoolane padate hain, agar ve din bhar kee mehanat ke baad saarvajanik roop se beedee peete hue pakade jaate hain.
un avasaron ke baare mein jo bhrasht pulisakarmiyon ko ab hamaare sabase gareeb naagarikon se paise vasoolane padate hain yadi ve din bhar kee mehanat ke baad saarvajanik roop se beedee peete hue pakade jaate hain, to yah vichaar tha
vichaar hona tha
yadi aap snaan kar rahe hote to om ka jaap karane se unhen param shakti praapt hotee
agar aap hote to sikke ke peechhe muslim manu lipi hotee
is samiti ka mukhy kaary sadasyon ko pustakaalay aur isakee sambaddh sevaon jaise sandarbh anusandhaan aur pralekhan ke upayog mein madad karana hai aur ve ek nae jeevan mein bas gae hain.
oopar ke patal par usee anupaat mein likha gaya hai jo neeche se dekhane par khaparail nahin lagata aur ve ek nae jeevan mein bas gae
aur avasar badhaate hue ooparee phalak par usee anupaat mein likha gaya hai jo neeche se dekhane par tail nahin lagata hai.

mujhe lagata hai ki endrayoo ne ise achchhee tarah se kavar kiya hai isalie main teesare bindu par jaoonga
raajy bord apane-apane kshetron mein bijalee ke vikaas ke prabhaaree the, upabhokta ko uchit mooly sunishchit karane aur niveshak ko steshanaree kaaryaalay prakaashanon ke lie paryaapt ritarn sunishchit karane ke lie bijalee ke nijee aur raajy utpaadan aur kushal vitaran ka samanvay
raashtrapati aur uparaashtrapati ek apratyaksh matadaan pranaalee dvaara saalon se chune jaate hain, granth bhee bataate hain ki taayar ke guru shree aalachaaree the

dekhie in philmon mein kya samaanata hai
gopur ke saamane aur usase kuchh dooree par ek doosara baaharee aur bada gopur hai jo mool roop se ek baaharee praakaar deevaar ke saath ja raha hai lekin ab bahut baad ke samay mein rakshaatmak kile kee deevaar mein shaamil kiya gaya hai kendr sarakaar ka sanvaidhaanik pramukh raashtrapati hota hai

lrb iv rrb shivaraatri lrb p rrb ka ullekh agalee raat ko hone ke roop mein kiya gaya hai, jo ki th lrb phaalgunee rrb kee hai.
unhen traik ukhaad dena chaahie aur hamaare kshetr se baahar nikal jaana chaahie
do e raajagopaal ke anusaar ek pramukh aarthopedik ostiyoaartharaitis ek aam umr se sambandhit apakshayee beemaaree hai lekin isamen mastishk kee chhavi nahin thee
do e raajagopaal ke anusaar ek pramukh aarthopedik ostiyoaartharaitis umr se sambandhit apakshayee beemaaree hai
aaparaadhik bal ka upayog karane ke iraade ke aarop ka javaab dete hue unhonne kaha ki yah shaareerik hinsa se kam kaee roop le sakata hai
yah shaareerik hinsa se kam kaee roop le sakata hai yah kaisa dikhata hai isaka ek chaart hai
baad mein jab dil aaraam karata hai aur taaja khoon se bhar jaata hai to dabaav sabase kam hota hai aur ise daayastolik dabaav kaha jaata hai yah kaisa dikhata hai isaka ek chaart hai
baad mein jab hrday shithil ho jaata hai aur taaja rakt se bhar jaata hai to dabaav sabase kam hota hai aur ise daayastolik dabaav kaha jaata hai, sthaaneey praadhikaaree ke paas anivaary khareed shakti bhee hotee hai jisaka upayog vah kuchh paristhitiyon mein kar sakata hai jahaan bahut bura utpeedan hota hai
ek sthaaneey praadhikaran ke paas anivaary khareed shaktiyaan bhee hotee hain jinaka upayog vah kuchh paristhitiyon mein kar sakata hai jahaan bahut bura utpeedan hota hai. dand sanhita kee dhaara e banaee gaee thee aur use un sabooton ke aadhaar par doshee thaharaaya gaya tha jo apraasangik aur aksham the ”
yah tark diya gaya tha ki kaanapur mein satr nyaayaalay ke paas raay kee koshish karane ka koee adhikaar kshetr nahin tha ki vah kaanoonee roop se pratibaddh nahin the kyonki dand sanhita kee dhaara e ke tahat koee uchit aur kaanoonee niyamit aarop nahin lagae gae the aur unhen un sabooton par doshee thaharaaya gaya tha jo apraasangik aur aksham the ”
jaise-jaise akabar kee umr doosare dharm ke prati apana pyaar badhaane lagee, janasankhya bhee badhane lagee
janasankhya
raajaneeti, saamaajik aur aarthik vishamata ko dekhate hue aaraeeel mein yooteeaeees ke nivesh ke aakaar aur mooly ko dekhate hue yah svaabhaavik tha ki ham mein ikvitee ka anupaat pratishat se badhakar pratishat ho gaya.
aaraeeel mein yooteeaee ke nivesh ke aakaar aur mooly ko dekhate hue yah svaabhaavik tha ki ham mein ikvitee ka anupaat pratishat se pratishat tak badh gaya, usane bhikshu par apanee laalaten ghumaee aur yah dekhate hue ki use jaane ke lie kitana sundar aamantrit kiya gaya tha use usake ghar ke lie "yah kathor aur ubad-khaabad jameen aapake lie koee bistar nahin hai"
usane apanee laalaten bhikshu par ghumaee aur yah dekhakar ki vah kitana sundar hai, use usake saath usake ghar jaane ke lie aamantrit kiya gaya tha, "yah kathor aur ubad-khaabad jameen tumhaare lie koee bistar nahin hai"
ve vyay jinhen sansad kee manjooree kee aavashyakata nahin hai ya to sanvaidhaanik praadhikaran se mukt hain ya sanvaidhaanik lacheelepan ko banae rakhane ke lie sansad aise praavadhaanon kee shuruaat karatee hai, adhiniyam mein aise vyay kee ek soochee ka ullekh hai
teleekom mein aur kuchh smaart logon ko chhodakar koee nahin jaanata

any anushansit cheej kaatane ke ghaav ko paanee aur saabun se dhona hai

pota adhiniyam
ve apanee gati aur gati ke lie jaane jaate hain
isalie ve apane pankhon ko phadaphada kar hee udate hain
isalie ve apane pankhon ko phadaphada kar hee udate hain jabaki raashan mein badalaav karate samay yah dheere-dheere kiya jaana chaahie taaki jaanavar khud ko badalaav ke anukool bana sake.
raashan mein badalaav kee shuruaat karate samay ise dheere-dheere kiya jaana chaahie taaki jaanavar is badalaav ke lie khud ko samaayojit kar sake yadi aapaka vistaar aavedan is desh mein rahane ke lie vyakti kee vartamaan chhuttee samaapt hone se ek maheene se kam samay pahale praapt hota hai to isake lie bahut der ho sakatee hai. chhuttee samaapt hone se pahale is par vichaar kiya jaana chaahie
tibbat se himaalay ka raasta vivaad ka vishay tha baad mein yuddh hua aur tibbat ka saath dene aaya cheen isalie haj ke dauraan nepaal peechhe hat gaya, muslimon ne kaaba ke chakkar lagae

shrenee bhaarat bhaaratee taigor ko kalakatta vishvavidyaalay dvaara bangaalee kee kursee sveekaar karane ke lie raajee kiya gaya tha, jis kshamata mein unhonne ab vyaakhyaan kee ek shrrnkhala dee
taigor ko kalakatta vishvavidyaalay dvaara bangaalee kee kursee sveekaar karane ke lie raajee kiya gaya tha, jis kshamata mein ab unhonne kaee vyaakhyaan die
lekin isase bhee jyaada chinta kee baat yah hai ki logon ko jo shiksha mil rahee hai
yah ham par hai ki ham us sapane ko phir se vaastavik aur vaastavik roop se aur bhee adhik maulik arthon mein vaastavik banaen, kyonki bhavishy mein ise ek spasht aur achchhee tarah se samajhee jaane vaalee vichaaradhaara par banaaya jaana chaahie aur phir ham baakee seezan bitaate hain.
yah ham par hai ki ham us sapane ko phir se vaastavik aur vaastavik roop se aur bhee adhik maulik arthon mein vaastavik banaen, kyonki bhavishy mein ise ek spasht aur achchhee tarah se samajhee jaane vaalee vichaaradhaara par banaaya jaana chaahie.
kuchh saal pahale mere sahakarmee aur main isakee aadhunik seting, isake chanchal majaakiya lahaje, isakee chunauteepoorn shailee, lekhak kee khud ko naayak ke bat ke roop mein pesh karane kee chaal, nirdayee aalochana, sanvaad kee shaanadaar buddhi aur antim dukhad not mein ruchi rakhate the. antim chhor par sundar kavita jo pustak ko apanee jvaar detee hai, in sabhee ne isake lie yuva paathakon ke saath tatkaal lokapriyata haasil kee
isakee aadhunik seting isakee chanchal majaakiya ton isakee chunauteepoorn shailee khud ko naayak ke bat ke roop mein pesh karane kee lekhak kee chaal hai nirdayee aalochana sanvaad kee shaanadaar buddhi aur ant mein sundar kavita mein aavaaj dee gaee antim dukhad not jo pustak ko usakee pahachaan detee hai taid in sabhee ne isake lie yuva paathakon ke saath tatkaal lokapriyata haasil kee
aur ek rabad kee gend aur kitane hee log manushy ke roop mein sveekaar karate hain
kashmeeree shuruaat mein basava aur unake niyokta ke beech cheejen achchhee chal rahee theen
shuruaat mein basava aur unake niyokta uddhav thaakare, baal thaakare ke bete ke beech shivasena aur unake bhavishy par cheejen achchhee chal rahee theen
uddhav thaakare baal thaakare ke bete shivasena aur unake bhavishy par mujhe nahin pata tha ki main aisa kar sakata hoon ya nahin
in dveepon ko unake utpaadon ke anusaar do vargon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai, damakudha yaanee kaudee ke gole ka diva kyonki vahaan ve naariyal ke taad kee shaakhaon se kaudee ke gole ikattha karate hain, jise ve samudr mein lagaate hain aur dhanabaar yaanee naariyal ke reshon se mudee huee doriyon ka diva aur jahaajon ke takhton ko ek saath bandhan ke lie istemaal kiya jaata hai, mujhe nahin pata ki main aisa kar sakata hoon
in dveepon ko unake utpaadon ke anusaar do vargon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai, damakudha yaanee kaudee ke gole ka diva kyonki vahaan ve naariyal ke taad kee shaakhaon se kaudee ke gole ikattha karate hain, jise ve samudr mein lagaate hain aur dhanabaar yaanee naariyal ke reshon se mudee huee doriyon ka diva aur jahaajon ke takhton ko aapas mein jodane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai
roy ke kaangres mein pravesh karane ke samay tak seepee ne mosko ke nirdeshon ke tahat kaangres ke virodh ko chhod diya tha aur isake bheetar kaam karana shuroo kar diya tha, isalie yah kaaphee sambhaavana hai ki ye taig kam se kam unamen se kuchh hain
yah vahee tha jo raamaling ne svayan ek mahaatma ya nipun sikhaaya tha, unhonne kaha tha ki saty ke mool se alag sabhee dharm samaan hain, unhonne is kor ko saty sanmaargam naam se alag kar diya, jisaka arth hai ki sachcha gyaan ya sachchee saarvabhaumik aatma us adhirachana se jo pratyek dharm is gathan par banaata hai. jab tak roy ne kaangres mein pravesh kiya tab tak dharm ka samagr svaroop aur prakrti mosko ke nirdeshon ke tahat see.pee. ne kaangres ke prati apane virodh ko chhod diya tha aur isake bheetar kaam karana shuroo kar diya tha.
yah vahee tha jo raamaling ne svayan ek mahaatma ya nipun sikhaaya tha, unhonne kaha tha ki saty ke mool se alag sabhee dharm samaan hain, unhonne is kor ko saty sanmaargam naam se alag kar diya, jisaka arth hai ki sachcha gyaan ya sachchee saarvabhaumik aatma us adhirachana se jo pratyek dharm is gathan par banaata hai. dharm ka kul svaroop aur svaroop is sambandh mein praakkalan samiti kee sthiti any do vitteey samitiyon se thodee bhinn hai
is sambandh mein praakkalan samiti kee sthiti any do vitteey samitiyon se thodee alag hai, is samay uddeshy bahut hee samarthak hai, lekin yuddh ke dauraan aur baad mein uttaree gathabandhan ke lie ek pramukh bhoomika dekhana chaahata hai.

bhaarateey sena seva ke sikhon ne yah daleel dekar british sainikon ka saamaan utaarane se inakaar kar diya ki ve kulee nahin the aur hadataal par chale gae javaaharalaal neharoo navambar se maee tak uttar pradesh mein paida hue the, ilaahaabaad
antyajon ke sambandh mein profesar majoomadaar likhate hain ki jis samay praarambhik smrtiyaan baneen us samay achhooton ko antyaj kaha jaata tha aur kahate hain ki unake upavibhaagon kee ganana mein kuchh srot bhinn-bhinn hain jo andamaan dveepon ke samooh mein doosaron ka ullekh karate hain, vyaapaarik gatividhiyon ka mukhy kendr port bleyar hai
ek akshauhim haathiyon ghodon aur purushon ke jeevit praaniyon kee kul sankhya athaarah akshauhim ke lie ek hee sankhya hai arthaat haathee ghode purush antyaj ke sambandh mein prophesar majoomadaar likhate hain ki jis samay praarambhik smrtiyon kee rachana kee gaee thee, us samay achhooton ko antyaj kaha jaata tha aur kahate hain ki unake upavibhaagon kee ganana mein kuchh srot doosaron ka ullekh karate hue bhinn hain
aur un logon ke lie jinamen aatm-sanyam kee spasht roop se kamee hai, lambe maheene ka upavaas anushaasan mein ek sabak tha aur un logon ke lie ichchha shakti ka abhyaas tha jinhonne raajaneeti mein vichaaradhaara ke ksharan par shok vyakt kiya hai jo ek utsaahajanak vikaas hoga
usane apane kaaraavaas ke ek ya do saptaah ke bheetar baaharee duniya ke saath sampark sthaapit kiya
yah bilkul spasht hai ki yah bachcha tarkaheen tha
"is tarah ke ek maamale mein ek bhaarateey kee sthiti kathin hai aur main pahale siddhaant par adaalat ko prastut karane ja raha hoon ki isaka sahee samaadhaan kya hai
isaka kaaran yah hai ki yah dharm ek eeshvar par aadhaarit nahin hai jo ki islaam dharm kee mool avadhaarana hai, unakee vikaas dar uchch aur sthir thee aur saath ke dashak mein thodee tej thee
isaka kaaran yah hai ki yah dharm kisee ek eeshvar par aadhaarit nahin hai jo ki islaam dharm kee mool avadhaarana hai
yah bhaarat mein kisee any ke vichaar mein nahin hai yadi ise akele jaane ke lie majaboor kiya jaata hai to yah utana hee niraashaajanak ho sakata hai jitana ki

yoo-tyoob ke is sadasy ke antargat aane vaale adhikaansh cheenee kshetr mein ""chainal prakaar"" naamak samooh mein bhaageedaar banane ka prastaav hai, jo aapako khaata seting par sain ap karane ke baad aapako bahut khaas banaata hai, phir aapako aseemit lambe veediyo kee peshakash kee jaatee hai lekin yah prastaav yah nahin hai ki us samay ke sadasy jo samooh ke paas jaate hain, jinake paas aseemit veediyo kharaad seting hotee hai, us samay unake paas aakaar mein mb seemit veediyo hota tha, ab ye khaate mbgb par seemit hote hain, ye is prakaar hain

kyonki agala jahaaj lambe samay tak aasapaas nahin tha sanvidhaan ke adhiniyam ke anusaar sansad mein raashtrapati aur do vidhaanasabhaen hongee jisamen raajyon kee vidhaanasabha ko raajy sabha vidhaanasabha kaha jaata hai aur logon kee sabha ko lokasabha vidhaanasabha kaha jaata hai

aur kya
jaisa ki sarvavidit hai ki krtrim garbhaadhaan pichhale varshon mein deyaree pashu prajanan mein vastutah maanak abhyaas ban gaya hai ya isalie unhonne spasht roop se janapath kee or se soniya ke nivaas sthaan aur jorj ke kaaryaalay agravaal ke sthaan par "nishchit" raajaneetik pratidvandviyon ko shaamil kiya tha aur abhee bhee shaamil hain seebeeaee ke ek maamale mein jahaan usane dillee ke ek jauharee ko jhootha phansaaya tha aur ab radd kie gae videshee mudra viniyaman adhiniyam ke tahat us par maamala darj kiya tha
jaisa ki sarvavidit hai ki krtrim garbhaadhaan pichhale kuchh varshon mein deyaree pashu prajanan mein vastutah maanak abhyaas ban gaya hai
upasabhaapati ke kaaryaalay ke chaaron or prachalit paripaatiyon aur paramparaon ke tahat yadi vah sansadeey samiti ka sadasy naamit ya niyukt kiya jaata hai to use usaka adhyaksh bhee niyukt kiya jaata hai puraan ka shaabdik arth puraana ya praacheen hai
eepee royappa banaam tamilanaadu elaarabee eyar esaseeaarabee raajy mein samaanata kee paaramparik avadhaarana ko chunautee dee gaee thee aur anuchchhed ke tahat samaanata ke adhikaar ke lie ek naya drshtikon pratipaadit kiya gaya tha jab nyaayamoorti chandrachood aur nyaayamoorti krshn ayar ne dekha ki samaanata kaee pahaluon aur aayaamon ke saath ek gatisheel avadhaarana hai aur upasabhaapati ke kaaryaalay ke aas-paas vikasit hone vaale sammelanon aur paramparaon ke tahat ise paaramparik aur siddhaantavaadee seemaon ke bheetar paalana aur seemit nahin kiya ja sakata hai yadi vah ek sansadeey samiti ka sadasy naamit ya niyukt kiya jaata hai to use isaka adhyaksh bhee niyukt kiya jaata hai.
eepee royappa banaam tamilanaadu elaarabee eyar esaseeaarabee raajy mein samaanata kee paaramparik avadhaarana ko chunautee dee gaee thee aur anuchchhed ke tahat samaanata ke adhikaar ke lie ek naya drshtikon pratipaadit kiya gaya tha jab nyaayamoorti chandrachood aur nyaayamoorti krshn ayar ne dekha ki samaanata kaee pahaluon aur aayaamon ke saath ek gatisheel avadhaarana hai aur yah paaramparik aur siddhaantavaadee seemaon ke bheetar paalana aur seemit nahin kiya ja sakata hai, bahut se bachchon ko vartanee kathin lagatee hai
bahut se bachchon ko vartanee kathin lagatee hai ek hee oordhvaadhar stambh mein paudhon ke beech antar spasht roop se jeenotaipik hote hain aur vibhinn oonchaee ke lie unake poorvajon ke anukoolan ke kaaran hote hain
ek hee oordhvaadhar stambh mein paudhon ke beech antar spasht roop se jeenotaipik hain aur unake poorvajon ke vibhinn oonchaee ke anukoolan ke kaaran hain lekin pramukh angon ke lie keval yahee log hain jinhen gambheer durghatanaon ka saamana karana pada hai lrb jyaadaatar sir kee choten rrb jo vaastav mein daata ban jaate hain
cholon kee yah mahaan rachana apane kuchh vivaranon mein shuroo huee aur abhee bhee adhooree hai, lagabhag bees varshon ke bheetar ek aur shaanadaar chol sanrachana, jise brhadeeshvar bhee kaha jaata hai, lagabhag usee yojana aur dijain par raajendr pratham chol elaarabee aaraarabee da gret san dvaara nirmit kiya gaya tha. aur raajaraaja ke yogy uttaraadhikaaree lekin pramukh angon ke lie keval vahee log hain jinhen gambheer durghatanaon ka saamana karana pada hai lrb jyaadaatar sir kee choten rrb jo vaastav mein daata banate hain
cholon kee yah mahaan rachana apane kuchh vivaranon mein shuroo huee aur abhee bhee adhooree hai, lagabhag bees varshon ke bheetar ek aur shaanadaar chol sanrachana, jise brhadeeshvar bhee kaha jaata hai, lagabhag usee yojana aur dijain par raajendr pratham chol elaarabee aaraarabee da gret san dvaara nirmit kiya gaya tha. aur raajaraaja ke yogy uttaraadhikaaree samasya tab ban jaatee hai
jahaan tak ​​bhaarat mein paudhon aur jeevit praaniyon ka sambandh hai, ham ek vishesh sthiti mein hain aur yah ajeebogareeb sthiti kaaphee had tak kuchh ya adhik varshon pahale yahaan angrejon ke aane ke kaaran hai.

aur yah vaastav mein ek khaalee soda kain ko kuchal sakata hai
kabeer raama ko ek alag chehara dena chaahate hain jaise-jaise aap bade hote jaate hain aapako svaad mein kamee ka anubhav ho sakata hai isalie apanee bhookh ko badhaane ke lie namak aaraarabee ke bajaay kuchh jadee-bootiyon aur masaalon ka upayog karen lrb
jaise-jaise aap bade hote jaate hain aapako svaad mein kamee mahasoos ho sakatee hai isalie apanee bhookh ko badhaane ke lie namak aaraarabee ke bajaay kuchh jadee-bootiyon aur masaalon ka upayog karen.
aur phir mainne vaastav mein kathin savaal kiya ki parivaar kee havelee ke ek kamare mein ek puraanee aur chhodee huee paalakee padee huee thee, jo usakee daadee kee thee aur jisamen bachche rabee ne dopahar mein sharan lee thee jab usaka prabhaaree naukar tha apane bhojan aur vishraam ke lie sevaanivrtt
aur phir mainne vaastav mein kathin prashn rakha yah sthiti guda maithun ke samaan nahin hai is sthiti mein purush apana ling mahila kee yoni mein peechhe se daalata hai is sthiti mein mahila ka chehara purush ke chehare se door hota hai aur mahila apane pet ke bal let jaatee hai is sthiti mein vah apane pairon ko phailaatee hai aisa karane se yoni spasht roop se khul jaatee hai is beech purush apanee yoni mein ling daalata hai is sthiti mein purush kee baaharee deevaaron ko dhakka dene par sir milata hai aur is kaaran jee spot ka aanand le sakate hain paramaanand mein seks yah pojeeshan gaharee paith aur lambe strok ko saksham banaatee hai, yahee kaaran hai ki garbhavatee mahilaon ke lie isakee siphaarish nahin kee jaatee hai. mahila taangon ko paas karake let jaatee hai isase jee seks ka bharapoor aanand milata hai is pojeeshan mein ekamaatr kamee yah hai ki yah aankhon ke sampark kee anumati nahin detee hai ya chumban karane kee koee gunjaish nahin detee hai
yah sthiti guda maithun ke samaan nahin hai is sthiti mein purush apana ling mahila kee yoni mein peechhe se daalata hai is sthiti mein mahila ka chehara purush ke chehare se door hota hai aur mahila apane pet ke bal let jaatee hai is sthiti mein vah apane pairon ko phailaatee hai aisa karane se yoni spasht roop se khul jaatee hai, is beech purush apanee yoni mein ling ko is sthiti mein daalata hai, is sthiti mein purush kee baaharee deevaaron ko dhakka milata hai aur is kaaran se jee spot seks ka aanand le sakate hain. aur lambe samay tak strok, yahee kaaran hai ki garbhavatee mahilaon ke lie isakee siphaarish nahin kee jaatee hai, is sthiti ko do bhaagon mein vibhaajit kiya ja sakata hai jisamen pahala jisamen mahila let jaatee hai aur apane pairon ko phailaatee hai jisase ek gaharee paith ho jaatee hai aur doosaree jisamen mahila pairon ko paas karake let jaatee hai yah jee seks ka bharapoor aanand lene mein madad karata hai, is sthiti mein ekamaatr dosh yah hai ki yah aankhon se sampark karane kee anumati nahin deta hai ya chumban karane kee koee gunjaish nahin deta hai

balki aap se behatar vayask rahe hain

yah ek svasth abhyaas nahin hai, haalaanki ek praarambhik tvarit vajan ghataane dekha ja sakata hai, lekin saamaany jeevan paddhati aur niyamit aahaar ko phir se shuroo karane par hamesha praarambhik shiksha kaksha tak hotee hai lekin ghar par sanskrt angrejee paalee bhaashaon ka adhyayan kiya jaata tha
pahala yah ki ham yahaan jo varnan kar rahe hain vah bhaarat mein angrejon ya yooropeey logon ka saanskrtik jeevan nahin hai, balki un angrejee ya pashchimee bhaarateeyon ka hai jinhonne unakee nakal karane kee koshish kee aur doosaree baat yah ki yah vivaran un sabhee shikshit bhaarateeyon par laagoo nahin hota jinhen isaka laabh mila tha. pashchimee shiksha ke roop mein isamen kaee achchhe aur mahaan purush shaamil the jinhonne desh kee raajaneetik mukti aur saanskrtik utthaan mein agranee bhoomika nibhaee, yah ek svasth abhyaas nahin hai, haalaanki ek praarambhik tvarit vajan ghataane ko dekha ja sakata hai lekin saamaany jeevan paddhati aur niyamit aahaar kee bahaalee par hamesha ek palataav
lrb d rrb vitt vidheyak agale varsh ke lie sarakaar ke sabhee vitteey prastaavon ko ek vidheyak mein shaamil kiya jaata hai, jise vitt vidheyak ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, jise aam taur par har saal bajat pesh karane ke turant baad lokasabha mein pesh kiya jaata hai, jo ki ham yahaan bata rahe hain bhaarat mein angrejon ya yooropeey logon ka saanskrtik jeevan nahin balki un angrejee ya pashchimee bhaarateeyon ka saanskrtik jeevan jinhonne unakee nakal karane kee koshish kee aur doosaree baat yah ki yah varnan un sabhee shikshit bhaarateeyon par laagoo nahin hota jinhen pashchimee shiksha ka laabh mila kyonki isamen kaee achchhe aur achchhe shaamil the. mahaan purush jinhonne desh kee raajaneetik mukti aur saanskrtik utthaan mein agranee bhoomika nibhaee
vojame onalain hindee tekst too speech oph vojame jeern roop mein rog lambee avadhi ka hai aur teen se chaar saal tak rah sakata hai
vojame onalain hindee tekst too speech oph vojame taaliyaan
taaliyaan bajaakar pahale unhonne mishanariyon ko bheja aur phir doktar aae aur usake baad sainikon ne aakraman kiya
pahale unhonne mishanariyon ko bheja aur phir doktar aae aur usake baad sainikon ne aakraman kiya, chhaatron mein se ek ne kaha "vaastav mein"
ya log niraash nahin the chhaatron mein se ek ne kaha "vaastav mein"
ya log niraash nahin the unhonne angrejee mein shree jee muthusvaamee chettee jaj oph da smol koz kort madraas aur vais president of da madraas thiyosophikal sosaitee dvaara abhipushti karake samaaj ko ek bayaan diya
yah ek shaikshik abhiyaan tha jise unhonne angrejee mein samaaj ke lie ek bayaan diya tha jisakee pushti shree jee muthusvaamee chettee ne kee thee, jo chhote maamale ke nyaayaalay madraas ke nyaayaadheesh aur madraas thiyosophikal sosaayatee ke upaadhyaksh the.
muslim tushtikaran ham kamajoriyon ko sunn karate hain
ham bhedyata ko sunn karate hain, aisa lagata hai ki yooenapee ne bhaarateey dalon dvaara dal-badal ko rokane ke lie apanaee gaee prati-rananeetiyon ka bhee baareekee se adhyayan kiya hai
aisa lagata hai ki sanyukt raashtr sangh ne dal-badal ko rokane ke lie bhaarateey dalon dvaara apanaee gaee prati-rananeetiyon ka bhee baareekee se adhyayan kiya hai
vah bhoomigat ho jaatee hai aur apane svayan ke laar ke ek vishesh sraav ke saath unhen khilaakar apane bachchon ke pahale bachchon kee dekhabhaal karana shuroo kar detee hai, haalaanki kuchh aise bhaav hain jo ek dharm kee dhaaranaon ke anusaar aakraamak hain, jabaki ve doosare dharm ke anusaar sveekaary hain jo alag-alag hain. arabee hibroo aur sinaak mein bhagavaan ek bhaasha mein paarit ho sakate hain, jabaki unhen doosare dvaara asveekaar kar diya jaata hai
haalaanki kuchh aise bhaav hain jo ek dharm kee dhaaranaon ke anusaar aapattijanak hain, jabaki ve doosare ke anusaar sveekaary hain, jo arabee hibroo aur sinaak mein eeshvar ko maanane ka antar ek bhaasha mein paarit ho sakata hai, jabaki ve doosare dvaara asveekaar kar die jaate hain.
to kya aaeedee sankshep mein kya karana pasand karate hain yadi aavedan jama karane ke samay paasaport upalabdh nahin hain
logon ke badala lene kee adhik sambhaavana thee yadi aavedan jama karane ke samay paasaport upalabdh nahin the to kya hoga
unake poore pravaas ke dauraan logon dvaara badala lene kee adhik sambhaavana thee, unhonne gaanv kee shiksha aur vikaas ke lie kaam kiya
apane poore pravaas ke dauraan unhonne gaanv kee shiksha aur vikaas ke lie kaam kiya, maut kee saja ko aam taur par mrtyudand ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, haalaanki uchch nyaayaalay dvaara isakee pushti kee jaanee chaahie, isase pahale ki ise laagoo kiya ja sake.
maut kee saja, jise aamataur par maut kee saja ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, ko uchch nyaayaalay dvaara pushti kee jaanee chaahie, isase pahale ki ise shreneebaddh kiya ja sake
