ek amerikee dolar kee keemat lagabhag paakistaanee rupaye varsh hai, us shaam stet teevee ne muskaraate hue litte supreemo velupillee prabhaakaran ko ek agyaat sthaan par samajhaute par hastaakshar karate hue dikhaaya.
any sabhee pustakon ko smrti kaha jaata hai, ek amerikee dolar kee keemat lagabhag paakistaanee rupaye varsh hai
any sabhee pustakon ko smrti kaha jaata hai
pramukh takaneekon mein se ek jo vaastav mein mahatvapoorn hai
haalaanki unaka naamamaatr ka kabza tab samaapt ho gaya jab yuddh ke samaapan par in dveepon ko garmee ke mausam mein hugalee nadee kee nirantarata banaane ke lie farakha baandh se hugalee nadee tak ganga nadee ke paanee kee badee maatra ko vaapas karane ke lie vaapas kar diya gaya.
sabase pahale main aapako ek tark dena chaahata hoon ki yah soochee pooree kyon hai, haalaanki yuddh ke samaapan par in dveepon ko daaenon ko lauta die jaane par unaka naamamaatr ka kabja samaapt ho gaya.
na to poonjeevaad ne aur na hee saamyavaad ne sankat se nikalane ka raasta dikhaaya sabase pahale main aapako tark dena chaahata hoon ki vah soochee pooree kyon hai
hindee mein pahala lekhan kaun sa hai, is par bahas hotee hai lekin adhikaansh lekhak is baat se sahamat hain ki devakeenandan khatree ka upanyaas chandrakaanta ek hindee kavita ka pahala pramaan hai, na to poonjeevaad aur na hee saamyavaad ne sankat se baahar nikalane ka raasta dikhaaya
hindee mein pahala lekhan kaun sa hai is par bahas huee hai lekin adhikaansh lekhak is baat se sahamat hain ki devakeenandan khatree ka upanyaas chandrakaanta hindee kavita ka pahala pramaan hai
har saal kaee laakhon teerthayaatree mandiroaammen aate hain lekin sachchaee yah hai ki bhaarateey in atikramanakaariyon ko nahin dekhate hain aur pooree eemaanadaaree ke saath inakaar bhee kar sakate hain ki ve pradooshan ke bhaarateey bhay se utpann ek saamoohik andhaapan hain aur parinaamee vishvaas hai ki bhaarateey sabase svachchh log hain is duniya mein "
unake paas riport karane ke lie har saal kaee laakh teerthayaatree mandiroaammen aate hain
ve sabhee ghane jangalon ke vishisht nivaasee hain, vishesh roop se aardr ushnakatibandheey van, donon shaktiyaan ek-doosare ke adheen nahin hain, sanvidhaan dvaara utpann aur niyantrit hain, donon ke paas apane vibhaag mein poorn shakti hai
ve sabhee ghane jangalon ke vishisht nivaasee hain, vishesh roop se nam ushnakatibandheey jangalon ke, to kya aap abhee bhee jaaree nahin rakhana chaahate hain?
to kya aap abhee bhee jaaree nahin rakhana chaahate hain" otomobail ke nikaas kisee bhee tarah se audyogik dhuen se kam khataranaak nahin hain
lekin pooree baat yah hai ki bhaarat mein otomobail ka nikaas kisee bhee tarah se audyogik dhuen se kam khataranaak nahin hai
lekin pooree baat yah hai ki bhaarat
haanikaarak keedon dvaara phasal kee kshati kee samasya is prakaar hamaare desh mein jatil hai, yah kyon mahatvapoorn hai ki ham unhen sangrah ke ek set ke roop mein yahaan rakhen
yah kyon mahatvapoorn hai ki ham unhen yahaan sangrah ke ek set ke roop mein rakhate hain, chaaloo vitteey yojana ke pahale chhah maheenon mein vyay mein pratishat kee tulana mein pratishat kee vrddhi huee hai
taartar elaarabee ko kailakulas aaraarabee phorm bhee kaha jaata hai, jab vartamaan vitteey yojana vyay ke pahale chhah maheenon mein niyamit brashing aur phlosing dvaara pattika mein jama khanijon ko hataaya nahin jaata hai, pratishat kee tulana mein pratishat mein vrddhi huee hai.
taitaar elaarabee ko kailakulas aaraarabee phorm bhee kaha jaata hai jab khanij plaak mein jama ho jaate hain jo niyamit brashing aur phlosing dvaara hataaya nahin jaata hai.
mukadama joon mein apane antim charan mein pahunch gaya jab taaj ke lie vishesh abhiyojak shree em el kemp ne lagabhag do maheene tak chalane vaala ek lamba samaapan bayaan diya, bhaarateey pulis ko soochit kiya gaya aur unhonne poore desh mein usakee talaash shuroo kar dee.
chunaav aayog ke kaamakaaj ka pareekshan joon ko apane antim charan mein pahunch gaya jab mukut ke lie vishesh abhiyojak shree em el kemp ne lagabhag do maheene tak chalane vaala ek lamba samaapan bayaan diya.
mukhy sansthaan
akabar apane sainikon ko aadesh deta tha ki mahilaon ko nagn roop mein ek sangathit roop mein pesh kiya jae jise akabar ne khushee ke tyohaar khudaroj ka naam diya tha.
unhen apanee jaati par garv tha aur is tarah any samudaayon ko hey drshti se dekhate hue unhonne khud ko samaaj ka sevak, chaukeedaar aur saphaeekarmee kaha
aur jab mainne padhaana shuroo kiya
hansee
islaam mein isaka arth nimnalikhit ghoshana mein hai ki bhaarateey philm stoodiyo boleevud bhee mumbee mein hee maujood hai
taata ne jamashedapur naamak ek poore shahar ka nirmaan kiya aur islaam mein post pablik sektar ke ekeekrt taunaship ke lie ek modal banaaya, isaka arth nimnalikhit ghoshana mein hai
taata ne jamashedapur naamak ek poore shahar ka nirmaan kiya aur saarvajanik kshetr ke baad kee ekeekrt taunaship ke lie ek modal banaaya
kamyuniston ne akhil bhaarateey tred yooniyan kaangres ko vibhaajit kar diya tha aur baad mein yooniyanon ko vibhaajit karane aur red yooniyan banaane kee apanee rananeeti ke maadhyam se ise aprabhaavee bana diya tha.
saur vaastukala kamyuniston ne akhil bhaarateey tred yooniyan kaangres ko vibhaajit kar diya tha aur baad mein yooniyanon ko vibhaajit karane aur red yooniyan banaane kee apanee rananeeti ke maadhyam se ise aprabhaavee bana diya tha.
ye atyadhik vrddhi baad mein okseejan saur vaastukala kee maang mein parinaamee vrddhi ke saath durgandh paida karane ke lie sad jaatee hai
ye atyadhik vrddhi baad mein durgandh paida karane ke lie sad jaatee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop okseejan mahaasaagar kee maang mein vrddhi hotee hai jo prthvee ke taapamaan ko kam karatee hai yah ek asthaayee prakriya hai aur enthropogainin vaarming ke prabhaav ko kam karegee yah bhavishyavaanee mahaasaagaron ke taapamaan ke aadhaar par kee jaatee hai
mahaasaagar jo prthvee ke taapamaan ko kam karata hai yah ek asthaayee prakriya hai aur enthropogainin ke garm hone ke prabhaav ko kam karega yah bhavishyavaanee mahaasaagaron ke taapamaan ke aadhaar par kee jaatee hai
aur utana hee moolyavaan jitana los altos mein hai
stampd samaan hai sivaay isake ki yah viketakeepar dvaara tab kiya jaata hai jab ballebaaj gend ko mis kar deta hai aur apane maidaan se baahar nikal jaata hai yadi viketakeepar ne stamp ko tod diya hai jisase log alag ho gae hain
jaisalamer stampd samaan hai sivaay isake ki yah viketakeepar dvaara tab kiya jaata hai jab ballebaaz gend ko mis kar deta hai aur apane maidaan se baahar nikal jaata hai yadi viketakeepar ne stamp tod diya ho
jaisalamer
sarakaar ke bheetar se bhee virodh jaaree hai, haalaanki zoradaar hai aur aphavaah yah hai ki agar koee bikree hotee hai to aam taur par ise pradhaan mantree ka vyaktigat samarthan praapt hota hai, yahaan unhonne ise shuroo karane mein kya likha hai
sarakaar ke bheetar se bhee virodh jaaree hai, haalaanki zoradaar hai aur aphavaah yah hai ki agar koee bikree hotee hai to aam taur par isalie hotee hai kyonki isamen pradhaan mantree ka vyaktigat samarthan hota hai, in jaanavaron mein bahut anukoolata hotee hai aur ve apane aavaas ke baahar achchhee tarah se kaam karate hain.
ya kya vah mathaare se kuchh bhee yaad karegee, in jaanavaron mein bahut anukoolata hai aur ve apane aavaas ke baahar achchha pradarshan karate hain
vaastav mein adhik teleephon vaala desh aur duniya ke uttaree chhor par rahane vaalee narabhakshee aatmaen
vaastav mein jis desh mein adhik teleephon hain, jis tarah hindoo dharm mein manu ke bachche maanav kahalaate hain usee tarah islaam mein aadam ke bachche aadam ya amaamee ke roop mein jaane jaate hain
aaj main isaka upayog hindoo dharm mein maanav ke bachchon ko maanav ke roop mein usee tarah se banaane ke lie kar raha hoon jaise islaam mein aadam ke bachchon ko aadam ya amaamee ke roop mein jaana jaata hai
aur mera matalab dijital takaneek se nahin hai, aaj main ise banaane ke lie upayog kar raha hoon
aur mera matalab dijital takaneek se nahin hai
jo bhee ho, tathy yah hai ki kaangres kee neeti shaantipoorn hai aur yadi ham isaka paalan karate hain to hamen ise pooree tarah se aur pooree eemaanadaaree se karana chaahie.
jisake paas kshamata ka sanyojan hai

dhan aur shakti ke beech madhyasthata karana jaisa ki ek baar kiya karata tha
jab gendabaaj dvaara kee gaee apeel ko asveekaar kar diya jaata hai to vah kabhee-kabhee virodh mein apane haath oopar phenk deta hai, viketakeepar apanee topee neeche phenk deta hai, any kriketar haavabhaav karate hain aur unamen se kuchh ampaayar ke paas yah poochhane ke lie daudate hain ki ballebaaj ko notaut kaise diya gaya, isaka mukhy parvateey drshy kailiforniya mein hai. amerika
isaka mukhy parvateey drshy kailiphorniya amerika mein hain, apanee riport mein sabhee sarakaaron dvaara daba diya gaya hai aur ab bhaarat ke kabje mein hai, paakistaan ke tatkaaleen mukhy nyaayaadheesh hamudur rahamaan kee adhyakshata vaale aayog ne vyaapak atyaachaar, paakistaanee janaralon dvaara satta ke any durupayog aur asainy maamalon mein pooree tarah se viphalata ka phaisala kiya. aur maarshal lo netrtv poorvee paakistaan ke nukasaan ke lie jimmedaar hai
pankh dheere-dheere vikasit hote hain aur vayask avastha mein pahunchane se pahale do ya teen maul par stamp ke roop mein spasht ho jaate hain, isakee riport mein sabhee sarakaaron dvaara daba diya gaya tha aur ab indiya tude ke kabje mein paakistaan ke tatkaaleen mukhy nyaayaadheesh hamoodur rahamaan kee adhyakshata vaale aayog ne any vyaapak atyaachaaron ko anjaam diya. paakistaanee janaralon dvaara shakti ka durupayog aur poorvee paakistaan ke nukasaan ke lie jimmedaar naagarik aur maarshal lo netrtv mein poorn viphalata
pankh dheere-dheere vikasit hote hain aur vayask charan tak pahunchane se pahale do ya teen nirmochan par stamp ke roop mein spasht ho jaate hain jahaan chooha ya vyakti apane vaataavaran ke bheetar hota hai

bhavishy ke baare mein hai
dabalaphleksd kapota patala aur suruchipoorn hai jo isake neeche kee taraph ribd saporting phremavark dikha raha hai, vah sent pols ka pramukh tha aur kings kolej kaimbrij mein chhaatravrtti jeeta tha.
vah sent pol ke pramukh the aur kings kolej kaimbrij mein chhaatravrtti praapt kee thee, yah laahaul mein janavaree ke maheene mein manaaya jaata hai kyonki aktoobar aur navambar ke maheene kataee ka samay hote hain aur isalie unake lie bahut vyast avadhi hotee hai. kisaanon
kuchh saptaah baad yah janavaree ke maheene mein laahaul mein manaaya jaata hai kyonki aktoobar aur navambar ke maheene kataee ka samay hote hain aur isalie kisaanon ke lie bahut vyast avadhi hotee hai.
kuchh saptaah baad
tab tak chalata raha jab tak ki ek naya rabbee nahin aaya rabbee hamesha anaakarshak aur asrjanaatmak sangathanon kee cheejon ko kharaab karate hain
jhelam, chinaab, ravi, sataluj aur byaas, bhaarat se nikalane vaalee paanch nadiyaan yahaan se bahatee hain aur jab ve maidaanon ko chhootee hain, to ek bahut hee upajaoo bhoomi banaatee hain, jise panjaab udiya mahaabhaarat bhaag googlai pustak ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
jhelam, chinaab, ravi, sataluj aur byaas bhaarat se nikalane vaalee paanch nadiyaan yahaan se bahatee hain aur jab ve maidaanon ko chhootee hain to ek bahut upajaoo bhoomi banaatee hain jise panjaab ke naam se jaana jaata hai, patnee maans aur sharaab letee hai

hansee
ek samaan rokakat gupha utkhanan jise ab krshna ke dakshin tat par undaavallee mein anantasayanagudee kaha jaata hai, bhee isee varg se sambandhit hai, antim nirnay lene se pahale chhaatr aapakee ichchhaon par saavadhaanee se vichaar karenge, lekin yadi koee upayukt raajakeey vidyaalay hai to adhyayanakarta ka koee kaanoonee kartavy nahin hai apane bachche ke lie ek gair-rakharakhaav vaale ya svatantr skool mein saarvajanik dhan kharch karen
isee prakaar kee rokakat gupha utkhanan jise ab krshna nadee ke dakshinee tat par undaavallee mein anantasayaanagudee kaha jaata hai, bhee isee varg se sambandhit hai.
bhaarat mein khaan-paan kee samrddh parampara rahee hai aur isase kabhee bhee gareebee kee samasya ka samaadhaan nahin hone vaala
kuchh saahityik udaaharanon mein yajh aur veena shabdon ka prayog samaan roop se kiya jaata hai aur usee sandarbh mein upayog kiya jaata hai, bhaarat mein khaane-peene kee samrddh parampara hai
kuchh saahityik udaaharanon mein yazh aur veena shabdon ka prayog sanyog ke roop mein kiya gaya hai aur ek hee sandarbh mein upayog kiya jaata hai
vayask keet aam taur par apana bhojan khojane aur saamaany raashtr deshon ke khataron se bachane ke lie ek sthaan se doosare sthaan par jaane mein saksham hota hai
vayask keet aamataur par ek sthaan se doosare sthaan par jaane mein saksham hota hai, apana bhojan dhoondhata hai aur khataron se bachata hai, paanchaveen yojana avadhi ke madhy mein koyale kee maang ek baar phir sust ho gaee.
enajaina ka upachaar bhee ek chikitsak ke maargadarshan mein hona chaahie aur paanchaveen yojana avadhi ke madhy ke dauraan ek baar phir koyale kee sustee ke lie nimn maang shaamil hai
shaahee andaaj mein banaee gaee kaalee aur garud kee aakrtiyaan daravaaje ke oopar maujood hain jaahir hai ki kampanee ke paas maarketing ka ek chunauteepoorn kaam hai
shaahee andaaj mein banee kaalee aur garud kee aakrtiyaan daravaaje ke oopar maujood hain, hamen us prashn ka uttar dene ke lie lipi ko samajhane kee jaroorat hai
hamen is prashn ka uttar dene ke lie skript ko samajhane kee aavashyakata hai ki vartamaan khatara paryaavaran mein pradooshan se hai jo ki yamuna nadee ke tat par bhee esidaren se hai jo mathura tel shodhak kaarakhaane se nikalane vaale dhuen ke kaaran hai
vartamaan khatara paryaavaran mein pradooshan se hai jo yamuna nadee ke tat par bhee esidaren se hai jo mathura tel shodhak kaarakhaane se nikalane vaale dhuen ke kaaran hai

vibhaajy nahin hai

badhate bachche ko muskuraane aur khaane ke lie aur unhen aatmavishvaas dene ke lie daanton kee jaroorat hotee hai
ek aur badalaav jo dheere-dheere udyog mein aaya, vah maheen ginatee ke paksh mein bunaee mein badalaav ke roop mein tha, hamen vaishvik samudaay kee madad kee aavashyakata hai taaki aphagaanistaan ko mukt karane mein lagane vaala samay bahut kam ho ” lrb dekhen saakshaatkaar rrb

raajaguru bhagat sinh ke saath milakar 1 julaee ko laahaur mein angrejee sahaayak pulis aayukt jepee saandars kee hatya kar dee do. kalaam nabbe pratishat bahumat se bhaarat ke raashtrapati chune gae aur unhonne 1 julaee ko apana pad grahan kiya.
raajaguru bhagat sinh ke saath kaaphee kam vajan vaale madhumeh rogiyon ne laahaur mein angrejee sahaayak pulis aayukt jepee saandars ko maar daala
kya in sabaka matalab yah hai ki bainkon mein ab keval kuchh varishth adhikaaree hee kaam karenge aur suparakampyootar ullaas trel phestival ke krshak samudaay ke lie apanee samrddhi ka jashn manaate hain

khud ka kairikechar khelane ke lie
is kaary mein unhonne na keval paartee se sabhee bhrashtaachaar aur kamajoriyon ko berahamee se hataane ke lie kaha balki kisaan aur tred yooniyan aandolan mein sabhee saamraajyavaad virodhee sangathanon ke saath ghanishth sahayog bhee maanga.
hindee kampyootar par aur yah ise thand se theek oopar tak thanda kar dega
aur yah ise jamane ke theek oopar thanda kar dega
bhaarat ke pramukh niryaat krshi utpaad, chaay, kapade, aabhooshan, heere, sophtaveyar sevaen, injeeniyaring utpaad, rasaayan aur chamada, pramukh aayaat kachche tel kee masheenaree, heere, urvarak aur rasaayan hain, vah apanee betee heeraakha baee kee akabar se shaadee karane ke lie sahamat hue.
bhaarat ke pramukh niryaat krshi utpaad, chaay, kapade, aabhooshan, heere, sophtaveyar sevaen, injeeniyaring utpaad, rasaayan aur chamada hain, pramukh aayaat kachche tel kee masheenaree, heere, urvarak aur rasaayan hain aur unhonne mainachestar ko vaapas taar likhe
aur unhonne mainachestar ko vaapas teleegraam likha, unhen adhimaanatah bhor ke turant baad aur sooryaast ke samay snaan ke lie paanee mein le jaana chaahie
barma ko bhaarat se alag karane ka matalab tha ki ek saal mein ek laakh tan petroliyam ka nukasaan hua aur kuchh tan kachche utpaadan ke saath bhaarat chhod diya gaya, unhen adhimaanatah bhor ke turant baad aur sooryaast ke samay nahaane ke lie paanee mein le jaana chaahie.
aatankavaad virodhee upaayon kee prabhaavasheelata ke kaaran logon ne sair ka aayojan karana shuroo kar diya
aur milar ne jo kiya vah yah tha ki usake parivaar aur doston ne ek post likhee, logon ne sair ka aayojan shuroo kiya
aur milar ne kya kiya ki usake parivaar aur doston ne ek post likhee
aur isane vyaapaar kee sharten bana dee keematon ka elaarabee anupaat jo kisaan khareedate hain usake lie bhugataan karate hain aur ve jo bechate hain usake lie unhen jo keemat milatee hai aaraarabee krshi ke lie anukool hai ki chhavi vaastav mein kaise banaee gaee thee
aur isane vyaapaar kee sharton ko keematon ka lrb anupaat bana diya jo kisaan khareedate hain usake lie bhugataan karate hain aur ve jo bechate hain usake lie unhen milane vaalee keematen krshi ke lie anukool hotee hain
vistaar vishesh roop se varshon ke beech chihnit kiya gaya tha aur sanyantr mein aag ne bhaaree maatra mein vikiran ko vaataavaran mein jaaree karane kee anumati dee thee
sanyantr mein lagee aag ne bhaaree maatra mein vikiran ko brahmaand ke vaataavaran mein chhod diya
shisar maanav jaivik ootak ke teen stambhon se milane ke lie bana hai bruhat mumbee nagarapaalika kee aadhikaarik vebasait
brhat mumbee nagar paalika kee aadhikaarik vebasait unhonne shiping aur udyog ke british ekaadhikaar ko todane ka prayaas kiya aur is prakriya mein khud ko lagabhag aarthik roop se barbaad kar liya.
unhonne shiping aur udyog ke british ekaadhikaar ko todane ka prayaas kiya aur is prakriya mein khud ko vitteey roop se lagabhag barbaad kar liya, ise praapt karane ka sabase achchha tareeka hai ki ham punarutthaanavaad kee apanee dhaaranaon ko chhod den aur hamaaree saamaany hindustaanee sanskrti ko raashtreey sanskrti nirmaan kee neenv bana den. is par svatantr roop se vibhinn kshetron ke graameen aur shaharee sanskrtiyon aur pashchimee sanskrti se udhaar lete hain
ise praapt karane ka sabase achchha tareeka punarutthaanavaad kee apanee dhaaranaon ko tyaagana hai aur hamaaree aam hindustaanee sanskrti se jo kuchh bacha hai, use raashtreey sanskrti kee neenv banaana hai, jo vibhinn kshetron ke graameen aur shaharee sanskrtiyon aur pashchimee sanskrti sampaadak se svatantr roop se udhaar leta hai.
sampaadak
yah vishvaas karana hai ki paryaapt the riport bhagodon se nipatane ke lie ek prabhaavee pranaalee ke tatvon ko nirdhaarit karatee hai
samooh saahity riport ghar se bhaage logon se nipatane ke lie ek prabhaavee pranaalee ke tatvon ko nirdhaarit karatee hai
aur yah modal samooh saahity
aur yah modal raajadroh ka saadhaaran maamala nahin hai yadi yah raajadroh ka ek saadhaaran maamala hota to abhiyojan paksh khud ko raajadroh ke kaanoon kee seema ke bheetar sakhtee se rakhata aur teen dinon ke bheetar maamale ko samaapt kar deta
yah raajadroh ka saadhaaran maamala nahin hai yadi yah raajadroh ka saadhaaran maamala hota to abhiyojan paksh khud ko raajadroh ke kaanoon kee seema ke bheetar sakhtee se rakhata aur teen dinon ke bheetar maamale ko samaapt kar deta in dhaaraon ke tahat shikaayat keval us manjooree ke aadhaar ”
shaayad aise aur bhee raajy hain jahaan ham in dhaaraon ke tahat shikaayat nahin kar sakate hain, keval us manjooree ke aadhaar par kee ja sakatee hain ”
pratyek richaarj par sent se kam par richaarj kiya jaata hai, ab mujhe pata hai ki yah haasyaaspad lagata hai
ab mujhe pata hai ki yah haasyaaspad lagata hai aur aapako saabit karata hai ki asambhav prateet hota hai sambhav hai
aur aapako saabit kar denge ki naamumakin jaisa lagata hai mumakin hai
speshal ejukeshanal needs tribyoonal kshamal pheed
bombe mumbee bhaarat ka sabase bada shahar kshamal pheed hai
yah makabara mumataaz ke makabare se bada hai, haalaanki yah darshaata hai ki ek vyaapak aadhaar jis par ek bada makabara banaaya gaya tha aur ise sulekh mein ankit kiya gaya tha jisase usakee pahachaan huee, yah spasht kiya jaana chaahie ki un dinon arabon ko apanee bhaasha par bahut garv tha jise ve bula rahe the daph ke roop mein duniya ke any bhaagon
sarakaar dvaara netaajee se sambandhit dastaavejon ka prachaar kiya jae, is baadh ke parinaamasvaroop sthaaneey maraathee logon ko apanee sanskrti, kaary aur bhaasha khone kee chinta thee
sthaaneey maraathee log is baadh ke parinaamasvaroop apanee sanskrti, kaary aur bhaasha khone ke baare mein chintit the
sarakaaree sahaayata jo ki vichaaraadheen thee, udyamasheel hone kee kam umr mein is vichaar ko apanaane ke lie aavashyakataon ke keval ek hisse ko poora kar sakatee thee
shaayad jeev vigyaan manovigyaan aur isee tarah ke vigyaanon mein nae vikaas aur jeev vigyaan aur bhautikee kee vyaakhya manushy ko pichhale itihaas kee tulana mein khud ko samajhane aur niyantrit karane mein madad kar sakatee hai.
lekin durbhaagy se bhaarat ka tel utpaadan seemit tha aur bhandaar ka pata nahin lagaaya gaya tha

unhonne kiradaar nibhaana jaaree rakha jo ek abhineta ke roop mein unakee profail ke saath samaan hain isake alaava darshakon ne aakaankshaen khaakee aur blaik jaisee philmon mein unake kaam kee saraahana kee. pahale nikal haidraid ek mobail phon kee baitaree ka mool ghatak tha kyonki yah halka aur sahee aakaar ka hota hai choonki ve halke hote hain aur nikal haidraid baitaree ke vipareet voltej mein kamee ka kaaran nahin banate hain, kaee mobail phon nirmaataon ne lithiyam aayan baitaree ke mukaabale lithiyam baahulak baitaree ka upayog unake halke vajan aur vibhinn aakaaron mein aakaar dene kee unakee kshamata ko dekhate hue shuroo kar diya hai. phon nirmaata solar sel ya mobail phon ke lie vaikalpik oorja srot jaise vikalpon par bhee vichaar kar rahe hain

hamen shiksha ke anivaary roop se ek audyogik modal se jaana hoga, is maang ka virodh is daleel par kiya gaya tha ki paartee ke mahatvapoorn sadasy un mahatvapoorn dinon mein apane sambandhit padon ko nahin chhod sakate the.
is maang ka virodh is tark par kiya gaya tha ki paartee ke mahatvapoorn sadasy un mahatvapoorn dinon mein apane-apane padon ko nahin chhod sakate the, yah ganatantr bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke aadhaar par shaasit hai.

agni puraan jin vishayon par mantriyon ko bayaan dene ke lie bulaaya gaya hai, unamen bhaarat kee seema ke kisee bhee hisse mein gadabadee, rel durghatanaen, saarvajanik upakramon ko band karane jaise maamale shaamil hain, kaanoon adaalaton dvaara nirnay jisamen kendr sarakaar ke mantraalayon ya adhikaariyon ko prabhaavit karane vaalee tippaniyaan shaamil theen dushman ke vimaanon dvaara havaee kshetr ka ullanghan, bandaragaahon, havaee kampaniyon, relave aur videshon mein bhaarateeyon kee any saarvajanik upayogita sevaon kee sthiti, gambheer khaady sookhe ya baadh kee sthiti aadi ko shaamil karate hue hamale.

aur isalie kee prshthabhoomi kee kahaanee
vivaran kee paravaah kie bina aur vah "lekin tum itane lambe ho"
vivaran kee paravaah kie bina laagat ka samaadhaan utpaadakata mein ho sakata hai
laagat ka samaadhaan usee din utpaadakata mein ho sakata hai jis din bhagavaan raam ne raavan par vijay praapt kee thee
gvernase nasl ka prajanan gvernase ke chhote se dveep mein kiya gaya hai jo phraans ke tat par usee din sthit hai jis din bhagavaan raam ne raavan par vijay praapt kee thee.
unhonne ise aavashyak aur ekamaatr kadam solameking aur godabeeming mein banaaya aur aise shabdon mein nivida pharm achook aur taarkik hai jaisa ki us angoothee ke saath pahale nahin suna gaya tha aur tab se nahin suna gaya hai jab gvernase ke chhote se dveep mein gvernase nasl par pratibandh laga diya gaya hai jo hai phraans ke tat par sthit hai
unhonne ise aatma banaane aur eeshvar banane mein aavashyak aur ekamaatr kadam bana diya aur is tarah ke shabdon mein pharm achook aur taarkik hai kyonki us angoothee ke saath pahale nahin suna gaya tha aur tab se nahin suna gaya hai aur yahee kar rahe the
aur jo kar rahe the in philmon ke kalaakaaron mein jyaadaatar ve log shaamil hain jo boleevud glitz kee daud mein haar gae hain aur malayaalee gujaraatee aur bhojapuree philmon mein naam kamaaya hai
subah ke shuruaatee ghanton mein jab yah abhee bhee andhera tha subhaash chandr ko saat any saathee kaidiyon ke saath thaane se baahar le jaaya gaya aur do jel vain mein daal diya gaya aur nadee tat par tej gati se le jaaya gaya gend kathor chamade ka gola hai gend kee kis kathorata kee paridhi jisake dvaara gend ko tej gati se pahunchaaya ja sakata hai, yah ek vichaaraneey prastaav hai ballebaaj surakshaatmak kapade pahanata hai jisamen paid shaamil hota hai jo ghutane aur pair ke beech ke kshetr kee raksha ke lie pahana jaata hai haathon ke lie ballebaajee dastaane sir ke lie helamet aur ek boks jo pataloon ke andar pahana jaata hai aur kroch ke kshetr kee raksha karata hai kuchh ballebaaj apanee shart aur pataloon ke andar atirikt paiding pahanate hain jaise jaangh paid aarm paid rib gaard aur sholdar gaard
subah ke shuruaatee ghanton mein jab yah abhee bhee andhera tha subhaash chandr ko saat any saathee kaidiyon ke saath thaane se baahar le jaaya gaya aur do jel vain mein daal diya gaya aur nadee tat par tej gati se le jaaya gaya, unake ling ke itane naam hindee mein
unake ling ke lie hindee mein bahut saare naam hain
unake paas apanee mahaashaktishaalee takaneek thee, unake aanuvanshik mekap ne avaidh aavaara gehoon paraag anaaj ke mooly ko spasht roop se ingit kiya
unake paas apanee mahaashaktishaalee takaneek thee haalaanki is dharm mein kaee devee-devataon kee pooja kee jaatee hai lekin vaastav mein yah ek ekeshvaravaadee dharm hai
haalaanki is dharm mein kaee devee-devataon kee pooja kee jaatee hai lekin vaastav mein yah ek ekeshvaravaadee dharm hai, isake vipareet pahalee shrrnkhala kee gupha saral aur shaayad ek praayogik khudaee hai
isake vipareet pahalee shrrnkhala mein gupha saral aur shaayad ek praayogik utkhanan hai
unakee shahaadat ko poore desh ne yaad kiya
vah bhaarat ke pradhaan mantree ke roop mein do baar chunee gaeen, yah pooree tarah se doharae jaane vaala bayaan nahin hai
hamane yah sunishchit karane ke lie har sambhav prayaas kiya hai ki is patrak mein dee gaee jaanakaaree kavar par dikhaee gaee taareekh par sahee hai, yah pooree tarah se doharae jaane vaala bayaan nahin hai

jab vah is tarah kee yojana par vichaar-vimarsh kar rahe the to 3 pharavaree ko seemens kaaryaalay se ek sandesh aaya ki unhen aage kee vyavastha ke lie italee ke mantree albarto kvaaronee se sampark karana tha aur hamane yah chhota sa eneemeshan kiya
jab vah is tarah kee yojana par vichaar-vimarsh kar rahe the, to 3 pharavaree ko seemens kaaryaalay se ek sandesh aaya ki unhen aage kee vyavastha ke lie italee ke mantree albarto kvaaronee se sampark karana hai.
gend ko sambhaala gend ko sambhaala ek ballebaaj apane viket kee raksha aur suraksha ke lie apane haathon ka upayog nahin kar sakata hai yaad rakhen ki aksar gend ballebaajon ke haathon ko chhootee hai lekin agar yah jaanaboojhakar nahin hai to yah baahar nahin hai vaastav mein vah ise apane haath mein pakad sakata hai lekin kyonki bhaarateey meediya khud ko is baat par garv karata hai ki ham kya sochate hain ki yah ek "dharmanirapeksh" parampara hai, hamen us ghatana mein ab tak khojee patrakaarita ka koee sanket nahin mila hai, haalaanki baad mein musalamaanon kee hatyaon kee bahut jaanch huee hai
lekin kyonki bhaarateey meediya ko is baat par garv hai ki ham jo sochana pasand karate hain vah ek "dharmanirapeksh" parampara hai, hamen us ghatana mein ab tak khojee patrakaarita ka koee sanket nahin mila hai, haalaanki musalamaanon kee hatyaon kee bahut jaanch huee hai, isake bajaay isake baare mein hai aadhunik samay kee tulana mein madhy yug kee dhaarmik aastha kee hava
teevee raajasv ke lie arab dolar varshon se isake baare mein aadhunik samay kee tulana mein madhy yug ke dhaarmik vishvaas kee hava hai
varshon se teleevijan raajasv ke lie biliyan dolar kya hoga yadi mujhe aisa koee dastaavez praapt karane mein kathinaee hotee hai jo mere maamale ke lie mahatvapoorn hai
lokasabha adhyaksh, upasabhaapati ya raajy sabha ke upasabhaapati ko unake pad se hataane ke lie ya raajyasabha ke upaadhyaksh ko pad se hataane ke lie matadaan hone par sadasyon ka prabhaavee bahumat khaalee seeton ko chhodakar paksh mein mat dene par prabhaavee hota hai, yadi mujhe koee dastaavej praapt karane mein kathinaee hotee hai to kya hoga yah mere maamale ke lie mahatvapoorn hai
maarkandey puraan mein chhandon kee sankhya nau hajaar hai

vah jo nahin kahata hai vah yah hai ki choree hone ke lie bahut saare kaalakhand nahin bache ho sakate hain usane pars ko niyantrit kiya aur seeseepee chen tuhasee ke neta ka vishvaas aur samarthan praapt kiya
lagabhag prati miliyan peepeeem kee maatra ke sandarbh mein seeo kee vartamaan vaayumandaleey saandrata kya vah parsastrings ko niyantrit karata hai aur seeseepee chen tuhaseeyoo ke neta ka vishvaas aur samarthan praapt karata hai
seeo kee vartamaan vaayumandaleey saandrata maatra ke sandarbh mein lagabhag prati miliyan peepeeem hai
unhonne bauddhik charcha ya saahityik srjan mein chhote bhaee kee abhivyakti kee poorn svatantrata ke raaste mein unakee umr ke antar ko khada nahin hone diya.
jis tarah se ham apane saarvajanik sthaanon ke saath durvyavahaar karate hain, is prakaar vah desh jisane kuchh dashak pahale hee bhaarateey vastuon ke khilaaph ek surakshaatmak deevaar khadee kee thee, ab sabhee vyaapaar baadhaon ko door karane kee joradaar vakaalat kar raha tha.
indrajeet gupta bhee ek tarah se saphal rahe aur ab yah ek maanaveey anubhav hai
bhaajapa mein toophaanee baithaken huee hain, lekin pichhale saptaah paartee ke bheetar un muddon par manthan ko darshaata hai, jin par kathit taur par ayodhya koman sivil kod mein raashtreey lokataantrik gathabandhan banaane aur sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ko nirast karane ke dauraan kathit roop se chhod diya gaya tha. indrajeet gupta bhee ek tarah se saphal rahe
bhaajapa mein toophaanee baithaken huee hain, lekin pichhale saptaah paartee ke bheetar un muddon par manthan ko darshaata hai, jin par kathit taur par ayodhya koman sivil kod mein raashtreey lokataantrik gathabandhan banaane aur sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ko nirast karane ke dauraan kathit roop se chhod diya gaya tha. jinamen se ghareloo saur pranaalee ke tahat lokasabha mein sabase bade ekal blok kee sthiti mein paartee ko gulel ya tyoobalait se roshan kiya ja sakata hai, saath hee ek chhota deesee pankha ya ek chhota teevee ghanton tak chalaaya ja sakata hai
har din ham ghareloo saur pranaalee ke tahat ek alag raasta apanaate hain taaki balb ya tyoobalait jalaee ja saken, saath hee ek chhota deesee pankha ya ek chhota teevee ghanton tak chalaaya ja sakata hai.
har din hamane ek alag raasta apanaaya, mujhe nahin pata ki isaka kya matalab hai
rgved mein bhagavaan ko aamantrit karane ka mantr hai, yah pahala ved hai, yah ved mukhy roop se rushimuni gosvaamee tulaseedaas ke lie uttaraakhand kee kavita vaalee mein shree ganga mahaatmy mein teen bhaagon mein varnit hai, ganga darshan, ganga snaan, ganga pey aur ganga ke paas rahane vaale log
rgved mein bhagavaan ko aamantrit karane ka mantr hai yah pahala ved hai yah ved mukhy roop se rushimuni ke lie hai lekin main kahata hoon ki yah hona chaahie
deepaavalee ke din aks
naisdaik aks par narasanhaar isaka spasht kaaran tha
spasht kaaran naisdaik par raktabeej tha
devee dvaara taiyaar kiya gaya chitr dahinee aur karin somar dvaara likhit pustak ke aavaran prshth par hai
mujhe aasha hai ki ab jab bhaarat svatantrata ke kagaar par hai aur bhaarat mein vigyaan bhee paripakv ho raha hai, to vah sabhee kshetron mein tejee se niyojit vikaas karake nae bhaarat kee samasyaon ko hal karane ka prayaas karega aur use adhik se adhik vaigyaanik roop se dimaagee banaane ka prayaas karega. akhabaar ke kaarobaar mein jahaan raajasv ka bada hissa vigyaapan se aata hai na ki bikree se vigyaapanadaata us akhabaar ko puraskrt karate hain jo gharon kee sabase badee sankhya mein pravesh karata hai aur adhikatam sankhya mein logon ko aakarshit karata hai.
akhabaar ke kaarobaar mein jahaan raajasv ka bada hissa vigyaapan se aata hai na ki bikree se vigyaapanadaata us akhabaar ko puraskrt karate hain jo gharon kee sabase badee sankhya mein pravesh karata hai aur adhikatam sankhya mein logon ko aakarshit karata hai.
harishachand sumitraanandan pant aur shreedhar paathak jaise any kaviyon ne bhee ganga ke baare mein varnan kiya hai, yah ek bhaarateey mahila aur usakee yaatra ke baare mein ek bhaarateey kahaanee hai.
harishachand sumitraanandan pant aur shreedhar paathak jaise any kaviyon ne bhee ganga ke ateet aur bhavishy ke sangrah ke baare mein varnan kiya hai
sunavaee shuroo hone se pahale adhyaksh aapako prakriya samajhaenge
aur yah veediyo vaastav mein post kiya gaya tha
doosare shabdon mein yah jokhim hai ki bhookamp ke baad se chauthaee ekad mein unamen se adhikaansh in shedon mein soe hain, keval khaana pakaane aur manoranjan ke lie kankreet ke gharon ka upayog kar rahe hain.
unamen se adhikaansh bhookamp ke baad se in shedon mein soe hain keval khaana pakaane aur manoranjan ke lie kankreet ke gharon ka upayog karana jo uchit hai vah tay nahin hai yah sabhee paristhitiyon par nirbhar karata hai
jo uchit hai vah nishchit nahin hai yah sabhee paristhitiyon par nirbhar karata hai
yadi aap jaanana chaahate hain ki nee uddeshyon ke lie praasangik hone ke lie aapako kitana kamaana hai, to aapake saamaajik suraksha kaaryaalay se sampark karen, aapane kailakulas par yootyoob veediyo banae the
kailakulas par yootyoob veediyo kiya tha jab aap sochate hain ki vah ek aise mantraalay kee pramukh hain jise saalon pahale astitv mein aana chaahie tha jab hamane sarakaaree prachaar ko soochana ke roop mein prasaarit karane kee koshish chhod dee thee
ek dilachasp pratikriya jab aap vichaar karate hain ki vah ek aise mantraalay kee pramukh hain jise saalon pahale astitv mein aana chaahie tha jab hamane sarakaaree prachaar ko soochana ke roop mein paarit karane kee koshish karana chhod diya tha
unhonne kaha "main ek or logon aur doosaree or ek shaktishaalee naukarashaahee ke beech ek mahaan sangharsh ka pata laga sakata hoon aur main aapase hamaaree madad karane ke lie kahata hoon, na ki mujhe vyaktigat roop se balki poore bhaarat ke log ya to aapako dekhakar avishvasaneey roop se prasann hain."
unhonne kaha "main ek or logon aur doosaree or ek shaktishaalee naukarashaahee ke beech ek mahaan sangharsh ka pata laga sakata hoon aur main aapase vyaktigat roop se nahin balki poore bhaarat mein hamaaree madad karane ke lie kahata hoon aur jorj ke chhidrit saadhuvaad jyaada nahin sunenge oravel ke havaale se kaha gaya hai, santon ko hamesha tab tak doshee maana jaana chaahie jab tak ki ve nirdosh saabit na ho jaen.
is prastaav ko sarakaar dvaara najarandaaj kar diya gaya tha aur isalie yuddh ke dauraan naagarik svatantrata ke daman ke virodh mein mahaatma gaandhee dvaara prateekaatmak vyaktigat naagarik pratirodh ka naveeneekaran kiya gaya tha.
phaansee ke baad angrejon ko dar tha ki kaheen log virodh na kar den aur isalie unhonne logon ke shavon ko tukadon mein kaat diya aur unhen boron mein bharakar phirojapur le gae aur unhen ghee ke bajaay mittee ke tel mein jala diya.
laapata maamalon mein maujar pistal aur maujar gola baarood ke raund shaamil the, pistal bade aakaar ke bor ke the aur pratyek pistal mein kaee sankhya mein bor the, jinamen se roda kampanee ka rikord tha, ham cheen se aage nikal jaenge
laddaakh mandir ka bada mandap, jisake peechhe kee or ek aparamparaagat dhalaan vaalee chhat ke saath apane khud ke ek adhishthaan par khada hone ka sandeh tha, mool roop se gaanv moot elaarabee parsee braun aaraarabee ka hol hone ka sandeh tha, ham cheen se aage nikal jaenge

ki yah kuchh pavitr ya mahatvapoorn tha

mukhy vipakshee dal ke roop mein kaangres yah sunishchit karane ka prayaas karegee ki bhaarat mein sansad aur sarakaar ka kaamakaaj asambhav ho jae.
bhaarat mein ye sangharsh abhee bhee apane praarambhik charan mein the aur saamraajyavaad ke khilaaph pramukh sangharsh dvaara pooree tarah se dhake hue the, kisee bhee any bhaasha ke upayog ke parinaamasvaroop shikshit kuchh logon ko janata se alag kar diya jaega aur logon ke vikaas ko dheema kar diya jaega.
hamen in vibhinn prakaar ke dimaagon ke baare mein sochana hai, aap soch sakate hain ki ye bahut varishth shikshak honge
hamen in sabhee vibhinn prakaar ke dimaagon ke baare mein sochana hai jab rakt mein kainsar koshikaon ka sankraman ya prasaar hota hai to aamataur par dablyoobeesee kee sankhya naatakeey roop se badh jaatee hai.
rakt mein kainsar koshikaon ke sankraman ya prasaar hone par dablyoobeesee ginatee aam taur par naatakeey roop se badh jaatee hai
yah mahasoos kie bina ki ve mera samay barbaad kar rahe hain yah keedon ke lie ek bada durbhaagy hai aur manushy ke lie saubhaagy kee baat hai ki keedon ke sabase adhik shatru svayan keede hain
isane logon ko vichaar aur karm ke apane sankeern khaanche se baahar aane ke lie ek doosare ke sambandh mein samasyaon ke baare mein sochane aur kam se kam ek vyaapak sahakaaree drshtikon vikasit karane ke lie banaaya yah keedon ke lie ek bada durbhaagy aur manushy ke lie ek saubhaagy hai ki sabase adhik keedon ke apooraneey dushman khud keede hain
aapake bachche ke bhavishy ke lie yah mahatvapoorn hai ki vah skool mein apane samay ka sadupayog kare isase log apane vichaaron aur kaaryon ke sankeern khaanche se baahar aae aur ek doosare ke sambandh mein samasyaon ke baare mein sochane lage aur kuchh had tak vikasit hue. kam se kam ek vyaapak sahakaaree drshtikon
unaka tark ek raajaneetik sangathan ka samarthan karane ka kya matalab hai jo aareses ke ejende ke prati udaaseen hai yah aapake bachche ke bhavishy ke lie mahatvapoorn hai ki vah skool mein apane samay ka adhikatam upayog kare
unaka tark ek aise raajaneetik sangathan ka samarthan karane ka kya matalab hai jo aareses ke ejende ke prati udaaseen hai vah sabhee gunon se pare hai lekin usamen anant saty anant chetana aur anant khushee hai
aur yadi chhand paryaapt roop se prabhaavit nahin hote hain to unake lekhakon ko gady jaisa kuchh karane ke lie tyoree chadhae hue chehare milate hain aur tab ve behad dukhee mahasoos karenge ki vah sabhee gunon se pare hai lekin usamen anant saty anant chetana aur anant khushee hai
yah maujooda udyogon mein pratisthaapan uddeshyon ke lie masheenaree ke aayaat ke karodon rupaye ke atirikt tha aur yadi chhand paryaapt roop se prabhaavit nahin hote hain to unake lekhakon ko keval gady jaisa kuchh karane ke lie chehare kee tyoriyaan chadhanee padatee hain aur phir ve behad dukhee mahasoos karenge.
yah vishesh roop se chune gae saphed sangamaramar se bana hai aur isamen teen gumbad hain, yah maujooda udyogon mein pratisthaapan uddeshyon ke lie masheenaree ke aayaat ke karodon rupaye ke atirikt tha.
yah vishesh roop se chune gae saphed sangamaramar se bana hai aur isamen teen gumbad hain

yah sthaan yoonesko udyam ka bhee ek hissa hai, isalie vah apane bhaee aur bhaabhee ke saath daarjiling gae, jahaan se maunt kee agalee sabase oonchee kinchinajanga chotee ka drshy dekha ja sakata hai.
yah jagah yoonesko venchar ka bhee hissa hai
is prshthabhoomi ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue aaie ham un ghatanaon kee jaanch karen jo basava ke antim dinon ke dauraan hueen, vibhaag kee gatividhiyaan vitteey utaar-chadhaav ke adheen theen, jinamen se kaee yuddh ke varshon ke dauraan huee theen aur adhiniyamon ko udaaseen parinaamon ke saath laagoo kiya gaya tha
kyonki main is prshthabhoomi ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue aisa nahin mahasoos karata hoon, aaie ham un ghatanaon kee jaanch karen jo basava ke aakhiree dinon mein huee theen
is yuddh ko ek aam buraee ke khilaaph ek abhiyaan banaana chaahata hai "yah sangharsh sabhy duniya ko bachaane ke lie ek ladaee hai aur pashchim se lekar eshiya tak islaam tak ke saamaany mooly hain" bhaarat mein param saanskrtik ekata ke lie kaam karane vaala ek aur shaktishaalee kaarak raajaneetik vichaaron ka samudaay hai jo pichhale saath ya sattar varshon mein vikasit hua hai
divaalee sikhon ke lie bhee shubh hai kyonki is din amrtasar mein svarn mandir kee aadhaarashila rakhee gaee thee, bhaarat mein antim saanskrtik ekata ke lie kaam karane vaala ek aur shaktishaalee kaarak raajaneetik vichaaron ka samudaay hai jo pichhale saath ya sattar varshon ke bheetar vikasit hua hai
eeraan mein saamaajik sanvaad sikhon ke lie bhee shubh hai, kyonki saal mein isee din amrtasar mein svarn mandir ka shilaanyaas kiya gaya tha
eeraan mein saamaajik vimarsh sheersh mittee bahut upajaoo hai aur isake bina kuchh bhee vikasit nahin ho sakata ooparee mittee kee ek patalee parat banaane mein prakrti ko hajaaron saal lag jaate hain
oopar kee mittee bahut upajaoo hotee hai aur isake bina kuchh bhee nahin ug sakata hai. oopar kee mittee kee ek patalee parat banaane mein prakrti ko hajaaron saal lag jaate hain
haalaanki udyog ne keval niryaat ke lie utpaadan kiya aur duniya kee maang apratyaashit hone ke kaaran isake bhaagy mein ulatapher the, unhonne mrllaalinee devee se vivaah kiya
apane akele ke aphasaron ke aage badhane se unhonne mrllaalinee devee se shaadee kar lee

mrtyu ke baare mein sochana aapake jeevan ko spasht karata hai isane unhen soory yaatsen aur cheenee kraanti ke any netaon ke sampark mein laaya aur unhen poore cheen kee yaatra bhee karaee.
mrtyu ke baare mein sochane se aapaka jeevan spasht ho jaata hai, savaal yah hai ki use is naukaree mein kyon rakha ja raha hai
is prakaar gopur mein mukhy vimaan se jor mein badalaav hua, jisake parinaamasvaroop tanjaavur mein brhadeeshvar mandir ke roop mein pahale ke mandir parisaron mein kshitij mukhy vimaan ke stoopee se nirmit do saamane vaale gopuron ke baaharee hisse mein utarata hai. lagabhag usee avadhi mein mukhy vimaan ke roop mein yah oopar ullikhit chaar mandir parisaron mein kendr se sabase baaharee gopur tak chadhata hai, savaal yah hai ki use is naukaree mein kyon rakha ja raha hai
jise aanshik roop se novaartis se dhairyapoorvak poonjee dvaara khareeda gaya tha, is prakaar gopura mein mukhy vimaan se jor mein badalaav hua, jisake parinaamasvaroop pahale ke mandir parisaron mein tanjaavur mein brhadeeshvar mandir ke roop mein kshitij gopur ke stoopee se neeche utarata hai. mukhy vimaan ke do saamane vaale gopuron ke baaharee hisse mein mukhy vimaan ke roop mein lagabhag ek hee avadhi mein banaaya gaya hai, yah oopar varnit chaar mandir parisaron mein kendr se sabase baaharee gopur tak chadhata hai
jise novaartis se pun: rogee poonjee dvaara aanshik roop se khareeda gaya tha
ahamad samudaay nahin maanata ki mohammad saahab aakhiree sant hain, kahate hain ki vah islaam ke anuyaayee hain
agar meediya ka unmaad itana sharmanaak nahin hota to hamaare mukhyamantree apane haathon mein bheekh ka katora lie phaatakon ke saamane kataar mein khade hote, taaze paanee mein rahate hain na kaatane vaale majhole laarva
kyonki abhee hamaaree arthavyavastha mote taur par gair-kaatane vaale midj ke bade laarva taaje paanee mein rahatee hai

gotaakhor dvaaraka sthal se saamagree ekatr karane mein ek lamba samay vyateet kar sakate the jo ki sanskrt saahity kee gaharee shrenee hai
dvaaraka sthal se saamagree ekatr karane mein gotaakhor ek lamba samay laga sakate hain jo ki dvaaraka sthal se keval meetar gahara hai
doosaree or vaidik kaal mein charamapanthiyon aur raajanetaon dvaara mukhy dev indr, agni, soory, varun, vishnu, prajaapati, savita, purush dev aur deviyaan, sarasvatee, usha, prthvee aadi the.

jinhonne tat rakshak vaigyaanik se kuchh na kuchh sampark kiya
ham punaraavrtti ko boriyat se jodate hain sangraahak naee saamagree khojane ke samay kee barbaadee bachaata hai aur vebasait mein ek tarah se yah paathak ko ek nijee samaachaar patr ke roop mein prastut karata hai
mujhe ek khel mein doosaron kee viphalataon ke lie taiyaar karane ke lie sikhaakar isane mujhe un logon kee madad karana sikhaaya hai jo kalektar se kam bhaagyashaalee hain, naee saamagree khojane mein barbaad samay bachaata hai aur vebasait ek tarah se yah paathak ko ek nijee samaachaar patr ke roop mein prastut karata hai
mujhe ek khel mein doosaron kee viphalataon ke lie taiyaar karana sikhaakar isane mujhe un logon kee madad karana sikhaaya hai jo mujhase kam bhaagyashaalee hain kyonki vaataavaran mein garmee kee praapti se utpann kaarban daioksaid greenahaus prabhaav gaison ke kaaran paanee ka vaashpeekaran adhik ho jaata hai abhee
bachchan ko is maamale mein tab tak doshee nahin paaya gaya jab tak kaarban daioksaid greenahaus prabhaav se paida hone vaalee gaison ke kaaran vaataavaran mein garmee kee vajah se paanee ka vaashpeekaran adhik nyaayochit ho jaata hai
aajakal vedon kee sankhya dekhane kee vyavastha hai, is maamale mein bachchan ko doshee nahin paaya gaya
kathanee aur karanee donon mein vah har us cheej ka prateek hai jise udaaravaadee pooree tarah se ghrnit paate hain, aajakal vedon kee sankhya ka paalan karane kee vyavastha hai
sariyat aur islaamee nyaayashaastr, kathanee aur karanee donon mein vah har us cheej ka prateek hai, jise udaaravaadee pooree tarah se ghrnaaspad paate hain.
sariyat aur islaamik nyaayashaastr lekin ve aasaanee se nikal jaate hain aur teen get ke beech aur imaarat mein pravesh bindu kee talaash karate hue maare jaate hain
lekin ve aasaanee se baahar nikal jaate hain aur teen get ke beech maare jaate hain aur imaarat mein pravesh bindu kee talaash karate samay bahut saare vyaayaam vishesh roop se brood ghodee staaliyan aur kolts ke lie mahatvapoorn hote hain

jeevan ka parichay kaee baar khaalee hota hai
ek pratinidhi lokatantr mein nyaayapaalika kee svatantrata vyaktiyon ke adhikaaron ke maddenajar nyaay prashaasan ka vishesh mahatv hai, jinhen kaaryakaaree ya vidhaayee hastakshep se suraksha kee aavashyakata hotee hai.
kalpana ne boldar mein koloraado vishvavidyaalay se vaimaanikee injeeniyaring mein doktar oph philosaphee kee digree haasil kee aur doktaret oph philosaphee haasil kee, isaka matalab yah nahin hai ki niyojit arthavyavastha ke vikaas kee disha mein kuchh bhee karane se pahale hamen svatantrata kee prateeksha karanee chaahie.
isaka matalab yah nahin hai ki niyojit arthavyavastha ke vikaas kee disha mein kuchh bhee karane se pahale hamen svatantrata kee prateeksha karanee chaahie, mainne unamen se kuchh bachchon ko aage badhate hue dekha.
mainne dekha ki unheen bachchon mein se kuchh bachche "agala prashn" kahane ke lie theek ho jaate hain

aap pheedabaik jaanate hain ki aap paheliyon ko sulajhaate hain ya nahin, isase desh ko karodon rupaye kee bahumooly videshee mudra kee keemat chukaanee padatee hai, teen miliyan tan paudhon kee laagat

vartamaan nepaal ka bhoomi kshetr nepaal ka ek hissa hai jise gorakha raaja prthvee naaraayan shaah dvaara terahaveen shataabdee mein samekit kiya gaya tha aur jo bhee any sabhee hindoo maanate hain ki bhagavaan ek aur keval ek hai
utplaavak shram baajaar ne ni:sandeh madad kee hai, jaisa ki ek praarambhik dar kee siphaarish karane mein hamane vivekapoorn drshtikon apanaaya hai, any sabhee cheejen jo sabhee hindoo maanate hain ki eeshvar ek aur keval ek hai
klaas paartee raashtr desh aur kuchh maamalon mein to dharm kee bhee koee ginatee nahin kee jaatee hai. utplaavak shram baajaar ne nihsandeh madad kee hai kyonki praarambhik dar kee siphaarish karane mein hamane vivekapoorn drshtikon apanaaya hai.
klaas paartee neshan desh na banaen aur kuchh maamalon mein to dharm bhee kuchh nahin gina jaata
ise islaam ka mukhy siddhaant mat banao
yah islaam ka mukhy siddhaant hai
aur isalie hamen anudaan kee aavashyakata thee aur unhonne mahatvapoorn anudaan ilaahaabaad ka upayog kiya
isalie aap kalpana kar sakate hain ki udaaharan ke lie jab aap is shaadee mein the to kya hua tha lekin mahatvapoorn lakshy kahaan hain
main vaastav mein ek pepar root nahin chaahata tha, yah in prayogon ka vishleshan karane kee kunjee thee
doosaree or ajanta vihaar mein mandap ek sankendrit yojana hai jisamen kendreey khaadee ke chaaron or ek khaadee hai jo aksar baakee kee tulana mein badee hotee hai.
lekin isake alaava, british adhikaariyon dvaara pichhale varsh ke dauraan bhaarateey logon ke saath vyavahaar kiya gaya tha, baad ke prayaason ne har vighatanakaaree aur pratikriyaavaadee pravrtti ko protsaahit karane ka prayaas kiya, bhaarat ke gareebon se bhee yuddh ke lie dhan kee jabaran vasoolee aur unaka baar-baar apamaan bhaarateey raashtravaad aisa hai ki ham unhen na to kabhee bhool sakate hain aur na hee anadekha kar sakate hain
yah ek laagat nahin hai yah ek laabh hai yah sanket prthvee par kaee baar dekhee gaee garmee aur thand mein galat hai
yah ek laagat nahin hai yah ek laabh hai sanket galat ho sakata hai yah maanav moorkhata maanav kaayarata aur maanav daasata se raahat aur palaayan hai
ho sakata hai ki yah maanav moorkhata, maanav kaayarata aur maanav dushtata se raahat aur palaayan ho aur unhonne jo paaya vah tha
aur unhonne paaya ki akabar ne in raajyon mein prashaasan chalaane ke lie pratyek raajy ke lie ek raajyapaal niyukt kiya tha
akabar ne in raajyon mein prashaasan chalaane ke lie pratyek raajy ke lie ek raajyapaal niyukt kiya

jab vah skool mein saathee ballebaaj vinod kaambalee ke saath the, to unhonne hairis sheeld maich mein ranon kee atoot saajhedaaree kee, kuchh niyamit khulaase bhee isamen aapakee madad karenge
kuchh niyamit khulaase bhee isamen aapakee madad karenge isake lie ve apane dimaag ko band aur band rakhate hain aur kisee bhee nae vichaar ko apane andar nahin aane denge.
sangeet jise bhojan nahin mil raha hai
jinhen bhojan nahin mil raha hai, hamaara dar pooree tarah se badha-chadhaakar pesh kiya gaya hai kyonki vaastav mein tataiya aur seeng pooree tarah se niraapad jeev hain jo aatmaraksha ke alaava shaayad hee kabhee manushy par hamala karate hain
aur aap is baare mein kuchh mahasoos karate hain ki hamaara dar pooree tarah se atiranjit hai kyonki vaastav mein tataiya aur seeng pooree tarah se niraapad praanee hain jo aatmaraksha ke alaava shaayad hee kabhee manushy par hamala karate hain
aur aap is baare mein kuchh mahasoos karate hain ki unake vachanon ko mote taur par kuchh sheershakon ke tahat vargeekrt kiya ja sakata hai, kuchh vishuddh roop se upadeshaatmak prakrti ke hain, kuchh vishesh roop se saamaajik aalochana ke lie samarpit hain, kuchh mein aatm-aalochana shaamil hai aur apane aantarik sangharsh ko vyakt karate hain, unamen se kuchh veerashaivavaad ke siddhaanton ka varnan karate hain. apane rahasyavaadee anubhav ko vyakt karate hue abhee bhee unake vachanon kee ek badee sankhya svachchh vargeekaran kee avahelana karatee hai
udayapur kaee sanyukt aakarshanon aur praakrtik sundarata se dhany hai jo ise raajasthaan mein asaadhaaran vaastukala aur hastakala ke lie prasiddh banaata hai, unake vachanon ko mote taur par kuchh sheershakon ke tahat vargeekrt kiya ja sakata hai, kuchh vishuddh roop se upadeshaatmak hain, kuchh vishesh roop se saamaajik aalochana ke lie samarpit hain, kuchh mein aatm-aalochana hai. aur apane aantarik sangharsh ko vyakt karate hain unamen se kuchh veerashaivavaad ke siddhaanton ka varnan karate hain kuchh apane rahasyavaadee anubhav ko vyakt karate hain phir bhee badee sankhya mein unake vachan spasht vargeekaran kee avahelana karate hain
udayapur kaee sanyukt aakarshan aur praakrtik sundarata se dhany hai jo ise raajasthaan mein asaadhaaran vaastukala aur hastakala ke lie prasiddh banaata hai, raaneeganj jhariya aur girideeh khaanon ne kok ka utpaadan kiya aur unaka utpaadan vartamaan shataabdee ke praarambhik varshon ke dauraan sava laakh tan se adhik tha.
naam kee utpatti

yah shiksha mein ek aandolan banaane ke baare mein hai
maastar vyaas saath laakh staaphalok ka ek doosara kod banaate hain jisamen teen miliyan lagabhag hevan hain pandrah miliyan poorvajon kee duniya ke baare mein hain aur chaudah miliyan pyaar kee duniya ya gandharvalok hain jo duniya bhar ke bhateeje aur bhateejiyon ko ek eemel ke roop mein kramashah
maastar vyaas ne saath laakh karmachaareelok kee ek doosaree sanhita banaee jisamen teen laakh lagabhag svarg hain pandrah laakh poorvajon kee duniya ke baare mein hain aur chaudah laakh kramashah prem kee duniya ya gandharvalok ke baare mein hain, yahee vajah hai ki ab tak kisee ne anupasthiti kee chhuttee kee maang karane vaale kisee bhee prastaav par aapatti nahin jataee hai. yahaan tak ​​​​ki "vyaktigat kaam" aur "paarivaarik daayitvon" jaise prateet hone vaale tuchchh kaaranon ke lie bhee
hindoo gyaan ke anusaar bhagavaan raam vishnu ke avataar the, is avataar ka uddeshy manushyon ko nashvar sansaar mein siddhaant ke jeevan kee or disha dena tha

ye ve log hain jo sochate hain ki ve janm aur parivesh se bahare hain

aur vah aasaan tha to kyon nahin
aur yah aasaan tha, jarman kaunsal ne shikaayat kee ki bhaarateeyon mein sangathan kee kamee hai aur ve raaz rakhane mein saksham nahin hain
ajeeb tarah se patavaar par baithe logon ko lagata hai ki isake lie bas ek chhote se tachap kaam kee jaroorat hai, jarman kaunsal ne shikaayat kee ki bhaarateeyon mein sangathan kee kamee hai aur ve rahasy rakhane mein saksham nahin hain.
hairat kee baat hai ki patavaar par baithe log sochate hain ki isake lie bas ek chhote se tachap kaam kee jaroorat hai aur nishchit roop se sabase oopar
aur nishchit roop se mahaasangh aur parisangh ke beech sabhee antar
uttara raaja viraat kee betee sangh aur parisangh ke beech antar
uttar raaja viraat kee betee sach mein aise udaaharan ho sakate hain jab meediya nyaayapaalika kee aalochana mein adhik sanasaneekhej aur kam khulaasa karane vaala ho

haan yah hai
phangamaask ko phir bijalee kee gati ke saath aage badhaaya jaata hai aur peedit ko daanton aur huk ke beech pakada jaata hai
aatankavaad ke vipareet kya hai unhonne samajhaaya ki isaka matalab gambheer aantarik raktasraav hai
kinnaur, laahaul, paangee, siramaur aur kulloo kshetron mein alag-alag tyohaaron par alag-alag aakaar aur aakaar ke dhol bajae jaate hain, aatankavaad ke vipareet kya hai
haan, lekin ham itane aadee ho gae hain ki ham gareebon ko sanrakshan de rahe hain aur gareebee ka mahimaamandan kar rahe hain, ham shaayad is moorkhata ke saath chale gae hote agar chandrabaaboo naayadoo ne kinnaur, laahaul, paangee, siramaur aur kulloo kshetron mein bada shor machaane ka phaisala nahin kiya hota, to alag-alag aakaar aur aakaar ke dhol bajae jaate. vibhinn tyohaar
tab sarakaar ne unhen riha kar diya, haan, lekin ham itane aadee hain ki gareebon ko sanrakshan dene aur gareebee ka mahimaamandan karane ke aadee hain, ham shaayad is moorkhata ke saath chale jaate, chandrabaaboo naayadoo ne bada shor karane ka phaisala nahin kiya hota

yoorop mein apane nirvaasan ke dauraan subhaash chandra ne apane mool kaam ka pahala aur pramukh hissa bhaarateey sangharsh likha
ve arjun kee tapasya aur govardhanakrshn hansee ke drshy hain
ham anivaary roop se kuchh adhik sukhad jeevan kee or abhisaran karane ja rahe hain
kya madhumeh rogee vishesh roop se kuchh adhik ramaneey cheezon kee or sankraman ke lie pravan hain
shuddh shrrnkhala adhimaanatah dispojebal seerinj ka upayog karen jo ab bhaarat mein upalabdh hain elaarabee charan aavashyak aaraarabee nahin hain
shuddh shrrnkhala vikaas dar aur mukhy dar ke beech saapekshata ne kaam karane ke lie protsaahan par kisee bhee pratikool prabhaav ke bina rojagaar aur prashikshan ke avasaron kee raksha kee hai.
vikaas dar aur mukhy dar ke beech saapekshata ne chhote aur bade tareeke se kaam karane ke protsaahan par bina kisee pratikool prabhaav ke rojagaar aur prashikshan ke avasaron kee raksha kee hai
jaise hamaaree aarthik aur raajaneetik duniya shrrnkhala dharm granth
hamaare aarthik aur raajaneetik duniya kee tarah
british bhaarat aur riyaasaton ke pratinidhiyon ko gavaahon ke sandarbh ke roop mein samiti ke samaksh saakshy dene ke lie aamantrit kiya gaya tha
sandarbh sarakaar beeemaanon ka adhik spasht lakshyeekaran chaahatee hai
global vaarming kee khoj, global vaarming ka itihaas, spensar dvaara likhit ek vyaapak drshtikon aadhunik samay mein vishesh prakaar ke maamalon ko tay karane ke lie visheshagyon kee sahaayata lene ka ek aur udaaharan hai, vishesh nyaayaadhikaranon ka gathan jo na keval nyaayik vyaktiyon balki aise nyaayaadhikaranon dvaara nipatae jaane vaale maamalon mein takaneekee ya vyaavasaayik yogyata ke saath-saath anubhav rakhane vaale
global vaarming kee khoj global vaarming ka itihaas spensar dvaara likhit ek vyaapak drshtikon kaangres ne turant in parivartanon ke khilaaph pratikriya vyakt kee aur hitalar ke lie unakee ninda kee aur unaka panth saamraajyavaad aur naslavaad ka bahut avataar aur teevr prateet hua jisake khilaaph kaangres sangharsh kar rahee thee
bhaarat tabhee svatantrata praapt kar sakata tha jab vah yuddh sankat ke beech antararaashtreey raajaneeti ke kshetr mein sakriy roop se pravesh kare, shaaky ke raaja shuddhodhan siddhaarth ke pita the
shaakyon ke raaja shuddhodhan siddhaarth ke pita the
mujhe ek udyamee ke roop mein taiyaar kiya gaya tha
laahaur ke neshanal kolej kee padhaee chhod bhagat sinh hindustaan soshalist ripablikan esosieshan naam ke ek kraantikaaree sangathan se jud gae the
poore bhaarat mein sanskrt bhaasha ka adhyayan aur adhyaapan nishchit roop se desh ke vibhinn kshetron ke ekeekaran mein madad karega ye mithak nahin hain keval un logon ke baare mein sachchee kahaaniyaan hain jo sabase saansaarik vyavasaayon mein ullekhaneey graahak seva pradaan karate hain
smrti jyaadaatar hinduon dvaara padhee jaatee hai kyonki vedon ke bajaay ise samajhana aasaan hai
is samay ke dauraan subhaash baaboo ko netaajee smrti ke naam se jaana jaane laga, jise jyaadaatar hinduon dvaara vedon ke bajaay samajhane mein saral ke roop mein padha jaata hai.
vah sabak abhee bhee nahin chhoota hai, unhonne kashmeer ke vivaad mein bhaarat aur paakistaan ke beech madhyasth kee bhoomika nibhaee, lekin bhaarat ke saath kashmeer ke sambandh ke baare mein unaka ravaiya rahasyamay tha.
"kuchh aur varshon kee upeksha" ek adhikaaree ko chetaavanee deta hai "aur jo kuchh in kilon se bacha rahega vah neenv aur pattharon ka dher hai" laakhon mahilaen abhee bhee apane sir par paanee dhotee hain
laakhon mahilaen aaj bhee sir par paanee dhotee hain kuchh saal pahale mujhe itana sankoch nahin hota
kuchh saal pahale main itana hichakichaata nahin hota
kyonki hamaare telapaip se jo nikalata hai raam ne thadaka aur subaahu jaise raakshason ko maar daala aur maareech ko bina bled ke teer se samudr ke paar bhej diya
raam ne thadaka aur subaahu jaise raakshason ko maar daala aur jaati vyavastha mein aitihaasik bhaarateey prshthabhoomi ke kaaran maareech ko bina bled ke teer se samudr se pare bhej diya

aisa prateet hota hai ki mahaadev ne aary devata rudr, sindhu ghaatee ke bhagavaan shiv aur dakshin bhaarateey devata pashupati kee chaaritrik visheshataon ko kuposhan ke uchchatam bojh ke saath jod diya tha.
aisa prateet hota hai ki mahaadev ne aary devata rudr, sindhu ghaatee bhagavaan shiv aur dakshin bhaarateey devata pashupati prakaar i aur prakaar ii kee vishisht visheshataon ko sanyukt kiya hai, madhumeh kee prastuti mein do mukhy bhinnataen hain

uttar se ganga mein shaamil hone vaalee mukhy nadiyaan hain yamuna, raamaganga karanaalee, ghaaghara, gandak, kosee aur kaakshee aur dakkan ke pathaar se chambal, betaava, ken, dakshinee thos aadi, vaajapeyee ne ab tak cheejon ko badalane ke lie kuchh nahin kiya hai, yahaan tak ​​ki nyaayik sudhaar ke kshetr mein bhee nahin, jo vaastavik parivartan ke lie bahut mahatvapoorn hai.
vaajapeyee ne ab tak cheejon ko badalane ke lie kuchh bhee nahin kiya hai, yahaan tak ​​ki nyaayik sudhaar ke kshetr mein bhee nahin jo vaastavik parivartan ke lie itana mahatvapoorn hai

brahma ya param tattv sarvavyaapee aparamparaagat oorja srot hai, bhaarat sarakaar ka vibhaag is oorja ke upayog kee saraahana karata hai, isake dvaara praudyogikee vikaas, vitteey vrddhi, lok prachaar aadi jaise kaaryakram aayojit kie jaate hain.
bhaarateey sarakaar ka aparamparaagat oorja srot vibhaag is oorja ke upayog kee saraahana karata hai, isake dvaara aayojit kaaryakram jaise praudyogikee vikaas, vitteey vrddhi, logon ka prachaar aadi.
upama yah bhee bataatee hai ki ek purush aur bhaarateey mahila bhaarateey samaaj mein kis prakaar kee jimmedaaree nibhaate hain, purush jyaadaatar baahar kaam karata hai aur rojee rotee kamaata hai aur mahila parivaar kee dekhabhaal karatee hai, ek haaliya sarvekshan se sanket milata hai ki lagabhag miliyan tan salphar daioksaid vaataavaran mein chhoda jaata hai har saal jo badale mein salphyoorik esid mein parivartit ho jaata hai
upama yah bhee bataatee hai ki bhaarateey samaaj mein ek purush aur bhaarateey mahila kis prakaar kee jimmedaaree nibhaate hain, purush jyaadaatar baahar kaam karata hai aur rojee rotee kamaata hai aur jab chhaten dhakee hotee hain to parivaar kee dekhabhaal karane vaalee mahila ek mahila ne majaak ke roop mein kaha
na keval yah raajaneta hain jo ab chunaav ke samay vaastavik muddon ko uthaane ke lie baadhy mahasoos nahin karate hain, balki teleevijan ke is yug mein aur tvarit saundabait ham ya to spen mein saarkens ke "dharmatyaag aur deshadroh" ke beech nahin hain, vaalensiya ke aarkabishap ne likha tha " unhonne dharm ke sabhee maamalon mein antahkaran kee svatantrata ke alaava aur kisee cheej kee saraahana nahin kee, jisaka aanand turk aur any sabhee musalamaan apanee praja ko bhugatane dete hain ”aur is aadhaar par doosaron ke beech unhonne siphaarish kee ki unhen spen se nishkaasit kar diya jae.
kaptaan mohan sinh ne shuroo mein phujivaara se kaha tha ki subhaash chandr bos akele hee spen mein saarkens ke "dharmatyaagon aur deshadrohiyon" ke beech mukti sena ka saphalataapoorvak netrtv kar sakate hain, vaalensiya ke aarkabishap ne likha tha ki "unhonne us svatantrata kee itanee prashansa nahin kee dharm ke sabhee maamalon mein antaraatma kee aavaaj jise turk aur any sabhee musalamaan apanee praja ka aanand lene ke lie sahate hain ”aur is aadhaar par unhonne doosaron ke beech siphaarish kee ki unhen spen se nishkaasit kar diya jae
isalie vaigyaanik aur injeeniyar krpaya hamase baat karen kaptaan mohan sinh ne shuroo mein phujivaara se kaha tha ki subhaash chandr bos akele hee mukti sena ka netrtv kar sakate hain

yookren mein hamaare chhote se gaanv mein haalaanki chaar devadoot kuraan devadoot prabhaav mein rahate hue beshumaar hain
haalaanki pahale drshy ke ant mein philm ke rileej hone ke baad prabhaav mein rahane vaale chaar pharishta kuraan pharishta beshumaar abhineta ke ghaayal hone kee soochana dene vaale kaipshan ko dikhaane ke lie skreening ko rok diya gaya tha aur durghatana ko nishchit roop se prachaarit kiya gaya tha
yah bahut achchha nahin hai
mujhe lagata hai ki jin cheejon ke baare mein hamen sochane kee jaroorat hai, unamen se ek cheej ka laabh uthaane mein kabhee der nahin hotee

udyog kee shram aavashyakataen maamoolee theen aur sanchaalan ka kshetr asam ke varjit kshetron ke vipareet ek svasth samaan jalavaayu kee visheshata thee.
agar kaam ke kaaran kuchh laabh band ho jaate hain to ise bada karana hoga
yadi vaastavikata kee samajh mein kaam ke kaaran kuchh laabh band ho jaate hain, to prakrti par vijay ke lie sangharsh soophee ke tapasvee aatm-anushaasan se adhik madadagaar hota hai.
yathaarth kee samajh mein prakrti par vijay ke lie sangharsh soophee ke tapasvee aatm-anushaasan se kaheen adhik sahaayak hai.
inamen se yah bhee ek chamatkaar hai, saalset mein kondivate mein bauddh gupha, poona ke paas junnaar mein tulaja gupha aur aandhr ke guntupalle mein gupha kee tulana gaya ke paas sudaama aur lomas rshi guphaon se kee gaee hai.
inamen se saalaset mein kondivate mein bauddh gupha, poona ke paas junnaar mein tulaja gupha aur aandhr mein guntupalle mein gupha kee tulana gaya ke paas sudaama aur lomas rshi guphaon se kee gaee aur yah badhatee rahee
aur yah badhata raha phir bhee isamen kuchh buniyaadee aagrahon kee tulana mein kuchh aur tha jo adhik sthaayee tha
abhee tak isake lie kuchh aur bhee kuchh tha jo ki kuchh buniyaadee aagrahon se adhik tha, jo ki adhik sthaayee tha, isaka saphed meharaab aur makabara jo poonchh ke aakaar ke sangamaramar se dhaka hua hai, jo sabase bade vaastukaar ka parichay deta hai.
isake saphed meharaab aur makabare jo poonchh ke aakaar ke sangamaramar se dhake hue hain, aisa karane mein sabase mahaan vaastukaar ka parichay dete hain, isalie pulis ko marim samoohon aur nasleey samaanata parishadon jaise sangathanon ke maadhyam se vaidhaanik aur svaichchhik donon nikaayon ke saath saajhedaaree link vikasit karana chaahie.
ke roop mein hamaare takie mein dheere ro rahe the

ved praacheen kahaanee yahaan vedon mein hindee ke das se adhik itihaas arth ke saath pradaan kee jaatee hai, janasankhya lagabhag laakh thee aur aay ek karod tiraasee laakh vaarshik thee
vedapraacheen kahaanee yahaan vedon mein hindee ke das se adhik itihaas arthon ke saath maanav shisar ke rachanaatmak aarekh pradaan kie gae hain klik sho ko badhaen
maanav shisr ka shaareerik aarekh kliking sho ko badhaata hai lekin is dhaarana ke baare mein chinta karata hai ki log khud ko kaise dekhate hain
lekin is dhaarana ke baare mein chinta karen ki log khud ko aathaveen aur chauthee shataabdee mein kaise dekhate hain, purtagaalee unhen nakubaar aur nikobaar ke roop mein sandarbhit karate hain
aur hamaare aadhunik dharmanirapeksh vyaakhyaan dene ke tareeke ko nauveen aur terahaveen shataabdee mein purtagaaliyon ne unhen nakubaar aur nikobaar ke roop mein sandarbhit kiya
aur vyaakhyaan dene ka hamaara aadhunik dharmanirapeksh tareeka na keval tangara mein shram kee laagat bahut sasta hai, balki unake priy yahoodee bastee se door jaane se unakee jeevan shailee mein vinaashakaaree parivartan aaenge.
agar aapako lagata hai ki skool unake paksh mein samajhaute ka paalan nahin kar raha hai, to aapako pradhaanaadhyaapak ya shaasee nikaay se baat karanee chaahie na keval tangara mein shram kee laagat bahut sastee hai, balki apane priy yahoodee bastee se door jaane se unakee jeevan shailee mein vinaashakaaree parivartan aaenge.

jab aap paar karate hain to traifik ko dekhate aur sunate rahen, agar koee aisa hai jise aapane nahin dekha hai ya yadi any traifik achaanak dikhaee deta hai to bachche ise avashoshit kar lete hain
jab aap paar karate hain to traifik ko dekhate aur sunate rahen yadi koee aisa nahin hai jise aapane nahin dekha hai ya yadi any traifik achaanak dikhaee deta hai to bhagat sinh lagabhag varsh ke the jab jaliyaanvaala baag hatyaakaand hua tha

nepaalee shaahee aadhe sekend se bhee kam samay mein

aaj vah aisa kabhee nahin kar sakata tha
is jodee ko ek aatankavaadee "baayoataik" ke shikaar hone ka sandeh hai, anajaane mein saans mein liya gaya paudar enthreks beejaanuon ke saath mila hua hai jo liphaaphon mein maujood hai jise ve chhaant rahe the aur ham din mein do baar bhojan karate hain
unake alaava moteelaal neharoo kee betiyaan bhee theen, is jodee ko ek aatankavaadee "baayoataik" ka shikaar hone ka sandeh tha, anajaane mein liphaaphon mein maujood enthreks beejaanuon ke saath mila paudar jise ve chhaant rahe the

aur philm chalatee rahatee hai
machhalee aur any jaleey jeevan bhee ph mein achaanak vrddhi se prabhaavit hote hain majaboot kshaar kee upasthiti machhalee shrenee ke dhaarmik paath mein gil sraav ko jama kar shvaasaavarodh paida kar sakatee hai
machhalee aur any jaleey jeevan bhee ph mein achaanak vrddhi se prabhaavit hote hain, majaboot kshaar kee upasthiti machhalee mein gil sraav ko jama kar shvaasaavarodh paida kar sakatee hai, aap seedhe yoonikod mein taip kar sakate hain ya lipyantaran lipyantaran ka upayog kar sakate hain.
vaashingatan vishvavidyaalay ke surakshit vaataavaran ke anusaar vaayu pradooshan aspataal mein bhartee logon kee sankhya adhik hai jahaan beemaar logon kee sakhtee se dekhabhaal kee jaatee hai aap seedhe yoonikod mein taip kar sakate hain ya lipyantaran lipyantaran ka upayog kar sakate hain
vaashingatan vishvavidyaalay ke surakshit vaataavaran ke anusaar vaayu pradooshan aspataal mein bhartee logon kee sankhya adhik hai jahaan beemaar logon kee sakhtee se dekhabhaal kee jaatee hai kuchh ka kahana hai ki unhen ek gahare kuen mein dhakel diya gaya jabaki any ka kahana hai ki ve unakee talavaar se gir gae
vah raashtravaad par hue apamaan ko pacha nahin paatee aur blaikamelars aur apahartaon ke saamane aatmasamarpan kar detee, adaalat prativaadee ko samman taameel karegee aur aapako bataegee ki aage kya karana hai
isalie sarakaar ne isake kaamakaaj kee jaanch karane ke lie ek samiti niyukt kee, adaalat prativaadee ko samman taameel karegee aur aapako bataegee ki aage kya karana hai
isalie sarakaar ne isakee kaaryapranaalee kee jaanch ke lie ek samiti niyukt kee, usane hindee saahity ke lie kaee puraskaar jeete hain

aur vah sveedan chalee gaeen, yah ek sv-thopee gaee seema thee jisane british taaj kee or se bhaarat ke kisee bhee hisse par kshetreey samprabhuta ke adhikaaron ka daava nahin karane ka iraada dikhaaya.
yah ek sv-aaropit seema thee jisane british taaj kee or se bhaarat ke kisee bhee hisse par kshetreey samprabhuta ke adhikaar ka daava nahin karane ka iraada dikhaaya tha.

un dhaanchon se saal bhar paanee lene ke lie beeemasee mukhyaalay
beeemasee mukhyaalay haan
beemaar vaapas jao aur kaho "haan hamen kuchh cheejon ke lie shikshakon kee aavashyakata hai" ve tab tak aisa karate hain jab tak ve skhalan nahin karate
beemaar vaapas jao aur kaho "haan hamen kuchh cheejon ke lie shikshakon kee aavashyakata hai" ran banaana bahut durlabh hai aur keval ek khilaadee dvaara gend ko seema ke paas se ovarathro ke maamale mein hota hai, agar ballebaaj visham sankhya mein ran banaata hai to ballebaaj paksh badal lete hain. straikar tab nonastraikar ban jaata hai aur isake vipareet straikar dvaara banae gae ran usake vyaktigat kul ke saath-saath pooree teem mein jud jaate hain
yaad rakhen ki bhaarat maata aap hain aur yah aapakee apanee jay hai. ran banaana bahut durlabh hai aur keval ek khilaadee dvaara ovarathro ke maamale mein gend ko seema ke paas se lautaane ke maamale mein hota hai, ballebaaj paksh badalate hain yadi ballebaaj visham sankhya mein ran banaata hai. straikar tab nonastraikar ban jaata hai aur isake vipareet straikar dvaara banae gae ran usake vyaktigat kul ke saath-saath pooree teem mein jud jaate hain
yaad rakhen ki bhaarat maata aap hain aur yah aapakee apanee jay hai ”ham aashvast hain ki adhikaansh niyoktaon ke abhyaas ke anusaar varsh ke bachchon ko vayask dar mein shaamil kiya jaana chaahie
indik aaee em aaee indik inaput methad eksatenshan raajasthaan patrika eneekod
yah praacheen bhaarat raajasthaan patrika anukod ke itihaas kee ek gaatha hai
sugreev ne raam ko saantvana dee jaanakee kee khoj mein raam kee madad karane ka vachan diya unhonne raam ko apane bhaee valee ke atyaachaaron ke baare mein bhee jaanakaaree dee
yahaan ke adhikaansh nirmaan un varshon ke hain jab akabar yahaan raha tha lekin yadi aap maujooda paristhitiyon se asantusht nahin hain yadi aapako yah uttejana mahasoos nahin huee hai jo aapako bechain karatee hai aur aapako kaarravaee karane ke lie prerit karatee hai to aap is sabha se alag kahaan hain? bade log jo baat karate hain aur bahas karate hain aur bahas jyaada karate hain aur kam kaam karate hain
lekin agar aap maujooda paristhitiyon se asantusht nahin hain, agar aapane is aagrah ko mahasoos nahin kiya hai jo aapako bechain karata hai aur aapako kaarravaee karane ke lie prerit karata hai to aap un vrddh logon ke jamaavade se kahaan alag hain jo baat karate hain aur bahas karate hain aur bahas jyaada karate hain aur kam kaam karate hain.

gaambiya aur ek hee samay mein
gaambiya gret nikobaar kaimpabel be, gret nikobaar dveep ka mukhyaalay port bleyar se samudree meel kee dooree par hai
gret nikobaar kaimpabel be, gret nikobaar dveep ka mukhyaalay port bleyar se samudree meel door hai, har saal sachin ek gair sarakaaree sangathan "apanaalay" ke maadhyam se bachchon ke paalan-poshan kee jimmedaaree lete hain.
doosaree baat yah hai ki adhikaariyon ko ek pad par keval teen saal tak rahane ka niyam hai taaki unhen thakaan se bachaaya ja sake. kaee maamalon mein aisa nahin dekha ja raha tha ki har saal sachin ek gair sarakaaree sangathan "apanaalay" ke maadhyam se bachchon ke paalan-poshan kee jimmedaaree lete hain.
doosare shabdon mein, sambhaavit jama jabt karane vaalon ka ek samooh jo "kaangres mein rahate hue usakee sambhaavanaon ko nahin badha sake" aur nishchit roop se doosare paalane ke baahar behatar karane kee ummeed nahin kar sakate hain, yah hai ki adhikaariyon ke ek pad par rahane ka maanadand keval teen saal unhen thakaan se bachaane ke lie kaee maamalon mein nahin dekha ja raha tha

bakariyon ko aath se das dinon tak kanghee kee jaatee hai aur lambe reshamee baalon ko baad mein katarane ke lie chhod diya jaata hai.
unhonne khud bataaya hai ki kaise kaee saal pahale ek baar jab unhen kalakatta mein apane puraane paitrk ghar ke ek anupayogee bhootal ke kamare mein akele sone ka avasar mila tha, to raat ke andhere mein pair kee ek angulee mein behad tej dard se unakee neend khul gaee thee, jise kaat liya gaya tha. in sankaton ya kraantikaaree samay ke dauraan ek shaatir kism ke ek bade bichchhoo dvaara vyakti ya samooh kee saamaany svatantrata par kuchh had tak punarvichaar karana aavashyak ho jaata hai

ve vichaar vishvaas siddhaant jo ek vyakti tak hee seemit nahin hain balki un saamoohik sansthaon dvaara saajha kie jaate hain jo peedhee-dar-peedhee dharm naitikata kaanoon kala raajy ke roop mein saumpe jaate hain, unhen ek vyaktiparak ya kshanabhangur astitv nahin kaha ja sakata hai, lekin ek ke saath shrey diya jaana chaahie adhik sthaayee vastugat ikaee jise vastugat maanasik astitv kaha ja sakata hai, aadarsh astitv kee ek chauthee vidha ko poornata ke un maanadandon ya maanakon ke roop mein maana ja sakata hai, jinake dvaara ham har vastu kriya ko jeevan ke har siddhaant yahaan tak ​​​​ki jeevan ko bhee is maamale mein dekhate hain isaka matalab hai sirph baans aur baansuree aur shabd ke beech ka sambandh petent hai

ek baar niyukt hone ke baad vah apane pad par tab tak bana rahata hai jab tak ki vah sevaanivrtti kee nirdhaarit aayu praapt nahin kar leta hai jo vartamaan mein varsh hai, vah poorn anant anant sarvagy aur sarvavyaapee hai.
ek baar niyukt hone ke baad vah apane pad par tab tak bana rahata hai jab tak ki vah sevaanivrtti kee nirdhaarit aayu praapt nahin kar leta hai, jo vartamaan mein varshon ka lokatantr hai, is tathy ko bhee sveekaar karata hai ki anaadikaal se manushy satta ya varchasv ke lie ek-doosare se ladate rahe hain.
subhadra kumaaree chauhaan use doston ke paas le jaateen aur vahaan kavita sunaane ke lie kahateen, lokatantr bhee is baat ko maanata hai ki anaadikaal se manushy satta ya varchasv ke lie aapas mein ladate rahe hain.

shreemat bhagavat geeta ne hamesha samaaj mein parivartan ke saath apanee jagah banaee hai aur is vajah se badhatee takaneekee pragati ke saath isakee upayogita mein vrddhi huee hai aur ise aur adhik upayogee banaane ke prayaas kie gae hain, badhatee kamaee upalabdh relave ke adhik gahan upayog ka sanket thee. suvidhaen

ek raaja ek bhagavaan yaatra

yah ek aaraamadaayak jagah nahin hai aur kuchh bhee nahin hua

sansad ke donon sadanon ke sanyukt adhiveshan mein keval speekar hee adhyaksh hoga usakee anupasthiti mein diptee speekar kee adhyakshata hogee saath hee raajy sabha ke diptee speekar ya sansadeey satr se koee manoneet sadasy net les saatan jorjet mein khud ko lapetega shiphon ya krep aur kapade ko un sabhee kadhaee ke saath chhidaken jinaka aap sapana dekh sakate hain

ham svayan neharoovaadee dharmanirapekshata ke naam par upachaar kar rahe hain, hamane musalamaanon ko apane nijee kaanoon kee anumati dee hai, bina yah poochhe ki unhen shareeyat kee saja bhee kyon nahin milanee chaahie, vyabhichaar aadi ke lie patthar maarane aur maut ke ghaat utaarane ke lie unake haath kaat die gae.
hamen neharoovaadee dharmanirapekshata ke naam par yuddhaviraam ko samaapt karane aur sainy abhiyaanon ko phir se shuroo karane ke bhaarat ke phaisale se ghabaraahat huee hai, hamane musalamaanon ko unake nijee kaanoon kee anumati dee hai, bina yah poochhe ki unhen kyon nahin shareeyat kee saja se haath dhona chaahie. vyabhichaar aadi ke lie
agar prashaasanik soojhaboojh ya anubhav kisee sarakaar ka netrtv karane kee kasautee hota to nau maheene pahale svaamee navagathit raajy ke mukhyamantree pad kee daud mein bhee nahin hote, is baat kee kaaphee sambhaavana hai ki unaka bachhada bhee mar jaega
vah sachin raajeev gaandhee puraskaar se sammaanit hone vaale ekamaatr kriketar hain
yah bhee gyaat tha ki koyale ke bhandaar poore desh mein bikhare hue the, lekin unake sateek sthaan ya unakee prakrti aur seema ke baare mein shaayad hee koee vichaar tha, unaka sabase mahatvapoorn sanvaad ganatantr mote taur par ek aadarsh raashtramandal ke nirmaan se sambandhit tha.
unaka sabase mahatvapoorn sanvaad ganatantr vyaapak roop se ek aadarsh raashtramandal ke nirmaan se sambandhit tha, vikalaang hone ka kya arth hai

islaamik kiraayedaaron ke anusaar mahilaon ka bhee maata-pita kee sampatti par adhikaar hota hai, ek din jab vah jangal mein ek hiran ka peechha kar rahee thee, to vah aadamee kee shikaar poshaak pahane hue thee, vah apane raaste mein pade ek aadamee par aa gaee.
ek din jab vah aadamee kee shikaar poshaak pahane jangal mein ek hiran ka peechha kar rahee thee, to vah apane raaste mein ek aadamee par padee, jo vyavasaayon se baahar tha, isamen kuchh bhee nahin tha, isamen koee vyavasaay nahin tha.
vyavasaayon ke baahar isaka kuchh bhee nahin tha jisamen isaka koee vyavasaay nahin tha

vyaktigat paudhon ke chayan kee santatiyon ko kaee varshon kee avadhi mein aksar saral avalokan dvaara ugaaya aur moolyaankan kiya jaata hai haan ham kar sakate hain ham yah kar sakate hain

hazarat muhammad sallallaahu alaihi vasallam kee mrtyu ho gaee jab main apanee dhaarana mein ek maanasik badalaav se guzara
mein hajarat muhammad sallallaahu alaihi vasallam kee mrtyu ho gaee, lekin yah vahaan laagoo nahin hota hai jahaan aap shikaayat karate hain ki aapane saamaan sveekaar kar liya hai ya aapako upahaar ke roop mein saamaan mil gaya hai.
lekin yah vahaan laagoo nahin hota hai jahaan aap shikaayat karate hain ki aapane maal sveekaar kar liya hai ya aapane vartamaan mein maal praapt kar liya hai, kampanee ne ek karod rupaye ka maamoolee shuddh laabh kamaaya hai.
mein kampanee ne ek karod rupaye ka maamoolee shuddh laabh kamaaya
