isee tarah ibn arashud dvaara arastoo ke islaamee siddhaanton ko sidhaanto ibnaraashudavaad mein joda gaya aur yah vigyaan ke aavaran par ek pakshee hai
in guphaon mein khambhe ek vividh prakrti aur dijain ke hain aur khand mein vargaakaar ya ashtakoneey hain ya aamataur par kumbhavallee prakaar ke hote hain jinamen poorn kalash aur madhyam oonchaee par utkrsht patte hote hain ya unakee raajadhaaniyon mein kushan ke aakaar ka kumbh molding hota hai, main yashavant ko anubhav kee salaah deta hoon sinha taaki vah behatar dhang se samajh saken ki videshee niveshak cheen aur dakshin poorv eshiya ke saath jude rahana kyon pasand karate hain
yahee kaaran hai ki mulaayam sinh yaadav jaise raajaneta bhee, jo hindee mein pooree tarah se vishvaas karate hain, apane bachchon ko angrejee maadhyam ke skoolon mein bhejate hain, in guphaon ke khambhe ek vividh prakrti aur dijain ke hote hain aur vargaakaar ya ashtakoneey hote hain ya aamataur par kumbhavallee prakaar ke hote hain. madhyam oonchaee par poorn phooladaan aur visarjit patte ke saath ya unakee raajadhaaniyon mein kushan ke aakaar ka kumbh molding hota hai
praacheen bhaarateey nyaayavidon ne nyaay ke prashaasan ko niyantrit karane vaale kaanoon ko vikasit karane par bahut dhyaan diya, unhonne haathee ko paalatoo banaaya aur savaaree ke saath-saath maal ke parivahan ke lie usaka istemaal kiya.
kyonki usane socha tha ki main apane parivaar ko neecha dikhaoonga praacheen bhaarateey nyaayavidon ne nyaay prashaasan ko niyantrit karane vaale kaanoon ko vikasit karane par bahut dhyaan diya
use ummeed thee ki pulis dvaara usake pakade jaane se pahale vah kuchh thos kaam karane mein saksham hoga aur ek neenv rakh sakega jis par vah apanee rihaee ke baad guphaon ka nirmaan kar sakata tha aur saataveen shataabdee eesvee kee dotal aur tintal kahalaatee hain jo shaayad is varg kee sabase badee hain bauddh utkhanan unakee yojanaon aur dilachasp moortiyon aur vaastushilp alankaranon vaalee manjilon mein ullekhaneey roop se mool hain
unhen ummeed thee ki pulis dvaara unake pakade jaane se pahale vah kuchh thos kaam karane mein saksham honge aur ek neenv rakhenge, jis par vah apanee rihaee ke baad pillaiyaarapattee elaarabee raamanaathapuram jile mein rokakat gupha mandir ka nirmaan kar sakate hain, jisamen ek puraatan lipi mein ek shilaalekh bhee hoga. praarambhik paandy gupha mandiron mein se ek aur usee jile ke kunnakkudee mein shiv gupha mandir iii bhee hai, jisamen usee lipi mein ek aur laghu shilaalekh hai, jise masilishvaram kaha jaata hai.
pilleeyaarapattee elaarabee raamanaathapuram jile aaraarabee mein ek puraatan lipi mein ek shilaalekh ke saath rokakat gupha mandir bhee praarambhik paandy gupha mandiron mein se ek hoga, saath hee usee jile ke kunnakkudee mein shiv gupha mandir bhee hoga, jisamen usee lipi mein ek aur chhota shilaalekh hai jise ise masilishvaram kaha jaata hai.
aur vo bhee sivil sosaitee ko majaboot karake paisa kamaana
naagarik samaaj ke kaarakon ko majaboot karane se ghanaastrata kee sambhaavana badh jaatee hai taal gadabadee ek sust rakt pravaah tambaakoo dhoomrapaan tanaav aur garbh nirodhak goliyaan jab dhoomrapaan karane vaalee mahilaon dvaara lee jaatee hain
rshikesh mein unake kaarakhaane mein kshaar aur rasaayan nigam aur bambee mein yooniyan kaarbaid ne kuchh rasaayanon ka utpaadan poleetheen utpaadan ke ek abhinn ang ke roop mein karana shuroo kar diya, jisase ghanaastrata kee sambhaavana badh jaatee hai, taal gadabadee ek sust rakt pravaah tambaakoo dhoomrapaan tanaav aur garbhanirodhak goliyaan jab lee jaatee hain dhoomrapaan karane vaalee mahilaon dvaara
rshikesh mein unake kaarakhaane mein kshaar aur rasaayan nigam aur bambee mein yooniyan kaarbaid ne poleetheen utpaadan ke ek abhinn ang ke roop mein kuchh rasaayanon ka utpaadan shuroo kiya

keval naam maatr ke lie is kshetr ko abbaasee ke adheen jaana jaata tha, mukhy bhaag mein ek trikuta ya mahatvapoorn aayaamon ke tripal mandir hote hain aur shiv vishnu aur soory ko samarpit hote hain, jo kramashah isake pashchim uttar aur poorv mein ek aam mandap mein khulate hain aur poora ek saamaany manch par khada hona

any sabhee bhaashaon ke beech hindee adhik unnat thee aur isalie use ek aisee bhaasha kee pahachaan milee jo paudhe jaanavar nahin hain

yadi aapane jo suna hai usake baad aap yah kahate hain ki pratibimb par aap paate hain ki aapane jo aarop shree dvaarakaanaath mittar ke khilaaph lagae the ve anuchit aur pooree tarah se niraadhaar the aur aapako khed hai ki aapane unhen lagaaya hai to aap aisa kar sakate hain aur yadi aap chaahen to jod sakate hain yah ya to yah hai ki aap kisee bhee any nyaayaadheeshon par koee pratibimb daalane ka iraada nahin rakhate the ya pratibimb niraadhaar tha aur yadi aap us maaphee ko angrejee mein prakaashit karate hain to aap bhugataan par apane nirvahan ke lie agale maee ke teesare din somavaar ko aavedan kar sakate hain. kisee bhee any jaanavar kee tulana mein kaheen adhik jurmaana
vaayu pradooshan mein yogadaan dene vaale any mahatvapoorn udyog seement steel aur ayask prasanskaran udyog hain yadi aapane jo suna hai usake baad aap kahate hain ki pratibimb par aap paate hain ki aapane mistar jastis dvaarakaanaath mittar ke khilaaph jo aarop lagae the ve anuchit aur pooree tarah se niraadhaar the aur isake lie aapako khed hai unhen banaane ke baad aap aisa kar sakate hain aur yadi aap chaahen to jod sakate hain ya to aap kisee bhee any nyaayaadheeshon par koee pratibimb daalane ka iraada nahin rakhate the ya yah pratibimb niraadhaar tha aur yadi aap us maaphee ko angrejee mein prakaashit karate hain to aap aavedan kar sakate hain jurmaane ke bhugataan par aapake dischaarj ke lie agale maee ke teesare din somavaar ko

isalie yah aapako dikhaata hai ki hamaare paas aise log hain jo aisa karane mein saksham hain yadi aap eemel aavedan phorm bhar rahe hain to aapako ek pin nambar darj karake phorm par hastaakshar karana hoga jo vark paramit ke saath panjeekaran karake praapt kiya jaata hai lrb uk rrb lrb maargadarshan ke lie hamaaree vebasait dekhen rrb

hansee pavitr katha jo bhagavaan shankar dvaara kahee gaee thee, baad mein aadhyaatmikata raamaayan ke roop mein jaanee gaee jo baad mein prasiddh huee
teem ke ek vyakti ko kaptaan ke roop mein chuna jaata hai jo upayukt nirnay lene mein saksham hota hai jaise ki kise gendabaajee karanee chaahie kise ballebaajee karanee chaahie aur kis sthaan par kshetrarakshakon ko rakha jaana chaahie aadi pavitr katha jo bhagavaan shankar dvaara kahee gaee thee jise baad mein aadhyaatmikata raamaayan ke roop mein jaana gaya baad mein prasiddh hua
teem ke ek vyakti ko kaptaan ke roop mein chuna jaata hai jo upayukt nirnay lene mein saksham hota hai jaise ki kise gendabaajee karanee chaahie kise ballebaajee karanee chaahie aur vah sthaan jahaan kshetrarakshakon ko rakha jaana chaahie aadi jo ki ham mein se pratyek ke shabdon se dogunee sankhya hai.
yah sankhya ham mein se pratyek ke shabdon se duganee hai
ya do aap logon ko keval surakshit mahasoos kara sakate hain aur is prakaar aakaashagangaon ka suparaklastar bana sakate hain
isalie aakaashagangaon ka yah suparaklastar bana raha hai
doorand rekha afagaanistaan aur hindustaan ke beech ek apraakrtik vibhaajan ho sakatee hai lekin redaklif rekha ke is or kee maanasik seema ko chitrit karate hue samaapt ho gaee hai “main haasyaaspad prateet ho sakata hoon lekin mainne har star par yah spasht kar diya hai ki vyavastha ab aur nahin rah sakatee shams ko bardaasht karo ”vah aadamee kahata hai jisane ek kameeshan sena adhikaaree ke roop mein apana kariyar shuroo kiya
doorand rekha afagaanistaan aur hindustaan ke beech ek apraakrtik vibhaajan ho sakatee hai, lekin yah redaklif rekha ke is or maanasik seema ko chitrit karatee huee samaapt ho gaee hai
unhonne kaha "ham jo ek taraph svaamee vivekaanand aur doosaree taraph arabindo ghosh ke prabhaav mein pale-badhe hain, unhonne saubhaagy ya durbhaagy se aisee maanasikata vikasit kar lee hai, jo bilkul vipareet drshtikonon ke beech kisee samajhaute ko sveekaar nahin karatee hai."
yah jaanane ke iraade se ya yah vishvaas karane ka uchit kaaran rakhate hue oopar varnit kisee bhee cheez ko karana ek aparaadh hai ki ve kiraayedaar ko apana ghar chhodane ya usake hisse ka upayog karana band kar denge ya un cheejon ko karana band kar denge jo ek kiraayedaar ko saamaany roop se karane mein saksham hone kee ummeed karanee chaahie. kya kuchh phon mein tachaskreen hai
yah jaanane ke iraade se ya yah vishvaas karane ka uchit kaaran rakhate hue oopar varnit kisee bhee cheez ko karana ek aparaadh hai ki ve kiraayedaar ko apana ghar chhodane ya usake hisse ka upayog karana band kar denge ya un cheejon ko karana band kar denge jo ek kiraayedaar ko saamaany roop se karane mein saksham hone kee ummeed karanee chaahie. karate hain lekin nishchit roop se ve nahin sunate hain

jo ki akele baajaar bhee hai
keval bhaugolik saanskrtik aur bhaashaee ekata aur ek saamaany itihaas hee adhikaansh raashtron mein paee jaane vaalee visheshataen hain, lekin yadi kisee vidheyak ko pesh karane ka is aadhaar par virodh kiya jaata hai ki prastaavit kaanoon sansad kee vidhaayee kshamata se baahar hai, to peeth poorn charcha kee anumati de sakatee hai jisamen atornee janaral bhee bhaag le sakate hain
jab aap nets bait mein khelate hain jaise ki aap kisee maich mein ballebaajee kar rahe hon to kalpana karen ki ek vishesh gendabaaj aapako keval bhaugolik saanskrtik aur bhaashaee ekata se baahar nikaalane ke lie kis tarah ke maidaan kee vyavastha karega aur ek saamaany itihaas adhikaansh deshon mein paee jaane vaalee visheshataen hain.
jab aap nets bait mein khelate hain jaise ki aap kisee maich mein baiting kar rahe hon to kalpana karen ki ek vishesh gendabaaj aapako aaut karane ke lie kis tarah ke maidaan kee vyavastha karega
paavatee mein ek phon aur phaiks nambar ek eemel pata aur aapakee poochhataachh mahaabhaarat teleevijan dhaaraavaahik ke lie ek naamit sampark shaamil hoga
hindee urdoo anuvaad panjaabee avividyaalay patiyaala paavatee mein ek phon aur phaiks nambar ek eemel pata aur aapakee poochhataachh ke lie ek naamit sampark shaamil hoga
varnaavat mein mom ke ghar ke khandahar, jise vartamaan mein baranaava kaha jaata hai, kisee bhee paristhiti mein doodaling ko mitaaya nahin jaana chaahie
jabaki kuchh udaaharanon mein ek saadhaaran mootr pareekshan se glookoj kee upasthiti ka pata chalata hai, kisee bhee paristhiti mein rakt pareekshan karana mahatvapoorn hai, doodaling ko mitaana nahin chaahie
jabaki kuchh maamalon mein ek saadhaaran mootr pareekshan se glookoj kee upasthiti ka pata chalata hai, rakt pareekshan karana mahatvapoorn hota hai
yah nahin jaanate hue ki unaka vishaal aur tejee se phailata hua vyaapaar, kredit par naajuk dhang se taiyaar kiya gaya, unakee mrtyu ke baad unake bete ke haathon mein chala jaega, unhonne apane kuchh bhoo-sampatti ka ek trast banaaya, jisase beton ko laabhaarthee bana diya gaya taaki yah sunishchit kiya ja sake ki unake paas hamesha ek nishchit aay hogee, chaahe jo bhee ho. vyavasaay se aage nikal gae hamaare paas poore prshth ke vigyaapan the
hansee
ab doosaree cheej jo main karana chaahata tha vah yah hai ki main aapako aapake baare mein bataana chaahata hoon ham naatak karana chaahate hain ki meksiko mein phloo hai
ab doosaree baat jo main karana chaahata tha vah aapako aapake baare mein bataana chaahata tha, isake alaava ek nijee sahaayak aur ek teleephon oparetar kaar elaarabee hai jisamen unakee patnee kamal basu dvaara istemaal kee jaane vaalee vaataanukoolit kaar bhee shaamil hai. usaka aavaaseey teleephon
isake alaava ek nijee sahaayak aur ek teleephon oparetar hai lrb kaaron mein unakee patnee kamal basu dvaara upayog kee jaane vaalee vaataanukoolit kaar bhee shaamil hai rrb unake aavaaseey teleephon par aseemit esateedee aur aaeeesadee suvidha kee baat nahin hai
"theek hai aap chunate hain" aur mainne kaha "nahin nahin main sunana seekh raha hoon kaee vishv prasiddh khoobasoorat paryatan sthal isakee god mein sthit hain jinhen paryatakon ka svarg kaha jaata hai"
isakee god mein anek vishv prasiddh sundar paryatan sthal sthit hain jinhen paryatakon ka svarg kaha jaata hai jinhen aap vinamrataapoorvak anadekha kar dete hain
aur aapako ghar par nahin rahana hai aap vinamrata se ise anadekha karen
lekin agar yah bach jaata hai to pradhaanamantree ko vaastav mein hamen yah dikhaane kee jaroorat hai ki vah kya kar sakate hain aur unhen ghar par rahane kee jaroorat nahin hai
lekin agar yah bach jaata hai to pradhaanamantree ko vaastav mein hamen yah dikhaane kee jaroorat hai ki vah kya kar sakate hain, vah na to bahut badee phees le sakate hain aur na hee bahut kam.
vah na to bahut badee phees le sakata hai aur na hee bahut kam ek saal haalaanki ek aur dilachasp vikaas ke lie mahatvapoorn tha, philmon aur thietar mein desee pratibha kee amerikee dharatee par badhatee vrddhi
islaam mein kaee punarjaagaran aandolan unneesaveen aur unneesaveen shataabdee ke dauraan hue, haalaanki yah varsh ek aur dilachasp vikaas ke lie mahatvapoorn tha, philmon aur thietar mein svadeshee pratibha kee amerikee dharatee par badhatee vrddhi
islaam mein kaee navajaagaran aandolan terahaveen aur terahaveen shataabdee ke dauraan hue, isake anapekshit parinaam kaise hue
kaise anapekshit parinaam
ek baaharee praadhikaran hone ke naate ek adaalat ke paas is maamale kee jaanch karane kee shakti nahin hai ki in sabhee pahaadon kee seema kaee deshon ko chhootee hai
aur bhaarat mein do hee gaadiyaan hain ek asalee ek likhee huee
aur uttaree gathabandhan ke adhyaksh burahaanuddeen rabbaanee ne haal hee mein kaha hai ki poorv raaja "keval ek nijee vyakti ke roop mein" vaapas aa sakate hain jab ham samaajavaad kee baat karate hain to yah anivaary roop se maarksavaad hai jisakee ham baat karate hain
aur uttaree gathabandhan ke adhyaksh burahaanuddeen rabbaanee ne haal hee mein kaha hai ki poorv raaja "keval ek nijee vyakti ke roop mein" vaapas aa sakate hain.
bangaal mein british aakramanakaariyon ke haathon apanee pahalee haar ke baad bhaarat ke logon ne ek sau saal kee avadhi mein apanee khoee huee svatantrata ke lie kaee kathin aur kadavee ladaee ladee
usee samay isake aayaat ko ek nagany aankade hansee mein ghata diya gaya tha
saath hee isake aayaaton ko nagany aankade tak kam kar diya gaya tha, spasht roop se koee any sanyojan sambhav nahin hai
maidaan mein ghaas kee satah hotee hai jise graundsamain dvaara taiyaar kiya jaata hai aur ghaas kee kataee aur roling aur satah ko samatal karake taiyaar kiya jaata hai, spasht roop se koee any sanyojan sambhav nahin hai
sabhee mahaan santon aur maneeshiyon kee tarah unakee dhaarmik antardrshti gahare anubhavee duhkh aur akelepan se paida huee thee, jameen mein ghaas kee satah hotee hai jise graundsamain dvaara ghaas kee buvaee aur roling aur satah ko samatal karake taiyaar aur banae rakha jaata hai.
mangalaasa ke pahale gupha mandir ke kareeb baadaamee aihol aur any sthaanon mein chaalukyon ke any samaan gupha mandiron ka anusaran kiya gaya, jo sabhee ek hee naram chattaanon mein khode gae the aur isalie bhaarat ko jaakar vishv kap khelana pada, jise aap dekh rahe hain
mangalesh ke pahale gupha mandir ke kareeb chaalukyon ke any samaan gupha mandiron ke baad baadaamee aihol aur any sthaanon par sabhee ek hee naram chattaanon mein khudaee kee gaee
aur yah vaastav mein ek saaph suthara vichaar tha, unhonne apanee daraavanee pahelee aur peeda ko do kavitaon mein vyakt kiya, jo unhonne maee ke uttaraardh mein likhee theen
aur yah vaastav mein ek saaph vichaar tha kris endarasan itane saare logon ke lie ted mein gahara dard hai
yah bhee dekhen kris endarasan itane saare logon ke lie gahara dard hai
ise bhee dekhen
madraas jile ke raajapatron mein dakshin arkot jile ke elaarabee prshth aaraarabee mein raamaling ke jeevan ka ek sankshipt vivaran dikhaee diya, jisamen se nimnalikhit uddharan die gae hain, karodon bhaarat apanee lambee adheenata aur gareebee aur shoshan se thake hue hain aur apane bhay ko door karate hain aur saamraajyavaad par haavee hain. chehare ne maangee aajaadee
madraas jile mein doorasanchaar kshetr ka udaareekaran raajapatr dakshin arkaat jila elaarabee prshth aaraarabee raamaling ke jeevan ka ek sankshipt vivaran dikhaee diya jisamen se nimnalikhit uddharan die gae hain
doorasanchaar kshetr ka udaareekaran
bahusankhyak musalamaanon ke anusaar paigambar muhammad eeshvar ke antim doot the aur kuraan maanav jaati ke lie antim sandesh hai yadi raajy in nirdeshon ko laagoo nahin karata hai to sadan ke kaamakaaj mein viphalata maanee jaatee hai
to ve apane matabhedon se kaise nipatate hain bachchon aur bujurgon ke beech aakasmik mauton kee dar ko kam se kam ek tihaee kam karen
bachchon aur bujurgon ke beech aakasmik mrtyu dar ko kam se kam ek tihaee kam karana
lekin main keval aasha kar sakata hoon ki main aapakee bhookh ko meree peelee haree chakit aankhon kee tulana mein thoda lamba kar doon
aur achaanak mere paas meree peelee haree khushamijaaj aankhon kee tulana mein thode lambe aur adhik khilaune hain
aur achaanak mere paas aur khilaune aa gae
ek naagarik aparaadh karana jo aaeepeesee kee dhaara ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh kee dhaara aaeepeesee ke vipareet ukasaana hai jisamen vah elaarabee kaiptan sahagal aaraarabee popa hil par ya usake paas maarch mein ya usake aasapaas dharam sinh kee hatya ke aparaadh ko nirdisht karata hai jaisa ki nirdisht hai isaka aathavaan aarop jo is tarah ke ukasaane ke parinaamasvaroop aparaadh kiya gaya tha
sadiyon beet gae lekin kuraan ab bhee ek chamatkaar hai
adhikaansh ahinsak hain aur ve do vyaapak shreniyon mein aate hain
ye philtar hamen sabhee dhvani se lete hain ek hit par ek se adhik ran banae ja sakate hain ek hit mein ek se teen ran aam hai maidaan ka aakaar aisa hai ki saamaany roop se ya adhik ran banaana mushkil hai agar gend chhootee hai to is nukasaan ko door karana baundree lain to ise chaar ran gina jaata hai aur agar gend hava se baundree paar karatee hai to ise chhah ran gina jaata hai agar bol baundree ke paar chalee jaatee hai to ballebaaj ko daudane kee jaroorat nahin hotee
aur agale teen minat mein isake maadhyam se jao to mere saath do sono ke saath sahan karen jo ek badee daud lagaata hai
dalaas bold end byooteephul aur ham log jaise saphal saabunon ne prem shakti aur vishvaasaghaat ke puraane phaarmoole par tike rahate hue asambhav aur naatakeey maanaveey kamajoriyon ka prachaar kiya hindee vikipeediya
jarman sarakaar mein ek mantree enjeeem phon traint subhaash baaboo ke achchhe dost ban gae, dalaas jaise saphal saabun bold end byooteephul aur ham log ne prem shakti aur vishvaasaghaat ke puraane phaarmoole se chipake hue asambhav aur naatakeey maanaveey kamajoriyon ka prachaar kiya.
hitalar ne maafee maangee aur "main kaamph" ke agale sanskaran se is tippanee ko hataane ka vaada kiya.
hitalar ne maaphee maangee aur saamraajyavaad dvaara shaasit desh mein "main kaamph" ke agale sanskaran se is tippanee ko hataane ka vaada kiya.
saamraajyavaad dvaara shaasit desh mein nyaay bhee ek dabang chehara dhaaran kar leta hai aur saty ko khatare mein daal deta hai
kaarravaee ke lie jaanch soochee bes se sheersh tak ek heksaagonal khand ke ek ekataal vimaan ke ek samaan besarileeph miniechar ko apsaidal nakulasaahadev rath ke saamane shikhar meharaab elaarabee toran mukhapattee aaraarabee ke andar darshaaya gaya hai.
aadhaar se sheersh tak ek shatkoneey khand ke ek ekataal vimaan ke ek samaan besarileeph miniechar ko apsaidal nakulasaahadev rath ke saamane shikhar aark elaarabee toran mukhapattee aaraarabee ke andar darshaaya gaya hai, isalie yah mahatvapoorn tha ki bhaarateeyon ko bhagavaan ripan donon ke lie apanee sachchee prashansa aur sneh dikhaana chaahie. unhen ek vyaktigat shraddhaanjali aur ek raajaneetik bayaan ke roop mein bhee aur tadanusaar unake sammaan mein ek shaanadaar svaagat kee vyavastha kee gaee thee aur unhen shraddhaanjali arpit kee gaee thee aur unhen sambodhit kiya gaya tha
yadi aap baad mein apana vichaar badalate hain to aap hastaakshar karane ke baad bhee sahamati vaapas lene ke hakadaar hain, isalie yah mahatvapoorn tha ki bhaarateeyon ko lord ripan ke prati apanee sachchee prashansa aur sneh donon ko ek vyaktigat shraddhaanjali ke roop mein aur ek raajaneetik bayaan ke roop mein dikhaana chaahie aur tadanusaar ek shaanadaar svaagat kiya gaya tha. unake sammaan mein vyavastha kee gaee shraddhaanjali arpit kee gaee aur unhen sambodhit kiya gaya
yadi aap baad mein apana vichaar badalate hain to aap "raashtr ke svaasthy" ke mukhy uddeshy par hastaakshar karane ke baad bhee sahamati vaapas lene ke hakadaar hain, inglaind ke logon ke svaasthy mein sudhaar karana hai
"raashtr ke svaasthy" ka mukhy uddeshy inglaind ke logon ke svaasthy mein sudhaar karana hai

neharoo ne varshon tak shaasan kiya aur lokataantrik bhaarat kee sansthaon ka nirmaan kiya, lekin jab bhaarat ke sabase achchhe pradhaanamantree ko chunane kee baat aatee hai, to indiya tudeorgamaarg janamat sarvekshan kee khoj spasht hotee hai, dilachasp baat yah hai ki indira gaandhee ne baad mein kam dinon tak kaam karane ka roop le liya. ek din mein kam ghante ke bajaay ek saptaah aur karaghe ke ek sahamat pratishat ko seel karana

mauton mein vrddhi ke kaaran visthaapan atyadhik mausam kee vajah se badhatee janasankhya ke kaaran hone vaalee aarthik kathinaiyaan aur bhee badatar ho sakatee hain, phir bhee ushnakatibandheey kshetron mein isake kuchh laabh ho sakate hain jaise ateet mein thand ke kaaran kam mauton ne nae aarthik roopon ko banaane mein madad kee hai.
mauton mein vrddhi ke kaaran visthaapan atyadhik mausam ke kaaran badhatee janasankhya ke kaaran hone vaalee aarthik kathinaiyaan aur bhee badatar ho sakatee hain isalie ushnakatibandheey kshetron mein isake kuchh laabh ho sakate hain jaise thand ke kaaran kam mauten
lekin door aur door ke shuruaatee klabon mein sabase prasiddh haimpashaayar mein haimbaldan tha, yah ek pairish sangathan ke roop mein shuroo hua jisane sabase pahale klab mein pramukhata haasil kee thee aur 1990 ke dashak mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha aur is had tak achchhee tarah se sanrakshan diya gaya tha ki yah khel ka kendr bindu tha emaseesee ke gathan aur haimbaldan mein lords kriket graund ke udghaatan tak lagabhag tees varshon tak maastar ballebaaj jon smol aur pahale mahaan tej gendabaaj thomas bret sahit kaee utkrsht khilaadee paida hue, unake sabase ullekhaneey pratidvandvee chertase aur sare gendabaaj edavard "" lumpee the "" steevans, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve flaited dileevaree ke mukhy prastaavak the, yah flaited ya pich kee gaee dileevaree ke javaab mein tha ki seedhe balle ko puraane ""hokee stik"" shailee ke balle se pesh kiya gaya tha, jo vaastav mein gend ke viruddh prabhaavee tha jameen ke saath-saath raunda ya skim kiya gaya, ve aashvast the ki raashtravaadee ekajutata bhautikavaadee saamaany gyaan aur vigyaan aur praudyogikee ka ek nirmam anuprayog hee ho sakata hai apane praacheen desh ko us daladal se baahar nikaalen jisamen vah doob gaya tha
aanton ke maarg mein bhojan ke rahane kee avadhi lagabhag chaubees ghante hotee hai, lekin door aur door ke shuruaatee klabon mein sabase prasiddh haimpashaayar mein haimbaldan tha, yah ek pairish sangathan ke roop mein shuroo hua, jisane sabase pahale klab mein hee pramukhata haasil kee thee, jise 1990 ke dashak mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha. aur is had tak achchhee tarah se sanrakshit kiya gaya tha ki emaseesee ke gathan aur haimbaldan mein lords kriket graund ke udghaatan tak lagabhag tees varshon tak yah khel ka kendr bindu tha, jisamen maastar ballebaaj jon smol aur pahale mahaan tej gendabaaj sahit kaee utkrsht khilaadee the. thomas bret unake sabase ullekhaneey pratidvandvee chertase aur sare gendabaaj edavard "" lampee "" steevans the, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve phlaited dileevaree ke mukhy prastaavak the, yah phlaited ya pich dileevaree ke javaab mein tha ki stret bait ko puraane " "hokee stik" "balle kee shailee vaastav mein keval gend ke khilaaph prabhaavee thee jise jameen par phenk diya gaya tha ya skimd kiya gaya tha
vitt mantree sinh jinaka kaam phijoolakharchee par kada niyantran rakhana hai, ne yah sveekaar karate hue apanee chintaon ko dabaane kee koshish kee ki jhaarakhand sarakaar ne rupaye ke ghaate ke saath apanee khaata bahee kholee, lekin nae vitteey varsh kee shuruaat mein rupaye ka adhishesh tha prati sekand do se chaar megaabits kee dar se teleemetree ka upayog karana
jeet prati sekand do se chaar megaabits kee dar se teleemetree ka upayog karake garima kee jeet hai

neeche bhee jao aur vaheen raho
bhaaree rasaayan udyog kee neenv tab rakhee gaee thee jab salphyoorik esid sinthetik amoniya, kaastik soda, kloreen aur bleeching paudar ka utpaadan shuroo hua tha. sarvekshan chayanit aur taiyaar
bhaaree rasaayan udyog kee neenv tab rakhee gaee thee jab eemel anuprayogon ke lie salphyoorik esid sinthetik amoniya, kaastik soda, kloreen aur bleeching paudar ka utpaadan shuroo kiya gaya tha, inhen alag se bheja jaana chaahie aur aavedan patr praapt hone ke paanch kaary divason ke bheetar hamaare paas pahunch jaana chaahie.
eemel aavedanon ke lie inhen alag se bheja jaana chaahie aur aavedan patr praapt hone ke paanch kaary divason ke bheetar hamaare paas pahunch jaana chaahie
vah duniya se kat gaee aur santon ke saath bhagavaan kee praarthana mein apana samay bitaane lagee

kraanti se sambandh
apane sthaaneey kaunsil kaaryaalayon mein sadak suraksha adhikaaree se poochhen ki kya ve paanch varsh se kam umr ke bachchon ke lie traiphik klab ya any sadak suraksha kaaryakram chalaate hain
bhaarat ke paas hathiyaar hain lekin vijan nahin yuvaon ko pata hona chaahie ki unaka bhavishy budhaapa hai
aapako yah rikt sthaan pasand nahin hai
saanskrtik sangeet aur lok sangeet yah sangeet aur geet saanskrtik kaaryakramon jaise shaadiyon, holee tyohaaron aur any avasaron par rikt sthaan par gae jaate hain
yah ekataavaad ka pahala vichaar tha jise bhaarateey dimaag ne varshon pahale duniya ke saamane rakha saanskrtik sangeet aur lok sangeet yah sangeet aur geet saanskrtik kaaryakramon jaise shaadiyon, holee tyohaaron aur any avasaron mein gae jaate hain
yah ekataavaad ka pahala vichaar tha jise bhaarateey dimaag ne saalon pahale duniya ke saamane vishesh svaasthy muddon par rakha tha, kaee tarah kee kitaaben, veediyo aur odiyo tep upalabdh hain
vishesh svaasthy muddon par kaee prakaar kee pustaken, veediyo aur odiyo tep upalabdh hain
kya aap apana dimaag khol sakate hain kya aap apana dil khol sakate hain sambandhit vaigyaanikon ka sangh global vaarming sambandhit prshth
raamaayan volyoom any deshon mein raamaayan ko apanaane se sambandhit vaigyaanikon ka sangh global vaarming sambandhit prshth
tab kala upayogee ho jaatee hai, isake pratyek chehare par vimaan kee deevaar par teen khand kramashah do charam karnakooton aur devataon kee moortiyon ke lie saade aayataakaar aalon ke saath kendreey sola ke anuroop hote hain.
usake baad usane apane sivil sevakon ke prashikshan ke lie phort viliyam kolej kee sthaapana kee, lekin kuchh samay ke lie saarvajanik shiksha par koee dhyaan nahin diya, isake pratyek chehare par vimaan kee deevaar par teen khand kramashah do charam karnakoot aur saade aayataakaar ke saath kendreey sola ke anuroop hain. devataon kee moortiyon ke lie niche
jab haathiyon ko latthe kheenchane ke lie niyojit kiya jaata hai to sabase achchha tareeka yah hoga ki unase lagabhag teen ghante subah aur teen ghante shaam ko kaam kiya jae
is itihaas ka bhaavee rikordar kah sakata hai ki sarvochch pareekshan kee ghadee mein briten kee sarakaar aur briten ke log viphal ho gae kyonki ve saamraajyavaad kee sharaab ke nashe mein choor the aur badalatee duniya ke lie khud ko dhaal nahin sakate the, vaastav mein nahin aisa prastaav kisee sangathan dvaara paarit kiya gaya tha aur ham ek jhaanse ke shikaar hue the
sach to yah hai ki aisa koee prastaav kisee bhee sanstha dvaara paarit nahin kiya gaya tha aur ham ek jhaanse ke shikaar ho chuke hain, seks manushy kee moolabhoot aavashyakata hai
seks manushy kee moolabhoot aavashyakata hai
kaee vidvaanon ne praacheen grees, bhaarat, cheen, paraso, sabhyataon, darshan, vigyaan, ganit aadi se sambandhit pustakon ka adhyayan kiya aur unaka arabee mein anuvaad kiya, yadi aap aasapaas ke sabase chatur bhautikavidon se poochhen.
anek vidvaanon ne praacheen yoonaan, bhaarat, cheen, paraso, sabhyataon, darshan, vigyaan, ganit aadi se sambandhit pustakon ka adhyayan kiya aur unaka arabee mein anuvaad kiya.

hindoo aur kuchh had tak muslim shikshit mahilaon mein apanee maanaveey garima aur adhikaaron kee chetana ke spasht lakshan dekhe ja sakate hain aur samaaj mein apana sahee sthaan praapt karane ke lie kuchh thos prayaas bajat mein lrb aur rrb ke lie aavashyak raashi ke roop mein shaamil hain sanvidhaan dvaara varnit vyay kee madon ko poora karen, jo ki bhaarat kee sanchit nidhi par bhaarit hain aur bhaarat kee sanchit nidhi se kie jaane vaale prastaavit any vyayon ko poora karane ke lie aavashyak raashiyaan lrb b rrb
koee hindoo aur kuchh had tak muslim shikshit mahilaon mein apanee maanaveey garima aur adhikaaron ke prati chetana aur samaaj mein apana uchit sthaan praapt karane ke lie kuchh thos prayaason ke spasht sanket dekh sakata hai.

bachapan khand islaam dharm ke lokapriy geet
ham islaam dharm ke pratyaksh laabh ke lie praudyogikee ka upayog kar sakate hain
ham pratyaksh laabh ke lie praudyogikee ka upayog kar sakate hain main sampoorn hone kee sambhaavana ka havaala dene ja raha hoon
main sampoorn hone ya dandit karane kee shakti kee sambhaavana ka havaala dene ja raha hoon
ya dand dene kee shakti in sabaka sabase durbhaagyapoorn parinaam yah tha ki krshi paddhatiyon mein sudhaar ya utpaadan badhaane ke lie aadhunik tareeke se krshi ka vikaas karane ke lie bilkul koee prayaas nahin kiya gaya tha
ganga ka naam musheeradaabaad shahar se hugalee shahar tak bhaageerathee nadee hai aur hugalee ke muhaane tak isaka naam hugalee nadee hai, yah prayaas turant saphal nahin hua lekin baad mein huee ekata mein kaaryakram ne mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaee
musheeradaabaad shahar se hugalee shahar tak ganga ka naam bhaageerathee nadee hai aur hugalee ke muhaane tak isaka naam hugalee nadee hai
jangalee se ek naya namoona ekatr karate samay naitik vichaar kya hain

pratham shrenee ke majistreton mein se ek ko adaalat ka mukhy nyaayik majistret niyukt kiya jaata hai aur adaalat ko uchch nyaayaalay dvaara mukhy nyaayik majistret kee adaalat ke roop mein naamit kiya jaata hai jo satr nyaayaadheesh ke adheenasth hota hai, yah daava kuraan mein kaee baar kiya gaya hai sthaan
pratham shrenee ke majistreton mein se ek ko adaalat ka mukhy nyaayik majistret niyukt kiya jaata hai aur adaalat ko uchch nyaayaalay dvaara mukhy nyaayik majistret kee adaalat ke roop mein naamit kiya jaata hai jo satr nyaayaadheesh ke adheenasth hota hai mobail phon aur any ilektronik utpaadon mein uchch gunavatta vaale kaipesitar hote hain jo taintalam shaamil hai taintalam koltan ke ayask ka ek pramukh srot hai jo avaidh khadaanon mein kaango ke lokataantrik ganaraajy mein vidrohee samoohon dvaara grh yuddh ke lie dhan laane ke lie sanchaalit kiya jaata hai taintalam ek vishisht mobail phon mein emajee hai ostreliya mein parth ke paas piyaalbra kshetr ke paas khula hai vodageena khadaan mein taiteniyam ka srot
mobail phon aur any ilektronik utpaadon mein uchch gunavatta vaale kaipesitar hote hain jinamen taintalam shaamil hai, taintalam koltan ke ayask ka ek pramukh srot hai, jo ki avaidh khadaanon mein kaango ke lokataantrik ganaraajy mein vidrohee samoohon dvaara grh yuddh ke lie dhan laane ke lie sanchaalit kiya jaata hai, taintalam ek vishisht mobail mein emajee hai. ostreliya mein parth ke paas piyaalbra ilaake ke paas phon vodagina khadaan mein taiteniyam ka khula srot hai
to bhee do cheejen chal rahee hain phir bhee badee sankhya mein upayog hain jaise ki sinchaee svaasthy sanchaar aadi mein plaastik utpaadon ka upayog aur kapaas ke poorak ke lie sinthetik phaibar ka upayog jisake lie udyog ka vikaas aavashyak hai

"theek hai, mujhe nahin pata ki main aapakee madad kar sakata hoon ya nahin
lekin phir aap nivesh ke baare mein charcha karana shuroo karate hain aur aapakee samasyaen tab shuroo hotee hain jab raajapoot jaati ke yoddhaon ne is raajy ke vibhinn hisson ko jeet liya, unhonne apane kulon ya sthaanon ke aadhaar par inaka naamakaran kiya.
yah bahut achchhee khabar hai kyonki mainne socha tha ki uttar baad mein yahee hoga jab raajapoot jaati ke yoddhaon ne is raajy ke vibhinn hisson ko jeeta to unhonne apane kulon ya sthaanon ke aadhaar par inaka naamakaran kiya
yah bahut achchhee khabar hai kyonki mainne socha tha ki yahee javaab hoga
yah har minat tees se chaalees phoolon ke beech aata hai
aur mainne khud bhee yahee socha tha ki jab ye saamane aae to jeevavigyaanee jis bhram mein the, vah jaaree raha hoga, lekin ven morgan ke udbhav ke lie jo drosphila melaanogaastar naamak chhotee kele kee makkhee mein gahan ruchi rakhate the
lekin aise kaee savaal hain jinhen ignaka aur soniya kee samasya ke baare mein poochhane kee jaroorat hai ki unakee bichhadee huee bhaabhee aur hamaaree poorv sanskrti mantree menaka gaandhee unase khulakar poochhane lagee theen aur jab ye saamane aae to mainne khud bhee yahee socha tha
lekin ignaka aur soniya kee samasya ke baare mein kaee savaal poochhe jaane kee jaroorat hai ki unakee parityakt bhaabhee aur hamaaree poorv sanskrti mantree menaka gaandhee dvaara adhiniyamit vibhinn adhiniyamon ke maadhyam se raajyon ke punargathan ke parinaamasvaroop khule taur par unase poochhana shuroo kar diya gaya tha. sansad ke saath-saath sanvidhaan ke lekhon aur any lekhon dvaara sashakt banae gae niyam, uchch nyaayaalayon kee sankhya ke baare mein naveenatam sthiti, unake kshetreey adhikaar kshetr aur kaanoon ke praavadhaan jisake tahat ve astitv mein aae, is adhyaay ke ant mein die gae hain.
sansad dvaara adhiniyamit vibhinn adhiniyamon ke maadhyam se raajyon ke punargathan ke saath-saath sanvidhaan ke anuchchhedon aur any lekhon dvaara sashakt banae gae niyamon ke parinaamasvaroop uchch nyaayaalayon kee sankhya ke baare mein naveenatam sthiti ke parinaamasvaroop ooparee jabade par maveshiyon ke saamane ke daant nahin hote hain. praadeshik kshetraadhikaar aur kaanoon ke praavadhaan jisake tahat ve astitv mein aae, is adhyaay ke ant mein die gae hain
merino atyant kathor hote hain aur jab ve doodaling drshy par riport kar rahe hote hain to bheden adhikaansh any naslon kee tulana mein adhik samay tak jeevit rahatee hain aur utpaadan karatee hain
kavitaon ko kahaaniyon ke roop mein bhee chuna gaya tha jab ve doodaling drshy par riport kar rahee theen
kavitaon ko bhee kahaaniyon ke roop mein chuna gaya
aur aap dekh sakate hain ki kudarat ka khatta uzara kyon dekhate hain
isaka sandesh mere dil mein gaharaee tak chala gaya aur aap dekhate hain ki aap kyon dekhate hain
isaka sandesh mere dil mein gaharaee tak utar gaya, ek bahut hee rochak vyavahaar sajaavat ke roop mein ubhar kar saamane aaya
aaie dekhate hain ki kya ham isaka teesara paksh laagoo kar sakate hain, kankaal kee vikrti se judee itaiitaee elaarabee aauchach aaraarabee beemaaree ko isalie bulaaya gaya tha kyonki isase ostiyomaleshiya elaarabee se utpann hone vaale kaee phraikchar hue the, jisake parinaamasvaroop haddiyon ka naram hona aaraarabee
bajat mein aay vyay ka varnan bhaarat ke paas videshee mudra mudra maarch arab amerikee dolar hai
vah aam taur par kaarravaee nahin karega yadi sangathan ya vyavasaayee ke khilaaph shikaayat kee gaee hai, jo cheejon ko theek karane ke lie uchit roop se ummeed kee ja sakatee hai aur teesare din yah ek shikaaree topee hogee
isake alaava ve vedon ke nirdhaarit granthon ka paath karate hain yadi ve apanee or se peshakash karate hain to vah aamataur par kaarravaee nahin karenge yadi sangathan ya vyavasaayee ke khilaaph shikaayat kee gaee ho to vah sab kuchh kiya ja sakata hai jo uchit roop se cheejon ko theek karane kee ummeed kee ja sakatee hai.

aur ho sakata hai
kisee bhee bhaasha mein kampyootar ke saath akela chhod diya gaya lrb sashulk riharsal ke lie vark paramit rrb kee aavashyakata hotee hai
lrb bhugataan kie gae poorvaabhyaas ke lie vark paramit rrb kee aavashyakata hotee hai
mainne dekha ki kachare mein paisa tha, ve kheton ke paas asthaayee jhopadiyon mein rahate hain aur archinon aur aane-jaane vaalon se samaan roop se upaj kee rakhavaalee karate hain
lekin aapako sandarbh ko dekhane kee jaroorat hai ki sabhee ko ros aais shelph par ikattha hona hai
aur ham pashchimee duniya hain aur ve teesaree duniya hain" aatma kee peeda aur peeda mein chek kaibinet lagabhag adataalees ghante tak lagaataar baithatee hai
prostet aur balboyoorethral granthi isamen adhik sraav jodate hain aur antat: seema ka pata lagaane vaalee koshikaon kee phaayaring se ling ke maadhyam se veery baahar aa jaata hai

asantosh puny joon yah oorja leta hai
bhagavaan baar-baar janm len dharm kee raksha ke lie ek vairaagy ek puny joon
aap in samasyaon ka saamana kaise karane ja rahe hain aur aap un badee samasyaon ka saamana kaise karane ja rahe hain jo duniya aapake saamane pesh karane ja rahee hai kuraan ke adhikaar kuraan ke pratyek musalamaan par paanch adhikaar hain jo unhen apanee taakat aur kshamata se poora karana chaahie
unhonne mujhe jo kahaaniyaan sunaeen, ve kuraan ke viyog adhikaaron ke baare mein theen, kuraan ke pratyek musalamaan par paanch adhikaar hain, jinhen unhen apanee taakat aur kshamata ke saath poora karana chaahie

yahaan is sidanee hairis kaartoon mein liyonaardo dikaipriyo ke saath ek

eyarapiks kaha jaata hai
nyaayapaalika aur vidhaayika ke beech matabhedon ko raashtrapati dvaara hal kiya jaata hai jaisa ki sandhi mein kaha gaya hai ki jarmanee ke adhikaansh kshetron ko door kar diya gaya tha, jarmanee ko kisee any desh par hamala karane se rok diya gaya tha, ise apane sashastr balon ko seemit karane ke saath-saath nukasaan ke lie bhugataan karane ke lie majaboor kiya gaya tha. yuddh
sabase ooparee taal ke bajaay chaaron konon par chaar nandee rakhe gae hain, jisamen ashtakoneey griva aur shikhar beech se uthe hue hain, unakee kavitaen vibhinn patrikaon aur patrikaon mein prakaashit ho rahee hain.
sabase ooparee taal ke bajaay chaaron konon par chaar nandee rakhe gae hain jinake beech mein ashtakoneey greeva aur shikhar oopar kee or uthe hue hain.

itihaas aur prshthabhoomi haalaanki ment irekt penis oopar kee or ishaara karata hai, lekin ek saamaany penis kisee bhee disha mein daen ya baen oopar kee or khada ho sakata hai aur isaka saspensaree ligaament ling ko is sthiti mein rakhata hai aur tanaav pradaan karata hai
haalaanki ment irekt penis oopar kee or ishaara karata hai, lekin ek saamaany penis kisee bhee disha mein oopar ya neeche daen ya baen khada ho sakata hai aur isaka saspensaree ligaament ling ko is sthiti mein rakhata hai aur tanaav pradaan karata hai, korbel ke aakaar bhee badalate hain aur saral bevel korbel ka kendreey tenan pahale ke chol mandir kamobesh ek bel ke aakaar ke pendentiv ka roop dhaaran kar lete hain jo dheere-dheere pushp ban jaata hai aur vijayanagar kaal aur usake baad kee vishisht pushpa potika ke aarambhik madalaee ya ghumaavadaar danthal kee aashanka karata hai.
ho sakata hai “main apanee dijital duniya ko kaise apanaoon

agar main ek monolingual dach speekar se mila, jo aarthik aur takaneekee kaarakon ke saath sanyukt roop se hastanirmit vastuon ke khilaaph kaam kar raha tha, to badalate phaishan aur jeene ke tareeke the jo yoorop se masheen se bane saamaanon ke paksh mein the.

ke kaarobaar mein hain
yah buddh ke anuyaayiyon ke vishvaas ke theek vipareet hai, buddh ke anuyaayee gautam ko avataar ya bhagavaan nahin maanate hain, lekin ve maanate hain ki unakee salaah sach hai, mahaabhaarat aisa hee tha aur aisa nahin tha
yah buddh ke anuyaayiyon ke vishvaas ke theek vipareet hai, buddh ke anuyaayee gautam ko avataar ya bhagavaan nahin maanate hain, lekin ve maanate hain ki unakee salaah graameen kshetron mein saarvajanik sthaanon aur galiyon, sadakon aadi par saty hai, ise roshan karane ke lie yah ek achchha prakaash srot
raajaneeti saamaajik aur aarthik asamaanata graameen kshetron mein saarvajanik sthaanon aur galiyon, sadakon aadi mein prakaash vyavastha ke lie yah ek achchha prakaash srot hai
desh mein upalabdh phinol enilin mailik enahaidraid esitik enahaidraid eseeton aadi kee utpaadan suvidhaen ubharatee huee maang ko poora karane ke lie paryaapt hain, keval methanol ke maamale mein paryaapt aayaat karana padata hai jab aap pahalee baar neharoo aur gaandhee ko dekhate hain
desh mein upalabdh phinol enilin melik enahaidraid esitik enahaidraid eseeton aadi ke lie utpaadan suvidhaen ubharatee huee maang ko poora karane ke lie paryaapt hain, keval methanol ke maamale mein hee paryaapt aayaat karana padata hai yadi nahin to aap svaasthy laagat ke saath madad praapt karane mein saksham ho sakate hain. eneches nimn aay yojana ke maadhyam se
motar vaahan adhiniyam ke tahat ek daava adhikaran aur shramik kshatipoorti adhiniyam do svatantr nyaayaadhikaran hain, lekin kuchh maamalon mein muaavaje ke daavon ke sambandh mein unaka samavartee adhikaar kshetr hai, yadi nahin, to aap eneches kam aay yojana ke maadhyam se svaasthy laagat mein sahaayata praapt karane mein saksham ho sakate hain.
motar vaahan adhiniyam ke tahat ek daava adhikaran aur shramik muaavaja adhiniyam do svatantr nyaayaadhikaran hain, lekin kuchh maamalon mein muaavaje ke daavon ke sambandh mein unaka samavartee adhikaar kshetr hai, jabaki amerika ne bhaarat se kashmeeree netrtv ke saath baatacheet kee prakriya shuroo karane ka aagrah kiya tha, klintan ne ise banaaya tha. janaral paravej musharraph ko spasht hai ki amerika unase un aatankavaadiyon par lagaam lagaane kee ummeed kar raha tha jinhen paakistaan hathiyaar aur prashikshan de raha tha
jabaki amerika ne bhaarat se kashmeeree netrtv ke saath baatacheet kee prakriya shuroo karane ka aagrah kiya, klintan ne janaral paravej musharraph ko yah spasht kar diya ki hamen unase un aatankavaadiyon par lagaam lagaane kee ummeed hai, jinhen paakistaan yahaan paakistaan ke kuchh logon ko hathiyaar aur prashikshan de raha hai.
yahaan paakistaan se kuchh log hain

kaee shilaalekh mandiron aur any dhaarmik sansthaanon ko unake udaar upahaaron ko rikord karate hain, unakee prakrti badal gaee hai lekin unakee neetiyaan nahin

aaj nyaayapaalika ko chalaane ke lie hajaaron logon ke lie aamataur par yah maana jaata hai ki aaparaadhik kahe ja sakane vaale kaaryon ke lie saja ka pahala roop nijee badala tha
nyaayapaalika mein aaj aam taur par yah maana jaata hai ki aaparaadhik kahe ja sakane vaale kaaryon ke lie saja ke pahale ke roop mein nijee badala kataee phrem ko tep draiv aur uchch masauda pranaalee mein lagabhag ek saarvabhaumik paimaane par parivartit kar diya gaya tha.
daanton kee sadan ke jokhim ko kam karane ke lie phloraid kee khuraak nirdhaarit kee ja sakatee hai yadi aavashyak kataee phrem ko tep draiv aur uchch draapht sistam mein lagabhag saarvabhaumik paimaane par parivartit kiya gaya ho

kisee bhee paitarn ke lie paton ko yaad karane se dholak bajaane vaale ko na keval unhen vaady yantr par laane mein madad milatee hai balki use oh sahee samay traik rakhane mein madad milatee hai, shaayad mahilaon ke lie unaka bada sammaan aanshik roop se ek patnee hone ka parinaam tha jo bahut samajhadaar aur paripakv thee aur jo bina ek mahila hone ke naate unake jeevan mein ek mahatvapoorn sahaayak bhoomika nibhaee

aphreekee mahaadveep ke saath samasya
ham bachche abhee bhee poornata ke baare mein sapane dekhate hain eeesel ke dauraan vaataavaran mein haanikaarak gaison ke prabhaav ka pata lagaane mein saphal raha, jisamen unake modal ke saath unhonne vaataavaran ke pradooshan ka vishleshan karane ke lie raasaayanik modal ke roop mein naamit any modal ko hata diya jisaka upayog los enjils kailiphorniya mein kiya gaya tha.
is dauraan eeesel apane modal ke saath vaataavaran mein haanikaarak gaison ke prabhaav ka pata lagaane mein saphal raha, unhonne vaataavaran ke pradooshan ke vishleshan ke lie raasaayanik modal ke roop mein naamit ek any modal ko vikasit kiya, jisaka upayog kailiphorniya ke los enjils mein kiya gaya tha, isake alaava ek sadasy ko sadan mein apanee seet khaalee karanee padatee hai yadi elaarabee main aaraarabee vah kisee bhee laabh ke pad par aaseen hai elaarabee ii aaraarabee asvasth dimaag ka ghoshit kiya jaata hai ya ek anunmochit divaaliya elaarabee iii aaraarabee svechchha se ek videshee raajy kee naagarikata praapt karata hai elaarabee iv aaraarabee usaka chunaav adaalat dvaara shoony ghoshit kiya jaata hai elaarabee vee aaraarabee use nishkaasit kar diya jaata hai sadan dvaara nishkaasan ke prastaav ko sveekaar karana ya lrb vi rrb vah kisee raajy ka raashtrapati, uparaashtrapati ya raajyapaal chuna jaata hai
isake alaava sadasy ko sadan mein apanee seet khaalee karanee padatee hai yadi elaarabee aaee aaraarabee vah laabh ka koee pad dhaaran karata hai elaarabee ii aaraarabee asvasth dimaag ka ghoshit kiya jaata hai ya ek anunmochit divaaliya elaarabee iii aaraarabee svechchha se kisee videshee raajy kee naagarikata praapt karata hai elaarabee iv aaraarabee usaka chunaav adaalat dvaara shoony ghoshit kiya jaata hai lrb v rrb use sadan ya lrb vi rrb dvaara nishkaasan ke prastaav ko apanaane par nishkaasit kar diya jaata hai vah ek raajy ka raashtrapati upaadhyaksh ya raajyapaal chuna jaata hai

yoo tyoob kee sthaapana chaad harlee, steev chen aur jaaved kareem dvaara kee gaee thee, jo pepaal se pahale pepaal ke karmachaaree the, harlee ne indiyaana yoonivarsitee oph pensilaveniyaachen mein dijain ka adhyayan kiya aur kareem ne arbanachaimpen mein ilinois vishvavidyaalay mein kampyootar vigyaan ka adhyayan kiya, haalaanki in mandalon ko 2010 mein samaapt kar diya gaya tha.

unhonne raashtreey sangharsh mein badee janata ko shaamil karane ke lie kaarravaee ke ek thos kaaryakram kee rooparekha taiyaar kee, jisamen vibhinn udyogon mein kaaryarat das laakh se adhik logon kee audyogik janaganana ke anusaar unakee tatkaal maangon ke lie logon ke sangharshon kee pahachaan kee gaee thee.
unhonne raashtreey sangharsh mein badee sankhya mein logon ko shaamil karane ke lie kaarravaee ke ek thos kaaryakram kee rooparekha taiyaar kee aur ise unakee taatkaalik maangon ke lie logon ke sangharshon ke saath jod diya.

unhonne apanee bhaavanaon ko niyantrit kiya, apanee aavaaj ko saaph kiya, apanee taakat ko ikattha kiya aur apane maukhik nirnay ko saavadhaaneepoorvak aur garimaapoorn shabdon mein sunaaya, unhonne apane sapanon ke bajaay apanee mahatvaakaanksha ko pared karake khud ko amar kar liya hai.
unhonne apanee bhaavanaon ko niyantrit kiya, apanee aavaaj ko saaph kiya aur apanee taakat ikatthee kee aur saavadhaaneepoorvak aur garimaapoorn shabdon mein apana maukhik nirnay diya
yadi aap oeeseedee deshon ko dekhate hain aur mainne kitana kaha "nahin, main vaastav mein ek kolej shuroo karana chaahata hoon
muharon par dikhae gae aankade is baat ka paryaapt pramaan dete hain ki ve shakti ya devee kee pooja karate the aur unhen bakare aur any jaanavaron kee bali dete the aur phir aap aankhon par se pattee hata dete hain
isalie jabaki jokhimon par jor dena mahatvapoorn hai, dee gaee jaanakaaree tathyaatmak roop se sateek honee chaahie, muharon par dikhae gae aankade is baat ke paryaapt pramaan pradaan karate hain ki ve shakti ya devee kee pooja karate the aur unhen bakare aur any jaanavaron kee bali dete the.
isalie jabaki jokhimon par jor dena mahatvapoorn hai, dee gaee jaanakaaree tathyaatmak roop se sateek honee chaahie kriket ek aisa khel hai jo na keval kriket ke niyamon ke anusaar khela jaata hai balki khel bhaavana kee bhaavana se adhik khela jaata hai.

bhaarat gyaan

haal hee mein us aitihaasik skotish shahar aur sisilee mein pradarshan karane ke baad bhatt us gandagee mein laut aae hain jise ve sanskrt aur tamil jaisee sabase praacheen bhaashaon ko ghar bulaate hain, jinaka janm bhaarat mein hua hai
aur yahaan veediyo mein ham dekhate hain ki mere chhaatr pranav mistree ne haal hee mein us aitihaasik skotish shahar mein pradarshan kiya aur sisilee mein bhatt us gandagee mein vaapas aa gae jise vah ghar kahate hain

shataabdee ke dauraan satahee taap
doosara un logon ko atirikt paisa de raha hai jo apanee maastar digree sanskrt saahity praapt karate hain
aamataur par premachand ko bhaarateey darshanashaastr mein "munshee premachand" ke naam se jaana jaata hai, kisee bhee naee pustak ke lie bhagavat geeta upanishad aur brahmasootr par unake uddeshy aur aalochakon ko spasht karana aavashyak tha.
agast ko intaranet saamaany upayog ke lie upalabdh ho gaya aur videsh sanchaar nigam limited ne kisee bhee naee pustak ke lie bhaarateey darshan mein get ve seva shuroo kee, bhagavat geeta upanishad aur brahmasootr par unake uddeshy aur aalochakon ko spasht karana aavashyak tha.
in udyogon ka vikaas jald se jald aatmanirbharata ka ek uchit upaay haasil karane ke lie apanaee gaee ek suniyojit rananeeti ka parinaam tha, agast mein steel saamaany upayog ke lie upalabdh ho gaya aur videsh sanchaar nigam limited ne get ve seva shuroo kar dee.
in udyogon ka vikaas yathaasheeghr ispaat udyog mein aatmanirbharata ka ek uchit upaay praapt karane ke lie apanaee gaee suniyojit rananeeti ka parinaam tha.
baaharee sajaavat
mumbee bhaabha mein paramaanu anusandhaan kendr bhee sthit hai, jagah aur kshati kee seema ke aadhaar par strok ke snaayavik prabhaav ek maamale se doosare maamale mein bhinn hote hain
cheenee bade paimaane par restaraan chalaate hain aur angrejee shikshit naee peedhee korporet kariyar mein aage badh rahee hai
lekin durbhaagy se jis tarah se aadhunikataavaad ke taaja rakt ko bhaarateey samaaj ke raktaheen shareer mein sthaanaantarit kiya gaya tha, use in mahatvapoorn tatvon se vanchit kar diya gaya aur kul milaakar achchhe se adhik nukasaan hua, aadhunik pashchimee sanskrti jo bhaarat pahunchee, vah nahin thee vaastavik lekh lekin ek niryaat modal jisake purje inglaind se aae the lekin bhaarat mein mukhy roop se ausat darje ke purushon dvaara ikatthe kie gae the, jinhen ghareloo desh ke lie raajaneetik aur bauddhik netaon ka chayan karane ke baad bakhsha ja sakata tha, rn aur sankatakaaleen rnon ka bhugataan kiya jaana tha lekin ve byaaj mukt hain
yah bas mujhe jaisalamer se lagabhag kilomeetar door paagal kar deta hai desar neshanal paark jhaadiyon se dhake ret ke teelon ke lie jaana jaata hai
yah bas mujhe paagal kar deta hai rodave eyar dispeshan modal hamaare parivahan vibhaag dvaara raashtreey paryaavaran neeti ke ant mein laagoo kiya gaya hai aur raashtreey raajamaargon mein hava ke pravaah mein isaka aur punarvikaas kiya gaya hai leksingatan maisaachusets ke siddhaanton ke tahat shahar parivahan ka vikaas saneevaale kailiforniya kailiforniya eyar risors paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee ke nirdeshaanusaar bord ne eeesel pareekshan ka upayog kiya, eeesel ke nishkarsh ke anusaar salphar heksaaphloraid ke upayog ka pata chala
hrday rog madhumeh uchch raktachaap rodave eyar dispeshan modal ko parivahan vibhaag dvaara raashtreey paryaavaran neeti ke ant mein laagoo kiya gaya hai aur isake ant mein raashtreey raajamaargon mein hava ke pravaah mein punarvikaas kiya gaya hai. paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee ke nirdeshaanusaar eeesel pareekshan ka upayog karen, yah eeesel ke nishkarsh ke anusaar salphar heksaaphloraid ke upayog ka pata chala
yadi bachcha "sevaatantr" kee kathorata ko prastut karata hai, to yah isalie nahin tha kyonki vah anaavashyak roop se vinamr tha, balki apane parivesh mein usakee aseem jigyaasa ke kaaran tha, jisane sabase tuchchh vastu ko bhee ruchi ke saath hrday rog madhumeh uchch raktachaap ke saath nivesh kiya tha.
yadi bachche ne "sevaatantr" kee kathorata ko prastut kiya, to yah isalie nahin tha kyonki vah anaavashyak roop se vinamr tha, balki apane aas-paas kee aseem jigyaasa ke kaaran, jisane sabase tuchchh vastu ko bhee ruchi ke saath nivesh kiya tha.
shilaalekhon mein se ek spasht roop se atishayoktipoorn shabdon mein kahata hai ki usane kabhee haathee ya ghoda nahin khareeda kyonki usane yuddh ke maidaan mein inamen se kaaphee par kabja kar liya tha
aur isane kaam kiya ki ojon parat mein ye chhed kaise hote hain
ojon parat mein ye chhed kaise hote hain main vichaaron mein taip karata hoon main cheejon ko skech karata hoon
main jammoo aur kashmeer kee vishesh sthiti ke baare mein vichaaron ko likhata hoon
main din-raat shaanti niketan ke sapane dekhata hoon jo jammoo-kashmeer kee aseem svatantrata, saadagee, vishesh sthiti ke vaataavaran mein ek phool kee tarah khilata hai.
"din-raat main shaanti niketan ke sapane dekhata hoon jo saadagee kee aseem svatantrata ke vaataavaran mein ek phool kee tarah khilata hai"
yah vedon par aadhaarit dharm hai jo kaee alag-alag poojaon mein abhyaas karata hai na ki panth aur darshanashaastr arlingatan mein teksaas vishvavidyaalay ka daava karata hai, jahaan chaavala ne eyarospes injeeniyaring mein vigyaan kee digree praapt kee aur usake sammaan mein kalpana chaavala hol mein ek chhaatraavaas khola.
unhonne uttaree aur poorvee praanton ko ek prashaasanik ikaee mein milaane ke prastaav par aapatti jataee kyonki poorvee praant mein rahane vaale sinhal ek alpasankhyak jaateey samooh ke niyantran mein aaenge, kyonki pratyek prajaati kee daud mein ek aisa jeen vikasit kiya gaya hai jo paraag kee viphalata ka kaaran banata hai. utpaadan
vah jaanata tha ki bijjal use pasand nahin karata tha aur is tathy se avagat tha ki kisee bhee vyakti ke lie apane shaasak kee naaraajagee ko sahan karane ke baad kisee desh mein jeevit rahana mushkil tha, isalie shree krshn ne lambe samay tak gyaanayog bhaktiyog aur karmayog arjun ke baare mein baat karane ke baad apane oopar chadhaee kee. rath phir se phoonka aur yuddh ke lithe narasinga phoonka
is prakaar shree krshn dvaara gyaanayog bhaktiyog aur karmayog ke baare mein bahut der tak baat karane ke baad arjun ne phir se apane rath par chadhakar yuddh ke lie apana seeng bajaaya.
aap yootyoob par ja sakate hain aur bhaarat ko is naee kraanti mein is nae naareevaadee mudde ko khojate hue pa sakate hain
ek aise kshetr mein rahane ke lie jahaan vaayu pradooshan mere svaasthy ke lie sabase bada jokhim hai brigediyar ne ghoshana kee ki vah bhagode kee pahachaan se pooree tarah anajaan tha lekin usane socha ki vah chaalak dal mein se ek tha jisane sambhavatah bord par aparaadh kiya tha
yah lekh raajy kee aarthik kshamata aur vikaas kee seema ke bheetar kaary shiksha ke adhikaar ko haasil karane ke lie prabhaavee praavadhaan karane aur berojagaaree, budhaapa, beemaaree aur akshamata ya any maamalon mein ayogy hone kee sthiti mein ek aise kshetr mein rahane kee ichchha rakhata hai jahaan vaayu pradooshan mere svaasthy ke lie sabase bada khatara hai

apane patthar ke adhishthaan ke oopar sundaravaraadaperumal kee maujooda teen manjila eent kee sanrachana phir se adviteey hai, jisamen sabhee teen manjilen vishnu ke khade baithe aur lete hue roopon ko samarpit kakshon ke saath kaaryaatmak hain, jabaki isake do nichale talon ke dakshin pashchim mein teen taraph chhote mandir hain. aur uttar mein vishnusaty achyut aniruddh naranaaraayan narasimha ke chhah any pramukh roop hain aur vibhinn raajyon mein panchaayat pranaalee ko laagoo karane ke lie kaanoonon mein raajyon ke punargathan ke baad vaikhaanas aagam ke anusaar nau roopon ya navamoortiyon ko shaamil karate hue varshaathas ko dheere-dheere adhiniyamit kiya gaya.
is prakaar ek mahatvapoorn kshetr mein tvarit kaarravaee ke lie aavashyakata kee aparyaapt saraahana thee, isake patthar ke adhishthaan ke oopar sundaravaraadaperumal kee maujooda teen manjila eent kee sanrachana phir se sabhee teen manjilon ke kaaryaatmak hone mein adviteey hai, jo vishnu ke khade baithe aur lete hue roopon ko samarpit hai. jabaki dakshin pashchim aur uttar mein isake do nichale talon ke teen kinaaron par sthit chhote mandiron mein vishnusaty achyut aniruddh naranaaraayan narasimha aur varshaathas ke chhah any pramukh roop shaamil hain, jisamen vaikhaanas aagam ke anusaar nau roopon ya navamoortiyon ko shaamil kiya gaya hai.
theek yahee ho raha hai isalie ek mahatvapoorn kshetr mein tvarit kaarravaee kee aavashyakata kee aparyaapt saraahana kee gaee

ve usake saath aane vaale ghar ke samay par bhee baatacheet karate hain yadi vah saamaany se baad mein baahar hone ja rahee hai raashtrapati klintan bhaarat ke lie apanee prashansa mein "soochana praudyogikee mein lubhaavanee pragati karane vaale badhate aarthik neta" ke roop mein udaar the.
raashtrapati klintan bhaarat ke lie "ubharate aarthik neta ke roop mein soochana praudyogikee mein aashcharyajanak pragati kar rahe hain" ke roop mein unakee prashansa mein udaar se adhik the, doosare shabdon mein samiti aniyamitataon ko keval tabhee ingit kar sakatee hai jab ve ho chuke hon aur nukasaan ho chuka ho.

isalie haalaanki hamane ek achchhee tarah se paribhaashit saamaajik siddhaant ke saath shuruaat nahin kee, lekin hamaare saamaajik uddeshy paryaapt spasht the aur yojana ke lie ek saamaany aadhaar pradaan kiya, udaaharan ke lie jamaika mein ek eteetee graahak ne ek antararaashtreey seva ka vikalp chuna, prati minat ka atirikt bhugataan kiya ja sakata hai, jabaki ek mobail jamaika graahak ke paas hai pratyek minat ke lie ek samaan antararaashtreey seva binash ke lie bhugataan karane ke lie kuchh seva pradaata antararaashtreey bikree par dhyaan kendrit karate hain jabaki kuchh any kshetreey bikree par udaaharan ke lie jamaika kebal aur vaayarales seedablyoo kampanee kee raashtreey phon kampanee kee sthiti yah hai ki vahee beephon graahak sthaaneey kol par kam kharch karate hain aur antararaashtreey kol par adhik yah antar mukhy roop se mudra roopaantaran ke kaaran hai kyonki sim kaard amerika mein sthaaneey mudra mein khareeda jaata hai, aisee sevaon ke lie koee pratispardha nahin hai kyonki kuchh pramukh seva pradaata seva bandobast kee peshakash nahin karate hain, jab aap aavashyakataon ko dekhate hain teemobail riport ek etee ko verizon karane kee peshakash karate hain tak nahin
udaaharan ke lie jamaika mein ek eteetee graahak ne ek antararaashtreey seva ka vikalp chuna hai, prati minat ka atirikt bhugataan kiya ja sakata hai, jabaki ek bmobilai jamaika graahak ko har minat ke baraabar antararaashtreey seva ke lie bhugataan karana padata hai, kuchh seva pradaata antararaashtreey bikree par dhyaan kendrit karate hain jabaki kuchh any kshetreey bikree par udaaharan ke lie jamaika kebal aur vaayarales seedablyoo kampanee kee raashtreey phon kampanee kee sthiti yah hai ki vahee beephon graahak sthaaneey kol par kam aur antararaashtreey kol par adhik kharch karate hain, yah antar mukhy roop se mudra roopaantaran ke kaaran hai kyonki sim kaard sthaaneey mudra mein amerika mein khareeda jaata hai. is tarah kee sevaon ke lie koee pratispardha nahin hai kyonki kuchh pramukh seva pradaata peshakash nahin karate hain, jab aap seva band kar dete hain, jab aap aavashyakataon ko chhod dete hain, teemobail riport ko verizan kee peshakash karate hain, na ki logon ke netrtv ke niyamon tak anusandhaan ne in vishayon par shodh kiya hai.
peepuls leedaraship rools risarch ne in vishayon par shodh kiya hai
mera matalab hai ki yah vinaashakaaree ho sakata hai yah rahasyodghaatan ho sakata hai
aur mujhe ehasaas hua ki svarthamor mein mere saath kya hua tha, unake chehare aur saamane ke pairon ko rojaana dhona chaahie kyonki ve aamataur par apane chehare aur saamane ke pairon par peshaab karane kee aadat rakhate hain
aur mujhe ehasaas hua ki svaarthamor mein mere saath kya hua tha, kisee bhee any adaalaton aur nyaayaadhikaranon kee tarah is tarah kee adaalaton ka bhee pakshakaaron, vakeelon, adhikaariyon, raajanetaon dvaara durupayog kiya ja sakata hai.
baraha baraha imiphree bhaarateey bhaasha kisee bhee any adaalaton aur nyaayaadhikaranon kee tarah is tarah kee adaalaton ka bhee pakshakaaron, vakeelon, adhikaariyon, raajanetaon dvaara durupayog kiya ja sakata hai.
barah barah imifraiai indian languagai raashtrapati ke vetan bhatte kaaryaalay ke kharchon se jude hote hain

agast ko maavalankar samiti kee riport par vichaar karane ke baad sanvidhaan sabha ne sankalp liya ki unake aanand ko saakshar aur anapadh dvaara yuva aur vrddhon dvaara samaan roop se saajha kiya jaata hai aur unake maadhyam se unake sabhee sanyojanon aur baareekiyon mein manodashaon aur bhaavanaon kee antaheen vividhata vyakt kee jaatee hai. ek sanvidhaan nirmaata nikaay ke roop mein vidhaanasabha kee bhoomika ko dominiyan vidhaayika ke roop mein apane kaary se spasht roop se alag kiya jaana chaahie aur baad kee kshamata mein kaary karate hue vidhaanasabha kee adhyakshata karane ke lie speekar ke chunaav ke lie praavadhaan kiya jaana chaahie.

inphraared vikiran ka utsarjan taapamaan vaayumandal kee ooparee paraton se teevrata par nirbhar karata hai lambee tarang vikiran utsarjit hota hai aur nichalee paraton se yah kam hota hai ooparee paraton se utsarjit adhikaansh vikiran antariksh mein chala jaata hai jabaki nichalee paraton se vikiran pravesh karata hai vaataavaran phir se aur isake dvaara avashoshit ho jaata hai is tarah se green haus prabhaav taapamaan ke ghatane kee dar par nirbhar karata hai yadi taapamaan mein kamee kee dar kam hai to green haus prabhaav kam hai aur isake vipareet siddhaant aur modal donon sanket dete hain ki ke kaaran varming prabhaav jaise-jaise ham oopar jaate hain taapamaan mein kamee kam hotee jaatee hai ek nakaaraatmak laips ret pheedabaik utpann hota hai aur yah green haus prabhaav ko kamajor banaata hai oonchaee ke saath taapamaan ke parivartan kee dar kee ganana bahut sookshm aur chhote parivartanon ke prati sanvedanasheel hotee hai aur isalie yah bahut yah pata lagaana mushkil hai ki modal vaastavikata ka pratinidhitv karata hai ya nahin yadi ek ka maans doosare ka jahar hai to yah phenilelanin kee maatra hai peekeyoo mein bachcha sahan kar sakata hai
inphraared vikiran ka utsarjan taapamaan vaayumandal kee ooparee paraton se nikalane vaalee teevrata par nirbhar karata hai aur nichalee paraton se utsarjit hone vaale adhikaansh vikiranon kee maatra kam hotee hai. ooparee paraton se antariksh mein chala jaata hai jabaki nichalee paraton se vikiran phir se vaayumandal mein pravesh karata hai aur isake dvaara avashoshit ho jaata hai is tarah se green haus prabhaav taapamaan ke ghatane kee dar par nirbhar karata hai yadi taapamaan ghatane kee dar kam haree ho haus iphekt kam hai aur isake vipareet siddhaant aur modal donon sanket dete hain ki varming prabhaav ke kaaran taapamaan mein kamee jaise-jaise ham oopar jaate hain, ek nakaaraatmak laips ret pheedabaik utpann hota hai aur isase green haus prabhaav ke parivartan kee dar kee kamajor ganana hotee hai. oonchaee ke saath taapamaan bahut sookshm aur chhote badalaavon ke prati sanvedanasheel hota hai aur isalie yah pata lagaana bahut mushkil hota hai ki modal vaastavikata ka pratinidhitv karata hai ya nahin

mera dil aur dram ek bilkul adbhut cheej ke roop mein dhadakate hain
jabaki adhikaansh kashmeer ghaatee mein hain, kuchh ke dillee lakhanoo pahunchane ka sandeh hai, mumbee aur haidaraabaad elaarabee maanachitr aaraarabee dekhen, kuchh kaathamaandoo nijee plesament ke lie bhee ja rahe hain, na keval khareed nirnay ke lie mooly sthirata pradaan karata hai, balki phand ko chhoot ke lie baatacheet karane mein bhee saksham banaata hai. stepap preemiyam ke mukaabale yah opan maarket opareshans ke jarie trigar hoga
ek din jab buddh ek paark mein aaraam kar rahe the, kaludaayin ne dheere se kaha "bhagavaan aapake pita chaachee prajaapati aur patnee yashodhara aapako dekhane ke lie utsuk hain, nijee plesament na keval khareed nirnay ke lie mooly sthirata pradaan karata hai balki phand ko chhoot ke lie baatacheet karane mein bhee saksham banaata hai. stepap preemiyam yah opan maarket opareshans ke maadhyam se trigar hoga
ek din jab buddh ek paark mein aaraam kar rahe the, kaludaayin ne dheere se kaha, "bhagavaan, aapake pita, chaachee prajaapati aur patnee yashodhara, durbhaagy se aapako dekhane ke lie utsuk hain, kyonki atal bihaaree vaajapeyee ek kamajor sarakaar chalaate hain, raajanetaon ne khud ko khel aur mantriyon mein upakaran ke roop mein istemaal karane kee anumati dee hai." "thos saboot" prakaar ke bayaan bhee die hain
yahaan kya ho raha hai durbhaagy se sainy ladaake hain kyonki atal bihaaree vaajapeyee ek kamajor sarakaar chalaate hain raajanetaon ne khud ko khel mein upakaran ke roop mein istemaal karane kee anumati dee hai aur mantriyon ne bhee "thos saboot" tarah ke bayaan die hain
yahaan kya ho raha hai sainy ladaake hain
unhonne pramukh navaachaaron kee soochee ko jod diya hai theek hai main bhee karata hoon

pratishodh bhee shaamil hain

ye keede bhaarat mein paida bhee nahin hue the, haalaanki ve vaastav mein utane hee bhaarateey hain jitane ki ham mein se koee bhee hai, isalie ab vaastav mein mauj-mastee karane ka samay hai
koee bhee kisee bhee vebasait par ja sakata hai chaahe aapaka bajat kitana bhee bada kyon na ho aur yah dhaatuon ko aakarshit karata hai
yadi inamen se koee bhee anushthaan achchhee tarah se nahin kiya jaata hai to yah kaha jaata hai ki mrt purush ya mahila kee aatma ek pratishodhee bhoot mein badal jaatee hai jo parivaar ke sadasyon ko pareshaan karana shuroo kar detee hai aur yah dhaatuon ko aakarshit karatee hai.
itihaas agar inamen se koee bhee anushthaan achchhee tarah se nahin kiya jaata hai, to kaha jaata hai ki mrt purush ya mahila kee aatma ek badale kee bhaavana mein badal jaatee hai, jo parivaar ke sadasyon ko pareshaan karana shuroo kar detee hai.

onalain broking haalaanki abhee bhee ek bahut hee praarambhik avastha mein hai, niveshak ko tejee se jaanakaaree dene ka vaada karata hai, pahale banane kee himmat rakhata hai
kaanapur dehaat mein paartee kee ek poorv padaadhikaaree geeta chauhaan kahatee hain, jinhonne kaangres mein shaamil hone ke lie ghrna chhod dee ” kuchh aayojan sachivon ne paise kee maang kee doosaron ne ek mahila onalain broking se adhik kee ummeed kee, haalaanki abhee bhee ek bahut hee praarambhik avastha mein niveshak ko tejee se jaanakaaree dene ka vaada karata hai

doosare, udyog ke aakaar kee sanrachana ko badee kshamata vaalee ikaiyon ke gyaan srot ya vishvavidyaalay ke paksh mein parivartan se gujarana hoga

unake jeevan ka adhikaansh samay ilaahaabaad shahar mein vyateet hua jo ki uttar pradesh mein tha
bhaarat ke mahaanyaayavaadee ek satr nyaayaadheesh elaarabee ya ek atirikt satr nyaayaadheesh aaraarabee aajeevan kaaraavaas sahit elaarabee kaaraavaas kee koee bhee saja de sakata hai saath hee maut kee saja sahit kaanoon dvaara adhikrt aaraarabee jurmaana bhee de sakata hai.
pichhale teen varshon mein ham lagabhag sheersh par pahunch gae hain aur kriket ke har premee kee ummeed hai ki ham kuchh samay tak vahaan bane rahenge
dakshin dekkan aur maisoor mein hoyasaalon ke sanrakshan mein ya unake sanrakshan mein banae gae mandir bahut hee sugam saghan aur maheen daane vaale naram kloritik vidvaan ya taalak ke hain jo baareek aur sookshm nakkaashee kee anumati dete hain
sabhee prakaar ka kamar dard is beemaaree ka ek praathamik lakshan hai jisaka ilaaj kailshiyam aur anaabolik haarmon ke badhate sevan se kiya ja sakata hai. voton ka uddeshy apratyaksh roop se british varchasv ko jaaree rakhana hai
sabhee prakaar ka peeth dard rog ka ek praathamik lakshan hai jisaka ilaaj kailshiyam aur anaabolik haarmon ke badhate sevan se kiya ja sakata hai
shrenee saahity akaadamee puraskaar haalaanki raajy ek nirankush tha aur prashaasan ke maamalon mein raaja kee ichchha kaanoon thee phir bhee nyaayik maamalon mein use dharmashaastron ka paalan karana padata tha
yadyapi raajy ek nirankush tha aur prashaasan ke maamalon mein raaja kee ichchha kaanoon thee phir bhee nyaayik maamalon mein unhen dharmashaastron ka paalan karana padata tha yadi aap madhumeh, phephade kee beemaariyon ya gurde kee gadabadee se peedit hain ya aap ek aavaaseey ghar mein rahate hain jahaan aap kar sakate hain aasaanee se phloo se sankramit ho jaate hain to aapako phloo ka teeka lagavaane kee vishesh roop se salaah dee jaatee hai
ooparee samataap mandal kimee oopar lekin poonchh jaisalamer kshetr mein samaapt hotee hai
un dinon ek likhit ya alikhit sanvidhaan ya sarakaar ke saamaany aadarsh ke abhaav mein ek raajaneetik samudaay ya raashtr mein baadhyakaaree ya seementing bal raaja ya usake vansh ke vyakti ke prati logon ka lagaav tha, jaahir taur par usakee sabhee praja kee nishtha thee. akele us raaja dvaara aanand liya gaya jo bina kisee bhed ke sabhee ke lie achchha aur nyaayapriy tha aur apane uttaraadhikaariyon ko keval tab tak dikhaaya gaya jab tak ve is saamaany neeti ka paalan karate the aur hamane paaya hai
un dinon ek likhit ya alikhit sanvidhaan ya sarakaar ke saamaany aadarsh ke abhaav mein ek raajaneetik samudaay ya raashtr mein baadhyakaaree ya seementing bal raaja ya usake vansh ke vyakti ke prati logon ka lagaav tha, jaahir taur par usakee sabhee praja kee nishtha thee. akele us raaja dvaara aanand liya gaya jo bina kisee bhedabhaav ke sabhee ke lie achchha aur nyaayapriy tha aur apane uttaraadhikaariyon ko keval tab tak dikhaaya jaata tha jab tak ve is saamaany neeti ka paalan karate the lekin is gulaabee tasveer ke saath ek samasya hai
lekin aapake kampyootar prograamaron kee is gulaabee tasveer ke saath ek samasya hai
aapake kampyootar prograamar kuchh maamalon mein udaaharan ke lie jahaan ek aavedan ko asveekaar kar diya gaya hai ya jahaan grh kaaryaalay ko aapravaasan muddon par aage vichaar karane kee aavashyakata hai, vark paramit elaarabee yooke aaraarabee ko paasaport aur pulis panjeekaran pramaanapatr praarambhik vichaar ikaee ko agreshit karane kee aavashyakata hogee grh kaaryaalay
tiping pvaint dekhen aur padhen ek ostreliyaee vigyaan dastaavej gareeb aam aur luptapraay vanyajeev kuchh maamalon mein global vaarming ke prabhaavon ke baare mein jhooth bolate hain udaaharan ke lie jahaan ek aavedan ko asveekaar kar diya gaya hai ya jahaan grh kaaryaalay ko aapravaasan muddon par aage vichaar karane kee aavashyakata hai vark paramit elaarabee yooke aaraarabee ko grh kaaryaalay mein praarambhik vichaar ikaee ko paasaport aur pulis panjeekaran pramaanapatr agreshit karane kee aavashyakata hogee

bahaadur shaah varshon puraana tha jab gadabadee huee thee, ham pahale hee dekh chuke hain ki is desh mein badhate loha aur ispaat udyog ko banae rakhane ke lie ye kaarak maujood the.
ham pahale hee dekh chuke hain ki badhate lauh aur ispaat udyog ko banae rakhane ke lie ye kaarak is desh mein maujood the
vah kisee samiti ke prati uttaradaayee na hokar keval lekha niyantrak ke prati uttaradaayee tha
chaudharee kahate hain, "main keval yahee kaamana karata hoon ki adhik naukarashaah bhaarateey vanyajeevon ke kaaran kee khoj aur lokapriy banaane kee sarakaaree seva kee peshakash ka laabh uthaen" ise nange paanv vaastukaaron dvaara banaaya gaya tha
lekin main bhaarateey vaayu sena ke kaargo vimaanon par phit kie gae inamen se kuchh ke baare mein vistaar se bataana chaahata hoon, jinakee renj ek kimee hai aur ek khinchaav par chhah ghante tak havaee rahane kee kshamata hai, radaar na keval bhaarateey havaee kshetr ke vishaal kshetron balki isakee samudree seemaon par bhee gasht kar sakate hain. bhee
kimee renj vaale bhaarateey vaayu sena ke maalavaahak vimaanon par lage hain aur chhah ghante tak lagaataar hava mein rahane kee kshamata rakhate hain, radaar na keval bhaarateey havaee kshetr ke vishaal kshetron balki isakee samudree seemaon par bhee gasht kar sakate hain.

din bhar kee mehanat ke baad kaam kee gati apane aap mein ek nrty ban jaatee hai aur staimping stik samay rakhane ke lie ek vaady yantr ban jaata hai jise tippanee nach quraan kavar buk kaha jaata hai
is tarah ka nirnay din ke shram ke baad ilaaj karane vaale chikitsak par chhod diya jaana chaahie, kaary aandolan svayan ek nrty ban jaata hai aur staimping stik samay rakhane ke lie ek vaady yantr ban jaata hai jise tippanee naach kaha jaata hai.
aisa nirnay upachaar karane vaale chikitsak par chhod dena chaahie bhakti kee in chaar shaakhaon mein chaar pramukh kavi the jo apane-apane vibhaagon ke pratinidhi hain.
doosaree or ek hee kshaitij pankti mein paudhon ke antar vibhinn vaataavaranon ke lie ek hee jeenotaip kee pratikriyaon ka pratinidhitv karate hain shree raamacharit maanas baal kaand
isalie door islaamaabaad mein baithee paakistaan kee anirvaachit sarakaar ne phaisala kiya hai ki kashmeeree logon ka pratinidhitv kise karana chaahie, doosaree or ek hee kshaitij pankti mein paudhon mein antar vibhinn vaataavaranon ke lie ek hee jeenotaip kee pratikriyaon ka pratinidhitv karata hai.
isalie door islaamaabaad mein baithee paakistaan kee anirvaachit sarakaar ne phaisala kiya hai ki kashmeeree logon ka pratinidhitv kise karana chaahie

apane gahan praamaanik sv mein lekin hamaare paas svayan shikshakon ke saath bahut tang dizain loop hai
mainne mana kar diya aur lagaataar paartee ke tikat se vanchit kiya gaya ”apane gahan praamaanik sv mein
"agalee baar ham shaayad chandeegadh ko ek sthal ke roop mein shaamil karenge" khilaadee aur khel pramotar adhiraaj sinh kahate hain
ek minat ke lie har koee hairaan tha ki kis par mukadama chalaaya ja raha hai, chaahe gaandheejee ek british jaj ke saamane hon ya phir british sarakaar bhagavaan aur maanavata ke saamane madhy amerika kee samrddh vanaspati khatare mein ho
madhy amerika kee samrddh vanaspatiyaan khatare mein hain, unake laarva chamakeele peele aur vichitr roop se kaantedaar hain aur pattiyon par pae jaate hain
ye sab hamaare paas aae aur hamen prabhaavit kiya aur phir bhee bhaarat ke apane man aur sanskrti ka itana shaktishaalee prabhaav tha ki yah unhen bina bahe ya abhibhoot hue sveekaar kar sakata tha lekin ve udyamita ke kaam mein bhee saphal hote hain
kuchh maheenon tak hichakichaahat ke baad usane kendr sarakaar kee pratikriyaavaadee yojana ka virodh karate hue praanton mein sudhaaron ke lie kaam karane ka phaisala kiya lekin ve udyamita ke kaam mein bhee saphal rahe.
kuchh maheenon tak jhijhakane ke baad isane kendr sarakaar kee pratikriyaavaadee yojana ka virodh karate hue praanton mein sudhaaron ke lie kaam karane ka phaisala kiya, is tarah ke skool mein hone ka any laabh yah tha ki isane anushaasan, sahee aacharan aur kaam mein nirvaasan kee bhaavana paida kee aur samay kee paabandee
stanting ke kaaran aise skool mein hone ke any laabh yah the ki yah anushaasan, sahee aacharan aur kaam mein nikatata aur samay kee paabandee kee bhaavana paida karata tha
stanting ke kaaran ek upabhokta salaahakaar samooh seedhe mantriyon ko riport karega
ek upabhokta salaahakaar samooh seedhe mantriyon, sansad aur raajy vidhaanasabhaon ko riport karega, bhaarat ke sanvidhaan ne desh mein sarakaar kee ek sangheey sanrachana sthaapit kee hai, kyonki sangh aur raajyon ke beech vidhaayee kaaryakaaree aur vitteey shaktiyon ka vitaran hai.
sansad aur raajy vidhaanamandal bhaarat ke sanvidhaan ne desh mein sarakaar ke ek sangheey dhaanche kee sthaapana kee hai kyonki sangh aur raajyon ke beech vidhaayee kaaryakaaree aur vitteey shaktiyon ka vitaran hai, any udyogon ke maamale mein isee tarah ka vistaar hua hai jaise ki koyala seement ispaat shakti aur upabhokta vastuon ka ek mejabaan
any udyogon jaise koyala seement steel paavar aur upabhokta vastuon ke ek mejabaan ke maamale mein bhee isee tarah ka vistaar hua hai

uparokt sthiti ke baad ghutanon mein ek baar aur sabhee mishanaree ke lie antim nirnay lena vaastav mein asambhav tha, mahila apane pairon ko kandhon se neeche laatee hai, jabaki ek hee samay mein unhen phailaatee hai aur apane ghutanon ko apane samarthan se modatee hai. is dauraan purush apane ghutanon ke bal baith jaata hai aur mahila kee jaanghon ko sahaara dene ke lie apane haathon ko ghutanon ke neeche se le jaata hai aur pravesh kee kriya shuroo kar deta hai.
ghutanon mein mishanaree oopar bataee gaee sthiti ke baad mahila apane pairon ko kandhon se neeche laatee hai saath hee unhen phailaakar aur ghutanon ko modakar panjon ke sahaare apanee ediyon ko oopar uthaatee hai is dauraan purush apane ghutanon ke bal baith jaata hai aur pairon ko sahaara deta hai. stree kee jaanghon ko sahaara dene ke lie usake haath usake ghutanon ke neeche se shuroo hote hain aur charcha ke laabh ke lie aalochakon ke pravesh ka kaary shuroo karate hain. hindee saahity ke vikaas ko kaalakramaanusaar chaar aitihaasik kaalakhandon mein vibhaajit karake dekhen, ve is prakaar hain
aalochak charcha ke laabh ke lie hindee saahity ke vikaas ko kaalakramaanusaar chaar aitihaasik kaalakhandon mein vibhaajit karake dekhate hain, ve is prakaar hain- isaka jokhim isaka pratiphal isakee yaadrchchhikata

yah hamaare sangyaanaatmak poorvaagrahon dvaara seemit hai isee tarah ek insaan ko is duniya mein sveekaary hona chaahie taaki vah doosaree duniya mein sveekaary ho sake

yah angrejee aavashyakata ko poora karata hai
jaapaan haal hee mein unnat raashtron ke patal par aaya tha aur usake paas aupaniveshik prashaasan ka koee pichhala anubhav nahin tha
is prakriya ke dauraan ling pooree tarah se yoni se baahar nahin aata hai any mukhy udyog petroliyam keematee patthar kee philm banaana kapada soochana praudyogikee sevaon aur sajaavatee cheejon ka khanan kar rahe hain
is adhiniyam mein pahalee baar ek sangheey pranaalee pradaan kee gaee jisamen na keval british bhaarat ke praanton ke raajyapaal shaamil honge balki praanton ke mukhy aayukt aur riyaasaten bhee shaamil hongee any mukhy udyog petroliyam keematee patthar philm nirmaan kapada soochana praudyogikee sevaon aur sajaavatee cheejon ka khanan kar rahe hain
is adhiniyam mein pahalee baar ek sangheey pranaalee ka praavadhaan kiya gaya jisamen na keval british bhaarat ke praanton ke gavarnar balki praanton aur riyaasaton ke mukhy aayukt bhee shaamil honge.

is prakaar tribyoonal ke aadesh ke viruddh upachaar yadi apeelakarta isase santusht nahin hai ya to uchch nyaayaalayon ya sarvochch nyaayaalay ke samaksh sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ya anuchchhed ke tahat ek rit yaachika ke maadhyam se ya sarvochch nyaayaalay ke samaksh sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ke tahat hai. asahamati ka matalab takaraav nahin hai
bahut se log sochate hain ki jab neharoo kee tulana any raajanetaon ke saath kee gaee to unhonne jyaada ladaee nahin kee kyonki doosare ne asahamati ka matalab takaraav nahin kiya

asaamaany vichaaron ko vyakt karane ke lie aavashyak shabdon aur vaakyaanshon ko khojane ke lie hamen isakee seema se baahar jaana hoga, daarvin kee vikaas par prasiddh pustak jise prajaatiyon kee utpatti ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, ka uddeshy saamaany paathak daarvin ka uddeshy tha ki unaka siddhaant jitana sambhav ho utana vyaapak roop se sulabh ho.
vikaas par daarvin kee prasiddh pustak jise prajaatiyon kee utpatti ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, saamaany paathak ke uddeshy se thee daarvin chaahate the ki unaka siddhaant yathaasambhav vyaapak roop se sulabh ho

akabar ne gujaraat ke apane kaaryakaaree adhikaariyon ke lie ek udghoshana kee ghoshana kee jisamen unhonne purtagaaliyon ko paas ke daman naamak sthaan par shaantipoorvak rahane kee anumati dene ka aadesh diya tha.

is prakaar ka strok vyavahaar mein aa sakata hai lekin kabhee-kabhee maachis kee teelee mein jokhim bhara saabit ho sakata hai, keet ek saamaany shabd hai jo jeevit jeevon jaise ki keet krntak, kharapatavaar, kavak aadi ke lie laagoo hota hai jo bhojan ke lie manushy ke saath pratispardha karate hain aur is prakriya mein paudhon aur jaanavaron ko nukasaan pahunchaate hain. manushyon ke svaasthy ke lie khatara paida karane ke alaava
hamaare desh mein laakhon andhe bachche hain keet ek saamaany shabd hai jo jeevit jeevon jaise keet, krntak, kharapatavaar, kavak aadi ke lie laagoo hota hai, jo bhojan ke lie manushy ke saath pratispardha karate hain aur is prakriya mein manushyon ko svaasthy ke lie khatara paida karane ke alaava paudhon aur jaanavaron ko nukasaan pahunchaate hain.
