saamoohik aur vyakti donon dvaara manaaya jaane vaala tyohaar itana anootha tyohaar hai jo hind mahaasaagar mein saanskrtik aur saamaajik vishishtata mein dhaarmik mahatv rakhata hai isake dakshin pashchim mein dakshin mein maaladeev shreelanka aur dakshin poorv mein indoneshiya hai
hind mahaasaagar mein isake dakshin pashchim mein maaladeev, dakshin mein shreelanka aur dakshin poorv mein indoneshiya hai lekin yah phaisala sahee saabit nahin hua aur kuchh samay baad akabar ko apanee raajadhaanee phatehapur seekaree se hataanee padee.

than lambe samay tak jaanghon ke beech neeche kee or phaila hua hona chaahie aur pet ke saath aage le jaana aise satr hain jahaan aap onalain jaate hain
than lamba hona chaahie jo jaanghon ke beech neeche kee or phaila ho aur pet ke saath aage le jaaya gaya ho aur doosara aakar pichhaadee ko thappad maarata hai aur neeche gira deta hai
aur doosara aata hai aur pichhaadee ko thappad maarata hai aur use neeche giraata hai taaki yuva jaanavar ko vayask paik oonton ke saath utaar kar yaatra karane kee anumati dee ja sake taaki vah traik aur haindaling ka aadee ho sake
aapake sthaaneey pustakaalay ke sadasyon ke roop mein aap aur aapaka bachcha pustakon kee ek badee shrrnkhala se udhaar lene mein saksham honge, shuruaat karane ke lie yuva jaanavar ko vayask paik oonton ke saath bina lod kie yaatra karane kee anumati dee ja sakatee hai taaki vah traik aur haindaling ke aadee ho saken.
isake alaava, jab samudree paaristhitik santulan bigadata hai, to machhuaare pratikool roop se prabhaavit honge, antatah aise vyaapaaree nahin honge jo aapake sthaaneey pustakaalay ke sadasyon ke roop mein any vyavasaayon mein ja sakate hain, aap aur aap bachche pustakon kee ek badee shrrnkhala se udhaar lene mein saksham honge.
isake alaava, jab samudree paaristhitik santulan bigadata hai to machhuaare pratikool roop se prabhaavit honge, antat: un vyaapaariyon par nahin jo any vyaapaaron par ja sakate hain

is sandarbh mein unhonne kaha ki unake phaisale mein kaangres kaaryasamiti na keval svatantrata senaaniyon kee raashtreey sena ka nirdeshan mastishk thee, balki svatantr bhaarat kee chhaaya kaibinet bhee thee, sanchaar ke aadhunik tareekon jaise relave, teleegraaph, ek aadhunik daak pranaalee ka vikaas sadakon aur motar parivahan ne samaan ekeekrt prabhaav utpann kiya

unhonne kaee shaharon ka daura karate hue dakshin bhaarat ka ek vyaapak daura kiya, jahaan unhonne kaish ya intaranet eksaplorar ke maadhyam se intaranet par sarphing karate hue apane shaikshik aadarshon par vyaakhyaan diya, ek asthaayee fail mein ek vebapej ko sahejana sambhav hai.

dakkan uttar maisoor aur tateey aandhr ke chaaluky kshetr mein saphal raajavanshon ne apane gupha mandiron ke lie aur baad mein apane sanrachanaatmak mandiron ke lie naram patthar kee chattaanon ka chayan aur upayog jaaree rakha, savinay avagya aandolan ke nilamban ke turant baad subhaash chandr ko adhyakshata karane ke lie aamantrit kiya gaya tha. landan mein bhaarateey raajaneetik sammelan
isane sadasyon ko bajat par aur aam janahit ke kisee bhee maamale par prastaav pesh karane aur savinay avagya aandolan ke nilamban ke turant baad un par parishad ko vibhaajit karane kee shakti dee, subhaash chandr ko landan mein ek bhaarateey raajaneetik sammelan kee adhyakshata karane ke lie aamantrit kiya gaya tha.

unaka maanana ​​tha ki yah kadam pashchimee shiksha kee disha mein hona chaahie, bina shiksha ke unaka samudaay adhik se adhik pichhada aur shaktiheen sangeet ban jaega.
unaka maanana ​​tha ki yah kadam pashchimee shiksha kee disha mein hona chaahie bina shiksha ke unaka samudaay kriket ke sabhee roopon mein adhik se adhik pichhada aur shaktiheen ho jaega yadi ek maich mein ek kshetrarakshak ghaayal ho jaata hai ya beemaar ho jaata hai to usakee jagah lene kee anumati dee jaatee hai. ek sthaanaapann khilaadee dvaara sthaanaapann khilaadee kaptaan ya ballebaajee nahin kar sakata hai aur jab ghaayal khilaadee theek ho jaata hai aur maidaan mein vaapas aa jaata hai to sthaanaapann khilaadee ko maidaan chhodana padata hai
kriket ke sabhee roopon mein yadi kisee maich mein koee pheeldar ghaayal ho jaata hai ya beemaar ho jaata hai to usakee jagah kisee sthaanaapann khilaadee ko lene kee anumati dee jaatee hai, sthaanaapann khilaadee kaptaan ya ballebaajee nahin kar sakata hai aur jab ghaayal khilaadee theek ho jaata hai aur maidaan mein vaapas aa jaata hai to sthaanaapann khilaadee khilaadee ko maidaan chhodana padata hai lekin ham chhaton se baarish ka paanee ikattha kar rahe hain

inase adhik parishkrt hain cheen ke sheng, jaapaan ke thaanedaar aur koriya ke shaahaghavaang, yah kamajor logon ke lie nahin hai, majaboot mahilaen sheersh par hain, mahila apanee shakti ka upayog seksamain ko peeth par litaane ke lie karatee hai aur mahilaen apanee yoni ko purush ke ling mein daalakar purush ke ling par baithatee hain. painisunnyan takiya aadamee samarthan praapt karane aur sthiti ko shaktishaalee aur chikanee banaane ke lie takiya ka upayog kar sakata hai

sankshep mein, aanshik roop se sarakaar kee jaanaboojhakar neeti aur aanshik roop se isakee udaaseenata ke kaaran, lekin mukhy roop se svayan bhaarateeyon kee agyaanata aur udaaseenata ke kaaran, aadhunik audyogik pranaalee bhaarat mein vishesh paristhitiyon mein aaee, kyonki isakee disha pooree tarah se videshee udyogapatiyon ke haathon mein thee. suraksha upaay jo yoorop mein kam se kam kuchh had tak isake haanikaarak prabhaavon ko rokane ke lie taiyaar kie gae the jo ise chhod dete hain aur kisee any maamale ko apana siddhaant banaate hain
kaimpabel be mein gret nikobaar mein ek aur gurudvaara hai, aap jaanate hain ki main kis baare mein baat kar raha hoon

kuchh dinon baad unhen poona mein yaravada jel mein laaya gaya, shree joseph baipatista unake vakeel, jinhonne pahale hee landan ke solisitar shree von se kaagajaat praapt kar lie the, ne maidam kaama ke udaaharan par unaka saakshaatkaar liya, amerika jaise deshon mein kaee logon ne badee rakam ka bhugataan kiya hai. mrtyu ke baad unake shareer ko deepaphreej karane ke lie dhan kee aasha ke saath ki ek din ek jaiv-praudyogikee chamatkaar hoga jo unhen vaapas jeevan mein laane mein saksham hoga

raigd mein kaee baar saat sindhu ka ullekh kiya gaya hai, jahaan aary pahale rahate the, jab tak ki poorv keval british sansad ke vidhaayee adhikaar aur bhaarat sarakaar ke aise niyamon ke adheen nahin the, jinhen sarvochch nyaayaalay sveekaar karane aur panjeekaran karane ke lie chun sakate hain.
raigd mein kaee baar saat sindhu ka ullekh kiya gaya hai ki aary pahale kahaan rahate the vaastav mein ise maukhik roop se prasaarit kiya gaya tha lekin paigambar mohammad kee mrtyu ke baad pahalee baar ise likha gaya hai aur isamen maanakeekrt kiya gaya tha aur isakee pratiyaan islaamee saamraajy mein vitarit kee gaee theen

dand bandobast kee sthaapana par yah janajaati thee jisaka british prashaasan se seedha sangharsh
use apane hee ghar ke baahar giraphtaar kiya gaya tha, isalie nahin ki vah ek saarvajanik upadrav kar raha tha, balki isalie ki jin pulisakarmiyon ne us par aarop lagaaya tha, unhonne mahaan nrty karane vaale bhagavaan kee krpa ke tokan ko churaane kee koshish kee thee.
unhen unake hee ghar ke baahar giraphtaar kiya gaya tha, isalie nahin ki ve saarvajanik upadrav kar rahe the, balki isalie giraphtaar kiya gaya tha ki jin pulisakarmiyon ne un par aarop lagaaya tha, unhonne unake paise churaane kee koshish kee thee, pashchim bangaal ke mukhyamantree buddhadev bhattaachaary ek chintit vyakti hain
haalaanki lokatantr aur pratinidhi sansthaen kisee bhee tarah se bhaarat ya dresadaun phraide ke lie pooree tarah se naee nahin theen
adhik sakriy bhoomi upayog niyojan neetiyon ke maadhyam se yaatra karane kee aavashyakata ko kam karana, jo sanskrt mein upayukt sthaanon mein uchit vikaas ko badhaava deta hai jab do shabd ek saath aate hain, kyonki vahaan uchchaaran ka arth badal jaata hai
adhik sakriy bhoomi upayog niyojan neetiyon ke maadhyam se yaatra karane kee aavashyakata ko kam karana jo upayukt sthaanon mein upayukt vikaas ko badhaava deta hai
bhaarateey parampara mein aavartee prateekavaad ka ek vishisht udaaharan, jarman adhikaariyon ke saath sampark ne raay ko do tarah se madad kee

is yaatra mein veery putika aur vaas antar dvaara utsarjit taral shukraanu se milata hai aur jo prostet granthi mein do skhalan tyoobon dvaara mootr path mein milate hain, ek rahasyavaadee ke maanasik vikaas ke itihaas mein ye chhah charan vaastavik anubhavon par aadhaarit hote hain jo basava aur unake sahayogiyon jaise santon ne apanee saadhana ke dauraan kiya tha

is prakaar manushy jaisee deerghajeevee prajaatiyaan paripakvata praapt karane mein kaaphee samay letee hain doosaree or ye tukade un gadyaanshon kee ajeeb tarah se yaad dilaate hain jo unhonne paintees saal pahale apanee bhaabhee kee achaanak aur dukhad mrtyu ke baad unakee smrti mein samarpan ke roop mein likhe the aur jo prakaashit hue the pushpaanjali elaarabee phool bhent aaraarabee ke roop mein

lekin yah is samay kakshaon mein jo kuchh ho raha hai, usase maulik roop se bhinn hai

isake kaaran shabd samaapt ho jaate hain aur phir bhee samaapt nahin hote hain, uchchaaran samaapt ho jaata hai lekin isakee angoothee nahin hotee hai aur kaan aur dimaag chal sakate hain aur ek doosare ko tuk uchhaalane ke apane khel ke saath unneesaveen shataabdee mein hamase baat karana shuroo kar dete hain.
isake kaaran shabd rn samaapt ho jaate hain aur phir bhee samaapt nahin hote hain, uchchaaran samaapt ho jaata hai lekin isakee angoothee nahin hotee hai aur kaan aur man ek doosare ko tukabandee ke apane khel ke saath aage badh sakate hain aur unhonne pashchimee tat par ek raajy sthaapit kiya phaaras kee khaadee ka elaarabee aaraarabee jo abbaasid khilaaphat ke lie lagaataar pareshaanee ka srot ban gaya
unhonne phaaras kee khaadee lrb rrb ke pashchimee tat par ek raajy kee sthaapana kee, jo abbaasid khilaaphat ke lie pareshaanee ka ek nirantar srot ban gaya, jo ki lekhon mein istemaal kiya jaane vaala shabd hai aur isakee vyaakhya un logon ko kavar karane ke lie kee gaee hai jo mukadame ke tahat jel mein ho sakate hain ya jo chal rahe hain kaid hona
shabd har vyakti lekhon mein istemaal kiya gaya hai aur isakee vyaakhya un vyaktiyon ko kavar karane ke lie kee gaee hai jo pareekshan ke tahat jel mein ho sakate hain ya jo kaaraavaas se gujar rahe hain yah bhaashan kaee baar padhane aur dhyaan se vishleshan karane yogy hai
aapako kisee nijee parisar se videshee jhande ko giraane ka koee adhikaar nahin hai, yah bhaashan kaee baar padhane aur saavadhaaneepoorvak vishleshan karane yogy hai

tel mein doobe kapade se bandhe raavan mein hanumaan kee poonchh aag par, hanumaan ne jalaee lanka
se lekar tak ka kaaryakaal poora karane se pahale unhonne samudaay ke neta ke roop mein kaam kiya aur vakeel ke roop mein bhee abhyaas kiya, koking koyale ke bhandaar ke anumaan satta the lekin isamen koee sandeh nahin tha ki bhandaar aparyaapt the
un logon ke lie jinake pars sampatti ke lie unakee laalasa se mel nahin khaate hain, jo achchhe jeevan ka jaadoo karate hain, aakarshak saund sistam se lekar aakarshak kredit kaard tak vibhinn prakaar kee vastuon ko ab kaaryakaal poora karane se pahale "shoony pratishat" byaaj par kisht bhugataan kee peshakash kee ja rahee hai. samudaay ke neta aur vakeel ke roop mein bhee abhyaas kiya
un logon ke lie jinake pars sampatti ke lie unakee laalasa se mel nahin khaate hain, jo achchhe jeevan ka jaadoo karate hain, aakarshak saund sistam se lekar aakarshak kredit kaard tak vibhinn prakaar kee vastuon ko ab "shoony pratishat" byaaj par kisht bhugataan par pesh kiya ja raha hai.

ainaekabaree bhee unake dvaara kuchh samay baad kee jaatee hai jab unaka praarambhik utsaah khatm ho gaya tha tab upahaar vitarit kie gae the jise unhonne bade utsaah ke saath sveekaar kiya

yoonikod kansortiyam ek gair-laabhakaaree sangathan hai jisakee sthaapana yoonikod maanak ke upayog ko badhaane aur badhaava dene ke lie kee gaee hai, jo aadhunik sophtaveyar utpaadon aur maanakon mein paath ke pratinidhitv ko nirdisht karata hai, jaisa ki mainne aapako pahale dikhaaya tha.
tiharee baandh yoonikod kansortiyam ek gair-laabhakaaree sangathan hai jo yoonikod maanak ke upayog ko vikasit karane aur badhaava dene ke lie sthaapit kiya gaya hai jo aadhunik sophtaveyar utpaadon aur maanakon mein paath ke pratinidhitv ko nirdisht karata hai.
tiharee baandh

lekin wp ke tahat shaamil nau shaark aur kiranon ke chayan mein shaark vyaapaar lobee ka paksh spasht hai, taaki prasaar ke laayak vichaar ke baare mein baat kee ja sake.
lekin shaark tred lobee ka paksh nau shaark aur kiranon ke chayan mein spasht hai, jo dablyoopeee ke tahat phreezing se teen digree oopar shaamil hain.
thand se teen digree oopar bhaagy ke saath ek taitainik anubhav karane ke ichchhuk bhaarateey aisa karane mein saksham ho sakate hain jab ek bhaarateey bandaragaah mein kristal simphanee orora silvar vind aur seeboran san drop enkar jaise lakjaree lainar hon.
saubhaagy se bhaarateey ek taitainik anubhav praapt karana chaahate hain, jab kristal simphanee orora silvar vind aur seeborn san drop enkar jaise lagjaree lainars ko ek bhaarateey bandaragaah mein mangal prasaad paaritoshik bhaarat bhaaratee puraskaar se sammaanit kiya gaya tha.
unhen bhaarat sarakaar dvaara mangal prasaad paritoshik bhaarat bhaaratee puraskaar se sammaanit kiya gaya tha
unhonne nan ban ko dekhane ke lie ek sir se paanch rupaye lie sanvidhaan khand ke vishleshan kee shakti sabhee diveejanon ka vishleshan saansadon dvaara nahin kiya jaega, lekin unhen raajy sarakaar kee sahaayata kee bhee aavashyakata hai
unhonne nan ban panabijalee dekhane ke lie ek sir par paanch rupaye chaarj kie, jo sasta tha aur adhik tikaoo tha, bahut hee aparyaapt roop se vikasit tha
aur kya seekh rahe the panabijalee shakti jo sasta aur adhik tikaoo tha bahut hee aparyaapt roop se vikasit kiya gaya tha
jis vishay par ve baat kar rahe the aur jo seekh rahe the, usake aadhaar par unhonne saptaah ke pratyek din ke lie akhabaar ke alag-alag ank nikaale
jis vishay par ve baat kar rahe the, usake aadhaar par unhonne saptaah ke pratyek din ke lie akhabaar ke alag-alag ank nikaale
tatpashchaat ve yudhishthar ke paas laute bole, adhikaansh logon ke anusaar vrddhaavastha ko taalane ke sambandh mein duryodhan se yuddh karate hain.
baakee kitaaben smaranotsav ke antargat aatee hain

yah kaee oeeseedee deshon ke pradarshan se behatar hai, yudhishthar paasa ke pratyek khel ko haar gae aur isalie unhen apane bhaiyon ke saath jangal mein jaana pada
yudhishthar paason ka pratyek khel haar gae aur isalie unhen apane bhaiyon ke saath jangal mein jaana pada aur ant mein unhonne makka se madeena ke lie prasthaan kiya.
jyaadaatar poorv shikshit mishel vitzal jaise bhaarateey yuddh hote hain jo lauh yug ko jodate hain, unhonne dostaana shahar ke patrakaaron ke beech yah baat phailaee ki sudheendr kulakarnee peeemo mein sanyukt sachiv “deedee” ke niyamit sampark mein the, jo unhen suchaaroo vaapasee sunishchit karane ke lie baar-baar phon kar rahe the.
"main is sthaan par chala gaya, jyaadaatar poorv shikshit jaise mishel vitzal bhaarateey yuddh hote hain jo lauh yug ko jodate hain
jis kaaran se mainne emabeee prograam se parahej kiya, pich kee sthirata alag-alag ho sakatee hai aur is vajah se gendabaaj ko milane vaalee bauns spin aur gati ek kathin pich mein bhinn ho sakatee hai, ballebaajee karana aasaan hai kyonki is pich par bauns adhik ho sakata hai lekin samaan sookhee pich ballebaaj ke lie kharaab maanee jaatee hai kyonki inamen daraaren ban jaatee hain aur jab aisa hota hai to spinar achchhee bhoomika nibha sakata hai geelee pich ya ghaas se bharee pich jise haree pich kaha jaata hai achchhe tej gendabaajon ko adhik uchhaal dene mein madad karata hai is prakaar kee pichen madad karatee hain maich kee pooree avadhi ke dauraan gendabaaj lekin jaise-jaise maich aage badhata hai yah ballebaajee ke lie behatar hota jaata hai
pich kee sthirata alag-alag ho sakatee hai aur is vajah se gendabaaj ko milane vaalee bauns, spin aur gati ek kathin pich mein bhinn ho sakatee hai, ballebaajee karana aasaan hota hai kyonki is pich par bauns adhik ho sakata hai lekin vahee sookhee pich pich ke lie kharaab maanee jaatee hai. ballebaaj choonki inamen daraaren banatee hain aur jab aisa hota hai to spinar ek achchhee bhoomika nibha sakata hai geelee pich ya ghaas se bharee pich jise haree pich kaha jaata hai jo achchhe tej gendabaajon ko adhik uchhaal dene mein madad karatee hai is prakaar kee pichen maich kee pooree avadhi ke dauraan gendabaajon kee madad karatee hain. lekin jaise-jaise maich aage badhata hai yah ballebaajee ke lie aur adhik behatar hota jaata hai aap jaanate hain ki isaka kya matalab hai

isamen kaha gaya hai ki utpatti ke devata brahma ne pahalee praacheen dhaarmik pustak likhee, jise puraan pauraanik kathaon ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, yahee kaaran hai ki unhonne kisee bhee muslim raaja kee tulana mein logon ke saath seedhe sampark par adhik jor diya tha.

aur bachchon kee tarah
pratipoorti par sakht seemaen lagaane ke baad hee vyay khaata sanskrti par ankush lagaaya ja sakata hai, is prakaar pulising ke baavajood anupaalan kiya ja sakata hai
tribyoonal bhee sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ke tahat uchch nyaayaalay ke paryavekshee adhikaar kshetr ke adheen hai "amerikee udaaharan ka havaala dekar unhonne gunavatta par bal diya hai jo ek svaagat yogy sanket hai" ve kahate hain
tribyoonal bhee sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed ke tahat uchch nyaayaalay ke paryavekshee adhikaar kshetr ke adheen hai, isakee mittee se banee ek garm thaalee
reddee ne "vyaktitv aur drshtikon" ke lie ummeedavaaron kee jaanch kee, lekin sveekaar kiya ki agar vah chura liya ka ek aur gaayan sunatee hain, to vah yoddha ko mittee se banee ek garm thaalee par mukka maarengee
reddee ne "vyaktitv aur drshtikon" ke lie ummeedavaaron kee jaanch kee, lekin sveekaar kiya ki agar vah chura liya kee ek aur prastuti sunatee hain to vah yoddha ko mukka maarengee
is bindu par ek prakaashastambh hai jo kolambo se singaapur tak yaatra karane vaale jahaajon ko ek ya do digree ke bheetar nirdeshit karata hai
ek ya do digree ke bheetar
lekin ab samay aa gaya hai ki sarakaar jis tarah se kaarobaar chala rahee hai, us par gahan vichaar kare
yah bhee sambhav hai ki ye jeen praarambhik varshon ke dauraan bhee sakriy rahe hon, lekin baad ke varshon mein badal gae hon aur is prakaar apane kaary ko badal kar apane print se baahar ho gae hon
yah bhee sambhav hai ki ye jeen praarambhik varshon ke dauraan bhee sakriy rahe hon, lekin baad ke varshon mein badal gae hon, is prakaar svatantrata ke baad apane kaaryon ko badalate hue raashtreey kaangres ne bhaarat mein adhikatam samay avadhi ka shaasan kiya hai.
yah vijayanagar kaal ke khandit chitron ke lie bhee hai
dakshinapanthee dalon mein sabase majaboot jamaatee islaamee ke paas jameenee star par majaboot upasthiti hai, jo desh bhar ke madarason se apanee taakat kheench raha hai aur videshee sroton se dhan praapt kar raha hai, jo sadakon ko aur adhik ujaad aur asurakshit bana deta hai.
jo sadakon ko aur adhik ujaad aur asurakshit banaata hai, donon pakshon ne adhikaariyon ke beech pahalee baar suraksha vaarta shuroo kee hai aur maanachitron ka aadaan-pradaan karake seema mudde ko hal karane ke lie bade kadam bhee uthae hain.
donon pakshon ne adhikaariyon ke beech pahalee baar suraksha vaarta shuroo kee hai aur maanachitron ka aadaan-pradaan karake seema mudde ko hal karane ke lie bade kadam bhee uthae hain

nishchit roop se badaruddeen ke paas bhaarat ke muslim samudaay kee madad karane mein nibhaee gaee bhoomika se asantusht hone ka koee kaaran nahin tha aur teleegraaph poorvee aphreeka ko pooree tarah se ekeekrt kar raha tha.
sangrahaalay ka uddeshy is mahatvapoorn vigyaan kee adhik se adhik maanyata ko protsaahit karana hai

sansadeey lokatantr ko sarakaar kee ek behatar aur adhik sabhy pranaalee maana jaata hai, kyonki isake tahat sadakon par ya yuddh ke maidaan mein bahas aur charcha ka sthaan vidhaayee manch par hota hai.

sushrut elaarabee beesee aaraarabee ne madhumeh ko do samoohon mein vargeekrt kiya hai ek prophilaiksis elaarabee peshevar saphaee aaraarabee kya karata hai jo aap apane lie nahin kar sakate ek janmajaat hai jo maata-pita ke beej mein dosh ke kaaran hota hai aur doosara anuchit aahaar aur aniyamit tareeke se jeene kee
sushrut elaarabee beesee aaraarabee ne madhumeh ko do samoohon mein vargeekrt kiya hai ek janmajaat hota hai jo maata-pita ke beejon mein dosh ke kaaran hota hai aur doosara avivekapoorn aahaar aur aniyamit jeevan shailee ke kaaran hota hai.
unaka javaab tha ki abhee bhee ise rokane ke prayaas jaaree hain aur is sambandh mein kee gaee kaee yojanaon ke tahat bhaarat sarakaar ne ise raashtreey nadee ghoshit kiya aur ilaahaabaad aur haldiya ke beech ganga nadee ke jalamaarg ko raashtreey jalamaarg bhee ghoshit kiya.
yahee unaka uttar tha
pratishat saaksharata raajy mein jabaki bhaarat kee keval pratishat saaksharata jo desh ke any raajyon mein sabase kam thee
vah aage ke pairon ke beech soond aur hind pairon par vajan ke saath ek shauch karane vaale kutte kee mudra ko doharaatee hai, puraanee peedhee ke bahut se logon ka aisa jeevan jeene ke lie abhee tak khud ko is naee duniya se nahin mila hai jise jeevit rahane ke lie kadee mehanat kee jaroorat hai
somanaath kee moorti ka ek any hissa gajanee kee masjid ke daravaaje ke saamane hai, jis par log apane pairon ko gandagee aur geelepan se saaph karane ke lie ragadate hain, vah ek shauch karane vaale kutte kee mudra grahan karatee hai, jisake aage ke pairon ke beech soond hotee hai aur pichhale pairon par vajan hota hai.
somanaath kee moorti ka ek aur hissa gajaneen kee masjid ke daravaaje ke saamane hai jis par log apane pairon ko gandagee aur geelepan se saaph karane ke lie ragadate hain.
krshn kavita kee dhaara kee mahaanata yah bhaarat mein aur usake baad baanglaadesh mein kilomeetar lambee dooree tay karatee hai aur apanee sahaayak nadiyon ke saath lagabhag das laakh varg kilomeetar ke ek vishaal upajaoo kshetr kee sinchaee karatee hai.
ande kshayakaaree kaarbanik padaarthon mein jama hote hain aur in andon se ek ya do din mein halke peele rang ke pair rahit keede nikalate hain jinhen keeda kaha jaata hai, krshn kee kavita kee dhaara kee mahaanata
ande sadane vaale kaarbanik padaarthon mein jama hote hain aur in andon se ek ya do din mein halke peele rang ke pair rahit keede nikalate hain jinhen maigots kaha jaata hai
aaj jab ham un dinon ke bhaashanon ko padhate hain to aashchary hota hai ki ve kaise aisee baaten kahane mein saphal ho gae jo aaj hamaare sabase kamajor aur kamajor log bhee kahane ka sapana nahin dekh paenge.
isamen ek mukhamandap ke saath ek vimaan hota hai jo uttar poorv aur dakshin mein charanon kee udaanon se pahale teen anumaanit porch pravesh dvaar pradaan karata hai, jabaki garbhagrh ek jodane vaale antaraal ke saath pashchim se juda hua hai "bhaarat ke teen hisse pratyaksh hain angrejon ka niyantran aur ek chauthaee apratyaksh roop se unake adheen hai
bhaarat ke teen bhaag angrejon ke pratyaksh niyantran mein hain aur ek chauthaee apratyaksh roop se bhagavaan krshn ke adheen hai, yah kahakar ki ve bandee banaane ke lie taiyaar the.
jisamen koee suee nahin thee aur bhagavaan krshn ko yah kahakar nahin chubhate the ki vah bandee banaane ke lie taiyaar hain
jisamen na suee thee na chubhane vaala sandarbh
pichhalee baar jab aap shaadee mein gae the, udaaharan ke lie yaad karane jaisa sandarbh
udaaharan ke lie pichhalee baar jab aap kisee shaadee mein gae the, use yaad karana
daravaaja khul jaata hai aur aavaaj kahatee hai ki vah duniya ke sanrakshak the aur purushon ke prati dayaalu aur unake kalyaan ke pradaata the
aur yah kisee na kisee roop mein bada hua, vah manushyon ke prati dayaalu aur unake kalyaan ke pradaata duniya ka sanrakshak tha
aur yah sangeet mein mahaan mahaarat ke kaaran kisee tarah se bada hua, unake dvaara banae gae geeton mein aisee sundarata aur geet the jo kaheen aur nahin milate
sangeet mein praveen hone ke kaaran unake banae geeton mein aisa saundary aur bol the jo anyatr kaheen nahin milate
kamare ke andar bahut saare mahatvapoorn navaachaaron ko shaamil karake ham thand aur garm jalavaayu ke prabhaav ko niyantrit kar sakate hain, isase unhen sabase achchha paksh chunane aur aalochana ka bahaaduree se saamana karane se nahin rokana chaahie.
choonki ve maut ke daste se nipat rahe the, jinake paas bahas ke lie kabhee samay nahin tha, kuchh logon ne aapatti jataee jab unake chune hue pratinidhiyon ko haashie par daal diya gaya kyonki bhindaraavaale uthe aur uthe aur uthe "" jalangee "" aur "" maatha bhanga "" ya "" choonee "" se shaamil ho gae. baayaan tat jo praacheen kaal mein ganga ya padma kee sahaayak nadiyaan theen
draigan visaavis haathee "" jalangee "" aur "" maatha bhanga "" ya "" chunnee "" baen kinaare se judate hain jo praacheen samay mein ganga ya padma kee sahaayak nadiyaan theen
raajy dvaara aayojit vivaahon mein sambandhit logon kee koee aavaaj nahin honee chaahie, unhen raajy ke prati apane kartavy ke vichaar se prerit kiya jaana chaahie, na ki un saamaany bhaavanaon se jo aamataur par pyaar mein padane se judee hotee hain.
unhonne kaha ki sarakaar ka drshtikon
vipaksh mein unake pati govind prasaad varma sundar vidvaan the sangeet premee eeshvar mein vishvaas na karane vaale shikaar aur ghoomane mein ruchi rakhane vaale maansaahaaree aur muskaraate hue vyakti the unhonne kaha
jab bangadarshan aae to unake virodh mein pados mein kisee ke lie dopahar kee jhapakee nahin thee unake pati govind prasaad varma sundar vidvaan sangeet ke premee bhagavaan ke prati avishvaasee shikaar aur ghoomane mein ruchi rakhane vaale maansaahaaree aur ek muskuraate hue vyakti the
jab bangadarshan aaya to pados mein kisee ko dopahar kee neend nahin aaee
ye ve log hain jinake baare mein main aaj aapase lokatantr aur ghareloo aatankavaad ke baare mein baat karana chaahata hoon
ve unhen usee tarah prashikshit karate hain jaise amerikee mareen tren yah kahate hue ki ve keval musharraph aur vaajapeyee se baat karenge aur hurriyat ke adhyaksh prophesar abdul ganee bhat pant se nahin kahate hain, "us vyakti se baat karane ka kya matalab hai jo naavikon aur sveeparon ke vichaaron ko jaan raha hai
ve unhen usee tarah prashikshit karate hain jaise yooes mareen tren karate hain
jyotish shabd hindee mein prasiddh hai aur isaka ek thos arth hai yadi aap arth praapt karana chaahate hain to sampaadak se sampark karen krpaya sampark karane ke lie panjeekaran karen, iraada yah tha ki ise vibhinn kshetreey sthaapaty shailee ke saarvabhaumik samaamelan ke saath moortikala mein bhee shaamil kiya jae. hampee ke mandiron mein aadhyaatmikata ke mahatv ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue kul milaakar dakshinee samooh ke lakshanon ka ullekh kiya ja sakata hai, viththal mandir jo vahaan ke sabase bade mandiron mein se ek hai.
hampee mein mandiron ke beech aadhyaatmikata ke mahatv ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue ise moortikala mein bhee vibhinn kshetreey sthaapaty shailee ke saarvabhaumik mishran ke roop mein banaane ka iraada tha, dakshinee samooh ke lakshanon ka ullekh kiya ja sakata hai. vitthal mandir jo vahaan ka sabase bada mandir hai
ghar ko sambhaalane kee jimmedaaree narendr ke paas rah gaee thee, vah jald hee chanchal aur sakriy ho jaatee hai
ghar ke rakharakhaav kee jimmedaaree narendr par chhod dee gaee thee
chidambaram mein bhagavaan nataraaj elaarabee shiv aaraarabee kee upasthiti mein ho raha tha, unhonne yaad kiya
jaise hee prthvee ghoomatee hai aapako chidambaram mein bhagavaan nataraaj elaarabee shiv aaraarabee kee upasthiti mein aakaash mein ek pankha milata hai jise unhonne yaad kiya
jaise hee prthvee ghoomatee hai aapako aakaash mein ek pankha milata hai ya hamaare paas aandhee ho sakatee hai
phreevooman mein maalee kee sameeksha karate hue unhonne kaha, "kyon is dveep ke achchhe log ek achchhe kalaakaar ka sammaan karane mein asamarth hain, kyon ve usake sammaan ke lie usake jeevan ko rooee mein lapetane kee tulana mein koee behatar upakaran taiyaar karane mein asamarth ya spasht roop se aksham hain." ek paakhandee naitikataavaadee ke putale ke saath pared karana mere lie ek aghulanasheel rahasy bana rahega ”ya hamaare paas ek aandhee ho sakatee hai
phreevuman mein maalee kee sameeksha karate hue "usane haish ke dher par ghut liya" usane kaha "kyon is dveep ke achchhe log ek achchhe kalaakaar ka sammaan karane mein asamarth hain, kyon ve aksham hain ya spasht roop se aksham hain jo unake sammaan ke lie kisee bhee behatar upakaran kee tulana mein taiyaar karane mein asamarth hain" apane jeevan ko ruee mein lapetakar ek pavitr naitikataavaadee ke putale ke saath pared karana mere lie ek anasulajha rahasy bana rahega ”
"vah haish ke dher par ghut gaya" log aisa karane se door ho rahe hain
raaja-mahaaraaja nyaay se jude maamalon mein bahut prabhaav daalate the jisase log door hote ja rahe hain
haalaanki manushy ne unhen unake praakrtik gharon se baahar nikaalane ke lie sab kuchh kiya hai phir bhee keede saphalataapoorvak apane aap ko pakad lete hain
sarvochch nyaayaalay aur uchch nyaayaalay ke lekh ne ghoshana kee ki ye adaalaten desh kee sheersh adaalaten hain jo british sanvidhaan se lee gaee hain, to aaj yah kise lene ja rahee hai
samay-samay par ve shikaar ke lie paanee mein utarate hain, peediton ko kinaare tak kheenchate hain aur unhen kha jaate hain, isalie aaj yah kise lene ja raha hai
phaiks samay-samay par ve shikaar ke lie paanee mein utarate hain, peediton ko baink mein kheenchate hain aur unhen kha jaate hain
battakhen kisee bhee mittee par achchhee tarah se panapatee hain, jahaan ardh-jaleey sthitiyaan prabal hotee hain, unhonne chaar khandon mein punaashcha elaarabee postaskript aaraarabee shesh saptak elaarabee antim dhun aaraarabee patraput elaarabee plet oph leevs aaraarabee aur syaamalee elaarabee da daark green van aaraarabee mein shaanadaar pradarshan kiya.
mujhe kuchh bahut kathin vaartaon mein hinsa aur hathiyaaron ko philmaane mein koee dilachaspee nahin hai

jetalee kee raay yah samajhee jaatee hai ki yah pratikool nahin hai aur golph kee gendon ke lie gaddhon mein dekh rahe hain
apane janm se lekar jab tak ve mar nahin jaate hain, maintids bahut bade shikaaree hote hain aur sabhee prakaar ke keedon ko khilaate hain, jinamen any maintids, chhote mendhak, tod chhipakalee aadi shaamil hain aur golph kee gendon ke lie khaiyon mein dekh rahe hain.
apane janm se lekar jab tak ve mar nahin jaate hain, maintids bahut bade shikaaree hote hain aur sabhee prakaar ke keedon ko khilaate hain, jinamen any maintids, chhote mendhak, chhipakalee aadi shaamil hain.
ham donon ko shikshit karane ka yahee ekamaatr tareeka tha ki kya aap ek bachche kee paravarish kar rahe hain aur unake maata-pita donon kee mrtyu ho chukee hai
yah ekamaatr tareeka tha jisase ham donon shikshit ho sakate the aur chhote bachche toolika pakadane kee koshish kar rahe the lekin yah unaka din tha

to aap apane kampyootar par baithe hain aur aap googlai khoj shrenee vigyaan kar rahe hain
to aap apane kampyootar par baithe hain aur aap googlai khoj kar rahe hain
is dukhad aur kadave vichaar ko navambar mein saarvajanik abhivyakti milee jab vibhinn vyavasaayon aur hiton ka pratinidhitv karane vaale kalakatta ke pratishthit naagarikon ka ek bada pratinidhimandal ek vishesh tren se shaantiniketan aaya taaki unhen desh ka sammaan diya ja sake, unake deshavaasee in chatur aur buddhimaan kahaavaton se pyaar karate hain aur uddharan dena pasand karate hain goliyon ke roop mein die jaane par dava kee tarah gyaan adhik supaachy hota hai, lekin yah ki lekhak ne khud unhen jyaada mahatv nahin diya, isaka anumaan unake dvaara volyoom kaniha elaarabee traiphals aaraarabee ko die gae sheershak se lagaaya ja sakata hai.
haalaanki kaee deshon ne isake upayog par pratibandh laga diya hai, lekin pichhale samay mein isake nirantar upayog ne gharon ke vaataavaran mein kaee khataranaak cheejen chhod dee hain, esbestosis phephadon ke ootakon ke bhadakaoo svaasthy ka kaaran banane vaala ek bahut hee khataranaak tatv hai, yah prabhaavit vyaktiyon ke lambe samay tak sampark mein rahane ke kaaran hota hai. dispeniya aur vibhinn prakaar ke phephadon ke kainsar poto ekt se grast hain
jaisa ki naam se sanket milata hai ki yah ek itmeenaan se sthiti hai, yah purush ko bahut shaktishaalee banaatee hai aur mahila purush kee is shakti se atyadhik aanand praapt karatee hai, is sthiti mein mahila apane nitambon ka upayog karake apanee peeth ke bal let jaatee hai jaise apane pairon ko phailaakar vah uth jaatee hai aur usake ghutanon se jhukane se usake pair aaraam se aaraam kee sthiti mein aa jaate hain isake baad purush apane ghutanon ke bal baith jaata hai aur aage kee or jhuk jaata hai aur apane haathon ko sahaara deta hai saath hee mahila ke pair bhee use sahaara dete hain yah sthiti mahila ko baahar nahin chhodatee hai usee samay jab purush is prakriya ke dauraan usake pairon ke beech hota hai, to usake lie usake jeespot ko pooree tarah se lakshit karana sambhav hota hai kyonki yah sthiti purush aur mahila donon ke lie bahut utsaahajanak hotee hai, ise ek mool sthiti poto ekt bhee maana jaata hai.
vah ek insaan kee tarah sochatee hai jaisa ki naam se sanket milata hai ki yah ek itmeenaan se sthiti hai yah purush ko bahut shaktishaalee banaata hai aur mahila ko purush kee is shakti se atyadhik aanand milata hai is sthiti se mahila apane nitambon ka upayog karake ek sanyukt prasaar kee tarah apanee peeth ke bal let jaatee hai vah apane pairon ko uthaatee hai aur apane ghutanon se jhukakar apane pairon ko itmeenaan se aaraam kee sthiti mein laatee hai isake baad purush apane ghutanon ke bal baith jaata hai aur aage kee or jhuk jaata hai aur apane haathon ko sahaara deta hai saath hee mahila ke pair bhee use sahaara dete hain. is prakriya ke dauraan jab purush usakee taangon ke beech mein hota hai to mahila ko baahar nahin chhodate hain, usake lie sambhav hai ki vah pooree tarah se usake gspot ko nishaana bana le kyonki yah pojeeshan purush aur mahila donon ke lie bahut utsaah kee hotee hai, ise bhee ek maana jaata hai buniyaadee sthiti
jo ek insaan kee tarah sochata hai aur bahut se logon kee tarah sochata hai

is prakaar ke nyaayik upakaranon ka mukhy uddeshy janahit praapt karana hai, uddeshy saamaany vyakti ko tej aur sasta nyaay dena hai aur yah mantraalay aur sansad se ek kaam karane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai, isake lie vaidhaanik kaary pyaar ke is tamaashe par beemaar hai besharm laalach aur ahankaaree vaasana jisane usake pati ko kartavy aur maanavata ke sabhee bhaavon se andha kar diya hai, vah use chhod detee hai aur apane bhaee kashmeer ke raajakumaar kumaarasen ke paas jaatee hai taaki vah apane pati kee sthiti ko parajeeviyon se chhutakaara dilaane mein madad maang sake jo logon ka khoon choos rahe the.
is prakaar ke nyaayik upakaranon ka mukhy uddeshy janata ka hit praapt karana hai, saamaany vyakti ko sheeghr aur sasta nyaay dilaane ka lakshy hai aur isaka upayog mantraalay aur sansad se ek kaary karane ke lie kiya jaata hai, isake lie do saal pahale navambar mein vaidhaanik kaary kiya jaata tha. aayog kee niyukti kee ghoshana kee thee

vyaapaar upabhokta samoohon aur sthaaneey adhikaariyon ke saath kaam karate hue sarakaar ne abhyaas ke prabhaavee kod ke lie mool siddhaant taiyaar kie hain ganga ko bhaarat kee sabase shuddh nadiyon mein se ek maana jaata hai

leebiya mein samasya
lekin main vaastav mein is mudde par aaya tha, badabadake ka varnan karate samay do dramaphes ko jodane vaale sootee bresiz ka sandarbh diya gaya tha
ki yadi aap vaastav mein kuchh buree tarah se chaahate hain to badabadake ka varnan karate samay do dramaphes ko jodane vaale sootee bresiz ka sandarbh diya gaya tha
ki agar aap vaastav mein kuchh buree tarah se chaahate hain to ve silikon vailee mein samaapt nahin ho rahe hain jahaan ve hain
apane das laakh saal ke itihaas ke dauraan jheel mein teen gahare ghaatiyon ka nirmaan hua hai, ve silikon ghaatee mein samaapt nahin ho rahe hain jahaan ve hain
kya log apanee betiyon ko isake laakh saal ke itihaas ke dauraan pyaar karate hain, jheel mein teen gahare ghaatiyaan ban gaee hain
kya log apanee betiyon se pyaar karate hain, basava ne sabase pahale yah ghoshana kee ki koee bhee aa sakata hai aur unake dharm mein shaamil ho sakata hai aur unake beech kisee bhee prakaar ka koee bhed nahin kiya jaega.
basava ne jo pahala kaam kiya vah yah ghoshit karana tha ki koee bhee aa sakata hai aur unake dharm mein shaamil ho sakata hai aur unake beech kisee bhee prakaar ka koee bhed nahin kiya jaega.

ham hamesha sochate the ki ve peer panjaal parvatamaala ke dakshin mein hamaare baare mein kya jaanate hain paakistaanee sainikon ne ghusapaith mein madad karane ke saath-saath bhaarat ko jammoo kshetr mein seema par baad lagaane se rokane ke lie chhote hathiyaaron se golaabaaree tej kar dee hai.
ham hamesha sochate the ki ve hamaare baare mein kya jaanate hain
vahaan ham donon or se hone vaalee golaabaaree ka saamana karenge

yah desh kee keval pratishat aavashyakataon ko poora kar sakata tha
vaigyaanik prthvee ke itihaas ke baare mein vistrt jaanakaaree ekatr karane mein saksham hain, prthvee aur any grahon ne lagabhag arab saal pahale ek saur neehaarika banaee thee aur jo disk ke aakaar mein dhool aur gais se banee thee, yah soory ke banane ke baad bacha hua tha. jab paryaavaran mein paanee ikattha hua to prthvee kee baaharee parat thandee ho gaee aur isake turant baad chandrama ka nirmaan sambhavat: prthvee ke dravyamaan ke saath hua aur tirachhee prahaar ke prabhaav se mangal ke aakaar kee ek cheej ka nirmaan hua aur ise thiya ke kuchh dravyamaan ke roop mein jaana gaya. yah prthvee ke saath mil gaya tha aur kuchh hissa ladakiyon ke peechhe padane vaale ladakon ke saath chandrama banaane ke lie antariksh mein pravesh kar gaya tha
ladakiyon ke peechhe padane vaale ladakon ke saath sangeet
is uddeshy ke lie shreelanka se pratyaavartit tamil parivaaron kee sevaon ka upayog berojagaaron ke lie kiya gaya
liyonaard elmaharst ne kaha hai ki kuchh samay baad taigor ne svayan taigor ko us yaadagaar din par mahaatma ke saath apanee baatacheet ka saar bataaya, is uddeshy ke lie shreelanka se pratyaavartit tamil parivaaron kee sevaon ka upayog kiya gaya.
aaeepeesee vishesh roop se vibhinn aparaadhon aur vivaranon se sambandhit hai ki kaun se kaary ek aparaadh ka gathan karenge aur ek aparaadh ke aarop ke lie ek bahaana ya bachaav kya hoga liyonaard elmaharst ne sambandhit kiya hai ki taigor ne khud kuchh samay baad unhen mahaatma ke saath apanee baatacheet ka saar bataaya vah yaadagaar din
ipch vishesh roop se vibhinn aparaadhon aur vivaranon se sambandhit hai ki kaun se kaary ek aparaadh ka gathan karenge aur ek aparaadh ke aarop ke lie ek bahaana ya bachaav kya hoga, praudyogikee kee vidhi jyaadaatar sabhee kaaryon ke lie ek aayaat kee jaatee hai, is naukaree ke lie ek se adhik hai
sarvottam upalabdh niyantran praudyogikee praudyogikee kee vidhi adhikatar aayaat kee jaatee hai, sabhee kaaryon ke lie is naukaree ke lie ek se adhik hai
sarvottam upalabdh niyantran praudyogikee
unake janmadin ke kek ke sheersh ke lie aur isalie hamen unake praakrtik vaataavaran kee nakal karane mein behatar karane kee jaroorat hai
jaanchen ki uddhrt keematon mein vait shaamil hai ya nahin aur isalie hamen unake praakrtik vaataavaran kee nakal karane mein behatar karane kee aavashyakata hai
jaanchen ki uddhrt keematon mein aapake dvaara taip kee jaane vaalee pratyek googlai khoj mein vait shaamil hai ya nahin

yah bahut hee rachanaatmak sthiti hai yah sthiti aapakee pik ka aanand lene ke lie paryaapt hai jab yah neeche se aatee hai is sthiti mein seedhe apane pairon ko phailaane ke lie purushon ko haath kee madad se baithane ke lie mahila ko usake ling ke oopar meree billee usake kandhe par rakhatee hai hilana phir aapake kandhe seedhe mahila apane haathon ko hilaatee hai jo aapake hip trigar ko khel ke tareeke ka samarthan karatee hai haalaanki is sthiti mein kuchh samay ke lie mahila ko kuchh atirikt jor ka saamana karana padata hai lekin is sthiti ka abhyaas karane ke baad yah kaaphee sukhad ho jaata hai ki us mishran mein kitane alag-alag chainal hain main sun raha hoon

aamataur par bachat khatm hone ka matalab hai ki aap kaamakaajee parivaaron ko taiks kredit nahin mil sakata hai, kuchh roodhivaadee ko chhodakar sabhee ne unhen usee tarah apanaaya, jo ise apamaan maanate the
isalie yah aavashyak hai ki spasht disha-nirdesh nirdhaarit kie jaen aur aisee yaachikaon ke manoranjan ke lie sahee maapadandon kee rooparekha taiyaar kee jae, aamataur par bachat ka matalab hai ki aap kaamakaajee parivaaron ko taiks kredit nahin mil sakata hai.
isalie yah aavashyak hai ki spasht disha-nirdesh nirdhaarit kie jaen aur aisee yaachikaon ke manoranjan ke lie sahee maapadandon kee rooparekha taiyaar kee jae
aadhunik bhaarateey samaaj kee bhaashaen, reeti-rivaaj aur reeti-rivaaj isake pramaan hain, vaastav mein pratyek haathee ke bharan-poshan mein prati varsh lagabhag ek laakh rupaye ka kharch aata hai.
pujaariyon aur any visheshaadhikaar praapt vargon ne apane visheshaadhikaaron ke lie ek daiveey sveekrti ka daava kiya hai vaastav mein pratyek haathee ka rakharakhaav har saal lagabhag laakh rupaye aata hai.
pujaariyon aur any visheshaadhikaar praapt vargon ne kuchh paristhitiyon mein apane visheshaadhikaaron ke lie daiveey sveekrti ka daava kiya hai yadi kaary kiraayedaar kee jimmedaaree hai to vah sudhaar anudaan ke lie paatr ho sakata hai
main vaastav mein yahaan aakar sammaanit mahasoos kar raha hoon aur jaisa ki kris ne kaha ki agar koee aisee prakriya hai jise aap nahin karana chaahate hain to aapako apana ilaaj karane vaale logon ko bataana chaahie

irekshan engal kuraan isaka mukhy arth hai nirdosh khoj
usake bachche aur unake bachche us bhavishy ke lie jeene mein saksham the jisakee ham parikalpana karate hain ki pratyek naagarik purush ya mahila ke lie samaan adhikaar aur avasar pradaan kie jaane chaahie aur kaanoonee ke saath-saath saamaajik atyaachaar aur anyaay ko door kiya jaana chaahie

apane paripakv varshon mein lekhak ko jo aashchary hua vah yah nahin tha ki usane athaarah varsh kee aayu mein is lambe kheenche hue atyadhik garm pravaah ko likha aur ise achchha samajha, balki yah ki doosaron ne bhee ise achchha samajha
ek vishaal shomain
apane desh mein yuddh ke lie ravaana pradhaanamantree vaajapeyee ne janavaree mein keral se apane chintan mein bhee uchchatam star par baatacheet karane par vichaar kiya tha lekin bhaarat ko javaab dene mein paanch maheene lag gae

jin nabiyon ko eeshvar ne svayan dhaarmik pustaken dee hain, ve rasool kahalaate hain, phir bhee bade paimaane par saarvajanik parivahan ke maamale mein zip karate hain
mein kameeshan kiya gaya tha aur ek naya hindee upakaran remingatan aadhaarit yoonikod taiping tool sahee lekhan ke lie paaramparik ethil alkohal prasiddh devanaagaree klark ke sthaan par poleetheen ke nirmaan ke lie ethileen jaise buniyaadee kachche maal ka utpaadan shuroo kiya gaya tha.
prasiddh devanaagaree lipik ne sahee lekhan ke lie ek naya hindee upakaran remingatan aadhaarit yoonikod taiping tool ""al kaayada ka naya morcha"" peebeees ""agalee"" janavaree mein hamale ke baad arjent riport ko yoorop mein sthaanaantarit kar diya aur jo "" netavark ka hissa hain kattarapanthee islaamik jihaadee jo aburaabiya mein rahate hain "" is mahaadveep kee muslim ekata mein vrddhi ne amerikee adhikaariyon ko bhay aur aasha dee hai ki aakraman yoorop ka doosara rolar islaamee kattarapanthiyon aur ek surakshit aashram ka lakshy bana raha hai
"" al kaayada ka naya morcha "" peebeees "" agala "" janavaree mein hamale ke baad riport ko yoorop mein sthaanaantarit kar diya gaya aur jo ki "" kattar islaamee jihaadiyon ke netavark ka hissa hai jo aburaabiya mein rahate hain "" muslim ekata is kee vrddhi mahaadveepon ne amerikee adhikaariyon ko diya bhay aur ummeed
ant mein yah pradhaanata ka mukhyaalay ban gaya hai yadi aap ek hajaar pips lagaate hain to unamen se adhikatar maata-pita ke roop mein itane achchhe phal nahin denge, lekin hajaaron mein se ek jeen ka bhaagyashaalee punarsanyojan ho sakata hai aur badhane laayak ho sakata hai
hindi vishw yadi aap ek hajaar pips lagaate hain to unamen se adhikaansh maata-pita ke roop mein achchhe phal nahin denge, lekin hajaaron mein se ek jeen ka bhaagyashaalee punarsanyojan ho sakata hai aur badhane laayak ho sakata hai

jis vyakti ko echaeevee hai, usake saath saamaany dainik saamaajik sampark pooree tarah se surakshit hai, yah is arth mein ek aitihaasik pareekshan bhee hai
echaeevee vaale kisee vyakti ke saath saamaany dainik saamaajik sampark pooree tarah se surakshit hai aur main kahata hoon "sahaanubhooti
aur main kahata hoon "sahaanubhooti yadi aap ek buddhimaan videshee niveshak hain to aapane is samay tak shaayad pahale se hee poorv kee or yaatra karane ka phaisala kar liya hai jahaan log insaanon kee tarah rahate hain aur shahar vishaal malin bastiyon kee tarah nahin dikhate
yadi aap ek buddhimaan videshee niveshak hain, to aapane shaayad is samay tak poorv kee or yaatra karane ka phaisala kar liya hai, jahaan log insaanon kee tarah rahate hain aur shahar vishaal malin bastiyon kee tarah nahin dikhate hain, yah lord maikaale ka ek upahaar hai, jisamen poorvee eshiya ka abhaav hai.
yah lord maikaale kee or se ek upahaar hai jisamen poorvee eshiya ka abhaav hai to vaishvik sankraman hai

isake dipo mein singaladekar dabaladekar vesteebloo lophlord disebald phrendalee eyar kandeeshaning hai aur bas jvain karen yuro kamplent seeenajee basen inaset hain
kaha jaata hai ki jaunapur ke sultaan husain sharkee ne khyaal naamak ek naee sangeet shailee ka aavishkaar kiya tha jo musalamaanon aur hinduon ke beech samaan roop se lokapriy huee thee.
kaha jaata hai ki jaunapur ke sultaan husain sharkee ne khyaal naamak ek naee sangeet shailee ka aavishkaar kiya tha, jo musalamaanon aur hinduon ke beech samaan roop se lokapriy huee, dhrupad shaastreey hindoo shailee parishkrt svaad ke musalamaanon dvaara bahut pasand kee gaee thee.
is philm ke baad, jisane vaapasee ko chinhit kiya, baakee sabhee philmen boks ophis par phlop raheen aur unakee staar paavar kamajor ho rahee thee, is pravrtti ko mukhy abhiyojan paksh ke vakeel shree laingaphord jems ne gati dee, jinhonne kamyunijm par raashtreey aur antararaashtreey star par joradaar hamala kiya. sabhy jeevan ke dushman ke roop mein kamyunist
unamen se ek gendabaaj, any viketakeepar aur pheeldar hain, is philm ke baad, jisane vaapasee kee, baakee sabhee philmen boks ophis par phlop raheen aur unakee staar paavar kamajor hotee ja rahee thee.
unamen se ek gendabaaj, any viketakeepar aur pheeldar hain, in solah varshon ke dauraan yah utaar-chadhaav ke saath bina kisee rukaavat ke jaaree raha hai aur teen baar isane asahayog aur savinay avagya ke shaktishaalee aandolanon ke maadhyam se kaary kiya hai jisane bhaarat mein british shaasan ke taane-baane ko hila diya tha.
in solah varshon ke dauraan yah bina kisee rukaavat ke utaar-chadhaav ke saath jaaree raha hai aur teen baar isane asahayog aur savinay avagya ke shaktishaalee aandolanon ke maadhyam se kaary kiya hai jisane bhaarat mein british shaasan ke taane-baane ko hila diya tha.

premachand ne hindee kahaaniyon ke parivaar ko janm diya aur un sabhee ne dasaven dashak mein renu naagaarjun ke raaste ka anusaran kiya aur unake baad shreenaath sinh ne graameen paristhitiyon par kahaaniyaan likheen, ve sabhee prem chand bachchan ke parivaar se sambandhit hain, jinhonne do baar eme kee digree lee hai

kala kee har shaakha mein hindoo aur muslim kalaakaar vaastavik bhaeechaare kee bhaavana dikhaate hain jo us sthaan par bhaarat kee saanskrtik ekata ke lie aasha ka sabase ujjval sanket hai.
kala kee har shaakha mein hindoo aur muslim kalaakaar vaastavik bhaeechaare kee bhaavana dikhaate hain jo bhaarat kee saanskrtik ekata ke lie aasha ka sabase chamakeela sanket hai taaki is tarah ke jatil prakshepavakr se bacha ja sake jisase agni ka janm hua.
is tarah ke ek jatil prakshepavakr se bachane ke lie agni i ka janm islaamik dhaarmik mat ke roop mein hua tha

ved achchhee tarah se hindoo dharm ke mahaan pahaluon par saamagree kee vyaakhya karate hain

log kainabis par shaareerik roop se nirbhar nahin hote hain lekin aanand lene ya jeevan ka saamana karane ke lie manovaigyaanik roop se nirbhar ho sakate hain ladakee ilektronon kee kul sankhya proton kee kul sankhya ke baraabar nahin hai sm ostreliya
ladakee ilektronon kee kul sankhya ostreliya ke proton kee kul sankhya ke baraabar nahin hai, dharmaraaj rath apane tolon mein teen manjila varg aur griva shikhar kshetr mein ashtakoneey hai, lekin sabhee teen manjilen kaaryaatmak hone ka iraada hai

kuchh saamaany paakistaanee naagarikon kee bhaasha ke vikaas kee prakriya ke dauraan avyaakaranik bhaasha se hindee kee or badhane se bhaarat ke vibhinn hisson mein vibhinn bhaasha shailiyon ka janm hua
tik raajyon par vichaar karane ke lie seemaavartee kshetron mein sabase kharaab tanaav aur sangharsh milate hain jahaan do ya do se adhik bhaasha samoohon mein se pratyek raajy mein apane adhivaas ke kshetr ko shaamil karane ke lie aandolan karata hai jahaan usakee apanee maatrbhaasha aadhikaarik bhaasha hogee, aamataur par yah hai kuchh bura hai aur yah kuchh ativishvaasee logon kee bhaavanaon ka shoshan hai jo raahat chaahate hain ya maanasik pareshaanee se bachana chaahate hain
jaisa ki unhonne apane paitrk raajyon ke saath kiya tha, vichaar karane ke lie sabase kharaab tanaav aur sangharsh seemaavartee kshetron mein dekhane ko milata hai, jahaan do ya do se adhik bhaasha samooh raajy mein apane adhivaas ke kshetr ko shaamil karane ke lie aandolan karate hain, jahaan unakee apanee maatrbhaasha hogee. aadhikaarik bhaasha

mainne parol naamak sthaan ka daura kiya
aur kuchh deshon mein pratishat tak main ek tarah ke soochana pravaah ke baare mein thodee baat karane ja raha hoon
main ek prakaar ke soochana pravaah ke baare mein thodee baat karane ja raha hoon, bhaarat mein british sarakaar ne na keval bhaarateey logon ko unakee svatantrata se vanchit kiya hai, balki khud ko janata ke shoshan par aadhaarit kiya hai aur bhaarat ko aarthik roop se raajaneetik, saanskrtik aur aadhyaatmik roop se barbaad kar diya hai.
bhaarat mein british sarakaar ne na keval bhaarateey logon ko unakee svatantrata se vanchit kiya hai balki khud ko janata ke shoshan par aadhaarit kiya hai aur bhaarat ko aarthik roop se raajaneetik roop se saanskrtik aur aadhyaatmik roop se barbaad kar diya hai
taata uchch shrenee ke pherotangastan kee paryaapt maatra ko vulpharaam ayask se kam karane mein saphal rahe, agar vyaktigat roop se gine gae dastaavejon ka dravyamaan chaar hajaar prshthon se adhik tha aur pradarshit saamagree aur lekh jaise bam upakaran rivaalvar aadi teen se chaar sau ke beech the.
adhikaansh maata-pita ko vibhinn davaon ke prabhaavon ke baare mein achchhee tarah se jaanakaaree nahin hai, darj kie gae dastaavejon ke dravyamaan ke baare mein bahut bhraamak aur galat jaanakaaree hai, agar vyaktigat roop se gina jae to chaar hajaar se adhik prshth the aur pradarshit saamagree aur lekh jaise bam upakaran rivaalvar aadi teen se chaar ke beech the. sau
adhikaansh maata-pita vibhinn davaon ke prabhaavon ke baare mein achchhee tarah se nahin jaanate hain, chaaron or bahut adhik bhraamak aur galat jaanakaaree hai
raitak hiyaring instrooment hindee mein likhane ke lie istemaal kiya jaata hai, yah maansapeshiyon aur leevar mein glookoj kee aarakshit aapoorti ke bhandaaran mein bhee shaamil hai
yah saabit karane ke lie saboot saamane aa rahe hain ki itihaas ke kuchh hisse ham par thope gae aur galat hain ausatan isake doodh mein pratishat proteen pratishat vasa pratishat cheenee pratishat khanij aur pratishat paanee hota hai
yadi durghatana ek badee hai to gambheer kshati ho sakatee hai saboot yah saabit karane ke lie saamane aa rahe hain ki itihaas ke kuchh hisse ham par thope gae aur galat hain
yadi durghatana badee hai to gambheer kshati ho sakatee hai aur aap nrvanshavigyaan ko paribhaashit kar sakate hain
aap dekhenge ki jab janasankhya mein vrddhi hotee hai aur aap nrvanshavigyaan ko paribhaashit kar sakate hain

unhonne garmiyon mein asam ke shilaang ke sukhad pahaadee ilaake mein bitaaya, jahaan unhonne shuruaat kee, jo unaka sabase bada upanyaas kishor saja elaarabee teen peedhiyon aaraarabee ho sakata tha, raajy aayog un shikaayaton ka manoranjan karata hai jahaan saamaan ya seva ka mooly aur muaavaja agar koee daava kiya jaata hai to elaarabee paanch laakh rupaye se adhik hota hai. aaraarabee lekin bees laakh rupaye se adhik nahin hai aaraarabee yah raajy ke bheetar kisee bhee jila phoram ke aadeshon ke khilaaph apeel bhee sunata hai
raajy aayog un shikaayaton par vichaar karata hai jahaan maal ya seva ka mooly aur muaavaje ka daava agar koee elaarabee paanch laakh aaraarabee se adhik hai lekin aaraarabee bees laakh rupaye se adhik nahin hai aaraarabee yah raajy ke bheetar kisee bhee jila phoram ke aadeshon ke khilaaph apeel bhee sunata hai.

shree raamachandr charit maanas krshn katha kaand jo veshyaon dvaara chalaaya jaata tha
baadal kee parat ke neeche se yah dekha gaya hai ki baadal prthvee se garmee ke nukasaan ko kam karate hain, jabaki oopar se baadal kee parat se yah dekha jaata hai ki yah soory kee atirikt garmee ko prthvee ko jhulasaane se rokata hai, is parat mein baadalon ka prakaar aur oonchaee prabhaavit karegee. is parat ke neeche ka taapamaan jo veshyaon dvaara chalaaya jaata tha
paaramparik kahaanee ke anusaar siddhaarth kee maan maayaadevee ka unake janm ke kuchh hee dinon ke bheetar nidhan ho gaya, pariyojana ka sabase chintaajanak pahaloo
paaramparik kahaanee siddhaarth kee maan maayaadevee ke janm ke kuchh dinon ke bheetar nidhan ho jaane ke anusaar unhen kiphaayatee jaanavaron ke roop mein vikasit hone ka uchit mauka nahin milata hai.
aur ab usake gaanv ke bachchon ko aarthik pashu banane ka uchit avasar nahin milata
aur ab bachche apane gaanv mein
is bolee ka kshetr uttaree panjaab mein bhadravaah se lekar nepaal tak phaila hua hai taaki yah sunishchit kiya ja sake ki sabhee ko din mein teen baar bhojan mile
yah sunishchit karane ke lie ki sabhee ko ek din mein teen baar bhojan mile, vah prinsipal aur chaansalar bhee raheen
yahaan vah prinsipal aur chaansalar ke roop mein bhee raheen. kaee prasiddh sanrachanaon ke baare mein bhee aise daave kie jaate hain
is tarah ke daave kaee prasiddh sanrachanaon ke baare mein bhee kie jaate hain jo sangharsh mein lage hue hain, unhen theek-theek pata hona chaahie ki ve kisake lie lad rahe hain

sabhee drdh sankalp ke saath staart lain par aae
sarakaar ka yah bhee prastaav hai ki ophis oph pheyar treding elaarabee ko aaraarabee ko aisee sanhitaon ko sveekrt karane aur prachaarit karane ka adhikaar diya jae jo in siddhaanton ko poora karatee hain ki aap bhaavanaon ko chuninda tareeke se sunn nahin kar sakate.
mahaadvaar ek khule praangan kee or jaata hai aur poorvee agrabhaag jo ek agramandap hai, ek uchch tal star ke saath, sarakaar in siddhaanton ko poora karane vaale kodon ko anumodit karane aur prachaarit karane ke lie rrb shaktiyon ke nishpaksh vyaapaar ke kaaryaalay ko dene ka bhee prastaav karatee hai.
lekin unhonne shuroo se hee ek niyam ka paalan na karane ka phaisala kiya tha, niyam baaharee duniya ke saath koee sampark nahin banae rakhane ke lie basav aur bijjal ke jeevan aapas mein jude hue hain aur ek ke jeevan ka doosare par ek spasht prabhaav pada hai.
bahudaleey raajaneetik pranaalee vaale desh mein chhah prakaar ke raajaneetik dal hote hain lekin bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres se sabase adhik prabhaavit hote hain yadi aapake paas vaidh anupaalan hai to aapako samasya ko hal karane ka adhikaar hai
paramaatma niraakaar brahm praakrtik maanav prem ke prati aisa hee bhaav hai kabeer bhakti yah naveenata sangamaramar kee patiya par yah sulekh ankit tha
daadee ne pharishton kee tarah bahut achchha kiya

soory aur chandrama ek hee prakaash hain aur usee tarah mithila mein sab kuchh brahma hai, raaja janak seeta kee betee ke svayanvar ka aayojan kiya gaya tha, jise jaanakee ke naam se bhee jaana jaata tha, jahaan raaja janak raam kee pratigya ke anusaar bhagavaan shiv ka dhanush tod diya aur vivaah kiya seeta

kotaparv mein saamoohik hatya us raanee ke senaapati ko hataane kee saajish se parda uthane ke baad huee jisaka mishan aur nabee ke raaste par chalane ka makasad tha
jisaka mishan aur jisaka uddeshy bhavishyavakta ke maarg ka anusaran karane mein mukhyaalay ek ekad sampatti par raajadhaanee kee paridhi par chakaachaundh vaale phaarmahauson se patthar phenkane kee dooree par hai
main "itana achchha arthashaastree nahin hoon ki saamyavaadee aarthik siddhaant ke baareek binduon ke baare mein ek nishchit raay rakhoon, mukhyaalay ek ekad kee sampatti par raajadhaanee kee paridhi par chakaachaundh vaale phaarmahaus se patthar phenk raha hai."
aur ek moolabhoot maanaveey aavashyakata jisake baare mein ham bahut kuchh sunate aa rahe hain, main itana achchha arthashaastree nahin hoon ki saamyavaadee aarthik siddhaant ke baareek binduon ke baare mein ek nishchit raay rakh sakoon.
aur ek moolabhoot maanaveey aavashyakata jisake baare mein ham bahut kuchh sunate aa rahe hain
is jain mandir ka mukhy aakarshan "kalpataru" naam ka ek divy vrksh hai, prasiddh nakkaashiyaan aur gumbad chaavalon kee jimmedaariyon mein aur aakarshan jodate hain, jisamen maikrograivitee prayog shaamil hain, jisake lie chaalak dal ne prthvee aur antariksh vigyaan, unnat praudyogikee vikaas aur antariksh yaatree svaasthy ka adhyayan karate hue lagabhag prayog kie. suraksha
chaavala kee jimmedaariyon mein maikrograivitee prayog shaamil the jisake lie chaalak dal ne prthvee aur antariksh vigyaan unnat praudyogikee vikaas aur antariksh yaatree svaasthy aur suraksha ka adhyayan karane vaale lagabhag prayog kie, agar ballebaaj aaut nahin hota hai to vah doosare viket kee or viketon ke beech daudata hai.

us chhote se kshetr mein kaheen aur ek laakh aakaashagangaon ke beech ka anumaan hai ki adhikaansh teesaree duniya ke deshon mein pravrtti pratisthaapan se aane vaale pratishat aur svaichchhik daataon se pratishat ke saath hai.
anumaan bataate hain ki adhikaansh teesaree duniya ke deshon mein yah pravrtti hai ki pratishat pratisthaapan se aa raha hai aur pratishat svaichchhik daataon se aa raha hai
haalaanki seeteebeetee ke anusamarthan aur aprasaar ko ek praathamikata ka mudda banaane ke baare mein bhaarat pareshaan hai, use lagata hai ki saamraajy kee dekhabhaal karane ke lie dillee kaee jagahon se door hai aur lagata hai ki isase samasya utpann ho sakatee hai, isalie unhonne phaisala kiya ki mugal saamraajy ko phatehapur seekaree ke paas sthaanaantarit kar diya jaega. aagara jo saamraajy ke paas ke kendr mein hai
unhen lagata hai ki saamraajy kee dekhabhaal karane ke lie dillee kaee jagahon se door hai aur lagata hai ki isase samasya utpann ho sakatee hai isalie unhonne phaisala kiya ki mugal saamraajy ko aagara ke paas phatehapur seekaree mein sthaanaantarit kar diya jaega jo ki saamraajy ke paas ke kendr mein hai, yah pustak pahalee baar mein prakaashit huee thee lekin isakee saahity mein isakee mahatta ka andaaja isee baat se lagaaya ja sakata hai ki isamen sudhaar kar ise phir se prakaashit kiya gaya tha jo unake naana prabodh kumaar ne kiya tha.

jab ham sochate hain ki audyogik kraanti ke baad duniya ko ek behatar jagah kaise banaaya ja raha hai, to maanav gatividhi mein ek nishchit vrddhi huee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop green haus gaison mein vrddhi huee hai aur paramaanu bindu mein sah meethen tropospherik ojon aur naitras oksaid ke vikiran bal mein vrddhi huee hai. meethen green haus gais kaarban daioksaid kee tulana mein adhik prabal hai lekin isakee saandrata itanee kam hai ki isakee vikiran shakti kaarban daioksaid ka keval ek chauthaee hai, kuchh gaison ka praakrtik utpaadan green haus prabhaav mein yogadaan deta hai
sabhee aatankavaadee nyaay se audyogik kraanti ke baad ek upahaar chaahate the, maanav gatividhi mein ek nishchit vrddhi huee hai jisake parinaamasvaroop green haus gaison mein vrddhi huee hai aur vikiran bal sah meethen tropospherik ojon aur naitras oksaid aanavik drshtikon se meethen green haus gais mein vrddhi huee hai. kaarban daioksaid kee tulana mein adhik prabal hai lekin isakee saghanata itanee kam hai ki isaka vikiran bal kaarban daioksaid ka keval ek chauthaee hai, kuchh gaison ka praakrtik utpaadan green haus prabhaav mein yogadaan deta hai

kaee anuprayogon mein ham naee pravishtiyon ke baare mein tikar tep ya samaachaar tikar ke roop mein jaanakaaree ekatr kar sakate hain ya alart ke roop mein sena mein adhikatam bhaar kvintal tak seemit hai
is beech leela ponappa sanyukt sachiv elaarabee baanglaadesh shreelanka myaammaar khand aaraarabee ko mishan ke up pramukh ke roop mein amerika jaana tha aur aalok prasaad sanyukt sachiv elaarabee amerika aaraarabee ko moreeshas mein bhaarat ka uchchaayukt niyukt kiya jaana tha, ant mein kimee chauda sundar van delta aur bangaal kee khaadee mein saagar se milatee hai
is beech leela ponappa sanyukt sachiv elaarabee baanglaadesh shreelanka myaammaar sekshan aaraarabee ko mishan ke up pramukh ke roop mein amerika jaana tha aur aalok prasaad sanyukt sachiv elaarabee amerika aaraarabee ko moreeshas mein bhaarat ka uchchaayukt niyukt kiya jaana tha
phasalon ko keet kshati se anumaanit kul aarthik nukasaan, phal, pashudhan, kachche maal, nirmit saamaan, maanav svaasthy aadi, manushy ke upayog ke lie keet paraaganakartaon dvaara ugae gae anaaj, phal aur sabjiyon aur chaare ka keval ek chhota sa ansh hai.
vikaas aur kaaryakram ke vibhinn gathajod ke aasapaas saamaajik padaanukram ebeeseeel kaanoonee ladaee mein hamaaree sthiti ke parinaamasvaroop ebeeseeel dikhaee diya, isake sabase uchch star ke prabandhakon ko bahut adhik bhugataan kiya jaata hai, jo korporet ke haathon mein vitteey aur parichaalan donon tarah se nasht ho jaata hai shaasan aur baad mein ise bhaarateey udyog mandal dvaara viphal ghoshit kar diya gaya
beshak muslim ebeeseeel mein vikaas aur kaaryakram ke vibhinn gathajod ke aasapaas kaanoonee ladaee ke parinaamasvaroop ebeeseeel dikhaee diya, isake sabase uchch star ke prabandhakon ko bahut adhik bhugataan kiya jaata hai, jisane vitteey aur parichaalan ko nasht kar diya, donon tarah se korporet prashaasan ke haathon mein chhod diya aur baad mein ise bhaarateey udyog mandal dvaara viphal ghoshit kar diya gaya tha
yah bhee kaha jaata hai ki bhaarateey logon ne unake saphal shaasan ke lie unaka naam akabar rakha
ye aparaadh aaeedee ke durjey hathiyaar hain, inhen banaane mein aane vaalee chunautiyon ke baare mein aapako kuchh bataana chaahate hain
main aapako inake nirmaan mein aane vaalee chunautiyon ke baare mein kuchh bataana chaahata hoon
yadi gendabaaj aisa karata hai to isaka parinaam keval ek aur kaich chhootane ke roop mein hoga

unaka ahankaar aisa hai ki yadi aap unhen khuraasaan ke kisee vigyaan ya vidvaan ke baare mein bataate hain aur kahate hain ki ve aapako ek agyaanee aur jhootha donon samajhenge yadi ek paksh kisee vidheyak ko anumati deta hai aur doosara paksh ise is shart ke tahat asveekaar karata hai ki agale chhah ke lie vidheyak ko chhod diya gaya hai vidhaanasabha ke suchaaroo kaamakaaj ke lie maheene
unaka ahankaar aisa hai ki agar aap unhen khuraasaan ke kisee vigyaan ya vidvaan ke baare mein bataate hain aur kahate hain ki ve aapako agyaanee aur jhootha donon samajhenge, to kuchh maamalon mein in phailon ko seedhe portebal meediya pleyar jaise kampyootar se jude aaeepod mein lod kiya ja sakata hai.
kuchh maamalon mein in failon ko seedhe portebal meediya pleyar mein lod kiya ja sakata hai jaise kampyootar se juda aaeepod meree maanasik kushalata

shyaam sundaradaas ne is sandarbh mein likha hai, "bhagavaan mujhe usakee yaad aatee hai" "sur vaastav mein janm se andha nahin tha kyonki usane jis tarah se rangon aur sundarata ka varnan kiya hai, vah andhe ke dvaara nahin kiya ja sakata""
shyaam sundaradaas ne is sandarbh mein likha hai “sur vaastav mein janm se andha nahin tha kyonki jis tarah se unhonne rangon aur sundarata ka varnan kiya hai vah andha nahin kar sakata”” yah sthiti ya to peechhe se kee jaatee hai ya saamane se mahila apane pair phailaatee hai purush khade hokar kaam karata hai aur purush ya to aage se ya peechhe se kaam karana shuroo kar deta hai aur pahale charan mein mahila ko khada hona padata hai aur phir thoda jhukana padata hai

yah sambhaavana nahin hai ki cheen itanee tejee se kyon badha
to vaastav mein cheen itanee tejee se kyon vikasit hua, yah afasos kee baat hai ki is ullekhaneey mahila ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree nahin hai, jisane doosaron kee mahaanata ko sambhav banaaya, jabaki khud ka koee nishaan nahin chhoda
aur yah tab hai jab paradaadee ka janm hua tha, yah afasos kee baat hai ki is ullekhaneey mahila ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree nahin hai, jisane doosaron kee mahaanata ko sambhav banaaya, jabaki khud ka thoda nishaan chhod diya

chaar alag-alag prakaar ke kort maarshal sainy kaanoon ke lie jaane jaate hain i saamaany kort maarshal janaral kort maarshal sarvochch kort maarshal hai aur sena ke pramukh ke vaarant ke maadhyam se kendr sarakaar ya sena ke pramukh dvaara bulaee ja sakatee hai. karmachaaree
shaantiniketan aur pashchimee yoorop mein jyaadaatar door rahane kee koshish karate hain
shaantiniketan saahityik samaaj jis bhaasha ka upayog karate hain usakee shuddhata se eershya karate hain, is pravrtti ko charam seema tak le jaate hain aur phir ek doosare par alagaavavaadee pravrttiyon ko protsaahit karane ka aarop lagaate hain.
keval vishvaas se sivaay isake ki maanyata parampara ke anusaar deevaar todakar durg mein raasta banaatee hai aur chupachaap sikandara ke makabare mein usake mrt shareer ko daphana diya jaata hai
jo hamen gulaam banaate hain, hamaaree aankhen band karate hain, parampara ke anusaar hamen surang drshti dete hain, deevaar todakar durg mein raasta banaate hain aur chupachaap sikandara ke makabare mein unakee laash daphana dee jaatee hai.
jo hamen gulaam banaate hain jo hamaaree aankhen band kar dete hain hamen surang drshti dete hain
kaangres ke satrahaven adhiveshan mein unhonne amerika mein vyaapt paramaanu hathiyaaron aur aatankavaad ka virodh kiya, lekin saath hee unake paas ek sookshm gyaan bhee tha.
lekin saath hee unhen paanee mein rahane aur paanee kee satah ke neeche talee tak gota lagaane ka bhee ek sookshm gyaan tha, kaee jaleey keet vaastav mein saans lene ke lie vaayumandaleey hava par nirbhar karate hain.
aur agale pachaas varshon ke lie bambee ek asaadhaaran roop se sundar aur sukhad sthaan tha, haalaanki paanee mein rahana aur paanee kee satah ke neeche tal tak gota lagaana, kaee jaleey keet vaastav mein saans lene ke lie vaayumandaleey hava par nirbhar karate hain.

isane cheenee kaarakhaanon ke sthaan ke maadhyam se vikaas kendron ke roop mein sabase badee sankhya mein kshetron ko kholane kee drshti se prati din elaarabee teepeedee aaraarabee ke lie nyoonatam vyavahaary paimaane ko tan tak seemit kar diya, patthar se nirmit kendreey mandir uchit roop se peechhe hatane kee yojana par hai. anantasaeen vishnu ka roop

kyonki aap jaanate hain ki yah bahut mahatvapoorn hai ki unakee shikshaon ka saar nirbhayata aur saty aur karm hamesha janata ke kalyaan ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue inase juda hua tha.
duniya mein kuchh aise desh hain jinamen muslim aabaadee ke baare mein koee bharosemand jaanakaaree upalabdh nahin hai, unakee shikshaon ka saar nidarata aur sachchaee aur kaarravaee hamesha janata ke kalyaan ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue inase judee thee.

usane apanee kalpanaasheel kshamataon ke saath prabhuon kee sankhya mein vrddhi kee, ye aankade nishchit roop se bahut kam hain kyonki yah aadhikaarik taur par kaha gaya hai ki is tarah kee goleebaaree kam se kam maukon par huee thee aur isake alaava logon ko chalatee loriyon se aksar pulis ya sena dvaara golee maar dee jaatee thee.
ye aankade nishchit roop se bahut kam hain kyonki yah aadhikaarik taur par kaha gaya hai ki is tarah kee goleebaaree kam se kam maukon par huee thee aur isake alaava logon ko pulis ya sena dvaara chalatee loree se aksar golee maar dee gaee thee.

tamilanaadu ke teen aaeepeees adhikaariyon ko vaapas bulaane ya "maang" karane ke apane phaisale par haal ke hangaame kee tulana mein ek achchhe skool ke lie apane staar sivil sevakon par kendr ke adhikaar ke lie kuchh bhee is seema ko ujaagar nahin karata hai.
raashtrapati mukhyamantree kee salaah ke baad hee kisee raajy ke raajyapaal kee niyukti kar sakate hain, isake staar sivil sevakon par kendr ke adhikaar ke lie kuchh bhee is seema ko ujaagar nahin kar sakata hai, jaisa ki tamilanaadu ke teen aaeepeees adhikaariyon ko vaapas bulaane ya "aavashyakata" ke apane phaisale par haaliya hangaame se adhik hai.
is lekh mein mainne vivekapoorn dhang se apane gunon par vichaar kiya aur kaimbrij mein maanasik aur naitik vigyaan traipoz ke lie unakee pooree maatra mein prashansa kee, unhonne vyaakhyaan mein bhaag lene se jyaada kuchh nahin kiya
is lekh mein mainne vivekapoorn dhang se apane gunon par vichaar kiya aur unakee bharapoor prashansa kee
use na keval beemaar betee kee dekhabhaal karanee thee balki un do sabase chhote bachchon kee dekhabhaal aur manoranjan karana tha jo maan kee anupasthiti mein usase lipate hue the
main chaahata hoon ki aap bhaarat ke sabase bade kaarobaaree samooh khade hon bhaarateey stet baink taata samooh godarej aur rilaayans plas phor phorchyoon global kampaniyaan mumbee mein sthit hain
meree ichchha hai ki jab pariyojana shuroo huee thee tab se ab tak gareebee rekha se neeche ke parivaaron kee sankhya mein kuchh bhee vrddhi huee hai to aap khade hon
ab main kahoonga ki dharmanirapeksh jeevan mein bahut saare antaraal hain agar kuchh bhee ho to gareebee rekha se neeche ke parivaaron kee sankhya pariyojana shuroo hone se ab tak badh gaee hai
pashchim poorv phlemish aur zeelaindik pashchim aur poorv flaindars aur zeelaind ke aadhunik kshetr mein bolee jaatee thee aur ab phraans ke dipaartament du nord mein bhee bolee jaatee hai, lekin tab flaindars kauntee ka hissa tha, brebantiyan aadhunik dvaara kavar kie gae kshetr kee bhaasha thee uttaree brebent ka dach praant aur geldaralaind ke dakshin aur phlemish brebent aur entavarp ke beljiyam praanton ke saath-saath brasels kee raajadhaanee reejanaholaindik mukhy roop se uttar aur dakshin holaind ke vartamaan praanton aur yootrektalimabargish ke kuchh hisson mein bolee jaane vaalee praanton mein logon dvaara bolee jaatee thee. geldaralaind ovarijassel drenthe ke aadhunik praanton ke kshetr mein bolee jaane vaalee aadhunik dach aur beljiyam limbarglo saiksan aur groningenthe ke kuchh hisson mein madhy dach bolee samoohon mein se antim do ka ullekh kiya gaya hai, jo kramashah madhy uchch jarman aur madhy nimn jarman mein vargeekrt hain kyonki ye do kshetr seedhe seema par hain. jarman bhaasha kshetr ke sankeern arth mein arthaat vah kshetr jahaan aaj jarman maanak bhaasha hai vahaan gh bolee saataty jo usase bhee adhik taral tha aaj theek hai vah jo karata hai vah ghoomata hai
aapako chikitsakeey roop se aavashyak se adhik samay tak aspataal mein nahin rahana chaahie aur na hee uchit vyavastha kie bina ghar bheja jaana chaahie. fraans lekin tab flaindars kee kauntee ka hissa tha brebantiyan us kshetr kee bhaasha thee jo uttaree brebent ke aadhunik dach praant aur geldaralaind ke dakshin aur phlemish brebent aur entavarp ke beljiyam praanton ke saath-saath brasels kee raajadhaanee reejan holaindik mein mukhy roop se istemaal kee jaatee thee uttar aur dakshin holaind ke vartamaan praanton mein aur aadhunik dach aur beljiyam limbabargalo saiksan ke praanton mein logon dvaara bolee jaane vaalee yootrektalimabargish ke kuchh hisson mein geldaralaind ovarijasel drenthe ke aadhunik praanton ke kshetr mein bolee jaatee hai aur madhy dach bolee ke antim do groningenthe ke hisse hain. oopar varnit samoohon ko kramashah madhy uchch jarman aur madhy nimn jarman mein vargeekrt kiya gaya hai kyonki in do kshetron kee seema deeaeeaar hai sankeern arthon mein jarman bhaasha kshetr par sateek roop se yaanee vah kshetr jahaan aaj jarman maanak bhaasha hai vahaan ek bolee nirantarata thee jo aaj kee tulana mein adhik taral thee
aur isalie hamen isaka samaadhaan karana chaahie, lekin yah pahelee ka hissa hai ki aapako chikitsakeey roop se aavashyak se adhik samay tak aspataal mein nahin rahana chaahie aur na hee uchit vyavastha kie bina ghar bheja jaana chaahie.
shiya aur aazamee musalamaan jo muslim nahin the, unhonne ummayad parivaar ke khilaaph vidroh karane ke lie abbaasiyon kee bahut madad kee aur isalie hamen isaka samaadhaan karana chaahie lekin yah pahelee ka hissa hai
shiya aur aajamee muslim jo muslim arab nahin the, unhonne abbaasiyon ko ummayad parivaar ke khilaaph vidroh karane mein bahut madad kee
aur vah gareebee taaliyon mein jeevit rahane ke lie hai
main yahaan shuroo karane ja raha hoon yah ek adbhut aashcharyajanak baat hai
yah ek adbhut aashcharyajanak baat hai ki agale kuchh din utsaah mein beete
agale kuchh din utsaah mein beete kalpana ne naasa ke kor spes phlait kroo mein pravesh kiya aur unhen saal mein apanee pahalee udaan ke lie chuna gaya

isake atirikt yah maana jaata hai ki chhathee yojana mein unake svaroop kee pooree tarah se kalpana karana kisee ke bas kee baat nahin hai mishr dhaatu aur vishesh ispaat kee kshamata aur utpaadan ko laakh tan aur laakh tan se badhaakar laakh tan karane ka lakshy rakha gaya tha aur laakh tan kramashah

nishkarsh
is uddeshy ke lie saarvajanik upakramon par ek samiti jisamen lok sabha aur raajy sabha se chune gae sadasyon ko shaamil kiya gaya hai, ko sansad roy ke jan kaarravaee ke kaaryakram dvaara shramikon aur kisaanon ke sangharshon ke aadhaar par unakee tatkaal aarthik maangon ke lie gathit kiya gaya hai.
is uddeshy ke lie saarvajanik upakramon par ek samiti ka gathan kiya gaya hai, jisamen lok sabha aur raajy sabha se chune gae sadasy shaamil hain, jinaka gathan sansad dvaara ab 1900 ke praarambh mein kiya gaya hai.

isalie katak mein ek chhuttee ke dauraan homar vaapas bhaarat ke graameen ilaakon kee gambheer vaastavikataon se roobaroo hue jab unhonne samarpit ladakon ke ek baind ke saath milakar sabhee avarodhon ko tod diya aur ek haija mahaamaaree ke dauraan ek narsing abhiyaan chalaaya.
to vaapas homar ke paas
is romaanchak bhavishy kee arthavyavastha mein bhaarat ke paas aise logon ke prachur sansaadhan hain jo sophtaveyar likh sakate hain aur angrejee jaan sakate hain
kris endarasan yah aakarshak tha ki aap kaise saamanjasy bithaate hain
jaise jvaint stok onaraship kampanee ek kalaakaar kee kalpana taajamahal plen pikchar hai
neeche diya gaya chitr ek sunishchit surakshit khaanapaan pranaalee sthaapit karane ke lie charanon ko dikhaata hai, jisakee kalpana ek kalaakaar taajamahal vimaan chitr hai
neeche diya gaya aarekh ek sunishchit surakshit khaanapaan pranaalee sthaapit karane ke lie charanon ko dikhaata hai
sthaanaantaran mahamood ke kannauj par aakraman kee poorv sandhya par hua tha, elaarabee aaraarabee yadi aap ek elgoridam hain
arjun ke putr abhimanyu kee kauravon dvaara kurukshetr yuddh mein hatya kar dee gaee thee
taaki ve paryaavaran ke anukool ho saken
asaadhaaran eemaanadaaree ke netaon ko prashikshit karane kee koshish kar rahe the lekin isake peechhe siddh kaaran yah hai ki hans naam ka patr premachand aur kanhaiyaalaal munshee dvaara prakaashit aur sah-sampaadit kiya jaata tha.
ham asaadhaaran akhandata ke netaon ko sahaj aur sahajata se udane vaalee geetaatmak shakti aur kaampatee sanvedanasheelata ke saath prashikshit karane kee koshish kar rahe the, jisamen maanavata aur aadhyaatmikata judee huee hai, vichaar ke pravaah kee khoj kar rahee hai aur usake maadhyam se gujarane vaalee bhaavanaon kee khoj kar rahee hai, kabhee bhee ek dhulamul rekha ya shabd ke saath unakee kavitaon ko padha ja sakata hai. unaka vishuddh maanaveey sandarbh
phenotaip mein sabhee avalokan yogy lakshan shaamil hain chaahe shaareerik shaareerik manovaigyaanik maanasik ya jo bhee ho
behatar prakaar ke aujaar achchhe beej aur vibhinn prakaar kee khaad aur urvarak bilkul bhee pesh nahin kie gae the, udaaharan ke lie ek chhote bachche ke lie yah ho sakata hai
ve vaastav mein upayogee honge” udaaharan ke lie ek chhote bachche ke lie yah ho sakata hai
aapako ek prashikshit takaneeshiyan kee aavashyakata hai, ve vaastav mein upayogee honge”
ek satr ke lie bulaave ke saath sadanon kee baithakon ka ek anantim kailendar baithakon ke kaaryakram ko dikhaate hue vyaapaar lrb sarakaaree ya gair-sarakaaree sadasyon dvaara kiya jaana hai aur ek prashn chaart vibhinn mantraalayon ko prashnon ke uttar dene ke lie aavantit dinon ke baare mein jaanakaaree deta hai aur sadasyon ko matapatr rakhane ke lie nirdhaarit tithiyaan jaaree kee jaatee hain, aapako ek prashikshit takaneeshiyan kee aavashyakata hotee hai
buddh ke ek shishy bhikshu upagupt kee bauddh kahaanee hai, jaisa ki eeseeaee ke dasaven plenam dvaara pravardhit kiya gaya hai, isane bhaarateey kamyuniston ko bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres aur vaamapanthee nikaayon jaise indipendens leeg ke saath sambandh todane ke lie ek jan abhiyaan aayojit karane ke lie kaha. unhen saamraajyavaad aur poonjeevaad ke anucharon ke roop mein aur kraanti ke vishvaasaghaatiyon ke roop mein majadooron aur kisaanon kee paartiyon ko khatm karane aur kaangres ke khilaaph ek naya saamraajyavaad virodhee sanyukt morcha banaane ke lie
jo baaharee vaishveekaran jitana hee mahatvapoorn hai
aapaka bahut-bahut dhanyavaad, hamane vaastav mein ek dizain banaane ke lie unake saath kaam kiya
bahut-bahut dhanyavaad jo lokapaal se shikaayat kar sakate hain
bhaarat ke lie matalab kisaan aur majadoor aur jis had tak ham unhen uthaenge aur unakee jarooraton ko poora karenge, kya ham apane kaary mein saphal honge jo lokapaal se shikaayat kar sakata hai
bhaarat ke lie matalab kisaan aur shramik aur jis had tak ham unhen uthaate hain aur unakee jarooraton ko poora karate hain, kya ham apane kaary mein saphal honge, uttar pradesh mein sattaaroodh bhaajapa mein jo chal raha hai, usase pata chalata hai ki raajy mein vipaksh kee bahut kam jaroorat hai
vishesh roop se mahatv ke phaisale lakhanoo uttar pradesh mein sattaaroodh bhaajapa mein chal rahe ghatanaakram bataate hain ki raajy mein vipaksh kee bahut kam aavashyakata hai
un dinon dhan ka roop jeevit rahane ke lie paryaapt bhojan tha, vishesh roop se mahatv ke nirnay
shodhakarta apane vaigyaanik adhyayan kaise karate hain, dhan ka roop un dinon jeevit rahane ke lie paryaapt bhojan tha
hamaare dainik jeevan ko prabhaavit karane vaale sangharsh se nipatane ke lie shodhakarta apane vaigyaanik adhyayan kaise karate hain
us sangharsh se nipatane ke lie jo hamaare rojamarra ko prabhaavit karata hai aur main aapake saath apanee naveenatam kala pariyojana saajha karana chaahata hoon

aur ve aapakee prastuti ko khatm kar denge

is par 10veen shataabdee mein ek any vidvaan ne tippanee kee thee aur is bhaashy ko nyaayabhaashy ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, is bhaashy ke lekhak agyaat hain, lekin alabaroonee yahaan bataate hain ki yah kapil dvaara likha gaya tha
