yadi haan, to aap kaary karane mein saksham ho sakate hain aur sansad aur nyaayapaalika ke kaary ko vibhaajit karane ke baad in laabhon ko praapt karana jaaree rakh sakate hain, shesh kaary mantraalay karate hain
yadi kisee ek ke lie haan, to aap kaam karane mein saksham ho sakate hain aur arabon bade vichaaron ke in laabhon ko praapt karana jaaree rakh sakate hain
main meksiko mein turkee mein morakko mein kaam karata hoon, mumbee kee paribhaasha maan hai, jisaka arth hindoo devee ka roop mahaamba hai, bhagavaan mahaamba ka janm mumbee mein hua hai, mah maraatee naam hai
mumbee kee paribhaasha mam hai jisaka arth hai hindoo devee ka roop mahaamba bhagavaan mahaamba ka janm mumbee mein hua hai mah maraatee naam hai lekin gaandheejee aur unake samarthakon ne unase kuchh nahin suna
garbhapaat ka kaary aam taur par khees ke sraav aur prasav ke any saamaany sanketon se pahale hota hai uchch sadan ka mahatv yah sadan pratham shrenee ka nahin hai yah vidhaan sabha dvaara paarit vidheyak ko asveekaar ya sanshodhit nahin kar sakata hai yah keval adhikatam avadhi ke lie deree kar sakata hai maheene ke atirikt isaka upayog kaibinet mein visheshagy kee niyukti ke lie kiya ja sakata hai kyonki manoneet sadasy ka bhee praavadhaan hai
uchch sadan ka mahatv yah sadan pratham shrenee ka nahin hai yah vidhaan sabha dvaara paarit vidheyak ko asveekaar ya sanshodhit nahin kar sakata hai yah keval ek maheene kee adhikatam avadhi ke lie vilambit ho sakata hai isake alaava isaka upayog kaibinet mein visheshagy kee niyukti ke lie kiya ja sakata hai kyonki isamen praavadhaan hai manoneet sadasy ke roop mein bhee unhonne angrejee logon se khud ko bachaane ke lie upasthiti ko apanaaya
unhonne khud ko angrejon se bachaane ke lie vesh dhaaran kiya
lekin jaisa ki arnest hemingve ne ek baar chetaaya tha "gati ko kaarravaee ke saath kabhee bhramit na karen" raashtrapati ke kartavyon mein prastaavit kaanoon bilon ko apanee sahamati dena aur adhyaadesh jaaree karana shaamil hai.
bahuvachan mein inhen soorat kaha jaata hai raashtrapati ke kartavyon mein prastaavit kaanoon vidheyakon ko apanee sahamati dena aur adhyaadesh jaaree karana sanvidhaan kee vyaakhya karana shaamil hai
bahuvachan mein inhen soorat kaha jaata hai

vah vishaalata svayan par kendrit honee chaahie, vah sachet roop se samarpit aur ek uchch uddeshy ke lie avachetan roop se prerit ke roop mein likhata hai
yadi koee vyakti chaitr ke sabhee dinon mein upavaas karata hai, to vah apane bachchon ke badappan par dhan aur aanand praapt karata hai, raanee ke lie usake moh ka laabh uthaate hue kashmeer ke usake rishtedaar raajy mein sabhee mahatvapoorn padon ko hadap lete hain aur unakee loot ko poora karate hain.
yadi koee vyakti chaitr ke sabhee dinon mein upavaas karata hai to vah apane bachchon ke badappan par dhan aur aanand praapt karata hai, sabhee peediton ko ehatiyaat ke taur par doktar ke paas jaana chaahie
aur kya ve zarooraten keval unheen jagahon par sthit hain, sabhee peediton ko ehatiyaat ke taur par doktar se sampark karana chaahie
aur kya ve jarooraten keval unheen sthaanon par sthit hain
jab eshiyaee aur futabol kee baat aatee hai, to kaee roodhivaaditaen hain, sabase pahale ki eshiyaee aahaar itana achchha nahin hai ki ek khilaadee ko bheeshan minaton tak banae rakha ja sake, vibhinn hisson mein kaee darjan aise sarvekshan chalae.
isake adhigrahan se bhaarat kee vaayu raksha saavarakar mein kaaphee vrddhi hogee, jo bhaarat sarakaar dvaara die gae niyamit paasaport par ek chhaatr ke roop mein inglaind gae the, un par bhagoda aparaadhee adhiniyam ke tahat aarop lagaaya gaya tha.

yaatriyon ne saanketik bhaasha par aapatti jataee
pata lagaane yogy beemaariyon ke abhaav mein bhee yaatriyon ne isaka virodh kiya, hrday mein badhatee umr ke saath haanikaarak parivartan hote hain
pahachaane jaane yogy rogon ke abhaav mein bhee badhatee umr ke saath hrday mein haanikaarak parivartan hote hain amitaabh harivansh raay bachchan ke do putron mein bade hain, doosare putr ka naam ajitaabh hai
harivansh raay bachchan ke do beton mein bade hain amitaabh, doosare bete ka naam hai ajitaabh
vah samatal phooladaan se nikalakar sangamaramar ke oopar susajjit gumbad kee lambaee ko aur adhik majabootee pradaan karatee hai
yoorop ke amerikee us samay ke aashrit the jab risti dekaate bhaarateey bahut heen the vah havaeejahaaj se baahar chale gae

khaady udyog mein
ooparee ganga nahar pranaalee se nirmaan poora hone ke baad janavaree mein sharad rtu kee phasal ko bhee paanee kee aapoorti javaahar laal neharoo ne laahaur mein bhaarateey dhvaj phaharaaya
appaachan ne jo kiya vah durbhaagy se ab nahin hai lekin asantushton ke lie yah kisee takhtaapalat se kam nahin hoga
mumbee kee kul aabaadee ka pratishat gandee jhuggiyon aur gaanvon mein rahatee hai lekin asantushton ke lie yah takhtaapalat se kam nahin hoga
adaalat mein hindoo aur muslim darabaariyon kee sakaaraatmak baatacheet ke maadhyam se aapasee sammaan mein vrddhi huee aur unamen samaan sthiti kee bhaavana vikasit huee mumbee kee kul aabaadee ka pratishat gandee jhuggee aur gaanvon mein rahata hai
adaalat mein hindoo aur muslim darabaariyon kee sakaaraatmak baatacheet ke maadhyam se aapasee sammaan mein vrddhi huee aur unake beech samaan sthiti kee bhaavana vikasit huee jis sthaan par unhen apana darabaar lagaana hai vah sthaan uchch nyaayaalay dvaara niyukt kiya jaata hai.
vah sthaan jahaan use apana darabaar lagaana hai, uchch nyaayaalay dvaara niyukt kiya jaata hai
unhen sthirata mein hissedaaree dekar cheen ne apane padosiyon ko uighur aatankavaad ko kabhee bhee vaapas lene kee sambhaavana nahin hai, ab sattaadhaaree vaam morcha aashvast hai ki kisee bhee roop mein kendreey hastakshep atyadhik sambhaavana nahin hai yadi yah do maheene se adhik samay tak kaangres ke samarthan ka aahvaan karega aur kaangres mamata ko upakrt karane ke mood mein nahin hai, agale saal hone vaale vidhaanasabha chunaav tak lambe aur khoonee takaraav kee taiyaaree kar rahee hai
usake baad karn prayaag mein alakananda aur ganga sangam par kisee bindu par unhen sthirata mein hissedaaree dekar cheen ne apane padosiyon par kabhee uigar aatankavaad ka samarthan karane kee sambhaavana nahin jataee.
ek sandarbh mein svaichchhik kya hai lekin usake baad vaalee ko atyadhik vishaal doorabeen kaha jaane vaala hai
apanee mansha par sandeh karana anuchit hai lekin usake baad jo hoga use atyadhik vishaal doorabeen kaha jaega
is vidheyak ko paarit karane ke lie donon sadanon kee shakti samaan hai is vidheyak ko paarit karane ke lie donon sadanon mein samaan bahumat kee aavashyakata hai yadi ek sadan vidheyak ko asveekaar karata hai aur baadha utpann hotee hai to raashtrapati donon grh mantriyon kee sanyukt baithak kee salaah dete hain ki hamaare uddeshyon par sandeh karana anuchit hai
sanvidhaan mein kuchh vishesh praavadhaan kie gae hain aur mukhy nyaayaadheesh ko anuchchhed ke aadhaar par ukt karmachaariyon kee seva kee sharton ko nirdhaarit karane ke lie adaalat ke karmachaariyon ko niyukt karane kee shakti dee gaee hai, sivaay kisee baaharee praadhikaran ke sandarbh ke. penshan vetan aur bhatton aur chhuttee ke lie jahaan raashtrapati ke saath paraamarsh nirdhaarit hai rrb sarvochch nyaayaalay ke karmachaariyon aur any sarakaaree sevakon ke sambandhit vargon ke vetan dhaanche mein kisee bhee tarah kee asangati se bachane ke lie
unakee maut saamane vaale ke lie ek ghaatak jhataka thee, lekin taalibaan ke peechhe amerika jaane ke saath hee isane apanee taakaton ko phir se sangathit kar liya.
aml varsha kee rokathaam aur niyantran esid jamaav ka niyantran aasaan nahin hai kyonki yah vibhinn maanaveey gatividhiyon ke kaaran hota hai haalaanki sthiti ko niyantran se baahar hone se rokane ke lie abhee nimnalikhit kadam uthae jaane chaahie unakee mrtyu saamane vaale ke lie ek ghaatak jhataka tha lekin saath hee taalibaan ka peechha karate hue usane jaldee se apanee sena ko phir se sangathit kar liya
aml varsha kee rokathaam aur niyantran esid jamaav ka niyantran aasaan nahin hai kyonki yah vibhinn maanaveey gatividhiyon ke kaaran hota hai haalaanki sthiti ko niyantran se baahar hone se rokane ke lie abhee nimnalikhit kadam uthae jaane chaahie main kabhee bhee apana kuchh bhee nahin bana paaya jo unhonne mujhe kaanon se shaareerik ya maanasik roop se pakad kar nigalane ke lie majaboor karane kee koshish kee
main kabhee bhee apana khud ka kuchh bhee nahin bana paaya jise unhonne kaanon se shaareerik ya maanasik roop se pakadakar mujhe nigalane ke lie majaboor karane kee koshish kee, paryatak paarking se chal sakate hain ya vidyut bas seva se ja sakate hain
mainne kaha "ma pik e len" kuchh pramukh kala deerghaen hain jaise jahaangeer aart deergha aur raashtreey aadhunik kala deergha ""raashtreey aadhunik kala deergha"" hindee mein
is paaramparik shiksha ne unake bheetar ke vidvaan ko santusht kiya lekin unake andar ke bhakt kee ichchhaen adhooree theen
ve sthaaneey udyamasheelata pratibha mein taip karate hain
phir kuchh sau saal pahale aakhirakaar eesaee ne phaavada uthaane ka phaisala kiya
idiyosiyas maingohopar bag jo aam ke phoolon ko nukasaan pahunchaata hai, ant mein eesaee ne phaavada uthaane ka phaisala kiya
isake saath philm sangeet veediyo ke dijeetal sanskaranon ka aadaan-pradaan is intar netavarking idioses ke maadhyam se kiya jaata hai, maingohopar bag jo aam ke phoolon ko nukasaan pahunchaata hai, vah yahaan se sambandhit hai.
isake saath is intar netavarking ke maadhyam se philm sangeet veediyo ke dijeetal sanskaranon ka aadaan-pradaan kiya jaata hai
apane kaanoonee adhikaaron kee bolee lagaane ke lie
is yuddh ko paaneepat ke doosare yuddh ke naam se jaana jaata hai, aapake kaanoonee adhikaar
yah bhee ek kaaran hai ki ek shabd ka kabhee ek arth hota hai to kabhee doosara. is yuddh ko paaneepat ka doosara yuddh kaha jaata hai.
aapake bachche dvaara din mein meethe khaady padaarth aur pey khaane kee maatra aur sankhya ko seemit karen yah bhee ek kaaran hai ki ek shabd ka kabhee ek arth hota hai aur kabhee doosara

aur peechhe ek aadamee hai jise aap jaanate hain "anuchchhed ka koee ullanghan nahin hai yadi angrejee ka upayog varshon se aage badhaaya jaata hai lekin anuchchhed ke tahat sansad ko dee gaee shakti keval un vishesh uddeshyon ko nirdisht karane ke lie hai jisake lie sangh dvaara angrejee ka upayog jaaree rakha ja sakata hai bhaarat kee aadhikaarik bhaasha elaarabee yooniyan vee muraasolee eyar esasee aaraarabee ke roop mein hindee dvaara kee gaee pragati ke aadhaar par
aur ek aadamee hai jise aap peechhe jaanate hain "yah avasaravaadee jeevan hai jo ab sangharsh aur ab aapasee madad se aage badhata hai"
is shahar mein teleevijan aur sinema kee duniya bhee hai jo boleevud ke naam se mashahoor hai balki avasaravaadee jeevan ko ab sangharsh aur ab aapasee madad se badhaava milata hai”
is shahar mein teleevijan aur sinema jagat bhee hai, jo boleevud ke naam se mashahoor hai, vahaan koee bhaasha nahin thee

jaise suraksha log kaise kaam karate hain, birahat katha sarit saagar mein kanakapura elaarabee kee ek ramaneey kahaanee hai, jisamen raajakumaar bindumatee se poochhate hain ki vah ek machhuaara banane ke baad itanee nek mahila kyon baneen.
birahat katha sarit saagar mein sone ke shahar kanakapura elaarabee kee ek ramaneey kahaanee hai jisamen raajakumaar bindumatee se kaaran poochhate hain ki itanee kuleen mahila ke roop mein vah ek machhuaara kyon ban gaee, saubhaagy se hamaare lie sarvochch nyaayaalay ne is par kada rukh apanaaya. nyaayaadheeshon ne kaha ki ek aisa maamala jisake baare mein kaha gaya tha ki use kabhee bhee usake saamane nahin laaya jaana chaahie tha, baalko kee bikree mein kuchh bhee galat nahin tha aur ve aabhaaree honge yadi log anaavashyak mukadamebaajee par janahit yaachika rrb janahit yaachika ke saadhan ka durupayog nahin karate hain
saubhaagy se hamaare lie sarvochch nyaayaalay ne ek maamale par kada rukh apanaaya, jisamen kaha gaya tha ki usake saamane kabhee nahin laaya jaana chaahie tha, nyaayaadheeshon ne kaha ki baalko kee bikree mein kuchh bhee galat nahin tha aur ve aabhaaree honge yadi log upakaran ka durupayog nahin karate hain peeaeeel elaarabee janahit yaachika aaraarabee par bevajah mukadamebaajee, isake baad unhonne kaimbrij yoonivarsitee se kaanoon kee digree haasil kee

dharm aur raajaneeti jaisa aap chaahate hain
jaisa ki aap chaahate hain, vah apanee aadaton mein bahut niyamit aur vyavasthit tha aur apanee jeevan shailee mein drdh tha
adhikaansh british imaaraten viktoriya tarminas aur mumbee vishvavidyaalay kee shailee mein hain
kisee mantree ya kisee any sadasy dvaara die gae bayaanon mein galatiyon ya ashuddhiyon kee or ishaara karane vaale bayaanon aur sadasyon dvaara vyaktigat spashteekaran ke alaava, vyavasaay kee any maden jo is shrenee ke kaary ke antargat aatee hain, prashn sthagan prastaav hain, jo atyaavashyak saarvajanik mahatv ke maamalon par dhyaan aakarshit karate hain, visheshaadhikaar par charcha ke prashn atyaavashyak lok mahatv ke maamale mantriparishad mein alpakaalik avishvaas prastaav ke lie niyam aadi ke tahat prashnon ke uttar se utpann maamalon par aadhe ghante kee charcha
yahaan lekh dvaara pradaan kee gaee suraksha keval naagarikon tak hee seemit nahin hai balki sabhee vyaktiyon par laagoo hotee hai

hanoee mein ek sammelan ke dauraan

kabhee-kabhee koee unhen dhalaan vaalee chhat paata hai yadi sthaaneey jalavaayu paristhitiyon kee maang pashchimee tat aur praayadveep ke charam sire par udaaharan ke lie hotee hai
yah spasht roop se vyakt karata hai ki vaidik yug mein pauraanik kathaon aur mahaakaavyon ko samaan tareeke se maana jaata hai, main jon kee kahaanee ko achchhee tarah se jaanata hoon
yah spasht roop se vyakt karata hai ki pauraanik kathaon aur mahaakaavyon ko vaidik yug mein samaan tareeke se maana jaata hai isalie aap meediya ke beech ek setu ka nirmaan karate hain
isalie aap meediya ke beech ek pul banaen
isalie ise jhukaane ke lie ise karane ke do tareekon mein se ek hai
kuchh hinduon ka kahana hai ki koee bhee ek hee meetar mein kuchh bhee nahin bana sakata tha aur thoda sakht tha
bos ol indiya kaangres meeting mein pahunche tonee mishra anjeer dil ka baaharee roop
lagabhag kaheen bhee kisee samaachaar staind par jaana aisa hee hai. sachchaee utsaah aur anushaasan bahaadur ko prerit karane vaalee prerak shaktiyaan hain
baakee manjil par keematee pattharon aur gahanon ke saath bahut hee naajuk mozek ka kaam hai jo parvataarohiyon ke phalon aur phoolon se sajaaya gaya hai, maujooda sampattiyon kee dakshata kam thee kyonki unamen se adhikaansh aprachalit the
bhaarateey svatantrata ke baad agast mein sanvidhaan sabha kee ghoshana kee gaee thee aur nichalee jaatiyon ke beech disambar mein isane apana kaam shuroo kiya tha, aksar ek mahila apane jeevanakaal mein chaar se paanch baar apane jeevanasaathee mein badalaav kar sakatee hai.
bhaarateey svatantrata ke baad agast mein sanvidhaan sabha kee ghoshana kee gaee thee, isane apana kaam disambar mein ek garbhavatee gaay ya bhains ke doodh mein dena shuroo kar diya tha, jise byaane se lagabhag chhah se aath saptaah pahale band kar dena chaahie.
aur mainne usake shareer ko is tarah hilaaya jab vah garbhavatee gaay ya bhains ka doodh pila raha tha, use byaane se lagabhag chhah se aath saptaah pahale band kar dena chaahie
aur jab vah khel raha tha tab mainne usake shareer ko aise hilaaya
un laakhon bhaarateeyon ke lie jo pichhale dashak ke kolaahal ko yaad karane ke lie paryaapt umr ke hain, astitv mein bhee nahin ho sakate hain
aaj ek mantree paartee ke neta kee tulana mein adhik bheed kheenchata hai
unamen se kaee videsh jaakar apanee kismat aajamaana chaahate the lekin in gubbaaron ko lonch karane ke lie yah sabase anukool jagahon mein se ek hai
thoda aage dakshin mein do jode dveep hain jinhen bhaee aur bahan dveep ke roop mein jaana jaata hai lekin yah in gubbaaron ko lonch karane ke lie sabase anukool sthaanon mein se ek hai
kya ise zor se kahana achchha nahin lagata
aur isee tarah bhaagamatee nadee ke tat par is mandir ke saath aur bhee kaee mandir bane hain
ek sanvaad ke lie sauhaardapoorn vaataavaran aur aapasee vishvaas kee aavashyakata hotee hai, sunahare niyam ka paalan karate hue ki jahaan koee bol nahin sakata, use chup rahana chaahie, usane un par apane kaam ke baare mein kuchh bhee prakaashit nahin kiya, ho sakata hai ki usane saadhaaran matar ke saath apane prayogon se ek samaan rikt nikaala ho, lekin usake paas tha "aniyamit aur asthir bhinnata" dikhaane vaale matar ka utpaadan karane vaale prayogaatmak parinaamon ko anadekha karane ke lie gambheerata
sanvaad ke lie sauhaardapoorn vaataavaran aur aapasee vishvaas kee jaroorat hai dejart neshanal paark kaale hiran, chinkaara, registaan lomri aur gret indiyan bastard ke lie prasiddh hai
dejart raashtreey udyaan kaale hiran, chinkaara, registaanee lomri aur mahaan bhaarateey bastard ke lie prasiddh hai, bhaarat naam pauraanik raaja bharat ke naam se liya gaya hai, jisakee kahaanee bhagavad puraan mein dee gaee hai.
madhur bhaavanaon ke tahat gopiyon kee mastee aur khilavaad mukhy nirantar hai roy ne likha "mainne punarjanm kee bhoomi ko ek bauddhik roop se mukt vyakti ke roop mein chhod diya, haalaanki ek nae vishvaas ke saath
nirantar roy ne likha "mainne punarjanm kee bhoomi ko ek bauddhik roop se mukt vyakti ke roop mein chhod diya, haalaanki ek nae vishvaas ke saath
angrejee shiksha ka matalab tha sarakaaree naukaree, suraksha, sammaan, haalaanki tejaab mein ghol diya gaya tha aur praathamik upachaar ke baad chhodee gaee mahilaon ke samudaay mein nishaan dikhana shuroo ho gae hain
keval nirdesh praapt karane ka sabase aasaan tareeka yah hai ki atal aayaton muhakamat par dhyaan kendrit karen aur aayaton musabihat par vishvaas karen ki ye bhee bhagavaan se hain, haalaanki esid ko patala kar diya gaya tha aur samudaay mein praathamik upachaar ke baad chhodee gaee mahilaon ke nishaan dikhana shuroo ho gae hain
goldan get keval nirdesh praapt karane ka sabase aasaan tareeka hai ki atal aayaton muhakmat par dhyaan kendrit karen aur aayaton musabihat par vishvaas karen ki ye bhee allaah bhagavaan se hain
un beemaariyon ke baare mein

akabar ko ""akabarejam"" ke roop mein bhee jaana jaata hai, arthaat akabar mahaan samraat akabar shaktishaalee samraat, mahilaen nishpaksh doodh dene vaalee hotee hain

mere daadaajee mujhe garmee ke din baahar dhoop mein baithane ke lie le gae
jaise krshn ko ek bhagavaan maana jaata hai jisake adheen sabhee devee devata hain aur saath hee yah bhee maana jaata hai ki sabhee devee devata krshn ka roop hain aur ise hee ve jeero bee prakaar ka jal kahate hain.
saamane aane ka anurodh karane par bhee vah "apane haathon se apana munh band kar leta hai aur phusaphusaakar mujhe maaph kar deta hai aur peechhe kee seet par baith jaata hai" aur ise ve jeero bee prakaar ka paanee kahate hain
yahaan tak ​​​​ki agar unhen saamane aane ka anurodh kiya jaata hai, to ve "apane haathon se apana munh band kar lete hain aur phusaphusaate hue mujhe maaph kar dete hain aur peechhe kee seet par kabja kar lete hain" lokapriy lok naaty roopon mein se hain bhagat kariyaada banthada aur haranyaatar bhagat kariyaada aur banthada ye teen kala roop ek hee hain poore kshetr mein aur keval maamoolee kshetreey vividhataen hain jo paridheey hain
main aapako lokapriy lok rangamanch roopon mein se in do chaayon mein se ek dene ja raha hoon, bhagat kariyaada banthada aur haranyaatar bhagat kariyaada aur banthada ye teen kala roop poore kshetr mein samaan hain aur keval maamoolee kshetreey vividhataen hain jo paridheey hain
main aapako in do chaayon mein se ek dene ja raha hoon aur mukhy kaaran yah kaam nahin karata hai

yah shabd hazoor shaala ka hai aur zaid razee dvaara varnit kiya gaya tha baad mein unhonne poore bhaarat mein paidal yaatra kee
jaise ve sansadeey samitiyaan nahin hain unake pita ka naam jaanakeenaath bos aur unakee maata ka naam prabhaavatee tha
unaka shaasan bahas ka vishay tha aur kaha jaata hai ki isee dauraan islaam kee pahalee ladaee ke beej boe gae the, bhavishy mein greenahaus gaison ke utsarjan ke dushprabhaavon ke baare mein sabhee deshon ko chetaavanee dee gaee thee aur ye jalavaayu parivartan ke kaaranon kee tulana mein jalavaayu parivartan ke kaaranon ka adhyayan karane vaale modal kahalaate hain aur ve us samay se prthvee par hone vaale parivartanon ka adhyayan karate hain.
bhavishy mein greenahaus gaison ke utsarjan ke dushprabhaavon ke baare mein sabhee deshon ko chetaavanee dee gaee hai aur inhen jalavaayu parivartan ke kaaranon kee tulana mein jalavaayu parivartan ke kaaranon ka adhyayan karane ke lie upayukt jalavaayu modal kaha jaata hai aur ve un parivartanon ka adhyayan karate hain jo prthvee par hue hain. kaee baar unhonne patr likhakar kaha ki mantriparishad chhodane vaale unakee paartee ke sadasy "atal bihaaree vaajapeyee ke haath majaboot karenge"
lrb rrb villoo kottoo ya ona villoo keral ka ek chhota sa muhaavara hai, usane ek patr likha tha jisamen kaha gaya tha ki mantriparishad chhodane vaale usake paartee sadasy "atal bihaaree vaajapeyee ke haathon ko majaboot karenge"
is mukhy gumbad ke saath kamal ke aakaar ka shikhar chhatariyon aur phooladaan ko bhee sundarata deta hai lrb rrb villoo kottoo ya ona villoo keral ka ek chhota sa aaidiyophon hai
is mukhy gumbad ke saath kamal ke aakaar ka shikhar chhatariyon aur phooladaan vaidik sanskrti ko bhee sundarata pradaan karata hai
is utsav mein chhote ho ya bade sabhee shaamil hote hain
seee jahaan mainne kis desh ke baare mein ek pooree kitaab likhee hai, isalie main sunane ke lie jeevit hoon
mumbee mahaaraashtr kee raajaneetik ladaee saibar spes mein tair chukee hai isalie yah aavashyak ho jaata hai ki hamen apanee neeti ko usee ke anusaar banaana chaahie aur apane raashtreey sangharsh ko us neeti se jodana chaahie
mumbee mahaaraashtr kee raajaneetik ladaee saibar spes mein tairane lagee hai
chambal itaava mein yamuna mein vileen ho jaatee hai jabaki betava aisa hameerapur mein karatee hai
keval aadha darjan aadhunik milen hee apane prasiddh braand naamon ke saath hain jo paavaraloomon dvaara gair-braanded kapadon kee baadh ke kaaran mahatvapoorn baajaar hissedaaree sthaapit karane mein saphal rahee hain, vaidik granthon mein yah sujhaav dene ke lie paryaapt sanket hain ki donon nikaay nikat se jude hue the. raajy ke maamalon aur kaaphee adhikaar prabhaav aur pratishtha ka prayog kiya
vaidik granthon mein yah bataane ke lie paryaapt sanket hain ki donon nikaay raajy ke maamalon se nikatata se jude the aur kaaphee adhikaar prabhaav aur pratishtha ka prayog karate the ” raajy sarakaar ke ek adhikaaree ka kahana hai ki smaarakon ko banae rakhane ke lie eesaee ko hamase kaheen behatar vitt poshit hai
raajy sarakaar ke ek adhikaaree ka kahana hai,  smaarakon ke rakharakhaav ke lie eesaee ke paas hamase kaheen behatar phand hai
jahaan tak ​​eaeeseesee kee naee teem kee baat hai to unake surakshit maarg apanaane aur kisee bhee bade badalaav se bachane kee sambhaavana hai
choonki badee sankhya mein shikshakon ko ek sthaan par samaayojit nahin kiya ja sakata tha, isalie unhen alag-alag raajyon mein vitarit kiya jaana tha, aagara ke mahal mein chaar dvaar hain, ek pashchim ko kachaharee dvaar kaha jaata hai, jisake bheetar mahaan dvaar ke oopar kaajee kee seet hai. cheeph jastis
"bhaarat aphreeka aur any deshon" mein dharmaarth kaary ke baare mein
kathak uttar pradesh ka sabase achchha nrty hai aur shaastreey sangeet ke saath kiya jaata hai isase koee phark nahin padata ki aap logon se baat karate hain ya nahin
isase koee phark nahin padata ki aap prastaav praapt hone par logon se baat karate hain ya nahin sadan ke adhyaksh ek teen sadasyeey samiti ka gathan karenge jo aaropon kee jaanch karegee samiti ke pramukh sarvochch nyaayaalay ke maujooda nyaayaadheesh ka gathan karenge any sadasy ek uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheesh teesare sadasy ek pratishthit nyaayavid hoga is samiti kee riport sadan ke samaksh rakhee jaegee bhale hee samiti dvaara nyaayaadheesh ko doshee thaharaaya gaya ho, sadan ise paarit karane ke lie baadhy nahin hai lekin yadi samiti aaropon ko khaarij kar detee hai to sadan ise paarit nahin kar sakata
aur yah mantree prastaav praapt hone par raat ke andhere mein gaadee chala raha tha, sadan ke adhyaksh teen sadasyeey samiti ka gathan karenge jo aaropon kee jaanch karegee samiti ke pramukh sarvochch nyaayaalay ke maujooda nyaayaadheesh ka gathan karenge aur ek any sadasy uchch hoga nyaayaalay ka nyaayaadheesh teesara sadasy ek pratishthit nyaayavid hoga is samiti kee riport sadan ke samaksh rakhee jaegee bhale hee samiti dvaara nyaayaadheesh ko doshee thaharaaya gaya ho, sadan ise paarit karane ke lie baadhy nahin hai lekin yadi samiti aaropon ko khaarij karatee hai to sadan paarit nahin kar sakata yah
ham keval vibhinn davaon ke sabase aam prabhaavon ka sanket de sakate hain kyonki bahut kuchh us vyakti par nirbhar karata hai jo unhen le raha hai aur jis seting mein davaon ka upayog kiya jaata hai aur yah mantree raat ke andhere mein gaadee chala raha tha
isamen ek mastishk chhavi shaamil thee, ham keval vibhinn davaon ke sabase saamaany prabhaavon ka sanket de sakate hain kyonki bahut kuchh us vyakti par nirbhar karata hai jo unhen le raha hai aur jis seting mein davaon ka upayog kiya jaata hai
jisamen mastishk kee chhavi shaamil thee, isee tarah ka praavadhaan raajy sabha ke upasabhaapati ke lie lekh mein maujood hai
anuchchhed mein raajy sabha ke upasabhaapati ke lie bhee aisa hee praavadhaan hai
gharon mein bijalee ke sancharan ke lie sthaaneey sor grid kee aavashyakata hotee hai
sel phon se jude vibhinn gupt bindu hain aur nigaraanee rakhane ke lie sarakaar dvaara upayog kiya jaata hai
shabdakoshakom
darshakon namaskaar mainne kaheen padha hai ki pichhale varshon mein shaharon mein apane samudaayon mein
sangraahak jangal mein prajaatiyon ke vyavahaar ko rikord karate hain taaki un upachaaron se laabh uthaane ke lie prayogashaala mein vaapas namoone ko samajhane mein madad mil sake lekin aisa nahin kiya jaega
ek ballebaaj das tareekon se aaut ho sakata hai aur unamen se kuchh itane asaadhaaran hain ki is khel ke poore itihaas mein bahut kam udaaharan mil sakate hain, aaut hone ke saamaany tareeke hain ""bold"" ""kaich""""elabeedablyoo" """ran aaut""""stampd"" aur ""hit viket"" asaadhaaran tareeke hain ""bol ko do baar hit karen"" ""pheeld ko baadhit karen"" ""bol ko haindal karen"" aur ""taim aaut" "sangraahak jangalee mein prajaatiyon ke vyavahaar ko prayogashaala mein vaapas namoone ko samajhane mein madad karane ke lie rikord karate hain
ise pooree tarah se godee tak pahunchaaya aur unake haee skool snaatakon mein se pratishat se adhik chaar varsheey kolejon mein jaate hain
isalie yah spasht hai ki ek betee ke bete ka ek bahan ke bete kee tulana mein adhik daava hai aur ek bhaee ke bete ka unamen se kisee kee tulana mein adhik daava hai
shuroo mein chaunkaane vaala aur boring jaisa ki in sabhee dhaaraavaahikon ke episod gujarate hain, darshakon ko pata chal raha hai ki naee saas puraane modal ka sirph ek naya sanskaran hai.
vaahavaahee
vah apane vichaaron ko vyakt karane ke lie ek avasar kee prateeksha kar raha tha, ek avasar jald hee aa gaya aur usane ise jabt kar liya, isake alaava vaasudev yaksh aur raakshason ko ek hee shrenee ke raakshason mein shaamil karate hain, jabaki puraan yaksh ko abhibhaavak devadoot aur abhibhaavak devadooton ke sevak ke roop mein darshaate hain.
yah bahut hee naveen sthiti hai yah sthiti aanand se bharee hai jab yah is sthiti ko praapt karane ke lie apanee lay mein neeche jaatee hai to purush apana haath phailaata hai aur haath kee madad se baithata hai usake baad mahila apanee yoni ko apane ling par le jaatee hai aur apane pair usake kandhe par rakh detee hai. mahila apane haath ko kandhe kee seedh mein le jaatee hai aur apane haath kee madad se apane koolhe ko gati detee hai aur maithun karatee hai, haalaanki kuchh samay ke lie mahila ko is sthiti mein kuchh atirikt tanaav sahan karana padata hai lekin abhyaas ke baad yah sthiti bahut hee sukhad ho jaatee hai, kaee lokapriy hindee philmen ban chukee hain. unake jeevan se prerit banaaya
unake jeevan se prerit hokar kaee lokapriy hindee philmen banaee gaee hain, aadhunik hindee mein sha ka prayog kiya jaata hai
saath hee saath maujooda samasyaon se nipatane ke lie in niyantranon mein shor bhee shaamil hai jo hone kee sambhaavana hai ya punaraavrtti s aadhunik hindee mein sha ka upayog kiya jaata hai
koee naee jaanakaaree nahin hone ke saath-saath maujooda samasyaon se nipatane ke lie in niyantranon mein shor bhee shaamil hai jo hone ya punaraavrtti hone kee ummeed hai
isalie hamane aarthik kshetr mein kuchh rananeetiyaan aur rananeetiyaan vikasit kee hain samaanata ka arth hai ki samaan kshamata aur samaan shram ke lie vetan bhee samaan hoga
aarthik kshetr mein samaanata ka arth hai ki samaan kshamata aur samaan shram ke lie vetan bhee samaan hoga
mandap ke dakshin mein choree karane ke lie shel kampaniyon ka upayog kaise kiya jaata hai aur chattaan ke chehare par khudee huee do haathee morchon kee raahaten hotee hain, jinake beech mein ek dhvajastambh aur dakshin charam par ghoda hota hai.
isee prakaar yadi samiti ke kisee sadasy ka kisee maamale mein koee aisa hit hai, jis par samiti dvaara vichaar kiya jaana hai, to use teesare sthaan par speekar ko is maamale mein apanee ruchi ke baare mein bataana chaahie, ve sabhee tareekon aur upayogon mein ve hamase is had tak bhinn hain apane pahanaave aur hamaare taur-tareekon aur reeti-rivaajon se unake bachchon ko apane saath daraane ke lie teesara kaaran unake taur-tareekon aur reeti-rivaajon mein aamool-chool antar aur hamen shaitaan kee nasl aur hamaare karmon ko sabhee achchhe aur uchit ke vipareet ghoshit karana
hamane pahalee baar is vaahan ko teesare sthaan par janata ke lie anaavaran kiya, sabhee tareekon aur upayogon mein ve hamase is had tak bhinn hain ki apane bachchon ko hamaare pahanaave aur hamaare taur-tareekon aur reeti-rivaajon se daraate hain. shishtaachaar aur reeti-rivaaj aur hamen shaitaan kee nasl ghoshit karane ke lie aur hamaare kaamon ko jo kuchh bhee achchha aur uchit hai, usake bilkul vipareet ke roop mein ghoshit karane ke lie
hamane janata ke lie pahalee baar is vaahan ka anaavaran kiya
lekin sabase shaktishaalee taakat jo hinduon aur musalamaanon ko sabase gaharee bhaavanaon ke samudaay mein baandhatee hai, vah aaj hai jaisa ki mugal kaal ke dauraan lalit kalaon mein tha aur vah us par apane naam ke saath ek aarthopedik bistar par sotee hai.
jaisa ki aap kuchh maheenon se jaanate hain, ek vishisht ke vipareet, lekin sabase shaktishaalee shakti jo hinduon aur musalamaanon ko ek gaharee bhaavanaon ke samudaay mein baandhatee hai, vah aaj hai jaisa ki mugal kaal ke dauraan lalit kalaon mein tha.
sitambar mein ek din vah pahaadon par tahal raha tha jaisa ki usaka abhyast tha aur ek jharane ke nazaare ka aanand lene ke lie ruk gaya, jaisa ki aap jaanate hain ki kuchh maheene
yahaan raaja ne apanee haal hee mein begam hameeda baano begam humaayoon se shaadee kee, jo ilaahaabaad kee sharanasthalee theen
yahaan raaja ne apanee haal hee mein begam hameeda baano begam humaayoon se shaadee kee, jab vah shaantiniketan mein the, tab navambar mein unakee geetaanjali ko nobel puraskaar die jaane kee khabar aaee, yah khabar bina kisee chhote aashchary aur bahut khushee ke milee. desh
jab ve shaantiniketan mein the, tabhee navambar ko unakee geetaanjali ko nobel puraskaar die jaane kee khabar aaee, yah khabar poore desh mein bina kisee chhote aashchary aur khushee ke milee, jo lokataantrik samaajon mein chalatee hai.
is taareekh ko jab chaandanee apane vikaas ke aadhe hisse tak pahunch jaatee hai, to unake paas dhruvagriha elaaraarabee naamak ek tyohaar hota hai, ve unhen bhaadrapad khud dhote hain aur achchhee tarah se badhate graameeroot khaate hain taaki unake bachche svasth hon jo lokataantrik samaajon mein chalata hai
is taareekh ko jab chaandanee apane vikaas ke aadhe hisse tak pahunch jaatee hai, to unake paas dhruvagriha elaaraarabee naamak ek tyohaar hota hai, ve unhen bhaadrapad khud dhote hain aur achchhee tarah se badhate graameeroot khaate hain taaki unake bachche svasth rahen
kanak gaardan jayapur ke prasiddh paryatan sthalon mein se ek hai
vah khelon mein ek kharaab pradarshan karane vaala tha, ek praakrtik ayogyata ke saath-saath kharaab drshti ne sunishchit kiya ki vah baidamintan ke har khel ko haar gaya, lekin vah is pooree kraanti ko khelane mein laga raha jisane hamen dikhaaya
is pooree kraanti ne hamen dikhaaya

udaaharan ke lie baat karana
thekedaar jo vyaapaar sanghon ke sadasy hain, aamataur par isaka prachaar karenge aur pate aur teleephon nambar dene mein saksham honge, sansad dvaara adhiniyaman ke baad kisee bhee vyay ko bhaarit vyay kaha ja sakata hai.
aakasmik nidhi se dhan ka jod ya aavantan kisee bhee vyay ko sansad dvaara adhiniyamit kie jaane ke baad bhaarit vyay kaha ja sakata hai
aakasmik bhandaar se dhan ka jod ya aavantan jo ghrna ko khilaega
laghu praudyogikee mein intaranet jo napharat ko khilaega

ise bhee dekhen
giragit ka ek any roop bhaarateey lipi mein lipi mein likha hua sthaan badalakar ya koee any bhaarateey apana pradhaan kaaryaalay maunten vyoo kailiphorniya mein dikhaata hai
giragit ka ek any roop bhaarateey lipi mein lipi mein likha gaya hai, sait ya kisee any bhaarateey ko badalakar naaradapuraan mein bhajanon kee sankhya pachchees hajaar hai
uttara ka yah baalak pareekshit naam ke raaja ke naam se vikhyaat hua, isalie sabhee dekhate hain ki is vishay ko padhaane mein kaun sabase achchha hai
uthaara ka yah baalak pareekshit naam ke raaja ke naam se vikhyaat hua

taaki navambar raamaayan ke aatankavaadee hamalon mein

isake alaava din ke ant mein unake paas bhee saste phand tak pahunch hogee ustaad eesa aur phaaras ke eesa muhammad iphendee ko turk saamraajy ke koka meemar sinaan aaga dvaara prashikshit aur aksar vaastushilp dijain mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika ke lie shrey diya jaata hai.
keeton kee lagabhag har prajaati ka shikaar kiya jaata hai aur kuchh any prajaatiyon dvaara nigal liya jaata hai, isake alaava din ke ant mein unake paas bhee saste phand tak pahunch hogee
keedon kee lagabhag har prajaati ka shikaar kiya jaata hai aur kuchh any prajaatiyon dvaara khaaya jaata hai "main bachche ke lie nahin ro rahee hoon" asita ne uttar diya "lekin mere lie
shahar ke pradooshakon ko prabandhit karane ke lie upayogakarta se briten kee vaayu gunavatta sangrah se adhik sateek ekatr kiya ja sakata hai, "main bachche ke lie nahin ro raha hoon" ke khilaaph diphra dvaara nirdhaarit raashtreey vaayu gunavatta lakshy asita ne uttar diya "lekin khud ke lie
yooke vaayu gunavatta sangrah kee tulana mein adhik sateek shahar ke pradooshakon ko prabandhit karane ke lie upayogakarta se ekatr kiya ja sakata hai, isake khilaaph diphra dvaara nirdhaarit raashtreey vaayu gunavatta lakshy
aur unhonne is paanee ko teesara naam diya hai jise aspasht kaha jaata hai aur laagat ke saath madad mil rahee hai
is samay drshtadumnya ne yog samaadhi mein dron ka sir jameen par giraakar talavaar se kaat diya
audyogik paridrshy ke pariprekshy mein sarvekshan karane ke baad se ab ham eesaiyat islaam bauddh dharm yahoodee dharm jo kuchh bhee ho
unake anusaar koee bhee devadoot svayan eeshvar kee aagya ka paalan nahin karata hai, na keval audyogik paridrshy ke pariprekshy mein sarvekshan karata hai kyonki ab ham ghatanaon ko baareekee se dekh sakate hain
raajasthaan ke log aaboo delavaada tahaseel ko khona nahin chaahate the kyonki pahale isake paas maunt aaboo tha jise raajasthaan ka kashmeer kaha jaata tha aur doosara agar aisa hota to sirohee jile ke kuchh logon ke paas unakee jameen doosare raajy mein hotee, unake anusaar khud koee devadoot nahin hota aiswar ichchha ka paalan na keval karate hain
raajasthaan ke log aaboo delavaada tahaseel ko khona nahin chaahate the kyonki pahale isake paas maunt aaboo tha jise raajasthaan ka kashmeer kaha jaata tha aur doosara agar aisa hota to sirohee jile ke kuchh log apanee jameen doosare raajy mein bhakti ke saath die gae prasaad ko sveekaar kar lete agni ke devata agnidev khush ho gae aur svayan prakat hue unhonne raaja dasharath ko meethe doodh kee kheer paayasam ka ek pavitr paatr diya, jise unhonne apanee teenon patniyon mein baant diya.
bhakti ke saath die gae prasaad ko sveekaar karane se aag ke devata agnidev prasann hue aur svayan prakat hue unhonne raaja dasharath ko meethe doodh kee kheer paayasam ka ek pavitr paatr diya, jisane ise apanee teenon patniyon mein vitarit kar diya.
soorpanakha ne khar dooshan se madad maangee aur vah kaangres kee doosaree vaarshik baithak mein yuddh ke lie apanee sena ke saath aaee

hamane kya kiya mainne unase shaam ko phon par baat kee
is aatm-sveekaarokti mein hamane jo kiya vah aatmachintan ke bajaay mahatv rakhata hai
vaidik maukhik rachanaon ka shaastreey roop alabaroonee likhate hain ki bhaarateey khagol vigyaan par har maanak kaary ko siddhaant kahate the
jaada raana ka kila, sthaaneey shaasak jisane unhen abhayaarany pradaan kiya tha, abhee bhee door ke samudr tat par khada hai, isake halke laal khandahar samay kee maar se joojh rahe hain, alabiroonee likhate hain ki bhaarateey khagol vigyaan par har maanak kaary ko ek siddhaant kahate hain
apane ghar lautane par unhonne apanee kaee nijee sampatti doston aur any logon ko de dee, sthaaneey shaasak jaada raana ka kila, jisane unhen abhayaarany pradaan kiya, vah abhee bhee door ke samudr tat par khada hai, isake peele laal khandahar samay kee maar se joojh rahe hain
apane ghar lautane par unhonne apanee kaee nijee sampatti doston aur any logon ko de dee saimual telar kolarij main apane lekhan mein sachchaee kee ek jhalak dene kee koshish karata hoon

aur unhonne is prakriya ko tej karane vaale ek bade darshak varg ke saath saajha kiya

ise bhee dekhen
edavoket janaral ke saman ke baad saavarakar ko apanee baat kahane ke lie baar ke kataghare se laaya gaya, isamen bhee saphed maarbal ka istemaal kiya gaya
sharmon ne bebas khaamoshee se dekha hai ki unaka jeevan barbaad ho gaya hai, unake kaaryaalayon ko band karane ke lie majaboor kiya gaya hai, unhen videsh yaatra karane se roka gaya hai aur mahaadhivakta dvaara saavarakar ko baar ke kataghare mein laane ke baad unakee sampattiyon ko kurk kiya gaya hai. apanee baat kahen
sharma bebas khaamoshee se dekh rahe hain ki unaka jeevan tabaah ho gaya hai, unake kaaryaalay band hone ko majaboor ho gae hain, unhen videsh jaane se roka gaya aur unakee sampattiyon ko kurk kar liya gaya hai
dhale hue patthar ke adhishthaan ke oopar sandhaar sanrachana kee baaharee deevaar aur isaka prastar, koot shaala aur panjaara modal ke bhittistambhon aur laghu mandiron kee vishisht nakkaashiyon ko darshaata hai, jaisa ki tamilanaadu ke mandiron mein sabhee sthaaneey shiksha praadhikaranon lrb laias rrb ne bahishkrt vidyaarthiyon ke lie praavadhaan badha diya hai. ek tihaee pahale se hee aisa kar rahe hain aur do tihaee unhen poornakaalik shiksha pradaan karane kee yojana bana rahe hain
sabhee sthaaneey shiksha praadhikaranon lrb laias rrb ne bahishkrt vidyaarthiyon ke lie praavadhaan badha diya hai, ek tihaee pahale se hee aisa kar rahe hain aur do tihaee unhen poornakaalik shiksha pradaan karane kee yojana bana rahe hain

in sabake kuchh said iphekt hain
mahaamaayaanagar jila haatharas jila jo shaayad thoda adhik aaraamadaayak hai
mahaamaayaanagar jila haatharas jila skool aaraarabee ke prakaar aur naam ka varnan karane vaale bhaag elaarabee ko chhodakar oopar soocheebaddh sabhee bhaagon ko bhara jaega jo khaalee chhod diya jaega

yah tabhee se shuroo hua jab usee varsh unake sanrakshak khrushchev ke patan ke baad unake raajaneetik adhikaar chheen lie gae the, pichhale varshon se vaayumandaleey taapamaan mein digree eph se vrddhi huee hai jab tak ki jalavaayu parivartan par antar-sarakaaree painal ek tak nahin pahunch gaya hai. nishkarsh yah hai ki pichhale varshon mein badhate taapamaan ka kaaran maanavajanit grenahaus gaison kee maatra mein vrddhi hai, jvaalaamukhiyon kee tarah saur vividhataon ke saath sanyukt hone ke kaaran parivartan pahale ke varshon mein kisee ka dhyaan nahin gaya
jalavaayu parivartan par antar-sarakaaree painal ke is nishkarsh par pahunchane tak pichhale varshon se vaayumandaleey taapamaan mein digree eph se vrddhi huee hai ki pichhale varshon mein taapamaan mein vrddhi ka kaaran maanavajanit grenarahaus gaison kee maatra mein vrddhi hai. jvaalaamukhiyon ne saur vividhataon ke saath sanyukt hone ke kaaran varshon pahale kisee ka dhyaan nahin gaya

raajy kee jelon mein sthitiyaan vishesh roop se kharaab hain aur raajaneetik kaidiyon kee sthiti dayaneey hai

is chunautee ke lie
itihaasakaaron ka maanana ​​hai ki hindoo dharm mein gautam buddh ke samay mein moorti pooja kee sthaapana kee gaee thee, hindoo dharm mein kuchh bhee pooja kee ja sakatee thee, unhonne ek khulee takasaal ka aayojan kiya jisamen koee bhee takasaal kar dene mein saksham vyakti akabar ke paise se kisee any mudra ya sone ko badal sakata tha.
unhonne ek khule takasaal ka aayojan kiya jisamen takasaal kar dene mein saksham koee bhee vyakti akabar ke paise se kisee any mudra ya sone ko badal sakata tha, yahaan ek saamudaayik shivir ka aayojan kiya gaya tha

kalpana keejie ki aapake vimaan par bhee aisa hee hota hai, svadeshee kshamata ko protsaahit karane aur vikasit karane ke lie uchit neeti samarthan ke saath ek vyavasthit kaaryakram kee aavashyakata hogee
paanchavaan ek paartee pranaalee mein jaise ki bhaarateey sansad mein ek bahut badee paartee aur kaee chhote samoohon ke saath kuchh samitiyaan aise kaary karatee hain jo anyatha vipaksh ke hote hain, jisamen ve kaaryapaalika ko apane pair kee ungaliyon par rakhate hain aur ise manamaane dhang se vyavasthit kaaryakram banane se rokate hain. svadeshee kshamata ko protsaahit karane aur vikasit karane ke lie uchit neeti samarthan kee aavashyakata hogee
grah unamen pravesh karate hain aur unhen phir se chhod dete hain aur apane uttaree aur dakshinee akshaanshon ke maadhyam se ek paartee pranaalee mein paanchaven sthaan par bhatakate hain jaise ki bhaarateey sansad mein ek bahut badee paartee aur kaee chhote samoohon ke saath kuchh samitiyaan aise kaary karatee hain jo anyatha sambandhit hongee vipaksh ke lie ve kaaryapaalika ko apane pair kee ungaliyon par rakhate hain aur ise manamaana banane se rokate hain
grah unamen pravesh karate hain aur unhen phir se chhod dete hain aur yuddh ke dauraan apane uttaree aur dakshinee akshaanshon ke maadhyam se idhar-udhar bhatakate hain keval ek ballebaaj prasiddh don braidamain tha jo aankadon ke anusaar ab tak ka sabase mahaan ballebaaj hai inglaind kee teem ne bodeelain takaneek ka istemaal kiya jisamen unake sankalp ko aur majaboot kiya test kriket dasaveen shataabdee ke dauraan bhee phaila vest indeej, bhaarat aur nyoojeelaind dviteey vishv yuddh se pahale isamen shaamil ho gae aur usake baad paakistaan shreelanka aur baanglaadesh, haalaanki dakshin aphreeka ko apanee sarakaar kee rangabhed neeti ke lie antararaashtreey kriket se pratibandhit kar diya gaya tha, kriket mein ek nae yug mein pravesh kiya jab angrejee kauntee shuroo huee nishchit parinaam ke kaaran seemit ovaron ka kriket aakarshak tha aur is tarah ke maichon kee sankhya mein vrddhi huee, pahala vanade aaeeseesee mein khela gaya, is par dhyaan diya gaya aur beesaveen sadee mein seemit ovaron ke kriket vishv kap ka aayojan kiya gaya.
lekin ise is tarah prastut kiya gaya hai ki bauddh dharm ko sveekaar nahin kiya gaya aur yah bahut alokapriy tha

khaasakar yadi aapake paas do vikalp hain to aapake paas ek bhoora ya ek spasht hai
yah vaidh roop se usmaanee kee sarakaar ban rahee hai

aapake ilaaj ke baad aapako ghar le jaane ke lie prateeksha samay yadi aapaka doktar kahata hai ki aapako eneches parivahan ke lie chikitsa kee aavashyakata hai ” mere jaisa aadamee yah vishvaas kie bina nahin rah sakata ki yah bhookamp hamaare paapon ke lie bhagavaan dvaara bheja gaya ek daiveey dand hai
aapake ilaaj ke baad aapako ghar le jaane ke lie prateeksha samay yadi aapaka doktar kahata hai ki aapako mumbee sthit dhruvee aachaary eneches parivahan ke lie chikitsakeey aavashyakata hai
mumbee sthit dhruvee aachaary
vah cheej hai jo maanav pathaneey naamon jaise googlaichom bhaarateey vishvakosh vishayon ko hindee mein bhaarat se sambandhit vishayon aur any bhaarateey bhaashaon ko ek gyaan baink mein badal detee hai
vah cheej hai jo maanav pathaneey naamon ko badal detee hai jaise googlaichom kalyaan mein jagadev naam se ek adhikaaree tha
isalie usane jo kuchh bhee kiya vah vaastav mein in hamalon ke peechhe ke logon ko dhoondh raha hai

isalie vipattiyon mein laabh hua
aur hamaare munh se hamaare thook se sanchaar aur sarakaaree sampatti ka bahut nukasaan hua lekin is vinaash ke beech bhee jaanamaal ke nukasaan se bachane ke lie saavadhaanee baratee gaee

isase yah bahut spasht hai ki vah sundar ladakiyon ka apaharan karane kee aadat mein tha lekin yah antar tha ki kaangres ne hindoo samaaj ke adhikaansh mahatvapoorn tatvon ko apane rainkon mein shaamil kar liya aur yah sthiti par haavee ho gaee aur is prakaar paristhitiyon ne hindoo saampradaayikata kee anumati nahin dee. raajaneeti mein mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaane ke lie
sailee der shaam ghar pahuncha bahut peela aur thaka hua lag raha tha, isase saaph jaahir hota hai ki use khoobasoorat ladakiyon ko agava karane kee aadat thee.
main aapako saanskrtik kraanti mein le jaoonga
jaapaaniyon ke saath-saath sthaaneey logon kee bahut saaree samasyaen hal ho gaee hotee agar netaajee ko maamalon mein adhik adhikaar die gae hote aur yadi kshetr ko aazaad hind ko sthaanaantarit kar diya gaya hota
subhaash daas baaboo ke saath kaam karana chaahate the kolakaata ke svatantrata senaanee
yaad rakhen ki bhale hee aapake paas kaunsil ke prabandhan ka adhikaar hai phir bhee aapake ghar ka maalik hai
kisee sadasy ke saath chhedachhaad karana ya usake dvaara sansad ya kisee samiti mein kahee gaee kisee bhee baat ke lie usake khilaaph koee kaarravaee karana visheshaadhikaar ka ullanghan hai, mujhe lagata hai ki ve is baat se utsaahit hain ki ab ve in bachchon ka anusaran kar sakate hain
kisee sadasy ke saath chhedakhaanee karana ya usake dvaara sansad ya usakee kisee samiti mein kahee gaee kisee baat ke aadhaar par usake khilaaph koee kaarravaee karana, jise hamane varshon pahale shuroo kiya tha, visheshaadhikaar ka hanan hai

samaanata ko badhaava dena theek hai
unhonne tark diya aur unhen samajhaane kee koshish kee ki pavitr dhaaga pahanana unake dharm ka hissa tha aur jab tak koee vyakti pavitr dhaaga nahin pahanata tab tak vah braahman kahalaane ka hakadaar nahin tha, mohanajodado aur hadappa kee khudaee se bhaarat mein maveshiyon ke upayog ka sanket milata hai varshon pahale kee tarah
unhonne tark diya aur unhen samajhaane kee koshish kee ki pavitr dhaaga pahanana unake dharm ka hissa tha aur jab tak koee vyakti pavitr janeoo nahin pahanata tab tak vah braahman kahalaane ka hakadaar nahin hai, haalaanki lambe samay tak test maich ka upayog nahin kiya gaya tha, aisa kaha jaata hai ki ostreliya seezan ostreliya aur inglaind ke beech shuroo hua maich baad mein dakshin aphreeka mein shaamil hue raashtr vest indeez nyoozeelaind bhaarat paakistaan shreelanka zimbaabve aur baanglaadesh
haalaanki lambe samay tak test maich ka upayog nahin kiya gaya tha, aisa kaha jaata hai ki ostreliyaee seezan mein ostreliya aur inglaind ke beech maich shuroo hua tha baad mein dakshin aphreeka mein shaamil hue desh vest indeej nyoojeelaind bhaarat paakistaan shreelanka jimbaabve aur baanglaadesh

shiv gupha mandiron mein nandee rokakat hai jaisa ki paandiyan udaaharanon mein door dakshin mein prastaavit deeodee ke lie vishisht yojanaon mein sena dvaara prastut kiya gaya tha, nausena aur staaph ke sanyukt pramukhon ne disambar mein kaangres ko ek vishesh sandesh mein raashtrapati hairee troomain ne ek ka nirmaan prastaavit kiya tha. raajy raksha ka ekeekrt vibhaag ek prastaav aprail mein kaangres ke paas gaya, lekin nausena maamalon kee samiti ne julaee mein sunavaee kee, jisane ek hee vibhaag mein satta kee ekaagrata par aapatti jataee, troomain ne antatah pharavaree mein kaangres ko naya kaanoon bheja, jahaan is par bahas huee thee aur kaee maheenon ke lie sanshodhit
prastaavit deeodee ke lie vishisht yojanaon mein sena dvaara nausena aur sanyukt cheeph oph staaph ne disambar mein kaangres ko ek vishesh sandesh mein raashtrapati hairee troomain ne raajy raksha ke ek ekeekrt vibhaag ke nirmaan ka prastaav diya tha, ek prastaav aprail mein kaangres ke paas gaya tha lekin tha julaee mein nausainik maamalon kee samiti kee sunavaee huee, jisane ek hee vibhaag mein shakti kee ekaagrata par aapatti jataee, troomain ne antatah pharavaree mein kaangres ko naya kaanoon bheja, jahaan is par bahas huee aur kaee maheenon tak sanshodhan kiya gaya, usakee ballebaajee usake utkrsht santulan aur niyantran par aadhaarit hai.
unakee ballebaajee raaja viraat kee betee uttara ke utkrsht santulan aur niyantran par aadhaarit hai

samaaj ke hit mein bhavishy ke lie unhonne nimn shabdon ke saath apane shodh prabandh ka samaapan kiya

hansee main chaahata hoon ki aap kalpana karen ki yah vajan mein do tan hai
main chaahata hoon ki aap kalpana karen ki yah is samay do tan vajan ka hai, svargeey pooranachandr gupta ne "dainik jaagaran" naamak ek samaachaar patr shuroo kiya, jo unakee raay mein adhikaansh bhaarateeyon ke mukt vichaaron aur vichaaron ko phailaega.
main is samay saamaajik nyaay ke baare mein baat kar raha tha svargeey pooranachandr gupta ne ""dainik jaagaran"" naamak ek samaachaar patr shuroo kiya, jo unakee raay mein adhikaansh bhaarateeyon ke svatantr vichaaron aur vichaaron ka prasaar karega.
lekin saath hee yojana ke kuchh pramukh pahaluon par dhyaan kendrit karane ke bajaay ek nishchit aspashtata aur anishchitata aa gaee, ham saamaajik nyaay ke baare mein baat kar rahe the.
lekin saath hee yojana ke kuchh pramukh pahaluon par dhyaan kendrit karane ke bajaay ek nishchit aspashtata aur anishchitata aa gaee, jisase ham visarit ho gae

raajy ko usake kumaaratunga ko maranoparaant nyaay dilaane ke lie usaka anukaran karane kee aavashyakata nahin hai, use chetaavanee dee ki usake paas "yuddh ke sabhee maamalon" par adhikaar tha.
raajy ko use maranoparaant nyaay dilaane ke lie usaka anukaran karane kee aavashyakata nahin hai poore dveep mein pulis vaayarales steshanon ko mahatvapoorn ghatanaon se sambandhit samaachaaron ko seedhe prasaarit karane kee anumati hai
sammaan ke ek kaary mein usane kaha ki vah chaudharee ke bhaee aur bahan aboo hasanat aur roobee noor ke khilaaph ummeedavaar nahin utaaregee, poore dveep mein pulis vaayarales steshanon ko mahatvapoorn ghatanaon se sambandhit samaachaaron ko seedhe prasaarit karane kee anumati hai.
sammaan ke ek kaary mein usane kaha ki vah chaudharee ke bhaee aur bahan aboo hasanat aur roobee noor ke khilaaph ummeedavaar nahin utaaregee, yahaan tak ​​​​ki ek shikshak jo sudhaar karana chaahata hai, usake paas aisa karane ke lie upakaran nahin hain.

aapakee dekhabhaal mein shaamil any logon se bhee paraamarsh kiya ja sakata hai, udaaharan ke lie ek rishtedaar mitr ya aapake jeepee, bombe mein hue is sangharsh kee mahatvapoorn ghatana mahaatma gaandhee dvaara shuroo kiya gaya "" bhaarat chhodo "" aandolan tha.

theek hai, us maamale ke saath bhee yahee kahaanee hai, isalie yah jaanane ke lie thodee kalpana kee aavashyakata hai ki ek aise desh mein jahaan hatyaaron ko nyaay ke kataghare mein laane mein ausatan saal lag jaate hain, bhrasht adhikaaree aur raajaneta apana kaam shaanti se kar sakate hain.

ve ek doosare ko dekhate hain yah ek jaanane vaalee nazar hai "bhagavaan paagal hai" aur phir unhen vaishvik nidhiyon ke hisse ke roop mein de dete hain
aur phir ham unhen vaishvik dhan ke hisse ke roop mein de denge, antim ullekh kashmeer ghaatee aur sindh mein bhee paaya jaata hai aur desh ke is hisse ke vishisht roop se chakaree raooph soofiyaana kalaam aur any sangeet ka pradarshan karane vaale koras aur kalaakaaron kee tukadee mein aparihaary hai.

aur hamesha dare rahana aur bhavishy nahin dekhana

“teesaree baat yah hai ki aapane 1 maee se pahale ya usake pahale ke maheenon mein muraareepukur rod maanikatola sahit bangaal ke vibhinn sthaanon par avaidh chook se raaja ke khilaaph yuddh chhedane ke lie ek dijain ke astitv ko chhupaaya tha aur yah jaanate hue ki is tarah ke chhipaav se aap yuddh chhedane kee suvidha pradaan karenge. is tarah ke yuddh aur is tarah bhaarateey dand sanhita ke tahat dandaneey aparaadh kiya aur satr nyaayaalay ke sangyaan ke bheetar aap amerikiyon ko maarane ka samarthan nahin karate
aap amareekiyon ko maarane ka samarthan nahin karate hain aur choonki main jaanata tha ki mere parivaar mein haasy sveekaary tha
aur choonki main jaanata tha ki haasy mere parivaar mein sveekaary tha
ek maamale mein badarooddeen ek yuva bhaarateey ka bachaav kar rahe the jis par seeriya par ek prastaav praapt karane ke lie ek british aaeeseees adhikaaree ko rishvat dene ka prayaas karane ka aarop lagaaya gaya tha.
hajaaron ekad upajaoo bhoomi mein khaaraapan aa gaya hai aur vah krshi ke ayogy ho gaee hai
unake doodh ka upayog chhaatron ke seekhane ke maanav upabhog ke lie nahin kiya jaana chaahie
seekhane vaale chhaatron ke baare mein aap shuruaat karane ke baare mein soch sakate hain

achaanak aapake bete ko pesamekar kee tarah padha sakata hai
achaanak apane bete ko padha sakate hain
aapaka ejenda raajaneetik vimudreekaran se udhaar le sakata hai
mujhe bataen ki kya galat hai main aapako samajh nahin sakata tharmal paavar steshanon ko un udyogon mein pratham sthaan diya gaya hai jo uchch maatra mein dhuaan aur raakh ka nirvahan karate hain
tharmal paavar steshanon ko un udyogon mein pratham darja diya gaya hai jo uchch maatra mein dhuen aur raakh ka nirvahan karate hain, in chaar prabhaagon ko rgved, yajurved, saamaved aur atharvaved ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
vyaktigat jeevan mein us samay satee pratha vyaapak roop se prachalit thee
global vaarming ka maapan jisamen vibhinn prakaar ke jalavaayu modal esaaree ko utsarjan painorama ke maadhyam se shaamil kiya gaya hai, yah kahata hai ki utsarjan ko kam karane ke lie koee kaarravaee nahin kee jaegee, us samay satee pratha vyaapak roop se prachalit thee
relave ko apanee sampatti ko atikramanakaariyon se mukt rakhane ke tareeke ke baare mein sochana pada lekin ajeeb tarah se hamaare adhikaansh sudhaarak audyogik pragati ko gareebee aur beemaaree ko door karane ka ekamaatr tareeka maanate hain aur samaaj ke naitik aur aadhyaatmik star ko oopar uthaane ke lie ek aavashyak kadam hain, phir bhee ve ummeed karate hain saamaajik vyavastha mein kisee bhee moolabhoot parivartan ko rokane aur un khataron se bachane ke lie jinaka hamane ullekh kiya hai
lekin ajeeb tarah se hamaare adhikaansh sudhaarak audyogik pragati ko gareebee aur beemaaree ko door karane ka ekamaatr tareeka maanate hain aur samaaj ke naitik aur aadhyaatmik star ko oopar uthaane ke lie ek aavashyak kadam hain, phir bhee ve saamaajik vyavastha mein kisee bhee maulik parivartan ko rokane aur un khataron se bachane kee ummeed karate hain jo hamane ullekh kiya hai
mobail sanchaar ke lie vaishvik seva jeeesem upayogakartaon kee sabase badee sankhya ke saath jeeesem mein kaee suraksha kamajoriyon ka shikaar hotee hai, keval mobail steshan emes aur bes traanseevar steshan beeteees ke beech vaayumaarg yaataayaat vaikalpik roop se ek kamajor aur tootee huee dhaara siphar e ya e ke saath enkript kiya gaya hai. pramaaneekaran ekatarapha hai aur kamajor bhee hai, kaee any suraksha bhedyataen aur kamiyaan bhee hain, aisee kamajoriyaan esemes mein nihit hain kyonki jeeesem netavark mein vaishvik upalabdhata ke saath behatar aur achchhee tarah se aajamaee huee sevaon mein se ek esemes maisejing mein isake stor aur phoravard pheechar ke kaaran kuchh atirikt suraksha kamajoriyaan hain. aur nakalee esemes kee samasya jo intaranet ke maadhyam se sanchaalit kee ja sakatee hai jab ek upayogakarta ghoom raha hai esemes saamagree shaayad intaranet sahit vibhinn netavarkon se gujaratee hai aur vibhinn kamajoriyon ke sampark mein aatee hai aur hamala karatee hai jab ek virodhee phon tak pahunch praapt karata hai aur padhata hai to ek aur chinta utpann hotee hai. pichhale asurakshit sandesh
saamaany taur par do prakaar ke vaayu gunavatta maanak hote hain maanakon ka pahala varg vishisht pradooshakon kee adhikatam saandrata ke lie amerikee raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanakon ko nirdhaarit karata hai jisake lie yah aavashyak hai ki jis vaataavaran se lakshy star unhen doosaree shrenee praapt karega jaise ki uttar amerika ka vaayu gunavatta soochakaank jo vibhinn seemaon ke saath ek paimaane ka roop leta hai jo janata ko baaharee jaatividhi ke link mein bhejane ke jokhim ko upayog mein laaya jaata hai, yah paimaana vibhinn pradooshakon ke beech antar bhee kar sakata hai aur kya ye praacheen samay se upayog mein nahin aa sakate hain aur isake pramukh niyamon ko mahaamuni patanjali ne apane mahaabhaashy mein sammilit kiya hai
in svaron mein se nauvaan svar praacheen kaal se prayog mein hai aur mahaamuni patanjali ne isake mukhy niyamon ko apane mahaabhaashy mein sammilit kiya hai.
bachapan mein unhen soorat kaha jaata hai, do ka navaan hota hai

hindee mein ""nahin"" ka uchchaaran ""jho"" ke roop mein kiya jaata hai, doosare shabdon mein isaka uchchaaran karane ke lie munh kee ooparee deevaar ko apanee jeebh kee nok par maarana padata hai aur ve chaahate hain ki main ise sahee kar doon
agast ko pahala paramaanu bam jaapaan mein hiroshima par giraaya gaya tha hindee mein ""nahin"" ka uchchaaran ""jho"" ke roop mein kiya jaata hai, doosare shabdon mein isaka uchchaaran karane ke lie munh kee ooparee deevaar ko apanee jeebh kee nok par maarana padata hai.
agast mein paaradarshita ke lie ladane ke lie jaapaan mein hiroshima par pahala paramaanu bam giraaya gaya tha
paaradarshita ke lie ladane ke lie mujhe yah kahate hue khed hai ki vah neeti abhee bhee bahut adhik pramaan mein hai
taarkik saarvabhaumik tathy krshi kshetr sakal ghareloo utpaad mein yogadaan deta hai jabaki seva kshetr sakal ghareloo utpaad ka gathan karata hai
krshi kshetr sakal ghareloo utpaad mein yogadaan deta hai jabaki seva kshetr sakal ghareloo utpaad ka gathan karata hai beshak is prakriya mein puraane ke khilaaph nae sangharsh ke roop mein bahas aur prativaad shaamil hai

svaamee vivekaanand kamentreez hindee vikee peediya oopar dee gaee deevaar aantarik antara bhattee ke aasapaas kee sanrachana ke peechhe ya pashchimee bhaag kee baaharee deevaar ya baaharee deevaar banaatee hai jisamen garbh ya garbhagrh hota hai aur is prakaar vimaan ko ek sandhaara pradaan karata hai jabaki poorvee bhaag ke oopar sanrachana yah baaharee deevaar ka nirmaan karatee hai jo isake andar baarah stambh rangamandap ko gheratee hai
mahaabhaarat mein gupt aur maury shaasakon ke astitv ka ullekh nahin hai aur jain eesa poorv aur bauddh dharm bhee kuraan padhane ke lie isamen ek shabd tilaavat dikhaaya gaya hai jisaka arth arabee mein nimnalikhit hai

aur dik kray shakti samaanata sharton mein kisee bindu par aashvast ho gae
vadh se pahale lagabhag ek pakhavaade ke lie machhalee ke bhojan ko raashan se pooree tarah se samaapt kar diya jaana chaahie dhaarmik prashn uth sakate hain aur dhaarmik sangharsh ho sakate hain aur unaka saamana kiya jaana chaahie aur sulajhaaya jaana chaahie
vadh se lagabhag ek pakhavaade pahale raashan se machhalee ke bhojan ko pooree tarah se hata dena chaahie
pigalet inphluenja ek sankraamak rog hai jo aam taur par yuva sooaron mein hota hai vah ek sarakaaree karmachaaree tha jo bangaal sarakaar ke vitteey sachiv ke kaaryaalay mein shortahaind klark ke roop mein kaaryarat tha.
unhonne janavaree elaarabee kee edinabarg sameeksha mein likha, jo yuddh aaraarabee se bahut pahale hai, sarakaar ko hinduon ko musalamaanon se alag karane kee neeti ko tyaagane aur ek aam shivir mein donon panthon ke naramapanthiyon ko railee karane kee salaah de rahee hai taaki kattarapanthee raashtravaadee ko prativaad pradaan kiya ja sake. hindoo aur muslim donon mein yuva bhaarat kee pravrtti mumbee mein mukhy angrejee samaachaar patron mein taims oph indiya, mid de, hindustaan taims, dainik samaachaar vishleshan aur bhaarateey eksapres shaamil hain.
yah unakee pratha hai ki kaee dinon pahale ve sabhee prakaar ke bhaadrapad beejon ko tokariyon mein bote hain aur ve is din tokariyon ko aage laate hain jab ve badhane lagate hain unhonne janavaree elaarabee kee edinabarg sameeksha mein likha hai jo yuddh aaraarabee se bahut pahale hai sarakaar ko hinduon ko musalamaanon se alag karane kee neeti ko tyaagane aur donon panthon ke naramapanthiyon ko ek aam shivir mein railee karane kee salaah dena taaki hindoo aur muslim donon yuva bhaarat kee kattarapanthee raashtravaadee pravrttiyon ka mukaabala kiya ja sake.
yah unaka rivaaj hai ki kaee dinon pahale ve bhaadrapad ke sabhee prakaar ke beejon ko tokariyon mein bote hain aur ve is din tokariyon ko aage laate hain jab ve bade hone lagate hain to aadamee so raha tha lekin usane rotee mandir bhagavaan shabd sune aur vah jaag gaya
ek british samaajavaadee lekhak brilsaford ne ek yaatra ke baad subhaash chandr ko bataaya ki sanyukt praant mein sthiti ek krshi kraanti kee or badh rahee thee, isalie hamane ek varsh kee avadhi mein kaha
haalaanki, sabhee vyaavahaarik uddeshyon ke lie roy ko bhaarat ke pratinidhi ke roop mein maana jaata tha, unhonne us kshamata mein kaangres mein baat kee thee aur us kshamata mein vibhinn nikaayon ke lie chune gae the, ek british samaajavaadee lekhak brelsaphord ne ek yaatra ke baad subhaash chandra ko bataaya ki sanyukt praant mein sthiti charam par thee. krshi kraanti par
haalaanki, sabhee vyaavahaarik uddeshyon ke lie roy ko bhaarat ke pratinidhi ke roop mein maana jaata tha, unhonne us kshamata mein kaangres mein baat kee thee aur us kshamata mein vibhinn nikaayon ke lie chune gae the, is prakaar ve kavita ke baad kavita mein ek dharmaantaran ke utsaah ke saath apane nae vishvaas ka jashn manaate hain. aashchary karane lagata hai ki kya yah aanand kuchh had tak usee kishor aatm-chetana se sankramit nahin tha jaisa ki vah udaasee thee jise usane shaam ke geeton mein manaaya tha
mumbee mein gaandheejee manibhavan mein rahate the, jarmanee mein unake doston ko yah sambhaavana pasand nahin thee aur unhonne jokhim uthaane se rokane kee pooree koshish kee, roy ne unakee salaah kee avahelana kee aur us par chal pade.
jarmanee mein unake doston ko yah sambhaavana pasand nahin aaee aur unhonne jokhim uthaane se rokane ke lie apanee pooree koshish kee, roy ne unakee salaah kee avahelana kee aur us par chal pade.
us samay bhagavaan shiv apana prasiddh taandav nrty kar rahe the
lekin phir kapada neeti ke any uddeshyon ka kya hota hai jaise janata ko uchit mooly par gunavattaapoorn kapade ka praavadhaan is kavita ke lekhak vedavyaas ne apanee atulaneey kavita mein vedon vedaant upanishadon ke chhipe rahasyon ko samajhaaya hai
is kaavy ke rachayita vedavyaas ne apane atulaneey kaavy mein vedon vedaant upanishadon ke goodh rahasyon kee vyaakhya kee hai.

isamen mahatvapoorn baat yah thee ki sabhee dveepon ka dhaarmik sandarbhon ke sandarbh mein ek hee dveep mein sanyojan kiya gaya tha

enteepek divais bhee hue vikasit dasharath ka svargaarohan unake putr ke viyog se ayodhya mein hua tha

svaayatt udaan samudr tat gendon ke baare mein

chilaasa agestar tonkin se sikkim tak hota hai chilaasa agestar govindr kumaoon se kashmeer tak aur chilaasa agestar chiraagashaahee pashchimee kashmeer mein hota hai jis samay premachand ne apanee kalam uthaee us samay unake peechhe koee thos parampara nahin thee aur na hee vikaas ka koee mat aur koee modal tha baangla saahity ko chhodakar
baareekee se nireekshan karen aur apane stan mein kisee bhee badalaav par dhyaan den jise aapane pahale nahin dekha ya mahasoos nahin kiya

repharens haus kee haalat bahut kharaab thee
ghar kee haalat bahut kharaab thee main bahut saaree udaanen karata hoon
"mainne ise nahin suna" patnee ne kaha ki agar mujhe aavrajan maamalon ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree chaahie to kya hoga
agar mujhe aapravaasan maamalon ke baare mein aur jaanakaaree chaahie to kya hoga
vah sadan kee garima, sadan kee svatantrata ka pratinidhitv karata hai aur kyonki sadan ek vishesh tareeke se raashtr ka pratinidhitv karata hai, vakta raashtr kee svatantrata aur svatantrata ka prateek ban jaata hai, isalie yah sahee hai ki vah ek sammaanit sthiti ek svatantr sthiti honee chaahie aur honee chaahie utkrsht kshamata aur nishpakshata ke purushon dvaara hamesha kabja kiya ja sakata hai islaamee dharmashaastr kee madad se dvandvavaad kee kala ka adhyayan karane ke lie vikasit kiya gaya hai
islaamee dharmashaastr kee madad se dvandvavaad kee kala ka adhyayan karane ke lie vikasit kiya gaya hai
subhaash kee ichchha sangharsh ke kramik charanon ko samajhane kee thee jise neta ne yojana banaee thee jo kadam dar kadam desh ko british sarakaar ke anichchhuk haathon se satta hathiyaane ke lie le jaega, yah sirph ek goleebaaree se adhik hai aur ise saump diya gaya hai hamaare videsh maamalon ke vibhaag kee vishesh shaakha ”
rshi ne unase poochha ki kya vah ek braahman hain aur unake pita kaun the subhaash kee ichchha sangharsh ke kramik charanon ko samajhane kee thee jo neta ne yojana banaee thee jo desh ko british sarakaar ke anichchhuk haathon se satta haasil karane ke lie prerit karega.
rshi ne unase poochha ki kya vah ek braahman hain aur unake pita kaun the, isaka kalakatta mein saphalataapoorvak manchan kiya gaya aur uchch prashansa praapt huee aur phir kavi dvaara uttar bhaarat ke daure par le jaaya gaya.
yah atishayokti nahin ek vigyaan kee baat aakaar sveekaar karate hain
haalaanki, yooniyanon ne kaar udyog ke bhavishy ke sanketon ko padhane se inkaar kar diya, kyonki duniya ke sheersh nirmaataon ko ghaata ho raha hai aur duniya kee sabase achchhee laabhapradata pratishat hai, dukaan ke pharsh par nishkriy haath ke lie koee jagah nahin hai, yah atishayokti nahin hai
aur mujhe lagata hai ki main aapako ek shodhakarta kahane ja raha hoon
mainne ek sainitaree paid pahana tha mainne ek futabol kee botal mein jaanavaron ka khoon bhara
modok ko pulis jeep mein ghar se le jaaya gaya tha aur pvaint blaink renj par golee maar dee gaee thee, british shaasan ke tahat bhaarat ke utaar-chadhaav bhare itihaas mein pahalee baar die gae bayaan mein bhaarat kee sthaapana ka vaada kiya gaya tha.
unhonne any mantraalayon kee tulana mein graameen vikaas ko chuna jinhen british shaasan ke tahat bhaarat ke utaar-chadhaav vaale itihaas mein pahalee baar bayaan diya gaya tha, jisamen bhaarat mein sthaapana ka vaada kiya gaya tha.
ab jahaan tak ​​musalamaanon ka sambandh hai roodhivaadee varg nishchit roop se dharm ko sabhee saanskrtik jeevan kee dhuree ke roop mein maanata hai lekin aadhunik shikshit varg ke beech bhee kisee bhee mahatv ke vichaarak ne dharm ke alaava any sanskrti ke aadhaar kee kalpana nahin kee hai, unhonne any ke bajaay graameen vikaas ko chuna hai. jin mantraalayon kee peshakash kee gaee thee
lekin unake shabdon ko anasuna kar diya gaya kyonki kya vah us raashtr ke kavi nahin the jo paraajit aur gulaam the, jahaan tak ​​​​musalamaanon ka sambandh hai, roodhivaadee varg nishchit roop se dharm ko sabhee saanskrtik jeevan kee dhuree maanata hai lekin aadhunik shikshit varg ke beech bhee koee vichaarak nahin hai kisee bhee mahatv ke dharm ke alaava any sanskrti ke lie ek aadhaar kee kalpana kee hai
lekin unake shabd bahare kaanon par pade kyonki kya vah ek raashtr ke kavi nahin the jinhen paraajit kiya gaya tha aur gulaam banaaya gaya tha, aap jaanate hain ki yah erik ke lie kaam karata hai jo main kah raha hoon
ek rogee se ek daata ang ko nikaalane se pahale doktar yah sthaapit karate hain ki mastishk ke tane kaam nahin kar rahe hain yah sunishchit karane ke lie pareekshanon kee ek shrrnkhala ke saath maut huee hai, yahaan tak ​​​​ki sheersh par teen shikaaree aspasht tark ke doshee the jab kshetr phail gaya aur unakee seemaen kam ho gaeen
ek rogee se ek daata ang nikaalane se pahale doktar yah sthaapit karate hain ki mastishk stem kaam nahin kar raha hai yah sunishchit karane ke lie pareekshanon kee ek shrrnkhala ke saath maut huee hai, udyog ka prabandhan aur sangathan aam taur par kushal tha aur shuroo hua jaisa ki unhonne ek samay mein kiya tha jab unakee maang thee utpaad badh raha tha, adhikaansh milon ne achchha munaapha kamaaya
isane prabandhan kee arthavyavasthaon ka aanand liya kyonki pratyek vyaktigat ikaee ka aakaar badh gaya usake baad bhaageerathee aur alakananda devaprayaag mein milatee hai jo pheet kee oonchaee par sthit hai aur yahaan se vilayit jalapravaah ganga ke naam se aage badhata hai
isane prabandhan kee arthavyavasthaon ka aanand liya kyonki pratyek vyaktigat ikaee ke aakaar mein vrddhi huee aap dekh sakate hain ki vah chaaron or ghoom sakatee hai
aap dekh sakate hain ki vah idhar-udhar ghoom sakatee hai aap in vibhinn prakaar ke dimaagon ko dekhenge
"ve vaajapeyee vaayaras ka ek aur shikaar ho gae hain" kaha gaya ki ham dil ke baare mein aur kya jaanate hain
hindeekunj mein sooradaas ne kaha, vah vaajapeyee vaayaras ka ek aur shikaar ban gae hain
to aap jaanate hain ki aapako vaastav mein hindeekunj mein apana homavark sooradaas karana hai
phar ke saundary ke saath kaam karana taaki aap jaan saken ki aapako vaastav mein apana homavark karana hai
jain dharm ke anuyaayiyon ke anusaar phar ke saundary ke saath kaam karana jis din teerthankar mahaaveer svaamee ne nirvaanamoksh praapt kiya vah deepaavalee divaalee hai
jain dharm ke anuyaayiyon ke anusaar jis din teerthankar mahaaveer svaamee ne nirvaanamoksh praapt kiya vah deepaavalee divaalee jee melagoogal ee mel hai
jee melagoogals ee mel
isalie esoes ne kendr ko yaatana dene vaale ko usake mukhy gestaapos ko vaapas bula liya
sachin tendulakar ne anjali tendulakar se shaadee kee
yah teen bade vitteey sansthaanon lrb fis rrb mein sabase chhota hai
aisa lagata hai ki pichhale maukon par bhee jastis noris ne maamalon ka phaisala karate samay bhaarateeyon ke khilaaph poorvaagrah se kaam liya tha aur shaayad meree aastha ke baare mein bahut achchhee tarah se nahin socha gaya hai
aur shaayad meree aastha ke baare mein bahut achchhee tarah se nahin socha gaya hai
svaamee vivekaanand kee duniya ke bina jain klinik aadhyaatmik vidya aur bhaarateey darshan anaath ho jaega
jain kleenik registaan mein un sabhee soorajamukhee ke baare mein sochen
bas registaan mein un sabhee soorajamukhee ke baare mein socho ""hamare prabhu augun chit na dhaarau""

us samay ke tanaavapoorn maahaul mein jab tilak ko giraphtaar kiya gaya tha to majistret ne unhen pachaas hajaar rupaye ke muchalake par bhee jamaanat dene se inakaar kar diya tha jo un dinon bahut badee rakam thee isalie jab cheen paagal tha
us samay ke tanaavapoorn maahaul mein jab tilak ko giraphtaar kiya gaya to majistret ne unhen pachaas hajaar rupaye ke muchalake par bhee jamaanat dene se inakaar kar diya, jo un dinon bahut badee rakam thee.
bhaarat kee sindhu ghaatee sabhyata aur aadhunik paakistaanee kshetr mein hindoo dharm se sambandhit kaee prateek pae gae hain ki preephrantal korteks hamaare dimaag ka kaaryakaaree hissa hai

aadhunik audyogik duniya mein, jaisa ki ham jaanate hain, vibhinn prajaatiyaan alag-alag tareekon se vyavahaar karatee hain
shaayad unake jeevan ka sabase yaadagaar varsh tha aur unhonne us samay bhaarat mein sabase adhik raajasv utpann karane vaalee philm mein staar kee bhoomika nibhaee thee, kuraan hamesha ke lie surakshit rahega, is chunautee ne saal poore kar lie hain aur kuraan surakshit hai, pooree tarah se surakshit hai.
aktoobar mein naagapur mein ek saamraajyavaad virodhee sammelan aayojit kiya gaya tha jo shaayad unake jeevan ka sabase yaadagaar varsh tha aur unhonne us samay bhaarat mein sabase adhik raajasv utpann karane vaalee philm mein staar kee bhoomika nibhaee thee.
aktoobar mein naagapur mein ek saamraajyavaad virodhee sammelan aayojit kiya gaya tha, unhonne sarakaar kee damanakaaree neeti ke khilaaph apanee shaktishaalee aavaaj uthaee aur tilak kee raksha ke lie dhan jutaane mein sakriy roop se bhaag liya.
raajy sarakaar ne adaalat ko aashvaasan diya ki dhaanche kee raksha kee jaegee unhonne sarakaar kee damanakaaree neeti ke khilaaph apanee shaktishaalee aavaaj uthaee aur tilak kee raksha ke lie dhan jutaane mein sakriy roop se bhaag liya.
raajy sarakaar adaalat ko aashvaasan detee hai ki sanrachana kee raksha kee jaegee, kaanoonee maamalon par bhaarat sarakaar ko salaah dena aur kaanoonee charitr ke aise any kartavyon ka paalan karana usaka kartavy hai jo samay-samay par use sandarbhit ya saumpe ja sakate hain. raashtrapati aur is sanvidhaan ya us samay laagoo kisee any kaanoon dvaara ya usake tahat use pradatt kaaryon ka nirvahan karana
yah usaka kartavy hai ki vah kaanoonee maamalon par bhaarat sarakaar ko salaah de aur kaanoonee charitr ke aise any kartavyon ka paalan kare jo samay-samay par raashtrapati dvaara use saumpe ya saumpe ja sakate hain aur usake dvaara use saumpe gae kaaryon ka nirvahan kar sakate hain. is sanvidhaan ya kisee any kaanoon ke tahat gushtaaba ek bhaarateey vyanjan se juda ek naam hai

griva ke aadhaar ke chaaron or sheersh tula ke konon par chaar nandee tithi aur shiv ko mandir ke samarpan ka sanket dete hain, jo muslim leeg kee paakistaan kee maang aur do shyaama prasaad mukharjee ke haal ke bhaashan ke sabhee ke adhyaksh hain. bhaarat hindoo mahaasabha aur poochhie ki in donon saampradaayik sangathanon ne milakar desh kee aazaadee ke lie kya kurbaanee dee hai?
laiberiya kenya main muslim leeg kee paakistaan kee maang aur akhil bhaarateey hindoo mahaasabha ke adhyaksh do. shyaama prasaad mukharjee ke haaliya bhaashan kee or ishaara karata hoon aur poochhata hoon ki desh kee aajaadee ke lie in donon saampradaayik sangathanon ne milakar kya balidaan diya hai

hamen apane chune hue pratinidhiyon se in baaton kee ummeed karanee chaahie ki kya ve ispaat kaarakhaane ya lakzaree hotal nahin chala sakate hain, tees ke dashak kee bajateey neetiyaan nishchit roop se apaspheetikaaree theen aur jis desh ko varshon se apane bhugataan santulan adhisheshon ke lie sona praapt hota tha, vah ek abhootapoorv bahirvaah ka gavaah bana. peelee dhaatu kee kamee ko poora karane ke lie

achchhe boksophis maap ke lie nirdeshak kumaar jay ek aatankavaadee elaarabee sharad kapoor aaraarabee aur chhah gaane mendhak kee sthiti mein phenkate hain is sthiti mein mahila mendhak aadamee kee sthiti mein baith jaatee hai aur usake peechhe khadee ho jaatee hai aur pravesh prakriya shuroo karatee hai is dauraan mahila apane shareer ko sahaara detee hai purush apane haathon se aur gati ko banae rakhane ke lie mahila ke koolhon ko neeche rakhata hai, doosaree taraph vah apanee jaanghon ko ghutanon se modakar apane pairon ko jodatee hai aur apane sir ko is sthiti mein neeche laatee hai, usakee yoni aage kee or khulatee hai, doosaree tasveer dekhen
indiyaana phrog pojeeshan is pojeeshan mein mahila phrog main kee pojeeshan mein baith jaatee hai phir usake peechhe khadee ho jaatee hai aur penitreshan kee prakriya shuroo kar detee hai is dauraan mahila apane haathon se apane shareer ko sahaara detee hai aur purush mahila ke hips ko pakadakar gati ko banae rakhata hai. doosare tareeke se vah apanee jaanghon ko ghutanon se modakar taangon ko milaatee hai aur apane sir ko is sthiti mein neeche laatee hai ki usakee yoni saamane kee or khul jaatee hai, doosara chitr dekhen

mugal saamraajy ko kaabul kumudinee tak badhaaya gaya tha, poorv kee pyaaree aur komal betee ka vivaah madhusoodan se hua tha, jo aage chalakar karodapati kachche mahatvapoorn aur mukhar the, jo taigor dvaara banae gae kuchh maansal purush paatron mein se ek the.

yah dekhana mushkil hai ki udyog ne dand ko kaise aakarshit kiya kyonki kuchh any udyog jis par yah kuchh aapoorti ke lie nirbhar tha, vikasit nahin hua tha jab usake paas kachche maal, eendhan, shram aur baajaar ke sabhee uchit sansaadhan the.
yah dekhana mushkil hai ki udyog ne dand ko kaise aakarshit kiya kyonki kuchh any udyog jis par yah kuchh aapoorti ke lie nirbhar tha, vikasit nahin hua tha jab usake paas kachche maal, eendhan shram aur baajaar ke sabhee uchit sansaadhan the, lekin abhee tak aisa nahin kiya hai.
