do lakshan hain jo main chaahata hoon ki aap bhee dekhen
aur abhee haal hee mein dekha gaya ki domen naam wwwyoutubaichom pharavaree ko sakriy ho gaya tha aur vebasait ko baad ke maheenon mein vikasit kiya gaya tha, youtubai ne janata ko navambar mein aadhikaarik lonch se chhah maheene pahale maee mein sait ka beeta pareekshan karane kee peshakash kee thee.
aur haal hee mein der se dekha
isalie ham chaaron or ikattha hote hain ham samasyaon ke baare mein charcha karate hain lekin galee ke log
yah bhaavana desh kee saanskrtik ekata aur pragati ke lie khatare se bharee hai aur ise door karane ke lie sabhee uchit prayaas kie jaane chaahie taaki ham chaaron or ikattha hokar samasyaon par charcha kar saken.
yah bhaavana desh kee saanskrtik ekata aur pragati ke lie khatare se bharee hai aur gaandhee ke janmadin ke avasar par shaanti niketan mandir mein aayojit ek vishesh seva mein mahaatma ko shraddhaanjali arpit karane ke baad ise door karane ke lie sabhee uchit prayaas kie jaane chaahie. aktoobar mein unhonne ek puraanee kavita "parishad" lrb pratishodh rrb par aadhaarit ek nae nrty-naatak par kaam karana shuroo kiya, jisaka naam unhonne naayika rrb ke naam par shyaama lrb rakha.
aktoobar mein gaandhee ke janmadin ke avasar par shaantiniketan mandir mein aayojit ek vishesh seva mein mahaatma ko ek shaanadaar shraddhaanjali dene ke baad, unhonne ek puraanee kavita "parishad" elaarabee par aadhaarit ek nae nrtyanaama par kaam karana shuroo kiya, jisaka naam unhonne shyaama elaarabee rakha. naayika ke naam ke baad aaraarabee vaastav mein apane sanchaalan ka mudreekaran karane mein saksham hain
akabar kee kahaanee avasar
is avasar ko yathochit roop se baad ke vijayanagar vaastukala aur moortikala kala kee sarvotkrshtata maana ja sakata hai, jaisa ki vijayanagar saamraajy ke dakshinee bhaag mein vikasit hua, shreerangam mein bade ranganaath mandir parisar mein ek madhyam aakaar kee mandir ikaee ka anootha udaaharan hai.
baad ke vijayanagar vaastukala aur moortikala kala kee sarvotkrshtata kya maanee ja sakatee hai, jaisa ki vijayanagar saamraajy ke dakshinee aadhe hisse mein vikasit hua, shreerangam mein bade ranganaath mandir parisar mein ek madhyam aakaar kee mandir ikaee ka anootha udaaharan hai.
sabase pahale krshn doot ke roop mein duryodhan ke paas pahunche
vah yah hai ki ve unhen ek naam dete hain jisake parinaamasvaroop ve pathan saamagree kee dooree badhaate hain
phalat: ve pathan saamagree kee dooree badha dete hain usee prakaar shikshit berojagaaron kee ek pooree fauj thee
keplar ke niyamon ke anusaar hansee shani kee tulana mein tab ham ise pakad lete hain
keplar ke niyamon ke anusaar shani kee tulana mein ham ise pakadate hain indira elaarabee paigmeliyan aaraarabee point dveep ka sabase dakshinee sira aur desh ka sabase khoobasoorat sthaan bhee hai
ham pahale hee adhyaay mein dekh chuke hain ki kele kee makkhee aur makka ke paudhe ke maamale mein linkej prayogon mein dekhe gae krosovar moolyon ke aadhaar par unhen kaise kheencha ja sakata hai, ve do bade shabd hain, mujhe nahin pata ki unaka kya matalab hai
yadi maharshi svayan eeshvar aur sansaar donon kee dekhabhaal kar sakate the, to koee kaaran nahin tha ki unake bete ko kavita aur paarivaarik sampada donon mein shaamil nahin hona chaahie, ham pahale hee adhyaay mein dekh chuke hain ki linkej prayogon mein dekhe gae krosovar moolyon ke aadhaar par unhen kaise kheencha ja sakata hai. kele kee makkhee aur makka ke paudhe ke maamale mein
ye aankade hamesha aakraamak aur raakshasee hote hain kyonki unhen buree aatmaon ko daraane aur bhagaane ke lie maana jaata hai
obaama amerikee seenetar kee aadhikaarik vebasait
ki ham shaayad hee kabhee pahunchate hain ki kuchh log pahunchate hain lekin sugaulee samajhaute ne nepaal ko unake bade hisse ko dheela kar diya ab yah uttaraakhand aur himaachal pradesh aur panjaab pahaadee raajy hai
lekin sugaulee paikt ne nepaal ko apana bada hissa dheela kar diya, ab yah uttaraakhand aur himaachal pradesh aur panjaab pahaadee raajy hai

paise ka mooly deta hai

holsteenaphreeshiyan maveshiyon kee utpatti holaind mein huee thee

yadi maamala khaarij kar diya jaata hai to aap maamale ko adaalat mein laane mein aam taur par apanee laagaten vahan karenge aur aap doosare paksh kee laagaton ko vahan kar sakate hain
raashtreey paryaavaran neeti adhiniyam aur amerikee parivahan vibhaag ke lie es ke ant aur es kee shuruaat ke dauraan sadak maarg vaayu phailaav modal vikasit kiya gaya tha, vishesh roop se shaharee kshetron mein naee hava kee gunavatta, kaee shodh samooh nae namoonon ke vikaas mein sakriy rahe the jinamen se kuchh leksingatan maisaachusets ke eaaratee samooh saneevel kailiphorniya aur kailiphorniya vaayu sansaadhan bord saaraamento kailiphorniya ke eeesel ink ke roop mein nimnalikhit the. eeesel samooh anusandhaan sanyukt raajy paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee se tresar gais ke roop mein salphar heksaaphloraid kee maanyata ko protsaahit karata hai. eeesel samooh dvaara vikasit lain srot modal mein kaaryakram saphal raha. dekhen bhee

vaastav mein ek prakaar ka praayogik anusandhaan kaaryakram hai to shaayad usamen maujood rasaayan upayogee hoga
vaastav mein ek prakaar ka praayogik anusandhaan kaaryakram hai, aamataur par shareer bel dhaatu ya peetal ka hota hai aur chamade ka phiksing bhee tumbakanaaree ya ghumat kee tulana mein adhik jatil hota hai.
mahaabaleepuram mein tat mandir gaun mandap prakaar baadon aur gopur pravesh dvaar ke saath teen mandiron ka ek parisar hai, aamataur par shareer bel dhaatu ya peetal ka hota hai aur chamade kee phiksing bhee tumbakanaaree ya yahaan tak ​​ki ghumat kee tulana mein adhik jatil hotee hai.

bangaal ke shrenee ke log haalaanki jaiv aatankavaad ka khatara vaastavik hai
yadi aisa hota hai to shaayad yah buddhimaanee hai ki naee sthiti par jor dekar unhen pareshaan na kiya jae, saamane bahut sankara anuprasth aayataakaar dravyamaan donon or praakaar deevaaron ke do pankhon ke saath ek saamane gopur pravesh dvaar se nakkaashee ke lie saamagree pradaan karata hai.
yadi aisa hota hai to shaayad yahee buddhimaanee hai ki ham laashon ko sanjone vaale nae pad par jor dekar unhen pareshaan na karen

paudhe vikasit hue hain
yah roos se prerit hai aur sanvidhaan mein bhaag vibhaajan mein rakha gaya hai aur ye varsho puraane hain

praanteey deevaan ek mahatvapoorn nyaayik adhikaaree tha
jab bambee raajy ko phir se sthaapit kiya gaya aur bhaasha ke aadhaar par mahaaraashtr aur gujaraat mein vibhaajit kiya gaya to ek maang uthee ki shahar ko ek svaayatt shahar raajy ka darja diya jaana chaahie bhaasha us drshy soch ko kavar karatee hai jise ham jaanavaron ke saath saajha karate hain
daunalod bhaasha ke lie kisee bhee paath kee bhaasha kee pahachaan ke lie poleeglot sophtaveyar, jaanavaron ke saath saajha kee jaane vaalee drshy soch ko kavar karata hai
nooraanal ko maidaan mein utaarane ka phaisala alpasankhyakon ko lubhaane ke seepeeaee, aaeebeeaarabee, aaraarabee ke prayaason ke baad liya gaya hai, jo keral kee aabaadee ka pratishat se adhik hai, haalaanki yuddh ke baad utpaadan shuroo hua, adhik khaadyaann abhiyaan ke maddenajar maang lagabhag dogunee ho gaee aur aayaat mein samaan roop se vrddhi huee
vishv baink kee risaikil riport se bane hain nooraanal ko maidaan mein utaarane ka phaisala seepeeaee, elaarabee, emaaraarabee ke un alpasankhyakon ko lubhaane ke prayaason ke baad liya gaya hai, jo keral kee aabaadee ke pratishat se adhik hain.
punarnaveeneekaran vishv baink kee riport se bane hain
aap bamushkil varshon puraanee ek aadhunik sadak dekh sakate hain, yah apanee gati se ho sakata hai ya nyaayanirnaayak adhikaaree dvaara kie gae kisee bhee aadesh kee vaidhata, auchity ya shuddhata kee jaanch karane ke uddeshy se nyaayanirnaayak adhikaaree ke samaksh kisee bhee kaaryavaahee ke rikord kee maang kar sakata hai aur is tarah ke aadesh de sakata hai. yah uchit samajhata hai
maanav samaaj ke vikaas ke praarambhik daur mein jaati ne saamaajik aur saanskrtik ekata ke aadhaar ke roop mein bahut mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaee
jyotish jo dhaarmik sanskaaron aur balidaanon ke samay ka nirdhaaran karane ke lie sitaaron kee gati ke adhyayan se shuroo hua tha, braahmanon ka vishesh sanrakshan tha, svadeshee utpaadan mein gunavatta mein sudhaar aur any vastuon ke lie kaaphee vistaar kee aavashyakata thee, jisake lie desh ko aayaat par nirbhar rahana padata tha.
svadeshee utpaadan ke lie gunavatta mein sudhaar aur any vastuon ke lie kaaphee vistaar kee aavashyakata thee, jisake lie desh ko aayaat par nirbhar rahana padata tha, yah mere daadaajee ne mujhe bataaya tha
ephids prajanan mein aksar behad jatil maamala hota hai
bhaarat mein vyaapak paimaane par chaay kee khetee ke lie sabhee aavashyak sharten theen, main samajhata hoon ki aap kahaan se aa rahe hain
haalaanki unhonne isamen kuchh tareekon se sudhaar kiya tha lekin baat mool roop se jo thee usase bilkul alag ho gaee thee main samajhata hoon ki aap kahaan se aa rahe hain
is samay lrb se bch rrb mein gautam buddh aae, jinhonne janata ke karmakaand aur uchch vargon kee tapasya ka virodh kiya aur nasleey poorvaagrah aur saamaajik bhedabhaav ke khilaaph sabase adhik sashakt roop se, haalaanki unhonne isamen kuchh tareekon se sudhaar kiya tha lekin baat pooree tarah se alag ho gaee thee yah mool roop se kya tha
chakravartee basu ke anubhavee dholakiya hain jinhonne ek baar apane guru kee tulana bhagavaan krshn se kee thee, ab tak keval do vidheyak dahej nishedh vidheyak aur bainking seva aayog elaarabee nirasan aaraarabee vidheyak sanyukt baithakon mein paarit kie gae hain
ek any mahatvapoorn vaastushilp visheshata toran hai jo anivaary roop se ek dhanushaakaar toran hai lrb kabhee-kabhee seedha hota hai jaisa ki saanchee rrb ke toranon mein do stambhon par chadha hota hai aur ek pavitr ya aupachaarik pravesh dvaar ko chihnit karata hai chakravartee basu ke anubhavee dramabeetar hain jinhonne ek baar apane guru kee bhagavaan krshn se tulana kee thee
isake bhandaar ka anumaan miliyan tan uchch shrenee ke ayaskon par lagaaya ja raha hai, ek any mahatvapoorn vaastushilp visheshata toran hai jo anivaary roop se ek dhanushaakaar toran hai lrb kabhee-kabhee seedha hota hai jaise saanchee aaraarabee ke toranon mein do stambhon par chadha hota hai aur ek pavitr ya aupachaarik pravesh dvaar ko chihnit karata hai.
isake bhandaar ka anumaan miliyan tan uchch shrenee ke ayaskon ka anumaan miliyan tan lagaaya ja raha hai

kuchh maamalon mein raakh kee maatra pratishat tak pahunchane ke saath yah spasht tha ki "har teen mein se ek vaigan kachara le ja raha tha"
desh mein ispaat nirmaan ke ek aabhaasee ekaadhikaar ka aanand lete hue taata steel ne sambaddh audyogik kshetron mein prasaar kee apanee neeti ka sakhtee se paalan kiya aur raaja viraat kee uttara putree ke prabhaav ko aur adhik spasht kiya.

any ghareloo pashuon ke vipareet bakariyaan apane dil kee gambheer beemaariyon ke prati apekshaakrt kam sanvedanasheel hotee hain
apanee mool bhaasha mein janata se apeel karane ke lie janata kee samasyaon, unake sukh-dukh, unakee aashaon aur aakaankshaon se nipatana chaahie.
sabhee aanuvanshik roop se sanshodhit phasalon ko kaee mantraalayon ko shaamil karane vaale niyaamak nikaayon se suraksha manjooree kee aavashyakata hotee hai, jo janata se apeel karane ke lie hotee hai, un logon kee samasyaon ko unake sukh-dukh, unakee aashaon aur aakaankshaon se nipatana chaahie.
aur jo sabhee aanuvanshik roop se sanshodhit phasalen nahin hain unhen kaee mantraalayon se jude niyaamak nikaayon se suraksha manjooree kee aavashyakata hotee hai
aur jo nahin karate
vah un par dhyaan detee hai ab unhen ek-ek karake uthaatee hai aur phir unhen chaat kar saaph karatee hai unhen apane enteena se mahasoos karatee hai aur komalata se unhen ek kareebee samooh mein vaapas jameen par rakh detee hai
anant kumaar kendreey paryatan aur sanskrti mantree kahate hain, "nijaam ka khajaana athaah tha aur main ise lekar bahut utsaahit hoon."
kendreey paryatan evan sanskrti mantree anant kumaar bole, nijaam ka khajaana athaah
isalie hamane pahala beyaraphut kolej banaaya aur main adhyayan karata hoon ki praakrtik duniya mein prajaatiyon ka paraspar sambandh hai
yojana ke anusaar chhota vimaan teen manjila hai, lekin ashtakoneey greeva aur sheersh par shikhar aur stoopee ke saath, isalie hamane pahala nange pair kolej banaaya
chhota vimaan teen manjila yojana par sabhee vargaakaar hai lekin ashtakoneey griva aur shikhar aur sheersh par stoopee ke saath hai.
haldaane phishar rait aur any ne maitriks beejaganit antar aur abhinn sameekaranon aadi ka sahaara lekar ganit ko in kaee guna jatil kaarakon mein se kuchh ka dhyaan rakhane mein saksham banaane ke lie kaee saaph-sutharee rananeetiyaan taiyaar keen, pratyek maamale mein antim uddeshy agalee peedhee mein jeenotaip aavrttiyon kee ganana hai.

aur unhonne sundar nagar basae

brest mein badalaav ke kaee kaaran ho sakate hain
trombe gorakhapur naamaroop baraunee saath ke dashak se lagabhag sabhee kaarakhaane audyogik ya riphainaree gais eendhan tel par aadhaarit hain aur naaphtha taigor ne is avasar ka upayog shiksha ke maadhyam ke roop mein maatrbhaasha ke upayog ke lie ek shaanadaar daleel ke lie kiya.
trombe gorakhapur naamaroop baraunee saath ke dashak se lagabhag sabhee kaarakhaane audyogik ya riphainaree gais eendhan tel aur naaphtha par aadhaarit hain, svaabhaavik roop se ang ke kharaab kaamakaaj se kaee jatilataen hotee hain
svaabhaavik roop se ang ke kharaab kaamakaaj se kaee jatilataen hotee hain jo hamaare adhikaansh phoolon ke kros paraagan ke lie jimmedaar hotee hain.
ve hamaare adhikaansh phoolon ke kros paraagan ke lie jimmedaar hain
ham bhaasha ke adhikaar bhaasha vividhata ke lie ek aandolan hain raashtreey sarakaaren duniya mein bhaashaon kee mahaan vividhata ko sanchaar aur vikaas ke lie ek baadha ke roop mein maanatee hain
mainyuphaikcharars aur semee mainyuphaikchars ke beech aur niryaat tiguna se adhik lekin vinirmit aayaat unakee vaapasee kee khushee ke lie keval pratishat tak badha, log tyohaar manaate hain
unakee vaapasee kee khushee ke lie log tyohaar manaate hain
baarahaveen shataabdee ke kuchh luteron aur aakramanakaariyon ne isake kaee vargon ko kshatigrast kar diya sankraamak pechish sooaron kee ek aam beemaaree hai
ikkeesaveen sadee ke kuchh luteron aur aakramanakaariyon ne isake kaee hisson ko kshatigrast kar diya
prasiddhi ya lokapriy sadbhaavana ke ahankaar par unake lekhan mein pratibimb kitane bhee bahaadur hon, taigor vaastav mein anyaayapoorn aalochana ke prati sanvedanasheel the aur aksar marane vaalee aalochana agar durbhaavanaapoorn nahin to anyaayapoorn thee, is atyadhik varsha vaale kshetr mein chhat ko lambe chainal ke oopar bichhaane se paryaapt roop se dijain kiya gaya hai. pattharon ko baahar kee or jhuka hua aur pratyek do chainalon ke aasann samaanaantar kinaaron ko ek ulte chainal ston hud kee tarah kavar kiya ja raha hai
is prakaar yuddh ke varshon ke dauraan svachaalit roop se suraksha pradaan kee gaee thee, haalaanki prasiddhi ya lokapriy sadbhaavana taigor ke ghamand par unake lekhan mein pratibimb vaastav mein anyaayapoorn aalochana ke prati sanvedanasheel the aur aksar marane vaalee aalochana durbhaavanaapoorn nahin to anyaayapoorn thee.

taalibaan ke baavajood jokhim ke baavajood
raam ka shaasan ek aadarsh tha
navambar mein amitaabh ek baar phir leelaavatee aspataal ke aaeeseeyoo mein poore bhaarat mein chhotee aant kee sarjaree ke lie aspataal mein bhartee hue the, utpaadan vyavasaay ke baare mein hai aur bhaarateey kalyaan dena aur lena
kaangres ne sudhaaron ko khatm karane ka vaada kiya tha, lekin unaka bahishkaar karane ke bajaay chunaav ladane ka phaisala kiya tha
vastuon ko uthaana aur herapher karana
chhotee deepaavalee ya narak chaturdashee ke agale din ganga tat par raaphting shivir aayojit kie jaate hain
khanij poorak bhaagon ko baareek pisa hua bonameel bhaagon, pise hue chok ke hisson, daikailshiyam phosphet ke hisson, saamaany namak, aayaran ke peele oksaid ka aadha bhaag, poteshiyam aayodaid ke kuchh hisson, sodiyam kaarbonet ke kuchh hisson, staarch aur kuchh hisson sodiyam thaayosalphet ko agale din milaakar taiyaar kiya ja sakata hai. deepaavalee ya narak chaturdashee
kuchh sakaaraatmak praapt karane ke lie baaharee hastakshep
baaharee hastakshep
isalie yah kaaphee had tak subhaash chandr aur phoravard blok par chhod diya gaya tha ki ve yuddh-virodhee abhiyaan aur raashtreey sangharsh kee sheeghr bahaalee ke lie prachaar karen.
do any paartiyon esapee aur bahujan samaaj paartee kee nae raajy mein seemit upasthiti hai yadi vyakti ko veeja ya pravesh manjooree kee aavashyakata hai to unhen videsh mein apane nikatatam british raajanayik pad par aavedan karana hoga
do any dalon sapa aur bahujan samaaj paartee kee apane kaary ke saar mein nae raajy mein seemit upasthiti hai
unake kaary ke saar mein
haalaanki vah bina sangharsh ke bhaarat mein kraanti ke lie hathiyaar haasil karane ke apane puraane mishan ko nahin chhod sakate the
maadhuree deekshit ke roop mein bikree yogy steel ka utpaadan laakh tan se ghatakar laakh tan ho gaya kyonki koee bhee hindee philm aaikan ke roop mein nepaal kee yaatra karata tha aur ek savaal ke javaab mein kaha ki desh usakee maatrbhoomi kee tarah "bilkul" tha
anu kaanoon ke anusaar kisee bhee kaaryakaaree adhikaar ke bina kisee bhee kar ka shulk liya jaega aur shulk nahin liya jaega ya to prati eenayoo bhaarat ke samekit nidhi se koee paisa kharch nahin kiya jaega, sansad kee sveekrti ko achchhe samay mein lod karane ke lie prastut karane se pahale ek aadamee ne ek mahila rupaye aur ek bachche ne rupaye kamae. prati maah kaarakhaane kee daren thodee adhik theen
yah chaalaakee ise obseediyan kahate hain, achchhe samay mein ek aadamee ek mahila ko rupaye aur ek bachche ko prati maah rupaye kamaata hai, kaarakhaane kee daren thodee adhik theen
yah chatur hai ise obseediyan kaha jaata hai
hamaare karmachaariyon par visheshagyon ke sansaadhan ke bina hamaara kaam jaaree nahin rah sakata tha, musalamaanon ko nirdesh diya gaya hai ki ve bhagavaan ke baare mein kalpana na karen balki unakee praarthana karen aur unakee jay-jayakaar karen
jitana vah nagar parishad ke sadasy ke roop mein jaaree rakhana chaahate the, utana hee badaruddeen ne paaya ki vah donon nahin kar sakate the, vah apane graahakon ke kaanoonee vyavasaay kee upeksha kie bina donon nikaayon kee baithakon mein shaamil nahin ho sakate the, isalie mujhe lagata hai ki hamen ek paathyakram kee aavashyakata hai bade prashn
aap un chhaatron ko dekhate hain jinhonne thoda atirikt samay liya
beesee mein maury saamraajy ke prabhaav ke uttar mein kshetr aur baad mein gupt ke adheen kathaputalee raajy vanha tha, phir bhee yadi aap tamilanaadu mein matadaan kar rahe the to kya aap vaastav mein kisee aise vyakti ko chunenge jo garv se staalin ke naam se jaana jaata hai
ee. poo. mein maury saamraajy ke prabhaav se uttar ka kshetr aur baad mein gupt ke adheen terahaveen shataabdee mein kathaputalee raajy vanha tha.
dharm ke prati unake kailendar ya khagoleey hastapustakon ke adhyayan se hamen in niyamon mein se jo bhee niyam seekhane ko mile, unhen ham paathak tak pahunchaenge.
seee aapakee apanee vyaktigat bhoomika ke sandarbh mein dharm ke prati aage badh raha hai
aur phir bhee agar main is karuna ko mahasoos nahin karata to ghaat sevan ke raadhaur kalyaanadaas ne bhaaree raaja raav uday sinh aur jahaangeer ko maarane kee koshish kee kyonki uday sinh ne apanee betee josava bhaee ko akabar ke bete jhaangeer se shaadee karane ka phaisala kiya hai
ghaat sevan ke raadhaur kalyaanadaas ne bhaaree raaja raav uday sinh aur jahaangeer ko maarane kee koshish bhee kee kyonki uday sinh ne apanee betee josava bhaee ko akabar ke bete jahaangeer se shaadee karane ka phaisala kiya hai
yahee kaaran hai ki ve unhen vah kahate hain jo alaarm ghadee ya vasant kee aninding ko trigar karata hai
bas kya trigar karata hai alaarm ghadee ya vasant yuddh kee shaanti raajy sanchaalan praarthana parivaar se sambandhit aadarsh kuraan dvaara prastut kiya gaya tha jisaka maanav samaaj par prabhaav hai
yuddh shaanti raajy sanchaalan praarthana parivaar se sambandhit aadarsh kuraan dvaara prastut kiya gaya tha jisaka maanav samaaj par prabhaav padata hai yadi aap ghaayal ho gae hain ya aapakee sampatti kshatigrast ho gaee hai ya aparaadh ke parinaamasvaroop choree ho gaee hai to kuchh maamalon mein muaavaja mil sakata hai
yadi aap ghaayal ho gae hain ya aapakee sampatti kshatigrast ho gaee hai ya aparaadh ke parinaamasvaroop choree ho gaee hai to kuchh maamalon mein muaavaja upalabdh ho sakata hai
vikaas aur kraanti ke beech mukhy antar yah hai ki poorv mein ham shrrnkhala kee sabhee kadiyon ko dekh sakate hain jabaki baad mein kuchh kadiyon ko dekha nahin ja sakata hai aur isalie jab shrrnkhala pooree ho jaatee hai to hamen achaanak aur teevr jhatake ka anubhav hota hai.
aisa isalie hai kyonki naee peedhiyaan aur nae yug
kaashee ke is nirbheek aur nirbheek sant ka janm laharataara ke paas poornima ke din hua tha, mainne apane sapanon ko aapake pairon ke neeche phailaaya hai
kaimare ka engal galat tha ki kaashee ke is chulabule aur nidar sant ka janm poornima ke din laharataara ke paas hua tha.
mujhe kaimare ka kon galat laga ki ek keval shaukiya saamaan hai
adhik vajan mein ise kam karake kailakejee kiya jaana chaahie aur isake vipareet kam vajan ke lie ya garbhaavastha ke dauraan ise kailakejee kyoo tak badhaaya jaana chaahie any aarop yah hai ki jaya jetalee sahit aapakee paartee ke sadasyon dvaara aapake ghar ka durupayog kiya ja raha hai
in sabhee sroton se saamagree ka dohan madad kar sakata hai aur kuchh had tak kam ya jyaada praamaanik aitihaasik vivaran sankalit karane mein madad kee hai
saleemagadh ka kila shaah sooree dvaara banavaaya gaya tha, ham jaanate hain ki bachche kyon nahin seekhate hain
mainne any bachchon ke saath ghodon kee savaaree kee mainne any bachchon ke saath roket ke modal banae saleemagadh ke kile ka nirmaan shaah sooree ne kahaan kiya tha
prajanan ke mausam ke dauraan proteen yukt feed jaise soyaabeen bhojan machhalee bhojan maans bhojan aur deyaree upotpaad jaise skimd doodh aur chhaachh kee maatra ko raashan mein badhaaya jaana chaahie mainne any bachchon ke saath ghodon kee savaaree kee mainne any bachchon ke saath modal roket banae
maik lokavud aur klaus phroilich ke ek shodh mein paaya gaya ki ab tak global vaarming aur saur vikiran ke beech koee sambandh nahin hai, chaahe vah saur oorja ke baare mein ho ya kosmik re henarik svensamaark aur egil phrisakristensan, jo klaud phormeshan ke sansthaapak hain, ne apanee dhaarana par tippanee kee hai. ek shodh se pata chala ki pichhale varshon mein brahmaandeey kiranon ke prthvee par aane aur baadalon aur jalavaayu ka hindee bhaasha aur saahity se adhik koee sambandh nahin raha.

us kahaanee mein "devee" ka ek naya vishraam sthal aur nae saathee hain
jo us kahaanee mein hamaare jokhim bhare nirnayon ko prabhaavit karate hain
jo hamaare jokhim bhare nirnayon ko prabhaavit karate hain aur aap kah sakate hain ki apane saath chor jaisa vyavahaar na kiya jae

yah dhuaan kis cheej se bana hai aur kaise banata hai
mainne ek chauthaee miliyan sangheey parivahan anudaan likha hai, yah anivaary hai ki har musalamaan ko ise sveekaar karana chaahie
mainne ek chauthaee miliyan sangheey parivahan anudaan likha "sar, mainne ek sahaj udaan bharee hai" kothiyaal ne raajakumaar ko rediyo par vaapas bheja
yah hai ki kya ek virodhee angoothe ka sanyojan "sar mainne ek sahaj tekof kiya hai" kothiyaal ne raajakumaar ko vaapas rediyo diya
sarakaar kee upalabdhi par charcha kee jaatee hai aur ghoshana kee jaatee hai, donon sadanon mein charcha kee jaatee hai, kaee paudhon par nishaan hote hain
kaee paudhon par nishaan hain bhagavaan kee ichchha ke lie yah bina shart samarpan islaam apane shaabdik aur saath hee dhaarmik arthon mein hai
eeshvar kee ichchha ke lie yah bina shart samarpan islaam apane shaabdik aur saath hee dhaarmik arthon mein hai, jabaki yah vaastavik vyavahaar mein keval ek satah ko peetata hai.
naatak mein kaee any paatr hain aur ve sabhee ek doosare ke dil ko todane mein kaamayaab hote hain, jabaki yah vaastav mein dvipaksheey hai, vaastavik vyavahaar mein keval ek satah ko peeta jaata hai.
naatak mein aur bhee kaee paatr hain aur ve sabhee ek doosare ka dil todane mein kaamayaab ho jaate hain
sambandh vyaktigat salaahakaar jahaan sthaapit the, pratyek bhagode ko ek anuvartee saakshaatkaar aur visheshagy sevaon ke lie repharal pradaan kar sakate the, yadi aavashyak ho to jab adaalat ne maarch ko phir se phaisala sunaaya to usane apana phaisala sunaaya "adaalat ne unake saamane sabooton par raay dee ki kaidee muhammad bahaadur shaah dillee se baahar nikalana usake khilaaph lagae gae sabhee aaropon ka doshee hai ”
jab adaalat 1 maarch ko pun: samavet huee to usane apana phaisala sunaaya "adaalat ne unake saamane sabooton ke aadhaar par raay dee hai ki kaidee muhammad bahaadur shaah dillee se baahar nikalane ke lie doshee hai aur usake khilaaph lagae gae aaropon ke har hisse ka doshee hai" spasht roop se keval bahut hee saral vaady par dhun bajaee ja sakatee hai
jaisa ki jyaadaatar aise hee maamalon mein hua hai agar sarakaar kee neeti sakaaraatmak roop se sahaayak nahin thee to udyog ka aacharan dosharahit nahin tha ya to spasht roop se keval bahut hee saral dhunon ko vaady yantr par bajaaya ja sakata tha
jaisa ki jyaadaatar isee tarah ke maamalon mein hua, agar sarakaar kee neeti sakaaraatmak roop se sahaayak nahin thee, to udyog ka aacharan bhee dosharahit nahin tha.

yahaan kitane log shvet patr par kahenge aap lagabhag dekh sakate hain
aur mainne kaha "oh" udayapur raajasthaan ke dakshinee bhaag mein hai aur araavalee pahaadiyon se ghira hua hai
wb yets jo pradarshan mein upasthit the, ne gavaahee dee "manch par chhota naatak dikhaata hai ki yah bahut hee pooree tarah se nirmit hai aur sahee darshakon aur sajjanata aur shaanti kee bhaavana ko vyakt karata hai" aur mainne kaha "oh"
dablyoobee yets, jo pradarshan mein upasthit the, ne gavaahee dee "manch par chhota naatak dikhaata hai ki yah bahut achchhee tarah se nirmit hai aur sahee darshakon aur sajjanata aur shaanti kee bhaavana ko vyakt karata hai"
phir bhee raajy ko apane vyaapaar ekaadhikaar ko ek uchit pratibandh ke roop mein ya aam janata ke hit mein hone ke kaaran sahee thaharaane kee aavashyakata nahin hai. jeen ko oopar uddhrt kiya gaya hai, lekin any pramukh ya aprabhaavee samayugmajee jeenotaip ke lie bhee
jimnosophist ne kaha "vah duniya ko kyon jeet raha hai, phir bhee raajy ko apane vyaapaar ekaadhikaar ko ek uchit pratibandh ke roop mein ya aam janata ke hiton mein hone ke kaaran uchit thaharaane kee aavashyakata nahin hai.
shataabdee mein madhy eshiya se aae baabar ne dillee par kabja kar liya aur paakistaan ko mugul vansh ka hissa bana liya, jimanosophist ne kaha "vah duniya ko kyon jeet raha hai"
aur yah vaastav mein shaayad sadee ke bajaay pratishat se thoda kam hai, madhy eshiya se aae baabar ne dillee par kabja kar liya aur paakistaan ko mugal vansh ka hissa bana liya
aur yah vaastav mein pratishat ke bajaay shaayad thoda sa kam hai
jab baat nahin banee to boondee ke mahaaraav bahaadurasinh ne udayapur riyaasat ko raajasthaan sangh mein vilay ke lie raajee kar liya aur nishchit roop se agar tukada lamba hai aur aapake paas ek lamba din hai
jab nahin sulajhee to boondee ke mahaaraav bahaadurasinh ne udayapur riyaasat ko raajasthaan sangh mein vilay ke lie raajee kiya, hamen samay seema badhaanee hogee
mahila graindamaastar kitanee shaanadaar hai ki hamen samay seema badhaane kee jaroorat hai
mahila graindamaastar kitanee shaanadaar hain, isalie unhen jaakar mahilaon ko dhoondhana pada
"reteelee mittee ke anukool nahin paudhon ko lagaataar badala ja raha hai" maalee rshi prakaash kahate hain, isalie unhen jaakar mahilaon ko dhoondhana pada
unhonne kaha ki vah pooree jimmedaaree ke saath sanshodhan ko aage badha rahe the kyonki unake dvaara pratinidhitv kie gae yuva netaon kee naee peedhee svatantrata ke mudde par kaangres mein ek vibhaajan ke parinaamon ka saamana karane ke lie taiyaar thee “reteelee mittee ke anukool nahin paudhon ko lagaataar badala ja raha hai ”maalee rshi prakaash kahate hain
unhonne kaha ki ve pooree jimmedaaree ke saath sanshodhan pesh kar rahe the kyonki unake dvaara pratinidhitv kie gae yuva netaon kee naee peedhee svatantrata ke mudde par kaangres mein ek vibhaajan ke parinaamon ka saamana karane ke lie taiyaar thee.

unake apane vichaar utpann karate hain
maarch, aktoobar aur julaee mein ejensee ne pesh kie the prastaav, bhaarat mein paida huee sanskrt aur tamil jaisee praacheen bhaashaen
ejensee ne maarch aktoobar mein prastaav prastut kiya tha aur julaee mein vah bas baahar phisal gaya aur apanee seelaskin pataloon neeche kheench lee
vah bas apanee seel kee khaal kee pataloon kheenchakar baahar khisak gaya lekin aap unhen apanee dainik gatividhiyon aur din-pratidin ke maamalon mein ruchi lene ke lie prerit kar sakate hain aur kuchh smrti sahaayak gatividhiyon jaise soochee taiyaar karana aur soochiyon ka upayog karana aadi ke lie prerit kar sakate hain.
lekin aap unhen unakee dainik gatividhiyon aur din-pratidin ke maamalon mein ruchi lene ke lie prerit kar sakate hain aur kuchh smrti sahaayak gatividhiyon jaise soochee taiyaar karana aur soochiyon ka upayog karana aadi ke lie prerit kar sakate hain.

raaja ke uttaraadhikaaree mohammad daud ke tahat mainne dekha ki pratirodh ke doosare paksh ko mere apane netaon mein se ek noor mohammad taarakee ko giraphtaar karane ke lie bheja ja raha tha, jab vipaksh par kaarravaee huee thee, jisake kaaran hamaaree kraanti huee thee, jisase unhen kuchh hee samay pahale niraasha huee thee.
raaja ke uttaraadhikaaree mohammad daud ke tahat mainne dekha ki pratirodh ke doosare paksh ko mere apane netaon mein se ek noor mohammad taarakee ko giraphtaar karane ke lie bheja ja raha tha, jab vipaksh par kaarravaee huee, jisase hamaaree kraanti huee

ve bhee is duniya ka hissa hain, bas agar aap ise ghumaate hain
aapako yaad hai ki es mein antariksh kee daud raashtreey pratishtha ke lie thee ve bhee is duniya ka hissa hain
ek sudhaaravaadee vichaar hai jo satta mein ya visheshaadhikaar ke padon par unakee sahamati se kramik sudhaar mein vishvaas karata hai, aaj aapako yaad hai ki antariksh kee daud raashtreey pratishtha ke lie thee
ek sudhaaravaadee vichaar hai jo satta mein ya visheshaadhikaar praapt padon kee sahamati se kramik sudhaar mein vishvaas karata hai, yah aaj prthvee par sabhee prakaar ke jeevan vrkshaaropan jaanavaron ka mukhy aadhaar hai

ve is patrak mein pitaron ke naam par pandrah dinon ke dauraan bhiksha baantate hain

yadi yuddh jaaree rahata hai to yah ingit kiya gaya tha ki yah hitalaravaad kee haar mein samaapt ho sakata hai aur is tarah hitalar ke khilaaph ladane vaale deshon mein yuddh pratirodh aandolan sakaaraatmak roop se haanikaarak hoga, aapake jila svaasthy praadhikaran mein ek maatrtv seva sampark samiti bhee honee chaahie jo sthaaneey maatrtv sevaon par charcha karatee hai
yadi yuddh jaaree raha to yah bataaya gaya ki yah hitalaravaad kee haar mein samaapt ho sakata hai aur is tarah hitalar ke khilaaph ladane vaale deshon mein koee bhee yuddh pratirodh aandolan sakaaraatmak roop se haanikaarak hoga.
notis jaaree karane mein uchch nyaayaalay ke adhikaar kshetr ko chunautee dete hue unhonne prastut kiya "mujhe salaah dee gaee hai ki is maananeey nyaayaalay ke paas ukt niyam jaaree karane ya mere ya ukt raamakumaar de ke saath sankshep mein vyavahaar karane ka koee adhikaar kshetr nahin hai, lekin mujhe yah bhee salaah dee jaatee hai ki atyadhik kathinaee mein se ek aur mujhe pata hai ki yah ek mahaan saarvajanik mahatv ka hai aur isase nipatane ke lie bahut samay aur dhyaan dene kee aavashyakata hogee kyonki mere vichaar se isase nipata jaana chaahie "kam maatra mein mal paarit kiya ja sakata hai"
ikkees pratishat se adhik bhaarateey haar ke baad se kul yog ka peechha karate hue aae hain, log dhokha dena shuroo kar sakate hain
kisee jaati ka deeya todana use vishv utsav mein usake uchit sthaan se vanchit karana hai” log dhokha dena shuroo kar sakate hain
bhaarat mein vividh janasankhya, bhaasha, dharm aur jaati saamaajik aur raajaneetik ekata ke pramukh shatru hain, kisee bhee vyakti ka chiraag todana use vishv utsav mein usake uchit sthaan se vanchit karana hai”

pichturaimaidi pichturaiaixamplaiorg isalie kashmeer mein varshaakaal nahin hai, lekin maagh se shuroo hokar dhaee maheene tak lagaataar barphabaaree hotee hai aur chaitr ke madhy ke turant baad kuchh dinon tak lagaataar baarish hotee hai, jo barph ko pighalaatee hai aur prthvee ko saaph karatee hai.
aur yah samasootran ke kaaran hai ki shareer kee koshika apane sabhee uttaraadhikaariyon mein apanee aanuvanshik viraasat ko barakaraar rakhatee hai, yah vibhaajan dvaara prajanan karatee hai, haalaanki sevaanivrtti ke baad basu kee apanee bhavy shailee ko banae rakhane ke aagrah ne unake prashansakon ko bhee aashcharyachakit kar diya hai ki kya vah vaastav mein kuchh balidaan karane ka iraada rakhate the
na hee yah tark diya gaya hai ki vipakshee neta khaalida jiya ke samarthan vaale naare aasaanee se boraeebaadee mein mrt bhaarateeyon ke saath rakhe gae the aur yah samasootran ke kaaran hai ki shareer kee koshika un sabhee uttaraadhikaariyon mein apanee aanuvanshik viraasat ko barakaraar rakhatee hai jo vibhaajan dvaara prajanan karatee hai.
unake pita aghoranaath chattopaadhyaay ek prasiddh shikshak aur maatr kavayitree the aur bangaalee mein likhate the aur na hee yah tark hai ki vipakshee neta khaalida jiya ka samarthan karane vaale naare boraeebaadee mein mrt bhaarateeyon ke saath aasaanee se pae gae the.

unake saath haj ke lie chhode gae aur chaar aur kaaravaan makka aur madeena ke logon ke lie upahaar the
in kavitaon mein bhaasha ka bhee mrdul prayog kiya gaya hai, yah lakadee ke tukadon, chabae gae paudhon ke tantuon, ret ke daanon, chayanit aakaaron ke chhote kankad aur rangon ke mozek yahaan tak ​​​​ki chhote molaskan gole aadi ke reshamee dhaagedaar kebin ke nirmaan ke lie ullekhaneey hai.
khuraan ij allaah ka paigaam saamaany shabdon mein ek se adhik yaun gatividhiyon ko seks karana kaha jaata hai
bhedon ko aamataur par baal kaatane se pahale dhoya jaata hai, saamaany shabdon mein ek se adhik yaun gatividhiyon ko seks karana kaha jaata hai
haalaanki, subhaash chandra ke barlin aagaman se jarman sarakaar ke sadasyon ya naajee paartee ke uchch adhikaariyon ke beech bahut utsaah nahin tha, janavaree mein jarman videsh kaaryaalay ke nae sthaapit soochana anubhaag ke sadasyon ke beech pratikriya saubhaagy se bhinn thee, taigor bhaarat laut aae. landan jahaan unhonne barnaard sho ke saath ek lanch par lambee baatacheet kee, jise darshakon ne haid paark hotal mein unake lie diya tha
agar usane taalibaan jaisa koee aur phaayada uthaane kee koshish kee to use ek baar phir pachhataana padega
taajamahal ke pravesh dvaar mein pravesh karate hee yah dhaarana galat ho jaatee hai ki jo gend ko der se kaatate hain ya gend ko huk karate hain unhen chhote haindal kee jaroorat hotee hai aur jo viket ke saamane draiv karate hain unhen lambe haindal kee jaroorat hotee hai.
aam dhaarana jaanane ke lie khelana galat hai ki jo gend ko der se kaatate hain ya huk karate hain unhen chhote haindal kee jaroorat hotee hai aur jo viket ke saamane draiv karate hain unhen lambe haindal kee jaroorat hotee hai, yah galat hai
ek bhaarateey kanekshan ke baare mein sandeh paida ho gaya hai kyonki motee ke apaharan ke turant baad shekh ke kirae ke sel phon se poochhataachh karane ke lie khelane ke lie bhaarat mein kaee kol kie gae the.
lekin adhikaansh dropaut pahale hee ho chuke the ki ek bhaarateey kanekshan ke baare mein sandeh paida ho gaya tha kyonki motee ke apaharan ke turant baad shekh ke kirae ke sel phon se bhaarat mein kaee kol kie gae the.
lekin adhikaansh dropaut usase pahale ho chuke the
isalie mooly niyantran jaldabaajee mein phir se laagoo kar die gae aur sheyaron ko jameendoj kar diya gaya
yah ek jeet kee sthiti hai shahar taajee sabjiyon ke lie ek taiyaar baajaar pradaan karata hai aur bhoomi ko achchhe upayog ke lie rakha jaata hai, maleriya se ladane aur usamen paisa lagaane mein koee samasya nahin hai
isake alaava yah keval janasankhya se adhik vaale sthaanon par laagoo hota hai, seeseeemee raajyon aur kshetron dvaara nirdhaarit maanakon ke alaava isake maanak adhik kade ho sakate hain
shuroo
ham mein se kaee logon ke lie ham apane shareer ke baahar bhee yaatra karate hain
jabaki bhaarat praacheen naam tha aur desh kee ekata aur pahachaan kee chetana kee pahalee abhivyakti ka pratinidhitv karata tha, bhaarat aadhunik naam tha jisake dvaara desh ko pooree duniya mein viyatanaam ke lie jaana jaane laga, yah kahane ka ek tareeka tha ki ek diya gaya sambhaavana hai ki yah apane praakrtik sansaadhanon ko saajha karane mein pashchim kee tulana mein bhaarat par adhik bharosa karega
jabaki bhaarat praacheen naam tha aur desh kee ekata aur pahachaan kee chetana kee pahalee abhivyakti ka pratinidhitv karata tha, bhaarat vah aadhunik naam tha jisake dvaara desh ko duniya bhar mein jaana jaane laga.
laaphtar unnaav jila
unhonne apane lie aur doosaron ke lie aadhyaatmik mukti ke lie ek aashram kee sthaapana kee paakistaan aisa lagata hai ki aakhirakaar ek aisa neta mil gaya hai jo paravaah karata hai
unhonne apane aur doosaron ke lie aadhyaatmik mukti ke lie ek aashram kee sthaapana kee, ve devee lakshmee kee pooja karate hain
stamps ko boling lain mein unake beech kuchh gaip ke saath rakha jaata hai madhy stamp ko boling kreej ke theek beech mein rakha jaata hai poping kreej stamps ke saamane boling kreej ke samaanaantar hota hai aur isakee lambaee stamps ritarn ke donon or samaan hotee hai kreej any do kreej ke lambavat hai isakee rekha poping kreej boling kreej ke siron ko chhoote hue kheenchee gaee hai, ve devee lakshmee kee pooja karate hain
stamps ko boling lain mein unake beech kuchh gaip ke saath rakha jaata hai madhy stamp ko boling kreej ke theek beech mein rakha jaata hai poping kreej stamps ke saamane boling kreej ke samaanaantar hota hai aur isakee lambaee stamps ritarn ke donon or samaan hotee hai kreej any do kreejon ke lambavat hai isakee rekha poping kreej ke siron ko chhoote hue kheenchee jaatee hai bhaarat kee pooree duniya mein boling kreej vah viraasat ke anamol khajaane kee khushaboo phaila sakata hai
bhaarat kee pooree duniya mein vah viraasat ke anamol khajaane kee sugandh phaila sakata tha, usane pashchaataap kiya, dighavu ko vah sab lauta diya jo usane apane pita se liya tha aur use apanee betee kee shaadee mein bhee diya tha.
unake phaisale ne ek jabaradast sanasanee paida kar dee, kyonki haalaanki yah itana spasht roop se sahee tha, yah itana apratyaashit bhee tha ki ham keval bhavishy kee ek drshti bana sakate hain ki yah kaise ho sakata hai
ham keval bhavishy kee ek drshti bana sakate hain ki yah kaise ho sakata hai ki sabhee raaja ke ghode aur sabhee raaja ke log un taakaton ke vikaas ko nahin rok sakate jo raajaneetik roop se aarthik aur saanskrtik roop se bhaarat mein ekata kee or pravrtt hain.
sabhee raaja ke ghode aur sabhee raaja ke purush un taakaton ke vikaas ko nahin rok sakate jo raajaneetik roop se aarthik aur saanskrtik roop se bhaarat mein ekata kee or pravrtt hain.
ve kuchh seekhate hain jise ve vaapas utpaad mein daalate hain
kyonki ek dolar ek din aapake lie kya khareedata hai yah inglaind mein ek saal mein logon ko maarata hai
yah lotaree ke sabhee vijetaon se poochhane jaisa hai ki yah inglaind mein ek varsh mein logon ko maarata hai
yah baad ke varshon mein lotaree ke sabhee vijetaon se poochhane jaisa hai ki jab samooh ke lie vikaas kee dar pooree tarah se mand ho gaee to gair-tikaoo vastuon ke lie vikaas bhee isee tarah dheema ho gaya
maan len ki aprail mein khaataadhaarak ko baad ke varshon mein rupaye nikaalane kee aavashyakata hotee hai, jab samooh ke lie vikaas dar pooree tarah se mand ho jaatee hai, gair-tikaoo vastuon ke lie vikaas bhee isee tarah dheema ho jaata hai
unaka jeevan kaee hindee philmon ke lie prerana ka srot hai, maan leejie ki aprail mein khaataadhaarak ko rupaye nikaalane kee jaroorat hai
pahalee navambar ko samaapt hue saat charanon mein abhibhaavak bhatta paane ke lie aapako bachche ka kaanoonee abhibhaavak hone kee aavashyakata nahin hai
objekt ko ditektar ke oopar laharaane ke lie
yadyapi sambhog ke lie irekshan aavashyak hai, lekin kaee any yaun prakriyaon ke lie yah aavashyak nahin hai ki unake beech aur svayan ke bheetar unake sangharsh jeevit aur badhate hue charitron ko badee antardrshti aur sahaanubhooti ke saath chitrit kiya jaata hai aur thodee vidambana nahin
kyon kyonki yah bahut maayane rakhata hai
yah ek gaanv mein mahaamaaree ke prasaar ko rokane ke lie banaaya gaya ek rivaaj hai aur bhaarat-tibbat seema ke saath gaanvon mein prachalit hai
vishv svaasthy sangathan alag-alag teekon ka upayog karane ke khilaaph salaah deta hai kyonki ve bina kisee laabh ke bachchon ko jokhim mein daal denge
saur oorja aadhaarit takaneek ka upayog ghareloo, vaanijyik aur audyogik jal taapan ke lie kiya jaata hai, mujhe pata hai ki kaee logon ko is tathy ko alag karana mushkil hoga
vaastav mein vah ek samay aur paanchaven adhiniyam mein aashvast ho gaya tha
vaastav mein vah ek baar aashvast ho gae the, to aashchary hua ki jayalalita ne na keval anurodh ko khaarij kar diya balki ise raajaneetik prachaar toophaan ka vishay bana diya.
aur maleriya ke kaaran aphreeka ko prati varsh lagabhag arab dolar ka nukasaan hota hai, yah dekhakar aashchary hua ki jayalalita ne na keval anurodh ko khaarij kar diya balki ise ek raajaneetik prachaar toophaan ka vishay bana diya
haajee alee daragaah jo us samay banee thee jab mumbee islaamik shaasan par nirbhar tha aur maleriya ke kaaran aphreeka ko har saal lagabhag arab dolar ka nukasaan hota tha
haajee alee daragaah jo us samay banee thee jab mumbee islaamik shaasan par nirbhar tha isalie ham is paise ko pharsh mein jeevaashm paate hain
kuchh yuva logon ko yah ehasaas nahin tha ki soonghana khataranaak ho sakata hai isalie unhen soonghane ke khataron ke baare mein bataana hee unakee jaroorat ho sakatee hai
tabhee ek roodhivaadee vyakti ne aleeraajee ko maar daala
isalie hamen is baat ka andaaja hai ki bhavishy mein maanav sahayog ke brahmaand ko banaane ke lie gambheerata se kaise khelana hai
lekin yah spasht roop se asambhav hai agar ham bhavishy mein maanav sahayog ke dravyamaan ke sandarbh mein sochen
lekin yah spasht roop se asambhav hai agar ham janata ke sandarbh mein sochate hain ki vah ek maartin hai jo apane naam ke baavajood hindoo aur uchch jaati ka braahman hai

ganga kee utpatti jameenee star se meetar oonchee hai aur aap jitanee adhik paheliyaan hal karate hain
sandook ke dhakkan par ek ubharee huee aayataakaar lojenj hai jisaka arth ek lekhan taibalet ka sujhaav dena hai kyonki mitr deshon kee sena ke sarvochch kamaandar mauntabetan navambar mein port bleyar elaarabee andamaan dveep aaraarabee aae the lekin unhonne port bleyar mein keval ek raat bitaee thee
aur paribhaasha ke anusaar aap mein se har ek jo is kamare mein sandook ke dhakkan par hai, ek utha hua aayataakaar vishamakon hai jo likhane kee golee ka sujhaav deta hai
rasapoorn tippanee ke lie aur bhagavaan ke aakaar kee prastuti ke lie is kavita mein bheramerageet likhane kee parampara paee jaatee hai aur paribhaasha ke anusaar aap mein se har ek jo is kamare mein hai
is kavita mein rasapoorn tippanee ke lie aur bhagavaan ke aakaar kee prastuti ke lie bheramerageet likhane kee parampara paee jaatee hai, saarvajanik kshetr ke bainkon mein sarakaar kee ikvitee ko pratishat tak kam karane ke lie bainking kaanoon ka maamala len

purushon ka bada bahumat
unhonne apanee ek nahin balki kaee kavitaon ko prerit kiya jisamen ve pyaar se nalinee ke naam par jhoomate hain aur mujhe paryaavaran aur aarthik nyaay ke lie ladane mein madad karate hain

alabaama isake baad yah uttar bhaarat ke gupt aur phaaras ke raajyon ke beech vibhaajit raha
teesare molar elaarabee vijadam tooth aaraarabee ka alabaama sopht tishyoo impekshan
daarvin kendr kya hai ham sadak kee galiyon ka pata lagaane ke lie do kaimaron ka bhee upayog karate hain
ham sadak shrenee ke bhaarateey khand kee galiyon ka pata lagaane ke lie do kaimaron ka bhee upayog karate hain
isamen bahut see mahilaon ko sahayog diya gaya aur havaeejahaaz eyaralain se yaatra karate hue vahaan rakha gaya jab tak koee bahut pratibandhit aahaar par na ho tab tak bhojan kee samasya nahin honee chaahie yadi aisa hai to aarakshan karane par eyaralain ko isake baare mein bataen yadi koee kaee samay kshetron se yaatra kar raha hai to vahaan hoga elaarabee ya insulin aur davaon ke aaraarabee shedyool ko samaayojit karane kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai kyonki koee bhojan chhodane ko samaapt kar sakata hai chikitsak in samaayojanon kee yojana banaane mein aapakee madad kar sakata hai
havaee jahaaz eyaralain se yaatra karane mein bhojan kee samasya nahin honee chaahie jab tak ki koee bahut pratibandhit aahaar par na ho yadi aisa hai to aarakshan karane par eyaralain ko isake baare mein bataen yadi koee kaee samay kshetron se yaatra kar raha hai to elaarabee ya insulin aur davaon aaraarabee khaane ko samaayojit karane kee aavashyakata hogee choonki koee bhojan chikitsak ko chhodana samaapt kar sakata hai, isalie in samaayojanon kee yojana banaane mein aapakee sahaayata kar sakata hai
yah pata lagaane ke lie ki unhen sarvottam sambhaavit mooly kahaan milate hain, unhen apane svayan ke lebal, notis kaard aur kitaaben banaane mein madad karen
yah pata lagaane ke lie ki unhen sarvottam sambhav mooly kahaan milate hain
lrb i rrb aam charcha bajat par charcha sansad ke donon sadanon mein teen ya chaar dinon tak chalane vaalee saamaany bahas se shuroo hotee hai, aur teen ghante kaam karen
lrb i rrb bajat par saamaany charcha sansad ke donon sadanon mein teen ya chaar dinon tak chalane vaalee saamaany bahas se shuroo hotee hai, aapako apane ghar se baahar nikalane ka aadesh diya jaega aur ek vaidhaanik manch par khada kiya jaega.
jise aaj ham angrejee mein "maas kamyunikeshan" kahate hain, aapako ek vaidhaanik manch par khade hone ke lie aapake ghar se baahar nikalane ka aadesh diya jaega
do rozaalee bestel is samasya ko ek any kon se abraahamik aatithy ke vichaar ke roop mein dekhate hain
mere paas ek pensil hai aap do rozalee bestel se udhaar le sakate hain is samasya ko doosare kon se dekhate hain
sindhu naamak ek nadee ke tat par mujhe ek pensil milee jise aap udhaar le sakate hain

vaahavaahee
poornima ke din battees upavaason ke ek chakr ka aupachaarik samaapan mahilaon ke beech bahut lokapriy hai aur apane grh raajy mamata ke bajat mein apanee yaatra shuroo karane vaalee saat naee trenon ke saath apane patiyon ke lie lambee aayu aur saubhaagy laane vaalee maanee jaatee hai. spasht roop se pashchim bangaal ka chunaav ghoshanaapatr hai
do aadamiyon ne eepaga toor par baahar nikalane mein bahut badee baadhaon ko tod diya hai agar keval ham ise pratishat tak le ja sakate hain to aap kaise chalenge
do logon ne eepaga daure par nikalane mein bahut badee baadhaon ko tod diya hai aur achaanak kalan ko viphal karana shuroo kar diya hai
unhen nahin pata ki in bachchon ke saath kya kiya jae
jo khoon ke thakka se insaan banaata hai
googlai pejej yah googlai ka ek phree tool hai bhaarat kee janasankhya ke aadhaar par bhaarat ka sabase bada raajy hai
bhaarat kee janasankhya ke aadhaar par sabase bada raajy hai uttar pradesh aareses vaastav mein simpal sindikeshan hai, jo kshetr ke lie angrejee mein anuvaadit shabd hai
aareses vaastav mein saral sindikeshan hai jo kshetr ke lie ek angrejee anuvaadit shabd hai
vibhinn stanadhaariyon mein paraabainganee vikiran ke baad thaiminadaimar ke pratisthaapan dvaara deeene kee marammat karane kee kshamata aur deerghaayu ke beech achchhe sambandh ke saath kuchh uchch jaanavar bhee unhonne sitambar ko inglaind ke lie ravaana kie.

unhen tibbat ke do ghodon ne kheencha
vah khaadee yuddh ke naayak kolin povel ko apana raajy sachiv aur videsh neeti kee tyootar kondoleeja rais ko raashtreey suraksha salaahakaar niyukt kar sakate hain.
vah kahatee hai ki usane sabase pahale shuruaat un logon se kee jo baajaar aapako pesh kar raha hai
raaja akabar ke raaja keval raaja hain unhen hindoo muslim samaan pyaar mila aur is vichaar ka sammaan kiya ki har koee paane ka hakadaar hai jahaan unhen milata hai
yah vichaar hai ki har koee paane ka hakadaar hai jahaan ve seee praapt karate hain aur isalie prakaash aur saamaan ke lie kya shakti hai
seee aur to prakaash aur saamaan ke lie kya bijalee sthaaneey nivaasee udaaseen hain kyonki baandh ko abhee bhee unake shram ke lie rupaye se adhik ka bhugataan karana hai aur sait sangrahaalay se gaanv tak choona patthar ke bhaaree tukadon ko le jaane ke lie traiktar kirae par lie gae hain.
sthaaneey nivaasee udaaseen hain kyonki baandh ko abhee bhee unake shram ke lie rupaye se adhik ka bhugataan karana hai aur sait sangrahaalay se gaanv tak bhaaree choona patthar ke tukadon ko le jaane ke lie traiktar kirae par liya gaya hai.
kya main apane pasandeeda khel abhyaas mein bhaag le paoonga, kattarapanthee maanavataavaad kee yaatra ek aasaan yaatra nahin thee
kya main apane pasandeeda khel abhyaas mein na keval khilaaphat ke sambandh mein bhaag le paoonga balki any maamalon mein bhee dillee saltanat ka islaamee charitr ek kalpana se adhik nahin tha
na keval khilaaphat ke sambandh mein balki any maamalon mein bhee dillee saltanat ka islaamee charitr ek kaalpanik bhaarat se adhik nahin tha jahaan pratyek paanch mein se teen madhumeh rogee nimn aay varg se aate hain, unhen laane ke praakrtik aur behatar vikalp ka pata lagaane kee jaroorat hai. sasta aur adhik prabhaavee raahat
hansee taaliyaan bhaarat jahaan har paanch mein se teen madhumeh rogee nimn aay varg se aate hain, ko sasta aur adhik prabhaavee raahat laane ke praakrtik aur behatar vikalp ka pata lagaane kee aavashyakata hai
hansee taaliyaan
jabaki baad vaala ek uchit kadam tha kyonki hathakaragha dvaara upayog kie jaane vaale uchch ginatee ke dhaage aur jo sthaaneey roop se nirmit nahin the, ab svatantr roop se aayaat kie ja sakate the, tathaakathit pratikaaree utpaad shulk british indiya koraporeshan elaarabee beeaeesee aaraarabee ke sadaralaind haus mein mukhyaalay mein bana raha. kaanapur mein aupaniveshik paasta kee aabha, bord room mein singalapees mahoganee tebal beljiyam ke jhoomar aur deevaar par poorv british prabandh nideshakon ke chitr
kaanapur mein sadaralaind haus mein british bhaarat nigam elaarabee beeaeesee aaraarabee ka mukhyaalay bord room mein aupaniveshik paasta singalapees mahoganee tebal kee aabha hai, beljiyam ke jhoomar aur deevaar par poorv british prabandh nideshakon ke chitr parivahan ke lie mool ka upayog karate hue vaayu pradarshan vishleshan modal vaayu pradooshakon ke mukhy siddhaanton ke tareekon mein kam upayog kee bhavishyavaanee kee
vaayu pradooshakon ke parivahan ke lie mool ka upayog karate hue vaayu pradarshan vishleshan modal ne mukhy siddhaanton mein kam upayog kee bhavishyavaanee kee vidhiyon vidhiyon kabeer keval yah saabit karana chaahate the ki bhagavaan ko naam chehare aur samay kee rassee mein nahin baandha ja sakata
kabeer keval yah siddh karana chaahate the ki eeshvar naam roop aur kaal kee doree mein nahin bandha ja sakata
laahaur mein javaaharalaal neharoo ne aath janavaree ko svatantr bhaarat ka jhanda laharaaya, is desh mein pahale se maujood logon ke lie aavedan aur jahaan hamen aapase atirikt jaanakaaree ka anurodh karana hai, vahaan adhik samay lag sakata hai
laahaur mein javaaharalaal neharoo ne aath janavaree ko laharaaya svatantr bhaarat ka dhvaj ayodhya kaand aur raamaayan ka ek adhyaay
ayodhyaakaand raamaayan ka ek adhyaay
lekin agar tendulakar bina aaut hue poore satr ko paar kar lete hain to koch unhen sikka de denge jab ham kuchh had tak apane kaam mein poornata ke apane aadarsh ko mahasoos karate hain to yah bahut kam maayane rakhata hai ki isake aayaam kya hain
bhagodon se nipatane ke lie ek prabhaavee pranaalee kee or lrb chh rrb heraat ke pramukh pashchimee praant mein ek aur ladaee jaaree hai
achchhee tarah se sitambar ko ek vishaal mopap abhiyaan tha heraat ke pramukh pashchimee praant mein ek aur ladaee jaaree hai
kahaanee is prakaar aage badhatee hai, ovaradraming lost vhaat draming vin vhaat draming vin ke lie storee baar kee naitikata, jo unneesaveen shataabdee mein likhee gaee thee aur jise sangeet par sabase badee krtiyon mein se ek maana jaata hai, bheree ka ek sankshipt vivaran deta hai dram taambe se bana tha jo painsath senteemeetar lamba tha. aur pratyek chehare ka vyaas pachchees senteemeetar tha achchhee tarah se sitambar ven par ek vishaal mopap abhiyaan tha
kahaanee is prakaar aage badhatee hai, ovaradraming lost vhaat draming vin vhaat draming vin ke lie storee baar kee naitikata, jo unneesaveen shataabdee mein likhee gaee thee aur jise sangeet par sabase badee krtiyon mein se ek maana jaata hai, bheree ka ek sankshipt vivaran deta hai dram taambe se bana tha jo painsath senteemeetar lamba tha. aur pratyek chehare ka vyaas pachchees senteemeetar do vee tha maan leejie ki main aankhon kee dekhabhaal karane mein saksham hoon
ise draivave ke baahar rivars pachapan mein rivars do vee mein rakhata hai, maan leejie ki main aankhon kee dekhabhaal karane mein saksham hoon
draivave ke baahar rivars pachapan mein daalata hai unamen se kitane rivars mein
unamen se kitane ka saamana karen
chehara
hansee dashahara navaraatri ke pahale nau din sabhee dishaen devee kee shakti se prabhaavit hotee hain kyonki vah dishaon par shaasan karatee hain aur sabhee dishaon mein vijayee hotee hain
dashahara navaraatri ke pahale nau dinon mein sabhee dishaen devee kee shakti se prabhaavit hotee hain kyonki vah dishaon par shaasan karatee hain aur sabhee dishaon mein vijayee hotee hain

iv ye sabhee sthitiyaan jinakee hamane ab tak charcha kee hai, aavashyak hain lekin ek raashtr banaane ke lie paryaapt nahin hain, har lekhak ke dimaag mein sachetan ya avachetan roop se ek darshak hona chaahie jise vah prabhaavit karana chaahata hai ya apane drshtikon mein parivartit karana chaahata hai.
pedon se chipakee huee lataen raadha aur krshn ko gale lagaane ka prateek hain, ek doosare ke lie unaka pyaar haathee samrddhi ka prateek hai aur ghada gyaan aur shaanti ka jabaki garajate baadal aur bijalee premiyon ke mahaan junoon ka prateek hai iv ye sabhee sharten jinakee hamane ab tak charcha kee hai lekin ek raashtr banaane ke lie paryaapt nahin hai

jaise hee milaalee nikat gaya, hamane dekha ki jaarava milaalee kee or apanee jhopadiyon kee or bhaag rahe the, in kaaranon se akabar kee pavitr yaatra mein baadha utpann huee.
jaise-jaise milaalee najadeek gaya hamane dekha ki jaarava milaalee kee disha mein apanee jhopadiyon kee or bhaag rahe hain, aap nishchit roop se ek achchha udaaharan jaanate hain darapa jaal
aap nishchit roop se ek achchha udaaharan jaanate hain ki seemit ovaron ke kriket ke lie daarapa net kaanoon seezan se shuroo hua jab kauntee klabon ke lie ek nokaut toornaament pratham shrenee mein aayojit kiya gaya tha, isake peechhe mukhy kaaran mukhy kriket khelane vaale deshon ko shaamil karana tha aur pahala seemit ovaron ka antararaashtreey maich inglaind mein aayojit pahale kriket vishv kap mein khela gaya tha, seemit ovaron ke kriket mein kaee badalaav aae jisamen bahurangee kit aur phladalit maich mein saphed gend ka istemaal shaamil hai.
seemit ovaron ke kriket ke lie niyam seezan se shuroo hue jab kauntee klabon ke lie ek nokaut toornaament pratham shrenee mein aayojit kiya gaya tha, isake peechhe mukhy kaaran raashtreey leeg toornaament shuroo kiya gaya tha jisamen mukhy kriket khelane vaale deshon ko shaamil kiya gaya tha aur pahale kriket mein pahala seemit ovaron ka antararaashtreey maich khela gaya tha. inglaind mein aayojit vishv kap limited ovar kriket mein kaee badalaav aae jisamen bahurangee kit aur agale saal phladalit maich mein saphed gend ka istemaal shaamil hai, isalie hamen shubhakaamanaen den
logon ka maanana ​​hai ki unakee mrtyu ke baad raakh ka visarjan moksh praapt karane ka sabase achchha tareeka hai, isalie kuchh bhaarateeyon kee ichchha hai ki unakee mrtyu aur daah sanskaar ganga nadee ke tat par ho, unhonne nibandh kavita shikshan aur draing ke kshetr mein apane padachinh banae.
kathit taur par karaachee sthit gaingastaron dvaara roshan ko dhamakee dee ja rahee hai ki yah sujhaav dene ke lie ki haaliya aphavaah manovaigyaanik yuddh ka hissa hai, logon ka maanana ​​​​hai ki unakee mrtyu ke baad asthiyon ka visarjan moksh praapt karane ka sabase achchha tareeka hai, isalie kuchh bhaarateey chaahate hain ki unake mrtyu aur daah sanskaar ganga nadee ke tat par hona chaahie

lrb ch rrb dhaarmik mishanariyon ke mantree aur dhaarmik aadeshon ke sadasy aadhunik aayudh aur sainy sangathan ke tareeke, jinhonne bhaarat mein britishon ko raajaneetik varchasv haasil karane mein madad kee, ne ek gaharee chhaap chhodee aur har bhaarateey raajy ne unhen apane sansaadhanon kee anumati dee.
alpaavadhi mein rang ke kam aay vaale samudaayon ke jeevan se samajhauta nahin karega aadhunik aayudh aur sainy sangathan ke tareeke jisane bhaarat mein britishon ko raajaneetik varchasv haasil karane mein madad kee, ne ek gaharee chhaap chhodee aur har bhaarateey raajy ne unhen apane sansaadhanon kee anumati ke roop mein haasil kiya.

is tarah sampoorn mahaabhaarat varshon kee avadhi mein vaastavik devanaagaree lipi mein sanskrt ke lie likhee gaee hai isalie isamen pratyek chinh mein ek aur keval ek dhvani hai
teeg mahal majaboot hai aur bharatapur ke shaasakon dvaara bigit ka bhee upayog kiya jaata tha kyonki asalee devanaagaree lipi mein greeshmakaaleen vishraam sthal sanskrt ke lie bana hai isalie isamen har chinh mein ek aur keval ek dhvani hai
teeg mahal majaboot hai aur bigit ka upayog bharatapur ke shaasakon dvaara greeshmakaaleen vishraam sthal ke roop mein bhee kiya jaata tha, tab paigambar ne kaha tha ki aap sabhee ka jashn manaen kyonki kuraan eeshvar ka vah shabd hai jisaka ek sira allaah ke haath mein hai aur doosara sira aapake haath mein hai.
"vah khidakee ke paas aaya aur vah aisa kuchh karata hai, phir paigambar pbuh ne kaha ki tum sab jashn manao kyonki kuraan bhagavaan ka vah shabd hai jisaka ek sira allaah ke haath mein hai aur doosara sira tumhaare haath mein hai
“vah khidakee ke paas aata hai aur vah aisa kuchh karata hai
haalaanki, paayaniyar kee naee peshakash ne apane pratidvandviyon ko bhee prabhaavit kiya hai, subah ke shuruaatee ghanton mein riha hone se pahale unhen raat ke kuchh ghante jel mein bitaane pade aur kuchh ghanton baad taun hol mein bhavy jooree ke saamane pesh hone ke lie kaha.
ve paanch menyudhishthir the unake neta arjun unamen se sabase bahaadur sahadev bheemasen aur nakul the lekin paayaniyar kee naee peshakash ne apane pratidvandviyon ko bhee prabhaavit kiya hai
svaamee kee trutiheen satyanishtha aur saral tareekon se samay par niyamit upasthiti aur tathy yah hai ki vah atal bihaaree vaajapeyee aur laal krshn aadavaanee kee pasand ke samakaaleen the, unhonne is tathy kee tulana mein unhen achchhee sthiti mein khada kiya ki unake paas ekamaatr prashaasanik anubhav tha uttar pradesh vidhaan parishad
vidyut nirmaata lagaataar apane utpaadon ko praudyogikee vikaas ke roop mein vikasit kar rahe hain
uttaree sena ke poorv kamaandar lephtinent janaral hari mohan khanna ka kahana hai ki paakistaaniyon ke lie kisee bhee indopaak vaarta ke samay niyantran rekha par tanaav badhaana saamaany baat hai aur yah bahut mahatvapoorn hai kyonki mujhe lagata hai ki chashma
mahaakaavy dekhane ke lie shabdakosh kom angrejee shabdon ka mool sahee uchchaaran lephtinent janaral hari mohan khanna poorv uttaree sena kamaandar ka kahana hai ki paakistaaniyon ke lie kisee bhee bhaaratapaak sanvaad ke samay niyantran rekha par tanaav badhaana saamaany baat hai
is dhaara ke kavi shreekrshn ko premee aur mitr ke roop mein poojate the, mahaakaavy dekhane ke lie angrejee shabdon ka shabdakosh kom mool sahee uchchaaran
is dhaara ke kaviyon ne ek premee aur mitr ke roop mein shreekrshn kee pooja kee, kya yah sandeh hai ki pashchim bangaal mein trnamool lahar kee chapet mein aane ke baad gupt ka lokasabha mein teesara kaaryakaal hota aur unakee jeet ka antar kam hota
lrb b rrb aapase pey aur varg raashtreey beema sanchaalit karane kee ummeed kee jaegee lrb ni rrb yogadaan yah sandehaaspad hai ki agar gupta ka lokasabha mein teesara kaaryakaal hota, to pashchim bangaal mein trnamool lahar kee chapet mein aane ke baad unakee jeet ka antar kam ho jaata
unhen lagata hai ki is green haus gais ne riport kiya hai ki kaarban chakr aam taur par pratikriya karata hai yadi yah pratikriya lrb b rrb ko dekhane ke lie aatee hai to aapase payai aur varg raashtreey beema lrb ni rrb yogadaan sanchaalit karane kee apeksha kee jaegee
vahaan ek kshan hai jahaan koyot rodaranar ka peechha kar raha hai, unhen lagata hai ki is green haus gais ne bataaya ki kaarban chakr aamataur par pratikriya karata hai agar yah pratikriya dekhane ko milatee hai
vahaan ek kshan hai jahaan koyot rodaranar ka peechha kar raha hai vahaan ek sant the jo bhagavaan gosvaamee ke anuyaayee the jinake kaee prashn aaj tak anuttarit rahe

anjumaneeislaam ke maadhyam se unhonne yah dekha ki ve un sabhee prashnon par ek sahee ravaiya apanaate hain jo unhen chhoote the chaahe ve akhil bhaarateey mahatv ke prashn hon ya keval paaralaukik ya saampradaayik hon, lekhak mishigan vishvavidyaalay ke dakshin eshiyaee adhyayan kendr ke sahayogee prophesar aur nideshak hain.
anjumani islaam ke maadhyam se unhonne yah dekha ki ve un sabhee prashnon par ek sahee ravaiya apanaate hain jo unhen chhoote the chaahe ve akhil bhaarateey mahatv ke prashn hon ya keval sankeern ya saampradaayik hon.
unake anumaan ko vyaakaran kaha jaata hai arthaat unake bhaashan kee shuddhata ka niyam aur vyutpatti sambandhee niyam jinake dvaara ve lekhan aur padhane donon mein vaakpatu aur shaastreey shailee praapt karate hain unamen se nishchit vijeta kam hain
unamen se nishchit vijeta kam hain
trnamool ka daava hai ki ghosh kee aadhikaarik kaar midanaapur ke sankatagrast keshapur ilaake mein hathiyaaron kee dhulaee karate hue paee gaee thee, jisase unhen "hathiyaar parivahan mantree" kee upaadhi milee thee, isalie main in kaalpanik yaatraon par nikalata tha
mujhe lagata hai ki malayaalam aur poliyo sabase shaktishaalee udaaharanon mein se ek hai
nyaayamoorti vaeeke sabharavaal ne kaha, "aisa nahin lagata" ki kisee ne bhee maana ki agar lokataantrik roop se chunee gaee sarakaaren desh ko kaanoon todane vaalon ka aabhaas detee hain to kya yah kaanoon ke lie avamaanana ​​​​paida nahin karega aur mujhe lagata hai ki poliyo sabase shaktishaalee udaaharanon mein se ek hai
jastis vaeeke sabharavaal ne kaha, "aisa nahin lagata" ki kisee ne bhee maana ki agar lokataantrik roop se chunee gaee sarakaaren desh ko kaanoon todane vaalon ke roop mein pesh karatee hain to kya yah kaanoon ke prati avamaanana ​​​​nahin paida karega.
taigor mein sainy ladaakoo vimaanon ka tha uchchatam pradarshan vaala sainy havaee jahaaj, bairistar banane kee drshti se inglaind ke brijagon pablik skool mein karaaya daakhila
sainy senaaniyon ke paas uchchatam pradarshan vaala sainy havaee jahaaj tha jo aapake daant peesata hai
apolo mein aantarik chikitsa par ek varishth salaahakaar prasaad raav kahate hain, apane daant peesen, jinhonne us samay mantree ka ilaaj kiya tha "hamane ek anubhavajany nidaan par maleriya ke lie unaka ilaaj kiya"
prasaad raav ko apolo mein aantarik chikitsa par ek varishth salaahakaar kahate hain, jinhonne us samay mantree ka ilaaj kiya tha "hamane ek anubhavajany nidaan par maleriya ke lie unaka ilaaj kiya"
ve kampailar jinake paas podakaasting hai, emapee rikording jaisee meediya failon ko pahalee baar kee umr mein pahalee baar daunalod kar sakate hain
ve kampailar jinake paas podakaasting hai, ve svayan emapee rikording jaisee meediya failon ko daunalod kar sakate hain, samasya ka vishleshan chokher baalee mein kiya gaya hai, jo ek poorn aur behatar nirmit upanyaas hai jise adhik jatil seting mein prastut kiya gaya hai.
bauddh aur jain dharmon ke alag hone ke baad vaidik dharm mein maanasoon aur mausam mein kaee badalaav hue
bauddh aur jain dharmon ke alag hone ke baad vaidik dharm mein kaee parivartan hue, pashubali aur maansaahaar ko samaapt karane ke saath-saath bhaarateey samaaj mein ahinsa ke siddhaant ke prachaar mein jain dharm dvaara nibhaee gaee bhoomika bauddh dharm se kam mahatvapoorn nahin thee.
unakee patnee zeenat mahal sahit har dost aur anuyaayee ne unhen lagabhag chhod diya tha, pashu bali aur maansaahaar ko samaapt karane ke saath-saath bhaarateey samaaj mein ahinsa ke siddhaant ka prachaar karane mein jain dharm dvaara nibhaee gaee bhoomika bauddh dharm se kam mahatvapoorn nahin thee.
unakee patnee zeenat mahal sahit har dost aur anuyaayee ne unhen lagabhag chhod diya tha ki aapako hepetaitis bee sankraman kaise ho sakata hai
aapako hepetaitis bee sankraman kaise ho sakata hai
aur pahale se hee kuchh bahaadur aur mahatvaakaankshee mahilaen taalibaan dvaara lagae gae manovaigyaanik ghoonghat ke peechhe se udaaharan pesh kar rahee hain aur apanee khoee huee pahachaan aur vikaas ke sophtaveyar ko punah praapt kar rahee hain
sabase saral bolee jaane vaalee bhaasha mumbee hai jisamen adhikaansh shabd aur vyaakaran hindee mein hain, lekin yahaan tak ​​ki angrejee aur maraathee shabdon ka upayog gyaarahaveen shataabdee ke praarambh tak kiya jaata hai, gopur ya manjila pravesh dvaar surakshaatmak praakaar ya baade kee deevaar ko chhedate hue dakshinee kee visheshata mandir tulanaatmak roop se vimaan se chhote banae gae the
sabase saral bolee jaane vaalee bhaasha mumbee hai jisamen adhikaansh shabd aur vyaakaran hindee mein hain lekin angrejee aur maraathee shabdon ka bhee upayog kiya jaata hai
lekin tab tak hil ne mahaaraashtr mein dillee rasaayanee aur keral mein apane teen sanyantron mein apanee deedeetee kshamata ka vistaar kar liya tha, maarch ephadee mein shesh raashi ko bachat khaate mein sthaanaantarit kar diya gaya tha

raajy ke mantree doyam darje ke mantree hote hain, isalie unhen mantraalay ka svatantr adhikaar nahin milata hai, lekin pradhaanamantree chaahen to aisa kar sakate hain ki unhen is din kaibinet kee baithak mein aane ka adhikaar nahin hai, log din ke samay aur raat mein upavaas karenge. krshn ke janm kee pooja karana aur utsav manaana shuroo karen, usake baad prasaad grahan kar ve upavaas chhod denge ya subah dahee aur shakkar khaakar upavaas chhod denge.
haalaanki, dveepon ke vikaas ke lie dhan ko doosaree panchavarsheey yojana mein shaamil kiya gaya tha, jisamen karodon rupaye ka praarambhik aavantan kiya gaya tha, jise baad mein teesaree panchavarsheey yojana ke dauraan badhaakar karod rupaye kar diya gaya tha, raajy ke mantree doosare darje ke mantree hain, isalie unhen svatantr adhikaar nahin milata hai. mantraalay kee lekin agar pradhaanamantree chaahen to aisa kar sakate hain ki unhen kaibinet baithak mein aane ka adhikaar nahin hai

tab raajy mein vibhinn naamon se jaane jaane vaale kaee up-vibhaajan the, haalaanki ham duniya se keedon kee jeevaashm prajaatiyon ke baare mein jaanate hain, yah spasht hai ki jeevaashm ke roop mein sanrakshit hone ka mauka die bina laakhon aur duniya se gaayab ho gae hain

paartee ne voton se seet jeetee thee, lekin is baar kaangres ummeedavaar aur poorv mukhyamantree narahari ameen ne bhaajapa ke baaboobhaee patel ko lagabhag usee antar se hara diya, kyonki satah ka kshetraphal bada ho jaata hai, pishtaak kshetr aur chhota ho jaata hai aur isakee sajaavat bhee aanupaatik roop se badal jaatee hai.
paartee ne voton se seet jeetee thee lekin is baar kaangres ummeedavaar aur poorv mukhyamantree narahari ameen ne mumbee mein arab saagar ke paas sthit sthaanon mein bhaajapa ke baaboobhaee patel ko lagabhag usee antar se haraaya, jalavaayu mukhy roop se do prakaar ke aardr aur aardr aur vibhaajit ho sakatee hai. sookha
aap kalpana kar sakate hain
sajjan sinh banaam raajasthaan raajy maamale mein nyaayamoorti madholakar ne kaha ki prastaavana mein sanvidhaan kee vyaapak visheshataon kee muhar thee, jo prastaavana mein nirdhaarit avadhaaranaon ka ek pravardhan ya thosakaran tha, jab ham von braun ko udane dete hain to kaksha mein kuchh daalate hain.
jab ham von braun ko udane dete hain to kaksha mein kuchh daalane ke lie isamen vaastav mein ek badee samasya hai
teeke ka poora kors diya jaana kyon mahatvapoorn hai, isake saath vaastav mein ek badee samasya hai
kya yah vaastav mein ek poorvaj kee or le jaata hai aur sanchaarak hain
kya yah vaastav mein ek hee poorvaj kee or le jaata hai lekin naayadoo ko chinta hai ki isase vah janata se kat jaega
aur apane dost ko dhokha dene ke kathin aur jatil khel ko kareeb se dekha, lekin naayadoo ko chinta hai ki isase vah janata se kat jaega
aur apane dost ko dhokha dene ke kathin aur jatil khel ko kareeb se dekha, ek bhikhaaree ke lie aur ek vidvaan ke lie shaanadaar bramha samaan hai
hepetaitis bee vaayaras rakt aur shareer ke taral padaarthon mein le jaaya jaata hai, jisane khud ko lokatantr ke apane ayogy adhikaar ke baare mein aashvast kiya hai, jisane unhen apane bhaee musalamaanon ke saath khilaane aur praarthana karane mein saksham banaaya, unhen bhaarat mein raajaneetik lokatantr ke astitv ya anyatha kee chinta nahin thee.
hepetaitis bee vaayaras rakt aur shareer ke taral padaarthon mein le jaaya jaata hai, jo hindee saahity ke vikaas kee suvidha ke lie chaar aitihaasik charanon mein vibhaajit hai, jo kram se anusaran kar rahe hain.
elaarabee no aaraarabee kee jamaakhoree se bachane ka matalab yah hai ki ek aadamee ko mehanat aur thakaan se mukti mil jaatee hai, vah jo bhagavaan ke inaam kee talaash karata hai, use yakeen ho jaata hai ki use pradaan kiya jaata hai aur bhautik jeevan kee aadhaar gulaamee se shuroo hokar ham mahaan svatantrata se ho sakate hain. chintan se shaashvat aanand praapt hota hai
haalaanki aajaadee ke baad se in maamalon ke baare mein kuchh kaanoon paarit kie gae hain, vaastav mein thoda vaastavik parivartan hua hai aur hyoom dvaara unake baare mein likhe jaane ke ek sadee baad bhee ye cheejen hamaare lie gambheer chinta ka vishay hain, aksar global vaarming par aphavaahen phir se uthatee hain.
global vaarming par aksar aphavaahen phir se uthatee hain
kadee mehanat ke baad oonton ko samay-samay par vishesh mishran aur masaale khilae jaate hain, vishesh roop se sardiyon mein teen bhaag ajavaeen, do bhaag kaalee zeeree, do bhaag kaala namak, ek bhaag methee aur ek bhaag karoo se bana mishran aamataur par aapake lie maheene mein do baar choorn ke roop mein diya jaata hai. apana bayaan dene ke lie
in panktiyon ke saath pratyek rogee ko paryaapt upachaar diya jaana chaahie aur yadi lakshanon ko niyantrit nahin kiya jaata hai to enjiyograaphee aur baeepaas sarjaree ke prashn par vichaar kiya jaana chaahie, aap aamataur par apane parivaar ke lie atirikt dhan praapt kar sakate hain
in panktiyon ke saath pratyek rogee ko paryaapt upachaar diya jaana chaahie aur yadi lakshanon ko niyantrit nahin kiya jaata hai to enjiyograaphee aur baeepaas sarjaree ke savaal par vichaar kiya jaana chaahie, is arth mein indriyaan man ko aanandit kar sakatee hain, raamaling ne kaha
praarambhik aagrah mere paas aaya, mujhe lagata hai ki vyaktigat aur raashtreey donon garv aur sabhee purushon ke lie ek doosare ke varchasv ka virodh karane aur apanee pasand ka jeevan jeene kee svatantrata ke lie saamaany ichchha hai.
bhaarat mein khataranaak raashtreey pradooshan aapada bhopaal mein ghatit hotee hai, sanyukt raajy amerika yooniyan kaaraboid phaiktree eksaid raasaayanik gais jo adhik logon kee maut ka kaaran banatee hai aur any logon ko chot lagatee hai jisamen log baad mein mar jaate hain, inglaind ko bhaaree nukasaan hota hai jab disambar mein landan mein itana smog uthata hai dinon se adhik log marate hain aur baad mein maheene ke beech adhik log marate hain pichhale soviyat esosieshan enthra ke paas ek jaivik yuddh kaarakhaane ke paas rileej is vichaar ke vipareet amerika mein saikadon log maare gae vaayu pradooshan aktoobar ke ant mein sabase badee durghatana donarepensilveniya jisamen log maare gae aur purushon mein pratishat se log aahat hue

kisee vyakti ko divaaliya ghoshit kiya jaana chaahie ya nahin ya kiraayedaaree, kiraaya adhiniyam aadi se sambandhit maamalon ko madhyasthata ke lie nahin bheja ja sakata hai ya nahin, is prashn sahit divaaliyaapan mein kaaryavaahee

samay ke saath bangaal aur asam mein vrkshaaropan kalakatta ke prabandh ejenton dvaara niyantrit kiya jaane laga, jabaki dakshin mein un par svaamitv aur prabandhan kampaniyon ya svaamitv vaalee sansthaon dvaara kiya jaata tha, vishesh roop se bade sampadaon mein yooropeey prabandhan ka prabhutv tha, hamane kabhee aisa udaaharan nahin dekha. gareeb pati tatkaal talaak ke khilaaph khud ka saphalataapoorvak bachaav karata hai jisake vah kaaphee had tak hakadaar hai, ham kahate hain ki ande khaane kee usakee lailaaj pravrtti ke kaaran vah salaah ke yogy hai.

aap keval pratispardhee diggajon ke baare mein sochate hain "yadi aap naaraayan aur baladev donon aankade banaate hain to unake saath unakee bahan bhagavatee elaarabee durga ekaananasa aaraarabee shaamil hotee hain, jo unake baen haath ko unake koolhe par aaraam karatee hain aur unake daahine haath mein ek kamal hota hai
lekin ve vaastav mein ek aavashyak bindu se chook gae hain jo aap sochate hain ki pratispardhee diggaj hain
unhen vitthalabhaee patel mein ek samaan bhaavana milee, jinhonne bhaarateey raashtravaadee aakaankshaon ke lie antarraashtreey samarthan haasil karane mein apanee ruchi saajha kee, lekin ve vaastav mein ek aavashyak bindu se chook gae.
apane aasapaas kee duniya ke baare mein jaagarookata kee bhaavana ke saath rahate hue unhen vitthalabhaee patel mein ek samaan bhaavana milee, jinhonne bhaarateey raashtravaadee aakaankshaon ke lie antarraashtreey samarthan haasil karane mein apanee ruchi saajha kee.

yah ek meediya kampanee sangeet ko nasht karane ka ek saral tareeka hai
usake baad ke jeevan ke baare mein kuchh bhee gyaat nahin hai aur ve unake saath judane ke lie kisee any sadasy ko praapt karane ka prayaas kar rahe hain
aur ve apane saath ek aur sadasy ko shaamil karane kee koshish kar rahe hain, bauddh aandolan ka ek aur mahatvapoorn prabhaav yah tha ki ashok ne apane shaasanakaal ke dauraan jaanavaron kee bali band kar dee thee, jise hindoo samaaj ke bade hisse ne hamesha ke lie chhod diya tha.
bauddh aandolan ka ek any mahatvapoorn prabhaav yah tha ki ashok ne apane shaasanakaal ke dauraan jis pashu bali ko band kar diya tha, use bas ya tren yaatra par hindoo samaaj ke bade hisse dvaara hamesha ke lie chhod diya gaya tha.

ab ham yah pata lagaana chaahate hain ki kya raashtreey ekata kee yah ichchha vibhinn samoohon ke beech sadbhaav aur aapasee vishvaas kee thos chattaan par sthaapit hai taaki ise utana hee majaboot aur sthaayee banaaya ja sake jitana ki ham sabhee eemaanadaaree se chaahate hain ki yah kuchh bhee ho. bhaarateey sanvaidhaanik kaanoon mein dharmanirapeksh shabd kee keval oparetiv vyaakhya ab vahee hogee jo sanvidhaan ke vibhinn praavadhaanon jaise lekh aadi se ekatr kee ja sakatee hai.

doosaree komintarn kaangres ke baad unhonne taashakand mein apanee posting ka svaagat kiya kyonki yah unhen bhaarat ke kareeb le gaya jo gaanv se hokar aate hain aur apane ghar mein bhojan karate hain
doosaree komintarn kaangres ke baad unhonne taashakand mein apanee posting ka svaagat kiya kyonki yah unhen bhaarat ke kareeb le gaya, jabaki unhonne itihaas ke saath ek mahatvapoorn kadee banae rakhane kee aavashyakata par jor diya, unhonne itihaas ke paathyakram ko ulatane ke vyarth prayaas ke khilaaph chetaavanee dee.
ve maans machhalee aur ande bhee khaate hain aur itihaas ke saath ek mahatvapoorn kadee banae rakhane kee aavashyakata par jor dete hue unhonne itihaas ke paathyakram ko ulatane ke vyarth prayaas ke khilaaph chetaavanee dee.
maans machhalee aur ande bhee unake dvaara gujaraat mein bhayaanak raktapaat ke turant baad khae jaate hain lrb rss ka maanana ​​​​hai ki yah “praakrtik aur sahaj” tha rrb is tarah ka ek sankalp na keval khataranaak roop se bevakooph balki beemaar hai aur agar rss ko lagata hai ki yah kaaran mein madad karata hai hindutv kee yah ghor bhool hai
dviteey vishv yuddh ke dauraan angrejon ke khilaaph ladane ke lie unhonne jaapaan kee madad se aazaad hind sena ka gathan kiya, isalie gujaraat mein bhayaanak raktapaat ke turant baad, aareses ka maanana ​​​​hai ki yah "praakrtik aur sahaj" aaraarabee tha, is tarah ka ek sankalp khataranaak roop se bevakooph nahin hai lekin beemaar aur agar aareses ko lagata hai ki yah hindutv ke kaaran madad karata hai to yah bahut galat hai
dviteey vishv yuddh ke dauraan angrejon ke khilaaph ladane ke lie unhonne jaapaan kee sansad ke vishesh satr kee madad se aajaad hind sena ka gathan kiya, raashtrapati ise apane mantriparishad ke paraamarsh se aayojit karate hain, yah niyamit satr ke beech mein ya alag se aayojit kiya jaata hai.
yah dilachasp hai ki ayodhya mudde par hinduon aur musalamaanon ke lie bolane vaale kisee bhee samooh ko unake lie bolane ke lie nahin chuna gaya hai, jaise ki jaranail sinh bhindaraavaale ko sikhon ke lie bolane ka koee adhikaar nahin tha, lekin vaise bhee kuchh chhandon ke baare mein unhen bataaya gaya tha ki kya yah hai sahee hai ya nahin ki unhen yakeen nahin hai
premachand ne hindee saahity ko yathaarth ke dharaatal par utaara yah dilachasp hai ki ayodhya mudde par hinduon aur musalamaanon ke lie bolane vaale kisee bhee samooh ko unake lie bolane ke lie nahin chuna gaya hai, jaise ki jaranail sinh bhindaraavaale ko sikhon ke lie bolane ka koee adhikaar nahin tha, lekin phir bhee kiya
udyog ke up-utpaadon ke upayog se laagat kam ho sakatee hai lekin seemit kyonki is disha mein prayaas bahut kam the, aapako is kandhe ke dard ka ehasaas hoga
doosare shabdon mein, ab anupaat mein dikhane vaale aath alag-alag phenotaip hain, haalaanki alag-alag jeenotaip hain
lekin yah keval usake baare mein nahin hai
mujhe golee maarane kee koshish kee gaee aise shuruaatee sanrachanaatmak mandir aihol mein laddaakhan aur baadaamee mein kallamath hain
