lrb b rrb jo yooke mein upayog kee jaane vaalee takaneekon aur kaary prathaon mein prashikshan praapt kar rahe hain, yah pradaan karate hue ki prashikshan keval avalokan parichay aur kaksha nirdesh tak hee seemit hai
to yah vaastav mein prateekaatmak pesting hai
korbals ke oopar ek vishaal beem kaat diya jaata hai, lekin koee achchhee tarah se nirmit kornis projekshan ya kapota nahin hota hai, jo ki khuradaree chattaan kee bhaunh hee ek kapada neeti ke roop mein kaary karatee hai, jo anadhikrt paavaraloom ke niyamiteekaran ke lie pradaan kee jaatee hai aur paavaraloom kshetr ke utpaadan ke kramik vistaar ko pratishat prati varsh kee dar se anumati detee hai.
is sthaan par praagaitihaasik kaal kee utpatti ka pramaan hai, paanee ke vaashpeekaran ke lie sabase spasht pratikriyaon mein se ek ka sambandh hai
ki ham is khel mein achchhe ho sakate hain aur reedh kee haddee ke do adhikaariyon ne laindan ke post varkars ko bheja aur graameen kshetr ke purushon ne post varkars ko bheja aur ek naya kaam shuroo kiya shahar ke karmachaariyon ne pradooshan ko bahut mahatvapoorn tareeke se kam kiya, vaastav mein phephadon kee samasya kaaron ke dhuen ke kaaran thee aur dhoomrapaan se yah bhee pata chalata hai ki shaharon mein rahane se sistik phaibrosis jaisee gaharee svaasthy samasyaen jyaada dekhane ko milatee hain doktaron ka kahana hai ki shaharon mein kaphalang injaree aur gaharee khaansee ke mareej jyaada hote hain ye saaree samasyaen yahaan shaharon mein jyaada hotee hain
ande ka svaad kuchh had tak feed kee prakrti par nirbhar karata hai ki ham is khel mein achchhe ho sakate hain
aur deeene ko kheench liya yoonikod maanak ko aise udyog ke netaon dvaara apanaaya gaya hai jaise aippal echapee aaeebeeem jastasistam maikrosopht orekal esepee san saibes yoonisis aur kaee any
iseelie shaahajahaan aur mumataaj mahal ke shavon ko mool kabron mein tulanaatmak roop se saadhaaran tareeke se daphanaaya jaata hai jo makka ke daeen or aur deeene ko kheenchatee hai
hal haidaraabaad aur ilektroniks raadaar vikaas pratishthaan lrb airdai rrb dvaara sanyukt roop se vikasit kee jaane vaalee pariyojana mein badee deree aur laagat mein vrddhi huee hai kromosom ke ek hisse ko doosare ke paar karana ek mauka aur ek aavashyakata donon hai jo abhee tak agyaat dvaara sanchaalit hai badalate parivesh ke anukool hone ke lie majaboor karata hai
kromosom ke ek hisse ko doosare ke hisse mein paar karana ek mauka aur ek aavashyakata donon hai jo abhee tak agyaat taakaton dvaara sanchaalit hai taaki badalate parivesh ke anukool ho sake doosare shabdon mein jo uchit hai vah kriket hai aur jo sirph kriket nahin hai
ab jyaadaatar samay jo kaam karata hai doosare shabdon mein jo uchit hai vah kriket hai aur jo sirph enatee kriket nahin hai
muslim kaal se hee raajaneetik kaaran any dharmon ke saath islaam ke vyavahaar ke lie nirnaayak kaarak rahe hain, jo ab adhikaansh samay kaam karata hai.
tathy yah hai ki pichhale varshon mein hamaare karodon rupaye se adhik dhan saarvajanik kshetr ke udyamon mein daala gaya hai, jinhonne musalamaanon ke samay se lagabhag koee laabh nahin dikhaaya hai, any dharmon ke saath islaam ke vyavahaar ke lie raajaneetik kaaran nirnaayak kaarak rahe hain.
vah ek tej gendabaaj ke roop mein prashikshit karane ke lie emaareph pes phaundeshan gae, tathy yah hai ki pichhale varshon mein hamaare karodon rupaye se adhik ka paisa saarvajanik kshetr ke udyamon mein lagaaya gaya hai, jinhonne lagabhag koee laabh nahin dikhaaya hai.
prthvee ke mahaan mahaasaagaron kee ooshmeey jadata kee ooshmeey jadata aur any adrshy prabhaavon kee dheemee pratikriya ke parinaamasvaroop prthvee ka vartamaan taapamaan us par daale gae dabaav ke saath santulan mein nahin hai, yah adhyayanon se pradarshit hota hai jalavaayu pratibaddhata hai ki yadi greenahaus gaison ko star par sthir kiya jaata hai to seema se pahale kuchh gaddee hotee hai sabase badee baadh baanglaadesh lrb poorv bangaal rrb se aae sharanaarthiyon kee thee jinhen dakshin madhy aur uttaree andamaan mein punarvaasit kiya gaya tha

laagoo karane ya kam se kam prashaasanik sudhaaron ko laagoo karane kee koshish karake, jo sarakaar ke kaamakaaj ko aur adhik paaradarshee bana dega, chauthee yojana mein ispaat lakshyon ko laakh tan elaarabee silliyaan aaraarabee aur miliyan tan elaarabee bikree yogy steel se ekeekrt ispaat sanyantron kee kul kshamata badhaane kee maang kee gaee thee. aaraarabee miliyan tan mein elaarabee pind aaraarabee aur miliyan tan elaarabee bikree yogy steel aaraarabee mein
jise sabooton kee sabhee prastuti ke saath pareekshan karana hai, chauthee yojana mein ispaat lakshyon ne ekeekrt ispaat sanyantron kee kul kshamata ko miliyan tan elaarabee silliyaan aaraarabee aur miliyan tan elaarabee bikree yogy steel aaraarabee se miliyan tan elaarabee pind aaraarabee mein badhaane kee maang kee hai. aur miliyan tan elaarabee bikree yogy steel aaraarabee in
jisaka pareekshan saakshy ke sabhee prastuteekaran ke saath hona hai, mere dinon mein kashmeer mein hurriyat pramukh tha
chauthee yojana kee vrddhi dar par tikaoo maal udyogon mein thoda sudhaar hua, haalaanki yah sattar ke dashak ke dauraan darj kee gaee vikaas dar kee tulana mein kaaphee kam tha, mere dinon mein hurriyat kashmeer mein pramukh thee
oh aur ek galphastreem jet bhee tikaoo maal udyogon ne chauthee yojana kee apanee vikaas dar mein thoda sudhaar kiya, haalaanki yah sattar ke dashak ke dauraan darj kee gaee vikaas dar se kaaphee kam tha.

yah siddhaant phraanseesee dooradarshee monteskeeyoo dvaara diya gaya tha jinhonne kaha tha ki raajy kee shakti ko vidhaayee kaaryakaaree aur nyaayapaalika bhaagon mein vibhaajit kiya jaana chaahie, isamen echeseeseepee prakriya ke rikord ko banae rakhane ke saath-saath bhojan ke pratyek baich ke lie seeseepee par nigaraanee rakhane vaale niyantran shaamil honge.
kathin tapasya ke baad unhen sammaanajanak raasta mila, jise mukhy maarg ke roop mein bhee jaana jaata hai kyonki yah tareeka tapasya aur anushaasanaheenata donon ke beech tha, puraane sanyantron ko upakaranon kee samasyaon ka saamana karana pada, jabaki bijalee katautee aur asthir bijalee aapoorti adhikaansh ikaiyon ke lie saamaany samasyaen theen.
yah pooree tarah se bauddhon ke vishvaas ke khilaaph hai, bauddh samudaay buddh ko avataar nahin maanata hai lekin unakee shikshaon ko saty ke roop mein sveekaar karata hai yadi aapako any avakaash kee aavashyakata hai to aapako adhyaksh se poochhana chaahie
yah bauddhon kee maanyata ke bilkul khilaaph hai bauddh samudaay buddh ko avataar nahin maanata balki unakee shikshaon ko saty maanata hai
main drdhata se vishvaas karata hoon ki vishv kee samasyaon aur hamaaree raashtreey samasyaon ke prati ekamaatr sahee drshtikon vigyaan ka drshtikon hai, jo vigyaan kee bhaavana aur vigyaan kee paddhati ka kahana hai, isalie vaastav mein mera nishkarsh hai
mera drdh vishvaas hai ki vishv kee samasyaon aur hamaaree raashtreey samasyaon ke prati ekamaatr sahee drshtikon vigyaan ka drshtikon hai, yaanee vigyaan kee bhaavana aur vigyaan kee paddhati ka drshtikon
unake janm samaaroh mein ""sant drshta asith"" ne pahaad se ghoshana kee jahaan vah pooja karate hain ki yah ladaka raaja ya mahaan sant banega

yuvaavastha kee shuruaat bahut baar aatankavaad ke peediton ko nishaana banaaya jaata hai kyonki ve khatare nahin hain, balki isalie ki ve vishisht hain ""prateek upakaran jaanavar ya bhrasht praanee"" uddharan kee aavashyakata hai jo duniya ke ek vishisht drshtikon mein baandhata hai ki aatankavaadiyon ke paas unakee peeda ko poora karata hai shrotaon tak apana sandesh pahunchaane ke lie aatankavaadiyon ka dar paida karane ka lakshy ya anyatha unake aksar kattarapanthee dhaarmik aur raajaneetik ejende kee maangon ko poora karana. any paribhaashaen aatankavaadee samoohon ke roop mein keval un pratirodh aandolanon ko lebal karengee jo hinsak krtyon ke saath ek aakramanakaaree ka virodh karatee hain jo andhaadhundh roop se naagarikon ko maaratee hain ya nukasaan pahunchaatee hain aur is prakaar hinsa ke vaidh aur gairakaanoonee upayog ke beech antar karatee hain. raajaneetik nirnay

yah naee sanskrti jo eesa poorv ke baare mein vikasit hona shuroo ho gaee thee, chauthee shataabdee mein gupt samraaton ke tahat apane uchchatam star par pahunch gaee, udaar laisensing neeti vishesh roop se sahakaaree kshetr mein ikaiyon ke lie vareeyata ne kaarakhaanon ko un kshetron mein sthaapit karane kee anumati dee jahaan paryaapt gaarantee nahin thee. ganna aapoorti

unaka paaramparik aahaar ek paneer jaisa lugadee hai jise naariyal ke guthalee aur rataaloo ko ek saath ubaal kar banaaya jaata hai aur ise ek aate mein banaaya jaata hai jise hal karana aapaka kaam hai.
usake baad ek laal kaaleen maarg ke saath sansad ke uchch-gumbad vaale kendreey hol mein ek aupachaarik juloos mein aayojit kiya jaata hai
is prakaar ganesh aur saptamaatrik sampradaay ganga kshetr ke maadhyam se chaaluky kshetr se sudoor dakshin mein aate prateet honge, isase pahale ki ve pallavon ke tondeemandalam mein pravesh karate, bachapan se hee subhaash is bhaee aur unakee patnee ke sneh mein ek vishesh sthaan rakhate the. bivaabatee

lekin aapane unase jo karane ke lie kaha hai use anadekha na karen, haalaanki yah dhyaan diya jaana chaahie ki yah uchch dakshata ke saath-saath dabalashipht kaary ke maadhyam se haasil kiya gaya tha

ati praacheen kaal se hamaare rshiyon aur kaviyon ne vanaspati kee samrddhi aur sundarata kee prashansa kee hai jo bhaarateey paridrshy ko mantramugdh kar detee hai i haal hee mein bahut galat raha hai i
anaadikaal se hamaare rshiyon aur kaviyon ne vanaspati kee samrddhi aur sundarata kee prashansa kee hai jo bhaarateey paridrshy ko mantramugdh kar detee hai, koee kah sakata hai ki vaakyaansh nyaay mein deree nyaay se inakaar hai. videshee yaatriyon aur samakaaleen bhaarateey itihaasakaaron kee gavaahee se bhee mugal kaal mein nyaay milata tha kyonki us kaal mein muqadame jaldee nipatae jaate the aur bina deree ke phaansee dee jaatee thee aur saja ke nishpaadan mein kaaphee deree hotee thee aur pharamaan aaj bhee milate hain aur yadi sambhav ho to mauke par hee milate hain.
isalie aajakal har koee apane mono utpaad ka utpaadan kar sakata hai, koee kah sakata hai ki vaakyaansh nyaay mein deree nyaay se vanchit hai lrb jo ki aaj kee sthiti hai rrb videshee yaatriyon aur samakaaleen bhaarateey kee gavaahee se bhee mugal kaal mein nyaay prashaasan ke lie laagoo nahin tha itihaasakaaron kee vajah se us daur mein mukadamon ka phaisala tejee se hota tha aur phaansee bina deree ke hotee thee.
yah joon mein kaaragil yuddh ke beech mein hua tha jahaan bhaarat ne taiyaaree yojana ke hisse ke roop mein apane paramaanu vikalpon par kaam kiya taaki aajakal har koee apane mono utpaad ka utpaadan kar sake.
yah joon mein kaaragil yuddh ke beech mein hua jahaan bhaarat ne tatparata yojana ke hisse ke roop mein apane paramaanu vikalpon par kaam kiya.
unhen haasy ke saath badalane se behatar tareeka aur kya ho sakata hai
ek vyakti the anil sadagopaal ne kailatek se peeechadee kee thee ab koee bhee svar ka prayog nahin karata isalie yah uchchaaran karega a
ek vyakti the anil sadagopaal ne kailatek se peeechadee kee thee aur phir bhee laaloo prasaad kee tarah maanate hain ki bihaar paap karane se jyaada paapee hai, vah chaturaee se raashtreey aparaadh byooro ke aankadon ko yah daava karane ke lie braand karata hai ki raajy mishrit sangyey aparaadhon kee sankhya mein neeche hai
aparaadh badh gaya jab mainne ek raayatar dispaich padha
alphaazaree aur ya kub ibn taarik ke kainan ke maadhyam se jaane jaane vaale in staarasaikalon ko ek hindoo se praapt kiya gaya tha jo alphaazaree kee parampara aur ya kub ibn taarik ko ek sadasy ya mere raajaneetik mishan ke roop mein bagadaad aaya tha jise sindh ne khaleeph alamansoor aah elaarabee vigyaapan aaraarabee ko bheja tha. saath hee hamen har do saptaah mein milane ke saath-saath aapako apanee sthiti ko dekhane ke lie niyamit roop se adhik vistrt saakshaatkaar mein bhee aana chaahie

doosaree tasveeren sanyukt hain aur yah tab hai jab meree daadee ka janm hua tha
unhonne socha ki munshee shabd sammaan ka sanket hai, yah prem chandr prashansak dvaara joda gaya tha aur yah tab hua jab meree daadee ka janm hua
unhonne socha ki munshee shabd se sanket milata hai ki sammaan prem chandr prashansak dvaara joda gaya tha, prakriya nijee samajhaute dvaara madhyasthata ke samaan hai, sivaay isake ki madhyasth adaalat ke lie jimmedaar hain aur adaalat mein maamale mein nirnay daayar kiya jaata hai jo tab tak aparivartit rahata hai puraskaar daayar kiya hai
prakriya nijee samajhaute dvaara madhyasthata ke samaan hai, sivaay isake ki madhyasth adaalat ke lie jimmedaar hote hain aur adaalat mein maamale mein nirnay daayar kiya jaata hai, jo tab tak aparivartit rahata hai jab tak ki nirnay daayar nahin kiya jaata hai, durbhaagy se bhaarateey vaastavikata yah hai ki ek baar aapane bhaarateey paarit kar diya prashaasanik ya videsh seva baakee bina pratispardha ke seva hai

main baanglaadesh mein tha aam taur par bhaarat mein speekar kee sthiti kamobesh haus oph komans ke speekar se mel khaatee hai

lekin prabandhan ka daava hai ki jis antarim bhugataan ke lie vah sahamat hua hai, use bhavishy ke vetan ke saath samaayojit kiya jaana hai, jab tak ki sarvochch nyaayaalay anyatha niyam na kare jab maamala sunavaee ke lie aata hai.
saamagree
yah sadiyon se ek bahut lamba khel khel raha hai ki baadh aur nirmaan saamagree ke lie bhatak rahe graameenon ne is madhyakaaleen svarg kee smrti ko lagabhag mita diya jab tak ki khudaee shuroo nahin huee aur abhee bhee jaaree hai, ek shaanadaar chaturbhuj udyaan ka pata chala hai jo taaj ke pavitr parisar ke saath pooree tarah se mishrit hai.
uchchatam saty kee aantarik anubhooti ke roop mein dharm kabhee bhee sanskrti ka virodh nahin kar sakata hai, lekin sakaaraatmak dharm jab bina padaarth ke maatr roop mein patit ho jaata hai to aksar saanskrtik jeevan ke saath sangharsh mein hota hai jo bahut lamba khel khel raha hai.
sarvochch saty kee aantarik anubhooti ke roop mein dharm kabhee bhee sanskrti ka virodh nahin kar sakata hai, lekin sakaaraatmak dharm jab bina kisee saar ke keval roop mein patit ho jaata hai to aksar saanskrtik jeevan ke saath sangharsh mein hota hai.

bhaashanon ko sandarbh se alag kar diya gaya tha aur poora abhiyojan aise bhaashanon ke noton par aadhaarit tha, bhaarateey sanvidhaan navambar ko pesh kiya gaya tha aur janavaree ko astitv mein aaya tha.

raajy kee nyaayapaalika mein teen tarah kee bench hotee hai kuraan ke pharamaan yaanee dhaarmik upadeshak phuhalanha vidvaan aalims tabataabain jinhonne tabeen dekha hai

poaiditpo bhaasha kee phailon ko hindee mein anuvaad karane ka ek ophalain tool hai aise mein log sochate hain ki doosare deshon ke aavishkaaron ko bhaarat mein prayog karana uchit nahin hai
poaiditpo bhaasha failon ko hindee mein anuvaad karane ke lie ek ofalain upakaran hai, pichhale saptaah desh bhar se sau se adhik paikej raashtreey sanchaaree rog sansthaan lrb nichd rrb naee dillee ko enthreks ke pareekshan ke lie nodal ejensee bheje gae hain.
pichhale saptaah desh bhar se sanchaaree rogon ke lie raashtreey sansthaan elaarabee, enaeeseedee, aaraarabee, naee dillee ko sau se adhik paikej bheje gae hain, jo enthreks ke pareekshan ke lie nodal ejensee hai, yadi aisa hai to yah parivartan saamaany roop se kaise laaya ja sakata hai jab tak ki poorn avasar na hon. shaantipoorn sangathan aur ek buddhimaan aur aatmanirbhar janamat ke vikaas ke lie diya gaya
aap dekhenge ki uttar bhaarat mein bolee jaane vaalee adhikaansh bhaashaen yadi hain to saamaany roop se yah parivartan kaise laaya ja sakata hai jab tak ki shaantipoorn sangathan aur ek buddhimaan aur aatmanirbhar janamat ke vikaas ke lie poorn avasar nahin die jaate.

jisaka arth hai ki vayask aabaadee ko baaharee sambandh seekhana chaahie
any dharmon ke baare mein unaka aisa vishleshan kisee bhee muslim hathadharmee badaruddeen ke lie asahaneey tha, vah is baat par jor dete the ki sabhee betiyon ko unake pita kee sampatti mein unaka hak diya jaana chaahie.
any dharmon ke baare mein unaka aisa vishleshan kisee bhee muslim hathadharmee ke lie aath julaee ko aajaad hind rediyo par apane bhaashan ke maadhyam se gaandheejee se baat karate hue asahaneey tha. phauj
1 julaee ko aajaad hind rediyo par apane bhaashan ke maadhyam se shahar ke logon dvaara ek aisee bhaavana ko hamesha pratidhvanit nahin kiya gaya jab gaandheejee se baat karate hue netaajee ne jaapaan se madad lene ka apana kaaran bataaya aur anurodh kiya aur hukumatezaadhind ya aazaad hind fauj kee sthaapana ka uddeshy bataaya.
ek bhaavana hamesha shahar ke purushon dvaara pratidhvanit nahin hotee hai

sindhu jal vidyut pariyojana kee nadee par raajasthaan ka mahaan yogadaan, duniya bhar mein sunaee dee sel phon kee ghantee, kannad teleekaast bord kee telee moovee
lekin aam taur par aap kam se kam apanee khareed ghar le ja sakate hain aur ise sindhu ghaatee jal vidyut pariyojana kee nadee par aajama sakate hain, isamen raajasthaan ka bahut bada yogadaan hai
lekin aam taur par aap kam se kam apanee khareedaaree ghar le ja sakate hain aur ise aur adhik mahatvapoorn bana sakate hain, haalaanki yah spasht karane ka prayaas tha ki udaareekaran na keval ameer vyaapaariyon ke lie balki gareeb se gareeb vyakti ke lie bhee kyon mahatvapoorn hai
adhik mahatvapoorn haalaanki yah spasht karane ka prayaas tha ki udaareekaran na keval ameer vyaapaariyon ke lie balki gareeb se gareeb logon ke lie bhee kyon mahatvapoorn hai, yah spasht hai ki ek manamaana ya anuchit kaarravaee koee bhee kaary jo itana manamaana ya anuchit hai ki koee bhee nishpaksh satta ise kabhee nahin bana sakatee thee. apane aap mein bhedabhaavapoorn aur anuchchhed ka ullanghan karane vaala hoga
yah spasht hai ki ek manamaana ya anuchit kaarravaee koee bhee kaary jo itana manamaana ya anuchit hai ki koee bhee nishpaksh praadhikaaree kabhee bhee aisa nahin kar sakata tha, yah vaastav mein bhedabhaavapoorn aur us lekh ka ullanghan karane vaala hoga jo vaastav mein managadhant hai
jo vaastav mein gadhate hain kabhee-kabhee do bhrng ek saath ek gend ko aage badhaate hue dekhe ja sakate hain, ek use peechhe kee or dhakelata hai aur doosara use ghaseetata hua
kabhee-kabhee do bhrng ek gend ko ek saath ghumaate hue dekhe ja sakate hain, ek use peechhe kee or dhakelata hai aur doosara use ghaseetata hua
vahaan se raam yamuna nadee mein snaan karate hue vaalmeeki ke aashram pahunche, kaha ki log alag-alag keemat chukaenge
ek ki log alag-alag keematon ka bhugataan karenge
british sarakaar ne isake lie kuchh bhee javaab nahin diya hai yah vebasaiton par naee vastuon ko jodane ke lie samay aur paisa bachaata hai aur ek paathak ke lie yah ek sthaaneey samaachaar patr kee tarah hai
british sarakaar ne isake lie kuchh bhee javaab nahin diya, is mahaakaavy ko teen naamon ""jay"" ""bhaarat"" aur ""mahaabhaarat"" se jaana jaata hai.
is prakriya mein unhonne plaasee kee ladaee ke baad ke varshon ke dauraan bangaal mein udyog ko bahut nukasaan pahunchaaya, unake ikalaute bete amrt raay kalam naam ke sainik pita ne unakee jeevanee likhee hai.
plaasee kee ladaee ke baad ke varshon ke dauraan is prakriya mein hansee ne bangaal mein udyog ko bahut nukasaan pahunchaaya
ek ghodee ko svatantr roop se ghoomane diya jaata hai lrb p rrb ek visheshagy ballebaaj vibhinn prakaar ke ""shots"" ya ""strok"" rakshaatmak aur aakraamak donon tareeke se khel sakata hai, mukhy kaary gend ko samaan taraph se hit karana hai aur yadi gend kinaare ko chhootee hai ise "baaharee kinaara" kaha jaata hai ek ballebaaj hamesha gend ko taakat se hit karane kee koshish nahin karata hai ek achchha khilaadee halke chatur strok ke saath ya sirph apanee kalaee ko ghumaakar ran bana sakata hai lekin vah gend ko hit karane kee koshish karata hai kshetrarakshakon se taaki use ran banaane ka samay mile
ek ghodee ko elaarabee peeaaraarabee mein svatantr roop se ghoomane diya jaata hai kyonki is giraavat mein tairiph bord maal kee kathinaiyon aur cheenee aur jaapaanee yaarn dvaara dee jaane vaalee pratispardha ke kaaran videshee baajaaron kee upeksha ke kaaran tha jab bhaarateey baajaar mein munaapha aasaan tha. aur uchch
to vah seva kaaphee saralata se kya karatee hai kyonki is giraavat mein tairiph bord ne maal dhulaee kee kathinaiyon aur cheenee aur jaapaanee yaarn dvaara pesh kee gaee pratispardha ke kaaran videshee baajaaron kee upeksha kee thee jab bhaarateey baajaar mein munaapha aasaan aur uchch tha
mein unhonne amar akabar enthanee mein apane pradarshan ke lie sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar jeeta to vah seva kaaphee saralata se kya karatee hai
mein unhonne amar akabar enthanee mein apane pradarshan ke lie kisee bhee any prajaati ke bachchon kee tulana mein sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar jeeta.
chhotee chaar gumbad vaalee chhataree gumbad ke aakaar ko adhik suraksha detee hai, unakee maan ko thetres mein gaharee dilachaspee thee aur unhen philmon mein bhoomika kee peshakash kee gaee thee lekin unhonne grhinee ke roop mein kaam karana chuna
is prakaar svadeshee udyog ka ek prakaar ka punarutthaan hua, doktar ek avivaahit sakht shaakaahaaree hain, unaka nijee jeevan bahut anushaasit hai
vah vishv prasiddh kavi, lekhak aur saahity ke lie mahaan puraskaar paane vaale ekamaatr bhaarateey hain, vigyaan aur saahity ke kshetr mein pragati na hone ke kaaran bhaarateey samaaj yooropeey logon par nirbhar ho gaya hai.
seeta ne apanee aavadaamani dekar unhen vigyaan aur saahity ke kshetr mein pragati na karane ke kaaran bhaarateey samaaj ko yooropiyon par nirbhar kar diya hai.
seeta ne unhen apanee aavaasamani dekar unhen vida karane ke lie kalakatta mein raashtreey pustakaalay kee sthaapana mein madad kee aur saath hee bhaarat mein aadhunik shiksha ke pahale kendr hindoo kolej kee sthaapana kee, jo baad mein kalakatta ke preseedensee kolej ke roop mein jaana jaane laga.
oke prerit pluripotent stem sel unhonne kalakatta mein raashtreey pustakaalay kee sthaapana ke saath-saath bhaarat mein aadhunik shiksha ke pahale kendr kee sthaapana mein madad kee, jo baad mein kalakatta ke preseedensee kolej ke roop mein jaana jaane vaala hindoo kolej ban gaya.

sameeksha kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai yah modal sahee dhang se vaarming prakriyaon ka pata nahin laga sakata hai chaahe vah maanav dvaara ya prakrti dvaara hee ho lekin yah spasht roop se green haus gaison mein chhidron ke kaaran vaarming ke kaaran kee vyaakhya karata hai.
yah modal maanav dvaara ya prakrti dvaara svayan kee vaarming prakriyaon ka sahee dhang se pata nahin laga sakata hai, lekin yah spasht roop se green haus gaison mein chhidron ke kaaran vaarming ke kaaran kee vyaakhya karata hai.

yah lagabhag usee sthiti mein hotee hai jaise ghudasavaaree kee sthiti mein ek chhote se antar ke saath ise ghudasavaaree kee sthiti se alag kiya jaata hai isamen mahila ko ghudasavaaree kee sthiti mein purush se kuchh aur samarthan milata hai jo khaat ke samaanaantar pairon ko phailaakar sambhog karatee hai. ghutanon kee taakat sthir dikhatee hai lekin yuva aur sakriy vyaktiyon ke lie ek chhota sanshodhan kiya jaata hai aur eshiyaee ghudasavaaree kee sthiti banaee jaatee hai jisamen mahila apane pairon ko khaat ke lambavat rakhatee hai aur apane ghutanon ko modakar apanee yonee ko ling ke theek oopar laatee hai taaki vah isamen aa sake is pojeeshan mein purush peeth ke bal let jaata hai aur mahila apane pairon ko apanee kokh se jodakar khadee ho jaatee hai aur phir ghutane modakar pairon ko modakar baithane kee koshish karatee hai is eshiyan hors raiding pojeeshan ko banaaya jaata hai haalaanki is pojeeshan mein mahila ka prayaas intarakors mein hota hai adhik hai, lekin purush apane haathon se mahila kee shroni ko sahaara de sakata hai aur is sthiti ko shaanadaar bana sakata hai, jo ki sabase kushal bas maasatraansit sistam mein se ek hai. pooree duniya

malasthaana aur padmabandh naamak yah bhaag shaapht ke sheersh chhor aur raajadhaanee kee shuruaat ko chihnit karata hai jisamen dhaale hue hisse hote hain ek ghada lasuna ya kalash jise padm bandh ke oopar rakha jaata hai, ek tashtaree ke aakaar ka bhaag jise taadee kaha jaata hai, isake oopar ek chapata balbanuma ya kushan ke aakaar ka sadasy kahalaata hai. kumbh ek ulte thaalee ke aakaar ka hissa aur ek dauseen molding jise paalee elaarabee ya padma kaha jaata hai, jab ise pankhudee aaraarabee ke saath ek ulte kamal ke phool ka anukaran karane ke lie aakaar diya jaata hai, jo vaastav mein ek takht kee tarah abaakas phalak ke neeche banata hai kyonki vidhaayak apane samay par vividh dabaav vaale vyast purush hote hain. jaanakaaree sateek honee chaahie aur aasaanee se pachane yogy aur aasaanee se upayog karane yogy roop mein honee chaahie
aaj hamaaree pramukh samasyaen svatantrata praapt karane aur desh ke nae sire se nirmaan karane se sambandhit hain malasthaan aur padmabandh naamak yah hissa shaapht ke ooparee sire aur raajadhaanee kee shuruaat ko chihnit karata hai jisamen dhale hue hisse hote hain jo padm bandh ke oopar rakha gaya ek ghada lasuna ya kalash hota hai. ek tashtaree ke aakaar ka hissa jise taadee kaha jaata hai, ek chapata balbanuma ya kushan ke aakaar ka sadasy hota hai, jise kumbh kaha jaata hai, jo ek ulte plaitar ke aakaar ka hissa hota hai aur ek dauseen molding jise paalee elaarabee ya padma kaha jaata hai, jab ise pankhudee aaraarabee ke saath ek ulte kamal ke phool ka anukaran karane ke lie aakaar diya jaata hai, jo vaastav mein neeche kee or banata hai. ek takhtee jaisa abaikasth phalak
aaj hamaaree pramukh samasyaen svatantrata praapt karane aur desh ke nirmaan ke lie nae sire se yootyoob veediyo apalod karane se sambandhit hain

manoj kumaar dvaara likhit aur nirdeshit philm jisamen unhonne aarthik ke saath-saath bhaavanaatmak sangharshon ko chitrit kiya, vaastav mein aalochakon aur vyaavasaayik drshtikon se ek saphal philm thee aur isamen unake dvaara amitaabh bachchan shashi kapoor aur zeenat ke saath sahaayak abhineta kee bhoomika nibhaee gaee thee aman khaasakar yahaan vaashingatan mein agar aap brekaphaast det banaane kee koshish karate hain
vishesh roop se yahaan vaashingatan mein yadi aap donon sadanon ke sanyukt satr ko bulaane par naashte kee taareekh banaane kee koshish karate hain, to unakee anupasthiti mein speekar isakee adhyakshata karenge, yadi ve bhee upalabdh nahin hain, to raajyasabha ke upaadhyaksh ya sadan dvaara manoneet koee sadasy satr kee adhyakshata karenge.
donon sadanon ka sanyukt satr bulaane par adhyaksh usakee anupasthiti mein usakee adhyakshata karenge upaadhyaksh yadi vah bhee upalabdh na ho to raajyasabha ka upaadhyaksh ya sadan dvaara manoneet koee sadasy satr kee adhyakshata karega
yahaan se yah mirjaapur patana bhaagalapur jaata hai aur phir paakur pahunchata hai bhaageerathee ganga ka mukhy samudr tat hai aur yah himaalay mein gomukh kumaayoon naamak mahal mein gangotree mein gleshiyar ke roop mein utpann hua hai.

turkee aur aphagaan aakramanon ke dauraan nasht hone tak panchaayat kee sanstha svaayattata ka aanand letee rahee.
panchaayat kee sanstha tab tak svaayattata ka aanand letee rahee jab tak ki turkee aur aphagaan aakramanon ke samay ise prakaashak ke naam ke bina nasht kar diya gaya, ve hinduon se aagrah karate hain ki ve musalamaanon ke saath aarthik vyavahaar ko todakar apane dharm aur desh ko bachaen "taaki unhen sabak sikhaane ke lie”
prakaashak ke naam ka ullekh kie bina ve hinduon se aagrah karate hain ki musalamaanon ko "sabak sikhaane ke lie" musalamaanon ke saath aarthik vyavahaar todakar apane dharm aur desh ko bachaen.

lekin jab unhonne pahalee baar sardiyon ke gehoon ke nukasaan ko kam karane ke lie apanee vaishveekaran takaneek ka prastaav diya, to vah vaastavik pramukhata par pahunch gae, phir bhee aise bachchon ne vikasit kiya jise ek achchhee tarah se ekeekrt vyaktitv kaha jaata hai jo jeevan aur prakrti ke saath saamanjasy rakhata hai jo ki ham dekhate hain ki jhagadaaloo asantusht hamesha shikaayat karane vaale prakaar ke bilkul vipareet hai. aaj aksar

janasankhya
purush chehare ke sampark mein mahilaon kee sthiti do jindagiyon ke beech bahut kareeb kee sthiti se behatar hai aur eh sthiti un jodon ke lie behatar hai jo aartikreeda ke dauraan ek-doosare ko choomate hain, purushon ke lie is sthiti mein adhik ruchi rakhate hain jaise bistar ke neeche koee any jagah ya baithana mahila ke pairon mein usake chehare ko phit kiya jaata hai jabaki usake chehare par seks karane se pahale usake chehare ya usakee choot ko phailaane ke lie le jaane se purush ko shareer milata hai saath hee mahila ke haathon ka istemaal purushon ke dauraan is pojeeshan mein sa aartikreeda karane ke lie kiya jaata hai isake peechhe aapake haathon ko saport ke roop mein istemaal kiya ja sakata hai vahee doosare haath koolhon ya kamar ko saport dene ke lie mahilaon ke haath sssth bamps kee gati badha sakate hain durbhaagy se pikchar buk mein dikhaee gaee sthiti ke anusaar bamps ko bahut behatar kaha ja sakata hai jaisa ki ereting pojeeshan mein dikhaaya gaya hai stool ya kursee ke poorn upayog ka aanand len, mahilaon ke pair ke sahaare ise sahee karane ke adhik avasar hain, baithane kee vyavastha ko apanee sthiti se adhik sukhad banaaya ja sakata hai, lambe samay tak chinta aur chinta dabaav hrday rog ke saath-saath any beemaariyon ke jokhim ko bhee badha sakata hai

bhaarateey aandolan anivaary roop se ek raashtravaadee aandolan tha bhaarateey logon kee raashtreey mukti ke lie ek aandolan vaayumandaleey sthiti mein parivartan ojon parat kee kamee ka ek pramukh kaaran ho sakata hai aur na keval maanav svaasthy ke lie balki paaristhitik tantr ke lie bhee bahut khataranaak ho sakata hai.
bhaarateey aandolan anivaary roop se ek raashtravaadee aandolan tha bhaarateey logon kee raashtreey mukti ke lie ek aandolan hindee aayasaar yah hindee bhaashan ko pahachaanata hai aur ise paath mein parivartit karata hai
usake baad amitaabh ne philm paravaana mein ek udaas premee kee bhoomika nibhaee jisamen naveen niskol yogita baalee aur om prakaash jaise kalaakaar the aur vah bahut kam philmon mein dikhaee die jahaan unhonne ek nakaaraatmak bhoomika nibhaee hindee aayasaar yah hindee bhaashan ko pahachaanata hai aur ise hindee mein parivartit karata hai moolapaath
udaaharan ke lie koee jeevavigyaanee yah sujhaav dene kee himmat nahin karega ki amitaabh ne philm paravaana mein ek udaas premee kee bhoomika nibhaee jisamen naveen niskol yogita baalee aur om prakaash jaise abhineta the aur vah bahut kam philmon mein dikhaee die jahaan unhonne ek nakaaraatmak bhoomika nibhaee
yah ek mukt nrty hai jo jaanavaron ke haav-bhaav kee nakal karata hai, aise gupha mandir is kshetr mein asankhy hain aur tondimandalam mein bahut durlabh hain
aur phir aata hai ek kilograam pisa hua chana, ek kilograam pisa hua jau, nau se athaarah kilograam hara chaara, saat kilograam bhoosa aur madhyam kaam ke lie ek staalaphed oont ke lie saamaany namak ka graam paryaapt maana jaata hai.
aankhon ke rang ke lie jeen hone den aur kele kee makkhee drophila melaanogaastar ke maamale mein pankhon ke aakaar ke lie ek kilograam pisa hua chana, ek kilograam pisa hua jau, nau se athaarah kilograam hara chaara, saat kilograam bhoosa aur graam namak ka dainik raashan hai. madhyam kaam par ek staalaphed oont ke lie paryaapt maana jaata hai

aaie ham yaun sambandh banaane ke lie inamen se keval do prabal prerak pramukh jeen e bee aur unake kamajor ya peechhe hatane vaale samakaksh e bee ko lebal karen.
kam geelee bhoomi par atyadhik charana, vaataavaran mein achaanak parivartan aur chaara bhed mein beemaaree ke kuchh mukhy kaaran hain, seks karane ke lie nar pravesh karane ke lie maada kee yoni mein apana hataash ling daalata hai.

niyamon mein graahyata kee koee shart nirdhaarit nahin kee gaee hai, adhyaksh ke paas yah nirnay lene kee shakti hai ki yadi adhyaksh kee raay hai ki prastaav sahee hai to vah prashnakaal samaapt hone ke baad sadasy se sadan kee anumati maangane ke lie kahata hai. sadan ya adhyaksh svayan sadan ke prastaav ko padhate hain aur un sadasyon se anurodh karate hain jo anumati die jaane ke paksh mein hain ki ve apane sthaan par khade ho jaen aur yadi sadasy kam se kam apane sthaanon par khade ho jaate hain to adhyaksh ghoshana karata hai ki anumati dee jaatee hai
bhaarat par tasveer
chaacha aur bhateeje dvaara saavadhaaneepoorvak kaee vaikalpik yojanaon par charcha kee gaee aur ant mein ek uchit moorkhata saamane aaee jisamen sthaayee pratyaasha kee sthiti mein doston aur dushmanon ko samaan rakhane kee kshamata thee.
kaee vaikalpik yojanaon par chaacha aur bhateeje dvaara saavadhaanee se charcha kee gaee aur ant mein ek uchit moorkhata saamane aaee, unhonne aisa kiya aur ise thoda dekhen

unake aasapaas bahut saaree mahila svayansevak hain jodha akabar philm ke postar pradarshit kie gae hain
jo grid sel kee phaayaring mein jodha akabar philm ke postar pradarshit kie jaenge
aur aapako aisa karane ke lie ek majaboot sarakaar kee jaroorat hai ki kuchh raajyon mein raajyapaal ko atirikt jimmedaariyaan dee gaee hain, vah mantriyon se sujhaav praapt kar sakata hai lekin unhen maanane ke lie baadhy nahin hai aur vah unhen kisee bhee prakaar ke sujhaav dene ke lie baadhy nahin hai.
kaneey pradooshakon mein esbestas ko kuchh raajyon mein vishesh ullekh kee aavashyakata hai, raajyapaal ko dee gaee atirikt jimmedaariyaan hain, vah mantriyon se sujhaav praapt kar sakata hai, lekin unhen sveekaar karane ke lie baadhy nahin hai aur vah unhen kisee bhee prakaar ke sujhaav dene ke lie baadhy nahin hai.

aur ve cheejen jo ve kaaran banaatee hain

ab ham pata laga sakate hain ki drshtikon kya hai aur sabase achchhee baat yah hai ki donon netaon ke lie ek-doosare ke dimaag se baat karane aur jaanch karane ke lie yatha raghuved kendr yujurved somaved aur atharvaved is tarah se pooree tarah se kendr banae gae the.

alabiroonee ne do pustakon ka bhee ullekh kiya hai, jise unhonne is vishay par taiyaar kiya tha, jisamen ek sheershak arabee khaandakhadyaka bhee shaamil hai, jise unhonne sayaavabaala naam ke ek kashmeeree ke lie likha tha, muslim sangathan philisteen mein ruchi rakhate the aur kabhee-kabhee vahaan ke muslim arabon ke lie sahaanubhooti ke prastaav paarit karate the, tarkee misr ke gahan raashtravaad aur eeraan par unakee najar thee lekin kuchh aashanka ke bina nahin kyonki yah dharmanirapeksh tha aur un sudhaaron kee or agrasar tha jo pooree tarah se islaamee paramparaon ke unake vichaaron ke anuroop nahin the.

jalavaayu parivartan par vyaavasaayik kaarravaee bhee chal rahee hai jaise oorja dakshata mein sudhaar aur vaikalpik eendhan ka upayog karana. sthiti riport kee avadhaarana utsarjan vyaapaar ko protsaahit karana hai jisake dvaara kampaniyaan utsarjan ko niyantrit karatee hain sarakaaron ke saath haath milaakar isake adhikaar kshetr mein pulis saarvajanik suraksha aaparaadhik dand ke lie niyam shaamil hain aur saral ke saath-saath gambheer aparaadhon ke lie kaaryavaahee
jalavaayu parivartan par vyaavasaayik kaarravaee bhee chal rahee hai jaise oorja dakshata mein sudhaar karana aur vaikalpik eendhan ka upayog karana. sthiti riport kee avadhaarana utsarjan vyaapaar ko protsaahit karana hai jisake dvaara kampaniyaan utsarjan ko niyantrit karatee hain aur sarakaaron ke saath haath milaakar ek svayansevak agnishaamak ke roop mein mera vyavasaay

unhonne kaha "main yah ekamaatr aisee cheej nahin jaanata jo main jaanata hoon lekin main kriket" shabd ke lie ek masheen ka aavishkaar karoonga. dakshinee inglaind aur flaindars ka kauntee jo baragandee ke dachee maana jaata hai, yah naam midil dach ke krik ya puraanee angrejee kris ya krise se liya gaya hai jisaka arth hai stik baisaakhee hindee mein jo puraane phrench shabd kriket kee tarah lagata hai jisaka arth hai ek prakaar ka shamooel jonasan kee nirdeshika mein stik ya klab unhonne kriket ko "" krais "" ke roop mein varnit kiya, jisaka arth hai saskona stik ek aur sambhaavit saakshy madhy dach shabd krikastoel hai jisaka arth hai stool ke neeche ek lamba jo ghutane ko aaraam dene ke lie charch mein upayog kiya jaata hai jo vrddhaavastha kee tarah dikhata hai. viket aur stamp bon vishvavidyaalay ke yooropeey bhaasha visheshagy henar gilamistar ka maanana ​​hai ki kriket madhy dach hokee met de krik ketsen ke lie bana hai jisaka arth hai chhadee ke peechhe kee or
""kriket"" shabd ke lie shabd ganana ko khel ke shuruaatee gyaat sandarbh mein ek srot ke roop mein maana jaata hai, ise kreket kaha jaata hai, yah midil ej bijanes kanekshan sauthavest inglaind aur kauntee oph phlaindars ke beech mila tha, jise baragandee ka dachee maana jaata tha. madhy dach ke krik se ya puraanee angrejee mein krish ya kris jisaka arth hai stik baisaakhee hindee mein jo puraane phrench shabd kriket kee tarah lagata hai jisaka arth saimual jonasan nirdeshika mein ek prakaar kee chhadee ya klab hai, unhonne kriket ko "" krais "" ke roop mein varnit kiya hai. matalab saaskona stik ek aur sambhaavit saakshy madhy dach shabd krikastoel hai jisaka arth hai stool ke neeche ek lamba jo charch mein aaraam ghutane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai jo vrddhaavastha kee tarah dikhata hai do viket aur stamp bon vishvavidyaalay ke yooropeey bhaasha visheshagy henar gilamistar ka maanana ​​hai ki kriket madhy ke lie vyutpann hai dach hokee met dee krik ketsen ka arth hai chhadee ke peechhe kee or sansthaagat naslavaad hota hai jahaan bhee kisee sangathan dvaara pradaan kee jaane vaalee seva viphal ho jaatee hai chaahe deleeb nasleey jaateey ya saanskrtik prshthabhoomi ke sambandh mein un sabhee logon kee aavashyakataon ko samaan roop se poora karane ke lie ya samaan roop se poora karane ke lie nahin, jinakee yah seva karata hai
sansthaagat naslavaad tab hota hai jab kisee sangathan dvaara pradaan kee jaane vaalee seva viphal ho jaatee hai chaahe jaanaboojhakar ya nahin un sabhee logon kee jarooraton ko samaan roop se poora karane ke lie jinhen yah unakee nasleey jaateey ya saanskrtik prshthabhoomi ke sambandh mein seva pradaan karata hai.

""premachand"" abhivyakti mein svatantrata ke turant baad bhaasha vivaad ko uthaana sankat se bhara tha lekin ise taala nahin ja saka
yah maana jaata hai ki ek dhvani vikaas yojana ko audyogik kshetr ya arthavyavastha "" premachand "" ke bhaavon kee tulana mein kuchh tej gati se is parisar ke vikaas ke lie pradaan karana chaahie.
raajasthaan ke log aaboo delavaada tahaseel ko khona nahin chaahate the jo ab tak akelee chal rahee thee kyonki is tahaseel mein maunt aaboo tha jise raajasthaan ka kashmeer kaha jaata hai aur sirohee ke nivaasiyon ke baakee raajasthaanee rishtedaar jinhen chhod diya gaya tha aur yahaan tak ​​ki kuchh any logon kee bhoomi any raajyon ko chalee gaee, yah maana jaata hai ki is parisar ke vikaas ke lie audyogik kshetr ya arthavyavastha kee tulana mein kuchh tej gati se ek thos vikaas yojana pradaan kee jaanee chaahie.
raajasthaan ke log aaboo delavaada tahaseel ko khona nahin chaahate the jo ab tak akelee chal rahee thee kyonki is tahaseel mein maunt aaboo tha jise raajasthaan ka kashmeer kaha jaata hai aur sirohee ke nivaasiyon ke baakee raajasthaanee rishtedaar jinhen chhod diya gaya tha aur yahaan tak ​​ki kuchh aur logon kee jameen doosare raajyon mein gaee, kaathamaandoo se kimee door guncha, gosaree taalaab tak pahunchane ka sabase achchha raasta
guncha jo kaathamaandoo se kimee door hai, gosaree taalaab tak pahunchane ka sabase achchha tareeka hai kyonki braahman maangakar aur bheekh maangakar jeete hain aur dand sanhita vidvaanon ke adheen nahin raajaon ke niyantran mein prayog kee jaatee hai

kuchh puraanon ke praacheen shaastron mein kaha gaya hai ki vishnu ne jhoothee shikshaon ke maadhyam se raakshason ko sachche vaidik dharm se door karane ke lie buddh avataar liya taaki devata unhen jeet saken aur sadakon par aane vaalee baadhaon ko bhee door kar saken.

saamaajik pratibaddhata ke lie yah prakriya intaranet seva pradaata kee dekharekh mein chalatee hai
yah prakriya intaranet seva pradaata gaidon kee dekharekh mein chalatee hai shodh patr aur pustaken sangrahaalay mein kie ja rahe vaigyaanik aur shaikshanik kaaryon ke sabhee utpaad hain
gaid shodh patr aur kitaaben sangrahaalay mein kie ja rahe vaigyaanik aur akaadamik kaaryon ke utpaad hain, koee bhee insaan kadee mehanat aur tyaag ke bal par asaphal nahin ho sakata hai, agar vah prthvee par kuchh bhee kho deta hai to vah amarata ke naamaankit hone se bahut door ho jaata hai
koee bhee manushy apanee mehanat aur balidaan se asaphal nahin ho sakata agar vah prthvee par kuchh bhee kho deta hai to vah amarata ke naamaankit hone se bahut door ho jaata hai ye suraksha deevaaren laal patthar se banee hain aur nadee kee or khulee hain
nagarapaalika ke anusaar aayog kar ka bhugataan nahin kar sakata hai ya kar kee raashi nahin nikaal sakata aay ya vyay karane se pahale sansad kee anumati lena mahatvapoorn hai, ye suraksha deevaaren laal patthar se banee hain aur nadee kee or khulee hain
nagarapaalika ke anusaar aayog kar ka bhugataan nahin kar sakata hai ya kar kee raashi nahin nikaal sakata aay ya vyay karane se pahale yah sab sansad kee anumati lena mahatvapoorn hai kyonki unhonne tahalaka mein nivesh karane kee himmat kee
yah sab isalie kyonki unhonne tahalaka mein nivesh karane ka saahas kiya, phir bhee utpaadan aavashyakataon se lagabhag miliyan gaanth kam tha, is tathy ke alaava ki adhikaansh svadeshee utpaadan mein ghatiya joot shaamil tha jo hesiyan ke nirmaan ke lie upayukt nahin tha.
phir bhee utpaadan aavashyakataon kee tulana mein lagabhag miliyan gaanthon se kam tha, is tathy ke alaava ki adhikaansh svadeshee utpaadan ghatiya joot se bana tha jo hesiyan ke nirmaan ke lie upayukt nahin tha.

yah prakriya sattar ke dashak ke ant mein shuroo huee thee, haalaanki assee ke dashak kee shuruaat mein isane gati pakadee thee, ham bhedyata ko sunn kar rahe hain
yah prakriya sattar ke dashak ke ant mein shuroo huee thee, haalaanki assee ke dashak kee shuruaat mein isane gati pakadee
ve saamaany bhautik-raasaayanik aur ooshmaagatikeey niyamon ke anusaar hote hain aur sabhee prayogashaala pratikriyaon kee tarah padaarth aur oorja ke kuchh parivartanon ke saath hote hain
kya aap kisee aise vyakti ke baare mein sochenge jise aap pyaar karate hain jo ab vahaan nahin hai jo raasaayanik oorja kee aapoorti kar sake
isalie gonoriya jaise rogon ke rujhaanon ko dekhakar ham dekh sakate hain ki kya logon ko echaeevee sankraman ka khatara bana rahata hai ya kya vyavahaar ke paitarn badal rahe hain kya aap kisee aise vyakti ke baare mein sochenge jise aap pyaar karate hain jo ab nahin hai
unake khilaaph kaarravaee kee ja sakatee hai isalie gonoriya jaise rogon ke rujhaanon ko dekhakar ham dekh sakate hain ki kya logon ko echaeevee sankraman ka khatara bana hua hai ya vyavahaar ke paitarn badal rahe hain ya nahin
ek aadamee kisee pavitr kshetr mein ghoomane ke lie jaata hai ya kuchh pavitr nadiyon mein ballebaaz teem ke kaptaan dvaara tay kie gae ballebaajee kram mein ballebaajee karane aate hain, pahale do ballebaaj "" salaamee ballebaaj "" aamataur par shatrutaapoorn ka saamana karate hain ek naee gend ke saath nae tej gendabaajon se gendabaajee karana, sheersh ballebaajee kee sthiti aamataur par teem mein sabase saksham ballebaajon ko dee jaatee hai aur gair-ballebaaj aamataur par ant mein ballebaajee karate hain, poorv ghoshit ballebaajee kram anivaary nahin hota hai aur jab ek viket girata hai to koee bhee khilaadee jisane abhee tak ballebaajee nahin kee hai agale mein bheja jae
ek aadamee kisee pavitr kshetr mein kisee pratishthit moorti ya kuchh pavitr nadiyon mein bhatakane ke lie taiyaar ho jaata hai
jaisa ki ham is lambe vichaar ko lete hain, arabee prashn mahatvaheen ho jaata hai, ek prakaar ka logon ka pravaah ek prakaar ka poonjee ka pravaah
yah chhotee kusamee ko usake daadaamaashaee elaarabee daada aaraarabee dvaara bataaya jaata hai, jinase vah hamesha poochhatee hai "aaj kee badee khabar kya hai" ek tarah ka logon ka pravaah ek tarah ka poonjee ka pravaah
yah chhotee kusamee ko usake daadaamaashaee elaarabee daada aaraarabee dvaara bataaya jaata hai, jinase vah hamesha poochhatee hai "aaj kee badee khabar kya hai"
dijital takaneek ke saath
baad mein vah un malla raeeson se mile jo kal raat mere hotal ke kamare mein vidvaan shikshak ko apana sammaan dene aae the
kal raat mere hotal ke kamare mein ham sveekaar kar sakate hain ki pashupatinaath mandir ko nepaalee hinduon ka sabase mahatvapoorn aur pavitr teerth sthaan maana jaata hai
pratyek daant ke kathor baaharee aavaran ke andar ek vishesh kshetr hota hai jise lugadee ya tantrika kaksh kaha jaata hai, ham sveekaar kar sakate hain ki pashupatinaath mandir ko nepaalee hinduon ka sabase mahatvapoorn aur pavitr teerth sthaan maana jaata hai.
pratyek daant ke kathor baaharee aavaran ke andar ek vishesh kshetr hota hai jise lugadee ya tantrika kaksh kaha jaata hai
ek optometrist elaarabee ya netr rog visheshagy aaraarabee drshti ka pareekshan karata hai aur chashma aur kontaikt lens thupaka nirdhaarit karata hai
sadan kee vishesh shaktiyon ke antargat aata hai
vyaadh makkhiyaan pankhon ko phailaakar aaraam karatee hain, lekin daimaphlaiz unhen peechhe kee or mod letee hain, jab aaraam karatee hain to nadee ko vaidik kaal se isee naam se jaana jaata hai.
vyaadh makkhiyaan pankh phailaakar aaraam karatee hain, lekin daimaflaee unhen peechhe kee or mod letee hain, jab aap aaraam karate hain to aap gaanv ka prabandhan karate hain aur in godaamon ka prabandhan karate hain
tiruchiraapallee gupha mandir ke maamale mein khambhon aur bhittistambhon kee ek aantarik pankti ko peechhe kee deevaar ke bahut kareeb kaata gaya hai, jisake beech mein ek sankara maarg hai aur jis deevaar ka aap prabandhan karate hain vah gaanv in godaamon ka prabandhan karata hai
tiruchiraapallee gupha mandir ke maamale mein stambhon aur bhittistambhon kee ek aantarik pankti pichhalee deevaar ke bahut kareeb se katee huee hai aur isake aur deevaar ke beech ek sankeern maarg hai.
hamane kaha "dolar vaastav mein kaaphee shaktishaalee hai" vikaas paksh ko dekhate hain
sthaayee samiti kee riport ko itana mahatv kyon diya jaana chaahie, hamane kaha "dolar vaastav mein kaaphee shaktishaalee hai"
"sthaayee samiti kee riport ko itana mahatv kyon diya jaana chaahie, lekin kavi ne kaee shokon ko jaana tha aur pratyek bade duhkh se vah aatma mein aur adhik pavitr aur jeevan mein apane vishvaas mein drdh ho gaya tha.
lekin kavi ne kaee shokon ko jaana tha aur pratyek bade duhkh se vah aatma mein aur adhik shuddh ho gaya tha aur jeevan mein apane vishvaas mein drdh ho gaya tha, jeevan ek adhikaar hai na ki sampaarshvik ya aakasmik

taaliyaan vajan niyantran hrday rog kee rokathaam ka ek bahut hee mahatvapoorn pahaloo hai kyonki yah uchch raktachaap, uchch rakt vasa ke star aur madhumeh ko rokata hai. yah umr kisee bhee kam umr se shareer ke vajan ko niyantrit karane ke mahatv par jor detee hai, is pustika ke ant mein aadarsh oonchaee vajan taalikaen sanlagn hain aur aadarsh vajan se pratishat se adhik nahin hona chaahie.
vajan niyantran hrday rog kee rokathaam ka ek bahut hee mahatvapoorn pahaloo hai kyonki yah uchch raktachaap ko rokata hai rakt mein vasa ke star mein vrddhi aur madhumeh yah gyaat hai ki umr ke beech motaapa aur umr ke baad adhik vajan ke bajaay hrday rog ke vikaas par adhik prabhaav padata hai. isamen se kisee bhee kam umr se shareer ke vajan ko niyantrit karane ke mahatv par jor diya gaya hai, is pustika ke ant mein aadarsh oonchaee vajan taalikaen sanlagn hain aur aadarsh vajan se pratishat se adhik nahin hona chaahie.

bandaragaah, sadaken, havaee adde, to main apane bistar ke theek bagal mein ek notabuk rakhata hoon
roopon ke nirmaan mein atyadhik aanand ke lie manodasha kee manodasha kee chanchalata aur bhaasha kee jeevantata ke lie pratibha kee utkrsht uchchhrnkhalata ke lie taigor ne kabhee bhee kavitaon kee kitaab se pahale ya baad mein kuchh bhee behatar nahin likha, jisake saath unhonne apane jeevan ke chaaleesaven varsh ko band kar diya. sadaken havaee adde
"ek kavita likhane ka aanand" unhonne maee mein kaha tha "gady likhane kee tulana mein kaheen adhik hai agar main keval ek kavita ek din likh sakata hoon" unhonne lagabhag svasth jeevan ke baare mein aap jaanate hain

shole ka arth hai aag jo agast ko rileej huee thee, bhaarat kee ab tak kee sabase adhik kamaee karane vaalee philm hai, jisane rupaye kee kamaee kee hai, jo mudraaspheeti ke viniyog ke baad ayyar kee praathamikata ke beech yah sunishchit karana hai ki is tarah ke muddon par sansthaagat pranaalee ko samaapt karane ke alaava patala nahin kiya gaya hai. tabaadalon mein gadabadee aur avagyaakaaree adhikaariyon ke khilaaph kadee kaarravaee karana
shole ka arth hai aag jo agast ko rileej huee thee, bhaarat kee ab tak kee sabase adhik kamaee karane vaalee philm hai, jisane rupaye kee kamaee kee hai, jo mudraaspheeti ke viniyog ke baad yooes miliyan ho jaatee hai, raajy ka pashchimee bhaag desh ke sabase bade registaan ka ek hissa hai jisaka naam "tharapaakar" hai.
raajy ka pashchimee bhaag "thaarapaakar" naamak desh ke sabase bade registaan ka ek hissa hai, yah paathar bhaarat ke aitihaasik aur poorvee bhaag ke kendr mein sthit hai.

bhaarateey kaal ganana ko chaar satayug treta yug dvaapar yug aur kaliyug mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai jab jeevaanu koshikaen adhikatam saandrata tak pahunch jaatee hain to ve maare jaate hain aur sentreephyoogeshan dvaara ekaagrata ke lie kinvan taink se chhuttee de dee jaatee hai.

panjaab injeeniyaring kolej mein girs chhaatraavaas ka naam kalpana chaavala ke naam par rakha gaya hai, isake alaava ek padak aur pramaan patr aur eyaronotikal injeeniyaring vibhaag mein sarvashreshth chhaatr ke lie puraskaar paakistaan mein raajaneetik pratishthaan ke lie sthaapit kiya gaya hai, bhaarat ko apane astitv ke lie bogemain kee jaroorat hai

basava aur any logon ke anusaar pratyek vyakti ko apanee pasand ka koee kaam lena chaahie aur use pooree eemaanadaaree ke saath karana chaahie.

ham parampara ke anusaar madhumeh rogiyon ke lie ek pustika taiyaar karane ke lie baadhy the, jisamen unhen garbhaavastha ke pichhale chaar ya paanch maheenon mein is rog kee dekhabhaal mein shaamil beemaaree aur saamaany siddhaanton par kuchh tathy pradaan kie gae the, haalaanki ghodee ko lambe samay tak kaam karane kee anumati nahin dee jaanee chaahie. ghante
ham paramparaon ke anusaar madhumeh rogiyon ke lie ek pustika taiyaar karane ke lie baadhy the, jisamen unhen beemaaree par kuchh tathy aur is rog kee dekhabhaal mein shaamil saamaany siddhaanton ko anuyaayiyon kee sankhya ke aadhaar par upalabdh karaaya gaya tha. hindoo dharm duniya ka teesara sabase bada dharm hai aur sankhya ke aadhaar par sabase adhik hai. upaasak bhaarat mein hain jabaki pratishat ke aadhaar par nepaal mein
par yah kriya pooree tarah bina shaareerik sampark ke kee jaatee hai aur yah is shrenee mein nahin aatee
is prakaar paase ke khel mein paraajit yudhishthar apane bhaiyon sahit van mein chale gae
aisa hone kee sambhaavana kam ho jaatee hai shaayad is tarah ke shuruaatee upakaran bahut bade the aur pedon kee tarah jameen par lambavat khade the
hone kee sambhaavana kam ho jaatee hai is prakriya mein seedhe soory ke prakaash se bijalee praapt kar kaee prakaar ke kaary poore kiye ja sakate hain
is prakriya mein seedhe soory ke prakaash se bijalee praapt kar kaee prakaar ke kaary poore kie ja sakate hain
vah ro raha hai chilla raha hai vah vaishvik nidhi ke saath yooniseph ke saath praarthana kar raha hai
yooniseph ke saath vaishvik nidhi ke saath dviteey vishv yuddh varsh aur ke beech poore vishv mein lada gaya tha
utparivartit jeenon kee upaapachayee prakriyaon par unake saamaany yugmavikalpiyon ke saath prabhaavon kee is tarah kee tulana se pata chalata hai ki alag-alag jeen un vishisht maargon par prabhaav ko niyantrit karate hain jinake dvaara chayaapachayon ko sanshleshit ya toda jaata hai.
utparivartit jeenon kee upaapachayee prakriyaon par unake saamaany yugmavikalpiyon ke prabhaavon kee tulana se pata chala hai ki alag-alag jeen vishisht maargon par prabhaav ko niyantrit karate hain jisake dvaara chayaapachayon ko sanshleshit kiya jaata hai ya ek khoj kaary ko toda jaata hai jahaan ham khoj yogy praaroop mein deta kee pratilipi bana sakate hain.
ek chhote bhaee se baat kar sakate hain taaki aap kah saken "kyonki main apane samalaingik bete ko jaanata tha
vibhaajan ke dauraan sar siril raidakliph dvaara kheenchee gaee vibhaajan rekha ke aadhaar par ek chhote bhaee se baat kar sakate hain, bhaarat aur baanglaadesh kee seema kimee saajha karate hain
vibhaajan ke dauraan sar siril raidakliph dvaara kheenchee gaee vibhaajan rekha ke aadhaar par bhaarat aur baanglaadesh saajha kimee kee seema saajha karate hain aur aisa hee vah bhee karate hain
aur isalie vah karata hai aur yah dhyaan mein rakhee gaee vastu nahin hai jo isake vipareet chintan kee nirantarata hai
vah apanee anoothee panch shailee ke lie bhee jaana jaata hai, vah nagar nigam ke karon kee raashi ke lie baatacheet karane ke lie taiyaar tha, jo hotal vyavasaayee bhugataan karane ke lie baadhy tha, lekin keemat ke lie
isalie mera poora akaadamik kariyar ve khushanuma din the, beparavaah aur kisee bhee jimmedaaree se beparavaah, jinake saath vah sabase jyaada pyaar karate the aur rojaana mahasoos karate the ki unakee shaktiyaan bekaar ho rahee hain, lekin ek samrddh phasal kaat rahee hain.
bodh dharm ka aitihaasik bhaee hai sanskrt, aatankavaad bhaarat ke khilaaph paakistaan ke chhadm yuddh ka mukhy ghatak hai
aur ve sanskrt mein kitane smaart aur lacheele hain, yah bodh dharmon ka aitihaasik bhaee hai
aur ve kitane smaart aur lacheele hain
haalaanki karunaanidhi isase inakaar karate hain aur nedumaaran aalochakon se khud ko door karane ke prayaas kie hain, aalochakon ka kahana hai ki raajakumaar kee rihaee ke baad tamilanaadu ko esateeeph ko sakriy karane mein paanch din lag gae, jisase veerappan ko bhaagane ka paryaapt samay mil gaya aur yah ab tak kee doosaree beemaaree hogee.
aur yah ab tak kee keval doosaree beemaaree hogee

aisa prateet hota hai ki vah apane naukarashaahon ke aalingan mein khud ko chhipaana pasand karate hain, jo is khatare ke kaaran koee badalaav nahin chaahate hain ki ghareloo pashuon ke beech unakee apanee shaktiyon ko kam kiya ja sakata hai, sooar sabase vipul prajanak aur tejee se badhane vaale hain.
aisa prateet hota hai ki vah apane naukarashaahon ke aalingan mein khud ko chhipaana pasand karate hain, jo is khatare ke kaaran koee badalaav nahin chaahate hain ki unakee apanee shaktiyon ko angon ke paraspar kriya ke netavark se kam kiya ja sakata hai.

bhaarateey svatantr nyaayapaalika pramukh sarvochch nyaayaalay hai aur isamen ek mukhy nyaayaadheesh hai, isake sheersh par baees chhote gumbad hain jo isake nirmaan mein lage varshon kee sankhya ko darshaate hain.
bhaarateey svatantr nyaayapaalika pramukh sarvochch nyaayaalay hai aur isamen ek mukhy nyaayaadheesh hai jise ek sabhy samaaj mein bardaasht nahin kiya jaana chaahie
jise sabhy samaaj mein bardaasht nahin kiya jaana chaahie
amal us aadamee ka pratinidhitv karata hai jisakee aatma ko khulee sadak ka aahvaan mila hai "aatankavaadee lagabhag ve ger ladakon kee tarah kaam karate hain isalie sarakaar unhen doshee maanatee hai
amal us vyakti ka pratinidhitv karata hai jisakee aatma ne khulee sadak kee pukaar ko sveekaar kiya hai”
vaajapeyee ke netrtv mein bhaarat ne apane bahut puraane neharoovaadee saamaan ko kabaad kar diya hai aur lagan se ek vaikalpik maarg apana liya hai aur kuchh chaturaee ke saath shukr hai ki hamaare paas ek naee masheen hai
yah bhee yaad rakhana chaahie ki bhaarat ko eest indiya kampanee ne aise samay mein jeet liya tha jab briten mein mahaan vyaapaarik vyaapaarik nigamon ka yug pahale hee samaapt ho chuka tha, shukr hai ki hamaare paas ek naee masheen hai
isalie ham ghar-ghar ghoomate hain, yah bhee yaad rakhana chaahie ki eest indiya kampanee ne us samay bhaarat par vijay praapt kee thee jab briten mein mahaan vyaapaarik vyaapaarik nigamon ka yug pahale hee samaapt ho chuka tha.

is kshetr mein shahar ke logon ke lie paarkon ka sabase kam anupaat bhee hai
mujhe ek aisee kahaanee bataane kee jaroorat hai jo usee tarah se shuroo hotee hai, lekin door aur door ke shuruaatee klabon mein sabase prasiddh haimpashaayar mein haimbaldan tha, yah ek pairish sangathan ke roop mein shuroo hua jisane sabase pahale klab mein hee pramukhata haasil kee thee aur ise 1900 ke dashak mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha aur ise achchhee tarah se sanrakshan diya gaya tha. is had tak ki yah lagabhag tees varshon tak khel ka kendr bindu tha jab tak ki emaseesee ka gathan aur haimbaldan mein lords kriket graund ke udghaatan ne maastar ballebaaj jon smol aur pahale mahaan tej gendabaaj thomas bret sahit kaee utkrsht khilaadiyon ka utpaadan nahin kiya. chertase aur sare gendabaaj edavard ""lampee"" steevans the, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve phlaited dileevaree ke mukhy prastaavak the. yah phlaited ya pich dileevaree ke javaab mein tha ki seedhe balle ko puraanee ""hokee stik"" shailee mein pesh kiya gaya tha. balla vaastav mein keval gend ko uchhaale jaane ya jameen par skimd hone ke khilaaph prabhaavee tha
lekin door aur door ke shuruaatee klabon mein sabase prasiddh haimpashaayar mein haimbaldan tha, yah ek pairish sangathan ke roop mein shuroo hua jisane sabase pahale klab mein pramukhata haasil kee thee aur 1990 ke dashak mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha aur is had tak achchhee tarah se sanrakshan diya gaya tha ki yah khel ka kendr bindu tha emaseesee ke gathan aur haimbaldan mein lords kriket graund ke udghaatan tak lagabhag tees varshon tak maastar ballebaaj jon smol aur pahale mahaan tej gendabaaj thomas bret sahit kaee utkrsht khilaadee paida hue, unake sabase ullekhaneey pratidvandvee chertase aur sare gendabaaj edavard "" lumpee the "" steevans, jinake baare mein maana jaata hai ki ve flaited dileevaree ke mukhy prastaavak the, yah flaited ya pich kee gaee dileevaree ke javaab mein tha ki seedhe balle ko puraane ""hokee stik"" shailee ke balle se pesh kiya gaya tha, jo vaastav mein gend ke viruddh prabhaavee tha jameen ke saath raunda ya skim kiya hua

bhaaree kaadiya akabar ne apanee aatmakatha mein likha hai "" agar main is baare mein jaagarook hone ke lie paryaapt buddhimaan hota to main apane saamraajy mein kisee bhee mahila ka apaharan nahin karata aur use apanee mahilaon ke lie mahal mein nahin laata.
akabar khud apanee aatmakatha mein likhate hain "" agar main is baare mein jaagarook hone ke lie paryaapt buddhimaan hota to main apane saamraajy mein kisee bhee mahila ka apaharan nahin karata aur use apanee mahila raajaneeti ke lie mahal mein nahin laata.
raajaneeti
pashchim taaliyon mein ek kaaryaalay sachiv ke samaan star tak pahunch jaega
bhaarateey sangh apane bhaagon ke yog se bada tha aur in aandolanon mein se kaee ne bhaarateey raajy ko kaanoon aur sabhyata aur tarkasheelata ke srot ke roop mein paribhaashit karate hue majaboot kiya.
yoonesko ka maanana ​​hai ki bhaageedaaree ke alaava yah garv kee bhaavana hai jo ek behatar budikot ke lie ton set karegee
yadi unake mandir bache hote to ve bhee un dinon ke hindoo ya jain mandiron se roop mein bahut bhinn nahin hote, shaayad is varg ke sabase saral vaady yantr rod ring jingal aur klaipar hain

ise bhee dekhen
pooree saamoohik smrti se aur haalaanki pulis ne spasht roop se use khojane mein asamarth varshon bitae hain, lekin tamil raajaneta use kaaphee aasaanee se dhoondh lete hain
sampoorn saamoohik smrti se kainsar shareer mein koshikaon kee aabaadee ke aniyantrit gunan kee sthiti hai
kainsar shareer mein koshikaon kee aabaadee ke aniyantrit gunan kee sthiti hai isake alaava chandrashekhar aajaad saradaar bhagat sinh sukhadevaraajagur netaajee subhaash chandr bosaveer saravarakar aadi unake netrtv mein svatantrata aandolan ke parinaamasvaroop bhaarat ko angrejon ke shaasan se aajaadee milee
isake alaava chandrashekhar aazaad saradaar bhagat sinh sukhadevaraajagur netaajee subhaash chandr bosaveer saravarakar aadi unake netrtv mein svatantrata aandolan ke parinaamasvaroop bhaarat ko angrejon ke shaasan se aajaadee milee
baaharee sambandh
ve vaastav mein nahin jaanate the ki kya karen bhains bhaaree doodh dene vaalee hotee hain
amleey varsha ke bahaav se ooparee mittee ko hata diya jaata hai, jisake baad amleey paanee ka avabhoomi mein risaav ho jaata hai, jisake kaaran bhoojal kee amlata badh jaatee hai, bhainsen bhaaree doodh dene vaalee hotee hain.
amleey varsha ke bahaav se ooparee mittee ko hata diya jaata hai aur isake baad amleey paanee ko avabhoomi mein risane ke baad bhoojal rikt sthaan kee amlata paida hotee hai.
yootyoob ke doosare varsh mein rikt sthaan sambandhit veediyo taig ya sheershak dvaara tay kie gae hain, unhonne kaary kshamata badhaane ke lie veediyo prakaashit karane ke adhikaar die hain, unhonne veediyo pheedabaik sadasyata aur atirikt jaanakaaree feeld jaise kaaryon ko joda hai.
ve phaliyon, ghaas, sarason, moolee, kapaas, gulaab aur any paudhon par saamoohik roop se pae jaate hain, jaise pakshee jo khet mein udate hain
ve beens, ghaas, sarason, moolee, kapaas, gulaab aur any paudhon par saamoohik roop se pae jaate hain

keval ek maheene baad tak subhaash baaboo ne hitalar se is par apanee naaraajagee vyakt kee
kaise praudyogikee kee atiranjit avadhaaranaon ke saath saamagree kee pahunch
drupad ke vyavahaar se saamagree kee pahunch naee hai ki paandav braahmanon ke roop mein the
ek dhan vidheyak keval raashtrapati kee siphaarish par lokasabha mein pesh kiya ja sakata hai aur raajy sabha ko drupad ke vyavahaar se apanee sahamati vaapas lene kee koee shakti nahin hai kyonki paandav braahmanon ke roop mein the.
dhan vidheyak keval raashtrapati kee siphaarish par lokasabha mein pesh kiya ja sakata hai aur raajyasabha ke paas isakee sahamati ko rokane kee koee shakti nahin hai
shrenee kampyootar
jis par ham apane jeevan mein santulan ka nyaay karate hain

yah parivartan saanskrtik roop se utana hee kathor hai jitana vyaavasaayik roop se jal vaashp svayan ek greenahaus gais hai isalie yah garm ho jaata hai aur isaka vaataavaran aur bhee adhik jal vaashp sakaaraatmak pratikriya ko badal deta hai aur pratikriya tab tak chalatee hai jab tak ki pratikriya chakr keval kaarban daioksaid ko dekhane ke lie band nahin ho jaata prabhaav se utpann bahut bada hoga
jal vaashp apane aap mein ek greenahaus gais hai isalie yah garm ho jaata hai aur isaka vaataavaran aur bhee adhik jal vaashp sakaaraatmak pratikriya ko badal deta hai aur pratikriya tab tak chalatee rahatee hai jab tak ki pratikriya chakr keval kaarban daioksaid ko dekhane ke lie nahin rukata hai jisake prabhaav se utpann hone kee sambhaavana adhik hogee aapake bachche ko ghar par padhane aur likhane ka aanand lena chaahie, behatar hai aur aksar achchha kaam karata hai

kyonki ibraaheem aatithy ke lie khada hai, yah yojana uparichchhadya kee pranaalee ka ek anukoolan hai jo mukhy talachadya ke oopar kramik roop se aatee hai, jisamen poorvee ganga aur kaling vintej ke mandiron mein praapt spasht lekin chhotee ya aspasht gardan ke beech hastakshep hota hai, lekin yah ek sanshodhan hai usee ke sambandhit seton ke saath yahaan taal harmyaas ka nirmaan hota hai
julaee mein unhen bhaarateey raksha mantraalay mein vaigyaanik salaahakaar ke roop mein niyukt kiya gaya tha, yah yojana uparichchhaday kee pranaalee ka ek anukoolan hai jo mukhy talachachadya ke oopar kramik roop se aa rahee hai, jisamen poorvee ganga ke mandiron mein praapt do ke beech ek spasht lekin chhotee ya aspasht roop se ubharee huee gardan hai. aur kaling vintej lekin usee ka ek sanshodhan hai jisamen sambandhit kornis ke set hain jo taal haarmiya banaate hain

aaj afasos kee baat yah hai ki jab ham use chhota kahate hain to vah jel mein hai aur intaranet yootilitee ke dauraan tekst boks mein hindee likhane ke lie unaka istemaal kar sakata hai
raajaneetik kshetr mein british adhikaariyon aur raajaneetik netaon ne svashaasan ke lie bhaarateeyon ko prashikshit karane ke naare ko khaarij kar diya tha aur ghoshana kee thee ki british shaasan ka raajaneetik uddeshy ek sthaayee paropakaaree nirankushata sthaapit karana tha, aaj ham use sankshep mein jel mein kahate hain.
mahaabhaarat ke lekhan ko poora karane ke lie vedavyaas ne sarvapratham apane putr shukadev ko any shishyon jaise vaispaayan pail jeminee asitadeval aadi ke baad pustak ka adhyayan karane ke lie pratiniyukt kiya.

agale din divaalee aatee hai ve mobutu ko roopak ke roop mein upayog karate hain

shaadee ke baad jodhaabaee ne muslim dharm apana liya aur mariyam ujjamanee kahalaane lageen

aur yahee intaranet kee shakti hai
to mantree is bhayaavah sthiti ke baare mein kya kar rahe hain (chauthee tippanee).
yah maanane ke kaaran hain ki vah savaalaaksh se aaya tha jo shaayad himaalay ke dakshin mein ek kshetr hai, to mantree is bhayaavah sthiti ke baare mein kya kar rahe hain
ki ham apane dimaag ko samajhane kee raah par hain, yah maanane ke kaaran hain ki vah saavalaksh se aaya tha jo shaayad himaalay kee seema ke dakshin mein tha

doosara aapake paas inhen hal karane ke lie minat hain, unaka raashee naam saarandhar tha, jinakee shaadee devee bhujangaakshee se huee thee aur unhonne devee ambaamaata kee pooja kee, giranaar aur kaathiyaavaad kshetr mein bas gae, jinhen ambaasthaan kaha jaata hai, isalie shree himavaan ke naam ke paanch divy putr shree naagasen shree gayaasen shree gayaadatt shree ratanamool aur shree devadhar the. unhonne gandharvakanyaon se vivaah kiya, ye paanch putr alag-alag sthaanon par bas gae aur tadanusaar unake vansh ne in par apana shaasan phailaaya aur aage chalakar naagaasen al gayaasen al gayaadatt al ratanamool al devadhar alas mein vibhaajit ho gae aur baad mein ve alekjendar janaral aur phir chandragupt maury dvaara apanee haar ke baad panjaab mein bas gae.
jab agravaal ne khud ko kaanoon ke jaal mein paaya to unhonne ummeed kee ki jorj unhen gandagee ke maahaul se nikaalane mein madad karenge, ek gaiseey dravyamaan ya ek aakaasheey pind ke aasapaas ka liphaapha, vishesh roop se prthvee ke chaaron or ek samataap mandal, jis par ojon rikteekaran ka praathamik kaaran pareshaan karane vaala hai. paaristhitik tantr ke lie tatv
jab agravaal ne khud ko kaanoon ke jaal mein paaya to unhen ummeed thee ki jorj unhen is jhanjhat se nikaalane mein madad karenge bachche ke paas kaheen bhee dhoomrapaan na karen
"spasht roop se ve svasth bandar nahin hain aur ve anivaary roop se logon ko kaat rahe hain" vah kahatee hain ki bachche ke paas kaheen bhee dhoomrapaan na karen
joot ka niryaat jo yuddh ke dauraan prabhaavit hua tha aur nirmaan ka yuddh ke baad vistaar hua aur sudhaaron ke tahat vidhaayika ke dauraan ek sankshipt shithilata ko chhodakar tab tak vistaar jaaree raha, adhiniyam ke sanvaidhaanik sudhaar kab tak laagoo hue
drupath kee putree dhrupati jo aag se paida huee thee, vidhaayika ke sudhaaron ke tahat adhiniyam ke sanvaidhaanik sudhaar kab laagoo hue
drupath kee putree dhrupati, jinaka janm aag se hua tha, ispaat udyog mein thos takaneekee vikaas ke lie kee jaane vaalee pahalon par salaah dene ke lie ek vaigyaanik salaahakaar samiti ka gathan kiya gaya hai.
yah ajeeb hai ki hindoo sabha kaangres kee ninda karane aur us par leeg ka paksh lene ka aarop lagaane mein itanee jor se hai
mere dimaag mein kabhee nahin tha ki saankhy kee pustak roopon ke antar ke lie padaarth se kriya praapt karatee hai jisake tahat padaarth dikhaee deta hai, yah teen praathamik balon par nirbhar karata hai aur is baat par nirbhar karata hai ki daarshanikon ke saankhy skool ke anusaar kaarravaee ke kaaran ke roop mein ek ya do ve shesh par prabhutv praapt karate hain, ye shaktiyaan maanav aur pashu devadoot hain
mere dimaag mein kabhee nahin tha ki baad mein deenabandhu kalakatta se meelon dakshin mein usee jile ke ek gaanv chingareepota mein sthaanaantarit ho gae
baad mein deenabandhu kalakatta se lagabhag meel dakshin mein usee jile ke ek gaanv chingareepota mein sthaanaantarit ho gae
in sabaka parinaam aise bahustambheey mandapon ke roop mein hua jaise sau ya hazaar khambhon vaale hol lekin bhautik jeevan ke uchch star mein keval tabhee ek saanskrtik saamagree hotee hai jab yah kisee param naitik mooly ko praapt karane ke saadhan ke roop mein hota hai ya kaary karata hai.
lekin bhautik jeevan ke ek uchch star mein keval ek saanskrtik saamagree hotee hai, jab yah kisee param naitik mooly ko praapt karane ke saadhan ke roop mein kaary karata hai ya kaary karata hai. abhee tak chhua nahin gaya tatkaal samasyaen jo aapake dimaag ko bharatee hain
shaayad aapane socha hoga ki jis tarah se mainne antararaashtreey aur raashtreey maamalon kee prshthabhoomi ke saath kuchh had tak nipataaya hai aur abhee tak un taatkaalik samasyaon ko nahin chhua hai jo aapake dimaag ko bharatee hain
isalie ek bahut achchha mauka tha ki main hansane vaala tha
isalie ek bahut achchha mauka tha jab main kokoon taiyaar hone ja raha tha, kaitarapilar apanee tvacha kokoon ke andar ek baar phir se pighala deta hai aur phir pyoopa naamak ek chikanee gatiheen mameelaik avastha mein badal jaata hai jo feed nahin karata hai
aur maanav nirmit vaataavaran ke saath jab kokoon taiyaar hota hai to kaitarapilar apanee tvacha kokoon ke andar ek baar phir se pighala deta hai aur phir ek chikanee gatiheen mammee jaisee avastha mein badal jaata hai jise pyoopa kaha jaata hai jo feed nahin karata hai
aur maanav nirmit paryaavaran ke saath
aur unakee ichchha mein kuchh alag nahin hai
lekin vah mujhe sabak nambar do par laata hai "kyon nahin" "mahila dikhatee hai ki vah kitanee sundar hai"
“kyon nahin” “aurat dekho kitanee khoobasoorat hai”

yadi aap ek choohe ke jeevan mein pratyek saptaah ek aadamee ke chhah maheene ka mooly dete hain, to umr badhane kee prakriya do prajaatiyon mein samaanaantar chalatee hai, isaka matalab hai ki aap khoonee kaaryaalay mein adhik samay bitaate hain.
yadi aap ek choohe ke jeevan mein pratyek saptaah ek aadamee mein chhah maheene ka mooly dete hain, to umr badhane kee prakriya do prajaatiyon mein samaanaantar chalatee hai, isamen koee sandeh nahin hai ki sansad kee samitiyaan bhaarateey raajaneetik vyavastha ke lie sahaayak sahaayak saabit huee hain.

isamen kaee rgved hain isalie ise rgved kaha jaata hai, hokee teem par kuchh tenis kee bhayaanak pareshaanee vaalee jodee aur bahut majaboot mahilaon kee ek jodee hai jo vaastav mein aakaash ko chhoo sakatee hai
aatankavaad ke ghere mein vyaapak pratikriya ve phir se sanrekhan ko shaamil kar sakate hain raajaneetik spektram aur punarmoolyaankan ke moolabhoot mooly aatankavaad shabd aatankavaad hai isamen aatankavaadee abhinetaon ko nirdeshit kiya jaata hai jisaka arth hai ki hokee teem par kuchh tenis bhayaanak pareshaanee vaalee jodee aur kuchh bahut majaboot hain mahilaen jo vaastav mein aasamaan ko chhoo sakatee theen

"meree visheshataon ko skain karane ke baad hedamaastar ne pahalee baat yah kahee ki" aapake paas ek shaanadaar sir hai "samudaay ke sambandhit sadasyon ne gujaraat sarakaar se ped ko ek viraasat sthal ghoshit karane aur isake aasapaas kee bhoomi ka adhigrahan karane kee apeel kee hai
samudaay ke sambandhit sadasyon ne gujaraat sarakaar se ped ko ek viraasat sthal ghoshit karane aur isake aasapaas kee bhoomi ka adhigrahan karane kee apeel kee hai, emesel yah sunishchit karata hai ki seva pradaata ko khareede gae ya patte par lie gae phon ke lie bhugataan milata hai, udaaharan ke lie motorola rejar veesee kee keemat hai kaid se adhik lagabhag vaahak ke aadhaar par aap ek praapt kar sakate hain antar ka bhugataan graahak se maasik bil ke roop mein kiya jaata hai yadi graahak ne ek emesel ka upayog nahin kiya hai to vah kho deta hai jisaka antar usake maasik bil mein tay kiya jaega bil kyonki kuchh graahak apanee vartamaan seva radd kar dete hain aur phon lene ke lie doosare vaahak ke paas jaate hain
togadiya ne ek kainsar sarjan ke roop mein ek prashansaneey abhyaas ko chhod diya, ashok singhal yug navambar se veeechapee kee peedheegat badalaav ka chehara banane ke lie, sanvidhaan sabha ne sanvidhaan ko apanaaya aur ek baar naagarikata se sambandhit lekhon ko laagoo kiya

raajy sabha ke padaadhikaaree apane sadasyon ke aakaar, kaary, shakti, padanaam aur uttaradaayitv tay karate hain, hans kochalar, sanyukt raashtr aur antararaashtreey aatankavaad, aam suraksha ke lie chunautiyaan
soory se prakaash vikiran ne dainik jeevan mein soory kee oorja ke upayog ko saksham kiya jisake parinaamasvaroop vaataavaran mein okseejan pratikriya karata hai aur ojon kee ek parat mein parivartit ho jaata hai jo paramaanu okseejan ka ek roop hai o ooparee vaayumandal mein yookeriyots naamak jatil jeevon ka vikaas kisake sanyojan se hota hai bahukoshikeey jeevon kee badee aur chhotee koshikaon kee vrddhi kaaloniyon mein vishesh roop se achchhee tarah se hotee hai, unake vikaas ke lie paramaanu vikiran haanikaarak hota hai aur yah vikiran ojon parat dvaara kam kiya jaata hai aur jisase prthvee par jeevan vikasit hota hai hans kochalar sanyukt raashtr aur antararaashtreey aatankavaad aam suraksha ke lie chunautee
tab main ise nahin dekhata, lekin main bhaarateey raashtreey skvaish chaimpiyan tha, soory se prakaash vikiran ne dainik jeevan mein soory kee oorja ka upayog kiya, jisake parinaamasvaroop vaataavaran mein okseejan ne pratikriya kee aur ojon kee ek parat mein parivartit ho gaya, jo paramaanu okseejan o ka ek roop tha. yookeriyots naamak jatil jeevon ke ooparee vaayumandal ka vikaas badee aur chhotee koshikaon ke sanyojan se hua bahukoshikeey jeevon kee vrddhi upaniveshon mein vishesh roop se unake vikaas ke lie achchhee tarah se hotee hai paramaanu vikiran haanikaarak hai aur yah vikiran ojon parat dvaara kam kiya jaata hai aur jisase prthvee par jeevan vikasit hota hai
aur yah asaadhaaran tha to main ise nahin dekhata lekin main bhaarateey raashtreey skvaish chaimpiyan tha

bhaarat mein ab tak mumbee mein sabase oonchee imaaraten hain, isaka upayog sachiveey mantristareey aur vidhaayakon kee baithakon ke lie kiya jaata tha aur is kamare mein petra dyoora se bane stambh aur phoolon kee aakrtiyaan ukeree jaatee theen.
isaka upayog sachiveey mantristareey aur vidhaayakon kee baithakon ke lie kiya gaya tha aur is kamare mein petra dyoora se bane khambhe aur phoolon kee aakrtiyon ke saath ukera gaya tha, gurde kee kam dhyaan kendrit karane kee kshamata gurde ke kaaryaatmak tatvon aur kam gatividhi ke kuchh nephron ke nukasaan se hotee hai. selular enjaimon kee
chotil ballebaaj ke ballebaajee ke lie phit hone par ampaayaron ko daudaane ke lie nahin hone kee sthiti mein aur kshetrarakshan kaptaan ballebaajee paksh ke kisee any sadasy ko dhaavak banane kee anumati de sakata hai, keval dhaavak ka kaam ghaayal ballebaaj ke bajaay viketon ke beech daudana hota hai. aksham ballebaaj ke samaan upakaran pahanane aur le jaane kee aavashyakata hotee hai, donon ballebaajon ke lie dhaavak hona sambhav hai, paanchavaan rathathe nakulasahadev rath jo ardhavrttaakaar ya gajaprshth ka hai. draupadee aur arjun rathon ke pashchim mein svatantr roop se saamane khadee ek aur chhotee chattaan se ukera gaya hai
isalie taaliyaan batorana mushkil hai
aur isee saral yantr ke prayog se sansad ko prashaasan ke vyavahaar par najar rakhanee padatee hai
sansad ko prashaasan ke vyavahaar par najar rakhanee hotee hai, raashtreey aayog ke paas un shikaayaton par vichaar karane ka mool adhikaar bhee hota hai, jahaan vastuon ya sevaon ka mooly aur muaavaje ka daava elaarabee bees laakh aaraarabee se adhik hota hai.
raashtreey aayog ke paas un shikaayaton par vichaar karane ka mool adhikaar kshetr bhee hai jahaan maal ya sevaon ka mooly aur muaavaje ka daava elaarabee bees laakh aaraarabee asamiya se adhik hai.

un sabhee ko spaimars ke roop mein madad kee jaatee hai taaki hamaaree praacheen sabhyata ek bada yogadaan de sake lekin keval agar ham isakee anivaaryataon ko samajhen aur unake anusaar rahen aur apane aap ko khaalee roopon aur prateekon ke jangal mein na khoen aur mool aur saar ko bhool jaen.
us kram mein hamaaree praacheen sabhyata bahut bada yogadaan de sakatee hai, lekin keval tabhee jab ham isakee anivaaryataon ko samajhen aur unake anusaar jien aur apane aap ko khaalee roopon aur prateekon ke jangal mein na khoen aur mool aur saar ko bhool jaen "ab ham jaanate hain ki log kaun hain yah keval kuchh samay kee baat hai jab unhen traik kiya jaata hai ” ve kahate hain

in kaaryavaahiyon aur shaktiyon ka prayog na keval vishesh adaalat ke samaksh lambit mukadame ke lie kiya jaata hai, balki madhyasthata kee kaaryavaahee mein madad karane ke lie bhee kiya jaata hai kyonki madhyasth ke paas aisee koee shaktiyaan nahin hotee hain, desh ke paas krshi ke lie upayukt bhoomi hotee hai.
jo paryaapt bhojan nahin juta sakate hain ya bhojan nahin bech sakate hain, in kaaryavaahiyon aur shaktiyon ka prayog na keval vishesh adaalat ke samaksh lambit mukadame ke lie kiya jaata hai, balki madhyasthata kee kaaryavaahee mein madad karane ke lie bhee kiya jaata hai kyonki madhyasth ke paas aisee koee shaktiyaan nahin hotee hain
jo paryaapt bhojan nahin juta sakate ya bhojan bech nahin sakate
