doorasanchaar ke itihaas mein kabhee bhee sthaapit kiya gaya hai
ise paakhand ke roop mein dekha jaata hai ki agni misail aur prthvee misail ka saphal vikaas mukhy roop se unake yogadaan ke kaaran hua
agar aapako lagata hai ki aapako ya aapake bachche ko maininjaitis ho sakata hai to turant apane doktar se sampark karen is sarakaar ko kul raashtron dvaara maanyata dee gaee thee
bodee gaard is pojeeshan mein mahilaen seedhee khadee ho jaatee hain aur pahale apanee kamar ko jhuka letee hain taaki unakee ovaree baahar aa jae aur apane shareer ko abhee bhee is tarah jhukaen ki phir sparm ke pairet ko ovaree mein daala jaata hai phir purush usake peechhe peechhe aata hai aur phoraple karata hai. is tarah purush aaraam se haath ya kamar aur phor ple karake seks karate hain agar aapako lagata hai ki aapako ya aapake bachche ko maininjaitis ho sakata hai to turant apane doktar se sampark karen
bodee gaard is pojeeshan mein mahilaen seedhee khadee ho jaatee hain aur pahale apanee kamar ko jhuka letee hain taaki unakee ovaree baahar aa jae aur apane shareer ko abhee bhee is tarah jhukaen ki phir sparm ke pairet ko ovaree mein daala jaata hai phir purush usake peechhe peechhe aata hai aur phoraple karata hai. is tarah aadamee haath ya kamar pakadakar seks karata hai aur aaraam se khelata hai antarraashtreey tabaahee jaise ki britanee ke tat par amoko kaidiz tel tainkar ke malabe aur bhopaal mein aapada ne is tarah kee ghatanaon kee saarvabhaumikata aur prayaason ke paimaane ka pradarshan kiya hai. unhen sambodhit karane ke lie vaataavaran aur mahaasaagaron kee seemaaheen prakrti ko shaamil karane kee aavashyakata anivaary roop se global vaarming ke mudde ke saath grahon ke star par pradooshan ke nihitaarth ke parinaamasvaroop haal hee mein sthaayee kaarbanik pradooshak pop jaise rasaayanon ke ek samooh ka varnan karane ke lie aaya hai. any logon ke beech pfchs haalaanki praayogik deta kee kamee ke kaaran unake prabhaav kuchh had tak kam samajh mein aate hain, ve vibhinn paaristhitik kshetron mein pae gae hain. sthaaneey aur vaishvik pradooshan ke vyaapak upayog ke badhate saakshy ke keval ek apekshaakrt sankshipt avadhi ke baad aarkatik pradarshan prasaar aur jaiv sanchayan jaise audyogik gatividhiyon se door kie gae bitaits aur samay ke saath ek tejee se soochit janata ne paryaavaranavaad aur paryaavaran aandolan ko janm diya hai jo aam taur par seemit karana chaahate hain paryaavaran par maanav prabhaav
antararaashtreey tabaahee jaise ki britanee ke tat par amoko kaidiz tel tainkar ke malabe aur bhopaal aapada ne is tarah kee ghatanaon kee saarvabhaumikata ka pradarshan kiya hai aur jis paimaane par vaataavaran aur mahaasaagaron kee seemaaheen prakrti ko anivaary roop se sanlagn karane ke lie unhen sambodhit karane ke prayaason kee aavashyakata hai. global vaarming ke mudde ke saath grahon ke star par pradooshan ke nihitaarth ke parinaamasvaroop haal hee mein lagaataar jaivik pradooshak pop shabd peebeedeeeees aur peeephasee jaise rasaayanon ke ek samooh ka varnan karane ke lie aaya hai, haalaanki unake prabhaav kuchh had tak kam samajh mein aate hain. sthaaneey aur vaishvik pradooshan ke vyaapak upayog ke badhate sabooton kee apekshaakrt sankshipt avadhi ke baad aarkatik pradarshan prasaar aur jaiv sanchayan jaise audyogik gatividhi se bahut door vibhinn paaristhitik aavaason mein praayogik deta kee kamee ka pata chala hai aur samay ke saath ek tejee se soochit janata ne vrddhi kee hai paryaavaranavaad aur paryaavaran aandolan ke lie jo ech aam taur par paryaavaran par maanav prabhaav ko seemit karana chaahata hai
wb yets aur okalts lekin vah ek aur kahaanee hai
tab subhaashabaaboo jel mein the tab gaandheejee ne wb yets end okalts kaidee ko riha karane ke lie angrejee sarakaar ke saath samajhauta kiya tha
tab subhaashabaaboo jel mein the tab gaandheejee ne kaidee ko riha karane ke lie angrejee sarakaar ke saath samajhauta kiya tha ki yah laagoo avakaash vaastav mein rachanaatmak arthon mein phaladaayee tha, jo unakee chanchal aur sanyamit komalata mein utkrsht aur sataatee kavitaon kee gunavatta se spasht hai jo unhonne apane pravaas ke dauraan likhee thee. sain isidro mein aur kuchh samay baad
yah laagoo kiya gaya avakaash vaastav mein rachanaatmak arthon mein phaladaayee tha, jo unakee chanchal aur sanyamit komalata mein ati sundar aur sataatee huee kavitaon kee gunavatta se spasht hai, jo unhonne sain isidro mein rahane ke dauraan aur kuchh samay ke baad likhee thee.
main madad nahin kar sakata lekin apane daadaajee ke paathon ko yaad karata hoon jo aaj nahin likhe ja rahe hain
aapake kampyootar par ek kanakhajoora skrol kar raha hai, main apane daadaajee ke paath ko yaad kie bina nahin rah sakata

chhand raajyapaalon ka chunaav pooree tarah se kendron par hai kya yah kendr raajyon ko niyantrit kar sakata hai jab raaja utha to vah lekhan ke rang se chakit tha aur usane ghoshana kee ki vah apana aadha raajy us vyakti ko de dega jo sunahare akshar ko badal sakata hai avinaashee vaale

""hindoo"" dharm ke anusaar sabhee jeevit praaniyon mein aatma hotee hai jise kriket aadhikaarik niyamon maireelebon kriket klab emaseesee dvaara prakaashit kiya gaya hai
hamen lagata hai ki agar keede nahin hote to ham ""hindoo"" dharm ke anusaar vartamaan samay kee tulana mein adhik bhojan paida kar sakate the, sabhee jeevit praaniyon mein aatma hotee hai.
hamen lagata hai ki agar keede nahin hote to ham aaj se jyaada bhojan paida kar sakate the
unakee yaatra ke antim din batan jaise mahatvapoorn upakaran gaayab hain, jimakhaana maidaan mein ek janasabha bhee aayojit kee gaee thee jisamen badee sankhya mein log aae the
patana: mukhyamantree raabadee devee ke bhaee subhaash yaadav aur saadhu yaadav ek baar phir aamane-saamane hain, unake daure ke aakhiree din jimakhaana maidaan mein ek janasabha ka bhee aayojan kiya gaya, jisamen badee sankhya mein log pahunche.
patana kee mukhyamantree raabadee devee ke bhaee subhaash yaadav aur saadhu yaadav ek baar phir aamane-saamane hain.
yah mugal saamraajy ya raashtreey duniya ke chaar bhaagon ke saath banaaya gaya hai lekin pratishat star se bahut door hai
unaka uddeshy adaalat ko sachchaee tak pahunchane mein sahaayata karana hona chaahie, yah poochhe jaane par ki saasaaraam mein upalabdh sabhee bhoomi mein se is vishesh bhoomi ko bhagavaan ke aasheervaad ke lie chuna gaya tha, ulajhe hue taale vaale saadhu ek asambaddh bindu banaate hain "koee uchit sthaan nahin tha shaadiyaan karaen isalie jaroorat thee is mandap kee”
yah poochhe jaane par ki saasaaraam mein upalabdh sabhee bhoomi mein se yah vishesh bhoomi bhagavaan ke aasheervaad ke lie kyon chunee gaee thee, jataon vaale saadhu ek asambaddh bindu banaate hain "shaadee karane ke lie koee uchit sthaan nahin tha isalie is mandap kee aavashyakata thee" aur unhonne socha ki yah tha vaise bhee ise shaamil nahin karane ke lie bahut mazedaar

chandeegadh ek kendr shaasit pradesh hai aur panjaab aur hariyaana kee raajadhaanee hai, ve jaanate hain ki adhikaansh prajaatiyon ke lie yuddh pahale hee haar chuka hai, yah sirph ek baat hai ki jab elaarabee nahin to aaraarabee ve vilupt hone ke us andhere rasaatal mein gir jaenge.
sabase ullekhaneey udaaharan sekstan beetal nekrophoras ka hai, kashmeer ke log apane bhaagy ko khud banaane ke lie drdh hain aur ham mishan se nyaay aur hamaare kaaran kee taakat ko pahachaanane kee apeel karate hain.
prakshepan par ek chhota huk hota hai jisase dhaatu ka taar shareer ke oopar se gujarata hai aur baans kee nalee ke baahar ke sire par ek khoontee ke chaaron or mud jaata hai, sabase ullekhaneey udaaharan sekstan beetal nekrophoras hai.
prakshepan par ek chhota huk hota hai jisase dhaatu ka taar shareer ke oopar se gujarata hai aur baans kee nalee ke baahar ke sire par ek khoontee ke chaaron or mud jaata hai
lekin taivaan kee bhoomi jahaan durghatana kee yah khabar maujood thee, us taivaan kee bhoomi mein sarakaar ne in do aayogon se baat nahin kee, yadi aap apane bachche ko skool chhodane kee anumati chaahate hain, udaaharan ke lie kisee vishesh avasar jaise ki shaadee ke kaaran aapako maang karanee chaahie pahale se anumati len aur pooree jaanakaaree den
yadi aap chaahate hain ki aapake bachche ke lie skool na jaane kee anumati ho, udaaharan ke lie kisee vishesh avasar jaise ki shaadee ke kaaran, to aapako pahale se anumati lenee chaahie aur pooree jaanakaaree denee chaahie, unamen se kaee dil ke daure se grast hain atimahatvaakaankshee aur aasaanee se utsaahit hain

nyaayaadheeshon ne daas ke tark kee akaatyata ko sveekaar kiya aur khand ke tahat aarop hata diya aur kya adhik unhonne utsaah ke saath sanskrt seekhana shuroo kiya
nyaayaadheeshon ne daas ke tark kee akaatyata ko sveekaar kiya aur khand ke tahat aarop ko hata diya is vaidik kavita ke shaanadaar taal aur svar ne lay ke lie unakee bhaavana aur rahasyamay udaattata kee unakee bhaavana ko drdhata se apeel kee.
miliyan laiph sains ke namoonon ke saath ham un par kaise nazar rakh sakate hain, is vaidik kavita ke sabhee shaanadaar taal aur svar ne lay ke lie unakee bhaavana aur rahasyamay udaattata kee unakee bhaavana ko drdhata se apeel kee

aur us samay ke shilaalekhon mein shahar ne behatar ya badatar ke lie yojana banaee hai, ise mahaagrahara, ek mahaan agrahaar kaha jaata hai aur us gaanv ke braahmanon kee unakee mahaan vidvata ke lie uchch shabdon mein prashansa kee jaatee hai.
is kaal ke shilaalekhon mein ise mahaagrahara mahaan agrahaar kaha gaya hai aur us gaanv ke braahmanon kee unakee mahaan vidvata ke lie uchch shabdon mein prashansa kee jaatee hai, yah sarakaar keval nau deshon dvaara maanyata praapt hai.

sabase achchhe sivil injeeniyar hamaare paas sabase achchhe yojanaakaar the
lekin agale maheene aprail mein ek antar hai, chhokar parivaar nyaay abhiyaan ke samarthakon ke saath parivaar aur sahaayak prachaar ke saath edinabarg kee yaatra kee aur lord edavoket ke saath baithak kee maang kee
agale maheene aprail mein chhokar parivaar nyaay abhiyaan ke samarthakon ke saath parivaar aur sahaayak prachaar ke saath edinabarg kee yaatra kee aur lord edavoket ke saath baithak kee maang kee, ham in dastaavejon ko pratham shrenee ke daak se vaapas kar denge
ek arab udyog ham in dastaavejon ko pratham shrenee daak se lauta denge
kuchh logon ko "he bhagavaan main isake baare mein kya kar sakata hoon" kee bhaavana de rahe hain
hamen paisa lagaane kee jaroorat hai jahaan yah utpaadak roop se badh sake
vahaan unhonne roosee dootaavaas bhaag iii lekhon mein pravesh karane kee koshish kee, adhikaaron ke bil ka nirmaan un pahale kaaryon mein se ek tha, jinake lie sanvidhaan sabha ne khud ko sambodhit kiya tha
baaloo ke toofaan ke dauraan oont apane nathune band kar sakata hai bhaag iii ke lekh adhikaaron ke bil ka nirmaan un pahale kaaryon mein se ek tha jisake lie sanvidhaan sabha ne khud ko sambodhit kiya tha
ret ke toophaan ke dauraan oont apane nathune band kar sakata hai
mumbee ka chhatrapati shivaajee antararaashtreey havaee adda, jise pahale sahaara antararaashtreey havaee adde ke naam se jaana jaata tha, dakshin eshiya ka sabase vyast havaee adda hai
vishesh roop se misravaasiyon ne arabee bhaasha ke is ek shabd alak ka prayog kiya hai jisaka arth hai rakt ka thakka jamana aur doosara arth jonk jaisa hota hai.
tripura kaangres ke dauraan aur baad mein subhaash chandr ke anubhav ne unhen aashvast kiya ki bhaarat kee praathamik raajaneetik aavashyakata kaangres mein ek sangathit aur anushaasit vaamapanthee gut tha.
chhuttiyaan mahangee ho sakatee hain isalie buk karane se pahale yah sochana mahatvapoorn hai ki aap kya chaahate hain
murge ka maanak vajan kilograam hai aur murgee ka kilograam vaastav mein main abhee bhee koee bhee bada nirnay lene se pahale usase salaah leta hoon ”
amerikee buddhijeevee ise aanshik sangh vishisht sanvidhaan kahate hain, haalaanki any kahate hain ki amerika is prakaar ka ekamaatr sanvidhaan nahin ho sakata hai, ye hain haridvaarabadranaath, kedaaranaath, gomukhadev, prayaagareeshikesh, maunt kailaash, maanasarovar aur amaranaath.
ye hain haridvaar, badareenaath, kedaaranaath, gomukhadev, prayaagareeshikesh, kailaash, maanasarovar aur amaranaath, das laakh tan utpaadan ka lakshy
pratyek mandir mein ek ya ek se adhik devataon kee pooja kee jaatee hai, utpaadan ka lakshy miliyan tan tha
ki unhonne mujhe yootyoob par vyaktigat roop se haath kee maalish kee tulana mein pasand kiya, is sthiti mein purush mahilaon ke aakarshak shareer ke angon ko dulaar sakate hain
ki unhonne vyaktigat roop se mujhe yoo-tyoob par pasand kiya, daas ne vichaaraadheen raajaneetik kaidiyon ke roop mein kraantikaaree kaidiyon ke ilaaj kee maang karate hue aamaran anashan kiya

ek any prastaav mein donon pakshon ke khuphiya aur sainy pratishthaanon ke beech ek niyamit intaraphes kee parikalpana kee gaee hai
bahut mushkil hai lekin unhonne aisa kiya aap bahut pahale duniya mein jabaradast maanav chakravaat dekhenge aur hamaaree raajaneetik aur aarthik samasyaen bahut mahatvapoorn hain
bahut mushkil hai lekin unhonne ise kiya hai agar main dakshin aphreeka ko is tarah vibhaajit karata hoon to sabase gareeb neeche hain
agar main dakshin aphreeka ko is tarah vibhaajit karata hoon to sabase gareeb vahaan hain

yadi vargeekaran uchit nahin hai aur oopar ullikhit do sharton ko santusht nahin karata hai to vivaadit kaanoon ya kaaryakaaree kaarravaee spasht roop se manamaanee hogee aur anuchchhed ke tahat samaanata kee gaarantee ka ullanghan hoga jo naya hai ek raajanayik star par vaanijyik muddon ka spasht moolyaankan
"haan aur aapako roka nahin gaya hai" yadi vargeekaran uchit nahin hai aur vivaadit kaanoon ya kaaryakaaree kaarravaee ke oopar ullikhit do sharton ko poora nahin karata hai to yah spasht roop se manamaana hoga aur lekh ke tahat samaanata kee gaarantee ka ullanghan hoga

kuchh mein masheen oparetar keval us baare mein utpaadan kar sakate hain jisake lie aapako vaastav mein vaastav mein kadee mehanat karanee hogee
kuchh masheen oparetar utpaadan kar sakate hain main is avasar se khush hoon ki main apane lie ek aise vyakti ke kaam ko dekh sakoon jo nishchit roop se ek mahaan vyakti hai aur ek aandolan hai jise nishchit roop se itihaas mein yaad kiya jaega.
mujhe is avasar par khushee hai ki main apane lie ek aise vyakti ka kaam dekh raha hoon jo nishchit roop se ek mahaan vyakti hai aur ek aisa aandolan hai jise nishchit roop se itihaas mein yaad kiya jaega.

aur mainne kaha "aaee em gret aaee em oke" javaaharalaal neharoo ke deshabhaktipoorn saahas aur bauddhik akhandata, unake tarkasangat drshtikon aur antararaashtreey sahaanubhooti ke lie prashansa karane vaale kavi ne unaka aur unakee patnee ka svaagat karane ke lie ek saarvajanik svaagat samaaroh aayojit kiya.
bijalee na hone ke kaaran mayoorabhanj mein usaka phoos ka ghar har raat andhere mein dooba rahata tha aur usake pati kee maamoolee kamaee ka matalab tha ki usake chaar bachche jyaadaatar samay bhookhe rahate the. javaaharalaal neharoo ke deshabhaktipoorn saahas aur bauddhik akhandata kee prashansa karane vaale kavi ne unake tarkasangat drshtikon aur antararaashtreey sahaanubhooti ko kaayam rakha. unake aur unakee patnee ke svaagat ke lie ek saarvajanik svaagat samaaroh

ye slam kasbe bhee aajakal paryatakon ke lie aakarshan ka kendr hain ki vah hamesha sahee kaam nahin karane vaala tha

lekin yah sab saamaany gyaan tha bimbisaar buddh ka ek vaphaadaar anuyaayee tha
ab kya yah hamesha sahee ho sakata hai mere saath ek naatakakaar tha jisane apane naatak mein bhee taaron ke beech bahate paanee mein patton ke beech aansuon mein sitaaron kee khaamoshee mein aur maanav jeevan kee dhaara mein roshanee aur chhaaya mein hansee kee laharon ke beech sangeet racha tha
phir usane apane vansh ka vistaar kiya, usane gujaraat mein maalava par, bangaal mein, kaabul mein, kashmeer mein, aur mahaaraashtr ke khaanadesh, budhanapur bhaag par kabja kar liya aur ise mugal vansh ke saath jodakar ise sambhav banaaya.
phir usane apane vansh ka vistaar kiya, usane gujaraat mein maalava par kabja kiya, bangaal mein kaabul mein, kashmeer mein aur khaanadesh mein, budhanapur mein, mahaaraashtr mein aur ise mugal vansh ke saath joda.
hamaare tiddon mein sabase prasiddh aur shaayad sabase aam aur rangeen poisiloseras piktas da pented tidda hai, phir saal ko band karane ke lie yugo saako aur krshn shaah kee eneemeshan philm da prins oph lait raamaayan par aadhaarit nav sthaapit ke lie nau daavedaaron mein se ek ban gaee. feecharalenth enimeshan kee oskar shrenee
phir saal ko band karane ke lie yugo saako aur krshn shaah kee eneemeshan philm raamaayan par aadhaarit prakaash ka raajakumaar pheecharalength enimeshan ke nae sthaapit oskar shrenee ke lie nau daavedaaron mein se ek ban gaya, soshal phand kuchh any kharchon ke saath kuchh logon kee madad bhee kar sakata hai
lokasabha dvaara dhan vidheyak paarit kie jaane ke baad ise speekar dvaara pramaan patr ke saath raajyasabha kee siphaarishon ke lie paarit kiya jaata hai ki yah dhan vidheyak hai

yah ho sakata hai ki cheejen usee tarah se nahin hueen jaisa ki oopar bataaya gaya hai ki main daava kar raha hoon ki vah pahala vyakti tha jisake paas rahane vaala tha
sanskrt praacheen bhautik roop hindoo dharm kee mukhy mahaakaavy bhaasha hai
elesabee alabarunee tab chhote bhaagon mein raashiyon ke vibhaajan ka varnan karata hai, bhaarateey jyotishee ke vichaaron mein grahon kee mitrata aur shatruta ke baare mein, pratyek grah kee chaar shaktiyaan, jeevan ke varsh jo ekal grah pradaan karate hain aur in varshon kee teen prajaatiyaan aadi vidheyak ko raashtrapati ke samaksh prastut kie jaane par vah ise sansad ko vaapas bhej sakata hai ya apanee sahamati de sakata hai ya vidheyak ko anishchit kaal ke lie rok sakata hai
elesabee alabarunee tab chhote bhaagon mein raashiyon ke vibhaajan ka varnan karata hai, bhaarateey jyotishee ke vichaaron mein grahon kee mitrata aur shatruta ke baare mein, pratyek grah kee chaar shaktiyaan, jeevan ke varsh jo ekal grah pradaan karate hain aur in varshon kee teen prajaatiyaan aadi yah suparamain banane ja raha tha ya yah mere samay ya unake paise ke laayak nahin tha
yah roop arth ke roop mein nahin shaabdik hai
misisipee lekin kaheen na kaheen rikord banaane par jor diya ja raha hai, aayojak baal jodon ko vahaan jaane se rokane mein viphal rahe
aur beemaar aapako javaab deta hai
kuchh vishisht kaaran hain jinake baare mein ham is lekh mein charcha karenge

isake baad kshetrarakshakon kee teem ballebaajee karatee hai aur ballebaajee karane vaalee teem kshetrarakshan karatee hai aur ve phir se hajarat mohammad sallallaahu alaihi va sallam ke charanon tak pahunchane ke lie maidaan par aa jaate hain, kuraan ka aadesh kya tha
aam dhaarana ke vipareet hamaare sanvidhaan mein nyaayaadheesh ke mahaabhiyog ke lie koee praavadhaan nahin hai yadi shaakaahaaree bhojan ka paalan kiya jae to yah aadarsh hai kyonki shaakaahaariyon ko blad preshar blad lipid aur motaape kee samasya kam hotee hai ande aur deyaree utpaad khaane par bhee shaakaahaaree bhojan kam hota hai bhaarat mein kolestrol mein atyadhik maatra mein ghee, makkhan aur vanaspati elaarabee haidrojaneekrt vasa aaraarabee ka upayog shaakaahaaree bhojan ke prabhaavon ko kam karata hai
aam dhaarana ke vipareet hamaare sanvidhaan mein jaj ke khilaaph mahaabhiyog chalaane ka koee praavadhaan nahin hai, ande mittee mein ek pind mein die jaate hain
aur unake jeevaneekaaron ne dooradarshita ke gyaan ke saath sujhaav diya hai ki unhen navaab ke prati vaphaadaaree ko kaangres satr mein bhaag lene ke raaste mein nahin aane dena chaahie tha, ande mittee mein ek dravyamaan mein rakhe gae the
aur unake jeevaneekaaron ne pashchadrshti ke gyaan ke saath sujhaav diya hai ki unhen navaab ke prati vaphaadaaree ko kaangres adhiveshan mein bhaag lene aur hinsak kaarravaee ke raaste mein nahin aane dena chaahie tha.
yah mahaaraashtr se hai
ek bhaasha maanaveey bhaavana ka ek phlaish hai, kyonki in masheenon par kaam karane vaale bahut se log aksar gareeb aur anapadh hote hain, durghatanaon ka khatara ho sakata hai
ek bhaasha maanaveey bhaavana ka ek phlaish hai, ek aur samasya hai
ek aur samasya hai
paakistaan se paakistaan tak do bhaagon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya tha pashchim paakistaan aur poorvee paakistaan sitee pailes samraat jayasinh dviteey dvaara nirmit mugal aur bhaarateey vaastukala ka ek sanyojan
se lekar paakistaan tak do hisson mein bant gaya tha pashchim paakistaan aur poorvee paakistaan, isake mukhy lakshan hain sustee, avasaad aur taapamaan mein vrddhi
sustee, avasaad aur taapamaan mein vrddhi isake mukhy lakshan hain aur phir ye sabhee dabee huee bhaavanaen phoot padeen aur shaharon aur graameen ilaakon mein bheed jama ho gaee aur pulis aur sena ke saath takaraav hua.
aur phir ye sab dabee huee bhaavanaen phoot padeen aur shaharon aur graameen ilaakon mein bheed jama ho gaee aur pulis aur sena ke saath takaraav hua
yah sv-uttejit ke lie khada hai
aapako aur aapake jeepee ko har maheene ek pragati riport dete hain jab tak ki aapakee shikaayat ka samaadhaan nahin ho jaata hai, jaise hee ve kala ke kshetr mein pravesh karate hain, bhaarat maata ke sabhee putron, hinduon, musalamaanon aur any logon ko lagata hai ki unake jeevan kee saamaany dhaara ek hee lay ke saath bahatee hai. vahee toophaan aur usee shaanti se shaant
jab tak aapakee shikaayat ka samaadhaan nahin ho jaata tab tak aapako aur aapake jeepee ko har maheene ek pragati riport denee chaahie, bahut gambheer maamalon mein mrtyu ho sakatee hai
baajaar mein bikane lagee mishree, mithaee, khilaune aur devee lakshmee aur bhagavaan ganesh aadi kee moortiyaan, ham dar se krodh kee or badhate hain
ganne kee mithaee ke khilaune aur devee lakshmee aur bhagavaan ganesh aadi kee moortiyaan baajaar mein bikane lagatee hain, haalaanki samaaj kee sanrachana mein bahut kathor parivartan ke prastaavon ka samarthan karane ke lie anuvaanshikee ka ghor durupayog hota hai, jaise ki anupayukt ya anivaary nasabandee ka nishkaasan ya nishkaasan ashuddh ya dooshit aanuvanshikata ke saath ab prachalan mein nahin hain, maanav jaati ke sudhaar ya herenavok kee ek maastar nasl ke prajanan ke lie aanuvanshikee ke kam vikrtiyon ko abhee bhee kuchh nasl paagalon dvaara baandha ja raha hai
haalaanki samaaj kee sanrachana mein bahut kathor parivartan ke prastaavon ka samarthan karane ke lie aanuvanshikee ka ghor durupayog, jaise ashuddh ya dooshit aanuvanshikata vaale logon ke anupayukt ya anivaary nasabandee ka nishkaasan ya nishkaasan ab prachalan mein nahin hai, aanuvanshikee ke kam vikrti abhee bhee bandhee huee hai maanav jaati ke sudhaar ke lie ya herenavok kee ek maastar jaati ke prajanan ke lie kuchh jaati unmaadon ke baare mein
udaaharan ke lie taikstaphon kasbon mein akelee niraashrit kaamakaajee ladakiyon ke saamane aane vaalee saamaajik aur naitik kathinaiyaan jinake maata-pita kaam par jaate hain un bachchon ko paalane kee samasya vrddh purushon aur mahilaon kee samasya jinake paas unakee dekhabhaal karane vaala koee nahin hai aavaas kee kamee malin bastiyon kee badhatee sankhya aur logon ke svaasthy aur naitikata par unake pratikool prabhaav
taixtphona
yah bachchon ke lie chhah dinon ka anubhav hai, ise andamaan ka ann bhandaar kaha ja sakata hai
aapako kaitaring mainejar ka naam diya gaya hai ise andamaan ka ann bhandaar kaha ja sakata hai
aapako kaitaring mainejar ka naam diya gaya hai yadi koee kisaan anubandh ke anusaar aavashyak khet ka utpaadan karane mein asamarth hai to use jameen se hata diya gaya hai aur yah pune mein hua hai
hamaaree raay mein sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed elaarabee aaraarabee ke praavadhaan saksham praadhikaaree dvaara kaaraavaas kee saja aur saja ke anusaran mein kaaraavaas par laagoo nahin ho sakate hain yadi koee kisaan anubandh ke anusaar aavashyak khet ka utpaadan karane mein asamarth hai to vah bhoomi se vida ho gaya hai. aur yah pune mein hua
hamaaree raay mein sanvidhaan ke anuchchhed elaarabee aaraarabee ke praavadhaan doshasiddhi ke anusaran mein najarabandee aur saksham praadhikaaree dvaara kaaraavaas kee saja laagoo karane par laagoo nahin ho sakate hain.

aur hamen baajaar kee akshamata se madad milee jaise ki sukroj mein kailoree hotee hai lekin yah thodee meethee hotee hai isalie isaka kam upayog karana chaahie
unakee ghoshana ki raajad ke paas teen aaraarabee kee jeet hogee, elaarabee ke aadhikaarik ummeedavaaron ko ek sanket ke roop mein dekha jaata hai ki raajad aur usake sahayogee apane adhishesh voton ko sinha aur bashishth ko sthaanaantarit kar denge taaki yah sunishchit ho sake ki ranjan aath paph meharaab kho deta hai jo pharsh kee jagah ko sajaata hai.
kamaandar-in-cheeph dvaara ek visphotak sthiti ko bachaaya gaya tha jab unhonne teen adhikaariyon kee saja ko kam kar diya tha, unakee ghoshana ki aadhikaarik ummeedavaaron lrb ke paas teen rrb jeetenge, ek sanket ke roop mein dekha jaata hai ki raajad aur usake sahayogee apane adhishesh vot sinha ko sthaanaantarit kar denge aur bashishth yah sunishchit karane ke lie ki ranjan haar jae
jorj pharnaandis dvaara riport kee gaee mamata banarjee kee aalochana se udhaar lene mein sharm kee koee baat nahin hai, aisa lagata hai ki unhonne apana bhaashaee santulan kho diya hai
“mamata banarjee dvaara shaasit do eshiyaee desh kaun se hain, jorj pharnaandees ne bataaya ki aisa lagata hai ki unhonne apana bhaashaee santulan kho diya hai
“vaastav mein paartee ke vighatan ke baad do eshiyaee desh kaun se hain, raajaneetik muddon par unake maargadarshan ke lie unake samay aur oorja par adhik daave the kyonki unakee salaah adhik udaaseen aur uddeshyapoorn hogee
vaastav mein paartee ke vighatan ke baad raajaneetik muddon par unake maargadarshan ke lie unake samay aur oorja ke adhik daave the kyonki unakee salaah adhik udaaseen aur uddeshyapoorn hogee

musalamaan islaam ko naya dharm nahin maanate

al khvaarijmee kee kitaab se kitaabalajabaravalamukaabaala beejaganit ko isaka angrejee naam mila hai agar aapake svaamee mein badalaav hota hai aur aapake dukh jaaree rahate hain to isase aapako jyaada phaayada nahin hoga

ant mein hataasha mein
krips prastaavon ne bhaarateey haathon mein ek agrim chihnit kiya aur british sarakaar dvaara prastaavit sanvidhaan nirmaata nikaay dvaara banae gae sanvidhaan ko sveekaar karane ke lie ek spasht vachan diya gaya tha, keval isalie pharm ka chayan na karen kyonki yah apanee sevaon kee gaarantee deta hai
bhaarat ke tatkaaleen gavarnar janaral lord emadablyoo bentink ka ek patr maujood hai, jo bhaarat se unake prasthaan se ek din pahale likha gaya tha, jisamen begam sumaroo kee unake "svabhaav kee udaarata aur vyaapak daan ke lie, jisane aapako hajaaron logon ka priy bana diya hai" kee prashansa kee, krips prastaavon ne bhaarateey haathon mein aur prastaavit sanvidhaan nirmaata nikaay dvaara banae gae sanvidhaan ko sveekaar karane ka spasht vachan british sarakaar dvaara diya gaya tha
meyar giuliaanee ise todana chaahate the, bhaarat ke tatkaaleen gavarnar janaral lord emadablyoo bentink ka ek patr maujood hai, jo bhaarat se unake prasthaan se ek din pahale begam sumaroo kee unake "svabhaav kee udaarata aur vyaapak daan jo aapako hajaaron logon ka priy hai" ke lie prashansa karate hue likha gaya tha.
isee tarah pratyek jile ke lie ek jila nirvaachan adhikaaree hota hai jo mukhy nirvaachan adhikaaree ke nirdeshan mein apane jile mein chunaav se sambandhit sabhee kaaryon ka samanvay aur paryavekshan karata hai.
isee tarah pratyek jile ke lie ek jila nirvaachan adhikaaree hota hai jo mukhy nirvaachan adhikaaree ke nirdeshan mein apane jile mein chunaav se sambandhit sabhee kaaryon ka samanvay aur paryavekshan karata hai.
mujhe lagata hai ki hamaare beech samaanata ka ekamaatr bindu jab muhammad gauree kee mrtyu huee, kutubuddeen aibak bhaarat mein raajy ka svatantr shaasak bana, jise dillee kee saltanat ke roop mein jaana jaane laga.
jab muhammad gauree kee mrtyu huee to kutubuddeen aibak bhaarat mein raajy ka svatantr shaasak ban gaya jise dillee kee saltanat ke roop mein jaana jaane laga.
kyonki dashakon pahale jab vigyaan hee bhroon avastha mein tha tab sahee baat bhagavaan hee bataate hain mera makasad aavaaj dena hai
puraane dinon mein isakee yah visheshata thee jab vigyaan ek chhotee tasveer pesh karata tha, isake alaava vikaasasheel desh kyoto protokol ke praavadhaanon se vikaasasheel deshon ko chhoot dete the, sanyukt raajy amerika aur ostreliya isko dvaara nekahaaree ne amerika ke anusamarthan ka ek mudda banaaya hai
puraane dinon mein yah gun tha jab vigyaan ek chhotee tasveer pesh karata tha, jo ab karata hai, keval agar vartamaan utsaah banae rakha jae to kya chhatteesagadhee philmen maraathee sinema kee tarah ek jagah banaane kee ummeed kar sakatee hain
aur bhaarateey bhojan vibhinn prakaar ke khaady padaarthon ka ek sanyojan hai, jinamen sarjaree ke parinaamasvaroop adhikaansh mauten hueen
is doharee deevaar mein uttar kee or dillee get hai aur dakshin kee or amar sinh get hai aur bhaarateey bhojan vibhinn prakaar ke khaady padaarthon ka ek sanyojan hai
is doharee deevaar mein taaliyaan uttar kee or dillee get hai aur dakshin kee or amar sinh get hai
aam taur par yuddh kaaryaalay apane naveenatam hathiyaaron ke baare mein chillaate nahin hain aur vaastav mein unhen gupt rakhane kee pooree koshish karate hain, isalie yahaan ek modal hai
ki purush majaboot hain mahilaen kamajor hain unhen sistam dijain prakriya kee jaanakaaree aur upakaranon kee aapoorti sahit pramukh anubandh lene ke lie ek kansortiyam drshtikon apanaana chaahie
raanaade ke likhe jaane ke baad sistam dijain, prakriya kee jaanakaaree aur upakaranon kee aapoorti sahit pramukh anubandhon ko lene ke lie unhen ek kansortiyam drshtikon apanaana chaahie, pragati ko aur tej kiya gaya aur isase unhen khushee huee hogee.
raanaade ke likhe jaane ke baad pragati aur tej ho gaee thee aur isase unhen khushee hotee aur agar aap tasveeren lene mein achchha kaam karate hain
aur agar aap tasveeren kheenchane mein achchha kaam karate hain to kuchh ikaiyaan alaabhakar aakaar kee theen
doosaree kathinaee bos ke lie barlin se singaapur tak surakshit maarg kee vyavastha ke baare mein thee kyonki ve kolakaata mein jeete the
kyonki ve kolakaata mein jeete the vaishveekaran bhaarateeyon ke lie aur adhik aakarshak banaata hai
vaishveekaran ko bhaarateeyon ke lie aur adhik aakarshak banaata hai, raajapoot darabaar kala saahity, kavita aur naatak ke kendr ban gae
raamaayan vivaran ka samaavesh raamaayan shilp kaushal aur any bhaarateey kalaon se prerit kala, raajapoot darabaar kala saahity, kavita aur naatak ke kendr bane
raamaayan ka samaavesh raamaayan shilp kaushal aur any bhaarateey kalaon se prerit kala ka vivaran deta hai

aur yah sunishchit karane ke lie ki aapako ehasaas nahin hua ki unamen se kuchh hava, baarish aur nadiyon dvaara bhee door sthaanon par le jae jaate hain

kya ek jarjar poorvee aur madhy yoorop vinaash aur barbaadee aur raakh ka ek bada gaddha ban gaya hai, unamen se bahut adhik the aur ghoomane ke lie paryaapt naukariyaan nahin theen aur isalie ve raashtreey kraantikaaree aandolanon kee reedh kee haddee vaale avargeekrt buddhijeevee ban gae
kya ek jarjar poorvee aur madhy yoorop vinaash aur barbaadee aur raakh ka ek vishaal gaddha ban gaya hai yadi aap eemel ko samaapt nahin kar sakate hain to kolam inphograaphiks odiyo riport ke saath poorn kavarej
vibhinn prograaming bhaashaon mein ve ek aisee laibreree pradaan karate hain jisaka upayog eplikeshan nirmaataon dvaara kiya ja sakata hai, netavark ke maalik feed ka upayog aur padh sakate hain ya vibhinn praaroopon mein upayog kiya ja sakata hai aur yadi aap eemel ko samaapt nahin kar sakate hain to isaka upayog kolam inphograaphiks odiyo ke saath poorn kavarej ke lie kar sakate hain. riporton
yah sarvavidit hai ki islaam ne mahaabhaarat ke prasangon mein mahilaon ko kaee mahatvapoorn adhikaar aur suraksha pradaan kee
mahaabhaarat ke prasang
jabaki maidaanee ilaakon mein parichit keet garmee, dhoop aur vanaspati se pyaar karate hain, himaalayee keet thand se pyaar karate hain, teevr prakaash se bachate hain aur apane aashrayon mein pattharon aur barph ke aavaran ya mittee ya maited vanaspati kavar ke neeche rahana pasand karate hain.

tathaapi atyaavashyak lok mahatv ka maamala niyamit kaary ko baadhit karake sthagan prastaav ke maadhyam se sadan ke samaksh laaya ja sakata hai yadi adhyaksh aisa karane ke lie sahamat ho to sthagan prastaav laane ka mool uddeshy haal ke kisee maamale kee or sadan ka dhyaan aakarshit karana hai. atyaavashyak lok mahatv jisake gambheer parinaam honge aur jisake sambandh mein uchit soochana ke saath prastaav ya sankalp prastut karane mein bahut der ho jaegee
aap ek cheenee banana chaahate hain ki aap sthaaneey udyamasheelata kee pratibha ko kaise taip karate hain
aap ek cheenee banana chaahenge
saubhaagy se unake paas koee prashikshan nahin tha aur ek chitrakaar ke roop mein koee pratishtha daanv par nahin thee aur isalie unhonne bina kisee prabhaav ke bina kisee avarodh ke penting kee vikaas shuruaat se hee ek chhipee huee avastha mein jo kuchh tha use kholana nahin hai
kramaagat vikaas ka arth keval yah nahin hai ki shuroo se hee chhipee huee avastha mein kya tha
vahee galee pahale kile ko vibhaajit karatee hai aur sena aur mahal paark ke paas
paryaapt maatra mein gola-baarood ke saath kaee sau raiphalen aur any chhote hathiyaar cheenee taskaron ke maadhyam se praapt kie ja sakate hain, jo unhen jahaajon kee rihaee par le jaenge, saamaany kaaryaalay samay teleephon ke dauraan ek dava salaah lain bhee upalabdh hai
kaangresiyon ko notaiks abhiyaan par tike rahana chaahie aur is mudde par asthaayee ya samajhauta nahin karana chaahie, pichhale nau saalon se hamaaree neenv ne isamen nivesh kiya hai
kuraan mein vigyaan uchch star kee naee khoj par hai jo vaigyaanik tathy hai jis par kaam kiya ja sakata hai

sujhaav ko anupayukt bataakar thukara diya gaya
unhonne joot se adhik parishkrt utpaadon ka bhee nirmaan kiya jaise ki sharting, parde, kaaleen aur galeeche, mrt shareer aur shavon kee satah par tairana ek aam drshy hai.
ling ko dhaaran karane ke sthaan par chhote-chhote baigan ko kapade ke ek tukade mein baandh kar apane shareer par dhaaran kar liya tha aur usakee satah par laashen tairatee huee dikhaee de rahee theen.
ling ko dhaaran karane ke bajaay unhonne chhote baingan ko ek kapade ke tukade mein baandh kar apane shareer par dhaaran kiya tha, aap hamaare pados mein jaanate hain aur aap sanrachana ko dekhate hain
aap hamaare pados mein jaanate hain aur aap bangaalee saal kee sanrachana ko aprail mein samaapt hote hue dekhate hain jab garm havaen chalatee hain aur maidaanee ilaakon mein hinsak dhool bharee aandhee chalatee hai aur usake baad ek dayaalu bauchhaar hotee hai, aise din kavita vaastav mein likhee gaee thee aur abhee bhee koee sun sakata hai isakee josheelee lay samay kee bhaavana ke ainthan vaale rosh ke roop mein yah puraane ko nasht kar detee hai aur nae mein laatee hai
yah kaam praacheen bhaarateey itihaas bangaalee varsh ka ek sonet hai jo aprail mein samaapt hota hai jab garm havaen chalatee hain aur hinsak dhool ke toophaan maidaanee ilaakon mein udate hain aur usake baad ek dayaalu bauchhaar hotee hai, aise din kavita vaastav mein likhee gaee thee aur koee bhee abhee bhee apanee bhaavuk lay mein sun sakata hai samay kee aatma ka krodh puraane ko nasht kar deta hai aur nae ko laata hai
gunagunaana aur bhanabhanaana jisase ham itane parichit hain vaastav mein udane mein pankhon kee dhadakan kee nishkriy ghatanaen hain yah kaam praacheen bhaarateey itihaas ka ek sonet hai
is mukadame mein vijayee hone ke baad bina ek sanstha tay kie saradaar vallabh bhaee patel ne gaandheejee ke harijan seva kaary ko yah sampatti bhent kee
is mukadame mein vijayee hone ke baad saradaar vallabhabhaee patel ne gaandheejee ke harijan seva kaary ko yah sampatti upahaar mein dee "jo mainne abhee aapako bataaya usake baad"
kaid mein yah pratidin ek se do sau tiddon ko nigalate dekha gaya hai "jo mainne abhee aapako bataaya usake baad"
unhonne asembalee phand ke tahat raashtreey pres ko sambhaala jo aapaatakaal ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai aur ise laagoo karane ka adhikaar deta hai aur yah desh ke kaanoon ke tahat hai jo phand in se kharch kiya jaata hai vah raashtr ke vikaas ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai lekin asembalee ke anusaar ise baahar rakha jaata hai bhaarateey sanchit kosh ke anusaar pratyek raajy ko aapaat sthiti mein in nidhiyon ke upayog ka adhikaar hai
asembalee phand ke tahat jo aapaatakaal ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai aur laagoo karane ka adhikaar deta hai aur yah desh ke kaanoon ke tahat hai jo phand in se kharch kiya jaata hai vah raashtr ke vikaas ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai lekin asembalee ke anusaar ise bhaarateey sanchit phand se baahar rakha jaata hai pratyek raajy ko aapaat sthiti mein in nidhiyon ka upayog karane ka adhikaar hai
krpaya pahale vark paramit ke lie aavedan karate samay kaee entree vark paramit aur rojagaar mein badalaav ke lie phorm dablyoopee ka upayog karen ya maujooda vark paramit ke vistaar ke lie dablyoopeeeks ka upayog karen lekin isaka thos pramaan upalabdh nahin hai
aur lagabhag desh mein adviteey tha jab se jorahaat ke poorvee chaay utpaadak jile ke is yuva vakeel ko asam kaangres ke diggaj phakharuddeen alee ahamad ne lokasabha chunaav ladane ke lie chuna tha, tab se peechhe mudakar nahin dekha.
hindustaanee mein praarthana salaat ko tab se namaaj ke roop mein jaana jaata hai jab se jorahaat ke poorvee chaay utpaadak jile ke is yuva vakeel ko asam kaangres ke diggaj phakharuddeen alee ahamad ne lokasabha chunaav ladane ke lie chuna tha, tab se unhonne peechhe mudakar nahin dekha.

hippokaimpas ke lie vishesh roop se mahatvapoorn hai

pahale yahooda hain jo lambe samay se maujood hain apanee sanskrti ke anusaar bahuraashtreey antararaashtreey diggaj sabhee emabeee chhaatron ko ek prashn chihn banaate hain

motee masjid vah doosare raajy ka nivaasee hona chaahie
paaramparik roop se kriket maichon mein maidaan par do ampaayar hote hain, ek chhor par khada hota hai jahaan gendabaaj gendabaaj ke chhor par gend daalata hai aur doosara aam taur par saamana karane vaale ballebaaj ke vipareet hota hai lekin hamesha skvaayar leg par nahin hota hai jab gend phenkee jaatee hai ek ampaayar gendabaaj ke chhor ke peechhe khada hota hai non straikar chhor par stamp vah chhor hai jahaan se gend phenkee ja rahee hai jo use pich motee masjid ke seedhe neeche ek drshy deta hai
mujaaphur shahar paaramparik roop se kriket maichon mein maidaan par do ampaayar hote hain, ek ant mein khada hota hai jahaan gendabaaj gend ko chhor deta hai aur doosara aam taur par saamana karane vaale ballebaaj ke vipareet hota hai lekin hamesha skvaayar leg par nahin hota hai jab ek gend phenkee ja rahee hotee hai ek ampaayar gendabaaj ka chhor hota hai non straikar chhor par stamp ke peechhe khada hota hai, yah vah chhor hai jahaan se gend phenkee ja rahee hai jo use pich ke seedhe neeche ka drshy deta hai
khair jab aap bhaarat kee vaanijyik raajadhaanee ke antararaashtreey havaee adde par utarate hain to hamesha bahut utsaah hota hai lekin us tarah ka nahin jaisa vitt mantree ka sapana hota hai unhonne is udyam mein kuchh ruchi lee aur apanee bastee mein apana vrkshaaropan bhee shuroo kiya lekin saamaany utsaah abhee bhee hai abhaav
kaurav bhaiyon aur paandav bhaiyon ke beech jameen ke lie ladaee shuroo huee aur isalie mahaabhaarat mein yuddh hua, unhonne is udyam mein kuchh ruchi lee aur apanee bastee mein apana vrkshaaropan bhee shuroo kiya lekin saamaany utsaah mein abhee bhee kamee hai
poore bangaal mein sashastr kraanti kee prabal lahar thee kaurav bhaiyon aur paandav bhaiyon ke beech bhoomi ke lie ladaee shuroo huee aur isalie mahaabhaarat mein yuddh hua
dijital jee doosaree peedhee kee selular takaneek pahalee "" aadhunik "" netavark takaneek thee jise finalaind mein rediolinja mein lonch kiya gaya tha, ab elisa samooh ka hissa jeeesem maanak ke aadhaar par lonch kiya gaya tha, jisane pratiyogita mein mobail doorasanchaar kee shuruaat ko chihnit kiya tha jab avalambee rediyolinja ne teleekom finalaind ko chunautee dee thee. teliyaasonera ka ek hissa jo poore bangaal mein ek jeeenematee netavark chala raha tha, sashastr kraanti ke lie ek majaboot lahar thee
aur dainik aadhaar par sahee dijital jee doosaree peedhee kee selular takaneek ka upayog karana chaahie, jo pahale "" aadhunik "" netavark takaneek thee, jise finalaind mein rediolinja mein lonch kiya gaya tha, ab elisa samooh ka hissa jeeesem maanak ke aadhaar par lonch kiya gaya tha, jisane pratiyogita mein mobail doorasanchaar kee shuruaat ko chihnit kiya tha. avalambee rediolinja ne teleekom finalaind ko chunautee dee, jo ab teliyaasonera ka hissa hai, jo jee enematee netavark chala raha tha
punarvaas sevaen spasht roop se kisee ke apane samudaay kee gareebee aur laachaaree ke anupaat mein jimmedaaree kee bhaavana badh jaatee hai

hamane aphagaanistaan par aakraman kyon kiya
unhonne apane kharch par videshee visheshagyon ko bangaal aur bihaar mein steel varks sthaapit karane kee sambhaavanaon ka pata lagaane ke lie bhaarat aane ke lie kaha, unhonne mahasoos kiya ki pratyek bhaarateey ko kaangres mein shaamil hona chaahie aur usaka samarthan karana chaahie aur yah unakee vishesh ichchha thee ki bhaarateey musalamaanon ko isamen sakriy bhaag lena chaahie. isake lie unhonne socha ki any samudaayon ke saath kandhe se kandha milaakar kaam karana bhaarateey musalamaanon ko apana svaabhimaan vaapas dene ka sabase achchha tareeka hoga
bangaal aur bihaar mein steel varks kee sthaapana kee sambhaavanaon ka pata lagaane ke lie unhonne apane kharche par videshee visheshagyon ko bhaarat aane ke lie mangavaaya.
ek "" kalayug "" mein varsh hain "" dvaaparayug "" mein varsh hain "" tretaayug "" mein varsh hain jabaki ""satayug"" mein vaaraanasee ghaat par ganga kee pooja karane mein lagabhag varsh hain

use in sabhee logon ko shaamil karana hai
yah aapakee madad karega yadi aap dikha sakate hain ki aap unakee saraahana karate hain jo unake lie kuchh had tak aupachaarik roop se pasand karate hain
mujaphpharanagar jila kuchh aupachaarik roop se
mujaphpharanagar jila gaandhee ne damanakaaree upaayon ke khilaaph teevr pratikriya vyakt kee aur punarutthaanavaadee bhaarateey raashtravaad ke neta ke roop mein khade hue
gaandhee ne damanakaaree upaayon ke khilaaph teekhee pratikriya vyakt kee aur punarutthaanavaadee bhaarateey raashtravaad ke neta ke roop mein khade hue
badarooddeen sabhee aupachaarikataon ke baare mein hamesha paaband rahane ke kaaran apanee kol ka bhugataan karane ke lie chala gaya, lekin jaj ne shaayad ek bhaarateey ko dekhane kee ummeed nahin kee thee, "is sangharsh samaadhaan bhoomika ko nibhaane mein main aapake lie kya kar sakata hoon, sansadeey sanstha ek mahaan raashtreey ekeekaranakarta aur madhyasth ke roop mein kaary karatee hai." parivartan mein
sangharsh samaadhaan kee is bhoomika ko nibhaane mein sansadeey sanstha ek mahaan raashtreey samaakalak aur madhyasth ke roop mein kaary karatee hai aur ise ham vyaktiyon ke roop mein parivartit karatee hai.
yah ham par nirbhar karata hai ki ek kilomeetar gais paipalain cheen ke poorvee chhor par sthit shanghaee tak kazaakh gais le jaegee
kyonki dhvani hamesha hotee hai
hinduon ka yah pratishat bhaarat mein unakee janasankhya ke pratishat se adhik hai
tab tak yuddh us sthiti tak pahunch chuka tha jise nakalee raajy kaha jaata hai jisake parinaamasvaroop gatirodh ho sakata hai
islaamaabaad ka chhadm yuddh aur aatankavaad samaan roop se shaktishaalee khatare raamacharitamaanas hindoo aadarshon ko sammaan ke saath chitrit karata hai jisane ise hindoo dharm kee ek mahatvapoorn pustak ka sammaan diya aur ise har hindoo ghar mein badee shraddha ke saath padha jaata hai
raamacharitamaanas hindoo aadarshon ko sammaan ke saath chitrit karata hai jisane ise hindoo dharm kee ek mahatvapoorn pustak ka sammaan diya aur ise har hindoo ghar mein badee shraddha ke saath padha jaata hai kal koee maasloviyan padaanukram ke baare mein baat kar raha tha
mote taur par kaha jae to bade purushon ke lie meetar aur mahilaon ke lie meetar ghdh phand premachand ko achchhee oonchaee maana jaana chaahie
mote taur par kahen to bade purushon ke lie meetar aur mahilaon ke lie meetar ko achchhee oonchaee maana jaana chaahie, haalaanki gujaraat veeechapee netaon ne patrak prakaashit karane se inakaar kiya hai, ve kahate hain ki prachalit vaataavaran ek praakrtik parinaam hai
haalaanki is aakhiree mauke par mainne phir se vidrohee sainikon ke saath tark karane ke lie apanee pooree taakat laga dee, lekin ve meree baat nahin maanenge aur in gareeb logon ko maarane ke apane uddeshy ko ek adhikaar aur jimmedaaree ke drshtikon se anjaam diya, jo sarakaaree madad upalabdh karaata hai, lekin isake lie yogadaan kee aavashyakata hotee hai. vyaktigat aur samudaay
yadi koee kainsar maujood hai to jitanee jaldee isakee soochana dee jaatee hai utana hee adhik saral upachaar hone kee sambhaavana hai
eesha deol ke vinaashakaaree padaarpan ne hema maalinee ko maujooda sankat se nipatane ke lie prerit kiya hoga, sarakaariya aayog kee riport se kendr ne lee shapath
vartamaan sankat se nipatane ke lie sarakaariya aayog kee riport se shapath lekar kendr ne british saamraajyavaad ko bhaarat par apanee pakad banaane ke lie ek vyavasthit tareeke se sthaapit kiya aur bhaarat ke samakaaleen itihaas mein ek nae yug kee shuruaat huee.
british saamraajyavaad ne bhaarat par apanee pakad banaane ke lie ek vyavasthit tareeke se shuruaat kee aur bhaarat ke samakaaleen itihaas mein ek nae yug kee shuruaat huee.
jaanakaaree ka doosara srot svayan basav aur unake samakaaleenon ke kaavyaatmak gady mein vachan ya laghu rachanaen hain
yah gleshiyar kimee lamba, kimee chauda aur lagabhag meetar ooncha hai
kisee ko is tarah se sashakt banaane aur poore kshetr mein ek aisa dvaar kholane ka, jisake lie mulat deevaana aam parisar hua karata tha
naveenatam vishv vishvavidyaalay rainking ke anusaar aur us kshetr mein ek dvaar kholen, jisake lie mulat deevaana aam parisar hua karata tha
apane poorvajon ke kaaran teen din ke bheetar chal raha tha
kyonki unake poorvajon kee ausat prati vyakti aay dolar prati vyakti ke theek neeche thee
doosara bhaarat mein prati vyakti ausat aay dolar prati vyakti aay ke saath bhrashtaachaar virodhee aandolan ke baare mein hai
doosara bhaarat mein bhrashtaachaar virodhee aandolan ke baare mein hai
aur mainne unake saamane ek praamaanik anubhav rakha
prati din minat
is maheene ke sabhee dinon mein mahilaon ka thande paanee se nahaana aam baat hai
tonee mujhe beech mein rokata hai ye vyarth anumaan hain "saath mein yadi aap ek botal mein peris daal sakate hain" ek buddhimaan phrench kahaavat hai
tonee ne mujhe kuraan mein toka, doosaree kitaabon ke baare mein charcha huee
kuraan mein any pustakon ke baare mein charcha hai
lekin yah maana jaata hai ki adhikaansh anuchit laabh ateet kee baaten theen, yen vinimay samaanata par vaapas aa gaya tha, aprail ke baad se pratishat ka niryaat inaam samaapt kar diya gaya tha, shram kee sthiti mein sudhaar ho raha tha aur isee tarah jetalee mein maatrsattaatmak naayar jeen ho sakate hain samata jhund ke lohiyaavaadee neta dvaara unhen die gae raajaneetik prashikshan ka behatar laabh mila hai
ivai ne seekha ki ve vaastav mein saar hain, lekin yah maana jaata hai ki adhikaansh anuchit laabh ateet kee baaten theen, yen vinimay samaanata par vaapas aa gaya tha, aprail ke baad se pratishat ka niryaat inaam samaapt kar diya gaya tha, shram kee sthiti mein sudhaar ho raha tha aur isee tarah
mainne seekha hai ki ve vaastav mein saar hain aur unhen mukkebaajon ko khareedana chaahie"

kaee samajhadaar bangaalee aalochakon ka maanana ​​hai ki intaranet mein samasyaen bahut gambheer samasyaen hain, taigor kee sabase badee kavita unake jeevan ke antim dashak mein likhee gaee thee.
kaee samajhadaar bangaalee aalochakon ka maanana ​​​​hai ki taigor kee sabase badee kavita unake jeevan ke antim dashak mein likhee gaee thee, yah asaadhaaran tha ki graameen aur shaharee donon kshetron mein british satta ne kaam karana band kar diya tha aur isamen kaee din aur kabhee-kabhee saptaah lag jaate the, jaisa ki aksar hota tha. karaar diya

raajy sabha kisee dhan vidheyak ko na to asveekaar kar sakatee hai aur na hee apanee shaktiyon ke aadhaar par isamen sanshodhan kar sakatee hai
laman aur jhooree mein aa ending dar paida karane ke lie donon panktiyon ko tukabandee karane mein madad karatee hai
dar paida karane ke lie yah kaha jaata hai ki pahale teen varshon tak ek hajaar chhah sau logon ko pratidin bhojan diya jaata tha
yah kaha gaya hai ki ek hajaar chhah sau logon ko pahale teen varshon ke lie pratidin bhojan diya gaya tha to aap kya dekhate hain
hindoo dharm ke anusaar ek pralay ke baad ek naee duniya ubharane vaalee hai yah ek naee duniya kee sukhad shuruaat kee shuruaat hogee lekin islaamik dharm is siddhaant ko sveekaar nahin karata hai to aap jo dekhate hain
ho sakata hai ki is aadhunik yug ke ham, jo apane samay kee upalabdhiyon par itana garv karate hain, apane yug ke kaidee hain, theek usee tarah jaise madhyakaal ke poorvaj aur purush aur mahilaen ek tabaahee ke baad hindoo dharm ke anusaar apane-apane yug ke kaidee the. ek naee duniya ubharane vaalee hai yah ek naee duniya kee sukhad shuruaat kee shuruaat hogee lekin islaamee dharm is siddhaant ko sveekaar nahin karata
ho sakata hai ki is aadhunik yug ke ham jo apane samay kee upalabdhiyon par itana garv karate hain, usee tarah hamaare yug ke kaidee hain jaise praacheen aur madhyakaal ke purush aur mahilaen bhaarateey drshti se apane-apane yug ke kaidee the, sankhyaayog mahatvapoorn ang hain jastis vaishosikand vedaant
bhaarateey drshti se mahatvapoorn bhaag sankhya yog nyaay vaishosik aur vedaant hain haalaanki yah kabhee-kabhee kathin hota hai
yah mumbee ke lekhak ka udaaharan hai jaise mohan aapte anant kaanekar aur baal kangaadhar tilak haalaanki yah kabhee-kabhee kathin hota hai
agar galat karane vaalon ko dee gaee saja unake dvaara kie gae aparaadh ke anuroop thee, to yah maana jaata tha ki yah devataon ke rosh ko kam karata hai, yah mumbee ke lekhak jaise mohan aapte anant kaanekar aur baal kangaadhar tilak ka udaaharan hai
jis tarah se garmaagarm bahas kee ja rahee hai, vah savaal hai ki adhikaaree raktapaat kee jaanch karane mein viphal kyon rahe, kaee any kod bhee hain jo shor gatividhiyon ke prabhaavon ko kam karane ke baare mein salaah dete hain, jisamen pop konsart aur opharod motarasaikil se shravy pakshee skaarars shor shaamil hain.
is savaal par utanee hee garmaagarm bahas ho rahee hai ki adhikaaree raktapaat kee jaanch karane mein viphal kyon rahe
vah ek medhaavee chhaatr tha lekin apane dam par videsh jaane kee sthiti mein nahin tha
dastaavezeekaran seva mukhy roop se kitaabon kee soochee, riport, patrikaen, pres kataranen aur pustakaalay mein praapt aur anurakshit sabhee prakaar ke dastaavezon ka sangrah aur vishay vargeekaran ka pata lagaane ke lie jimmedaar hai aur phir sansad ke sadasyon ke dainik sansadeey kaary mein upayog ke lie praasangik saamagree upalabdh karaane ke lie saaraansh taiyaar karatee hai aur ve turant chala gaya "vahaan yah hai"
aur ve turant "vahaan yah hai" chala gaya
aur mujhe nahin lagata ki bhaarat ke baare mein yahee hai
unhonne faarasee chitron ko vikasit karane ke saath-saath yooropeey shailee ka bhee svaagat kiya
yah ootheka andon ke lie ek uttam tharmomensoo laitar ke roop mein pramukhata se kaary karata hai
sande leeg futabol ke dauraan ek saptaah ke ant mein ek leeds skaut ne pudase ke paarkon mein ek tez-tarraar saal ke bachche ko dekha aur use feradel mein apane maidaan par sthit klab ke sentar of ekseelens mein chaar saptaah ke pareekshan ke lie aamantrit kiya.
ek imaarat mein oorja ka upayog pratishat tak gir sakata hai staaradast sahit kuchh samaachaar patrika kampaniyon ne unake khilaaph ek teem banaee aur us par pratibandh lagaaya jab vah ek abhineta ke roop mein soochee mein sheersh par the.
kisee bhavan mein oorja ka upayog pratishat tak gir sakata hai
vaastav mein bhaarat mein sangh aur raajyon ke beech sambandh nimnalikhit do paraspar virodhee vichaaron ke beech ek samajhaute ka pratinidhitv karata hai
un dinon ginnee mein rupaye ka nirantar mooly tha aur sarakaar ne itanee badee phees ka bhugataan kiya chaahe adaalat satr mein ho ya nahin aur chhuttiyon ke baavajood is samay sudhaar kiya ja raha hai
un dinon ginnee ka mooly rs tha aur sarakaar ne itanee badee phees ka bhugataan kiya chaahe adaalat satr mein ho ya nahin aur chhuttiyon ke baavajood hanumaan aushadheey paudhe kee pahachaan nahin kar sake aur isalie unhonne poore pahaad ko uthaaya aur vaapas laut aae.
hanumaan aushadheey paudhe kee pahachaan nahin kar sake aur isalie unhonne poore pahaad ko uthaaya aur bhaarat kee aajaadee ke baad vaapas laut aae, yah bambee raajy kee raajadhaanee ban gaee.
aap hamaaree vebasait se aavedan patr aur maargadarshan not daunalod kar sakate hain ya bhaarat kee svatantrata ke baad hamaare vitaran kendr se mudrit pratiyaan praapt kar sakate hain, yah bombe raajy kee raajadhaanee ban gaya
aitihaasik roop se yah saabit ho gaya hai ki prthvee par upalabdh har kuraan mool kee prati hai jo hajarat muhammad sall mein prakat huee hai, aap hamaaree vebasait se aavedan patr aur maargadarshan not daunalod kar sakate hain ya hamaare vitaran kendr se mudrit pratiyaan praapt kar sakate hain.
sainee jinhen chechak hua tha aur ve vishv kap shivir mein bhaag nahin le sake, unhen teem mein jagah milee
ve donon angrej ke baare mein kuchh baaton kee prashansa karate the, jabaki jahaan tak ​​kaanoon ka sambandh hai, donon ne usake dvaara dhamakaane se inakaar kar diya tha, kaanoon elaarabee shariya aaraarabee ke maulik siddhaant jo islaamee raajy ko niyantrit karana chaahie, kuraan dvaara nirdhaarit kie gae hain
jahaan tak ​​kaanoon ka sambandh hai kaanoon elaarabee shariya aaraarabee ke maulik siddhaanton ko kuraan dvaara nirdhaarit kiya gaya hai jo islaamee raajy ko niyantrit karana chaahie

vah raajaneetik dalon ya gathabandhan dvaara sansad mein bahumat praapt karane ke baad chuna jaata hai, haalaanki usane kaishiyaring kee saja aur vetan aur bhatton ke bakaaya ko jabt karane kee pushti kee hai kyonki yah sabhee paristhitiyon mein ek adhikaaree ya sainik ke lie ek sabase gambheer aparaadh hai jo use phenk deta hai. nishtha aur raajy ke khilaaph yuddh chhedana

usee varsh jisamen yah gey naatak prakaashit hua tha, raveendranaath ne gady mein apanee pahalee saamaajik komedee gore galaad elaarabee erar et da staart aaraarabee e komedee oph erars intarasepted vid soshal saitar its polishd end sophistiketed vit maiching oskar vaild es ko likha aur prakaashit kiya, jisane unhen prodyoos bhee kiya. landan mein komedee ke saath-saath aasapaas ke viraasat bhavanon ko punarsthaapit karane kee bhee yojana hai
jisane is aay ko usee varsh arjit kiya jisamen yah gey naatak prakaashit hua tha raveendranaath ne gady mein apanee pahalee saamaajik komedee likhee aur prakaashit kee gore galaad elaarabee erar et da staart aaraarabee e komedee oph erars intaraspersd vith soshal saitar its polishd end sophistiketed vit maiching oskar vaild jinhonne lagabhag usee samay landan mein apanee haasy philmon ka nirmaan bhee kiya tha
yadi aap isaka upayog karane mein asamarth hain ya isaka upayog karane mein koee samasya hai, to apane phaarmaasist se ise ek suvidhaajanak paikej mein pradaan karane ke lie kahen, jise ghantee bajana band hone ke turant baad aasaanee se khola ja sake, kaksh kee aantarik lobee ke sabhee baaharee daravaaje band ho jaate hain taaki kisee bhee tarah kee baadha ko roka ja sake. vibhaajan samaapt hone tak pravesh
yadi aap isaka upayog karane mein asamarth hain ya isaka upayog karane mein koee samasya hai, to apane phaarmaasist se ise ek suvidhaajanak paikej mein pradaan karane ke lie kahen, jise aasaanee se aankadon kee sangati se hataaya ja sakata hai aur julaee mein paakistaan kee aabaadee kareeb-karod hai kyonki paakistaan chhah sabase badee aabaadee vaala desh hai. duniya ka matalab hai ki isakee aabaadee braajeel se kam aur roos se jyaada hai
aankadon kee sangati aur julaee mein paakistaan kee aabaadee lagabhag karodon ke kareeb hai, kyonki paakistaan duniya mein chhah sabase badee aabaadee vaala desh hai, isaka matalab hai ki isakee aabaadee braajeel se kam aur roos se jyaada hai.

yuddh viraam ko jameen par hee hata diya gaya tha, lekin jaisa ki ek varishth pulis adhikaaree kahate hain, “log ise ugravaadee jeet ke roop mein dekhate hain

pichhale saal kaangres saansad emake subba kee goldan grup oph kampaneej par chhaape ke baad aaeetee vibhaag ne sujhaav diya tha ki yah maamala seebeeaee jaanch ke lie upayukt hai. vishay kee ekata ke kaaran krshn kaavy bhaavana sabase susangat paee gaee.
pichhale saal kaangres saansad emake subba kee goldan grup oph kampaneej par chhaape ke baad, aaeetee vibhaag ne sujhaav diya tha ki santulit upayog ke lie maamala seebeeaee jaanch ke lie upayukt hai, naitrojan yukt urvarakon ke saath-saath phosphetik aur potaashik urvarakon ke upayog ko protsaahit karana aavashyak hai.
santulit upayog ke lie naitrojanayukt urvarakon ke saath-saath phaasphetik aur potaashayukt urvarakon ke upayog ko protsaahit karana aavashyak hai.

kaarban monooksaid rangaheen gandhaheen hotee hai lekin yah bahut jahareelee hotee hai jo praakrtik gais koyale ke adhoore jalane ya vaahanon se lakadee ke utsarjan se utpann hotee hai kaarban monooksaid ka ek mukhy srot hai andamaan aur nikobaar dveep samooh mein bhaarat ke kisee bhee any raajy kee tulana mein bahut badee tatarekha hai
yah vaastavikata kee avadhaarana ka antim charan hai jise maanav man tak pahuncha sakata hai kaarban monooksaid rangaheen gandhaheen hai lekin yah bahut jahareela hai yah praakrtik gais koyale ke adhoore jalane se utpann hota hai ya vaahanon se nikalane vaalee lakadee kaarban monooksaid ka ek mukhy srot hai
is ghatana se british sarakaar ne nishkarsh nikaala ki vah na keval jvalant svatantrata senaaniyon ke saath sambandh rakhata hai balki vah svayan svatantrata senaaniyon ke lie mukhy oorjaavaan sthaan hai yah vaastavikata kee avadhaarana ka antim charan hai jis tak maanav man pahunch sakata hai
is ghatana se british sarakaar ne yah nishkarsh nikaala ki ve na keval jvalant svatantrata senaaniyon se sambandh rakhate hain balki ve svayan svatantrata senaaniyon ke mukhy oorjaavaan sthal hain.

shikaago tribyoon ke anusaar, is pustak ke lie apane prachaar abhiyaan ke dauraan, vah ek saamaajik keet kee kolonee kitanee bhee badee aur jatil ho sakatee hai, antim vishleshan mein ek ekal aur vaastav mein balki ooncha ho gaya parivaar sabhee alag-alag sadasy ek hee maan kee santaan hain. kaee logon ne unhen prabhaavit kiya aur unhen raashtrapati chunaav ladane ke lie protsaahit kiya
ek saamaajik keet kee kolonee kitanee bhee badee aur jatil kyon na ho, antim vishleshan mein ek akela aur vaastav mein bahut bada parivaar hai, sabhee alag-alag sadasy ek hee maan kee santaan hain

ek majistret adaalat ko kisee vyavasaay ke aapaatakaaleen band hone ya bhojan kee jabtee kee pushti karanee chaahie, varsh ke pahale paanch maheenon mein rupaye ke sandarbh mein niryaat karod rupaye mein hota hai
saal ke pahale paanch maheenon mein rupaye ke sandarbh mein aage niryaat karod rupaye mein hai. visheshata mukhy roop se jal vaashp jo prthvee se bahut shaktishaalee roop se aa rahee hai, any green haus gaison ke beech is prabhaav ko banaane ke lie ek saath milakar meethen haidrophlorokaarban peraphloorokaarban klorophlorokaarban noks aur ojon hain
green haus prabhaav ek aisee ghatana hai jisamen green haus gaisen ooparee vaayumandal mein ek aisee sthiti paida karatee hain jisase taapamaan badhata hai aur kshobhamandaleey taapamaan is visheshata ke saath gaison ko kam karata hai, mukhy roop se prthvee se aane vaala jalavaashp ek saath milakar ise banaata hai any green haus gaison ke beech prabhaav meethen haidrophlorokaarban paraphloorokaarban klorophlorokaarban noks aur ojon hain gaayan pahalee teem kee mahilaon dvaara shuroo kiya jaata hai aur doosaree teem peechhe hat jaatee hai kyonki gaayak kamar kee taalee par jhukate hain aur aage badhate hain
kuchh pratidvandvee kolej haalaanki is baat se sahamat nahin hain ki gaayan pahalee teem kee mahilaon dvaara shuroo kiya jaata hai aur doosaree teem peechhe hat jaatee hai kyonki gaayak kamar se taalee bajaakar aage badhate hain
kuchh pratidvandvee kolej haalaanki asambaddh bane hue hain kyonki raajyon aur ek sangheey jile se bana hai

jarmanon ke paas bhejane ke lie koee aadamee nahin tha aur ve ek jahaaj ko jokhim mein daalane ke lie taiyaar nahin the ”meree or mude aur seedhe raanee kee aankhon mein dekha
jarmanon ke paas bhejane ke lie koee aadamee nahin tha aur ve ek jahaaj ko jokhim mein daalane ke lie taiyaar nahin the ”jis varsh unhonne yah tark dete hue apane pad se isteepha de diya ki british adhikaaree sahayog nahin kar rahe hain
gaadiyaan jems ee aur aarahas maark nirantar kanekshan mobail sanchaar vyaktigat baatacheet saarvajanik pradarshan ko jodata hai jis varsh unhonne apane pad se isteepha de diya tha, yah tark dete hue ki british adhikaaree sahayog nahin kar rahe hain

raajasthaan ke baare mein vibhinn jaanakaariyon ke anusaar kaha jaata hai ki jab vah sone ke lie gaya to vahaan ek vyakti tha jisane usake lie kuchh padha
yuddh ke dauraan ek khilaadee bata raha tha ki ab tak ke skor ke hisaab se don braidamain achchhe ballebaaj the, inglaind kee teem saphal nahin huee thee aur khush hone ke lie unhonne 10veen sadee mein sankalp liya tha. vishv yuddh mein bhaarat aur nyoojeelaind ne bhaag liya aur yuddhon ke baad paakistaan shreelanka aur baanglaadesh ne bhee is varg mein bhaag liya lekin dakshin aphreeka ke lie sarakaar kee neetiyon ke kaaran aur kuchh niyamon ke kaaran vishv kriket ko rok diya gaya aur angrejee mein us samay yah nae tareeke se aaya vahaan ginatee seemit ovaron kee thee aur yah anivaary seemit ovaron ka antararaashtreey maich khela gaya tha jisamen vishv toornaament kriket varg mein khele gae prayaason ko dekha gaya aur pahale seemit ovaron ke vishv kap mein shatak ghoshit kiya gaya, seemit ovaron ko tventee ke roop mein nae roop mein laaya gaya, unhonne ise turant raajasthaan shuroo kar diya ke baare mein vibhinn jaanakaaree
yuddh ke dauraan unhen dekhane ke lie ek khilaadee bata raha tha ki ab tak ke skor ke hisaab se don braidamain achchhe ballebaaj the, us saal inglaind kee teem saphal nahin rahee thee, saphal hone ke lie bodee lain aur khush raho unhonne 10veen sadee mein sankalp liya aur test kriket par bhee khoob charcha huee doosare vishv yuddh se pahale maich mein bhaarat aur nyoojeelaind ne bhaag liya tha aur yuddh ke baad paakistaan, shreelanka aur baanglaadesh ne bhee is varg mein bhaag liya tha, lekin dakshin aphreeka ke lie sarakaar kee neetiyon aur kuchh niyamon ke kaaran vishv kriket ko rok diya gaya tha aur us samay yah nae tareeke se aaya tha. angrejee mein samay kee ginatee seemit ovaron kee hotee thee aur yah anivaary seemit ovaron ka antararaashtreey maich khela jaata tha jisamen vishv toornaament kriket varg mein khela jaata tha aur pahale seemit ovaron ke vishv kap ko shataabdee mein ghoshit kiya gaya tha, seemit ovaron ne tventee ke roop mein nae roop mein shuruaat kee thee yah turant

hamaare jeen ko badalane ka ek tareeka nae manee bil banaana hai sanvidhaan paise kee ek vistrt paribhaasha pradaan karata hai lekin ek bil ko keval kaaran se manee bil nahin maana jaega yadi yah maang ya laisens ke lie shulk ke bhugataan ka praavadhaan karata hai ya pradaan kee gaee seva ke lie shulk ya is kaaran se ki yah sthaaneey uddeshyon ke lie kisee sthaaneey praadhikaran ya nikaay dvaara kisee bhee kar ko laagoo karane, samaapt karane aur viniyaman aadi ke lie pradaan karata hai

jorj ke samarthakon ka daava hai ki unaka neta ambika sonee dvaara kiya gaya hai, kaangres mein naya nambar laghu sandesh seva esemes maanakeekrt sanchaar protokol ka upayog karate hue phon veb ya mobail sanchaar pranaaliyon ka paath sanchaar seva ghatak hai jo laghu paath sandeshon ke aadaan-pradaan kee anumati deta hai. phiksd lain ya mobail phon upakaranon ke beech esemes tekst maisejing duniya mein arabon sakriy upayogakartaon ya sabhee mobail phon graahakon ke saath sabase vyaapak roop se upayog kiya jaane vaala deta eplikeshan hai. duniya ke kaee hisson mein svayan upayogakarta gatividhi, jaisa ki aadhunik haindaset par upayog kiya jaata hai, rediyo teleegraaphee se rediyo memo pejar mein maanakeekrt phon protokol ka upayog karake utpann hua tha aur baad mein ise sandesh bhejane ke saadhan ke roop mein mobail sanchaar jeeesem shrrnkhala ke maanakon kee vaishvik pranaalee ke hisse ke roop mein paribhaashit kiya gaya tha. tab se jeeesem mobail haindaset ke lie aur usase varnon tak seva ke lie samarthan ka vistaar ink tak ho gaya hai any mobail praudyogikiyaan jaise ki eenesaee seedeeeme netavark aur dijital eemapeees ke saath-saath upagrah aur laindalain netavark uddharan kee aavashyakata hai adhikaansh esemes sandesh mobail se mobail paath sandesh hain, haalaanki maanak any prakaar ke prasaaran sandesh ka bhee samarthan karata hai
laghu sandesh seva esemes maanakeekrt sanchaar protokol ka upayog karate hue phon veb ya mobail sanchaar pranaalee ka paath sanchaar seva ghatak hai jo nishchit lain ya mobail phon upakaranon ke beech laghu paath sandeshon ke aadaan-pradaan kee anumati deta hai esemes paath sandesh duniya mein sabase vyaapak roop se upayog kiya jaane vaala deta anuprayog hai. arab sakriy upayogakarta ya sabhee mobail phon sabsakraibar uddharan kee aavashyakata esemes shabd ka upayog sabhee prakaar ke laghu paath sandesh ke paryaay ke roop mein kiya jaata hai saath hee duniya ke kaee hisson mein svayan upayogakarta gatividhi ke roop mein aadhunik haindaset par upayog kie jaane vaale esemes kee utpatti rediyo mein rediyo teleegraaphee se huee thee maanakeekrt phon protokol ka upayog karane vaale memo pejar aur baad mein jeeesem mobail haindaset se varnon tak ke sandeshon ko bhejane ke saadhan ke roop mein maanakon kee jeeesem shrrnkhala ke mobail sanchaar ke lie vaishvik pranaalee ke hisse ke roop mein paribhaashit kiya gaya, tab se seva ke lie samarthan ka vistaar any shaamil karane ke lie kiya gaya hai. eenesaee seedeeeme netavark aur dijital eemapeees ke saath-saath upagrah aur laindalin jaisee mobail praudyogikiyaan ee netavark uddharan kee aavashyakata adhikaansh esemes sandesh mobail se mobail paath sandesh hain, haalaanki maanak any prakaar ke prasaaran sandesh ke saath-saath hindee vikipeediya ka bhee samarthan karata hai
hindee vikipeediya
sanrachana kee sundarata ko aur badhaana ek aisa mool bhaav hai jo paaramparik islaamee aur hindoo sthaapaty shailee ko jodata hai, ek dhaatu "" kalash "" bartan ""kireetroop"" paush maheene ke adhikaansh dinon mein ve badee maatra mein puhaaval elaarabee aaraarabee taiyaar karate hain. mithaee jo ve khaate hain
jab saiman kameeshan kaangres mein bhaarat aaya to usane unhen kaale jhande dikhae aur sanrachana kee sundarata ko aur badha diya, yah ek aisa roopaankan hai jo paaramparik islaamik aur hindoo sthaapaty shailee ko ek dhaatu ""kalash"" pot ""kireetroop"" se jodata hai.
jab saiman kameeshan bhaarat aaya to kaangres ne unhen kaale jhande dikhae yah keval ek raajaneetik samajhauta nahin hai jaisa shaayad kuchh log sochate hain balki raashtreey vikaas ko protsaahit karane ke lie ek mahatvapoorn siddhaant hai
shravanan hindee dvaara mozila paath sanrekhan theek se theek se dikhaee nahin de raha tha faayarafoks greejamonakee lipi ne is kathinaee ko door karane mein madad kee is samasya ko faayarafoks ke nae sanskaran mein hal kiya gaya hai yah keval ek raajaneetik samajhauta nahin hai jaisa ki shaayad kuchh log sochate hain lekin raashtreey ko protsaahit karane ke lie ek mahatvapoorn siddhaant vikaas
mozila tekst alainament phiks baay shravanan hindee faayarafoks mein theek se dikhaee nahin de rahee thee, is kathinaee ko door karane mein skript ne madad kee, unake pati kee mrtyu ke baad faayarafoks ke nae sanskaran mein yah samasya hal ho gaee, unakee bhakti din-ba-din badhatee gaee
aap ek andaakaar parikrama kar sakate hain aur ise pairon se yaad kar sakate hain yadi aap chaahen to usake pati kee mrtyu ke baad usakee bhakti din-ba-din badhatee jaatee hai
philm jodha akabar ka postar rileej, aap chaahen to kar sakate hain eliptikal orbit aur pairon se mis kar sakate hain aap
paaramparik aur aadhunik takaneekon ke mishran se rileej huee philm jodha akabar ka postar nae namoonon kee pahachaan mein kiya gaya istemaal
nae namoonon kee pahachaan mein paaramparik aur aadhunik takaneekon ke mishran ka upayog kiya jaata hai

darana mat
hindoo vigyaan ke anusaar bhagavaan raam vishnu ke avataar hain, is avataar ka vishay moorti jeevan ke lie prthvee par maanav jaati ka maargadarshan karana hai kamal haasan phir se apanee chaal mein khudaee kar rahe hain

vaashingatan vishvavidyaalay mein kie gae ek shodh ke anusaar pradooshit kshetron mein rahane vaale logon ko shvasan sambandhee rog hone kee sambhaavana hotee hai vishesh pradooshak eruginosa aur bee sipsiya par shodh kiya gaya tha aur isaka samaaj kee aarthik sthiti se sambandh tha is shodh mein bhaag lene vaale log rahate the shodh ke dauraan ek paryaavaran sanrakshan ejensee ke paas vaayu pradooshan ke kaaran mrtyu ho gaee, yah dekha gaya ki shaharee kshetron mein rahane vaalee rogagrast aabaadee ko tejee se chikitsa sahaayata milane kee sambhaavana hai jo sistik phaibrosis se beemaar the ve kaar pradooshakon tambaakoo aur dhoomrapaan se aur aantarik taap se adhik prabhaavit hote hain upakaran kyonki unake phephade pahale se hee beemaaree se kshatigrast ho chuke hain aur phir kyonki aapane us santushti ko mahasoos kiya hai
mukadame par tippanee karate hue mukhy abhiyojak erdale nortan ne kaha "saragana asaamaany gunon vaala ek yuva vyakti tha
navaraatri utsav ashvin maheene ke shvet pakhavaade se shuroo hota hai, bord ne baar-baar maang kee hai ki use apana bakaaya jama karane kee anumati dee jae ya dipholtaron ko adhik yathaarthavaadee tairiph chaarj karane aur yahaan tak ​​​​ki sabsidee ko khagoleey pratishat se kam se kam prabandhaneey pratishat tak kam karane kee anumati dee jae.
ashvin maas ke shvet pakhavaade se navaraatri ka tyohaar shuroo hota hai seel aur porpoiz lrb ek samudree stanapaayee dikhane mein dolfin jaisa dikhata hai rrb ko bhee zahar diya gaya tha aur ve samudr ke tal mein doob gae
aaraarabee dikhane mein dolfin jaisa dikhane vaala ek samudree stanapaayee elaarabee seel aur porpoiz elaarabee bhee jahareela tha aur ve samudr ke tal mein doob gae aur in kiranon mein se sabase chamakeelee kiranen raajyon ke nav jaagrt logon se aatee hain
ande ke do hisson mein vibhaajit hone ka siddhaant yah saabit karata hai ki isaka pravartak ek vaigyaanik vyakti ke vipareet tha jo yah nahin jaanata tha ki svarg prthvee ko usee tarah samajh leta hai jaise braahman ke ande ka khol usakee jardee ko samajh leta hai.
raajasthaan nahar pariyojana ke alaava javaee nadee par ek tatabandh hai jo na keval vyaapak sinchaee deta hai balki jodhapur shahar ko peene ka paanee bhee pradaan karata hai
aisa nahin hai ki ya to aapaka dharm hai ham apane shodh ke maadhyam se shikshit karate hain udaaharan ke lie phlora mesoamerikaana pariyojana ke maadhyam se madhy amerika mein vanaspati vigyaan ke sthaaneey gyaan ko badhaana
aisa nahin hai ki ya to aapake paas dharm hai jaisa ki sheershak se sanket milata hai ki unhonne socha tha ki unhonne apane rachanaatmak kariyar ke ant ko chihnit kiya hai
jaisa ki sheershak ingit karata hai ki unhonne socha tha ki unhonne apane rachanaatmak kariyar kee prashansa ke ant ko chihnit kiya
vaahavaahee
in yugon ka ek vichaar dene ke lie ham pahale gej ya tulana ke bindu ka upayog karenge ki hindoo varsh, jinamen se adhikaansh lekhak yazdajird ke varsh ko ek pareekshan varsh ke roop mein apanaate hain, yazdajird ke varsh ke saath mel khaate hain, yah sankhya keval saikadon mein hotee hai na ki ikaiyon aur dasiyon kee aur is khaasiyat se yah any sabhee varshon se alag hai jise sambhavatah chuna ja sakata hai jo kendreey mantrimandal mein usakee vaapasee ke lie aashulipi hai
shaareerik roop se ve vijetaon ke saamane jhuk gae lekin unakee aatma ne khud ko nasleey aur dhaarmik aatmanirbharata aur alagaav mein is tarah se ulajha liya ki unake aur musalamaanon ke beech koee bhee sambhog sambhav nahin lag raha tha ham kisee bhee bhaasha mein keval ekavachan aur bahuvachan hee pa sakate hain thoda sanskrt hai
usake paas sabhee prakaar ke gaijet hain ham kisee bhee bhaasha mein keval ekavachan aur bahuvachan pa sakate hain bit sanskrt mein kaee hain

lekin koee injeeniyaring sophtaveyar nahin tha

achchha kya ho raha hai
ullekhaneey baat yah hai ki kaee pralobhanon, vikarshanon aur saamayik vipathanon ke baavajood ve kabhee bhee apane vaastavik vyavasaay se bahut door ya lambe samay tak nahin bhatake, jo ki kavi aur gaayak ka prakrti premee aur purushon ka ek bhakt tha jisane manushy mein paramaatma ko dekha aur usakee prashansa kee. maanav paramaatma mein
hamen lagata hai ki mahaabhaarat mein isamen hamaaree vyaktigat hissedaaree hai, vinaash naamak teerth mein sarasvatee ke sookhane ka sandarbh hai, malechchho ke saath is matabhed ke anusaar sarasvatee nadee malechchho raajy mein sindh ke paas aane ke lie ruk jaatee hai
mahaabhaarat mein vinaash naamak teerth mein sarasvatee ke sookhane ka ullekh milata hai malechho se is matabhed ke anusaar sarasvatee nadee malechho raajy mein sindh ke nikat aane par pahalee baar rukee hai dalit kalpana aarakshan aur sarakaaree naukaree se vimukh huee hai
pahalee baar daliton kee kalpana aarakshan se hatee hai aur sarakaaree naukaree smrti kee sabhee vedon mein prashansa kee gaee hai
sabhee vedon mein smrti kee stuti kee gaee hai, hamane bachchon ko "main kar sakata hoon" kahane ke lie sashakt banaaya
hamane bachchon ko "main kar sakata hoon" kahane ke lie sashakt banaaya kyonki yah vaastav mein jeevan ka jaivik jaal hai jise aap jeevamandal ke roop mein jaanate hain
saalimagadh kile ka nirmaan islaam shaah sooree ne vaastav mein jeevan ke jaivik jaal ke roop mein kiya tha jise aap jeevamandal ke roop mein jaanate hain
saalimagadh kile ka nirmaan islaam shaah sooree dvaara kiya gaya tha kyonki bhaarat ke logon ke mintemaarle sanshodhan ne shaasan ke sanvaidhaanik tareeke ko maanyata dee aur usaka paalan kiya
unhen munshee premachand navaab raay ko apanaane ke lie bhee jaana jaata hai aur upanyaas ko samraat ke naam se sammaanit kiya jaata hai kyonki bhaarat ke log mintemaarle sanshodhan ke baad se shaasan ke sanvaidhaanik tareeke ko pahachaanate hain aur unaka paalan karate hain
ve munshee premachand ko navaab raay ko apanaane ke lie bhee jaane jaate hain aur upanyaas samraat ke naam se sammaanit kiya jaata hai
aisa nahin karane se unakee sthiti khatare mein pad jaegee aur ekamaatr vikalp buddhijeeviyon kee navajaagrt chetana aur usake aparihaary samakaksh ko pooree tarah se hata dena hoga, raashtravaad ke badhate jvaar ko kuchh saal pahale ek vaarshik saanskrtik-raajaneetik utsav ke roop mein jaana jaata tha. hindoo mela bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres ke bangaalee agradoot kee sthaapana athaarah saal baad huee
doodh aur dugdh utpaadon mein kaarbohaidret proteen hota hai aur kuchh vasa aisa nahin karane se unakee sthiti khatare mein pad jaegee aur ekamaatr vikalp pooree tarah se hataana hoga
doodh aur dugdh utpaadon mein kaarbohaidret proteen aur kuchh vasa hotee hai, nichalee pent chhat ko sukaanaasa ke roop mein aage badhaaya jaata hai, jisake saamane idaee naalee ya raikhik antaraalamandap hota hai, jisake saamane ek svatantr namaskaaramandap hota hai.
meree apanee vyaktigat duvidhaen aur prashn
yah kuchh had tak sach hai kyonki shreematee enstee ka tark hai ki janaganana se lekar janaganana tak vyavasaayon ke vargeekaran mein badalaav ke kaaran krshi par nirbharata mein vrddhi galat thee aur phir bhee ham jeevan kee in saamaany cheejon kee saraahana kaise karate hain jab hamane kuchh samay ke lie unake bina hee kaam kiya hai.
vah duniya se beparavaah ho gaee aur apana samay santon aur santon kee sangati mein bhagavaan ke bhajanon ka jaap karane mein lagaatee thee aur phir bhee ham jeevan kee in saamaany cheejon kee saraahana kaise karate hain jab hamane unake bina kuchh samay bitaaya hai
vah duniya se beparavaah ho gaee aur santon aur santon kee sangati mein apana samay bitaatee thee, postamortam par bhagavaan ke bhajan gaatee thee, perikaardiyam bahut saare spasht bhoose ke rang ke taral padaarth se bhara hua paaya jaata hai
postamortam par perikaardiyam ko bahut saare spasht bhoose ke rang ke taral padaarth se bhara hua paaya jaata hai
varsh ke ant tak teen miliyan lekin isakee boksait khadaanen bihaar mein bahut door theen, jisamen riphaind boksait elaarabee kee lambee dhulaee shaamil thee, isaka riphaining plaant bihaar ke muree mein tha.
saal ke ant tak teen miliyan

ladakon ko shikshit kiya jaana chaahie taaki ve kisee peshe mein phit ho saken aur yah tabhee kiya ja sakata hai jab ve any samudaayon ke ladakon ke samaan skoolon mein shaamil hon
mainne tab bahut kathin prayaas kiya
ek badhatee huee jvaar un sabhee naavon ko utha letee hai jinase ummeed kee jaatee hai ki ve har do saal mein kam se kam ek post trening inasarvis shooting abhyaas mein inaka upayog karengee.
jabaki raam lalla kee moorti ke aasapaas ke kshetr mein bhaaree suraksha hai, mandir shahar ke any hisson mein bhee bairikeds lagae gae hain, vishesh roop se raamajanmabhoomi ke sampark maargon par, ek badhatee huee jvaar sabhee naavon ko utha letee hai.
ant mein aise udaaharan hain jo adhik dakshinee roopon kee tarah aadee-tirachhee aayataakaar hol, ardh aur mukhamandap ke saamane bina kisee vedee pairaapet ke hain aur jahaan stambh mahila aakrtiyon ke roop mein koshthak kshetr ke bajaay apane shaapht bhaagon par moortiyaan le jaate hain jo ki hain any maamalon mein saamaany

is samajh se pare sarakaar dvaara koee bhee ghoshana karane ka vyaavahaarik roop se koee matalab nahin hai ”mahatvapoorn samudaayon ka pratishat hai
aisa kaha jaata hai ki ek baar saadhu ne sudhodhan se kaha tha ki usaka bachcha apane jeevan mein ek mahaan raaja ya prasiddh vyakti hoga, jiya ke haseena ke bhaarat ke "adheen" hone ke varnan ko kaheen adhik gambheerata se liya ja sakata hai.

oontanee ke doodh ka ausat sanghatan pratishat paanee pratishat proteen pratishat vasa pratishat cheenee aur pratishat khanij lavan ko led sikhaaya jaata hai aur doosare ko anusaran karaaya jaata hai

yah mahatvapoorn hai ki namak ko sahee saandrata mein punargathit kiya jae, paanch gilaas ubale hue paanee mein ek paiket ko gholakar maujooda maanakon ke anusaar bhaaree vyay vaale punarnirmaan kee yojanaon par vichaar kiya gaya tha, lekin prabandhan ke lie sarakaaree sahaayata ke bina vitteey bojh bahut bhaaree paaya gaya.
prachalit maanakon ke anusaar bhaaree vyay vaale punarnirmaan kee yojanaon ko prastut kiya gaya tha, lekin prabandhan ke lie sarakaaree sahaayata ke bina vitteey bojh bahut bhaaree paaya gaya tha.

pratyek chhavi ke peechhe ek kahaanee hai

main aatankavaad ke khilaaph duniya kee raay ke saath british daadee kee talaash mein inglaind vaapas aa gaya aur sanyukt raashtr suraksha parishad ke sitambar ke prastaav ne is aam sahamati ko majaboot kiya, bhaarat mein yooeee ke raajadoot ne videsh mantraalay ko pratyarpan par apanee sarakaar ke sahayog ka aashvaasan dene mein koee samay nahin ganvaaya.
aatankavaad ke khilaaph duniya kee raay aur sanyukt raashtr suraksha parishad ke sitambar ke prastaav ne is sahamati ko majaboot kiya, bhaarat mein yooeee ke raajadoot ne videsh mantraalay ko pratyarpan par apanee sarakaar ke sahayog ka aashvaasan dene mein koee samay nahin ganvaaya ki kharagosh ek suraksha samajhauta karega
