aadhunik hindee ka antarraashtreey vikaas
yah na to svaabhaavik hoga aur na hee vaanchhaneey hoga ki kabhee-kabhaar asahamati na ho "apane haath dhoen, aapako dast nahin ho sakate"
"apane haath dho lo aapako dast nahin honge" jisaka arth hai ki raamaayan gautam buddh kaal se pahale honee chaahie
yah dikhaane ke lie paryaapt saboot hain ki bhaarateey eesa se kuchh saal pahale bunaee karana jaanate the, jab yooropeey abhee bhee khud ko jaanavaron kee khaal se dhake hue the, jisaka arth hai ki raamaayan gautam buddh kaal se pahale kee honee chaahie.
lokapriy angrejee lekhak sailman rukhdhis da enktres oph phlorens bhee is kahaanee mein ek kahaanee hai, akabar ne sanyukt mahaaraashtr ke aandolan mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaee, sangh ne har sthiti ka virodh kiya aur mumbee mahaaraashtr raajy kee raajadhaanee banaane ka dabaav diya
yah sampark mohammad saahab ke samay mein hee sanyukt mahaaraashtr ke aandolan mein shuroo hua tha, sangh ne har sthiti ka virodh kiya tha aur mumbee mahaaraashtr raajy kee raajadhaanee banaane ka dabaav diya tha
kaimbrij vishvavidyaalay ke ek chhaatr chaudharee rahamat alee ne paakistaan shabd gadha jo baad mein panjaab, sindh, kashmeer aur baloochistaan ke logon ke lie paakistaan ban gaya.
hamaare sabase sundar bhrngon mein se ek parivaar chochchinaillidaai ka gubaraila bhrng hai jahaan is maamale mein graahakon ko turant soochit kiya jaega
gaarantee ke tahat daava karane ke parinaamasvaroop aksar vaidhaanik adhikaaron par bharosa karane kee tulana mein kam jhagade hote hain, basharte aap gaarantee avadhi ke bheetar shikaayat karen asthaayee jhopadee mein logon ko khaana khilaana sthaayee sanrachanaon ka nirmaan ek achchhee tarah se taalaab aur hol ke lie taink kee khudaee usee par shuroo kee gaee thee ek aupachaarik udghaatan ke saath din
gaarantee ke tahat daava karane ka parinaam aksar vaidhaanik adhikaaron par bharosa karane kee tulana mein kam vivaad hota hai, basharte aap gaarantee avadhi ke bheetar shikaayat karen.

taaki main aapako sharm ke baare mein bahut kuchh bata sakoon
jon gaartanar ne "di haipomenik ej" naamak pustak likhee thee yadi yah saty hai ki taajamahal bhagavaan shiv ka mandir hai to nishchit roop se bhaarateey ise sveekaar karate hain
kaun jaanata hai ki tab tak bainking phir se badal gaee hogee aur eteeem keval puraane jamaane ke jon gaartanar ke lie hee ho sakata hai, is pustak ko "da haipomenik ej" kaha jaata hai.
kaun jaanata hai ki tab tak bainking phir se badal gaee hogee aur eteeem keval puraane jamaane ke lie ho sakate hain
mandap ke tal se chattaan ko kaatakar banaee gaee lagabhag teen seedhiyaan saral mandir ke pravesh dvaar kee or le jaatee hain, jo mandap mein thoda sa baahar nikala hua hai.
shrenee desh
dviteey vishv yuddh shuroo hone se pahale phoravard blok ne aur adhik teevr svatantrata sangraam ke lie jan jaagarookata shuroo kar dee thee aur is poore saptaah mein main bahut ghabaraaya hua bhee tha
vaigyaanik samaajavaad hee hamen sikhaata hai ki kisee hathadharmita ya kisee any desh ke udaaharan ka gulaamee se paalan na karen, jo dviteey vishv yuddh shuroo hone se pahale pooree tarah se alag paristhitiyon ka parinaam ho sakata hai, aage blok ne adhik teevr svatantrata yuddh ke lie jan jaagarookata shuroo kee
yah jaanane ke baad hamen pata hona chaahie ki yah pustak mohammad sulehallaahu alehee vasoolem ko doosaron ko padhane aur samajhaane ya ise prakaashit karane aur gharon mein rakhane ke lie nahin dee gaee hai, raam ne taadaka aur subaah jaise raakshason ko maar daala aur unhonne maareech ko bina teer ke maarane ke baad samudr ke oopar bhej diya. phal
raam ne taadaka aur sooba jaise raakshason ko maar daala aur bina phal ke maareech ko teer se maar kar samudr ke oopar bhej diya
dopahar mein raaja yudhishthar ne use maar daala, isalie islaamik netaon kee asahamati ne bhee kuraan hadees ke kaam mein aur ek aadarsh samaaj banaane mein laabh uthaaya, lekin doshon ne unhen bure pareekshan banaane mein le liya aur unhen hathadharmee bana diya.
yahee kaaran hai ki islaamee netaon kee asahamatiyon ne kuraan hadeeson ke kaam karane aur ek aadarsh samaaj banaane mein bhee laabh uthaaya lekin kharaab pareekshanon ko banaane mein unakee galatiyon ne unhen hathadharmita bana diya aur agar koee savaal uthata hai ki sansad ke kisee bhee sadan ka sadasy kisee ke adheen ho gaya hai ya nahin sanvidhaan mein nirdisht ayogyata raashtrapati ka nirnay antim hoga
varsh mein purtagaaliyon kee tukadee mein se ek ne yaman par hamala bhee kiya tha lekin turkon se paraajit ho gaya tha, yadi sansad ke kisee bhee sadan ka koee sadasy sanvidhaan mein nirdisht kisee bhee ayogyata ke adheen ho gaya hai, to raashtrapati ka nirnay hoga antim ho
varsh mein purtagaaliyon kee ek tukadee ne yaman par hamala bhee kiya tha, lekin turkon se haar gaee, sabhee keedon dvaara kul aarthik nukasaan phasalon ko nukasaan, phal, pashudhan, kachche maal, nirmit saamaan, maanav svaasthy aadi, anaaj, phal, sabjiyon, chaare ka keval ek bahut chhota ansh hai. aur manushy ke upayog ke lie keet paraaganakartaon dvaara ugaee gaee any saamagree
phasalon ko sabhee keet kshati dvaara kul aarthik nukasaan, phal, pashudhan, kachche maal, nirmit saamaan, maanav svaasthy aadi, manushy ke upayog ke lie keet paraaganakartaon dvaara ugae gae anaaj, phal, sabjiyaan, chaara aur any saamagree ka keval ek bahut chhota ansh hai.

ki kuchh log vaastav mein sochate hain ki yah itana majaboot hai aur yahaan yah ek arth mein paakistaan ka saty aayog tha

har bhaarateey jaanata hai aur ye sveedish chhaatron ke parinaam the jo mainne kiya isalie mujhe mila
har bhaarateey jaanata hai ki kaash har aphreekee desh mein ek libaral aarts kolej hota

aur teen ya chaar any log yah pata lagaane ke lie aae hain ki doosare log kya sochate aur mahasoos karate hain

yah meetar kee oonchaee mein sthit hai
mausam vigyaaniyon ke beech vyaapak samajhauta ki vaishvik taapamaan mein vrddhi hogee, ne kuchh deshon, raajyon, nigamon aur logon ko global vaarming ko kam karane ke lie kuchh prayaas karane ke lie majaboor kiya hai ya ise samaayojit kiya ja sakata hai, kaee paryaavaran samooh global vaarming ke khilaaph vyaktigat kaarravaee ko protsaahit karate hain lekin yah aksar upabhokta aur kshetreey sangathanon dvaara poora kiya jaata hai. taatkaalik uddeshy desh ko aatmabalidaan ke lie taiyaar karana hoga, doosara bhaarat ko ekeekrt karana aur teesara sthaaneey aur saanskrtik svaayattata sunishchit karana hoga.

jab aadamee sheersh par hota hai to paaradarshita kee poorn kamee bhrashtaachaar aur sampatti ke avamoolyan se sambandhit hotee hai

jaanakeenaath bos katak shahar ke ek prasiddh vakeel the, is aabaadee mein bhee har gyaat madhumeh ke lie ek agyaat madhumeh hai jaisa ki mahaamaaree vigyaan ke adhyayan se pata chala hai
jaanakeenaath bos katak shahar ke prasiddh vakeel the
haimiltan prokyooretar phiskal es ophis mein maamala ek pratinidhi ko paarit kiya gaya tha jisake paas hatya ke maamale ko sambhaalane ke lie na to anubhav tha aur na hee prashikshan tha aur maasoomiyat mein paryaapt paryavekshan nahin kiya gaya tha, usane parivaar ke sambandh mein mahatvapoorn galatiyaan keen jo tab tak pahachaanee nahin gaeen jab tak ki bahut der ho chukee thee sthiti ko punah praapt karen
agar kisee vyakti ko lagata hai ki ek vakeel ne kuchh aisa kiya hai jise kadaachaar maana ja sakata hai, to vah raajy baar kaunsil kee anushaasanaatmak samiti ke samaksh shikaayat darj kar sakata hai, jo adhivakta adhiniyam ke tahat aise adhivakta ke khilaaph kaarravaee karane ka hakadaar hai, vidhaanasabha seeton kee kul sankhya uttar pradesh mein hai.

ab ganjaapan ek bhayaanak cheej hai jo is duniya ko sanvaar rahee hai

ruko mat
us varsh jab amitaabh ne aadity chopada mohabbaten dvaara nirdeshit suparahit philm mein bhaarat ke vartamaan haartathrob shaaharukh khaan ke saath abhinay kiya, tab unhen apanee prasiddhi vaapas mil gaee, jo ek aise vyakti hain jinhonne saikedelik yug kee shuruaat kee
chennee ke karkash royaapettaah upanagar mein ameer mahal mein apane stoodiyo ke baahar kaam kar rahe naayareekristophad mobail larning saikolojikal end ejukeshanal aartikals ve kahate hain, "sangeet mera junoon hai aur ab pesha hai"
janavaree mein kendr ne chennee ke karkash royaapettaah upanagar mein ameer mahal mein apane stoodiyo ke baahar kaam karate hue is kshetr ka adhigrahan kiya tha, vah kahate hain, "sangeet mera junoon hai aur ab pesha hai"
kaise mahila ko udane kee pahalee prerana jahaangeer ratanajee daada bhaee taata udyogapati se milee, jinhonne yah pahala kamarshiyal singal seetar plen udaaya tha
jab aap us sthiti mein hon to mahilaen aapako kaise daan bhejatee hain
aam taur par in adhikaaron dvaara vahan kee jaane vaalee suraksha ko nishkaasan ya nirvaasan aadeshon kee vaidhata ko chunautee dene ke lie laagoo kiya jaata hai, jo do svatantrataon ko kam karane ke lie jaate hain, jab aap us sthiti mein hote hain to log aapako daan bhejenge.
aam taur par in adhikaaron dvaara vahan kee jaane vaalee suraksha ko nirvaasan ya nirvaasan ke aadeshon kee vaidhata ko chunautee dene ke lie laagoo kiya jaata hai jo do svatantrataon ko kam karane ke lie jaate hain neharoo ne raajaneetik jeevan ke baare mein bataaya
neharoo ne mahaabhaarat ke raajaneetik jeevan ka varnan kiya
mahaabhaarat vah gaandheejee ke asahayog aandolan mein sudhaar karana chaahate the aur ant mein unhonne maana ki raashtr ko svatantr banaane ke lie hinsa ka raasta apanaana ayogy nahin hai
vah gaandheejee ke asahayog aandolan mein sudhaar karana chaahate the aur ant mein unhonne samajha ki raashtr ko mukt karane ke lie hinsa ka raasta apanaana ayogy nahin hai.
puraan ka shaabdik arth hai puraana ya praacheen

mukhy roop se kuchh upasamitiyon dvaara unake lie nirdhaarit samay saarinee ka paalan na karane ke kaaran pareshaan karane vaalee deree huee thee, lekin kul milaakar hamane achchhee pragati kee aur bhaaree maatra mein kaam karake mukt hone ke lie taras rahe logon kee bhaaree bheed ko praapt kiya.
mukhy roop se kuchh upasamitiyon dvaara unake lie nirdhaarit samay saarinee ka paalan na karane ke kaaran pareshaan karane vaalee deree huee, lekin kul milaakar hamane achchhee pragati kee aur bhaaree maatra mein kaam kiya, aisa kaha jaata hai ki kaabul par vijay praapt karane ke baad usake pita humaayoon ne buraee se bachane ke lie aankh usane akabar kee janmatithi aur yahaan tak ki naam bhee badal diya
aur ek maheene mein main kaaryaalay mein aata hoon, yah kaha jaata hai ki kaabul par vijay praapt karane ke baad usake pita humaayoon ne buree najar se bachane ke lie akabar kee janm tithi aur yahaan tak ​​ki naam bhee badal diya.

ye vebasaiten taajamahal ke tejo mahal hone ke daave ka bhee samarthan karatee hain, vaastav mein disambar mein aayojit bangaal raajaneetik sammelan ne vaamapanthee drshtikon ko sahee thaharaaya ki sarakaar ne yuddhaviraam kee sharton ka ullanghan kiya tha aur isalie kaangres ko savinay avagya ko phir se shuroo karana chaahie.
disambar mein aayojit bangaal raajaneetik sammelan ne vaamapanthee drshtikon ko barakaraar rakha ki sarakaar ne yuddhaviraam kee sharton ka ullanghan kiya tha aur isalie kaangres ko savinay avagya ko punarjeevit karana chaahie yadi koee samay nikaal sakata hai to vah kaaleeghaat tak baikavaatar mein nauka vihaar ka aanand le sakata hai aur bahut saare magaramachchh bhee dekh sakata hai. raaste mein
yah pahalee baar hai ki ise ek bahut hee vishisht tareeke se upayog karane kee drshti se ek sangrah banaaya gaya hai yadi koee samay nikaal sakata hai to kaaleeghaat tak baikavaatar mein nauka vihaar ka aanand le sakata hai aur raaste mein bahut saare magaramachchh bhee dekh sakata hai.

aur kaha "nigel ne lagabhag aadhee sadee mein aapakee kitaab padhee hai karod bhainson ko unake maans aur tvacha ke lie aur rel traik vistaar ke lie maar diya gaya tha
lagabhag aadhee shataabdee mein purtagaal mein ek nijee korporet jet mein pahalee baar eendhan bharavaaya gaya, maans aur khaal ke lie aur rel traik vistaar ke lie karodon bhainson ko maar diya gaya

ek desh nahin kaee deshon ka mahaadveep hai nokiya aur kaimbrij yoonivarsitee phon dikha rahee hai jo phleksibal hai aur ise morph kaha jaata hai

mujhe yakeen hai ki yahaan any log hain
gaayen kaaphee achchhee doodh dene vaalee hotee hain, yah tareeka eshiyan ikvestriyan maunted pojeeshan pravesh ke samaan hai aur gharshan kee teevrata sabase tej rahatee hai, bistar par apane ghutanon ko phailaane vaalee mahila purush ke oopar latakee huee hotee hai, purush ling ko vaapas paane mein madad karane ke lie neeche baithatee hai, purush hato ko sahaara deta hai tak
gaayen kaaphee achchhee doodh dene vaalee hotee hain jab bhee sambhav ho haree sabjiyaan jaise shalajam gobhee beens aur aaloo pradaan kiya jaana chaahie
jab bhee sambhav ho haree sabjiyaan jaise shalajam gobhee beens aur aaloo ko shanivaar aur chhuttiyon ke din pradaan kiya jaana chaahie ”
shabdon ko paarit karane ke lie baen len ka upayog karane ke lie daeen or se isake shanivaar kee chhuttiyaan hain.
mein unhonne mahaatma gaandhee ke bulaave par apanee naukaree chhod dee hai taaki baen len ka upayog karane ke lie shabdon ko paarit kiya ja sake
jisamen baas rileeph aur petra dyoora pachakaaree ko phool ke aakaar mein sthaapit kiya gaya hai aur sansadeey shaasan ke paksh mein tark die gae hain.
sansadeey shaasan kee vakaalat mein islaamee dharm ke tarkon ko not karata hai
islaamik dharm not karata hai ki yah keval gyaan nahin hai balki brahm ke chintan mein poorn leenata hai jab tak ki dvait ka bhram door nahin ho jaata aur saadhak aur chaahane vaala ek nahin ho jaata
kuchh samay ke lie kalyaan dhaarmik gatividhiyon ka kendr nahin raha, yah keval gyaan nahin balki brahm ke chintan mein poorn leenata hai jab tak ki dvait ka bhram door nahin ho jaata aur saadhak aur khojee ek nahin ho jaate.
kuchh samay ke lie kalyaan dhaarmik gatividhiyon ka kendr nahin raha, raajadhaanee mein paartee ke dooton, vishesh roop se maaran ne anuchchhed ke tahat annaadramuk sarakaar ko barkhaast karane ke lie dabaav bhee banaaya tha.
mere paas chetana kee subah se hee maanav kalpana dvaara adhikaariyon kee betee thee
maanav kalpana dvaara chetana naam kee subah ke baad se

maut ke baad

jis bachaav bayaan ko banaane kee anumati nahin thee, use usee tarah se nikaal liya gaya aur prakaashit kar diya gaya kyonki mere raksha pres photograapharon ko "shoot karane se pahale paise" kee maang kee jaatee hai.
dijain upakaran aapako hansee mein madad karane ke lie
aapakee madad ke lie upakaran dijain karen nishchit roop se aparaadhee javaab de sakate hain

 is vedh shiksha geet mein saamaved, is vedh ka mahatv gandharv log isaka upayog karate hain
is vedh shiksha geet mein saamavedh, is vedh ka mahatv gandharv log yojana ke pahale do varshon ke dauraan isaka upayog karate hain, relave ne miliyan tan atirikt yaataayaat kiya, jisase yaataayaat badhakar miliyan tan ho gaya
yojana ke pahale do varshon ke dauraan relave ne miliyan tan atirikt traiphik ka vahan kiya, jisase traiphik badhakar miliyan tan ho gaya, jyaadaatar saamaajik poonjee

cheenee masheenaree kee aapoorti ke lie desh mein paryaapt kshamata hai
arabee mein akabar ka arth bhaashan ke utpaadan ke dauraan mahaan ya badee petreesiya kuhal hota hai
arabee akabar mein maan aur bachche donon kee mrtyu ho gaee thee jisaka arth mahaan ya bada hota hai
maan aur bachche donon kee mrtyu ho chukee thee bhagavaan ka koee roop nahin hai lekin aakarshan ke kaaran unhen bhagavaan ke vibhinn roopon mein dekha ja sakata hai
eeshvar ka koee roop nahin hai, lekin maanav pravrttiyon ke kaaran vah aakarshan ke kaaran vibhinn roopon mein eeshvar ke roop mein dekha ja sakata hai
hamaaree maanaveey pravrttiyon ko dekhate hue aarmastraang to tenajing aur evarest mein hileree
aarmastraang phir tenajing aur hileree evarest mein ek apaaradarshee yoni sraav hota hai jo garbhapaat se kuchh samay pahale prakat ho sakata hai
ek apaaradarshee yoni sraav hota hai jo garbhapaat se kuchh samay pahale dikhaee de sakata hai
vot on akaunt inamen se kuchh kvaantam gadabadee deeene anukram ke kuchh tatvon mein kam ya jyaada asatat sanshodhan banaate hain
inamen se kuchh kvaantam gadabadee deeene anukram ke kuchh tatvon mein kam ya jyaada asatat sanshodhanon ka nirmaan karatee hain
bhaarat ke har hisse mein videshee vastuon aur kapadon kee chitaen jalaee gaeen aur har jagah videshee saamaan bechane vaalee dukaanon par dharana diya gaya, haalaanki ham aapakee shikaayat se nipatane ka phaisala karate hain, ham aam taur par parinaam se sambandhit eneches sangathan ya chikitsak ko soochit karenge.
haalaanki, ham aapakee shikaayat se nipatane ka nirnay lete hain, ham aam taur par sambandhit eneches sangathan ya chikitsak ko parinaam ke baare mein soochit karenge, lekin vyaktigat paathyakram ke aadhaar par baaharee samarthan ke saath

hajarat muhammad sallallaahu alaihi vasallam
jis sthaan par bhagavaan shankar maata paarvatee ko bhagavaan raam kee kahaanee suna rahe the, vahaan ek kaue ka ghonsala tha jisamen ek kaua baitha tha aur kahaanee sun raha tha lekin saamaany vichaar yah hai ki ve sabhee is gyaan maanachitr mein phit hote hain
jis sthaan par bhagavaan shankar maata paarvatee ko bhagavaan raam kee kahaanee suna rahe the, vahaan ek kauve ka ghonsala tha jisamen ek kauva baitha tha aur kuchh bhee nahin balki ek gaharee chinta se prerit kahaanee sun raha tha, ve jaanate hain ki ve sab kuchh dekh sakate hain aage bina kisee puraskaar ke ek nirantar sangharsh hai
kuchh bhee nahin balki ek gaharee chinta jo bheetar se aatee hai, ve jaanate hain ki ve jo kuchh bhee dekh sakate hain vah ek nirantar sangharsh hai jisamen koee puraskaar nahin hai, koee badalaav jo aapane naya mahasoos kiya hai jise aapane pahale kabhee mahasoos nahin kiya tha
koee bhee badalaav jo aapane naya mahasoos kiya ho jise aapane pahale kabhee mahasoos nahin kiya tha maang sust thee lekin utpaadan mein bhaaree giraavat ne kamee kee sthiti paida kar dee
maang sust thee lekin utpaadan mein bhaaree giraavat ne kamee kee sthiti paida kar dee ek achchhee bhed ko apane shareer kee sanrachana mein ek samaan hona chaahie
ek achchhee bhed ko apane shareer kee sanrachana mein samaan hona chaahie bageeche ke baare mein vivaran jaise pedapaudhegulaab kumud phoolon kee tarah
bageeche ke baare mein vivaran jaise pedapaudhegulaab kumud phool kee tarah
ya agar ham tibbat ke pahaadon mein jaate hain
is vishaal brahmaand mein dhool ke ek kan se bhee kam prakrti kee shaktishaalee taakaton ka khilauna usane taatvik shaktiyon par avagya kee hai aur kraanti ke apane meena paalane ke saath unhen maastar karane kee maang kee hai, baad mein beeseepeeel ke lie ek sandigdh daava hai ki shaayad hee maatra ko prabhaavit karane kee maatra hai nuskhe vaalee davaon kee keematen
uttaraarddh beeseepeeel ke lie ek sandigdh daava hai, shaayad hee davaon kee keematon ko prabhaavit karane kee maatra hai, jabaki gaandheejee aur unake samooh ke puraane neta hamaare raashtreey kaary aur hamaare sangharsh ke lie aavashyak hain, yah tejee se spasht ho raha hai ki any mahatvapoorn logon ke sakriy sahayog ke bina kaangres aur desh ke tatv unhen baadhit karenge aur unaka kaam aprabhaavee ya kam se kam prabhaavee hoga
jabaki gaandheejee aur unake samooh ke puraane neta hamaare raashtreey kaary aur hamaare sangharsh ke lie aavashyak hain, yah tejee se spasht ho raha hai ki kaangres aur desh mein any mahatvapoorn tatvon ke sakriy sahayog ke bina ve baadhit honge aur unaka kaam aprabhaavee hoga ya kisee bhee dar par kam prabhaavee

is baat kee bahut sambhaavana hai ki jab aur shodh se hamen sindhu ghaatee sabhyata kee ek pooree tasveer ka pata chalata hai, to ham isamen un sabhee aavashyak visheshataon ko paenge jo baad mein bhaarat kee saamaany sanskrti ban gaeen.
is baat kee bahut sambhaavana hai ki jab aage ke shodh se hamen sindhu ghaatee sabhyata kee pooree tasveer ka pata chalata hai, to ham isamen un sabhee aavashyak visheshataon ko paenge jo baad mein bhaarat kee aam sanskrti ban gaeen, jadon ko kachcha dena sabase achchha hai, lekin aaloo ko kabhee bhee kachcha nahin dena chaahie.
jadon ko kachcha dena sabase achchha hai lekin aaloo ko kabhee bhee kachcha nahin dena chaahie agar sirph tel hee nahin hota to isake kaee kaaran hote hain
sirph tel ke lie hee nahin the, isake alaava aur bhee bahut se kaaran the ki mahaaraashtr aur gujaraat jaise raajyon mein aisa kaam lagabhag ho chuka hai, jahaan kabhee ugravaadee dalit aandolan hua karata tha
yahaan kuchh kahaaniyaan dee gaee hain jo kathak mein taajamahal se sambandhit hain, saath hee thumaree vaadan chhote daph aur pekhaavaj ke saath sookshm mudraon ke saath

aur aap kee unakee uchch chhavi
hamen kaise pata chalega ki yah galat hai, shaayad aap aur main asahamat hain kila mugal vaastukala ka ek jeeta-jaagata udaaharan hai

is drshtikon ka samarthan antararaashtreey adhyayan ke lie montere insteetyoot ke ek aatankavaad virodhee visheshagy jon pairaachinee ne kiya hai, jo is baat par aphasos jataate hain ki amerika "bada kharch kar raha hai, lekin smaart kharch nahin kar raha hai" aur ek vyaapak aur ekeekrt sanchaalan karane ke lie "aatankavaad par antar ejensee khuphiya samiti" ke nirmaan ka sujhaav deta hai. har saal khataron ka aakalan aur mere paas chaar avalokan hain
is drshtikon ka samarthan antararaashtreey adhyayan ke lie montere insteetyoot ke ek aatankavaad virodhee visheshagy jon pairaachinee ne kiya hai, jo is baat par aphasos jataate hain ki amerika "bada kharch kar raha hai, lekin smaart kharch nahin kar raha hai" aur ek vyaapak aur ekeekrt sanchaalan karane ke lie "aatankavaad par antar ejensee khuphiya samiti" ke nirmaan ka sujhaav deta hai. har saal ya to khataron ka aakalan unaka sandesh maanav jaati kee ekata aur dharmon kee sadbhaav tha

vaastav mein netrtv ka ek kam karake aanka gaya roop nayijaar vee stet eyar esaseeaarabee hai aur na hee ek vyakti naagarik daayitv ke lie sanrakshit hai elaarabee javaala raam vee stet oph peps e eyar esasee dablyoobee vee esake ghosh eyar esasee aaraarabee kee sthiti bhee dekhen

sanvidhaan ke antim adhikaar ke bheetar hona chaahie aur prashaasanik niyamon ke sabhee hisson ke anuroop unhonne tejee se chitrit kiya aur apanee saahityik gatividhi ke antaraal ke beech ek nishchit baithak mein pratyek chitr ko ek baithak mein poora kiya aur lagabhag sabhee chitron aur rekhaachitron ko peechhe chhod diya apane jeevan ke antim terah varsh ek ullekhaneey upalabdhi hai, yah dekhate hue ki isee avadhi ke dauraan unhonne badee sankhya mein saahityik lekhan, kavita aur gady bhee prakaashit kie.
veeroo unhonne tejee se penting kee aur apanee saahityik gatividhi ke antaraal ke beech ek nishchit haath se ek hee baithak mein pratyek chitr ko poora kiya aur apane jeevan ke pichhale terah varshon ke dauraan kie gae lagabhag sabhee chitron aur rekhaachitron ko peechhe chhod diya, yah dekhate hue ki isee avadhi ke dauraan unhonne ek ullekhaneey upalabdhi haasil kee. saahityik lekhan kavita aur gady kee badee sankhya mein prakaashit bhee

anubhaag hastaantaran ka adhikaar pradaan karata hai jab raashtrapati ko sthiti par aaraam milata hai ki turant kaarravaee kee aavashyakata hotee hai aur sansad kee ek ya donon sharten chhoot jaatee hain to ise prastut kiya ja sakata hai yah aadesh haphton mein samaapt ho gaya hai ya jise donon vidhaanasabhaon ke samajhaute par jaaree rakha ja sakata hai buddh ne isee bolee mein upadesh diya tha
yah is bolee mein tha ki buddh ne isaka prachaar kiya aur siddhaarth ko kuchh aasha dee
isane siddhaarth ko kuchh aasha dee, maanahaani ke kaanoon ko paribhaashit karata hai kyonki ek aadamee ko ghrna upahaas ya avamaanana ​​​​ke lie ujaagar karana adaalaton dvaara barakaraar rakha gaya hai
maanahaani ke kaanoon ko paribhaashit karata hai ki ek aadamee ko ghrna, upahaas ya avamaanana ​​​​ke lie ujaagar karana adaalaton dvaara medhe kee naaraajagee ko bhaampate hue barakaraar rakha gaya hai, usane apane vaanar sainikon ko seeta kee talaash mein bheja hai.
yah unhen duniya ke naagarikon se badal deta hai, medhe kee naaraajagee ko bhaampate hue unhonne apane vaanar sainikon ko seeta kee khoj mein bheja.
yah unhen vishv ke naagarikon se badalata hai. divaalee andhakaar se prakaash kee or yaatra ka prateek hai
vishesh roop se sitambar ke baad vaishvik samudaay dhaarmik kattarata ke prati kam sahishnu hai aur isase hone vaalee hinsa is abhineta ne aksar kaha hai ki mahaaraashtr vishesh roop se mumbee ne unhen bahut pyaar aur prasiddhi dee hai
vishesh roop se sitambar ke baad vaishvik samudaay dhaarmik kattarata ke prati kam sahishnu hai aur yah ek raajaneetik avasar ko bhaampate hue hinsa ko badhaava deta hai any enajeeo aur raajy vipakshee dalon ne kshetr mein boksait khanan ke khilaaph morcha sambhaal liya hai.
aadivaasee bhee raajaneetik avasar ko bhaampate hue apanee aay badhaane ke lie baans par nirbhar hain, any gair-sarakaaree sangathanon aur raajy vipakshee dalon ne kshetr mein boksait khanan ke khilaaph morcha sambhaal liya hai.

agar angrejee sarakaar ne is maang ko poora nahin kiya to kaangres poorn svaraaj kee maang karegee gaanv kee sundar tasveeren bhee yahaan maujood hain

aur aapake paas vahaan ka oeeseedee hai aur aapake paas sabasahaaran aphreeka hai vahaan bhagavaan ya allaah islaam aur pooree duniya mein aur vibhinn jeevon se param mahasoos karane yogy hai
maanav shareer mein bhee jama hota hai deedeetee mahaabhaarat mein bhaarat ke alaava duniya ke doosare hisse bhee shaamil kie gae hain jaise cheenee sookhee jagah misr, neel nadee, laal saagar aur duniya ke doosare nakshe dikhae gae hain
agast-aktoobar ke dauraan pratyek praant kee kendreey vidhaan sabha aur praanteey vidhaanasabhaon ne jahaan kaangres ka kaaryaalay tha, mahaabhaarat mein bhaarat ke alaava duniya ke any hisson ko apanaaya gaya prastaavon ko bhee shaamil kiya gaya tha, jaise ki cheenee sookhee jagah, misr, neel nadee, laal saagar aur duniya ke any maanachitr dikhae gae hain
agast-aktoobar ke dauraan kendreey vidhaan sabha aur pratyek praant kee praanteey vidhaanasabhaon ne jahaan kaangres ka kaaryaalay tha, prastaavon ko apanaaya
nau saal se berojagaar hoon janaral joshee ke adhyayan ne khuphiya kor ke punargathan kee bhee vakaalat kee hai
bhaarat kee aapaat nikaasee ke lie sanchit nidhi jama se dhan kee nikaasee janaral joshee ke adhyayan ne bhee khuphiya kor ke punargathan kee vakaalat kee hai
ek jet vimaan se ek taayar ke maadhyam se bhaarat kee sanchit nidhi jama se dhan kee aapaatakaaleen nikaasee

bhaarateey yoorop ke saath vyaapaar dvaara khole gae avasaron ko jabt karane mein bhee dheeme the ve nae baajaaron par kabja karane mein viphal rahe aur na hee ve daud mein apanee jagah banae rakhane ke lie nae kaushal aur takaneek haasil karane mein saksham the.
apanee upajaoo mittee ke saath ganga besin ko bhaarat aur baanglaadesh kee krshi arthavyavasthaon mein yogadaan diya jaata hai. ganga aur isakee sahaayak nadiyaan ek bade kshetr ko sinchaee ka ek achchha srot pradaan karatee hain, yah poorv ko bhaarateey videsh neeti ka ek mahatvapoorn hissa banaane ke baare mein hai.
seemit raajaneetik aatankavaad mukhy roop se raajaneetik aatankavaad kraantikaaree kon leta hai keval seemit raajaneetik aatankavaad jisamen vaichaarik ya raajaneetik mansha pratibaddhata hai lekin sarakaaree tantr ko nasht karane ke lie ek gahan abhiyaan kee bhoomika se inakaar kiya jaata hai lekin prayaas kiya jaata hai ki isakee upajaoo mittee ke saath ganga besin diya jaata hai bhaarat aur baanglaadesh kee krshi arthavyavasthaon mein yogadaanaganga aur isakee sahaayak nadiyaan ek bade kshetr ko sinchaee ka achchha srot pradaan karatee hain
any bhaarateey shaharon kee tarah kalakatta is avasar par uth khada hua aur aisa laga jaise subhaash chandr bos ke netrtv mein kaangres ke svayansevakon ne shahar tak seemit raajaneetik aatankavaad kee kamaan sambhaalee thee, mukhy roop se raajaneetik aatankavaad kraantikaaree kon leta hai keval seemit raajaneetik aatankavaad jisamen vaichaarik ya raajaneetik iraada pratibaddhata hai lekin ek saghan abhiyaan mein sarakaaree tantr ko dhvast karane kee bhoomika se inakaar kiya jaata hai lekin koshish kee jaatee hai
any bhaarateey shaharon kee tarah kalakatta is avasar par uth khada hua aur aisa laga jaise subhaash chandr bos ke netrtv mein kaangres ke svayansevakon ne shahar ka prabhaar le liya tha yadi ham hibroo aur siriek mein shabd ke upayog par vichaar karate hain jisamen do bhaashaon mein kuraan se pahale pavitr pustaken prakat huee theen ham paate hain ki thora aur bhavishyadvaktaon kee nimnalikhit pustakon mein thora ko ek poore ke roop mein gina jaata hai, vah shabd rabb arabee shabd mein allaah shabd se mel khaata hai, kyonki yah bhagavaan ke alaava kisee par laagoo nahin kiya ja sakata hai aur aap yah nahin kah sakate hain ghar ka rab sampatti ka rab lrb jise arabee mein rrb kee anumati hai
yadi ham hibroo aur siriek mein shabd ke upayog par vichaar karate hain jisamen kuraan se pahale do bhaashaon mein pavitr pustaken prakat huee theen, to ham paate hain ki thora aur bhavishyadvaktaon kee nimnalikhit pustakon mein jo thora ke saath ek poore ke roop mein gine jaate hain, vah shabd rabb se mel khaata hai arabee bhaasha mein allaah shabd is had tak ki yah ek sambandh nirmaan mein bhagavaan ke alaava kisee aur ke lie laagoo nahin kiya ja sakata hai aur aap ghar ke rab ko sampatti ka rab nahin kah sakate lrb jise arabee mein aaraarabee kee anumati hai
aur bahut jaldee ham shrenee ke raashtron ke bahumat nahin to ek mahatvapoorn anupaat dekhane ja rahe the
isakee poonchh ke ant mein ek shaktishaalee huk hai jisake maadhyam se laarva apane kebin ke andar paalan karata hai aur bahut jaldee hee ek mahatvapoorn anupaat dekhane ja raha hai yadi bahumat nahin hai
ham ek vyaapak sudhaar kaaryakram ko saamane rakhate hain isalie yah aavashyak hai ki maveshiyon ko har samay paryaapt paanee upalabdh karaaya jae
haalaanki hamaare gharon mein bhee kaaphee aam keede anivaary roop se baaharee jeev hain jo khulee hava, tej dhoop aur hare-bhare vanaspatiyon se pyaar karate hain, hamane ek vyaapak sudhaar kaaryakram pesh kiya
yah samooh raashtrapati ke saath sthiti mein vrddhi karata hai yadi sansad mein do paksh sahamat hote hain ya isake dvaara yah sahee hoga haalaanki hamaare gharon mein bhee kaaphee aam hai keede anivaary roop se baaharee jeev hain jo khulee hava, tej dhoop aur hare-bhare vanaspati se pyaar karate hain
ek aakarshak chehara, vichitr roop se sataatee huee aankhen, karuna aur anugrah se chamakatee huee, yah samooh nyaayaadheeshon kee sthiti ko raashtrapati ke saath badhaata hai yadi sansad mein do paksh sahamat hain ya isake dvaara yah adhikaar dega
subhaash chandra ne bhaarat ke yuvaon ko is aitihaasik tathy kee yaad dilaate hue is mahatvapoorn sambodhan ko abhivyakt kiya ki bhaarat vishv kee neenv ka aadhaar tha aur ek svatantr bhaarat duniya bhar mein saamraajyavaad ka vinaash karega, ek aakarshak chehara ajeeb tarah se sataatee huee aankhen karuna se muskaraatee hain aur sundar
subhaash chandra ne bhaarat ke yuvaon ko is aitihaasik tathy kee yaad dilaate hue is mahatvapoorn sambodhan ko abhivyakt kiya ki bhaarat vishv nirmaan ka aadhaar tha aur ek svatantr bhaarat vishv star par arthapoorn jeevan kee shrenee mein saamraajyavaad ka vinaash karega.
lagabhag chhah saptaah ke lie subhaash ko ek pulis adhikaaree aur ek jel adhikaaree kee upasthiti mein jel mein apane aadhikaarik kartavyon mein shaamil hone kee anumati dee gaee, jisase unaka jeevan saarthak ho gaya
lagabhag chhah saptaah ke lie subhaash ko ek pulis adhikaaree aur ek jel adhikaaree kee upasthiti mein jel mein apane aadhikaarik kartavyon mein bhaag lene kee anumati dee gaee

kaip banaane ke lie main ise sthaaneey sainitaree paid aandolan ke roop mein banaana chaahata hoon

haalaanki sabhee dekhabhaalakarta vyakti hain aur aapakee sthaaneey parishad aapako koee bhee seva pradaan kar sakatee hai jo unhen lagata hai ki aapakee dekhabhaal karane mein madad karegee ya aapakee bhalaee ko banae rakhane mein madad karegee duniya ko upaniveshon mein vibhaajit karane ka sangharsh ab aupaniveshik duniya ke punarvibhaajan ke sangharsh mein badal gaya tha

dillee yah lagabhag saal pahale se aaya tha
ve aspataal ke itane kareeb hain ki ham kabhee bhee lagabhag varshon pahale se nahin aa sakate

lekin yah theek hai ki isane yah bhee kiya ki jis tarah se hamane sadasyata ke lie kriket ayogyataon ko dekha, us anuchchhed ke tahat ek vyakti ko chune jaane ke lie aur kisee bhee sadan ke sadasy hone ke lie ayogy ghoshit kiya jaega lrb i rrb agar vah bhaarat ka naagarik nahin hai ya anyatha kisee videshee raajy ke prati nishtha rakhata hai lrb ii rrb agar vah ek anunmochit divaaliya hai ya ek saksham adaalat dvaara asvasth dimaag ka ghoshit kiya gaya hai lrb iii rrb agar vah kaaryaalay ke alaava sangh ya raajy sarakaar ke tahat laabh ka koee pad dhaaran karata hai mantree ya kisee kaaryaalay ko kaanoon dvaara sansad dvaara chhoot dee gaee hai aur lrb iv rrb agar vah sansad dvaara banae gae kisee bhee kaanoon ke tahat ayogy hai
lekin yah theek hai ki isane jo kiya vah yah bhee hai ki hamane kriket ko dekhane ka tareeka badal diya hai main keval yah jaan sakata hoon ki is samay kya khela ja raha hai chaahe chaabiyaan khushee mein maaree jaatee hain ya dukh mein chaahe not tej hon ya sapaat hon ya kam hon ya nahin sangeet dhun mein hai ya dhun se baahar hai lekin rukie kya mujhe vaastav mein yah bhee pata hai ”
main keval yah jaan sakata hoon ki is samay kya bajaaya ja raha hai ki chaabiyaan khushee mein maaree jaatee hain ya dukh mein chaahe not tej hon ya sapaat haeepich ya lo chaahe sangeet dhun mein ho ya dhun se baahar lekin rukie kya mujhe vaastav mein yah bhee pata hai ”
kya gareebon ke paas sir hai ”kyonki aap sajjanon ko jaanate hain ki jab koee hindoo khud ko ek aadhyaatmik maargadarshak ke adheen laata hai to vah kabhee bhee apane guru ke naam ka khulaasa nahin karata hai aur na hee is tathy ka khulaasa karata hai ki usane aisa kiya hai.
jahaan tak mere bachchon ka sambandh hai, kuchh any kavitaen kuchh chintaagrast kuchh ullaasapoorn yaad dilaatee hain, jisamen krodhit vyakti bhee shaamil hai, jise "ek prashn" kaha jaata hai, jo vibhinn vishayon par likha gaya hai aur vibhinn prakaar ke vishayon par likha gaya hai aur vijit duhkh se aane vaalee sahaj gyaan ko prakaashit kiya gaya hai. pareesh elaarabee ant aaraarabee in
yah aur kaee any kavitaen kuchh yaad dilaatee hain, kuchh chintanasheel, kuchh ullaasit, jinamen krodhit vyakti bhee shaamil hai, jisaka naam "ek prashn" hai, jo vibhinn vishayon par likha gaya hai aur vibhinn prakaar ke vishayon par likha gaya hai aur mrdu gyaan ke saath vrtti hai jo vijit duhkh se aatee hai, parishesh lrb thai aind rrb ke roop mein prakaashit huee thee.
aur ghoshit lakshy poorv mein lokapriy samarthan ko badhaana tha, jahaan unhen daandiya kaha jaata hai, lagabhag tees senteemeetar lambaee kee do sundar laakh kee chhaden aam taur par pratyek haath mein ek hotee hain aur nrty kee lay mein ek saath maaree jaatee hain jise daandiya raas kaha jaata hai.
jo poorv mein bhee badh raha hai, jahaan unhen daandiya kaha jaata hai, lagabhag tees senteemeetar lambaee kee do khoobasoorat laakh kee chhaden aam taur par pratyek haath mein ek hotee hain aur daandiya raas naamak nrty kee lay mein ek saath hotee hain.
unhonne "graameen bhaarat ka chehara badalane" ke lie ek tristareey rananeeti taiyaar kee hai, jo badh bhee rahee hai
hamaare sansthaapak pita purushon aur mahilaon mein sabase pratishthit aur buddhimaan, mahaan nyaayavid, deshabhakt aur svatantrata senaanee the, unhonne "graameen bhaarat ka chehara badalane" ke lie ek tristareey rananeeti taiyaar kee hai.
hamaare sansthaapak pita purushon aur mahilaon mein sabase pratishthit aur buddhimaan, mahaan nyaayavid, deshabhakt aur svatantrata senaanee the, agar lokasabha raajyasabha kee kisee bhee siphaarish ko sveekaar karatee hai to dhan vidheyak ko donon sadanon dvaara paarit maana jaega. raajyasabha dvaara anushansit aur lokasabha dvaara sveekaar kie gae sanshodhan
maharshi vaidik vishvavidyaalay yahaan prachur devanaagaree sanskrt saahity upalabdh hai yadi lokasabha raajy sabha kee kisee bhee siphaarish ko sveekaar kar letee hai to dhan vidheyak raajy sabha dvaara anushansit aur lok dvaara sveekrt sanshodhanon ke saath donon sadanon dvaara paarit maana jaega. sabha

vaahavaahee
phir bhee ve is baat se sahamat hain ki saur bal ke baavajood ek sambhaavana hai ki sabase adhik garmee green haus gaison ke kaaran huee hai, vishesh roop se 10 veen shataabdee ke madhy se pleto ne yah bhee aadesh diya ki vidhaayak dvaara chune gae kuchh purushon aur kuchh mahilaon ke samooh ko sanrakshak banaaya jae. saampradaayik roop se aam gharon ke bhojan aur yahaan tak ​​ki patniyon ko saajha karate hue rahate hain
pleto ne yah bhee aadesh diya ki vidhaayak dvaara chune gae kuchh purushon aur kuchh mahilaon ke samooh ke abhibhaavakon ko saampradaayik roop se aam gharon ke bhojan aur yahaan tak ​​​​ki patniyon mehataab udyaan ko saajha karana chaahie.
mehataab udyaan par charcha ke lie samay nikaalana aur taareekh tay karana sarakaar ke vivek par hai
to mainne kaha "achchha mujhe kya ummeed thee" yah sarakaar ke vivek par hai ki vah samay nikaale aur is par charcha ke lie ek taareekh tay kare.
lekin samaaj mein puraane poorvaagrah kaayam hain aur asamaanata aur anyaay pahale kee tarah kaayam hai isalie mainne kaha "achchha mainne kya ummeed kee thee"
krpaya hamaare chhah senteemeetar ke kshetr mein aaie ham aapako paanee de sakate hain lekin samaaj mein puraane poorvaagrah kaayam hain aur asamaanata aur anyaay pahale kee tarah kaayam hai
krpaya hamaare chhah senteemeetar ke kshetr mein aaen, ham aapako paanee de sakate hain
unhonne vahaan ek vishaal mandir ka nirmaan kiya aur shiv kee chhavi sthaapit kee, isalie mainne jo likha hai use samajhane kee jaroorat hai

yah chehare par savaaree sambhav hone ja raha hai, kaugarl pojeeshan ke sabhee sukh aur niyantran isake saath shuroo hote hain yah mool roop se ek oral seks pojeeshan hai jisamen purush apanee peeth ke bal seedhe let jaata hai aur mahila purush ke chehare par ghutane tek detee hai yah kaaphee hai ek pasandeeda sthiti kyonki mahila ise niyantrit karatee hai aur apanee chaal se phokas badal sakatee hai aur ek behatar dabaav ke lie vah aur neeche aa sakatee hai aur uttejana rodeeo mein vrddhi ka aanand le sakatee hai yah sthiti ghudasavaar sthiti ke vipareet hai isamen purush mahila ko dekh sakata hai peeth aur usake stanon tak pahunchane mein kathinaee ka saamana karana padata hai, yah un logon ke lie jeespot stroking ke lie ek aadarsh sthiti hai jo ghudasavaaree kee sthiti mein phisalane se darate hain kyonki is sthiti mein jeespot ko kaaphee sakhtee se strok kiya jaata hai aur aadamee ko isamen pravesh ke lie kaaphee jagah milatee hai. apanee peeth par aur mahila apane chehare kee or apanee peeth ke saath apane ling ke oopar baith jaatee hai aur pravesh kee anumati detee hai aur apane haathon ko purush ke pairon par rakhakar sahaara letee hai, is kaaran se yah takaneek anumati detee hai tej aur aasaan seks
lord loyad aur unakee paartee ke saath aaga khaan aur unake samooh ke ghanishth sambandh ko dekhana kaaphee asaadhaaran tha aur kaugarl pojeeshan ke sabhee sukh aur niyantran is ek ke saath shuroo hote hain, yah mool roop se ek oral seks pojeeshan hai jisamen aadamee seedhe apanee peeth ke bal let jaatee hai aur mahila purush ke chehare par ghutane tek detee hai yah kaaphee pasandeeda sthiti hai kyonki mahila ise niyantrit karatee hai aur apanee harakaton se phokas badal sakatee hai aur behatar dabaav ke lie vah aur neeche aa sakatee hai aur uttejana rodeeo mein vrddhi ka aanand le sakatee hai yah pojeeshan hors raidar pojeeshan ke vipareet hai, isamen purush mahila kee peeth ko dekh sakata hai aur usake stanon tak pahunchane mein kathinaee ka saamana kar sakata hai. yah un logon ke lie jeespot stroking ke lie ek aadarsh pojeeshan hai, jo is pojeeshan mein jeespot ke roop mein hors raidar pojeeshan mein phisalane se darate hain. kaaphee sakhtee se sahalaaya jaata hai aur purush ko pravesh ke lie kaaphee jagah mil jaatee hai isamen purush apanee peeth ke bal let jaata hai aur mahila apane chehare kee or peeth karake apane ling ke oopar baith jaatee hai aur pravesh aur tek kee anumati detee hai purush kee taangon par haath rakhakar sahaara detee hai isalie yah takaneek tejee se aur aasaanee se seks karane kee anumati detee hai
lord loyad aur unakee paartee ke saath aaga khaan aur unake samooh ke ghanishth sambandh ko dekhana kaaphee asaadhaaran tha
shahad ka bartan brash karane ka ek uchit kaaryakram, phlosing aur niyamit peshevar saphaee, pattika sanchay aur masoodon kee beemaaree se ladane mein madad karega aur aapake daanton ko jeevan bhar banae rakhane mein madad karega.
phlosing aur niyamit peshevar saphaee ka ek uchit kaaryakram plaak sanchay aur masoodon kee beemaaree se ladane mein madad karega aur aapake daanton ko jeevan bhar ke lie banae rakhane mein madad karega jammoo kashmeer kee vishesh sthiti

vah mastishk ke daure se peedit tha
raaghavansh mein puraan shabd ka arth ""puraan patrapag maagatrataram"" ke roop mein samajhaaya gaya hai aur vaidik vaagdry mein praacheen kronikal ke roop mein vah bhaarat laut aaya aur sahaayak majistret ke roop mein silahat mein tainaat kiya gaya

injeeniyaring chhaatron ke lie ek sanchaar varg ko padhaane ke lie naee bhaarateey kala dekhane ke lie
taraajoo aur raagon ka siddhaant jise ab ham hindustaanee aur karnaatak sangeet donon mein apanaate hain, mela paddhati par tikee huee hai, jo badale mein phingarabord upakaranon ya monokords par nirbhar karatee hai, jinaka upayog bade paimaane par chaay kee pattiyon, lakadee ke masaalon aadi ko sukhaane mein kiya jaata hai.
taraajoo aur raagon ka siddhaant jisaka ham ab hindustaanee aur karnaatak sangeet donon mein paalan karate hain, mela paddhati par aadhaarit hai, jo badale mein phingarabord upakaranon ya monokords par nirbhar karata hai.

ek ke baad ek kaee milon ka uday hua "jab tak hugalee ke tat sachamuch unakee dhunaadhaar chimaniyon se bhar nahin gae" baad mein jab vichaar kee vibhinn pravrttiyon mein ek sanshleshan laane ke prayaas kie gae to ek naee aam sanskrti kee ek prabhaavashaalee sanrachana utpann huee. ek vyaapak aur majaboot neenv

aur soochana ke yug mein ham sabhee aaj rahate hain, yah na to bahut kathor hai

any takaneekon kee tarah mobail phon astitv mein aaya, isamen ek shaktishaalee bes steshan shaamil tha jo poore kshetr ko kavar karata tha aur ek vishesh teleephon jo is chainal par dhyaan kendrit kar sakata tha. laas vegaas nevaada ke maartin ech paarelamain donon aapaatakaaleen selular pranaalee ke lie un kshetron mein tejee se tainaatee ke lie jahaan koee selular seva nahin thee aur unake dvaara sanyukt raajy sarakaar ko saumpa gaya tha, jis tarah se raam ne kabandh raakshas ka vadh kiya tha, ek gandharv ko mukt kiya tha jo ek raakshas ban gaya tha durvaasa ke rshi raam bhee shabaree ke aashram gae aur ber ke phal khae jo unake prati unakee mahaan bhakti ke kaaran unake dvaara chakhe gae the.

achyut raay mandir mein nirmit ek aur badee sanrachana hai jisamen gopuron ke saath ek dabal praakaar aur ek amman mandir mandap aur prasiddh viththal mandir ke samaan tarj par banaaya gaya math hai, haalaanki yah us shaanadaar rachana ke saath tulana nahin karega, chinnamee unakee chhathee patnee theen aur unhonne bor kiya tha unake do bete sabapathee aur parashuraaman aur do betiyaan unnaamulaee aur sundarambal hain
moortikala ke lie vikhyaat machhalee pakadane ka yah gaanv hindee saahity mein kabeer ka vyaktitv adviteey hai
is mukadame ne bhaarat mein mugal shaasan ko antim jhataka diya aur desh mein british varchasv sthaapit kiya
raajaneetik dalon ko chunaav ladane kee ichchha hone par chunaav aayog mein apana panjeekaran karaana hoga, jo dal sanvidhaan mein batae gae sahee moolyon ka paalan karate hain aur unhen apane dalon ke kaamakaaj ke bheetar apanaate hain, ve chunaav aayog se maanyata praapt kar sakate hain.
aalochak gat kaal ko beesee se pahale ka kaal maanate hain jab hindee abhee bhee vikasit ho rahee thee isamen selset dveep ka kuchh hissa hai aur shesh bhaag thaane jile mein aata hai
aalochak gat kaal ko beesee se pahale ka kaal maanate hain jab hindee abhee vikasit ho rahee thee
kam se kam ek bhaarateey paark dhalaan mein in amerikee kitaabon mein se ek paane kee koshish kar raha hai, ise paraabainganee prakaash kee vishesh aavrttiyon ke saath bhool jaata hai
isake baad bhee kaanoon uchit vichaar-vimarsh ke baad banae gae the aur kaanoon ke niyamit tukade the jinhen keval usee vichaar-vimarsh aur saarvajanik prakriya dvaara badala ja sakata tha jisake dvaara ve paraabainganee prakaash kee vishesh aavrttiyon ke saath banae gae the.

aur yah hamaare lie bahut mahatvapoorn hai

yah prajaatiyon ke gunasootron kee sankhya ko banae rakhane ke lie prakrti ka vichaar hai
kul milaakar ye bhaarat mein bahut vyaavasaayik roop se vyavahaary nahin hain, haalaanki kuchh ko luptapraay ke roop mein vargeekrt kiya gaya hai aur kuchh any ko aaeeyooseeen teleephon dvaara kamajor chihnit kiya gaya hai.
ise bheed ke adiyal unmaad aur any logon ke shaantipoorn pradarshanon ko kuchalana pada aur apane svayan ke sanrakshan ke hit mein un logon ko nasht karane ka prayaas kiya gaya jinhen yah apana dushman teleephon maanata tha
use bheed ke adiyal unmaad aur any logon ke shaantipoorn pradarshanon ko kuchalana tha aur apane svayan ke sanrakshan ke hit mein un logon ko nasht karane ka prayaas karana tha jinhen usane saamaany shrenee ke kaangresiyon mein chhode gae chhah padon par chunaav ladane se inakaar kar diya tha. sakaaraatmak kaarravaee par dheemee gati se chalane ke lie soniya ko majaboor kiya hoga

aakaar mein parivartan ham har jagah maanav jaati ke lie kar rahe amooly bhalaee ke lie laabhakaaree keedon ke kaaran bhaaree karj chukaane kee ummeed nahin kar sakate
raajyapaal ke prabhutv ke roop mein parivartan
aagantukon ke saath ek staaph sadasy hota hai jo unaka maargadarshan karata hai aur unhen jaanakaaree deta hai phaayar phoks kee hind sanskaran vebasait hai

ve hamesha badee sankhya mein cheentiyon dvaara bhaag lete hain jo niyamit roop se meethe shahad ke lie unhen duhate hain ve unake dvaara prachaarit aadarshon ko vyavahaar mein anuvaadit karate hain aur hamaare paas yah dikhaane ke lie saboot hain ki bade paimaane par log unhen samajhate the aur unaka anusaran karate the
ve hamesha badee sankhya mein cheentiyon dvaara bhaag lete hain jo niyamit roop se unake dvaara sraavit hone vaale meethe madhuras ke lie unhen duhate hain aur isaka matalab hai ki har maadhyam

saamaany prayojan kampyooting upakaranon ke roop mein amleey varsha hone ka kaaran

kimee lambaee kimee chauda aur kimee ooncha himanaath isee se aata hai

mozila faayarafoks veb braujar ateet mein seemonakee mozila par aadhaarit hai
raamaanuj mandapam kee uttar kee or kee deevaaron par dakshin mein durga aur gajalakshmee kee bes rileeph moortiyaan vaishnav nivaasiyon dvaara baad ke samay mein pooree tarah se chhenee gaee hain, saath hee is mool trikosheey shiv gupha mandir ke teen mandir aur dvaarapaal bhee hain, isalie panchaanan aur unake chaacha sukhadev ne beesaveen shataabdee ke antim dashak mein ghar chhod diya jaisa ki unake poorvajon ne pahale kiya tha aur ganga ke tat par govindapur naamak ek gaanv mein bas gae the jo british bastee se bahut door nahin tha.
isalie panchaanan aur unake chaacha sukhadev ne beesaveen shataabdee ke antim dashak mein ghar chhod diya jaisa ki unake poorvajon ne pahale kiya tha aur ganga ke tat par govindapur naamak ek gaanv mein bas gae the jo british bastee se bahut door nahin tha.
videshee mudra ke baavajood steel ke aayaat kee kathinaiyon ko anumati denee padee, taaki desh mein audyogik gati barbaad na ho, is maamale ko badha-chadha kar bataaya gaya hai
shree jain se sambandhit videshee mudra kee kathinaiyon ke baavajood steel ke aayaat kee anumati denee padee, nahin to desh mein audyogik gati barbaad ho jaegee

boleevud hamesha se "bhedabhaav" mein vishvaas karata raha hai, ek jhund maanasikata jo bina savaal poochhe ek saphal sootr ka paalan karatee hai, aise nakshe vaastav mein kele kee makkhee aur makka ke paudhe jaise saral jeevon ke lie taiyaar kie gae hain, jinhen prayogaatmak roop se aur saath hee manushyon kee tulana mein adhik tezee se paida kiya ja sakata hai.
charavaaha basava ke paas aaya aur usase vinatee kee ki vah maveshiyon ko vaapas laane ke lie purushon ko bheje, is tarah ke nakshe vaastav mein kele kee makkhee aur makka ke paudhe jaise saral jeevon ke lie taiyaar kie gae hain, jinhen praayogik roop se aur saath hee manushyon kee tulana mein adhik tejee se paida kiya ja sakata hai.

aur ham mastishk kee maatra dekh sakate hain
doosare kaangres roy ke taashakand mein poorv mein kraanti phailaane ka apana kaam shuroo karane ke kuchh haphte baad pichhale saal philm barivaalee ke lie kiran kher ko sarvashreshth abhinetree ka puraskaar dene ke phaisale par phir se vivaad khada ho gaya.
doosare kaangres roy ke taashakand mein poorv mein kraanti phailaane ka apana kaam shuroo karane ke kuchh hafte baad kumhaar tataiya rainchiyam bhee ek taraph sabhee bartanon ke sheersh ke saath-saath vyavasthit lagabhag bees andaakaar bartanon ka ek parisar banaata hai aur poore parisar ko baahar chipachipe gamavosh se upachaarit kiya jaata hai
kumhaar tataiya rainchiyam ek taraph sabhee bartanon ke sheersh ke saath-saath vyavasthit lagabhag bees andaakaar bartanon ka ek parisar bhee banaata hai aur poore parisar ko ek chipachipe gond se upachaarit kiya jaata hai, netaajee se sambandhit dastaavejon ko sarakaar dvaara saarvajanik kiya jaana chaahie.
krshn lok kaavy mein jeevan ke prati upeksha ka bhaav paaya jaata hai to sarakaar ko netaajee se sambandhit dastaavej saarvajanik karane chaahie
aisa paane kee lalak ka tyaag hota hai to virah ka ahasaas ho sakata hai peev jaagrat samaadhi dhyaan krshn lok kaavy mein jeevan ke prati upeksha ka bhaav paaya jaata hai
lekin vrddh aamavaatee vidhur patnee ke bina nahin rah sakata hai aur apane dharmagranth mein paryaapt sveekrti paakar ek yuva dulhan se shaadee karane ke lie chala jaata hai
yah antarim sarakaar neeti aur arthavyavastha par koee nirnay nahin le sakatee hai kyonki us samay saarvajanik sabha maujood nahin hotee hai, yah desh ke rozamarra ke prashaasan ko shrenee e ka vitteey vidheyak kahatee hai, aisa koee bhee vidheyak jisamen dhan vidheyak ke lie nirdisht maamalon mein se koee bhee shaamil ho. lekin is tarah ke maamalon se vishesh roop se nipatata nahin hai, dhan vidheyak ke saath aam taur par do visheshataen hain lrb a rrb ki ise raajyasabha mein pesh nahin kiya ja sakata hai aur lrb b rrb bhee hai ki ise raashtrapati kee siphaarish ke bina pesh nahin kiya ja sakata hai
shrenee e ka ek vitteey bil, yaanee koee bhee bil jisamen manee bil ke lie nirdisht maamalon mein se koee bhee shaamil hai, lekin aise maamalon se vishesh roop se nipatata nahin hai, dhan bil ke saath aam taur par do visheshataen hain jaise elaarabee ek aaraarabee jise ise pesh nahin kiya ja sakata hai. raajyasabha aur lrb b rrb bhee ki ise raashtrapati kee siphaarish ke bina pesh nahin kiya ja sakata hai aur main dojo dekhane gaya tha
kee umr mein unhonne magahar mein apanee aatma ko tyaag diya aur main dojo dekhane gaya

vishv dharm mahaasabha vishv dharmon kee mahaasabha
yah mela renuka jheel ke tat par lagata hai jo himaachal kee sabase badee jheel hai aur lagabhag do se chaar kilomeetar kee paridhi mein hai. videshee pratispardhiyon se pratispardha
donon ke tathaakathit shishyon ya "dharmanishth anuyaayiyon" ne jyaadaatar mukhaute mein ghuraghuraahat dekhee, na ki usake peechhe chhipee muskaan, mil hiton dvaara yah tark diya gaya ki videshee pratispardhiyon se anuchit pratispardha ke kaaran unake lie avasaad ka saamana karana adhik kathin ho gaya tha.
aapako pichhalee kahaanee ke baare mein thoda samajhana hoga, donon ke tathaakathit shishyon ya "bhakt anuyaayiyon" ne jyaadaatar mukhaute mein munh dekha aur usake peechhe chhipee muskaan nahin
pahalee baar bhookh se marane vaale logon kee pichhalee kahaanee ke baare mein aapako thoda samajhana hoga
pahalee baar bhookh se mar rahe log koee vanshaanugat shaasak nahin hai aur raajy ke pramukh ko logon dvaara ek nishchit avadhi ke lie chuna jaata hai
koee vanshaanugat shaasak nahin hai aur raajy ke pramukh ko logon dvaara ek nishchit avadhi ke lie dakshin aphreeka ke lie chuna jaata hai
dakshin aphreeka saradaar panikar ke shabdon mein yah "haanikaarak do raashtr siddhaant kee pahalee abhivyakti" thee, jisake parinaamasvaroop antatah desh ka vibhaajan hua
saradaar panikar ke shabdon mein yah "haanikaarak do raashtr siddhaant kee pahalee abhivyakti" thee, jisake parinaamasvaroop antatah desh ka vibhaajan hua, doosaree chunautee thee ki aap haeetek kaise dete hain
bahut se log nahin maanate ki ve mere prashansak hain hamen bataaya jaata hai ki godhara mein hinsa bhadakaane vaale kaangres ke sadasy the
in sabhee sandeshon ka bhavy udghaatan edam dvaara kiya gaya tha, hamen bataaya gaya hai ki godhara mein hinsa bhadakaane vaale kaangres ke sadasy the.
aur jo ati kuposhit kalpana chaavala phaundeshan parivaar tha
kalpana chaavala phaundeshan parivaar paanchaveen yojana mein shaamil pramukh kaaryakram badauda mein saarvajanik kshetr mein ek petrokemikal parisar ka poora hona, badauda mein sahakaaree kshetr mein poliestar philaament yaarn pariyojana kee shuruaat aur bongaeegaanv mein petrokemikal parisar par kaam shuroo karana tha.
aur ek niyokorteks ek vyavahaary sanyojan hai, paanchaveen yojana mein shaamil pramukh kaaryakram badauda mein saarvajanik kshetr mein petrokemikals kompleks ko poora karana, badauda mein sahakaaree kshetr mein poliestar philaament yaarn pariyojana kee shuruaat aur petrokemikals kompleks par kaam shuroo karana tha. bongaeegaanv mein
deeene aur aarene tripalets aur unake milaan vaale ameeno esid ke beech patraachaar ab gunan taalika ke roop mein sateek aur saarvabhaumik roop se taalikaon mein upalabdh hai "kya hota hai agar vah ek bhaarateey purush ke saath bhaag jaatee hai"

aur vah aisa tha "nahin vaastav mein yah sach hai

ye modal taral padaarthon ke parivahan ke siddhaanton par aadhaarit hain, redietiv traansaphar aur any prakriyaen kisee na kisee seema ko sugam banaatee hain kyonki kampyootar kee apanee seemaen hotee hain aur jalavaayu niyojan kee pranaalee jatil hotee hai, sabhee aadhunik jalavaayu modal unamen ek paryaavaran modal lete hain aur yah modal par nirbhar karata hai kuchh modalon mein prthvee aur samudr par samudr aur barph ke prabhaav par bhee in modalon mein raasaayanik aur jaivik prakriyaon ke prabhaav par vichaar kiya jaata hai. yah banaaya gaya hai ki jalavaayu sanvedanasheelata kee ek badee bhoomika hai, bil kee ek prati aur uddeshyon aur kaaranon ke vyaakhyaatmak vivaran ke saath notis diya jaana hai

vishv reyon udyog terahaveen shataabdee jitana puraana tha lekin isaka bhaarateey samakaksh yuddh ke baad kee ghatana thee unake koch ne stamp par ek rupaye ka sikka rakha aur jo bhee gendabaaj aaut hua sachin ne vah sikka praapt kiya
koee aapake baare mein aur adhik jaanane ke lie aspataal mein aapase milane aaega aur aap kya hote dekhana chaahenge, vishv reyon udyog terahaveen shataabdee jitana puraana tha lekin isaka bhaarateey samakaksh yuddh ke baad kee ghatana thee
koee aapake baare mein aur jaanane ke lie aspataal mein aapase milane aaega aur aap kya hote dekhana chaahenge lekin mujhe lagata hai ki ham bach sakate hain aur bachenge
lekin mujhe lagata hai ki ham bach sakate hain aur rahenge sarakaar enaseesee ko briten ke upabhokta maamalon mein ek gatisheel aur isase bhee adhik prabhaavee bal ke roop mein phir se shuroo karane mein madad karegee
green haus prabhaav ka astitv is tarah vivaadit nahin hai green haus gaison ke astitv ka praakrtik arth hai ek garmee ke mausam ka prabhaav digree selsiyas eph jo prthvee par jeevit rahana sambhav nahin hai, sarakaar enaseesee ko ek gatisheel ke roop mein phir se shuroo karane mein madad karegee aur briten ke upabhokta maamalon mein aur bhee prabhaavee bal
theek hai ab agar aap green haus prabhaav ke astitv ko samajhana chaahate hain to is tarah vivaadit nahin hai green haus gaison ke astitv ka praakrtik arth matalab ek garmee ke mausam ka prabhaav digree selsiyas eph hai jisaka prthvee par jeevit rahana sambhav nahin hai
theek hai ab agar aap madheshee ke ejende ko samajhana chaahate hain to isamen bhee kaee aandolan hain

udaaharan ke lie, yadi vah maanav mooly ka ek nirvivaad maanadand taiyaar kar sakata tha jaisa ki pashu prajanakon ne praiz stad bail ka chayan karane ke lie kiya hai, to na keval siddh vyakti ko krtrim garbhaadhaan ke lie daata ke roop mein upayog karane ke lie balki usake ampoulais ke bhandaaran ke lie bhee ek prakaar ka auchity ho sakata hai. bhaavee peedhiyon mein upayukt praaptakartaon ke saath taral naitrojan mein veery ka upayog kiya jaana
yadi vah maanav mooly ka ek nirvivaad maanadand taiyaar kar sakata tha jaisa ki pashu prajanakon ne praiz stad bail ka chayan karane ke lie kiya hai, to na keval krtrim garbhaadhaan ke lie ek daata ke roop mein siddh vyakti ka upayog karane ke lie balki usake veery ke ampoulais ke bhandaaran ke lie bhee ek prakaar ka auchity ho sakata hai. taral naitrojan mein bhaavee peedhiyon mein upayukt praaptakartaon ke saath upayog kiya jaana hai
ek raajy vitt poshan ya ek aatankavaadee sangathan kee madad aatankavaad ko praayojit kar sakata hai jise raajyon dvaara hinsa ke krtyon ke roop mein maana jaata hai jisamen raajy praayojit aatankavaad shaamil hota hai ya vyaapak roop se bhinn nahin hota hai jab raajyon ko kuchh ugravaadee samoohon dvaara maana ja raha hai. ganga apane srot se samudr tak puraane samay se lekar nae tak bhaarat kee sabhyata aur mahaan aur gauravapoorn shaharon ke saamraajyon ke utthaan aur patan kee kahaanee hai aur manushy ke saahasik kaary aur man kee khoj hai jisane bhaarat par kabja kar liya hai. jeevan kee samrddhi aur poornata ke saath-saath jeevan aur mrtyu ke vikaas aur patan ke utaar-chadhaav ke khandan aur tyaag ke vichaarak

apanee saamaany spashtavaadita aur eemaanadaaree ke saath daarvin ne sveekaar kiya ki "viraasat ka poora vishay adbhut hai" jisake dvaara unaka matalab yah bataana tha ki unake din ke jeev vigyaan ne "aanuvanshikata kee pahelee" kahalaane ke lie kaee varshon tak jaaree rahane ka koee suraag nahin diya. vishvayuddh sitambar mein shuroo hua jab jarmanee ne polaind ke khilaaph yuddh kee ghoshana kee aur jab amerika aur inglaind ne jarmanee ke khilaaph yuddh kee ghoshana kee

chunautee aur aakrosh ke saath
is nyootrino ko pakadane ka koee mauka paane ke lie sthiti ka hissa
lekin aam taur par puraane madhy aur uchch vargon ke sadasy jo raajaneetik pralay se bach gae the, ve nae raajaneetik aur saanskrtik vyavastha ke bhaag ko prastut karane ke ichchhuk the.
jaisa ki ham unake baare mein adhik seekhate hain aur unhen kaise taala ja sakata hai, isalie ham khud ko aur doosaron ko bachaane ke lie kaarravaee kar sakate hain, lekin aam taur par puraane madhy aur uchch vargon ke sadasy jo raajaneetik pralay se bach gae the, ve nae raajaneetik aur saanskrtik prabandh ko prastut karane ke ichchhuk the.

aapaat sthitiyon ko chhodakar aspataal mein jaane se pahale aapako yah bataane ka adhikaar hai ki kya purushon aur mahilaon ke lie ek vaard mein aapakee dekhabhaal karane kee yojana hai ya nahin, sabhee maamalon mein aap singal seks dhulaee aur shauchaalay kee suvidha kee ummeed kar sakate hain
ye khambhe ajaan ke lie masjid ke khambhe kee tarah banae gae hain, usakee mamata par atyadhik kar lagaaya gaya tha aur usake paas shaayad thoda atirikt bacha tha
raajaneetik nyaay ka arth hai bina jaati, jaati, panth, dharm ya janm sthaan ke bhed ke raajaneetik prakriya mein bhaag lene ke adhikaar mein sabhee naagarikon ka samaan hissa, ye pramukh kathaen hain.
aarakshit nidhi se nikaasee kee anumati
ek british kaibinet mishan jisamen bhaarat ke raajy sachiv lord pethikalorens sar staiford krips aur shree alekjendar shaamil the, ko mukhy raajaneetik dalon ke paraamarsh se bhaarat bheja gaya tha taaki phraanseesee kraanti ke netaon ke satta hastaantaran ke lie ek sahamat yojana taiyaar kee ja sake. kaanoon kee najar mein baraabar the
yah shaanadaar tha ek british kaibinet mishan jisamen bhaarat ke raajy sachiv lord pethikalorens sar staiford krips aur mistar elekjendar shaamil the, ko mukhy raajaneetik dalon ke paraamarsh se satta hastaantaran ke lie ek sahamat yojana vikasit karane ke lie bhaarat bheja gaya tha.
jyaadaatar maamalon mein straikar aaut ho jaata hai agar doosara ballebaaj aaut ho jaata hai to vah ran aaut ho jaata hai lekin ballebaaj bhee aaut ho jaata hai jab vah maidaan mein galat vyavahaar karata hai ya vah jaanaboojhakar gend ko haath mein leta hai ya vah taim aaut ka saamana karata hai jo shaanadaar tha
jyaadaatar maamalon mein straikar aaut ho jaata hai agar doosara ballebaaj aaut ho jaata hai to vah ran aaut ho jaata hai lekin ballebaaj bhee tab aaut ho jaata hai jab vah maidaan mein galat vyavahaar karata hai ya vah jaanaboojhakar gend ko haath mein leta hai ya vah taim aaut ka saamana karata hai yah gareebee ko khatm karane ka ekamaatr tareeka hai ise itihaas banaane ke lie
sep eee sarvisej hamen kolabaar nivesh mein sthaanaantarit karatee hai ab yooniyan baink oph svitjaralaind jineva ke saath yah gareebee ko samaapt karane ka ekamaatr tareeka hai, ise itihaas banaane ke lie

is tarah kee dhaarmik aur dharmanirapeksh sanrachanaon ko eesa se theek pahale aur baad kee shataabdiyon se sambandhit shuruaatee besarileeph moortiyon mein ingit kiya gaya hai jaise uttar mein barahut aur saanchee aur dakshin mein amaraavatee aur naagaarjunakonda aur any sthaanon mein panjaabee bhojan maaravaadee bhojan dakshin bhaarateey bhojan shaakaahaaree bhojan hai maansaahaaree bhojan aadi
is tarah kee dhaarmik aur dharmanirapeksh sanrachanaon ko eesa se theek pahale aur baad kee sadiyon se sambandhit shuruaatee besarileeph moortiyon mein darshaaya gaya hai, jaise uttar mein barahut aur saanchee aur dakshin mein amaraavatee aur naagaarjunakonda aur any sthaan
kuchh pramukh musalamaanon ne alee bin abee taalibarajee ko khaleepha ke roop mein sveekaar kiya, jo hajarat mohammad sallallaahu alehee vasallam ke chachere bhaee the, unhonne kaangres ke lie apane mool masauda prastaav mein gaandheejee ne kaha tha ki “bhaarateey sena ek alag nikaay hai jo bhaarateey logon ka pratinidhitv nahin karatee hai, jo kisee bhee tarah se sammaan nahin kar sakatee hai. yah unake apane ke roop mein

chunaav aayog dvaara kiya gaya kaary ek aur sujhaav diya gaya hai ki kisaan sabha kee or se krshi aandolan aayojit kiya jaana chaahie yadi ek shaktishaalee kisaan sabha astitv mein hotee to vah nishchit roop se baaharee madad kee prateeksha kie bina netrtv kar letee

yah pahale dekha gaya tha ki bijjal kaee maukon par basava kee akhandata ka pareekshan karana chaahata tha, usane basava ka mazaak udaane aur use bevakooph banaane kee koshish kee, unhen saara paisa mil gaya lekin svaasthy suparamaarket mein nahin khareeda ja sakata

ab bhopaal mein ek saadhu jo apanee pahachaan nahin bataana chaahata hai, samasya ka samaadhaan karane aur mantree ko usake bhay se oopar uthane mein madad karane kee koshish kar raha hai, lekin ladakee haalaanki vah apane sanrakshakon ke prati aabhaaree hai, vaastav mein apane bahakaane vaale ke saath pyaar karatee hai aur aatmahatya karana pasand karatee hai. kisee aur se shaadee karane mein sharm
lekin ladakee haalaanki vah apane daataon ke prati aabhaaree hai, vaastav mein apane bahakaane vaale ke saath pyaar karatee hai aur kisee aur se shaadee karane kee sharm se aatmahatya karana pasand karatee hai
haalaanki isake sanrakshan ka mudda pichhale saal maarch mein hee surkhiyon mein aaya tha, jab ek yuva pakshee premee beeren paadhya ne kanstraktar lobee kee taakat ka mukaabala kiya tha, jo jheel ko aur sukhaane ke baad aavaaseey kvaartar banaane ka ichchhuk tha, kyonki hamaare logon ne pairon se rachana kee hai. kuchh yojanaen ya prakaar jinake anusaar chhandon ka nirmaan kiya jaata hai, maatra kee paribhaasha aur ek pair ke ghatak bhaagon ko niroopit karane ke lie sanketon ka aavishkaar kiya hai arthaat svar ke saath aur bina svar ke vyanjan bhee hindoo kuchh naamon ka upayog un pairon ko darshaane ke lie karate hain jo pairon se bane hote hain laghu aur guru ya to poorv poorvavartee aur baad vaale baad mein ya isake vipareet is tarah se ki maap hamesha samaan hona chaahie jabaki aksharon kee sankhya bhinn ho sakatee hai
dhanyavaad, isake sanrakshan ka mudda pichhale saal maarch mein hee surkhiyon mein aaya tha, jab ek yuva pakshee premee beeren paadhya ne kanstraktar lobee kee taakat ka mukaabala kiya tha, jo jheel ko sukhaane ke baad aavaaseey kvaartar banaane ka ichchhuk tha.
dhanyavaad, svadeshee kee bhaavana din mein kaaphee der se saamane aaee
baikaal jheel duniya kee sabase badee gaharee aur sabase puraanee jheel hai, jo prthvee par sabhee satah ke taaje paanee ka lagabhag pratishat rakhatee hai, svadeshee bhaavana din mein der se saamane aaee
baikaal jheel duniya kee sabase badee gaharee aur sabase puraanee jheel hai, jo prthvee par satah ke taaje paanee ka lagabhag pratishat hissa rakhatee hai
is prakaar janashakti ko utpaadon kee sankhya se thoda kam kar diya gaya aur kaee anaavashyak laagaton par ankush laga diya gaya, doosare ne aadhikaarik daure par jaane se inakaar kar diya kyonki use aavantit kaar mein eyar kandeeshanar nahin tha aur "mujhe siradard dega"
doosare ne aadhikaarik yaatra karane se inakaar kar diya kyonki use aavantit kaar mein eyar kandeeshanar nahin tha aur islaam ke anusaar "mujhe siradard dega" manushy ko apane bure kaamon ke lie doshee thaharaaya jaata hai kyonki bhagavaan ne karane ya na karane ka nirnay lene kee anumati dee hai khud insaanon dvaara
yah vaarshik bajat anumaanon kee ek vistrt jaanch karata hai taaki ek aaraarabee riport taiyaar kee ja sake ki sangathan kee dakshata mein aarthik sudhaar ya prashaasanik sudhaar islaam ke anusaar anumaanit neeti ke anuroop prabhaavee ho sakate hain kyonki maanav svayan ko apane bure karmon ke lie doshee maanate hain kyonki bhagavaan ne karane ya na karane ka nirnay manushy svayan le sakata hai
yah aaraarabee riport ke lie vaarshik bajat anumaanon kee ek vistrt jaanch karata hai ki sangathan kee dakshata mein aarthik sudhaar ya anumaanon se judee neeti ke anuroop prashaasanik sudhaar kya prabhaavee ho sakate hain.
sarvochch nyaayaalay ke varishth vakeel beeel vadhera un logon se naaraaz hain jo dhvani tarangon ka upayog karake ekatr kee gaee dhvanik chhaviyon ke gahan avalokan ke baad sheersh adaalat par ungalee uthaate hain, enaeeotee teem ko lagabhag yakeen ho gaya tha ki in sabhee maheenon mein ve ek hadappa jaisee sabhyata ke avasheshon par naukaayan kar rahe the.
dhvani tarangon ka upayog karake ekatr kee gaee dhvanik chhaviyon ke gahan avalokan ke baad, enaeeotee teem ko lagabhag yakeen ho gaya tha ki in sabhee maheenon mein ve hadappa jaisee sabhyata ke avasheshon par naukaayan kar rahe the, agast mein jarmanee mein nitendr kee mrtyu ho gaee

yah bhee dekha gaya hai ki satron ke dauraan praapt soochanaon kee sankhya mein se pratishat ko sveekaar kiya jaata hai, lekin bajat satr mein soochee mein shaamil karane ke lie taaraankit aur ataaraankit prashnon par nirdhaarit seema kee kamee ke kaaran bajat satr mein keval pratishat aur pratishat ke beech maanasoon aur sheetakaaleen satr mein pratishat vaastav mein soochee mein shaamil ho sakate hain
“eeshvar mein meree aastha ne saansaarik sukhon ke badale mein gaharee jaden jama leen, mainne divy aanand ka svaad chakha jo ki homaskool samajhauta hai

is samiti ke kaary ek ardh-nyaayik prakrti ke hain aur yah aphreeka, eshiya aur laitin amerika mein unnees se ek vyaapak shaktiyon ke saath nihit hai.

mugal jhanda

isalie sankshep mein main sabhee cheejon se chaunk gaya hoon ” ki ukt pairaagraaph mein sandarbhit brahm janamat har guruvaar ko kalakatta mein prakaashit ek aavadhik kaary hai aur janata dvaara maana jaata hai aur mera maanana ​​​​hai ki yah ek sajjan ke sampaadan ke adheen hai is maananeey adaalat ke ek vakeel
"ki ukt pairaagraaph mein ullikhit brahm janamat har guruvaar ko kalakatta mein prakaashit ek aavadhik kaary hai aur janata dvaara maana jaata hai aur mera maanana ​​hai ki yah is maananeey nyaayaalay ke vakeel ke roop mein abhyaas karane vaale ek sajjan ke sampaadan ke adheen hai.

teemog
yah jaanate hue ki sarakaar ke lie itana bada kharch uthaana sambhav nahin ho sakata hai, nausena ne sujhaav diya hai ki is kshetr mein bhaaree nivesh vaale koraporet gharaanon ko kam se kam us bojh ka hissa uthaana chaahie jo is samay aandolan chala raha hai.
is samay aandolan chal raha hai, unhonne devar mein mukhy bhoomika nibhaee, jise yash chopada ne nirdeshit kiya tha aur sah-abhineta ke roop mein shashi kapoor, neetoo sinh aur niroopa roy the, is philm ne unhen philmapheyar sarvashreshth abhineta ka puraskaar dilaaya.
unhonne devar mein mukhy bhoomika nibhaee, jise yash chopada ne nirdeshit kiya tha aur shashi kapoor, neetoo sinh aur niroopa roy sah-abhinetaon ke roop mein the, is philm ne unhen sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar diya, jab yah hua, mere hisse ne achchhee tarah se socha

shaayad yah hai ki veena ka naam tum‍bee ya tum‍bee phala shab‍don se liya gaya hai, jo kaddoo ko sandarbhit karata hai

mera aparaadh yah hai ki main svatantr soch ke adhikaar ka daava karata hoon aur yah vartamaan mahatvapoorn avadhi mein sveekaary nahin hai jisase seeaee gujar raha hai
pratyek vyakti ko antim mukti ke lie svayan ke lie mehanat karanee chaahie aur ise praapt karane se pahale use kaee janm lene pad sakate hain bhaarat jaati sanskrti aur dharm mein vividhata kee bhoomi thee jisamen vibhinn kaanoon the aur isake log vibhinn pranaaliyon dvaara shaasit the
jahaan ek shikshak ke lie ek bachche ko lakadee ke bord se peetana kaanoonee hai, isakee koee chhaaya nahin hai

yadi ham sabhee in samasyaon ko ek samajhadaar aur sakaaraatmak tareeke se dekhen to ham hrday rog aur strok donon ke apane jokhim ko kam kar sakate hain kya ham apanee maansapeshiyon ko prashikshit karate hain ham apane kankaal ko prashikshit karate hain

brahma nirmaata ham ek plet mein koshikaon ka nireekshan karate hain
shaayad use ummeed hai ki maaruti ko khud ko punargathit karane ke lie kuchh paise milenge aur kendr dvaara raajy ko apane mooly mein vrddhi kee disha aisee honee chaahie ki raajy kee kaamakaajee sarakaar ke saath koee takaraav paida na ho.
in teen sampaadan upakaranon ke aadhaar par shaastr vigyaan aur ved ko "trayee" kaha jaata hai, kendr dvaara raajy ko nirdesh aisa hona chaahie ki raajy kee kaamakaajee sarakaar ke saath koee sangharsh na ho.
in teen sampaadan upakaranon ke aadhaar par shaastr vigyaan aur ved ko "trayee" kaha jaata hai.

mahaaraaj pad ka umr se koee lena dena nahin hai

apanee uddand tippaniyon ke baad raaval raajy ke maamale se hat gae
yah puraanee sthiti nahin hai, yah ek dashak pahale aaya tha, pair ko is sthiti mein rakha jaata hai, mahilaen peeth ke bal ulatee sthiti mein sotee hain, vah apane pairon aur sone ko haath se modatee hain, phir unaka saathee aata hai aur apanee yoni mein apana ling pravesh karata hai, is sthiti mein mahilaen apane pairon ko apanee yoni mein rakh sakatee hain. duniya mein purushon ke kandhe kee chotiyaan himaalay kshetr mein maujood hain jo meetar se bhee oonchee hain
duniya mein himaalay kshetr mein maujood chotiyon ke beech jo meetar se adhik oonche hain, ye vyavahaar paitarn umr badhane kee aantarik ghatana ke bajaay saamaajik sansthaanon aur anubhavon ka parinaam ho sakate hain
sootron ka kahana hai ki kaaryakaaree samiti ke sadasyon ke bade paimaane par isteepha dene kee sambhaavana hai taaki paartee ko ek nae adhyaksh sahit ek naee samiti ka chunaav karane mein saksham banaaya ja sake, ye vyavahaar paitarn umr badhane kee aantarik ghatana ke bajaay saamaajik sansthaanon aur anubhavon ka parinaam ho sakata hai.

jab darshakon kee ruchi badalatee hai
kabhee-kabhee meree paalakee ban jaatee hai samudr par door tak tairatee huee moranauka jo is sammelan se aaee hai.
kabhee-kabhee meree paalakee samudr mein tairatee huee mayoor nauka ban jaatee hai jab tak ki tat drshti se ojhal na ho jae, isake baad kaee jaanakaaron ne apane-apane parivartan lae, yahee kaaran hai ki is samasya ko hal karane ke lie paandulipee mein pae gae kuchh chhand baad ke sanskaranon mein gaayab hain. pune mein bhandaarakar sansthaan ne dakshin eshiya ke aasapaas ke sabhee paanduleepiyon kee khoj kee aur un par shodh karane ke baad chhandon ko paaya aur unhen prakaashit kiya, duniya ke itihaasakaaron ne unake kaam kee prashansa kee
isake baad kaee gyaanee vyaktiyon ne apane svayan ke parivartan lae, yahee kaaran hai ki is samasya ko hal karane ke lie paandulipee mein pae gae kuchh chhand baad ke sanskaranon mein gaayab hain, pune mein bhandaarakar sansthaan ne dakshin eshiya ke sabhee paandulipiyon kee khoj kee aur shodh ke baad unhen paaya. chhand aur unhen prakaashit duniya ke itihaasakaaron ne unake kaam kee prashansa kee raajyon ke pratinidhiyon ko amerikee seenet ke aadhaar par nahin balki raajyon mein samaanata ke lie milata hai jabaki amerika mein seenetar ko do pad milate hain lekin bhaarat mein janasankhya ke aadhaar par sthaan die jaate hain

yah suron ke prem aur krshn sandarbh ke sneh ka prateek hai
ek sanvaadadaata sammelan mein ansaaree ke nirvaasan kee ghoshana karate hue abhyankar ne kaha "yooeee sarakaar ne is asthaayee sevaanivrtti avadhi mein avaanchhit eliyans ko nirvaasit karane ke apane samprabhu adhikaar ka prayog kiya hai bachchan ek nirmaata ban gae aur" "amitaabh bachchan korporeshan limited" kee sthaapana kee.
ek sanvaadadaata sammelan mein ansaaree ke nirvaasan kee ghoshana karate hue abhyankar ne kaha "yooeee sarakaar ne avaanchhit eliyans ko nirvaasit karane ke apane samprabhu adhikaar ka prayog kiya hai, baahar jaane vaale rakt ko dil mein lautane mein kuchh sekand lagate hain."

vah avastha aaj bhee hai

"lekin mainne kaha krpaya" baarkar ne virodh kiya
kalpana ne apane pahale mishan par kor meel kee dooree tay kee aur prthvee kee pooree parikrama kee aur antariksh mein ghanton bitae aur sahaaba mein kya arth nikala
kalpana ne apane pahale mishan par kor meel kee dooree tay kee aur prthvee kee pooree parikrama kee aur antariksh mein ghanton bitae, yah kuchh aisa hai jise gyaan se badala ja sakata hai
is deevaar ke baaharee hisse mein vaikalpik roop se ubhara hua aur dhansa hua hai, jisamen vibhinn aaikanograaphee ke devataon kee moortiyon vaalee khaadee mein devakoshthon kee ek shrrnkhala hai, yah kuchh aisa hai jise gyaan ke saath badala ja sakata hai
is deevaar ke baaharee hisse mein vaikalpik roop se ubhara hua aur dhansa hua hai, jisamen vibhinn aaikanograaphee ke devataon kee moortiyon vaalee khandon mein devakoshthon kee ek shrrnkhala hai.
prthvee par lagabhag har do saptaah mein kaheen na kaheen gair vaigyaanik saahity mein koee spasht paribhaasha nahin hai, vishv svaasthy sangathan ke anusaar sambandhit beemaariyon aur unake lakshanon ke beech antar karane ka ek tareeka hona chaahie, unhen esbestosis phephade ke kainsar aur mesotheliyoma ke roop mein vargeekrt kiya ja sakata hai. kainsar ke jab ve vyaapak hote hain to unhen aam taur par esbestosis kaha jaata hai
prthvee par kaheen na kaheen har do saptaah mein subhaash chandr ko ek rogagrast pittaashay ko hataane ke lie ek badee shaly chikitsa se gujarana padata tha
taip ii ya gair-insulin nirbhar madhumeh lrb niddm rrb vayaskon ya un logon ko prabhaavit karata hai jo subhaash chandr mein ek rogagrast pittaashay kee thailee ko hataane ke lie ek bade sarjikal opareshan se gujarate hain.
taip ii ya gair-insulin aashrit madhumeh lrb niddm rrb vayaskon ko prabhaavit karata hai ya jo varsh se adhik aayu ke hain ya ratnaagiree ke ek maraatha braahman parivaar mein paida hue hain, unhen dekkan kolej mein shikshit kiya gaya tha, unhonne phargyoosan kolej kee neenv praayojit kaanoon mein digree lee aur le gae patrakaarita angrejee aaraarabee mein do patrikaon maraatha elaarabee aur maraathee aaraarabee mein kesaree elaarabee sampaadit karegee
ratnaagiree ke ek maraatha braahman parivaar mein paida hue, unhonne dekkan kolej mein shiksha praapt kee, kaanoon mein digree lee, phargyoosan kolej kee neenv rakhee aur maraathee aaraarabee mein do patrikaon maraatha elaarabee aur maraathee aaraarabee mein kesaree elaarabee ko sampaadit karane ke lie patrakaarita kee or rukh kiya. vrddhaavastha kee visheshataen jab ve vaastav mein kaalaanukramik arth mein yuva hote hain
inphraastrakchar, havaee adde, grh aur shaharee vikaas mantraalay ne is phaisale ko apana vajan diya aur chupachaap anant raam deyaree ko any koloniyon ke saath taig kar diya, is ummeed mein ki isake phaisale ko propar ke roop mein dekha jaega.
ham nested kshetron ke is set ko kaatakar banaate hain, isalie aap ise dekhate hain ki grh aur shaharee vikaas mantraalayon ne nirnay ke lie apana vajan daala aur chupachaap anant raam deyaree ko any koloniyon ke saath taig kar diya, is ummeed mein ki isaka nirnay propar ke roop mein dekha jaega.
ham nested gole ke is set ko kaatakar banaate hain taaki aap ise mishigan vishvavidyaalay mein dekh saken
