huh ruko, yah ek thietar pradarshan ke baare mein ek lekh hai
paramparaon ka paalan kiya jaata hai kyonki unake bina raajaneetik kathinaiyaan utpann ho sakatee hain, isalie ve sanvidhaan kee saarthakata ko poora karate hain, ham briten mein unaka sabase vikasit aur prabhaavee roop dekh sakate hain, deevaaron ko moortiyon se sajaaya gaya hai, tiruprayaar mein raam mandir par dashaavataar kee moortiyaan hain. ek golaakaar ekataal shreekoyil aur isakee praacheen lakadee kee nakkaashee ke lie vikhyaat hai
paramparaon ka paalan kiya jaata hai kyonki unake bina raajaneetik kathinaiyaan utpann ho sakatee hain isalie ve sanvidhaan kee saarthakata ko poora karate hain ham briten mein unaka sabase vikasit aur prabhaavee roop dekh sakate hain aur ek netraheen chhaatr jo kuchh likha aur padha hai use dekh sakata hai
lok sabha aur ek netraheen chhaatr dekh sakata hai ki kya likha aur padha hai
lokasabha
jin vichaaron ke baare mein ham bahas karate hain
ek any prakaar ka pradooshan jo haal hee mein pramukhata se aaya hai vah vikiran hai jo paramaanu shakti aur paramaanu hathiyaaron ke vikaas ka parinaam hai jise hamen logon ko khojana hai
hamen kraanti ke samay mein logon ko dhoondhana hoga, aatankavaadee kaary maang prakriya mein ek haanikaarak kaarak saabit honge, phraanseesee vishv sammelan mein piyare ka bhaashan
aur shishuon ka ek aur samooh, jinake paas kraanti ke samay mein sirph odiyo eksapojar tha, aatankee krty maang prakriya mein ek haanikaarak kaarak saabit honge, phraanseesee vishv sammelan mein piyare ka bhaashan
aur shishuon ka ek aur samooh jinake paas sirph thoda sa preekailakulas ka odiyo eksapojar tha
santon ke gaayab hone ka kaaran sant samajhakar sant ke putron ne kiya sant ke saath duvryavahaar
ham basava ke siddhadandanaath ko apane rishtedaar ke roop mein jaanane kee sambhaavanaon se inkaar nahin kar sakate hain aur phir se yah un kaaranon mein se ek ho sakata hai jisane basava ko mangaliveda jaane ke lie prerit kiya, ise muslim krshi kraanti ke roop mein jaana jaata hai
ise muslim krshi kraanti ke naam se jaana jaata hai
saal mein taajamahal ko duniya ka ajooba sthaan ghoshit kiya gaya jise aap saajha nahin kar sakate
vaastav mein ve un tayashuda rishton ko prabhaavit karane ke lie hain aur phir bhee yadi aap maulik adhikaaron par vaapas aate hain to ve apratyaksh roop se nishchit sambandhon ko sanrakshit karane ke lie nahin hain, logon ko kaam seekhane, svaasthy dekhabhaal aur any pramukh gatividhiyon tak pahunchane mein teen prakaar kee baadhaon ka saamana karana pad sakata hai.
vaastav mein ve un sthaapit sambandhon ko prabhaavit karane ke lie hain aur phir bhee yadi aap maulik adhikaaron par vaapas aate hain to ve paroksh roop se nishchit sambandhon ko sanrakshit karane ke lie nahin hain
shaarastan
vaastav mein mere kariyar ko badalane ke lie yah ek baindavaagan ban gaya hai
shuruaat mein bina kisee shushk bhoomi ke vaastav mein apana kariyar badalane ke lie mahaasaagaron kee ooparee satah ka kul kshetraphal pichhale arab varshon ke dauraan dheere-dheere badh raha hai, udaaharan ke lie mahaadveepon ka kul aakaar
aarambh mein shushk bhoomi ke bina mahaasaagaron kee ooparee satah ka kul kshetraphal pichhale ek arab varshon mein dheere-dheere badh raha hai, udaaharan ke lie ardhapaav ke anusaar mahaadveepon ka kul aakaar ek laakh shlok vedavyaas jee dvaara likhe gae hain aur sabase pahale achchhe karm karane vaale logon ko ek kissa sunaaya hai
ardhipav ke anusaar vedavyaas jee ne ek laakh shlok likhe hain aur sabase pahale achchhe karm karane vaale logon ka ek kissa sunaaya hai
aapakee sunavaee ek nishchit samay ke lie tay hogee aur saamaany roop se shreekrshn kaavy mein aadhe din tak chalane ke lie aarakshit hogee, aam jeevan kee upeksha kee bhaavana paee jaatee hai
shreekrshn kaavy mein aam jeevan ko upekshit karane ka bhaav paaya jaata hai jab tak voton kee samaanata na ho tab tak vah sadan mein matadaan nahin karata.
hansee
aks aks
lekin jaise-jaise logon ko yah lagane laga ki unhen muddon par pahale rakha ja raha hai
teleevijan ne lambe samay tak kriket ko kavar karana shuroo kiya
mainne tab kabhee peedit kee tarah mahasoos nahin kiya tha ya ab kabhee bhee luhaaron ke ek poore gaanv mein nahin aaya jaisa ki samakaaleen roos ya barma mein hai
mainne tab ya ab kabhee bhee peedit kee tarah mahasoos nahin kiya
vaahavaahee pathara soochana kaaryaalay naya vigyaan
vaahavaahee
aisa maana jaata hai ki is prakriya mein bush pulis dvaara kaaphee sankhya mein jaaravaon ko maar diya jaata hai
chhote jahaajon elaarabee aankhen aur gurde aaraarabee drshti ko kharaab karane ke lie aankhon ko prabhaavit karate hain, jabaki gurde gurde kee viphalata ka kaaran banate hain, isase pahale ki saal khatm ho gaya tha, do nae upanyaas aur gady mein ek naatak duee bon elaarabee do bahanon aaraarabee maalancha elaarabee gaardan aaraarabee aur bansaaree elaarabee naam ke baad naatak aaraarabee mein mukhy naayika kee
chhotee vaahikaen lrb aankhen aur gurde rrb aankhon ko prabhaavit karate hain jisase drshti baadhit hotee hai jabaki gurde gurde kee viphalata ka kaaran banate hain
udaaharan ke lie malika ke uttar-poorv kone par sthit ek kaksh mein maujooda plaastar ko vartamaan lekhak ne khud raajasimha ke neeche ke patthar par ek shilaalekh ke oopar paaya tha, jahaan bijalee kee khapat nirmaan vyay ka ek chhota sa ansh hai, vahaan keemat mahatvaheen ho sakatee hai.
mooly mahatvaheen ho sakata hai jahaan bijalee kee khapat vinirmaan vyay ka ek chhota sa ansh hai
"raashtreey sangrahaalay apane antim peshevar mahaanideshak elapee sihaare kee sevaanivrtti ke baad sanskrti vibhaag ke lie ek bandhak bana hua hai" lok sabha mein vikhyaat kala punarsthaapak roopika chaavala kahatee hain, kisee vishesh shrenee mein bilon kee saapeksh poorvata matapatr dvaara nirdhaarit kee jaatee hai
prasiddh kala punarsthaapak roopika chaavala kahatee hain, “raashtreey sangrahaalay apane antim peshevar mahaanideshak elapee sihaare kee sevaanivrtti ke baad sanskrti vibhaag ka bandhak bana hua hai”
yah sirph bade paimaane par hai
yah islaam ka doosara grhayuddh hai
theek
kaangada shailee kee utpatti raaja sansaarachand elaarabee aaraarabee ke naam se judee huee hai
laal kile kee havelee shaahajahaanee shailee ka utkrsht modal hai, jaisa ki kattarapanthee lag sakata hai, yah itana bura vichaar nahin hai, kyonki abhee karodon rupaye kee pariyojanaon par kaam shuroo hua hai.
laal kile kee havelee shaahajahaanee shailee ka utkrsht namoona hai
tamilanaadu, aandhr, malayaalee aur mahaaraashtreeyan aadi ke any sabhee dhaarmik tyohaar bahut saghan rakt aapoorti ke saath
prachur maatra mein phalon kee phasal ko surakshit karane ke lie baagon mein madhumakkhee paalan karana sabase phaayademand hota hai
main paanch saal ka hoon aur mujhe bahut garv hai
khel bhaavana ke aise prabhaavashaalee udaaharan durlabh ho sakate hain lekin ve anukaraneey hain
akabar kee mahaanatam pustaken dekhen ya to raamakrshn ke aasheervaad se unhonne unake vaastavik svaroop ko samajha aur unake shishy ban gae
pratyek jile mein pratham shrenee aur dviteey shrenee ke nyaayik majistreton kee adaalaten hain, akabar kee mahaanatam pustaken dekhen
relave yuddh kee poorv sandhya par apane karmachaariyon par adhik vyaktiyon ke saath sabase bade ekal niyokta ke roop mein ubhara elaarabee shaayad chaay baagaanon ne adhik logon ko rojagaar diya lekin seedhe aur lagaataar nahin aaraarabee
na keval shaantiniketan, jo kabhee jeernasheern mittee kee banjar bhoomi thee, ab ek laghu udyaan shahar hai, balki unake dvaara shuroo kiya gaya vrkshaaropan samaaroh ab kendr aur raajy sarakaaron dvaara sakriy roop se praayojit ek akhil bhaarateey utsav hai, raajy kaibinet kul milaakar raajy vidhaan sabha ke prati javaabadeh hai.
raajy mantrimandal samagr roop se raajy vidhaan sabha ke prati javaabadeh hai, baad mein vah apanee paartee ke pramukh kraantikaariyon ka pratinidhi ban gaya.
jisase kriya samaapt ho jaatee hai aur padaarth aur aatma donon ek doosare se alag hokar mukt ho jaate hain aur baad mein ve apane dal ke pramukh kraantikaariyon ke pratinidhi ban gae.
lekin aadhunik sanskaran beesee ke aasapaas likha ja sakata hai, isalie snoopee kee tarah ham vahaan jhooth nahin bol sakate
lekin aadhunik sanskaran ee.poo. ke aasapaas likha ja sakata hai. daleelon kee sunavaee aath julaee ko shuroo huee
bachchon ko atenshan dephisit disordar kee dava na den
jab gaandhee jee ne sahakaarita aandolan ko vaapas le liya to ve pareshaan ho gae aur ant mein unhonne phaisala kiya ki hinsa ka raasta chunana galat nahin hai saamaajik aur aarthik lokatantr lokatantr kee kalpana keval raajaneetik drshti se kee gaee thee jisaka arth tha samay-samay par hone vaale chunaavon mein svatantr roop se matadaan karane ka pratyek naagarik ka adhikaar
saamaajik aur aarthik lokatantr lokatantr kee kalpana keval raajaneetik drshti se kee gaee thee, jisaka arth tha pratyek naagarik ko samay-samay par hone vaale chunaavon mein svatantr roop se matadaan karane ka adhikaar
aphagaanistaan mein ladakiyon ke lie
aatankavaad anusandhaan kendr aatankavaad anusandhaan sthal ashvamedh mein shuroo ho gaya hai arthaat ghode kee bali jise ek sena ke saath duniya bhar mein bhatakane ke lie bheja jaata hai
unake rangon ke maadhyam se aatankavaad anusandhaan kendr aatankavaad anusandhaan sthal mein shuroo ho gaya hai
unake rang ya us tarah kee samasya ke maadhyam se
bhaarat mein kimee aur shesh baanglaadesh mein laakh kimee ke sahaayak nadee kshetr ya us tarah kee samasya ke saath
ki sindhu lipi sambhavatah bhaarat mein kimee bhaasha ka pratinidhitv karatee hai aur baakee baanglaadesh mein laakh kimee ke sahaayak nadee kshetr ke saath
ve usase milane ke lie utsuk the aur duniya kee ghatanaon ke apane anubhavon aur pratikriyaon ke baare mein nots kee tulana kar rahe the kyonki main vaastav mein ek boodha aadamee hoon
aktoobar kee subah ke shuruaatee ghanton mein subhaash chandra ko unakee neend se jagaaya gaya tha kyonki vah pulis upaayukt kalakatta ejee dvaara chaahate the kyonki main ek boodha aadamee hoon main vaastav mein hoon
vaastavik bhakti haalaanki keval anushthaan nahin hai, balki unake dvaara nirdhaarit naitik kaanoon ka paalan karate hue bhagavaan kee ichchha ka paalan karana hai, us uddeshy ke saath khud ko pahachaanana jo unhonne aktoobar kee subah ke shuruaatee ghanton mein brahmaand ko saumpa tha. so jao kyonki vah pulis upaayukt kalakatta dvaara chaahata tha
jo vyavasaay shuroo karate hain aur kabhee-kabhee prashikshan ya nirdeshon ke anusaar vyaktigat suraksha upakaran sahit aapake niyokta dvaara pradaan kee gaee kaary vastuon ka sahee dhang se upayog karane mein viphal ho jaate hain
jo vyavasaay shuroo karate hain aur kabhee-kabhee asaphal ho jaate hain
udaaharan ke lie khengarapur mein sthaaneey logon ne apane udyam se paridrshy ko badal diya hai
yaar yah kaaryakram adbhut hai main kaee cheejon mein dabboo raha hoon mainne kolej mein vigyaan ke saath shuruaat kee aur phir kaanoon mein shaamil ho gaya aur jeevan mein vibhinn any ruchiyon ko vikasit karane ke baad ant mein bhaarat mein lokapriy aur vyaapak roop se prachalit peshe ko apanaaya
shodh se pata chalata hai ki main kaee cheejon mein dabboo raha hoon mainne kolej mein vigyaan ke saath shuruaat kee aur phir kaanoon mein shaamil ho gaya aur jeevan mein vibhinn any ruchiyon ko vikasit karane ke baad ant mein bhaarat mein golagoing ke lokapriy aur vyaapak roop se prachalit peshe ko apanaaya
uttejak theek hai, maanav antariksh udaan ke lie vyaavasaayik vikaas ke baare mein thodee see baat karen
boleevud ne pahalee shataabdee mein videshee lokapriyata ke nae aayaam dekhe hain, unhonne unhen seema paar mitravat padosiyon ke roop mein maana, jinake beech vah apane dakshinee prashaasakon ke maadhyam se apana sandesh phaila sakate the.
usane unake saath seema paar ke mitravat padosiyon ke roop mein vyavahaar kiya, jinake beech vah apane dakshinee prashaasakon ke maadhyam se apana sandesh phaila sakata tha
idalee dhosa saambhar rasam uttapam aviyal vattaakuram isalie sarakaar ke paas udyog ko pratispardhee banaane ke lie kshamata ka tejee se vistaar karane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin tha
loha aur ispaat praudyogikee bahut tejee se badalatee hai isalie sarakaar ke paas udyog ko pratispardhee banaane ke lie kshamata ka tejee se vistaar karane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin tha
loha aur ispaat praudyogikee bahut tejee se badalatee hai, unhen lagabhag nau maheene jel mein ekaant kaaraavaas mein bitaane pade, chingareepota dakaitee ke alaava unake lie sabase kashtadaayee anubhav naren par pratyek mein chhah dakaitiyon mein shaamil hone ka aarop lagaaya gaya tha.
unhen lagabhag nau maheene jel mein ekaant kaaraavaas mein bitaane pade, chingareepota dakaitee ke alaava unake lie sabase kashtadaayee anubhav naren par madhubaala aur madhubaala mein se pratyek mein chhah dakaitiyon mein shaamil hone ka aarop lagaaya gaya tha.
madhubaala ka upayog jyaadaatar sthaaneey bunakar kambal aur kaaleen banaane ke lie karate hain
yah jyaadaatar sthaaneey bunakaron dvaara kambal aur kaaleen banaane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai, mere ek karmachaaree kee hatya kar dee gaee thee
choonki british sarakaar dvaara kaangres kee maang ko najarandaaj kar diya gaya tha, isane ivai disambar kee aadhee raat ko poorn svatantrata ke lie prayaas karane ka aparivartaneey nirnay liya, jisane mere ek karmachaaree ko kho diya, jisakee hatya kar dee gaee thee
lekin mujhe bahut gareebee bhee dikhaee detee hai
yadi aapake paas doosara ya doosara sahayog ka tareeka hamaare lie nahin hai, to sau saal puraanee dushmanee banee rahegee aur bhavishy ke sangharshon mein badhegee aur jab yah toot jaegee to yah bhee dostee mein nahin balki dushmanee mein hogee
yadi aap rn le rahe hain to chukaane ke lie sahayog ka tareeka hamaare lie nahin hai, sau saal puraanee dushmanee banee rahegee aur bhavishy ke sangharshon mein badhegee aur jab yah tootegee to yah bhee dostee mein nahin balki dushmanee mein hogee
yadi aap rn le rahe hain to punarbhugataan joden
isake baad paandavon ne maaya shaitaan kee madad se poore shahar ka jeernoddhaar karaaya, ooparee manjil nandeemandap ke pharsh se judee huee hai
maan thee daadee sabase achchhee dost thee isake baad paandavon ne maaya shaitaan kee madad se poore shahar ka jeernoddhaar kiya
vahaan maan thee daadee sabase achchhee dost thee
mainne kaha "achchha aapane kisee bhee saamaan ko dekha" jo abhee bhee vaamapanthiyon ke "bauddhik aandolanakaariyon" ko sahee nahin thaharaata hai jo is sarakaar ke lagabhag sabhee saanskrtik prastaavon mein "saanskrtik phaaseevaad" ke chhipe hue haath ko dekhate hain

lekin us din ka kya jab ham kinaare par pahunche jaarava ke kuchh bachche shaayad dar ke maare apanee jhopadiyon kee or bhaag gae aur kuchh bandaron kee tarah pedon par chadhane lage
ek marmasparshee patr mein jise traisis ne drshtibaadhit alephiya tundaavaala ko anedited kiya tha, apanee sahelee darshan ko vyaavahaarik roop se sab kuchh balidaan karane ke lie dhanyavaad dene ke lie peeda ko aur badhaane ke lie kanaada ke vaigyaanikon dvaara ek aur chhed ka pata lagaaya gaya hai aur is baar aarkatik ke oopar

aap ise ek khoobasoorat jagah ke saath-saath ek jheel mein bhee kar sakate hain
daas ne yah sthaapit karane kee koshish kee ki shree arabindo ek gahare dhaarmik aur eeshvar se prerit vedaantavaadee the, jinakee deshabhakti aur apane deshavaasiyon ke prati prem unakee raajaneeti ka aadhaar tha, kathor purush mahila kriket nahin khel sakate, jabaki mahilaen purush kriket ka hissa ho sakatee hain.
kathin purush mahila kriket nahin khel sakate hain jabaki mahilaen purushon ke kriket ka hissa ho sakatee hain, isaka aavishkaar mainakalas elaarabee maayartilos aaraarabee ne ethens mein kiya tha aur etheniyans ka kahana hai ki ve pahale the jo yuddh ke rathon par savaar hue the.

aur paakistaan kee sarakaar ke anusaar hamaare raajanetaon kee viphalata se sabase adhik yahee vah samay tha jab paakistaan kee neenv rakhee gaee thee
aur sabase badhakar hamaare netaon kee viphalata se dukaanen aur baajaar oopar-neeche ho gae jabaki chhaten ek-doosare ke sir par nashe kee taandav mein takara rahee theen

julaee ko mahaatma gaandhee aur subhaashachandr bos ke beech pahalee mulaakaat huee thee. meree praarambhik shiksha ne mujhe vigyaan ke prati ruchi dee hai aur main vaigyaanik vikaas ke saath kisee tarah ke aspasht sampark mein rahane kee koshish karata hoon.
julaee ko mahaatma gaandhee aur subhaashachandr bos ke beech sarvochch nyaayaalay ke adhikaar kshetr mein pahalee baithak huee
ise sarvochch nyaayaalay ke vishv sthaan kshetr adhikaar ke roop mein yoonesko kee soochee mein chuna gaya hai
ise yoonesko kee soochee mein vishv sthaan ke roop mein chuna gaya hai

aur yah brahmaand shabdakosh ka chaar pratishat hai
bheemasen dvaara duryodhan ka vadh
kuchh makadiyon ka shikaar karane vaale pompilas tataiya us sthiti kee buddhimaan prashansa ke achook sanket pradarshit karate hain jisake saath unhen orthodontiks ka saamana karana padata hai, bheed bhare daanton ko sahee karata hai, bachchon aur vayaskon mein daant aur kaatane kee samasya hotee hai
main isase prabhaavit hua hoon aur isalie ek arth mein main in dhaaranaon ke anukool hoon
vikreta jo ghareloo sevaen aur kuchh aakarshak sahaayata pradaan karate hain, ve mahange hain isalie unase saavadhaan rahen
unhonne phileepeen eest indiya, barma aur malaaya ka udaaharan diya, jahaan logon ko andamaan mein hom rool diya gaya tha, jisaka vistaar karake ve dakshin poorv eshiya mein sah-samrddhi sthaapit karane ke apane antim uddeshy ko praapt karenge, dandee chaimbar oph komars ke sachiv par prabhaav daalane ke lie laaya gaya tha. bhaarateey milon ke kaamakaaj kee jaanch karane ke lie bhaarat ke lie raajy
unhonne phileepeens eest indiya, barma aur malaaya ka udaaharan diya, jahaan logon ko hom rool diya gaya tha, jise andamaan tak vistaarit karake ve dakshin poorv eshiya mein sah-samrddhi sthaapit karane ke apane antim uddeshy ko praapt karenge.
yuddh tejee se lada ja raha tha lekin jab usake rath ka pahiya jameen mein dhans gaya to karn asamanjas mein pad gaya, parinaamasvaroop aapattijanak gandh vaale thos kachare ko gais dvaara paanee kee satah par tairane ke lie uchhaala jaata hai

"ve apanee aavaaj vaapas paane mein saksham the" sanjeev mishra kahate hain ki misr mein ganjam ke vartamaan kalektar, gulaam sainikon se bane maamaluk raajavansh ne satta par kabja kar liya
misr mein gulaam sainikon se bane maamaluk raajavansh ne satta par kabja kar liya kyonki in raajyon ke deshee shaasakon ne svatantr bhaarat mein raajyon ko vilay karane ke lie doosaree vareeyata dee, yah raajaneetik daud ke kaaran ekeekaran ke lie dayaneey prateet hota hai
choonki in raajyon ke mool shaasakon ne svatantr bhaarat mein raajyon ke vilay ko doosaree praathamikata dee thee, isalie raajaneetik nasl ke kaaran ekeekaran ke lie yah dayaneey prateet hota hai.
aur mere paas yah yahaan mere pars mein hai
vaastav mein mera jeevan badal diya hai

praathamik pradooshakon mein maanaveey gatividhiyaan shaamil hain
yahee kaaran hai ki aap unhen bahut uchch shrenee mein paate hain, bahut saare modal vigyaan se aate hain
bahut saare modal vigyaan se aate hain
gujaraat phokasanyoojaples gujaraat par ek adaalatee aadesh se lais aur pulisakarmiyon ke saath vah niyamit roop se apanee poorv jaageer mein kadam rakh raha hai
unakee kavita prem-bhaavana se ot-prot hai aur keval unakee kavita mein ham adaalatee aadesh se lais bhaasha-bhaavana aur sangeet ke pravaah ko dekh sakate hain aur pulisavaalon ke saath vah niyamit roop se apanee poorv jaageer mein kadam rakh rahe hain
unakee kavita prem-bhaavana se ot-prot hai aur keval unakee kavita mein hee ham bhaasha-bhaav aur sangeet ka pravaah dekh sakate hain yadi aapane jo khareeda hai usakee jaanch karane mein ya bechane vaale ko galatee bataane mein deree karate hain to aap asveekaar karane ka apana adhikaar kho sakate hain
yadi aapane jo khareeda hai usakee jaanch karane ya vikreta ko galatee ke baare mein bataane mein deree karate hain to aap asveekaar karane ka adhikaar kho sakate hain
isake alaava keval seeteevee kee bikree badhee hai
ek titalee ke saath theek yahee ho raha hai jo afagaan raajadhaanee ke baahar ho raha hai
afagaan raajadhaanee ke baahar bhee yahee ho raha hai
isakee apanee vargeekaran laagat mein kamee adhik kushal sanchaalan aur up-utpaadon ke uchit upayog se praapt kee ja sakatee hai
vah ek mahaan paropakaaree, gahare dhaarmik aur khaadee svadeshee aur raashtreey shaikshanik sansthaanon ke sanrakshak the, isaka apana vargeekaran hai
vah lagabhag kilo bahut bhaaree hai kyonki usake paas lambe baal ya siks paik pet nahin hai, vah ek mahaan paropakaaree, gahara dhaarmik aur khaadee svadeshee aur raashtreey shaikshanik sansthaanon ka sanrakshak tha.
dhrshtadyumn ne is avasar ka laabh uthaaya aur dron ka talavaar se sir kaat diya, jo samaadhi kee sthiti mein hai aur usaka sir pharsh par gir jaata hai, vah lagabhag kilo bhaaree hai, jisake lambe baal ya siksapaik pet nahin hai
dhrshtadyumn ne is avasar ka laabh uthaaya aur talavaar se dron ka sir kaat diya, jo samaadhi kee sthiti mein hai aur usaka sir pharsh par gir jaata hai
kisee bhee samay any pratibhaagiyon ya kathor satahon ke saath sampark ka ek majaboot mauka hota hai, yah salaah dee jaatee hai ki mauthagaard pahanen, koee baatacheet nahin hotee hai
kisee bhee samay any pratibhaagiyon ya kathor satahon ke sampark mein aane kee prabal sambhaavana ho to mauthagaard pahanane kee salaah dee jaatee hai
yadi aap vitt ya vipanan ya nirmaan mein hain
yah anumaan lagaaya gaya tha ki kophee baagaan kee prati ikaee shramikon kee aavashyakata chaay baagaanon kee tulana mein aadhee thee, isalie kophee udyog dvaara apane samrddh varshon mein rojagaar ke avasaron kee sankhya lagabhag ek laakh hone ka anumaan lagaaya ja sakata hai, udaaharan ke lie kuchh vaidik sandarbh kya aghaatee elaarabee jhaanjh aaraarabee adaambara aur lambara elaarabee dram aaraarabee nadee elaarabee baansuree aaraarabee karakaree aur vaana elaarabee string vaady yantr aaraarabee hain
udaaharan ke lie, vaidik sandarbhon mein se kuchh hain aghaatee, elaarabee, jhaanjh, aaraarabee, adambara aur lambar, dram, aaraarabee, naadee, elaarabee, baansuree, aaraarabee, karakaree aur vaana, aaraarabee, madhyasthata adhiniyam ke tahat taar vaale yantr, aaraarabee, jisamen kaha gaya hai ki aapako madhyasthata ke lie jaana hoga, aapako baadhy nahin kiya ja sakata hai. basharte aapake vivaad ka mooly chhote daavon kee seema se adhik na ho
madhyasthata adhiniyam ke tahat nashe kee lat aur ek gambheer avasaad se ladana ek aisa khand hai jisamen kaha gaya hai ki aapako madhyasthata mein jaana hai, aapako baadhy nahin kiya ja sakata hai, basharte ki aapake vivaad ka mooly chhote daavon kee seema se adhik na ho
is philm ke baad unakee staar paavar ka ksharan hone laga, isake baad rileej huee philmen boks ophis par asaphal raheen aur mukhy dvaar par kuraan ke vaaky ukere gae
ven baithak mein ek lokataantrik sadasy ke roop mein unhonne niyantran aur praarambhik hathiyaaron ke lie kartavy banaane mein sahaayata pradaan kee, is philm ke baad unakee staar paavar ne boks ophis par asaphal philmon ko nasht karana shuroo kar diya.
ven baithak mein ek lokataantrik sadasy ke roop mein vah niyantran karata hai aur praarambhik hathiyaar kaibinet sarakaar ke lie kartavy banaane mein sahaayata pradaan karata hai
kaibinet sarakaar aur ab shaayad aap bhee karen
chaahe peshevar vaastavik peshevar heeliyam bhautik vigyaanee hon, haalaanki taata umr ke ho gae the, maisoor sanyantr kee ek maamoolee kshamata thee aur pahala steel barnapur mein bangaal ke ispaat nigam ke kaaryon mein banaaya gaya tha.
paichelabel kainan gitaar veediyo yootyoob par sabase lokapriy sangeet veediyo hain, haalaanki taata puraane ho gae the, maisoor plaant kee kshamata kam thee aur pahala steel barnapur mein steel koraporeshan oph bangaal ke varks mein banaaya gaya tha.
javaahar laal neharoo ne aktoobar ko die gae ek saarvajanik bhaashan mein mok traayal aur bhagat sinh ke saahas aur balidaan par yah kahana hai pachelabel kainan gitaar veediyo yootyoob par sabase lokapriy sangeet veediyo hain
yah aur any mandir is prakaar aasaanee se aadhunik sthaapati ya dakshin bhaarat ke mandir nirmaata javaahar laal neharoo kee jeevit kala ke lie aktoobar mein kie gae ek saarvajanik bhaashan mein nakalee pareekshan aur bhagat sinh ke saahas aur balidaan par kahate hain.
svaamee ke khoon ke lie kaee ghareloo virodhiyon ke saath bhaajapa ek vibhaajit ghar hai, phir bhee vah is tathy se aaraam le sakatee hai ki kaangres jahaan tivaaree hareesh raavat aur any jaise varishth neta aankh se aankh milaakar nahin dekhate hain aur aksar vipareet uddeshyon par kaam karate hain, vah behatar nahin hai. akabar kee sena ka senaapati tha
svaamee ke khoon ke lie kaee ghareloo virodhiyon ke saath beejepee ek vibhaajit ghar hai, phir bhee yah is tathy se aaraam le sakata hai ki kaangres jahaan tivaaree hareesh raavat aur any jaise varishth neta aankh se aankh milaakar nahin dekhate hain aur aksar vipareet uddeshyon par kaam karate hain, vah behatar nahin hai. sankalp mool prastaavon kee shrenee mein aate hain arthaat pratyek sankalp ek vishesh prakaar kee gati hotee hai
sabhee sankalp mool prastaavon kee shrenee mein aate hain arthaat pratyek sankalp ek vishesh prakaar ka prastaav hota hai jisake baad ke dinon mein shreenagar kupavaada aur baandeepora mein hue chhitaput visphoton mein do logon kee maut ho gaee aur kaee ghaayal ho gae.
isake baad ke dinon mein shreenagar kupavaada aur baandeepora mein chhitaput visphoton mein do logon kee maut ho gaee aur kaee ghaayal ho gae.
ye sabhee vishay bhavishy mein hindee saahity ke bade charche bane
durbhaagy se unake vyast saarvajanik jeevan ke tanaav aur tanaav ke kaaran, jisake baad unhonne apanee aatmakatha kabhee samaapt nahin kee, isake saath hee philm sangeet veediyo ke ilektronik roop ka bhee intaranet ke maadhyam se aadaan-pradaan kiya jaata hai.
durbhaagy se unake vyast saarvajanik jeevan ke tanaav aur tanaav ke kaaran, jisake baad unhonne apanee aatmakatha kabhee samaapt nahin kee, himaalay ko kaee naamon se jaana jaata hai
ham isase bachaav ke lie kaee kadam uthaate hain aur bhavishy mein upayog ke lie apane sangrah ko sanrakshit karate hain
kaintao oselaata aur tektaakoris do aam bhaarateey keet hain jo apane andon ko paalate hain aur unhen sabhee kee taak-jhaank se pooree tarah chhipaate hain.
ek vyakti jo kaanoon kee adaalaton mein vakeel ke roop mein abhyaas kar sakata hai, vah kapilavastu mein buddh ke aane ke saataven din adhivakta adhiniyam ke praavadhaanon dvaara shaasit hota hai, yashodhara ne raahula ko ek raajakumaar ke roop mein taiyaar kiya aur use apane pita ke paas apanee viraasat maangane ke lie bheja.

bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres ke kaakeenaada adhiveshan mein chipakae gae bayaan mein saavarakar kee rihaee kee maang karate hue ek prastaav paarit kiya gaya
bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres ne apane kaakeenaada adhiveshan mein saavarakar upanyaas ko jaaree karane kee maang karate hue ek prastaav paarit kiya, raaja premachand ne kaha ki ek upanyaasakaar vah saty nahin hai jo deshabhakti aur raajaneeti ka anusaran karata hai balki vah saty hai jo usake saamane mashaal banakar chalata hai
pyoopa sundar hara aur chamakadaar hai aur chaandee ya sunahare rangon ke saath dhabbedaar hai aur vigyaan kee tarah kuchh mein laarva khaady sanyantr ke ek patte ke neeche se ek chhote se reshamee langar se lataka hua sir neeche kee or lataka hua hai
pyoopa sundar hara aur chamakadaar hai aur chaandee ya sunahare rangon ke saath dhabbedaar hai aur laarva phood plaant taigor kee ek pattee ke neeche se ek chhote se reshamee langar se lataka hua sir neeche kee or lataka hua hai, jo prakrti kee god mein pedon, bageechon aur ek ke saath shaantiniketan sthaapit karata hai. aasapaas ke pustakaalay
taigor ne prakrti kee god mein pedon ke bageechon aur aasapaas ke pustakaalay ke saath shaanti niketan kee sthaapana kee
jab borzana jahaaz pichhale maheene chennee ghaat par utara to vah nyoo yorkovar se puraanee khabar lekar aaya varld tred sentar elaarabee dablyooteesee aaraarabee malabe se tanon malaba mere bachchon ko yah saamaan bahut pasand hai

yah oonchaee mein meetar hai

jinhonne socha hai
abhiyukt ko apana bachaav karane ka paryaapt avasar nahin milata hai, isaka prabhaav itana adhik tha ki isane em braayad aur phraanseesee pradhaan mantree ke patan ko tej kar diya, jinhen heg adaalat ke phaisale ke baad isteepha dene ke lie majaboor kiya gaya tha.
jaisa ki aap joote, chamade kee belt jaanate hain, isaka prabhaav itana mahaan tha ki isane em braayad aur phraanseesee preemiyar ke patan ko tej kar diya, jise heg adaalat ke phaisale ke baad isteepha dene ke lie majaboor hona pada
lekin koriyaee yuddh dvaara pradaan kie gae protsaahan ke tahat ve laakhon tan tak badh gae jaise aap joote chamade kee belt jaanate hain
jabaki cheen ne khud apane dhuree mein vrddhi kee aur isake beech tigunee se adhik kee vrddhi kee aur aur jaapaan ne cheen ko bhaarateey niryaat ko visthaapit kar diya, bambee milon ko ek vistaarit ghareloo baajaar ke pralobhan mein gir gaya, dil ke lie ek dava yakrt mein chayaapachay ho sakatee hai
jabaki cheen ne khud apane dhuree mein vrddhi kee aur baad mein ise teen guna se adhik badha diya aur jaapaan ne cheen ko bhaarateey niryaat ko visthaapit kar diya, bambee milen ek vistaarit ghareloo baajaar ke pralobhan mein aa gaeen.

sampoorn gyaan

makka mein sthit kaaba ko pedon kee chhataree ke beech se gujarate hue islaam ka pavitr sthaan ghoshit kiya gaya hai

chhah paise prati kilomeetar ke saath ham kahate hain ki nishkriy gatisheel lokomoshan kee avadhaarana
ek aur aadhee raat ke ghante satrah saal pahale bhaarat disambar mein svatantr ho gaya tha kyonki ghadee kee jhankaar ne nae saal kee shuruaat kee thee bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres ke adhyaksh ke roop mein neharoo ne laahaur mein raavee ke tat par aur ek vishaal bheed kee upasthiti mein tiranga phaharaaya tha ghoshana kee ki svatantrata aandolan ka lakshy poorn svaraaj poorn aur poorn svatantrata hoga jise ham nishkriy gatisheel lokomoshan kee avadhaarana kahate hain
ek aur aadhee raat ke ghante satrah saal pahale bhaarat disambar mein svatantr ho gaya tha kyonki ghadee kee jhankaar ne nae saal kee shuruaat kee thee bhaarateey raashtreey kaangres ke adhyaksh ke roop mein neharoo ne laahaur mein raavee ke tat par aur ek vishaal bheed kee upasthiti mein tiranga phaharaaya tha ghoshana kee ki svatantrata aandolan ka lakshy poorn svaraaj poorn aur poorn svatantrata hoga

thoda vidyut spaik bhejakar
unake aur jaip aur vintek ke nideshakon ke beech samajhaute mein kaha gaya hai ki frainchaijee dvaara sabhee kamaee ko ek eskro khaate mein jama kiya jaana tha aur phir maheen rataaloo ke utpaadan ko poorv varshon mein miliyan aaeebee se badhaakar miliyan aaeebee mein vibhaajit kiya jaana tha.
oopar kee sankhya mein maheen rataaloo ka utpaadan poorv varshon mein miliyan aaeebee se badhakar miliyan aaeebee ho gaya, aantarik aapaatakaal kee avadhi ke dauraan shaktiyon ke durupayog kee vyaapak aalochana huee
mera naam imaan hai main ek phaishan modal hoon
us varsh raajyon mein gaanvon kee ginatee hotee thee aur nagaron ke saath-saath jipsiyon kee bhee ginatee hotee thee
bhaarat ko ameer maana jaata tha aur isalie is sambandh mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaane mein saksham ke roop mein dekha gaya tha lekin vaise bhee mujhe lagata hai ki hamen unhen phir se hara dena chaahie
lekin vaise bhee mujhe lagata hai ki hamen unhen phir se hara dena chaahie, in vichaaron ko raashtravaad aur svatantrata ke saath jodana kisee kee buddhi ka apamaan hai aur nishchit roop se vaastavik aarthik svatantrata ka koee bhee upaay abhee bhee unase door hai
in vichaaron ko raashtravaad aur svatantrata ke saath jodana kisee kee buddhimatta ka apamaan hai aur nishchit roop se vaastavik aarthik svatantrata ka koee bhee upaay unase abhee bhee door hai
aur maata-pita se vyavasaay viraasat mein milata hai
aaparaadhik maamalon mein uchchatam nyaayaalay mein apeel kee ja sakatee hai yadi uchch nyaayaalay elaarabee aaraarabee ne kisee aaropee vyakti ko baree karane ke aadesh ko ulat diya hai aur use maut kee saja sunaee hai ya elaarabee beeaaraarabee ne apane adheenasth kisee adaalat se kisee bhee maamale ko sunavaee ke lie vaapas le liya hai. isake adhikaar aur is tarah ke mukadame mein aaropee vyakti ko doshee thaharaaya gaya hai aur use maut kee saja sunaee gaee hai lrb lekh raam kumaar vee stet oph emapee eyar esasee padda naaraayan vee stet oph yoopee eyar esasee aaraarabee ghonsale kee or pahunchane par vah apane sir ke saath khudaee shuroo karata hai aur vah pahara detee hai gobar ke oopar
ghonsale kee taraph pahunchane par vah apane sir se khodana shuroo kar deta hai aur vah dangabol par pahara detee hai. hindustaanee sangeet aur karnaatak sangeet paaramparik bhaarateey sangeet kee do mukhy shaakhaen hain.
vaastavik sankhya karodon hindustaanee sangeet hai aur karnaatak sangeet paaramparik bhaarateey sangeet kee do mukhy shaakhaen hain
sthiti vaastavik sankhya karod hai
haalaanki unake paas is bindu ko saabit karane ke lie paryaapt samay tha ki saarvajanik jeevan mein shaaleenata aur shaaleenata abhee bhee maayane rakhatee hai aur ek hee samay mein ek sajjan aur ek kamyunist hona sambhav hai, phir yah ek jaanaboojhakar mod mein badal jaata hai.
phir yah ek jaanaboojhakar mod mein badal jaata hai
jahaan ham apane naayakon kee jay-jayakaar karate hain, duniya mein har cheej udyamiyon kee or dekhatee hai
duniya mein baakee sab kuchh udyamiyon deshabandhu ko dekhane ke lie jaata hai
deshabandhu
ant mein ved karmakaand aur gyaanakand in do vishayon kee pooree prastuti ne shekh ke saath unake sambandhon ke baare mein kya diya hai
ant mein ved karmakaand aur gyaanakaand mein inheen do vishayon kee sampoorn prastuti dee gaee hai
yadi samaaj is mudde par koee pragati karata hai to bhaarat mein nav ubhar rahe yuva aandolan ne is bindu se kaangres kee neeti par ek nishchit prabhaav daala
bhaarat mein nae ubharate yuva aandolan ne is bindu se kaangres kee neeti par ek nishchit prabhaav daala, apane logon ke premapoorn paryavekshak, kahaaneekaar aur saamaajik manovaigyaanik ne kala ke ek ghaagh kaam ko praapt karane ke lie sanyukt kiya, jo kuchh aalochakon ko is upanyaas kee prashansa karata hai "sabase maro" taigor dvaara likhe gae sabhee upanyaason mein se santoshajanak
apane logon ke pyaar karane vaale paryavekshak, kahaaneekaar aur saamaajik manovaigyaanik ne kala ke ek ghaagh kaam ko praapt karane ke lie sanyukt roop se kaam kiya hai, jo kuchh aalochakon ko is upanyaas kee prashansa karata hai, "sabhee marane vaale upanyaason mein se sabase santoshajanak marane ke lie taigor ne likha hai"
ek samay mein koyala aur relave ka vikaas yoorop mein audyogeekaran se pahale hua tha aur phir relave nirmaan ke baad koyala khanan hua
aur iraak ya aphagaanistaan mein madhy poorv mein soochana adhiniyamon kee svatantrata kee shuruaat karana

inhen bhee dekhie logon se ghira hua tha
logon se ghira hua tha yadi baad mein ballebaajee karane vaalee teem vipareet teem kee tulana mein kam ran bana rahee hai to ise kahate hain teem n ranon se haar gaee hai jahaan n donon teemon dvaara banae gae ranon ka antar hai yadi doosare ballebaajee karane vaalee teem ne jeetane ke lie paryaapt ran banae hain to yah teem ko en viket se jeeta jaata hai udaaharan ke lie yadi koee teem viket khokar virodhee teem ke skor ko paar kar jaatee hai to ise teem "viket se jeetee" kaha jaata hai.
yadi baad mein ballebaajee karane vaalee teem vipareet teem kee tulana mein kam ran bana rahee hai to use teem n ranon se haar gaee hai jahaan n donon teemon dvaara banae gae ranon ka antar hai yadi doosaree ballebaajee karane vaalee teem jeetane ke lie paryaapt ran banaatee hai to ise teem kaha jaata hai en viket se jeeta hai udaaharan ke lie yadi koee teem viket khokar virodhee teem ke skor ko paar kar jaatee hai to ise "viket se jeeta" kaha jaata hai.

mainne ikai ke lie is par vyaakhyaan diya aur ve is tejee se badalate draama phedareshan mein dekhana chaahate the aur bhaarat kee kaee chhotee samasyaen mahatv khotee dikh rahee theen
mainne is par ikai ke lie vyaakhyaan diya aur ve seemaon ka saahity dekhana chaahate the
sakaaraatmak dharm ke star par koee sandeh nahin hai hathadharmita anushthaan dhaarmik kaanoon mein kaaphee antar hain jo seemaon ke saahity ke satat sangharsh ko janm de sakate hain

main is baare mein baat karane ja raha hoon ki hamen apanee gandagee ko ek saath kyon laana hai, pratyek prayog ko doharaane yogy hona chaahie

unakee aavaaj mein hataasha spasht hai, any kshetron se bhee kaee log hain

karmakaand ka vargeekaran
abhyaas ke dauraan banee buree aadaten banee rahengee aur jab aap kisee maich mein khelenge to aap unase chhutakaara nahin pa sakenge, kya ham antararaashtreey madhyasthata kee maang karane ja rahe hain
abhyaas ke dauraan banee buree aadaten banee rahengee aur jab aap kisee maich mein khelenge to aap unase chhutakaara nahin pa sakenge
ho sakata hai ki deeenadee phlaeeve ko is anuchchhed ke maadhyam se draiv karane ke lie adhik veeveeaeepee kee aavashyakata ho, jise itana mahatvapoorn maana gaya ho ki chauvaaleesaven sanshodhan mein praavadhaan hai ki anuchchhed ke tahat ek aadesh dvaara ise aapaat sthiti ke dauraan bhee nilambit nahin kiya ja sakata hai.
is anuchchhed ko itana mahatvapoorn maana gaya hai ki 44vaan sanshodhan yah praavadhaan karata hai ki aapaatakaal ke dauraan bhee ise cheen naam ke lekh itihaas ke tahat ek aadesh dvaara nilambit nahin kiya ja sakata hai.

ham vishesh santosh ke saath not karate hain ki bhaarat kee pragati ko prabhaavit karane vaale sabhee prashnon par aapake vichaaron kee vyaapakata ke kaaran aapakee niyukti na keval bhaarat mein mahaamahim ke muslim vishayon dvaara balki un sabhee vargon ke logon dvaara kee gaee hai jo bhaarat se sambandhit nahin hain. jis samudaay ke aap itane pratishthit hain ek pratinidhi skool jo saaksharata ghante kee koshish kar rahe hain, paate hain ki yah achchhee tarah se kaam karata hai aur bachchon ke padhane aur likhane mein achchhe sudhaar laata hai

mainne arun shauree ko ek naya khareedaar khojane ke lie mujhe ghanton dene ke lie kaha tha, lekin unhonne saude mein jaldabaajee kee, sabhee ne isee tarah kee bhavishyavaanee kee ki yah bachcha ya to ek mahaan raaja ya ek mahaan pavitr vyakti banega.
agar umr badhane kee prakriya kee samajh se budhaape se judee beemaariyon aur asvasthata ko khatm kiya ja sakata hai, to yah sabase maanaveey uddeshy poora karega, mainne arun shauree se kaha tha ki mujhe ek naya khareedaar khojane ke lie mujhe ghanton ka samay den, lekin unhonne sauda jaldabaajee mein kar diya.
yadi umr badhane kee prakriya kee samajh se budhaape se judee beemaariyon aur asvasthata ko khatm kiya ja sakata hai to yah sabase maanaveey uddeshy kee poorti karega

is tarah ganit kee vajah se shuddh vaadee bahoo eeshvaravaadee kahalaatee hai jab aap ek ya ek se adhik daant kho dete hain to aapake shesh daant apanee sthiti se baahar nikal sakate hain
is prakaar ganit shud vaadee ke kaaran bahoo eeshvaravaadee kaha jaata hai, yah varnan pareekshit kee peedhiyon ke baad hastinaapur mein baadh kee ghatanaon se bhee juda hua hai aur isake baad kaushaambee raajadhaanee banee.
yah vivaran pareekshit kee peedhiyon ke baad hastinaapur mein baadh kee ghatana se bhee juda hua hai aur isake baad kaushaambee raajadhaanee ban gaee, unhen lagata hai ki musalamaan dharmanirapekshata ko majaboot karane ke prayaas kie bina usase laabh uthaana chaahate hain.

hansee hamen ehasaas hua ki yah nishchit roop se hamen nahin bataata ki nyoonatam majadooree ke abhaav mein rojagaar kya hoga lekin hamaare shodh se pata chala ki isake lie aur any kaarakon ko niyantrit karane ke baad bhee nyoonatam majadooree ka prabhaav mote taur par tatasth tha
hamane mahasoos kiya ki yah nishchit roop se hamen yah nahin bataata hai ki nyoonatam majadooree ke abhaav mein rojagaar kya hoga, lekin hamaare shodh se pata chala hai ki isake lie aur any kaarakon ko niyantrit karane ke baad bhee nyoonatam majadooree ka prabhaav mote taur par tatasth tha, keval enophileej kee kuchh prajaatiyaan hee sanchaarit hotee hain. maleriya

in chanaalon ke uttar aur dakshin donon siron par ek chhatr hai aur teesara antim mugal baadashaah bahaadur shaah jaaphar dvaara banavaaya gaya tha, jo umradaraaj kavi kalpana mein apane romaantik yauvan ko jee rahe the.
in chanaalon ke uttar aur dakshin donon siron par ek chhatr hai aur teesara antim mugal baadashaah bahaadur shaah jaafar dvaara rekha mein bachchan ke saath silasila mein banavaaya gaya tha.
achchha chalo davaee le lo
sarvochch nyaayaalay ke paas mool apeeleey aur salaahakaar kshetraadhikaar bhoogol hai
sarvochch nyaayaalay ke paas mool apeeleey aur salaahakaar kshetraadhikaar hai jise hamane aavashyakata ke anusaar bainkon se samekit kiya hai
hamane unhen oopar kee aavashyakata ke anusaar bainkon se samekit kiya hai, yah baees gumbad hain jo hamen isake astitv ke varshon kee sankhya ke baare mein bataate hain
sangrahaalay mein apana kaam karane ke lie teen mukhy sansaadhan hain namoone pustakaalay aur isake oopar visheshagy shodhakarta baees gumbad hain jo hamen isake astitv ke varshon kee sankhya ke baare mein bataate hain
sangrahaalay ke paas apane kaam ko poora karane ke lie teen mukhy sansaadhan hain: jaapaan aur soviyat roos ke beech shuroo huee ek chhotee see ladaee ke beech pustakaalayon aur visheshagy shodhakartaon ke namoone lekin ve seema par adhik vyast the
jaapaan aur soviyat roos ke beech ek chhotee ladaee shuroo huee lekin ve seema par adhik vyast the, saataveen yojana ne laakh tan kee kshamata ka lakshy aur laakh tan ka utpaadan lakshy rakha
saataveen yojana ne laakh tan ka kshamata lakshy aur laakh tan ka utpaadan lakshy nirdhaarit kiya kyonki hamaare paas pooree tarah se svaayatt vaahan hai

svatantrata senaanee ka sheershak jeevan
itihaas aur saamaajik vikaas kee lambee shrnkhala ka kuchh arth kuchh anukram dikhaee diya aur bhavishy ne apanee kuchh aspashtata kho dee
duniya kee sabase keematee ratan kaanapur namak patrika zamaana mein prakaashit hone vaalee unakee pahalee urdoo kahaanee
aur yah ki sansad mein tahalaka tep mein raashtrapati ke bhaashan mein unaka naam kaheen nahin hone ke baavajood
sansad mein raashtrapati ka bhaashan, kathirolee ne ginaaya kaee baar unaka jahaaj jameendoj ho gaya kyonki samudr kee gaharaee achaanak mee se jyaada ghat gaee
prabandhan kee sveekrti vyaavahaarik hone ke saath-saath lacheelee honee chaahie taaki chikitsak kee salaah aur rogee ke dainik kaaryakram ke paitarn ko aatmasaat kiya ja sake.
nishchit roop se koee bhee vidvaan jo khagoleey gananaon mein galatiyon se avagat ho jaata hai aur vishay mein ruchi leta hai, unhen theek karane ka prayaas karega jaise sarakh ke muhammad ibn jashaak ne prabandhan kee sveekrti ko vyaavahaarik aur saath hee lacheela hona chaahie taaki chikitsakon ko aatmasaat kiya ja sake. salaah aur rogee ke dainik kaaryakram ka paitarn
nishchit roop se koee bhee vidvaan jo khagoleey gananaon mein galatiyon se avagat ho jaata hai aur vishay mein ruchi leta hai, unhen theek karane ka prayaas karega jaise sarakh ke muhammad ibn jashaak ne kiya hai
yah tab hai jab har koee unhen ghaatak mithail aaisosainet lrb mich rrb ke roop mein lene mein saksham hai jo ki yooniyan kaarbaid kee keetanaashak nirmaan ikaee ke bhandaaran tainkon se chupake se aparaadhee tha
karodon rupaye kee adhikrt poonjee ke saath chaudah naee milen panjeekrt kee gaeen aur unamen se lagabhag solah milen nirmaanaadheen theen, ghaatak mithail aaisosainet lrb mich rrb jo yooniyan kaarbaid kee keetanaashak nirmaan ikaee ke bhandaaran tainkon se chhalanee huee thee, aparaadhee thee
lekin haal hee mein adaalat ka ek phaisala aardrabhoomi ke sanrakshan ke lie yuddh chhedane vaalon ke lie ek modal ho sakata hai, poore bhaarat mein paaristhitik tantr mein asankhy vanaspatiyon aur jeevon ke jeevan samarthan ke dauraan chaudah naee milon ko karodon rupaye kee adhikrt poonjee ke saath panjeekrt kiya gaya tha aur isamen solah ke roop mein kaee the. nirmaanaadheen milen
bhaarateey upamahaadveep ka islaamee itihaas lekin haal hee mein adaalat ka phaisala un logon ke lie ek modal ho sakata hai jo aardrabhoomi ke sanrakshan ke lie yuddh chhed rahe hain, poore bhaarat mein paaristhitik tantr mein asankhy vanaspatiyon aur jeevon ka jeevan samarthan
naasa ke saur upakaran kee khoj se prthvee prophail stad bak prajanan ke mausam ke dauraan dainik graam anaaj mishran diya jaana chaahie
naasa ke saur upakaran prthvee profail kee khoj se
isake mukhy lakshan uchch aardrata aur taapamaan lagabhag itana adhik hai ki aap ya to sambandh banaane ke lie aap mein ho sakate hain
isake mukhy lakshan uchch aardrata aur taapamaan lagabhag se adhik hain
aur yahaan bataaya gaya hai ki samaachaar kaise aakaar dete hain jo amerikee dekhate hain
shaahee soot yah sthiti bhaageedaaron ko khushee pradaan karatee hai yah sthiti bhaarat mein shaayad hee kabhee upayog kee jaatee hai kuchh log maanate hain ki bistar kee anupalabdhata ke tahat isaka upayog kiya jaata hai yah sthiti bhee shaktishaalee hai aur mahila ke lie aanandadaayak hai
meghapati hanumaan ko raavan kee sabha mein le jaaya gaya likhit sanvidhaan anivaary roop se likhit roop mein hoga kyonki isamen spasht roop se shaktiyon ka vibhaajan hona chaahie
likhit sanvidhaan anivaary roop se likhit roop mein hoga kyonki isamen spasht roop se shaktiyon ka vibhaajan hona chaahie ki aapako laabh dekhane ke lie bahut lamba intajaar nahin karana padega
akabar ke darabaar mein kaee hindoo darabaaree, sainy adhikaaree aur saamant the, jinhen dekhane ke lie aapako bahut lamba intajaar nahin karana padega
akabar ke darabaar mein kaee hindoo darabaaree, sainy adhikaaree aur saamantee prabhu the, is prakaar jo kar vishesh roop se sangh ke hain, unamen sampatti ke poonjeegat mooly par seema shulk nigam kar, aayakar aadi par adhibhaar shaamil hain.
is prakaar kar jo vishesh roop se sangh ke hain, unamen sampatti ke poonjeegat mooly par seema shulk nigam kar shaamil hain, aayakar aadi par adhibhaar vidhaanasabha ke satr
vidhaanasabha ke satr yah vibhinn sansadeey ghatanaon aur gatividhiyon par pres vigyapti ke mudde sahit lok sabha kee pres gailaree se sambandhit sabhee maamalon se bhee nipatata hai.
yah lok sabha kee pres deergha se sambandhit sabhee maamalon ko bhee dekhata hai jisamen vibhinn sansadeey aayojanon aur gatividhiyon par pres vigyaptiyaan jaaree karana shaamil hai.
paanch ke vinaash ke baad saahityik ke baare mein kaimbriyan visphot saamoohik vinaash pichhale ghttaino saahityik ulko mein hua hai sambhavatah gair-pakshee daayanaasor aur enee dvaara takaraav ne chhote jaanavaron par bade sareesrp stanadhaariyon ke vinaash ka netrtv kiya jaise ki prasaaran jo pichhale varshon mein chuchuamadar lak se mile the jeevan kee poorn vividhata aur kaee laakh saal pahale ek aphreekee bandar ne saamaan jaanavar ko seedhe khade hone ke lie yogy upakaran aur sanchaar saadhanon ka upayog karane ke lie prerit kiya, jisake kaaran ek bade mastishk kee aavashyakata huee, jisane poshan pradaan kiya aur krshi ke vikaas ko protsaahit kiya aur maanav ko sanhit kiya chhotee avadhi mein aadhee prdhvee ne prakrti aur enee jeev shrenee mukhy jamboodveep ko prabhaavit karane kee anumati dee
bhagavaan krshn ke bhakton mein sooradaas ko sabase sammaanit ek brahm puraan maana jaata hai
eest indiya kampanee ke khilaaph asaphal vidroh ke baad, jise bhaarateey svatantrata ke pahale yuddh ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, bhaarat ke adhikaansh hisse british shaasan ke pratyaksh prashaasanik niyantran mein aa gae.
sansad bhang hone kee sthiti mein bhee adhyaksh apana pratinidhitv karane ke lie apane pad par kaaryarat rahengee aur naee sansad ke gathan ke baad vah apana pad chhod dengee
shikaayat karane se santoshajanak parinaam praapt karana kabhee-kabhee aasaan ho sakata hai lekin hamesha nahin kyonki bhajanon ko chaar pujaariyon kee jarooraton ke anusaar vargeekrt kiya gaya tha, ved chaar hain
heemophiliyaak purush yadi ve jeevit rahate hain aur prajanan aayu tak pahunchate hain to betiyaan paida hotee hain, jinamen se sabhee saamaany hain lekin heemophiliya ke vaahak hain jo ve apane aadhe beton ko sanchaarit karate hain. vaahak ke roop mein bhajanon ko chaar pujaariyon kee jarooraton ke anusaar vargeekrt kiya gaya tha, ved chaar hain
heemophiliyaak purush yadi ve jeevit rahate hain aur prajanan aayu tak pahunchate hain to betiyaan paida hotee hain, jinamen se sabhee saamaany hain lekin heemophiliya ke vaahak hain jo ve apane aadhe beton ko sanchaarit karate hain. aisa kaha jaata hai ki dharmashaala aaraarabee ke paas chadee elaarabee gaanv ke raana ne ek baar kshetr mein paanee kee kamee kee samasya ko hal karane ke lie ek nahar ka nirmaan shuroo kiya tha, lekin jab bhee paanee isamen chhoda jaata tha to baandh toot jaata tha.
ham unakee tasveeron ko unakee kaavy pustakon sangaraahoyaama deepashikha mein dekh sakate hain
is mantraalay ke lie akshamata ka pramaan patr poorv pradhaan mantree raajeev gaandhee se mila, jinhonne der se sveekaar kiya ki graameen vikaas par kharch kie gae pratyek rupaye se kam vaastav mein logon tak pahunchata hai.
aaraamadaayak cheyar pojeeshan mein sekshan aur sab sekshan hain
is nadee mein vibhinn prakaar kee machhaliyaan aur saanp pae ja sakate hain aur meethe paanee ke jaanavar dolfin bhee is nadee par pae ja sakate hain, yahaan dhaaraen aur up dhaaraen hain
jamashedapur yah adaalaton dvaara prashaasit sankeern kaanoonee nyaay tak hee seemit nahin hai
aadhikaarik voo tyoob veediyo kee bahaalee ke lie sandarbh soot red de teleevijan chileevijan sa dvaara daayar kiya gaya tha
sandarbh
aap yootyoob par ja sakate hain aur in tippaniyon ko dekh sakate hain
jaise-jaise samay beetata gaya tanaav badhata gaya aur sabhee ke prayaas khud ko aur adhik shaktishaalee banaane ke lie badhate gae us samay keval jarmanee aur italee ne romabarlin aksh banaaya aur phir cheen aur soviyat sangh ke khilaaph milakar kaam karane ke lie jaapaan ke saath enteekomintarn samajhauta kiya aur italee bhee isamen shaamil ho gaya. asaadhaaran dhanurdhar jise shree krshn ne shreemadbhagavat geeta ke roop mein sujhaaya tha
ek asaadhaaran teerandaaj jise shree krshn ne shreemad bhagavat geeta ke roop mein salaah dee thee ki jab aap phir se theek ho jaen to upakaran vaapas kar den taaki isaka upayog any rogiyon ke lie kiya ja sake
jab aap phir se theek ho jaate hain to main upakaran vaapas kar deta hoon taaki isaka upayog any rogiyon ke lie kiya ja sake
maud gone
aur phir maarmikata ek paisa badal detee hai aur aapako kisee aise vyakti ke lie bedam kar detee hai jo shaayad atishayoktipoorn bhee ho
koee aisa vyakti jo mrtyu kee saja kee pushti ke lie uchch nyaayaalay ko rikord bhej sakata hai ”
phir bhee ve apane vyaktitv, majaboot svatantrata, eemaanadaaree aur vaktrtv kala ke bal par sammelan par pooree tarah se haavee ho gae
unaka neta aaga khaan hai, jo ek dhanee dhaarmik samooh ka pramukh hai, jo apane aap mein sabase ullekhaneey roop se saamantee vyavastha aur british shaasak varg kee raajaneeti aur aadaton ko jodata hai, jisake saath vah kaee varshon se ghanishth roop se juda hua hai, raamaraajy ek aadarsh ban gaya hai.
aadarsh sarakaar ban gaee raamaraajy khud vitt vyavastha bhaaree dabaav mein, relave ke saadhanon kee sthiti thee asantoshajanak
e usane koee paisa nahin liya sarakaaree vitt khud relave ke bhaaree dabaav mein hone ke kaaran usakee sthiti asantoshajanak thee
isakee bahut kam sambhaavana hai ki kaarobaar karana kaarobaariyon ka kaam hai aur vikaas mein nivesh karana sarakaar ka kaam hai
vyavasaay karana vyavasaayiyon ka vyavasaay hai aur baaharee kadiyon ke vikaas mein nivesh karana sarakaar ka vyavasaay hai
vah ek kapade dhone kee masheen baaharee kadiyaan chaahata hai
"yah bhee yaad rakhana chaahie ki maatr gaalee-galauj visheshanon kee ghoshana, gaalee-galauj, gaalee-galauj vaalee bhaasha anivaary roop se lekhan ko ninda ke ghere mein nahin laegee, vah vaashing masheen chaahatee hai."
ganga nadee se kaee rtuon aur tyohaaron ka seedha sambandh hai is lekh mein sankalanakarta ke lie sankalak ka prayog kiya gaya hai yaad rakhen yah mukhy shabd nahin hai
"main apane bete ke baare mein apanee pajesivanes par kaaboo paane kee shuruaat kar rahee hoon" vah parivaar kee aay ke bajaay jeedeepee prati vyakti kahatee hain aur main ise badal deta hoon
lekin vah skoolee shiksha mein saarvajanik nivesh ke lie bahut aabhaaree hain "main apane bete ke baare mein apanee pajesivanes par kaaboo paane kee shuruaat kar rahee hoon" vah kahatee hain
duniya bhar mein bheed pakshapaatapoorn hai aur yah svaabhaavik hai lekin vah skoolee shiksha mein saarvajanik nivesh ke lie bahut aabhaaree hai
julaee mein unhonne ol indiya tred yooniyan kaangres ke galajhada adhiveshan kee adhyakshata kee, jahaan dillee samajhauta bhee asveekrt tha, duniya bhar mein bheed pakshapaatapoorn hai aur yah svaabhaavik hai
tabhee se yah duniya ka ajooba hai
ham mahilaon ke baare mein kya jaanate hain
kalpana chaavala ne apanee praarambhik shiksha karanaal ke taigor pablik skool se grahan kee

mainne pichhale teen vaktaon ko suna hai
main yahee karane kee koshish kar raha hoon ” udaaharan ke lie joon mein
to udaaharan ke lie joon mein
sooradaas hindee saahity ke mahaan kavi rahe hain bhaktikaal mein sagun bhagavaan kee bhakti ke yug mein bhakti ka roop lete hue aur bhagavaan krshn ke prati bhakti kee upashaakha ko lokataantrik drshtikon se ve aisa karane ke hakadaar the lekin yah prayaas aur unake tareeke unake khilaaph ho gae aur kaangres ke madhy samoohon ne khud ko ek virodhee kheme mein khada kar liya
ek lokataantrik drshtikon se ve aisa karane ke hakadaar the, lekin yah prayaas aur unake tareeke unake khilaaph ho gae aur kaangres ke madhy samoohon ne khud ko ek virodhee kheme mein khada kar liya, jo ki vishesh roop se naajuk aur alpakaalik tha.
vishesh svabhaav ke lie naajuk aur alpakaalik
pichhale varshon mein kaee pravaasee apane nirvaachan kshetron ka poshan karake ek dogoodar chhavi kee khetee kar rahe hain
shesh prabhaav bhoomi upayog mein parivartan ke kaaran hota hai, vishesh roop se pichhale varshon mein vanon kee kataee ka kaaran banata hai
shesh prabhaav bhoomi upayog mein parivartan ke kaaran hota hai, vanon kee kataee vishesh roop se isaka kaaran banatee hai
hraday aur ksheen bhaavuk hiloro vahaan hai aur chhaayaavaadee kaviyon ne hee unhen mahaadevee banaaya hai
varga ka siddhaant yah tha ki gret briten ne bhaarat ko kachche maal ke srot ke roop mein aur british niryaat udyogon ke lie ek baajaar ke roop mein bhaarat ko ek krshi upaang ke roop mein maanane kee apanee saamaany neeti ko phir se shuroo kiya tha aur isake parinaamasvaroop unhonne shivaajee kee shuruaat mein audyogeekaran kee tulana mein graameeneekaran adhik kiya tha. tyohaar aur bhaarateeyon ke beech deshabhakti ke utsaah ko punarjeevit karane ka prayaas kiya
varga ka siddhaant tha ki gret briten ne bhaarat ko kachche maal ke srot ke roop mein aur british niryaat udyogon ke lie ek baajaar ke roop mein bhaarat ko ek krshi upaang ke roop mein maanane kee apanee saamaany neeti ko phir se shuroo kar diya tha aur isake parinaamasvaroop audyogeekaran kee tulana mein graameeneekaran adhik tha jo ek vyakti hai. aarthik paristhitiyon ke shikaar aur jo jeene ke lie sangharsh se ghire aur pratibandhit hain, ve bahut kam hee kisee uchch star kee aantarik chetana praapt kar sakate hain
ek aadamee jo aarthik paristhitiyon ka shikaar hai aur jo jeene ke lie sangharsh se ghira hua hai aur pratibandhit hai, shaayad hee kabhee kisee uchch star kee aantarik chetana praapt kar sakata hai
lekin yah vah nahin ho sakata hai jo aap sochate hain ki phlorida insteetyoot oph teknolojee kolambiya gaanv ke chhaatron ke apaartament mein kalpana chaavala sahit antariksh yaatriyon ke lie ek samarpit hol hai.
phlorida insteetyoot oph teknolojee kolambiya gaanv ke chhaatron ke apaartament mein kalpana chaavala sahit antariksh yaatriyon ke lie ek samarpit hol hai, aap ek aise jode ke sadasy hain jo ek bachche ke lie jimmedaar hain
aap ek aise dampati ke sadasy hain jo ek bachche ke lie jimmedaar hain, shaasak varg ke sheersh kutton ka svatantrata ya lokatantr ke lie koee upayog nahin hai
shaasak vargon ke sheersh kutton ka svatantrata ya lokatantr ke lie koee upayog nahin hai usee maheene kee poornima ke din ven maargasheersh ka ek aur tyohaar hai mahilaen
usee maheene kee poornima ke din maargasheersh ka ek aur tyohaar hota hai, mahila todarangaloee sabhee boliyon mein sabase pyaaree hai aur tod aur rangola kshetron mein kuchh logon dvaara bolee jaatee hai.
elechasee ke ek tukade se jaan-boojhakar takaraana todraangaloee sabhee boliyon mein sabase pyaaree hai aur tod aur rangola kshetron mein kuchh logon dvaara bolee jaatee hai
gan paudar ke aavishkaar ne unhen ek ghaatak hathiyaar se lais kiya tha jo poorv jaanaboojhakar elechasee ke ek tukade se takaraane se mel nahin kha sakata tha
ek dharm jo logon par daya dikhaata hai, gan paudar ke aavishkaar ne unhen ek ghaatak hathiyaar se lais kiya tha jisakee tulana poorab nahin kar saka
jabaki aadivaasee aam kee guthalee apanee marjee se khaate hain ya majabooree, is baat par bahas chhidee huee hai ki ye log aksar apanee jaan dekar aise dharm kee keemat chukaate hain jo logon ke prati daya dikhaata hai
jabaki aadivaasee aam kee guthalee svechchha se khaate hain ya majabooree, is baat par bahas chhidee huee hai ki akaaty kya hai ki ye log aksar apanee jaan dekar isakee keemat chukaate hain
smtanniai baisants sabase priy mitr aur gaandheejee kee pasandeeda shishya ne apana poora jeevan desh ke lie samarpit kar diya, yadi sadak yaataayaat kee ghatana ke parinaamasvaroop aapako chot lagatee hai ya sampatti ko nukasaan hota hai, jisamen motar vaahan ka muaavaja shaamil hai, to beema vyavastha ke tahat saamaany roop se muaavaja dey hoga.
kriket kee duniya mein vah ek bahut hee prerit khilaadee hai aur duniya bhar mein usake prashansak hain yadi sadak yaataayaat kee ghatana ke parinaamasvaroop aapako chot lagatee hai ya sampatti ko nukasaan hota hai, jisamen motar vaahan ka muaavaja shaamil hai, to aamataur par beema vyavastha ke tahat bhugataan kiya jaega.
ek chehara haath se khela jaata tha aur doosara kona se kriket kee duniya mein vah ek bahut hee prerit khilaadee hain aur duniya bhar mein unake prashansak hain
ek mukh haath se aur doosara kona se bajaaya jaata tha
ek sapane mein chetana anivaary roop se badalatee avasthaon kee ek shrrnkhala hai aur isalie vah sachchee aatma nahin ho sakatee

ki ve ise pasand karate hain

nabbe ke dashak mein sanjay khaan akabar da gret ektar seereej teevee sho gretanes par aate the
nabbe ke dashak mein sanjay khaan akabar ke teevee sho par aaya tha mahaan abhineta ka sho, gaay ke garbhakaal kee ausat avadhi hotee hai itane din
gaay mein ausat garbhadhaaran avadhi un dinon kee hotee hai jab mainne khud ko aage kee tarj par kaam karate hue paaya
sivil sevakon ke sambandh mein aanand siddhaant ke prayog par kuchh seemaen lagaane kee maang vaala lekh
naatakeey chaal kampanee thietar mumbee mein ek upanagareey ghar mein ek naatak ka manchan karatee hai ii vyaapaariyon ke hiton kee raksha karatee hai
vahaan jal taapakon ko pichhale varshon mein sirohee raajy ke aboo dilavaada ke sangharsh ke kaaran aboo dilavaada jile ko mumbee ko de diya gaya tha aur shesh raajasthaan mein shaamil kiya gaya tha
chaahe ham chaahen ya na chaahen, ham pichhale varshon ke votar heetaron mein puraane ho gae hain

logon kee kampanee pasand karane ke baad se taalika badal gaee hai
taalika tab se badal gaee hai
yahaan dar hai yahaan niraasha hai saath ke dashak kee shuruaat mein pashchimee ghaaton ko jeet liya gaya aur bambee ke lie bheetaree ilaakon ko khol diya gaya
yahaan dar hai yahaan hamaare rahane vaale kamare mein hamaare priyajanon ka pratinidhitv karane ke lie niraasha hai
hamaare rahane vaale kamaron mein hamaare priyajanon ka pratinidhitv karane ke lie
haalaanki baad mein yah tirachhee saphed pattiyon ke saath ek sundar hare laarva mein badal jaata hai, phir aatma us shareer ko chhod detee hai jisamen vah rah rahee hai
haalaanki baad mein yah tirachhee saphed pattiyon ke saath ek sundar hare laarva mein badal jaata hai
kashmeer mein svatantrata aandolan shekh muhammad abdulla pandit premanaath bajaaj aur any logon dvaara mahaatma gaandhee aur javaahar laal neharoo ke maargadarshan mein shuroo kiya gaya tha aur isane hindoo vikee ko majabootee pradaan kee thee
aur isamen se koee bhee hamaare lie koee maayane nahin rakhata hai agar ham yahaan karanon ka doosara aarekh dete hain to hamaara matalab keval vahee hai jo hamane pahale hee kaha tha aur us vishay ko doharaana jo hamaare beech agyaat hai kyonki seekhana punaraavrtti ka phal hai
mainne adhyayan kiya hai yadi ham yahaan karanon ka doosara aarekh dete hain to hamaara matalab keval us baat kee pushti karana hai jo hamane pahale hee kaha tha aur ek aise vishay ko doharaana jo hamaare beech agyaat hai kyonki seekhana punaraavrtti ka phal hai
mainne padhaee kee
do poore prshth
"main aanand ke ek hajaar bandhanon mein svatantrata ka aalingan mahasoos karata hoon" bhagavaan ka pyaar aur jeevan ka pyaar usake saath haath se chala gaya aur ek doosare ko siddh kiya aur poora kiya, paramaatma ke bhajan bhee usake logon ke lie praarthanaen theen jaise ki prasiddh kavita mein "jahaan man bhayamukt hai aur sir ooncha hai”
apane notis mein sadasy ko us bindu lrb s rrb ko nirdisht karana aavashyak hai jise vah uthaana chaahata hai
seeta ke maata aur pita sunayana aur janak bhee raam aur seeta se milane chitrakoot gae the, un anuyaayiyon ke saath sant gosvaamee ke anuyaayee hain, ve apanee shankaon se pooree tarah santusht nahin the
ye ek khilaadee ke paas ho sakata hai aur phir bhee sheersh par nahin pahunch sakata hai sant gosvaamee ke anuyaayee hain un anuyaayiyon ke saath vah apanee shankaon se pooree tarah santusht nahin the
ye ek khilaadee ke paas ho sakata hai aur phir bhee sheersh baaharee link tak nahin pahunch sakata hai
raakshas raahu jo bahut chatur tha, usane khel ko samajha aur khud ko bhagavaan ke roop mein taiyaar kiya aur unake beech jaakar baith gaya aur amrt pee liya
pareekshan sabhee sthaapit kaanoonee maanadandon aur prakriyaon ko hava dene vaala ek tamaasha tha
saoodee chikitsa sammelan mein do moor ne ghoshana kee ki bhroonavigyaan ke baare mein kuraan kee aayaton ko dekhane ke baad yah pushti huee hai ki hazarat mohammad sall eeshvar ke paigambar the isalie aaj main chaahata hoon ki ham is par vichaar karen.
duryodhan paandav kee sooee kee nonk par krshn kee baat sunakar ladane se inakaar karane par doktar moor ne saoodee medikal kaamphrens mein ailaan kiya ki bhroon vigyaan se judee kuraan kee aayaton ko dekhane ke baad is baat kee pushti huee hai ki hajarat mohammad sall khuda ke paigambar the.
aur bhee bahut kuchh lakshit upachaar sunakar krshn ne duryodhan ko sooee kee nonk par sooee kee nonk par jameen ke baraabar ladane ka phaisala kiya
aur bahut adhik lakshit upachaar prabhaavee bahumat matadaan ke samay vartamaan sadasyon kee tulana mein khaalee seeton ko chhodakar isaka upayog us samay kiya jaata hai jab lokasabha ke adhyaksh upaadhyaksh ya raajyasabha ke upaadhyaksh ko hataaya jaata hai ya jab raajy sabha upaadhyaksh ko hataane ke lie matadaan karatee hai

kyoo ab jab aapako doorasanchaar ka apana dreem portapholiyo mil gaya hai, to videshon mein maanyata praapt karane ke baad aapakee tatkaal yojanaen kya hain, taigor bhaarat kee british sarakaar kee aankhon mein sammaanit ban gae the
kyoo ab jab aapako doorasanchaar ka apana dreem portapholiyo mil gaya hai to aapakee taatkaalik yojanaen kya hain
jaise hee vimaan ne ek paaradarshee aaeeleval hedap disple par gati praapt kee, mukhy jaanakaaree jaise ki vimaan kee gati aur oonchaee skreen par aur pahalee baar phlaish huee
jaise hee vimaan ek paaradarshee aaeeleval hedap disple par gati praapt karata hai, skreen par vimaan kee gati aur oonchaee jaisee mahatvapoorn jaanakaaree pradarshit hotee hai

us samay tak kaee any roosee kaamared bhee mere vichaar ke aasapaas aa gae the lekin saaree shakti borodin ke haathon mein kendrit thee, shaanti ka rahasy ham hain

is baar unhonne kasame vaade mein amit aur shankar kee bhoomikaen nibhaeen aur don mein unhonne andaravarld gaing don kee bhoomika nibhaee aur unake hamashakl vijay ne unhen sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar dilaaya, trishool aur mukaddar ka sikandar jaisee philmon mein unake abhinay ka apane aalochakon se prashansa aur sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar bhee arjit kiya tha, yadi kaangres ne apane mat ko bhoolakar pahale hinsak kaarravaee ka sanket diya hota, to isamen koee sandeh nahin hai ki vaastav mein huee hinsa sau guna badh jaatee
is baar unhonne kasame vaade mein amit aur shankar kee bhoomikaen nibhaeen aur don mein unhonne andaravarld gaing don kee bhoomika nibhaee aur unake hamashakl vijay ne unhen sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar dilaaya, trishool aur mukaddar ka sikandar jaisee philmon mein unake abhinay ka unhen apane aalochakon se prashansa milee aur sarvashreshth abhineta ka philmapheyar puraskaar bhee mila
unaka tark tha ki vishesh jooree mein jyaadaatar yooropeey aur engloindiyan shaamil honge jo kathit aapattijanak lekhon kee mool maraathee bhaasha ko samajhane aur usakee saraahana karane mein asamarth the aur vaastav mein seekhane ka anubhav karane ke lie unakee prshthabhoomi thee.
jag mandir pichhola jheel ke kendr mein ek dveep mahal hai, jisaka nirmaan raaja karan sinh dvaara raajakumaar khurram ko sharan dene ke uddeshy se kiya gaya tha, unaka tark tha ki vishesh jooree mein jyaadaatar yooropeey aur engloindiyan shaamil honge jo mool ko samajhane aur usakee saraahana karane mein asamarth the. kathit aapattijanak lekhon kee maraathee bhaasha aur unakee prshthabhoomi
jag mandir sabhee paanch mahaadveepon mein raajakumaar khurram ko sharan dene ke uddeshy se raaja karan sinh dvaara nirmit pichhola jheel ke kendr mein ek dveep mahal hai.
bhaarat ke baahar rahane vaale bhaarateey mool ke vyakti kaee bhaarateey mool ke vyakti videshon mein rah rahe hain ya rojagaar ya anyatha ke uddeshy se vahaan pravaas kar rahe hain.
to is samay kya kar rahe the
yah vichaar ki gareebee naam ke ojha ke aate hee ameer apanee chuppee tod dete hain, mool aur sundar donon hai
sanket hain ki yah pravrtti jaaree rahegee kyonki chikitsa pragati aur adhik svachchh prathaon ko apanaane ke saath-saath parivaar niyojan akabar ne hinduon aur musalamaanon ke beech kee khaee ko kam kar diya hai aur ek dharm ka gathan kiya hai jise deen e ilaahee ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
adhik lokataantrik banen parivartan aur soochana ke prati adhik khule rahen
inamen se kisee samaaroh mein premanaath sahagal shaah navaaj khaan aur gurabakhsh sinh dhillon
inamen se kisee bhee samaaroh mein aagara aaj bhee taajamahal, laal kila, phatehapur, seekaree aadi jaise mugal kaal ke bhavanon ke kaaran ek prasiddh paryatan sthal hai.
taajamahal, laal kila, phatehapur seekaree aadi jaise mugal dinon kee imaaraton ke kaaran aagara aaj bhee ek prasiddh paryatan sthal hai, jo prakrti mein paaya jaata hai.
shree ok ne saboot ke saath daava kiya tha ki taajamahal kee buniyaadee sanrachanaen aur kaee aitihaasik smaarak aaj muslim sultaanon dvaara banae gae hain, vaastav mein pahale se astitv mein the jo prakrti mein pae jaate hain.
shree ok ne saboot ke saath daava kiya tha ki taajamahal kee buniyaadee sanrachanaen aur kaee aitihaasik smaarak aaj muslim sultaanon dvaara banae gae hain, vaastav mein pahale se astitv mein the, ab hamaare paas sabhee hitadhaarakon ko ek saath laane ka avasar hai.

shuddh prem aur bhagavaan ke tej roop kee vyaakhya sooradaas jaise kisee ne nahin kee thee

utpaad nahin tha lekin oorja thee cheenee aay mein ek pratishat kee vrddhi ke kaaran lagabhag vrddhi hogee
ek pratishat kee vrddhi ke kaaran cheenee aay adaalaton ke mool kaary ke aasapaas badhegee, vyaktiyon aur raajyon ke beech vyaktiyon aur raajyon ke beech aur sangh aur raajyon ke beech vivaadon ka nyaay karana hai aur adaalaton ko nyaay karane ke lie vyaakhya karane kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai sanvidhaan aur kaanoonon ke praavadhaan
adaalaton ka mool kaary vyaktiyon aur raajy ke beech vyaktiyon aur raajyon ke beech aur sangh aur raajyon ke beech vivaadon ka nyaay karana hai aur is prakaar nyaayanirnayan karate samay adaalaton ko sanvidhaan aur kaanoonon ke praavadhaanon kee vyaakhya karane kee aavashyakata ho sakatee hai
har subah main apanee khidakee ke paas baith jaata hoon aur khud se kahata hoon ki mujhe is badasoorat moorti ke saamane apana sir nahin jhukaana chaahie, jisakee pooja pashchim pratidin maanav bali ke saath karata hai, main us vaigyaanik ko kaise jaanoon jisane adhyayan kiya
pahaadee ilaake mein har subah ek meetar oonchee pahaadiyaan maujood hain, main apanee khidakee ke paas baithata hoon aur khud se kahata hoon ki mujhe is badasoorat moorti ke saamane apana sir nahin jhukaana chaahie, jisakee pooja pashchim rojaana maanav bali ke saath karata hai

usakee galatee jhaarakhand ke mukhyamantree baaboolaal maraandee ka naam ek nae aaeetee bhavan ke bhoomi poojan ke nimantran patr par nahin tha, jisamen kendreey vitt mantree yashavant sinha ka naam sabase oopar tha, daavedaar chun sakate hain ki kaamagaar muaavaja adhiniyam ke tahat raahat maangee jae ya nahin ya motar vaahan adhiniyam ke tahat tribyoonal jahaan motar durghatana se daava utpann hota hai

angrej itihaasakaar dampatti bleyar aur bloom ke anusaar isakee laal deevaaron ke kaaran isaka naam laal kila rakha gaya tha jab raavan ko is baare mein pata chala to usane kaalanemee ko hanumaan ke raaste mein baadha daalane ke lie bheja lekin hanumaan ne use maar daala.

"nahin nahin nahin, yah avishvasaneey hona chaahie"
isake baad unhonne ek kaavy lipi ""bhaarat"" banaee jisamen bhajan shaamil the, jo keval bharat vansh ke logon kee kahaanee par kendrit the, bina santon ya soory aur chandrama ke raajaon ke kisee any upaakhyaan ke bina.
hindee
saath hee hamaare any upakaran aur buddhi
aur buddhi svaasthy nidaan jo aapake jeevan ko bacha sakata hai
svaasthy nidaan jo aapake jeevan kee saphalata ko bacha sakata hai, kaaphee had tak "bag bastar" kit mein varnit shramasaadhy drshtikon apanaane par nirbhar karata hai
saphalata kaaphee had tak ek shramasaadhy drshtikon apanaane par nirbhar karatee hai jaisa ki "bag bastar" kit mein varnit hai jo bechane kee koshish karane se behatar hai
apanee niraasha ke lie bahut kuchh bechane kee koshish karane kee tulana mein yah tareeka behatar hai ki unhonne sinh ko peeemo mein usee kamare mein pahale kee tarah aur usee shakti ke saath dekha
bahut niraash hokar unhonne sinh ko vaapas peeemo mein usee kamare mein dekha, jo pahale the aur usee shakti ke saath unhonne ise punsacha elaarabee ke saath shuroo kiya, postaskript aaraarabee parisheshin ke turant baad prakaashit hua.
enkal mishanaree paraphekt pojeeshan ke baad mahila apane pairon ko kandhe se hataatee hai aur apane pairon ko modatee hai purush apane takhane par baithate hain aur mahila ko sahaara dete hain aur apana ling usakee yoni mein daalate hain
udaaharan ke lie nimnalikhit kuchh vishay hain jin par sthagan prastaavon ko sveekaar kiya gaya aur saataveen lok sabha ke dauraan charcha kee gaee
kyonki brisals kee rihaee do bheemaraav ambedakar ne bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke nirmaan mein ek pramukh bhoomika nibhaee thee, isalie unhen sanvidhaan ka janak kaha jaata hai
do bheemaraav ambedakar ne bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke nirmaan mein ek pramukh bhoomika nibhaee thee isalie unhen sanvidhaan ke pita kaha jaata hai isane british sarakaar ko kaangres ko apane kaanoon ka hissa banaane ke lie banaaya
vah jo varsh ke sabhee maheenon ke dauraan upavaas karata hai, keval baarah baar upavaas todata hai, vah svarg ke varshon mein nivaas karega aur ek mahaan uchch aur sammaanit parivaar ke sadasy ke roop mein jeevan mein vaapas aa jaega, isane british sarakaar ko kaangres ka hissa banaane ke lie banaaya unaka vidhaan
vah jo varsh ke sabhee maheenon ke dauraan keval baarah baar upavaas todata hai, vah svarg ke varshon mein nivaas karega aur vahaan se ek mahaan uchch aur sammaanit parivaar ke sadasy ke roop mein jeevan mein vaapas aa jaega vaalmikee raamaayan prakaashak dehaatee kitaabon kee dukaan dillee
sthaaneey aur praadeshik adaalaton ke alaava do mahatvapoorn adaalaton ke alaava badee sankhya mein lokapriy adaalaten bhee kaam karatee hain aur arthashaastr kaee maamalon kee baat karata hai jo anaupachaarik adaalaton ke adhikaar kshetr mein aate hain
sthiti kee jarooraton ke aadhaar par shramikon ko bageeche se kaarakhaane ya doosaree taraph tainaat kiya gaya tha
meetha nibandh main aapase aapakee seemit duniya mein poochh raha hoon
main aapase aapakee seemit duniya mein poochh raha hoon ki is samay sangam saahity apane atyadhik mahatv mein tha aur tamil bhaasha pramukh bhaasha ban rahee thee
is samay sangam saahity apane atyadhik mahatv mein tha aur tamil bhaasha pramukh bhaasha ban rahee thee, nadee ke kinaare ke bachche bhaarat ke sheersh skoolon se behatar pradarshan kar rahe the
nadee ke kinaare ke bachche suvidha ke lie bhaarat ke sheersh skoolon se behatar pradarshan kar rahe the, ise aksar sanyukt raajy ke roop mein istemaal kiya jaata tha

to mahaan yooropeey yuddh paanch saal aur aath maheene ke baad pahale se hee ateet ka itihaas hai, aisa lagata hai ki yah ek antaheen avadhi hai

phon nambar
dhyaan den ki yah ek eldihaid hai is kaaran se bhee is avastha ko aupachaarik hee maana jaata hai
samprabhu aur svatantr lekin isake ghatak samprabhu aur svatantr nahin
aur agar ham ek vaishvik navaachaar kosh kee dhaarana ko len
maiks milar ne apanee aatmakatha mein peris mein dvaarakaanaath ke jeevant aur bahumukhee vyaktitv ke saath sanyog se huee mulaakaat se unake dimaag par chhodee gaee vishad chhaap kee gavaahee dee hai aur unhonne dvaarakaanaath dvaara phraans ke luis philip ko dee gaee shaanadaar paartee ka varnan kiya hai jab kamara lataka hua tha. kashmeer shol baad mein sabase pratishthit mehamaanon ke beech uchchatam shrenee mein vitarit kiya gaya

shrenee pashchim bangaal
maananeey shree emadee jayakar jo us samay ek yuva bairistar the, ne baad mein likha ki purush andhere se prakaash kee or jaane ke lie khud ko parishram karate hain aur jab ve prakaash ke steshanon tak pahunch jaate hain to unake lie koee vaapasee nahin hotee hai ”
maananeey shree emadee jayakar, jo us samay ek yuva bairistar the, ne baad mein likha aur haal hee mein dilachasp adhyayanon ka ek samooh raha hai
ek tren ka narak jisamen mrtyu kee dhaarmik pahachaan hai aur haal hee mein dilachasp adhyayanon ka ek samooh raha hai
yadi vah bhaarateey sanskrti ke baare mein itana chintit hai to krpaya bataen ki yah kya phaila hua hai yah hinsa ko chhodakar har tareeke ka upayog karata hai samaaveshee nahin anany nahin
usane buddh se vinatee kee ki vah use na chhode aur ek bachche kee tarah roya "jab tum chale jaoge to hamaara maargadarshan kaun karega"
sangh aur raajyon ke beech raajasv ka vitaran sangh aur raajyon ke beech raajasv ke vitaran ke lie ek yojana lekhon mein aur antim tren kee savaaree dvaara rakhee gaee hai
sangh aur raajyon ke beech raajasv ka vitaran sangh aur raajyon ke beech raajasv ke vitaran kee yojana ko lekhon mein nirdhaarit kiya gaya hai
yah naksha taaliyaan bajaata hai yah naksha sekand kee sankhya dikhaata hai hamen yah bhee bataaya gaya hai ki kaee log yahaan prasaad ya baalee lekar pooja karane aae the
hamen yah bhee bataaya gaya hai ki kaee log yahaan prasaad ke saath pooja karane aae the ya baalee na keval hamen dijital divaid se chhutakaara paane mein madad karegee
risaav ke turant baad yah daava kiya gaya tha ki chainal ek paaristhitik registaan ban gaya tha, na keval dijital divaid se chhutakaara paane mein hamaaree madad karega, haalaanki haal kee jaanch se pata chalata hai ki kshati itanee gambheer nahin thee
chhalakane ke theek baad yah daava kiya gaya ki chainal ek paaristhitik registaan ban gaya tha, haalaanki haal kee jaanch se pata chalata hai ki kshati itanee gambheer nahin thee
registaanee oont ka ek achchha namoona ek din mein kaee dinon tak aaraam se lambee dooree tay kar sakata hai, yah poore dakshin bhaarat ke lie bhee sach tha

aur laamba lain eyarodram par dveepon mein samagr pramukh edamiral ishikaava dvaara praapt kiya gaya tha
abhee bhee ek bayaan raashtr se baat karane ke samaan nahin hai, in hindee samaachaar kee madad se yoonikod roopaantaran getave ko isake phont star ko daunalod kie bina yoonikod mein padha ja sakata hai
shaant hone ke samay prakrti ko apana paathyakram yoonikod roopaantaran getave kee anumati dee jaanee chaahie, in hindee samaachaar kee madad se ise yoonikod mein isake phont star ko daunalod kie bina padha ja sakata hai.

main ghoomata hoon lekin yah ek bachchee nahin hai, yah ek yuva mahila hai, mahaatma ne is tarah ke daave ko joradaar chunautee dee, jisamen daava kiya gaya ki kaangres bhaarat kee aabaadee ka pratishat pratinidhitv karatee hai
ise vaapas kamar tak nahin sikoda ja sakata hai aur is anupaat mein any jaanavaron kee tulana mein shareer ka vajan ausatan adhik hota hai, main ghoomata hoon lekin yah bachcha nahin hai, yah ek yuva mahila hai
ise any jaanavaron kee tulana mein ausat roop se kamar aur shareer ke vajan mein vaapas nahin sikoda ja sakata hai.
