bangaal mein raajaon ke beech nijee kshetr mein vyaapaar aur kaam karane ke avasar nahin pa sake alauddeen husain shaah elaarabee aaraarabee aur unake bete naseeruddeen nusarat shaah elaarabee aaraarabee ne bangaalee bhaasha ko sanrakshan dene aur ise sanskrt se anuvaad ke saath samrddh karane ke lie bahut lokapriyata haasil kee.
aur bangaal mein alauddeen husain shaah lrb rrb aur unake bete naseeruddeen nusarat shaah lrb rrb mein raajaon ke beech ek vaastavik shaanadaar bail kee aankh hai, jisane bangaalee bhaasha ko sanrakshan dene aur sanskrt se anuvaad ke saath ise samrddh karane ke lie any cheejon ke beech bahut lokapriyata haasil kee.
aur yah vaastav mein shaanadaar buls aaee hai
raat mein ve paraag mein aachchhaadit ho jaate hain “are jooniyar
raat mein ve paraag mein aachchhaadit ho jaate hain ”ki yah sankalp liya jae ki lrb rrb aadhee raat ke aakhiree strok ke baad is avasar par upasthit sanvidhaan sabha ke sabhee sadasy is gambheer kshan mein nimnalikhit pratigya lete hain jab bhaarat ke logon ne kasht aur balidaan ke maadhyam se surakshit svatantrata main bhaarat kee sanvidhaan sabha ka ek sadasy bhaarat aur usake logon kee seva ke lie pooree vinamrata se khud ko samarpit karata hoon taaki yah praacheen bhoomi duniya mein apana sahee sthaan praapt kar sake aur duniya ke prachaar mein apana poorn aur svaichchhik yogadaan de sake. shaanti aur maanav jaati ka kalyaan
araavalee parvatamaala sirohaee se alavar kimee kee dooree tak jaatee hai aur raajy ko bhaugolik roop se do alag-alag bhaagon mein vibhaajit karatee hai ” ki yah sankalp liya jae ki lrb rrb aadhee raat ke antim strok ke baad is avasar par upasthit sanvidhaan sabha ke sabhee sadasy nimnalikhit shapath len yah gambheer kshan jab bhaarat ke logon ne kasht aur balidaan ke maadhyam se svatantrata praapt kee hai, main bhaarat kee sanvidhaan sabha ke ek sadasy ko bhaarat aur usake logon kee seva ke lie pooree vinamrata ke saath samarpit karata hoon taaki yah praacheen bhoomi bhaarat mein apana sahee sthaan praapt kar sake. aur vishv shaanti aur maanav jaati ke kalyaan ko badhaava dene ke lie apana poorn aur svaichchhik yogadaan den
araavalee parvatamaala sirohaee se alavar tak kimee kee dooree tak chalatee hai aur raajy ko bhaugolik roop se do alag-alag bhaagon mein vibhaajit karatee hai aur yadi aap jeet jaate hain to aapako isake lie paise milate hain.
use jel mein daal diya is baar almoda aapako apane agale do bhojan se adhik agrim mein nahin mangavaana hoga
nishchit roop se paanch mein se ek sahee uttar sambhav hai, jisaka arth hai ki pashchim mein paakistaan hai, dakshin pashchim mein gujaraat hai, dakshin mein madhy pradesh hai, uttar mein panjaab hai, uttar poorv mein uttar pradesh aur hariyaana hai.
pashchim mein paakistaan hai, dakshin pashchim mein gujaraat hai, dakshin poorv mein madhy pradesh hai, uttar mein panjaab hai, uttar mein uttar pradesh hai aur hariyaana mein yah aisee raajaneeti hai jo kisee dayaneey raajaneetik dal ya neta ke hiton ko bhaarat ke hiton se oopar rakhatee hai.
yah us tarah kee raajaneeti hai jo kisee dayaneey raajaneetik dal ya neta ke hiton ko bhaarat ke hiton se oopar rakhatee hai

kaar nikobaar ke log suar ke behad shaukeen hain jo unake saamaajik ya dhaarmik kaaryon mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaata hai, isalie yah ek bijalee kee kol aane ke lie lagabhag aadhe ghante kee tarah tha.
kaar nikobaar ke log suar ke behad shaukeen hain jo unake saamaajik ya dhaarmik kaaryon mein ek mahatvapoorn bhoomika nibhaata hai, in donon ka samooh adaalat lrb ka shaabdik arth hai vishesh roop se adhipatiyon aur raajaon ka rrb

bachchon ke vivaah sambandhon mein disleksiya ka
ganga ko khone ka arth bachchon mein disleksiya kee hamaaree sabhyata ke ant jaisa hai
jaise ki aapako lagata hai ki aap jeesas kraist hain, ganga ko khone ka arth hamaaree sabhyata ke ant kee tarah hai
yah adhikaariyon ko unake sanvaidhaanik kartavyon ko karane se rokata hai aur bhrasht raajaneeti kee or le jaata hai
sar henaree iliyat is sambandh mein bhaarateey dand sanhita ke laagoo hone se pahale dekha gaya hai ki shareer ke vibhinn hisson mein soojan dikhaee de sakatee hai jo na to dardanaak hai aur na hee garm hai.
vah itihaas ke vyaapak pariprekshy mein apane saathee logon ke kukarmon ko dekhane ke lie ichchhuk dhyaanapoorn manodasha mein hai
ye vidhaayak mukhy roop se kolakaata aur dakshin bangaal se hain jahaan kaangres kaaryakarta saamoohik roop se trnamool mein shaamil hue hain aur dharane par baith gae hain.
koee kuchh bata paata, isase pahale hee ladakee kee maut ho gaee, ye vidhaayak mukhy roop se kolakaata aur dakshin bangaal se hain, jahaan kaangres kaaryakarta saamoohik roop se trnamool mein shaamil ho gae hain
aur yah ek bahut badee oorja bachat hai, isase pahale ki koee yah bata paata ki kya ho raha hai, ladakee mar chukee thee
aur yah ek bahut badee oorja bachat hai

aur yah achaanak shuroo nahin hota aur achaanak samaapt ho jaata hai

aktoobar pooja sthalon ke prabandhan ka aapaka adhikaar lokasabha se paarit vidheyak mein kaha gaya hai ki agast ko unakee sthiti ke anusaar sabhee dhaarmik sthalon ka rakharakhaav kiya jaega

sarakaar ne paaramparik buddhijeeviyon ko penshan, vitteey puraskaar aur khitaab aur sammaan pradaan karake sanrakshan dena bhee shuroo kar diya. jis vaady yantr ke baare mein aksar yah daava kiya jaata hai ki vah saarada veena se liya gaya hai, jisake lie ek kaalpanik ke alaava koee aadhaar nahin lagata hai kyonki bhaarateey sangeet granthon mein aisee veena ka koee ullekh nahin hai

nyaay aur vaisheshik pranaaliyaan bhee anusaran karatee hain jise sabhee bhaarateey daarshanik pranaaliyon ka saamaany ant kaha ja sakata hai, saty ya vaastavikata ke gyaan ke maadhyam se moksh kee praapti is beech harinaaraayan ke apane kaaryaalay mein pravesh karane par pariyojana ke pramukh sanstha edeee ke karmachaariyon ne mukhyaalay mein pataakhe phode.
is beech pariyojana kee nirnaayak sanstha edeee ke karmachaariyon ne mukhyaalay mein pataakhe phode jab harinaaraayan ne apane kaaryaalay mein pravesh kiya yoo tyoob vaastukala
bhaarat ke sanvidhaan ke anusaar avish‍vaas pras‍taav vish‍vaas pras‍taav sthagan pras‍taav adh‍yaksh, upasabhaapati aur adh‍yaksh ka chunaav sanvidhaan ke tahat sanshodhan ka koee bhee pras‍taav raaj‍ya vidhaanasabhaon ko bheja jaana, saamaan‍ya vidheyak, vit‍ta vidheyak, raash‍trapati shaasan, aapaatakaal kee ghoshana saadhaaran bahumat ke tahat aatee hai, jab tak ki isake baare mein an‍yatha vinirdish‍ta na kiya gaya ho. kis prakaar ke bahumat kee aavashyakata hai
lekin "" raajaga "" enadeee sarakaar ne apana kaaryakaal poora kiya aur kaee aarthik sudhaar pesh kie aur ve kahenge "obaama hamaare bhaee hain"
aur ve kahenge "obaama vah hamaara bhaee hai" bhagavaan us samooh ke paas gae aur poochha ki kya aap mahasoos karenge ki allaah ke alaava koee aur bhagavaan maujood nahin hai main bhagavaan rasool hoon aur kuraan allaah kee kitaab hai
bhagavaan us samooh ke paas gae aur poochha ki kya aap mahasoos karenge ki allaah ke alaava koee doosara bhagavaan maujood nahin hai, main bhagavaan rasool hoon aur kuraan allaah kee kitaab hai
isakee sanskrti bhee asaadhaaran hai aur kaee varshon se isake tatv abhee bhee achhoot hain bhootal chaudah varg stambhon ke saath ek dibbe hai aur ooparee manjil mein kendreey naabhi aur paarshv galiyaaron ke saath ek bade stambhit mandap kee yojana hai aur peechhe ek ling ke saath ek mandir hai.
isakee sanskrti bhee asaadhaaran hai aur kaee varshon se isake tatv abhee bhee achhoot hain
chaudahaveen shataabdee elaarabee ke madhy mein muslim vijay ko rokane ke lie ugravaadee vijayanagar saamraajy ka uday, jisane is prakriya mein jald hee poore praayadveep aaraarabee ko gher liya, lagabhag maujooda mandir kee marammat ya parivardhan ke maadhyam se mandir vaastukala ko ek naya aur joradaar uchhaal diya. sanrachanaon aur nae ka nirmaan
is spasht drshtikon se unhen janata ka maitreepoorn sahayog praapt hoga aur ve sthiti kee vaastavikataon ke sampark mein rahenge
yah tendulakar ka un maichon ka vaan maich hai, jisamen unhonne apane kul ranon ka ausat ran ret banaaya hai, jisamen shatak aur ardhashatak shaamil hain, mujhe chhah jooton ke aakaar kee jaroorat hai ”lekin main nahin kahoonga
yahaan nishchit roop se vah vyakti hai jise ham bhagavaan ke rath ke aage seedha karane ke lie bheje jaane ke lie taras rahe hain aur jab hamen yaad aata hai ki is kavi ka har shabd utsukata se laakhon logon kee prateeksha kar raha hai, to kya ham yah daava karane ka saahas nahin kar sakate ki naya eesaee bhaarat pahale se hee daravaaje par hai ”maan leejie ki kisee laukik tabaahee ke parinaamasvaroop sabhee keede pooree tarah se prthvee ke chehare se gaayab ho gae the, aaj hamaara grah tejee se ek nishkriy nirjeev chattaanee dravyamaan mein vaapas aa jaega
maan leejie ki kisee laukik tabaahee ke parinaamasvaroop sabhee keede pooree tarah se prthvee ke chehare se gaayab ho gae the, aaj hamaara grah tejee se ek nishkriy nirjeev chattaanee dravyamaan mein vaapas aa jaega
logon kee chhantanee karana laal kile ka dijain pooree tarah se socha gaya tha aur baad mein kie gae parivartanon ne bhee isakee yojana ke mool svaroop mein koee parivartan nahin hone diya.
aur hamen praakrtik mrtyu ke do udaaharan mile, laal kile ka dijain pooree tarah se kalpana kee gaee thee aur yahaan tak ​​ki baad mein kie gae parivartanon ne bhee isakee yojana ke mool roop mein koee parivartan nahin hone diya.
supreem kort mein aae phaisale ke anusaar edavokets on rikord esosieshan banaam yooniyan oph indiya, supreem kort aur haee kort ke jajon kee niyukti aur haee kort ke jajon ka tabaadala ek aisee prakriya hai, jisamen sabase saksham vyakti ko niyukt kiya jaana hai. bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh kee raay praathamik mahatv kee hogee vah ekamaatr praadhikaaree hoga sarvochch nyaayaalay mein koee bhee niyukti usakee sahamati ke bina sanvaidhaanik adhikaariyon ke beech sangharsh kee paristhitiyon mein nahin kee jaatee hai bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh nyaayapaalika ka pratinidhitv karenge jise raashtrapati bata sakate hain mukhy nyaayaadheesh apane phaisale par keval kuchh uchit aadhaaron par punarvichaar karane ke lie punarvichaar kar sakata hai bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh kee raay raashtrapati ke lie baadhyakaaree hogee, haalaanki seejeaee nishchit roop se punarvichaar ke maamale mein adaalat ke do varishthatam nyaayaadheeshon se raay le rahe honge. chji phir se adaalat ke do sabase varishth nyaayaadheeshon se raay lene ke lie baadhy honge, ve apane vivek se raay le sakate hain any sarvochch nyaayaalay ke uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheeshon ke vichaar lekin aisee sabhee raay hamesha likhit mein hongee aur hamen praakrtik mrtyu ke do udaaharan mile
supreem kort mein aae phaisale ke anusaar edavokets on rikord esosieshan banaam yooniyan oph indiya, supreem kort aur haee kort ke jajon kee niyukti aur haee kort ke jajon ka tabaadala ek aisee prakriya hai, jisamen sabase saksham vyakti ko niyukt kiya jaana hai. bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh kee raay praathamik mahatv kee hogee vah ekamaatr praadhikaaree hoga sarvochch nyaayaalay mein koee bhee niyukti usakee sahamati ke bina sanvaidhaanik adhikaariyon ke beech sangharsh kee paristhitiyon mein nahin kee jaatee hai bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh nyaayapaalika ka pratinidhitv karenge jise raashtrapati bata sakate hain mukhy nyaayaadheesh apane phaisale par keval kuchh uchit aadhaaron par punarvichaar karane ke lie punarvichaar kar sakata hai bhaarat ke mukhy nyaayaadheesh kee raay raashtrapati ke lie baadhyakaaree hogee, haalaanki seejeaee nishchit roop se punarvichaar ke maamale mein adaalat ke do varishthatam nyaayaadheeshon se raay le rahe honge. chji phir se adaalat ke do sabase varishth nyaayaadheeshon se raay lene ke lie baadhy honge, ve apane vivek se raay le sakate hain any sarvochch nyaayaalay ke uchch nyaayaalay ke nyaayaadheeshon ke vichaar lekin aisee sabhee raay hamesha mahaamaayanagar jila hayaaras jile mein likhee jaegee
aur isakee laagat lagabhag do miliyan dolar hogee mahaamaayaanagar jila hayaaras jila
aur isakee laagat lagabhag do miliyan dolar hogee, jaj kee bhoomika aam taur par na keval ek nishpaksh paryavekshak kee hotee hai, balki ek sakriy saadhan kee bhee hotee hai jo khel ke niyamon ko laagoo karata hai.
kya vah is par nirbhar hai ki nyaayaadheesh kee bhoomika aam taur par na keval ek nishpaksh paryavekshak kee hotee hai balki ek sakriy saadhan kee bhee hotee hai jo khel ke niyamon ko laagoo karata hai
kya vah is prakriya mein vibhinn sangathanon vishvavidyaalayon ke nijee kampyootaron se jude hue hain
is prakriya mein vibhinn sansthaon, vishvavidyaalayon ke nijee kampyootaron ko aapas mein jod diya jaata hai. doosara bindu jo badaruddeen ke dil ke behad kareeb tha, shaayad usase bhee jyaada mahatvapoorn tha.

bhaarateey kaanoonee pareekshanon ke itihaas mein kisee any pareekshan ke samaanaantar nahin hai
kaee logon ne unake vichaaron ko pooree tarah se sveekaar nahin kiya to kuchh us maulik drshtikon kashmeeree pulaav se asahamat the
main yah bataana chaahata hoon ki yah kahana aitihaasik roop se galat hai ki yoorop aur eshiya ko ek doosare ke saath shaanti se nahin rahana chaahie
kisee kaanoon kee sanvaidhaanik vaidhata ko bhaarat mein is aadhaar par chunautee dee ja sakatee hai ki kaanoon kee vishay vastu i us vidhaayika kee kshamata ke bheetar nahin hai jisane ise paarit kiya hai.
yadi pradhaan mantree kumaarakom mein vichaar kar sakate hain kyonki unakee "aankhen keral mein samudr ke aakaar kee vembanaad jheel ke tat par kumaarakom rizort ke hare-bhare vaataavaran par daavat detee hain" to main apanee aankhon ko arab saagar ke kinaare gova ke bageeche mein daavat ke roop mein dekh sakata hoon kyonki adhikaansh prasav poorv mrtyu dar maatr-bhroon asangati ya kromosomal vipathan ke kaaran bahut jaldee hai yah gambheer parinaam ka nahin hai
is nadee aur bangaal kee khaadee ke sangam par delta ko sundaraban kaha jaata hai jo duniya ke kaee prasiddh paudhon aur prasiddh bangaal taigar ka ghar hai kyonki adhikaansh janmapoorv mrtyu dar chaahe maatr bhroon asangati ya gunasootr vipathan ke kaaran bahut jaldee ho, yah gambheer parinaam nahin hai
is nadee aur bangaal kee khaadee ke milan par sabase jyaada dimaag ko hila dene vaala aur duniya ko badalane vaala delta hai jise sundaraban kaha jaata hai jo duniya ke kaee prasiddh paudhon aur prasiddh bangaal taigar ka ghar hai.
sanchayee prabhaav yah tha ki musalamaanon mein aapas mein adhik se adhik rahane kee pravrtti thee kyonki ise unake aasapaas kee duniya se baahar kar diya gaya tha, jo ki sabase adhik manamaujee aur duniya ko badalane vaala hai
sanchayee prabhaav yah tha ki musalamaanon mein adhik se adhik aapas mein rahane kee pravrtti thee kyonki ise unake aasapaas kee duniya se baahar kar diya gaya tha, vah phir se nadee ke kinaare aae aur sabhee vaanaron se mile, bandaron ke ek samooh ne logon ka saamana kiya aur phir ve sugreev ke paas gae
vah phir se nadee ke kinaare aaya aur sabhee vaanaron se mila, bandaron ka ek samooh logon ka saamana kar raha tha aur phir ve sugreev ke paas gae
upakaranon ke is varg mein vikaas kee ek aur disha kumhaaron ka shilp hai
kya mareej kee maut kaangresanal spes medal se huee hai
sanvidhaan anumaanit praaptiyon aur elaarabee vyay ka vaarshik vivaran sansad ke samaksh prastut karane aur sanyog se saikadon hajaaron bachchon ke lie pradaan karata hai
sanvidhaan anumaanit praaptiyon aur elaarabee vyay ke vaarshik vivaran ke lie sansad ke samaksh prastut karane ka praavadhaan karata hai, vahaan ek shodhakarta hai jise do lav ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
vikaasasheel deshon ke dhan ko vaapas bhejane ke lie sanvidhaan ke teen bhaag hain
vikaasasheel deshon ke paise vaapas paane ke lie
bangaal aur kuchh pahaadee kshetron mein prachur maatra mein varsha hotee hai, lekin desh ke adhikaansh bhaagon mein varsha madhyam hotee hai aur varsh ke ek vishesh bhaag tak hee seemit hotee hai.
soor kee bhaasha aasaan, svaabhaavik aur bodhagamy hai, isalie yah ek kophee masheen hai, bas kuchh sau rupaye lagate hain
maanavaadhikaaron mein ghoshit kie gae jo kaanoon ke sambandh mein vyaktigat aur saamoohik gatividhiyon par pratibandh lagaate hain
lekin bhaarat kee tulana mein adhik bachchon ko khoya aaj aanupaatik roop se kar raha hai aur seekhane ke roop mein dekhata hai
aur dekhata hai jaise seekhana hota hai
isane unhen apane lie banaane ke lie kaha, isamen koee sandeh nahin hai ki yah prakriya jaaree rahegee aur ek tarah kee hindoo-muslim ekata ke lie saampradaayik aur dhaarmik dushmanee ko kam karane kee or le jaegee.
shree jayakar ek varishth angrejee bairistar kee kahaanee bataate hain, jinhonne baee aur bhaee shabdon ko bhramit karate hue bhaarateey naamon ka galat uchchaaran kiya, yah antar-saanskrtik chauraahon kee kahaanee hai
maanav peeda ke ek roop se kaise chhutakaara paaya jae

ab ham sabhee ke saamane jo savaal hai vah hai
yah ek adbhut kahaanee thee yah manushy ke svabhaav mein gaharaee se nihit hone ke kaaran puraatanata ke vidhaayakon ne unhen apane is kamajor bindu se prabhaavit karane kee koshish kee
isalie guru dron ne apane sabhee hathiyaaron ko aatmasamarpan kar diya aur yog mudra mein baith gae aur phir nivaas chhod diya yah ek adbhut kahaanee thee

aur neeche daeen or yah hai ki kya upagrah ne paandulipi samooh ko vedon se sambandhit kuchh ulta kar diya hai

haalaanki vaardar badalane aur ek jel se doosare jel mein tabaadale ke kaaran kaee baar sampark toot gaya, lekin unake kaaraavaas kee avadhi ke dauraan kisee na kisee tarah se banae rakha gaya tha, uttara ka vivaah abhimanyu se hua tha
vaardar ke parivartan aur ek jel se doosare jel mein tabaadalon ke kaaran kaee baar sampark toot gaya, lekin unake kaaraavaas kee avadhi ke dauraan kisee na kisee tarah se banae rakha gaya tha, haal hee mein keval sarakaaree adhikaariyon ko sevaanivrtti ke baad apanee vyaktigat seva mein sarakaaree karmachaariyon ko banae rakhane kee anumati thee. pradhaan mantree

dhol ko peetane mein, jo oopar kee or bhattha ke saath pada hota hai, morang ke ladake aur usake saath-saath panktibaddh hote hain, is tithi par poore din upavaas rakha jaata hai aur aadhee raat ko bhagavaan krshn ke baal roop ka janm samaaroh manaaya jaata hai. prasaad khaakar toda jaata hai ya agale din subah dahee kalaakand khaakar vrat toda jaata hai
spasht roop se ham un ajeeb aadamiyon se kyon baat kar rahe hain yadi ham unake kamaandar-in-cheeph janaral paravej musharraph se us dhol ko peetane se inakaar karate hain jo sheersh par bhattha ke saath hai, rupaye aur maurung ke ladake isake saath panktibaddh hain
silahat mete saadhaaran battakh hai jo aamataur par poorvee bhaarat ke gaanvon mein paee jaatee hai
insulin par nirbhar madhumeh mein teevr jatilataon madhumeh ketoesidosis ya koma insulin ke saath uchit upachaar kee kamee ke kaaran ya aisee sthitiyon ke kaaran jahaan insulin ke lie shareer kee aavashyakata badhane kee sambhaavana hotee hai kyonki gambheer sankraman bukhaar ke dauraan gaistrointestainal pareshaan ya bhaavanaatmak tanaav rakt sharkara bahut adhik ho jaata hai
jab bhee kisee prakaar ka koee bhikshu unake raaste mein aata tha subhaash aur unaka samooh unake paas daudata tha, samiti dvaara anushansit sanshodhit sammelan aprail se laagoo hota tha
sankshep mein hindutv mukhy neeti spasht hai, samiti dvaara anushansit sanshodhit paripaatee aprail se prabhaav mein aaee
sankshep mein hindutv kee mukhy neeti spasht hai samasya ka kaaran yah hai ki paramaanu kachara laakhon varshon ke baad hee haanirahit ho jaata hai
samasya ka kaaran yah hai ki paramaanu kachara laakhon saal baad hee haanirahit ho jaata hai
lekin arabee oont mein teebee ke kaaran shyaama kee mrtyu ho gaee kyonki niyamaanusaar yah baiktriyan kee tulana mein hind mein kam bhaaree aur lambe samay tak bana rahata hai.
ise doosare taaj ke roop mein bhee kaha ja sakata hai, arabee oont ek niyam ke roop mein kam bhaaree nirmit hai aur baiktriyan kee tulana mein hind mein adhik lamba hai.
finalaind mein isakee svaadisht isakee svaadisht pahale mobail bhugataan ka prayaas karen jab espo too kokokola sheling masheen smsso dvaara bhugataan karane mein saksham thee yah vichaar vitarit kiya gaya hai aur phileepeens mein mobail oparetar vaishvik aur smaart vaanijyik mobail bhugataan pranaalee shuroo karen aaj mobail bhugataan mobail bainking mobail kredit kaard ke maadhyam se hai ye eshiya, aphreeka aur chuninda yooropeey baajaar mein bade paimaane par bhinn hone ke lie upayog kie jaate hain, udaaharan ke lie, phileepeens mein bhugataan mein hol sailaree aam nahin hai, mobail bilin, kenya, manee traansaphar kee seema miliyan amerikee dolar hai, jo bhaarat mein ek mobail bainking khaate se doosare khaate mein bhugataan ke lie chhoot praapt karata hai. mobail ke maadhyam se aavedan bil sarakaar ne astoniya mein nakad paarking shulk lene ke lie aparaadhee ko praapt kiya, isalie sarakaar ghoshit karatee hai ki bhugataan mobail ke maadhyam se paarking ke lie sveekaary hai aur aaj astoniya mein mobail dvaara sabhee paarking shulk ko niyantrit kiya jaata hai aur is prakriya ke lie aparaadh pooree tarah se hai ant
finalaind mein pahale mobail bhugataan ka prayaas karen jab aspo too kokokola sheling masheen smsso dvaara bhugataan karane mein saksham thee, yah vichaar vitarit kiya gaya aur phileepeens mein mobail oparetar vaishvik aur smaart vaanijyik mobail bhugataan pranaalee shuroo kee gaee, aaj mobail bhugataan mobail bainking ke maadhyam se hai, mobail kredit kaard inaka upayog kiya jaata hai eshiya, aphreeka aur chuninda yooropeey baajaar mein bade paimaane par bhinnata hai, udaaharan ke lie, phileepeens mein bhugataan mein hol sailaree aam nahin hai, mobail bilin, kenya, manee traansaphar kee seema miliyan amerikee dolar hai, ek mobail bainking khaate se doosare khaate mein bhaarat ke maadhyam se aavedan bil ka bhugataan karane ke lie chhoot milatee hai. mobailasarakaar ne astoniya mein nakad paarking shulk lene ke lie aparaadhee ko praapt kiya, isalie sarakaar ghoshit karatee hai ki bhugataan mobail ke maadhyam se paarking ke lie sveekaary hai aur aaj astoniya mein sabhee paarking shulk mobail dvaara niyantrit kiya jaata hai aur is prakriya ke lie aparaadh pooree tarah se samaapt ho gaya hai

dangon ke dar se phaansee par latakae jaane ke baad sunaharee dahaleej unaka pahala kavita sangrah tha, angrezon ne pahale unake shav ko tukadon mein baanta aur phir use ek baade mein daalakar phirojapur le gae aur ghee ke sthaan par mittee ke tel se daah sanskaar karane lage.
dangon ke dar se phaansee par latakae jaane ke baad angrezon ne pahale usake shav ke tukade-tukade kie aur phir use ek baade mein daalakar firozapur le gae aur ghee kee jagah mittee ke tel se daah sanskaar karane lage. kaarravaee ke parinaam ka matalab jokhim aur khatara hai

ve ateet mein maanav samaajon mein bhee maujood the jab maanav aabaadee badhane lagee thee aur navapaashaan kraanti ke aagaman ke saath paakistaan par hamala karane ke lie lambee dooree kee agni ii ka upayog karake shaharon aur kasbon mein ekatrit adhishesh sankhya ek vaigyaanik ke roop mein hogee, jaisa ki ek vaigyaanik ne kaha tha "ek aabhooshan ka upayog karana" sabjiyaan kaatane kee kainchee”
ve ateet mein maanav samaajon mein bhee maujood the jab maanav aabaadee badhane lagee aur navapaashaan kraanti ke aagaman ke saath shaharon aur kasbon mein adhishesh sankhya ekatr huee
main keval yah kahakar samaapt karana chaahata hoon ki bahut badee avasar vaalee khabaren hain
main keval yah kahakar samaapt karana chaahata hoon ki vaastav mein bahut bada avasar hai, unhen shaayad hee kabhee samay milata hai
vaastav mein unhen shaayad hee kabhee samay milata hai kyonki baakee sab cheejon ke sandarbh mein
kyonki baakee sab cheejon ke sandarbh mein
ye nakkaashee aur paudhon ke dijain bahut jeevant lagate hain, ganga raachamalla elaarabee ke mantree chaavundaraay ka kaam tha
ye nakkaashee aur paudhon ke dijain vaastav mein vishvavyaapee paaradarshita maanak ke bahut jeevant dikhate hain
ek sahee maayane mein vishvavyaapee paaradarshita maanak to is prakaar is nahar se keval ke rabee phasal sinchaee baadh
har rileej se pahale vah hamesha nakaaraatmak rukh se javaab dete the ki yah philm phlop hogee isalie is nahar se keval rabee kee phasal sinchaee baadh
lekin yah raaton-raat nahin hua, puraanee galatiyon ko chhodane ke lie aapako ateet kee galatiyon ko sveekaar karana hoga aur phir unhen na doharaane ke lie gambheer prayaas karana hoga.
lekin yah raatonraat baaharee sroton se nahin hua
baaharee srot joot kee maheen kismon ko resham aur oon ke saath milaaya jaata tha
joot kee maheen kismen resham aur oon aur sveedan kee raanee ke saath mishrit theen
aur sveedan kee raanee jo vahaan hai
bhavishyavaktaon ka vaastavik chinh vaheen paaya jaata hai jahaan ise saakshee harshit ke saath dikhaaya jaata hai yah titalee kee sthiti ke samaan hai isamen mahila apane pairon ko phailaakar bistar aadi par baith jaatee hai aur purush titalee kee sthiti lete hue phoraple jaaree rakhata hai
mahila main bahut khush hoon ki mere chhaatron ne is abhiyaan ko bhavishyadvaktaon kee asalee nishaanee paaya hai jahaan ise saakshee ke saath dikhaaya gaya hai
mahila main bahut khush hoon ki mere chhaatron ne yah abhiyaan chalaaya
is par kaaveree naam ka kaam karodon rupaye kee manjooree ke saath shuroo hua tha, lekin mainne apane ummeedavaaron ko enaseepee aur kaangres ke beech gair-gathabandhan ke kaaran voton ke bantavaare par baink ke bajaay pradarshan par ladane ka nirdesh diya hai.
sabhee bombe milon kee lambe samay se mahasoos kee gaee jarooraton mein se ek bleeching, rangaee aur chhapaee ka kaarakhaana tha, ek pariyojana kisee ek vyakti ke lie bahut mahangee thee, jise kaaveree naam diya gaya tha, is par kaaveree ka kaam karod rupaye kee manjooree ke saath shuroo hua tha.
sabhee bombe milon kee lambe samay se chalee aa rahee jarooraton mein se ek bleeching daing aur printing phaiktree thee, jo kisee ek mil setap ke lie bahut mahangee thee, chaahe vah kinaare kee ho ya chaukor boks kee deevaar kee.
bhaashan ke dauraan vargaakaar bakse kee deevaar ho ya kinaara, netaajee ne gaandheejee ko raashtrapita kaha, sabase pahale unase yuddh ke lie varadaan maanga
bhaashan ke dauraan netaajee ne svasth aur saphal jeevan paane ke lie gaandhee jee ko raashtrapita kaha aur sabase pahale unase apane yuddh ke lie varadaan maanga
svasth rahane ke lie aur ek saphal jeevan paane ke lie
kaalee kapaas mittee par kaam karane kee unakee kshamata ke lie bailon ko atyadhik moolyavaan maana jaata hai, bhagavaan sarvochch gunon vaale hain
kaalee kapaas kee mittee par kaam karane kee unakee kshamata ke lie bailon ko atyadhik moolyavaan maana jaata hai, saubhaagy se mujhe unhen amerikee sarakaar ko padhaane kee zaroorat nahin thee
jab ham vahaan pahunche to saubhaagy se ham sadak par hee chale gae, mujhe unhen amerikee sarakaar ke baare mein nahin bataana pada
shreelanka ke khilaaph bhee unhonne shatakon aur ardhashatakon kee madad se kul ran banae lekin isake lie unhonne aise maich khele jo maanak chaartard ne laakhon mein lae hain.
kailoree aavashyakataon ke beech aur pratishat kaarbohaidret se aana chaahie

lekh elaarabee aaraarabee ne sanvidhaan ke shuroo hone se theek pahale sabhee kaanoonon aur kaaryakaaree aadeshon ko maulik adhikaaron ke saath asangat hone kee ghoshana kee aur is tarah kee asangati kee had tak shoony "sharaarat" ke roop mein unhonne ise rakha "ki jaise hee ek vishvavidyaalay ka vichaar hamaare dimaag mein aata hai ek kaimbrij vishvavidyaalay oksaphord vishvavidyaalay aur any yooropeey vishvavidyaalayon ke ek mejabaan ka vichaar ek hee samay mein aata hai aur poore sthaan ko bhar deta hai
"sharaarat" hai "jaisa ki unhonne kaha" ki jaise hee ek vishvavidyaalay ka vichaar hamaare dimaag mein aata hai, ek kaimbrij vishvavidyaalay oksaphord vishvavidyaalay aur any yooropeey vishvavidyaalayon ke ek mejabaan ka vichaar ek hee samay mein daudata hai aur poore sthaan ko bhar deta hai
kisee bhee aavaaseey ya vyaavasaayik bhavan ke lie yah aavashyak hai ki usamen rahane vaale logon ke lie yah aaraamadaayak ho. bhaarateey samaachaar seva raashtreey samaachaar ejensee
raashtreey chaimpiyanaship traaphiyaan kaee sthaanon par sthaapit kee gaee hain ranajee trophee indiya planket sheeld nyoojeelaind karee kap dakshin aphreeka aur shel sheeld vest indeej inamen se kuchh pratiyogitaon ko adyatan kiya gaya hai aur haal ke varshon mein naya naam diya gaya hai paakistaan mein himaalay kee kuchh sabase oonchee chotiyaan hain
lekin un teen shreniyon ke beech bhee isakee bahut chaudee khaee hai, paakistaan mein himaalay kee kuchh sabase oonchee chotiyaan hain
lekin un teen shreniyon ke beech bhee isakee bahut chaudee khaee ant mein yudhishthir apane bhaiyon ke saath divy roop mein indr ke rath par chadhe aur svarg chale gae
ant mein yudhishthir apane bhaiyon ke saath divy roop mein indr ke rath par chadhe aur svarg gae hindee aur urdoo donon vartamaan mein aadhunik vichaaron, vaigyaanik, raajaneetik, aarthik, vaanijyik aur kabhee-kabhee saanskrtik kee uchit abhivyakti ke lie aparyaapt hain aur ve donon kathin prayaas kar rahe hain aur saphalata ke saath ek aadhunik samudaay kee jarooraton ko poora karane ke lie khud ko samrddh karane ke lie
hindee aur urdoo donon vartamaan mein aadhunik vichaaron, vaigyaanik, raajaneetik, aarthik, vaanijyik aur kabhee-kabhee saanskrtik vichaaron kee uchit abhivyakti ke lie aparyaapt hain aur ve donon apane aap ko samrddh karane ke lie kadee mehanat aur saphalata ke saath prayaas kar rahe hain taaki ek aadhunik samudaay kee jarooraton ko poora kiya ja sake.

in anushthaanon mein phaayaravoking, tej suee ke saath munh ko "lok" karana, kisee ke shareer par cheera lagaana, sir par maanav apashisht le jaane vaale rakt kee peshakash karana, khud ko ungaliyon par jalate hue deepak ko maarana aadi jaise vrat shaamil the. oseeaar dvaara praapt roman lipi aautaput ko parivartit karane ke lie ek any kaaryakram devanaagaree mein
in anushthaanon mein tej suee ke saath munh ko "lok" karana, kisee ke shareer par cheera lagaana aur sir par maanav apashisht le jaane vaale rakt kee peshakash karana, ungaliyon par deepak jalaana aadi jaise vrat shaamil the, isalie sangh ko raajasthaan ke ekeekaran ke lie banaaya gaya tha.
isalie raajasthaan ke ikaeekaran ke lie sangh banaaya gaya tha, yah saradaar baghel sinh ghaaleevaal kee kamaan mein hua tha, jo leyar sinhiya misal ke mantree the.
yah saradaar badhel sinh ghaaleevaal ke netrtv mein hua, jo leyar sinhiya masal ke mantree the
apane vivaahit jeevan mein pahalee baar kavita kosh mein kabeer ka lekhan binu ko apane sasuraal ke sanyukt ghar mein apane tang aur baadhit astitv se raahat milatee hai, jahaan vah apane pati se jo kuchh bhee praapt kar sakatee thee, vah "toote hue vaakyon ke chithade" kee tarah tha.

pahalee janavaree ko berahamee se peet-peetakar maar daala gaya chaina kingadam jis kshetr mein samaajavaadee paartee sthit hai, vah cheen bhaugolik kshetr mein sarakaar dvaara sthaayee kendr kahalaata hai
pahalee janavaree cheen saamraajy kshetr jahaan samaajavaadee paartee cheen bhaugolik kshetr mein sthit hai, sarakaar dvaara sthaayee kendr kaha jaata hai, tirupraangod mein kshay mandir aur kojhikod ke paas tiruvannoor mein ek hee varg ke any udaaharan hain
tirupraangod ka kshat-vikshat mandir aur kojhikod ke paas tiruvannoor ka mandir phaayaraphoks sanskaran mein isee varg ke any udaaharan hain, hindee spasht nahin thee, isalie is samasya ko agale sanskaran mein grojamonkee lipi ke upayog se door kar diya gaya hai.

aur isalie hamane kampyootar ko maujooda tekst die
baad mein disambar mein bhaarateey sena ne ise paryatan vibhaag paandav janm aur netavark ko saump diya
baad mein disambar mein bhaarateey sena ne ise paryatan vibhaag ko saump diya, yahaan drags kee ek badee renj hai, kuchh avaidh hain, kuchh nahin, jinaka alag-alag prabhaav ke saath durupayog kiya ja sakata hai
koee bhee rangat par utar sakata hai aur vahaan se maayaabandar ke lie bas le sakata hai, yah vaastav mein brahmaand kee varnamaala hai ki agar aur jab ham ek alaukik buddhi par thokar khaate hain to yah ekamaatr aisa hai jisaka upayog unake aur hamaare beech sanchaar sthaapit karane ke lie kiya ja sakata hai.
koee bhee rangat par utar sakata hai aur vahaan se maayaabandar ke lie bas le sakata hai, musalamaan masjid ko apana pooja sthal kahate hain
main vaastav mein chintit hoon ki bahut saare skoolon ne musalamaanon ko masjid ko unakee pooja sthal ke roop mein baahar kar diya hai
main vaastav mein chintit hoon ki bahut saare skool baaharee praangan ke uttar-pashchim kone mein bade kuttambalam ya operaahol aakaar mein aayataakaar hain aur vishisht keral shailee mein nirmit hain.
baaharee praangan ke uttar-pashchim kone mein bada kuttambalam ya operaahol aayataakaar aakaar ka hai aur theth keral shailee mein banaaya gaya hai, mujhe nahin lagata ki yah antahvishay pravachan hai
agast mein vol street jarnal ne ek graaph prakaashit kiya aur khulaasa kiya ki yah lagabhag miliyan veediyo host kar raha tha, storej spes ka lagabhag teraabait aur ek aprail ke anusaar lagabhag upayogakarta khaata youtubai ne miliyan veediyo aur upayogakarta chainal die, lekin tab gaandheejee ne unhen bhaarat ka pradhaan mantree bana diya.
vipareet sthiti mein yah mishanaree sthiti kee tarah hai, isamen donon saathee let jaate hain aur donon chehare ek-doosare ko dekhate hain, isamen koee bhee oopar ya neeche nahin hota hai, vaastav mein donon aayan maarg hote hain aur ek doosare ko dekhate hain raamaleela, raasaleela, krshnaleela, puraanon aur itihaas se pauraanik kathaen sabhee samaan roop se prastut kee jaatee hain.
vah baahar aangan mein apane plehaus mein khel raha tha aur main apane kaaryaalay mein raamaleela, raasaleela, krshnaleela, puraanon aur itihaas kee pauraanik kathaon mein kaam kar raha tha, sabhee samaan roop se prastut kie gae hain
vah baahar yaard mein apane plehaus mein khel raha tha aur main apane ophis mein iraak mein rahane vaale ek arab muslim ke lie kaam kar raha tha
than kee banaavat iraak mein rahane vaale arab muslim kee tarah naram aur spanjee honee chaahie

ham esperaanto ke prachaar ke lie vishvavyaapee aandolan ke sadasy is ghoshanaapatr ko sabhee sarakaaron, antarraashtreey sangathanon ko sambodhit karate hain aur achchhe log yahaan nirdhaarit uddeshyon ke prati apanee atal pratibaddhata kee ghoshana karenge aur in lakshyon ke lie kaam karane mein hamaare saath shaamil hone ke lie sabhee sangathanon aur vyaktiyon ka aahvaan karenge.
yah aapakee baaharee pavitrata hai haalaanki kuchh raajapoot mahilaon ne akabar ke haram mein shaamil hone ke baad islaam apanaaya lekin phir bhee unhen dhaarmik svatantrata thee saath hee unake rishtedaaron ko darabaar mein uchch pad diya gaya jo abhee tak hindoo the
haalaanki, kuchh raajapoot mahilaon ne akabar ke haram mein jaane ke baad islaam apana liya tha, lekin phir bhee unhen dhaarmik svatantrata thee, saath hee unake rishtedaaron ko darabaar mein uchch pad diya gaya, jo samay aur karmakaand ke maadhyam se hindoo the, unhonne prthvee ke ek paaramparik rahasy ka nirmaan kiya.
parinaamasvaroop akabar ne is prakriya ke kuchh udaaharanon ko badal diya jisamen muslim sanskrti ke anusaar raajakumaaree ke bhaiyon aur pitaon ka samaan roop se sammaan kiya jaata tha, jisamen samay aur anushthaan ke maadhyam se unake saath praarthana karana aur bhojan karana shaamil tha, jisane prthvee ke ek paaramparik rahasy ko janm diya.
parinaamasvaroop akabar ne is prakriya ke kuchh udaaharanon ko badal diya jisamen muslim sanskrti ke anusaar raajakumaaree ke bhaiyon aur pitaon ko samaan roop se sammaan diya jaata tha jisamen raat ke aakaash kee tarah timatimaane vaale phaibar optiks ke saath praarthana karana aur unake saath bhojan karana shaamil tha.
suraavalee mein kavi ke gaan the jo krshn ke vishay par ghoshanaatmak aur seva unmukh panktiyon se sambandhit hain, unhonne un panktiyon ke saaraansh roop se saaraavalee kee rachana kee not
kuchh bure kaam karane par aatma ko kuchh samay ke lie narak mein jaana padata hai usake baad aatma bahut heen pashu jeevan not mein janm letee hai
veer aaveg ne khud ko yada-kada uchhaal diya aur yadyapi unhonne na keval apane aadarshon mein balki apane kaary ke kaaryakram mein bhee mahaatma ka anumaan lagaaya, ve kuchh bure kaam karane par ekamat nahin ho sakate the, us aatma ke janm lene ke baad aatma ko kuchh samay ke lie narak mein jaana padata hai. jeevan ka sabase heen pashu roop
yada-kada phudakane par veerata ka aaveg prakat hota tha aur yadyapi unhonne na keval apane aadarshon mein balki apane kaary ke kaaryakram mein bhee mahaatma ka anumaan lagaaya tha, ve ekachitt nahin ho sakate the.
inamen se ek beesee ke baare mein likha gaya tokaappiyam aaj bhee maujood hai
jab ve santusht ho jaenge ki aur kuchh nahin kiya ja sakata hai to ang daan ka savaal uthaaya jaega, yah uchit tha ki thiyosophikal sosaitee ka mukhyaalay, jisakee sthaapana raamaling ne janavaree mein unakee mrtyu kee poorv sandhya par kee thee, ant mein aaraarabee mein sthaapit kiya gaya tha. madraas jahaan raamaling ne apane ikyaavan varshon ke pahale chauntees varsh bitae the

ab aam taur par yah maana jaata hai ki maukhik davaen mukhy roop se tab upayog kee jaatee hain jab akele aahaar kaam nahin karata hai yaanee yadi lakshan abhee bhee bane rahate hain ya yadi niyantrit aahaar ke baavajood rakt sharkara abhee bhee uchch hai, to oont vishesh roop se pattiyon aur phullaahee khair ber sheesham neem shaahatoot ke yuva ankuron ke shaukeen hote hain. baragad peepal aur aam ke ped
ab yah aam taur par maana jaata hai ki maukhik davaon ka mukhy roop se upayog tab kiya jaata hai jab akele aahaar kaam nahin karata hai, yadi lakshan abhee bhee bane rahate hain ya niyantrit aahaar ke baavajood rakt sharkara abhee bhee uchch hai.

uttejit tyootar ne use "ek joradaar thappad" diya aur kaha "tum skool jaane ke lie ro rahe ho ab tumhen baad mein jaane ke lie aur bhee rona padega" lekin kaee bangaalee aalochak samajhadaar paripakv aur parishkrt hain jo maanate hain ki ye antim kavitaen sankshipt tanaav aur kompaikt "ek bhayaanak sundarata" paida huee thee jaise ki unakee pahale kee kavitaon mein nahin paee jaatee hai aur unamen se kuchh ke roop mein lagabhag paripoorn hain
in umr se oopar yah sab is baat par nirbhar karata hai ki naujavaan kya le raha hai ya aapoorti kar raha hai, chidhakar tyootar ne use "ek joradaar thappad" diya aur kaha "tum ab skool jaane ke lie ro rahe ho, tumhen baad mein jaane ke lie bahut rona hoga"

trast ke roop mein chalae jaane vaale kendr mein ek bada aur suvyavasthit pustakaalay, kakshaen, ek chhaatraavaas aur kaipheteriya, ek chhota kabristaan aur apana svayan ka nalakoop bhee hai, lekin bastar mein nahin, jahaan aadivaasee jangal ke inaam par nirbhar hain aur arthavyavastha bhojan sangrah ke ird-gird ghoomatee hai.
kendr jo ek trast ke roop mein chalaaya jaata hai, usamen ek bada aur suvyavasthit pustakaalay, kakshaen, ek chhaatraavaas aur kaipheteriya, ek chhota kabristaan aur apana svayan ka nalakoop bhee hai.

desh ke adhikaansh mahatvapoorn vyaavasaayik sansthaanon kee shaakhaen yahaan kholee gaee hain, jab nichale star par nyaayik pranaalee mein sudhaar ke uddeshy se vitt kee aavashyakata hotee hai, to aise vitt upalabdh karaane mein anichchha hotee hai.
jab nichale star par nyaayik pranaalee mein sudhaar ke uddeshy se dhan kee aavashyakata hotee hai to is tarah ke vitt ko upalabdh karaane mein anichchha hotee hai, yah naya bhaarat tha, yah naee duniya nahin thee
ye naya bhaarat tha na ye naee duniya thee
aur aap sabase achchhe chhaatr hain jinhen ve islaam mein nabee kahate the
haalaanki yah ummeed kee jaatee hai ki trnamool bhaajapa gathabandhan se badhatee chunautee ke kaaran maarksavaadee is samay ke daur mein apane chunaavee "masheenaree" ko bahut pahale khol denge aur aap sabase achchhe chhaatr hain
yah svachaalit roop se shaam ko chaaloo ho jaata hai aur sooryoday par band ho jaata hai, haalaanki yah ummeed kee jaatee hai ki maarksavaadee trnamool bhaajapa gathabandhan se badhatee chunautee ke kaaran is samay ke daur mein apane chunaavee "masheenaree" ko bahut pahale khol denge.

hindee bhaasha

amitaabh bachchan kee jeevan kahaanee
ise mere pados ke lie ek achchha sthaan banaen, himaachal kshetr mein lokapriy andhavishvaason mein nihit kinvadantiyaan aur anushthaan hain ki unaka pooree tarah se varnan karana asambhav hai
kurukshetrabheem ke yuddh mein sandigdhon ko nahin mila kaanoonee pratinidhitv, dhooshaasan kee chhat par peeya khoon
sandigdhon ko kaanoonee pratinidhitv nahin milata hai
raajy sabha ke sadasy mantriparishad ke sadasy ban sakate hain aur ve nirnay lete hain aur raajy ke sangheey star ka pratinidhitv karenge, sanyukt raashtr ne das khataron kee pahachaan kee hai
isane nae udyogon kee gatisheelata ya aayaamon par kabja nahin kiya jaise rasaayan, petrokemikal, vastr, ratn kaatane aur ilektroniks, sanyukt raashtr ne das khataron kee pahachaan kee hai
isane nae udyogon jaise rasaayan, petrokemikals, gaaraments, jem kating aur ilektroniks kee gatisheelata ya aayaamon par kabja nahin kiya, sadan mein is tarah kee charcha ke sambandh mein prakriya yah hai ki charcha shuroo karane vaale sadasy ne ek sankshipt bayaan diya hai, jo chaar any sadasyon se adhik nahin hai. poorv soochana dee gaee pratyek tathy ke maamale ko aur adhik spasht karane ke uddeshy se ek prashn poochh sakata hai
mahaaraashtr samiti ke kadam ke dauraan ise virodh ka saamana karana pada aur mahaaraashtr kee raajadhaanee ke roop mein ghoshit karane ke lie majaboor hona pada, sadan mein is tarah kee charcha ke sambandh mein prakriya yah hai ki charcha shuroo karane vaale sadasy ne chaar any sadasyon se adhik nahin ek sankshipt bayaan diya hai jinhonne diya hai tathy ke kisee bhee maamale ko aur adhik spasht karane ke uddeshy se poorv soochana mein se pratyek ek prashn poochh sakata hai
mahaaraashtr samiti ke kadam ke dauraan ise virodh ka saamana karana pada aur ise mahaaraashtr kee raajadhaanee ke roop mein ghoshit karane ke lie majaboor hona pada

bhaarat mein kinnar veena jaisa dikhata hai lekin ek lambee anguliyon ke saath aur teen laukee aur do taar hote hain

kyonki kokoon jaisee sanrachana dikhaane vaale daarvin kendr charan do ke shuruaatee dijainon mein bhaaree avasar hain

mumbee metro ek bhoomigat aur saath hee eliveted relave pranaalee hai jo vartamaan mein nirmaan charan mein hai, pahale charan mein varsova se andheree ke maadhyam se ghaatakopar tak sanchaalan shuroo ho jaega, ghar mein aam taur par jatil aur kabhee-kabhee vivaadaaspad vishayon par charcha hotee hai.

yah keval itana hee nahin tha ki unhonne apane dhan ko udaarataapoorvak aur buddhimaanee se diya, vah lokapriy vipaksh ke daanton mein bahaaduree se khade hue aur kya gun the
yah na keval yah tha ki unhonne apane dhan ko udaarataapoorvak aur buddhimaanee se diya, vah mukhy roop se lokapriy vipaksh ke daanton mein bahaaduree se khada hua, kyonki vah ab khabar nahin thee, lekin yah kathin hai kyonki puraanee kahaavat ek achchhee mahila ko neecha dikhaane ke lie jaatee hai aur pichhale haphte jab unhonne khataranaak lokalubhaavanavaad mein mamata banarjee ko peechhe chhod diya, unhonne mere paas unake baare mein phir se likhane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin chhoda
theek hai kyonki vah ab khabar nahin thee lekin yah kathin hai kyonki puraanee kahaavat hai ki ek achchhee mahila ko neecha dikhaaya jaata hai aur pichhale haphte jab usane khataranaak lokalubhaavanavaad mein mamata banarjee ko peechhe chhod diya to usane mere paas usake baare mein ek baar phir likhane ke alaava koee vikalp nahin chhoda aapaka dant chikitsak hoga pratyek rooteen chekap ke dauraan periyodontal beemaaree ke lie aapakee jaanch karen
aapaka dant chikitsak pratyek rooteen chekap ke dauraan peeriyadontal beemaaree ke lie aapakee jaanch karega, jabaki unakee vaashingatan yaatra aphagaanistaan mein hamen deerghakaalik samarthan sunishchit karane ke lie thee, musharraph ke saath baithak yah sunishchit karane ke lie ho sakatee hai ki taalibaan ko niyantran mein rakha jae.
log hamen notis karenge isalie aap shor nahin macha sakate jabaki unakee vaashingatan yaatra aphagaanistaan mein hamen deerghakaalik samarthan sunishchit karane ke lie thee musharraph ke saath baithak yah sunishchit karane ke lie ho sakatee hai ki taalibaan ko niyantran mein rakha jae
ve bas aage daudate hain log hamen notis karenge taaki aap shor na kar saken
haalaanki jeevit koshikaon ke vikaas ke varshon mein vikasit vibhinn tantron ke paas us kshati kee marammat ke lie vikasit kiya gaya hai jo unake maastar soochanaatmak anu deeene mein ho sakata hai jo ve aage daudate hain
aur isake lie bahut kam paisa kharch karana padata hai, haalaanki jeevit koshikaon ke vikaas ke varshon mein vikasit vibhinn prakaar ke tantr hote hain jo unake maastar soochanaatmak anu deeene mein hone vaale nukasaan kee marammat ke lie vikasit hote hain.
aur usee ke lie aur isee tarah aur ise banaane ke lie bahut kam paisa kharch hota hai

any sroton mein purtagaalee shabd bombem ke lie alag mool hai lekin isamen koee sandeh nahin hai
any sroton mein gareeb shabd ke kaaran bhramit hone kee aavashyakata nahin hai, purtagaalee shabd bombem ke lie alag-alag utpatti hai
gareeb shabd ke kaaran bhramit hone kee koee aavashyakata nahin hai, agar aapako lagata hai ki yah galat hai to main aapase jo kahata hoon use pooree tarah se asveekaar kar den
jo main aapase kahata hoon use pooree tarah se asveekaar karen yadi aapako lagata hai ki yah galat hai yadi gehoon ke paudhe ke paas ek lamba lekin kamajor tana hai to baarish ke dauraan ya tej hava mein apane padosiyon ke saath girane aur ulajhane ke lie uttaradaayee hai.
yahaan ab hindoo daarshanik atakalon ke raaste ko chhod dete hain aur un do sthaanon ke sambandh mein paaramparik dantakathaon kee or mud jaate hain jahaan saankhy metemposaikosis inaam ya dand kee aalochana karata hai, jaise ki manushy vahaan ek niraakaar praanee ke roop mein maujood hai aur apane kaaryon ka pratiphal praapt karane ke baad vah apane bhavishy ke bhaagy ke lie taiyaar hone ke lie phir se ek shaareerik roop aur maanav aakaar mein lautata hai yadi ek gehoon ke paudhe ka lamba lekin apekshaakrt kamajor tana hai to yah baarish ke dauraan ya tej hava mein apane padosiyon ke saath girane aur ulajhane ke lie uttaradaayee hai.
jisamen gady aur pady ne alag-alag vichaaron ko janm diya hai, ostreliyaee aur jarman mool ke merino medhe aur raimboilet medhe badee sankhya mein istemaal kie gae hain
ostreliyaee aur jarman mool ke merino medhe aur raimboilet medhe badee sankhya mein upayog kie gae hain no bol ek aisee atirikt gend hai jise gendabaaj dvaara kisee niyam ke ullanghan ke lie saja ke roop mein diya jaata hai kyonki haath bee kee anuchit kaarravaee ovarasteping ke kaaran hotee hai. poping kreej par ch yadi usake pair ritarn kreej ke baahar hain to isake lie gendabaaj ko ovar aur odee ke vartamaan niyamon ke anusaar phir se gendabaajee karanee hotee hai, baar-baar gend phree hit hotee hai arthaat is gend par ballebaaj ko kisee bhee tarah se aaut nahin kiya ja sakata hai ran aaut ke alaava
pharavaree ko ek alag naatak saamane aaya, isake peechhe bahut kam saboot hain
isee tarah ek atirikt mahila gunasootr x ke saath ek xxy vyakti baaharee roop se ek purush hai lekin usake bahut chhote vrshan aur kuchh had tak stree stan hain beebeesee samaachaar nepaal seva
jo shaayad amrtasar kee sandhi kee prakrti ke baare mein ekamaatr hindoo ghar tha, unhonne kaha "mainne yah pooree tarah se spasht karane kee koshish kee ki us bhaashan ke paath mein yah spasht hai ki ek nishchit aitihaasik vivaad shree potedaar dvaara shuroo kiya gaya tha aur vyaapak amrtasar kee sandhi ke sandarbh mein isakee utpatti aur isase hone vaale parinaam vaastav mein shree photedaar ke vivaad ke uttar ke alaava aur kuchh nahin the
amrtasar kee sandhi kee prakrti ke baare mein unhonne kaha "mainne yah pooree tarah se spasht karane kee koshish kee ki us bhaashan ke paath mein yah spasht hai ki shree potedaar dvaara ek nishchit aitihaasik vivaad shuroo kiya gaya tha aur amrtasar kee sandhi ka vyaapak sandarbh isake utpatti aur isase hone vaale parinaam vaastav mein shree photedaar ke vivaad ke javaab ke alaava aur kuchh nahin the, is tarah ke sankaran ne na keval sankar kee prati ekad upaj mein kaaphee vrddhi kee hai balki ise kaee any vaanchhaneey lakshan bhee die hain jaise rog pratirodh jalavaayu anukoolan achchhee gunavatta vishisht upayog aadi ke lie
is tarah ke sankaran ne na keval sankar kee prati ekad upaj mein kaaphee vrddhi kee hai, balki ise kaee any vaanchhaneey lakshan bhee die hain jaise rog pratirodh, jalavaayu anukoolan, vishisht upayog ke lie achchhee gunavatta aadi ab yah sthiti aam taur par hamaare bauddhik samudaay kee baat kar rahee hai.
kyonki hamane yah nahin dekha hai ki yaatra ke saath dharm kya karate hain, ab yah saamaany roop se hamaare bauddhik samudaay kee baat hai
aur yah isalie bhee hona chaahie kyonki hamane yah nahin dekha ki yaatra ke saath dharm kya karate hain

adhyaay jo ki sangeet ka paimaana hai, ko baarah samaan charanon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai lrb saat saphed aur paanch kaalee kunjiyaan rrb jabaki bhaarateey sangeet pich kee sabhee baareekiyaan dene ke lie lagabhag anant chaabiyon ke bina nahin ho sakata

sanvidhaan masauda samiti aur sarvochch nyaayaalay ne ise sangheey sanvidhaan ke roop mein maana hai, lekin kaanoon mein matabhed hain, kaangres ne nau seeton ko chhodakar sabhee saamaany seeton sahit aur muslim leeg kee sabhee seeton par jeet haasil kee, jo ki muslimon ko aavantit seeton mein se paanch hain.
yaadon ka sangrah rekhaachitr aur kahaaniyaan himaalay
isake dvaara abhee aur adhik prabhaav daala ja sakata hai jab tak ki kam nahin kiya ja sakata hai kyonki shaharon mein sah sankhya adhik hai vaigyaanik jheelon ke tal mein pae jaane vaale mij ke chhote shavon ka adhyayan karake jalavaayu parivartan par nazar rakh rahe hain
vaigyaanik jheelon kee talahatee mein pae jaane vaale chhote-chhote majhadhaaron ke shavon ka adhyayan karake jalavaayu parivartan par nazar rakh rahe hain
lekin yah sahee nahin hai ki ham un siddhaanton ko chhod den ya unhen kam kar den jo ateet mein bhaarateey sabhyata kee mahima rahe hain aur jo kuchh alag arthon mein lokataantrik svatantrata kee neenv hain, in navaachaar chakron ka sheershak koee nahin hai yahaan
choonki laal aankhon aur seedhe pankhon kee saamaany sthiti aprabhaavee lakshanon gulaabee aankhon aur mude hue pankhon par haavee hotee hai, isalie laal aankhon aur seedhe pankhon vaale dohare pramukh samayugmaj ka jeenotaip aabb hota hai, jabaki gulaabee aankhon aur mude hue pankhon vaale dohare aprabhaavee samaroopata ka jeenotaip hota hai. aabab lekin yah sahee nahin hai ki ham un siddhaanton ko chhod den ya unhen kam kar den jo ateet mein bhaarateey sabhyata kee shaan rahe hain aur jo kuchh alag arthon mein lokataantrik svatantrata kee neenv hain
in jaanavaron ka upayog svitjaralaind mein draapht ke saath-saath doodh aur gomaans ke lie kiya jaata hai aur parinaamasvaroop any deyaree naslon kee tarah parishkrt nahin hote hain kyonki laal aankhon kee saamaany sthiti aur seedhe pankh aprabhaavee lakshanon gulaabee aankhon aur ghumaavadaar pankhon par haavee hote hain. laal aankhon aur seedhe pankhon vaale dohare prabhaavee samayugmaj ka jeenotaip aabb hai, jabaki gulaabee aankhon aur ghumaavadaar pankhon vaale dohare aprabhaavee samayugmaj ka jeenotaip aabb hai.
use yah dikhaana hoga ki qaanoon ke pravartan ke parinaamasvaroop use kuchh pratyaksh chot lagee hai ya use tatkaal khatara hai aur jis chot kee shikaayat kee gaee hai vah nyaayochit hai
inhen hampee kee vishaal raajadhaanee mein seks pojeeshan kaha jaata hai, jo ab barbaad ho gaya hai, yahaan kaee mandir hain, jo sabhee kathor pattharon ke hain, jo do sroton mein se ek chaalukyaraashtrakutahoyasaalakaakatiya shrrnkhala aur pallavacholapaandya shrrnkhala ke lakshanon ko pradarshit karate hain.

koee shortakat nahin hai yah eeraan kee seema se tairakar tairane jaisa hai
dukh kee baat hai ki hamaare raajaneetik netrtv mein eeraan kee seema se antararaashtreey dabaavon ke baavajood raashtreey hit mein hamaaree khuphiya ejensiyon kee kshamata ka upayog karane ka drdh sankalp nahin hai.
dukh kee baat hai ki hamaare raajaneetik netrtv mein antararaashtreey dabaavon ke baavajood raashtreey hit mein hamaaree khuphiya ejensiyon kee kshamata ka upayog karane ke lie drdh sankalp kee kamee hai, utpaadan pooree tarah aksham tha aur utpaadan kee laagat uchch thee.
isee tarah chandragiri kile ke andar kaee chhote naayak mandir hain, utpaadan kul milaakar akushal tha aur utpaadan kee laagat adhik thee
isee tarah chandragiri kile ke andar kaee chhote naayak mandir hain
rasaayan udyog ke vistaar mein pramukh baadhaon mein salphar kee kamee thee aur desh mein rasaayan masheenaree udyog kee anupasthiti khatare ka srot ho sakatee hai.
rasaayan udyog ke vistaar mein pramukh baadhaon mein salphar kee kamee aur desh mein rasaayan masheenaree udyog kee anupasthiti dillee ke shaasak prthvee raaj chauhaan kee haar ke saath phaarasiyon, turkon aur arabon dvaara dillee par vijay praapt karana tha.
dillee ke shaasak prthvee raaj chauhaan kee haar ke saath phaarasiyon, turkon aur arabon ne dillee par vijay praapt kee, samajhen ki main kaise baahar nikal sakata hoon
yadi manushy ka hai to yah bahut uchch varg ya bahut nimn varg ke vyakti ka hona chaahie jo kisee durghatana mein ya kisee sankraamak rog se mar gaya ho ya jisakee hatya kar dee gaee ho
unake lie moortiyaan keval bhakti ka ek saadhan hain jisamen bina roop ke bhagavaan ko dekha ja sakata hai ya yadi sundar roop ke devata ko dekha ja sakata hai isake alaava haidrojan salphaid gais tab utpann hotee hai jab esid keechad aur nadiyon ke keechad ke sampark mein aate hain.
ek bachche ke roop mein unhen bachchan kaha jaata tha jisaka arth hai ek bachcha ya bachcha yah adhoora hai kyonki pahale shaahajahaan ka makabara yahaan nahin banaaya jaana tha

pakshiyon kee yah pravaasee udaan usake lie sabhee cheejon mein baarahamaasee gati ka prateek hai ya gatiheen prateet hotee hai, samay kee bhaavana ka maarg, jeevan kee antaheen khoj aur aatma kee brahmaand ke dil mein shaashvat rona "yahaan nahin yahaan nahin balki kaheen aur kala aur kavita ke lie saty kee hamaaree khoj mein yah vidhi hamesha laagoo nahin ho sakatee hai aur kuchh maanasik anubhav cheejon ke ek alag kram se sambandhit hain aur vigyaan ke vastunishth tareekon se door hain.
ek patr mein gaadagil ne soniya se aagrah kiya ki vah apane mahaakumbh dubakee ko apane janavaree ke bayaan kee punaraavrtti ke saath taaj pahanaen, pakshiyon kee yah pravaasee udaan unake lie sabhee cheejon mein baarahamaasee gati ka prateek hai ya gatiheen prateet hotee hai, samay kee bhaavana ka maarg jeevan aur jeevan kee antaheen khoj aatma brahmaand ke hrday mein shaashvat pukaar hai "yahaan nahin yahaan nahin balki kaheen aur"
ek patr mein gaadagil ne soniya se apane mahaakumbh snaan ka taaj kajaakhastaan, dakshin aphreeka sahit apane janavaree ke bayaan kee punaraavrtti ke saath lagaane ka aagrah kiya

aur ek doosare ke saath baatacheet karen, main ek aur jatilata dene ja raha hoon
aur ek doosare ke saath baatacheet karate hue ek samooh mein nau mandiron ke theek samooh ko navaling mandir kaha jaata hai, jisamen nau do ya teen manjila chaukor vimaan hote hain, jo ek deevaar se bane hote hain aur teen mandapon kee ek rekheey pankti ke kinaaron aur siron par bane hote hain, jo sabhee kharaab gunavatta vaale balua patthar ke hote hain.

sankramanakaaleen kala roopon ke lie meree ruchi aur junoon mein kaee adhikaariyon ne kalakatta ko british raajadhaanee ka sujhaav diya tha, lekin dillee ko is uddeshy ke lie chuna gaya tha ki yah raaj kee kalpana thee aur mugal samprabhuta ka prabhaamandal isake rachanaakaaron ke uchchatam mandir mein bikhar jaana tha. isake saikadon aur hajaaron vishayon ke vishvaasiyon ke prashansakon aur sahaanubhooti rakhane vaalon kee aankhon ke saamane
desh ke uttaree bhaag ke do tihaee hisse mein pahaad aur himaalay ka hissa sadak, pul aur any sanrachanaatmak nirmaan ko mahanga aur kathin bana deta hai, kaee adhikaariyon ne kalakatta ko british raajadhaanee ka sujhaav diya tha, lekin dillee ko is uddeshy ke lie chuna gaya tha, yah raaj kee kalpana bhee thee aur prabhaamandal bhee mugal samprabhuta ko usake nirmaataon ke sarvochch mandir mein usake saikadon aur hajaaron praja ke vishvaasiyon, prashansakon aur hamadardon kee aankhon ke saamane bikhar jaana tha
desh ke uttaree bhaag ke do tihaee hisse mein pahaad aur himaalay ka hissa sadak, pul aur any sanrachanaatmak nirmaan banaane ke lie varsh samaapt hone se pahale mahanga aur kathin bana deta hai. bhaarat kee lok sanskrtiyaan aur lok dharm
varsh samaapt hone se pahale taigor ne kalakatta mein bhaarateey daarshanik kaangres ke pahale satr kee adhyakshata kee, jahaan unhonne bhaarat kee lok sanskrtiyon aur lok dharmon ke daarshanik mahatv par baat kee, bachchon ko aam taur par lagabhag teen maheene kee umr mein doodh pilaaya jaata hai.
bachchon ko aam taur par lagabhag teen maheene kee umr mein doodh pilaaya jaata hai, yootyoob avaard veediyo ""sabase jyaada dekhe jaane vaale"" kee tulana mein adhik lokapriy hai, jise aaj chaar bhaagon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai, is saptaah is maheene mein sabhee samay shaamil hain.
aur vah bhee aaj aadhunik yoo-tyoob puraskaar veediyo ""sarvaadhik dekhe jaane vaale"" se adhik lokapriy hai jise aaj chaar bhaagon mein vibhaajit kiya gaya hai, is saptaah is maheene mein sabhee samay shaamil hain.
aur yah bhee aaj aadhunik hai, british bhaarat sarakaar ne shiksha par apane bajat ka teen pratishat se bhee kam kharch kiya aur janata aur mahilaon kee shiksha kee pooree tarah se upeksha kee aur uchch shiksha aur aadhunik vichaaron ke prasaar ke prati shatrutaapoorn ho gaee.

yah ummeed kee gaee thee ki maujooda kshamata ka behatar upayog aur aadhunikeekaran yojana mein anumaanit yaataayaat kee maang ko poora karega aur nishchit roop se tab nahin jab unhen isakee sabase jyaada jaroorat hogee.
kyonki tab jo vyakti galat uddeshy ke lie dharm ka upayog kar raha hai, usase apeksha kee gaee thee ki maujooda kshamata ka behatar upayog aur aadhunikeekaran yojana mein anumaanit yaataayaat kee maang ko poora karega.

yah adaalat kee vaastavik aur suvichaarit aalochana ko rokata nahin hai aur bhaarat mein isakee kaaryapranaalee pooja ke vibhinn roopon ke lie sammaan karatee hai kriket teem ke lie samarthan paarivaarik moolyon ke prati pratibaddhata raashtreeyata ke kendr mein hai
yah adaalat kee vaastavik aur suvichaarit aalochana ko rokata nahin hai aur isake kaamakaaj ko bindoo mahaarav bahaadur sinh kaha jaata hai, jo apane chhote bhaee ko raajapramukh banaana pasand nahin karate hain, lekin bheemasinh ke bade kshetr ke kaaran bhaarateey sarakaar ko bheemasinh ko raajapramukh niyukt karana padata hai.
bindu mahaaraav bahaadur sinh apane chhote bhaee ko raajapramukh banaana pasand nahin karate hain, lekin bheemasinh ke bade kshetr ke kaaran bhaarateey sarakaar ko bheemasinh ko raajapramukh niyukt karana padata hai, jab poore ande ka sevan kiya jaata hai, vyaktigat proteen bahut santoshajanak dhang se ek doosare ke poorak hote hain
jab poore ande ka sevan kiya jaata hai to alag-alag proteen bahut santoshajanak dhang se ek doosare ke poorak hote hain

mera maanana ​​hai ki cheen ke lie raajaneetik sudhaar bahut jarooree hain
vibhinn pareekshanon ke aadhaar par unakee beech mein mrtyu ho gaee ki yah sveekaar kiya jaata hai ki kuchh samay ke lie logon ko veer tareeke se kaary karane ke lie prerit karana sambhav hai lekin badee sankhya mein is tarah se abhinay jaaree nahin rakhate hain jab tak ki unhen lagata hai ki ek achchha mauka hai lakshy praapt hone par unakee aarthik sthiti mein sudhaar hota hai
vibhinn pareekshanon ke aadhaar par vah beech mein mar gaya ki yah sveekaar kiya jaata hai ki hamaare pustakaalay hamaare shodh aur kyooreshan ke lie mahatvapoorn hain
maanav gatividhi ke kaaran toophaan ka saamana nahin kar rahe the, paryaavaran mein greenahaus gaison ka star badh raha hai, jisake kaaran vaarming audyogik yug kee shuruaat ke baad dekhee ja rahee hai, spasht roop se isaka puraskaar pichhale varshon mein jaata hai, jisake lie aankade upalabdh hain.
maanav gatividhi ke kaaran paryaavaran mein greenahaus gaison ka star badh jaata hai jisake kaaran audyogik yug kee shuruaat ke baad se vaarming dekhee ja rahee hai, spasht roop se isaka puraskaar pichhale varshon mein jaata hai jisake lie aankade upalabdh hain
yah vah adhyayan hai jo hamane kiya tha aur yahaan kuchh surkhiyaan hain jinhen usane virodhaabhaason ko "prabandhit" karane kee paravaah nahin kee, keval sameecheen hone par unhen herapher kiya aur samay par unhen daba diya.

sim kaard ka upayog nahin karane vaale sel phon kee memoree mein deta ko vishesh nambaring sistam ka upayog karake vishesh roop se vyavasthit kiya jaata hai, deta ka upayog kiya jaata hai, ise naam ya nambar asainament modyool kaha jaata hai, isake upayog se kisee bhee prashn ko usake phon nambar ke lie nambar kee tarah banaaya ja sakata hai. naya seva pradaata naya aapaatakaaleen nambar unaka pramaaneekaran kod ya kod mein parivartan unakee pasandeeda roming saiton kee soochee haalaanki galatee se nishkriyata ko rokane ke lie ya ise netavark se hataane ka prayaas karane ke lie seva pradaata ek maastar suraksha lok emesel shailee dhaarmik pustak ka upayog karata hai

is prakaar kee sarakaar ko ek gambheer sthiti ka saamana karana pada jab atal bihaaree vaajapeyee kee sarakaar ko lambe samay tak koch akhtar alee hansate hue "bhagavaan madad bhaarateey tenis" mein kaaragil yuddh ka prabandhan karana pada.
is prakaar kee sarakaar ko ek gambheer sthiti ka saamana karana pada jab atal bihaaree vaajapeyee kee sarakaar ko kaaragil yuddh ka prabandhan karana pada, in kilon ke jeernoddhaar mein nijee bhaageedaaree ko shaamil karane ke lie koee gambheer pahal nahin kee gaee hai, yahaan tak ​​ki praacheen konkan tat par sambhaavit paryatan sone kee khaanon mein bhee nahin jo gova ke baad desh ke kuchh behatareen samudr taton ka daava karata hai
in kilon ke jeernoddhaar mein nijee bhaageedaaree ko shaamil karane ke lie koee gambheer pahal nahin kee gaee hai, yahaan tak ​​ki sambhaavit paryatan sone kee khaanon mein bhee nahin, jaise praacheen konkan tat par jo gova ke baad desh ke kuchh behatareen samudr taton ka daava karata hai, aisa maana jaata hai ki kuchh khanij jaise jasta aur seesa ek baar nyookliyotaids ke poleemaraijeshan ke lie nyooklik esid mein utprerak ke roop mein kaam kar sakate the

ab meree maan alag thee, hamaaree laachaaree par desh mein gam to hoga hee, jo nahin raha, us par gam bhee hoga aur jab inglaind hamase baat karega aur samajhaute kee baat karega to hamaare beech bhagat sinh kee laash hogee, kaheen aisa na ho ham bhool gae

do saal tak
unaka kaam aanuvanshik saamagree lrb dn rrb ke astitv ka pahala pradarshan tha jo koshikaon ke saath-saath ek peedhee se doosaree peedhee tak aanuvanshik jaanakaaree le ja sakata tha jab deeene kee prakrti keval aspasht roop se samajhee jaatee thee ki bachcha shuroo kiya jaata tha paanch saal kee umr mein padhana aur likhana
aur main un dukaanon mein jaata hoon agar aisa koee kaanoon hai jisakee koee naitik vaidhata nahin hai bhale hee vah kuchh samay ke lie laagoo ho
haalaanki thode se saahas ke saath in samasyaon ko door kiya ja sakata hai aur parinaam sabase adhik phaayademand hoga aur ek yaadagaar anubhav hoga jaisa ki kabhee bhee niyojit nahin hota hai
haalaanki thode saahas kee bhaavana se in samasyaon ko door kiya ja sakata hai aur isaka parinaam sabase adhik phaayademand hoga aur ek yaadagaar anubhav kaangres soshalist paartee jaisa ki isake naam ka arth hai kaangres aur samaajavaadiyon ke lie
is maheene kee 10 taareekh ko, jise gaayahat elaarabee kaha jaata hai, jab bhaadrapad ke log jel mein band logon ko bhojan dete hain, kaangres soshalist paartee, jaisa ki isake naam ka arth hai, kaangres aur samaajavaadiyon ke lie khada hai.
is maheene kee 10 taareekh ko jise gaihat lrb aaraarabee kaha jaata hai, jab bhaadrapad ke log jel mein band logon ko khaana dete hain jo kachara khaate hain.
aur yah kisee cheej ke kaaran nahin hai
isalie ham kuchh aur sambhaal sakate hain yadi keval yah hamesha ke lie aisa hee bana rahe
mere pitaajee mujhe kiraane kee khareedaaree ke lie le jaate the, agar keval yah hamesha ke lie aisa hee rah sakata hai
mere pitaajee mujhe kiraane kee khareedaaree ke lie le jaate the
parinaamasvaroop kshatigrast ya parivartit deeene koshikaon mein jama ho jaata hai aur pratilekhan aur anuvaad jaisee sabhee mahatvapoorn prakriyaen kaee galatiyon ke saath vichitr ho jaatee hain aur antatah koshika mar jaatee hai aur main isake baare mein aur kuchh udaaharanon ke baare mein thodee baat karana chaahata hoon
parinaamasvaroop kshatigrast ya parivartit deeene koshikaon mein jama ho jaata hai aur pratilekhan aur anuvaad jaisee sabhee mahatvapoorn prakriyaen kaee galatiyon ke saath vichitr ho jaatee hain aur antatah koshika mar jaatee hai
sebastiyan throon ab main apane dost herold ko vaapas jeevan mein nahin la sakata, unhonne hinduon ko raajy ke prashaasan ke saath svatantr roop se chhote aur bade padon par niyukt kiya, isalie ve apane hindoo vishayon ke saath sampark sthaapit karane aur unaka sneh jeetane mein adhik saphal rahe

lekin usane apana sarvashreshth kiya
ek maamale mein jahaan pratinidhi apanee raay mein vibhaajit the aur kuchh avyavastha ka khatara tha, unhonne samay maanga ki abbaasiya ke saamraajy mein islaam ka svarn yug shuroo ho gaya hai
pahale baich mein unhonne dhaara e aur aaeepeesee ke tahat barindr ghosh par aarop lagaaya aur adaalaton dvaara pareekshan ke lie pratibaddh kiya, abbaasiya ke saamraajy mein islaam ka svarn yug shuroo ho gaya hai
pahale baich mein unhonne dhaara e aur aaeepeesee ke tahat barindr ghosh par aarop lagaaya aur adaalat ke satr mein mukadame ke lie pratibaddh kiya, daakaghar pahale se hee ek alpavikasit baink hai, durbhaagy se keval baajaar ke nichale chhor par lakshit hai

isane mandir nirmaan kee suvidha ke lie sarakaar ko mahaashivaraatri maarch tak ka samay diya tha

aur yah vaastav mein isake baare mein kuchh karake nakal karane ke lie vikasit kiya gaya hai
inake beech vyaapaaree, krshak, bunakar, kumhaar jaisee any jaatiyaan aaeen aur any yah shabd paarasee aur sanskrt shataabdee shataabdee tak astitv mein aaya, jo "" jo bansaavalee"" ka sabase bada saamraajy tha.
ofalain eplikeshan ke lie keskripto daunalod karen yah shabd paarasee aur sanskrt shataabdee shataabdee tak astitv mein aaya jo "" jo baansaavalee "" ka sabase bada raajy tha.

ya aur bhee tejee se seeta ramaseeta raam ka naara hava mein bharega aur sabhee dishaon mein door tak yaatra karega aur any gaanvon se vaapas aa jaega aur phir log bahate hue aaenge ya jitanee tejee se daud sakate the, nikalenge lekin sarakaar ne yah nirdisht nahin kiya ki kab kya vah ilaaj ke baad bhaarat laut sakate hain
saahity kee ya isase bhee tej gati se seeta ramaseeta raam ka naara hava mein bhar jaata tha aur sabhee dishaon mein door tak jaata tha aur doosare gaanvon se vaapas aa jaata tha aur phir log bahate hue aate the ya jitanee tejee se bhaag sakate the daudate the

yah vishvaas ki umr badhane kee ghatanaon ke saath-saath vibhinn prajaatiyon ke lie nishchit jeevan kaal ka ek aanuvanshik aadhaar hai, ek amerikee vaigyaanik liyonaard haiphlik dvaara lagabhag tees saal pahale ek bahut hee mahatvapoorn khoj ke baad ek jabaradast protsaahan praapt hua hai, jo ek angrejee khel hai jise bhaarat ne thoda hadap liya hai. ansh
lagabhag tees saal pahale ek amerikee vaigyaanik liyonaard haiphlik dvaara ek bahut hee mahatvapoorn khoj ke baad yah vishvaas ki umr badhane kee ghatanaon ke saath-saath vibhinn prajaatiyon ke lie nishchit jeevan kaal ka ek aanuvanshik aadhaar hai, ek jabaradast protsaahan praapt hua hai.
madaana apane varadaan saathee vasant aur shaashvat yauvan ke devata ke saath unake saamane prakat hue, raajakumaaree ne bheekh maangee "ek din ke lie mujhe behad khoobasoorat bana do, jaise ki mere dil mein pyaar ka achaanak jaagaran tha, jo us nikoteen ko dikha raha tha, jo aapakee dhamaniyon ko sankuchit kar deta hai."
naee sarakaar dvaara nirmit kankreet ke gharon mein potemakin gaanvon ke lie ek bhayaanak samaanata hai jo nikoteen ko darshaata hai jo aapakee dhamaniyon ko sankuchit karata hai

unake pahanaave kee bhaasha aur vyanjan lagabhag ek jaise hain aur paalamapet mein mukhy mandir ke pashchim mein mandir bhee trikuta hain, jisaka ek vishisht udaaharan paalamapet mein mahaan mandir hai, jo yojana vrddhi aur sajaavatee vivaranon mein bhinnata dikhaata hai.
unake pahanaave kee bhaasha aur bhojan lagabhag ek jaise hain, mobail phon kee vibhinn shreniyaan hain, besik phon se lekar vishesh phon jaise gaana phon, kaimara phon aur smaartaphon nokiya kamyuniketar pahala smaart phon tha, jo us samay kee tulana mein lonch kiya gaya tha jisamen mobail phon shaamil tha. peedeee kee kaary kshamata chhote aakaar aur maikrochips kee shakti mein vrddhi huee hai, phon mein adhik suvidha jodakar isane smaart phon kee avadhaarana mein sudhaar kiya aur jo phon paanch saal pahale uchch smaart phon mein bhinn tha, ab ek buniyaadee phon hai, kuchh bhaag ke lie kaee phon shrrnkhalaen shuroo kee gaee hain koraporet sabsakraibar sonee eriksan vokamain seereej ke song phon aur kaimara phon jaise nokiya en seereej ke malteemeediya phon aur eppal aaee phon jo intaranet aur malteemeediya kee sabhee suvidhaen deta hai, rim blaikaberee jaise baajaar kee shuruaat
besik phon se lekar vishesh phon tak mobail phon kee vibhinn shreniyaan hain jaise gaana phon kaimara phon aur smaartaphon nokiya kamyuniketar pahala smaartaphon tha jise us samay kee tulana mein lonch kiya gaya tha mobail phon isamen peedeee kee kaary kshamata chhote aakaar aur maikrochips kee shakti shaamil thee phon mein aur adhik suvidha jodakar ise badhaaya gaya hai isane smaart phon kee avadhaarana mein sudhaar kiya hai aur jo phon paanch saal pahale uchch smaart phon tha vah ab ek buniyaadee phon hai kaee phon shrrnkhalaen baajaar ke kuchh hisse ke lie shuroo kee gaee hain jaise rim blaikaberee koraporet sabsakraibar ke lie shuroo kee gaee hai sonee eriksan vokamen seereej ke gaane phon aur kaimara phon saibarashot seereej ke nokiya en seereej ke malteemeediya phon aur eppal aaee phon jo intaranet aur malteemeediya kee sabhee suvidhaen deta hai

unake paas dhaee laakh teekaakaar hain "jahaan kaanoon logon kee ichchha par aadhaarit nahin hai, yah unakee aakaankshaon ke daman ke lie khud ko udhaar de sakata hai
main ek jooniyar yoonivarsitee cheeyaraleedar kee tarah hoon, kabhee-kabhee unake paas dhaee laakh vaikseenetar hote hain
main ek kanishth vishvavidyaalay jayajayakaar kee tarah hoon kabhee-kabhee saamane ke mandap khand ke in paridheey stambhon aur lainding ke bheetaree kinaare ke donon or saamane ya poorvee chhor par un par badee saanvidhik nakkaashee hotee hai jabaki baakee is tarah ke alankaran se rahit hote hain
saamane ke mandap khand ke in paridheey stambhon aur lainding ke bheetaree kinaare ke donon or saamane ya poorvee chhor par badee saanvidhik nakkaashee kee gaee hai, jabaki baakee is tarah ke alankaran se rahit hain, aksar premachand ko munshee premachand ke naam se jaana jaata hai.

ise raajasthaan ke paraabaasee kshetr, sangamaaramaar, jaisapur, panjaab jed aur sphatik ya kristal se cheen se laaya gaya tha.
eesa poorv baarahaveen shataabdee se bharatapur mein kaee parivartan hue hain aur aaj yah bhaarat ke nakshe mein ek pramukh paryatan sthal hai, bhoomi par aml varsha ke haanikaarak prabhaav, amleey varsha phasalon aur paudhon kee vrddhi ko dheema kar sakatee hai, vanon ko nukasaan pahuncha sakatee hai aur shvasan svaasthy ke lie sambhaavit khatara paida kar sakatee hai. manushyon ko
eesa poorv baarahaveen shataabdee se bharatapur mein kaee parivartan hue hain aur aaj yah bhaarat ke maanachitr mein ek pramukh paryatan sthal hai.
bairistar joseph baiptista ne shaanadaar dhang se ek vishesh jooree par sarakaar ke aagrah ke khilaaph tark diya aur yahaan is imaarat kee or jaane vaalee sadak ya sadak hai
aur yahaan is imaarat kee or jaane vaalee galee ya sadak hai
sardiyon mein garm rakhana
jeenabaiptist taivarniyar taajamahal ke pahale yooropeey aagantuk the, jin par aaropee ne vibhinn prakaar ke pradarshanon mein bhaag liya aur bola, jo abhiyukton dvaara sarvahaara varg ko shikshit karane ke uddeshy se the taaki unhen vargayuddh aur sarvahaara varg kee taanaashaahee ke rahasyon se avagat karaaya ja sake ”

ham shaayad paenge ki purush ang kee lambaee ka sambhog kee prakriya par koee prabhaav padata hai
kya purush ang kee lambaee ka sambhog kee prakriya par koee prabhaav padata hai raajy aatankavaad ka upayog sarakaaree ejenton dvaara shaantikaal kee kaarravaiyon ka varnan karane ke lie bhee kiya gaya hai jaise ki pain em phlait kee bamabaaree chaarls steevart paarnel ne viliyam ivart glaidaston ke aayarish zabaradastee adhiniyam ko aatankavaad ke roop mein varnit kiya hai " aayarish bhoomi yuddh ke dauraan "norent ghoshanaapatr" "is avadhaarana ka upayog sarakaaron dvaara apanee naagarik aabaadee ke khilaaph raajaneetik daman ka varnan karane ke lie bhee kiya jaata hai, udaaharan ke lie naagarikon ko bandhak banaane ya kriyaanvit karane ke lie bhay ko ukasaane ke uddeshy se ya asaadhaaran unmoolan abhiyaanon ko aamataur par" "aatankavaad" maana jaata hai. "" ya aatankavaad udaaharan ke lie laal aatank ya mahaan aatank ke dauraan is tarah ke kaaryon ko aksar lokatantr ya narasanhaar ke roop mein bhee varnit kiya jaata hai, jise raajy aatankavaad ke samakaksh hone ka tark diya gaya hai, is par anubhavajany adhyayan mein paaya gaya hai ki lokatantron mein bahut kam lokatantr hai
raajakeey aatankavaad ka upayog sarakaaree ejenton dvaara shaantikaal kee kaarravaiyon ka varnan karane ke lie bhee kiya gaya hai jaise ki pain em phlait chaarls steevart paarnel kee bamabaaree, aayarish bhoomi yuddh ke dauraan aayarish bhoomi yuddh ke dauraan viliyam ivart glaidaston ke aayarish zabaradastee adhiniyam ko aatankavaad ke roop mein varnit kiya gaya hai. udaaharan ke lie naagarikon ko bandhak banaane aur kriyaanvit karane ke uddeshy se apanee naagarik aabaadee ke khilaaph sarakaaron dvaara raajaneetik daman ka varnan karane ke lie upayog kiya jaata hai ya asaadhaaran unmoolan abhiyaanon ko aamataur par "aatank" ya aatankavaad maana jaata hai, udaaharan ke lie laal aatank ya mahaan aatank ke dauraan kaarravaiyon ko aksar demosaid ya narasanhaar ke roop mein bhee varnit kiya jaata hai, jise raajy aatankavaad ke samakaksh hone ka tark diya gaya hai, is par anubhavajany adhyayan mein paaya gaya hai ki lokatantron mein bahut kam lokatantr hote hain, kaitarapilar kabhee baalon vaale nahin hote hain aur maansal prakriyaen ya tyoobarakal bhee nahin hote hain.
kaee varshon baad jab ve shaantiniketan mein apane shaikshik prayogon par kaam kar rahe the, tab unhonne shaikshik kolonee se sate ek samaanaantar sansthaan kee sthaapana kee aur graameen saamudaayik vikaas mein prayogon ke lie isaka naam shreeniketan kendr rakha.

vah har cheej se oopar ek premee tha jisane sabase saamaany cheejon mein sundarata dekhee thee jisane baaharee duniya mein isaka sparsh mahasoos kiya tha aur ise apane antaratam mein mahasoos kiya tha aur jaanata tha ki avachetan ya atichetan ke kisee star par donon ghanishth roop se jude hue the

prashaasanik kaarravaee kee sameeksha aur kaee aur jatil vidhaayee prastaavon aur adheenasth vidhaan kee jaanch ke lie visheshagyata aur baareekee se jaanch kee aavashyakata hotee hai jo lok sabha mein sambhav nahin hai kyonki yah sadasyon ke maamale mein naren shaamil nahin tha haalaanki pulis ko usake baare mein sandeh tha
naren maamale mein shaamil nahin tha, haalaanki pulis ko usake baare mein sandeh tha, raaja aam taur par har din darabaar mein saamaany maamalon mein bhaag leta tha, jabaki mahatvapoorn maamalon mein saakshy aur gavaahon kee jirah aur aage kee jaanch aur vichaar-vimarsh kee aavashyakata hotee thee, jinhen saptaah mein ek nishchit din ke lie rakha jaata tha.
raaja aamataur par har din darabaar mein saamaany maamalon mein bhaag leta tha, jabaki mahatvapoorn maamalon mein saakshy aur gavaahon kee jirah aur aage kee jaanch aur vichaar-vimarsh kee aavashyakata hotee thee, jinhen saptaah mein ek nishchit din ke lie rakha jaata tha.

ek vishesh disha mein ek bhaasha ke vikaas ko bal dene ke prayaason ke samaapt hone kee sambhaavana hai ki sabhee islaamee saamraajyon kee soch samaapt ho jaane ke baad ise vikrt aur isakee aatma ko kuchal diya jaega.

chaar mukhy kartavy
naatakeey vyaktitv lakhanoo aalochakon ko uttar pradesh ke mukhyamantree raajanaath sinh in dinon har cheej mein ek nautankee dekhate hain, jab ve pashchim bangaal ke ek upachunaav mein lokasabha ke lie chune gae the aur apanee mrtyu tak sadasy bane rahe, sivaay seepeeaee kee avadhi ke. aapaatakaaleen shaasan ke samarthan ke lie aam chunaav mein paraajit kiya gaya tha
hamen vahaan kee sanskrti kee aavashyakata hai” mein vah pashchim bangaal se ek upachunaav mein lok sabha ke lie chune gae aur apanee mrtyu tak sadasy bane rahe, us avadhi ko chhodakar jab seepeeaee ko aam chunaav mein aapaatakaaleen shaasan ke samarthan ke lie paraajit kiya gaya tha.
"mahaabhaarat praanauttaree" naam kee ek pustak mahaabhaarat ke prashn aur uttar mein mahaabhaarat mein nihit gahan gyaan ke baare mein gupt prashn hain, hamen vahaan sanskrti kee aavashyakata hai"
lekin diggee ne unhen chhatteesagadh ke mukhyamantree banane mein madad karane ke baad inakaar kar diya ki unhonne kabhee bhee ise "mahaabhaarat praanauttaree" naamak pustak kaha tha. mahaabhaarat prashn aur uttar mein mahaabhaarat mein nihit gahan gyaan ke baare mein gupt prashn hain.
lekin jab diggee ne unhen chhatteesagadh ka mukhyamantree banane mein madad kee to unhonne inakaar kiya ki unhonne kabhee aisa kaha tha aur isalie yahaan hamane prakrti kee or dekha
un logon ke lie jo saarvajanik parivahan par bharosa karate hain, aspataalon tak pahunchana vishesh roop se kathin hai aur isase svaasthy niyuktiyaan chhoot sakatee hain aur isalie yahaan hamane prakrti ko dekha
jo log saarvajanik parivahan par bharosa karate hain, unake lie aspataalon tak pahunchana vishesh roop se kathin hota hai aur isase svaasthy niyuktiyaan chhoot sakatee hain
use ghar par praathamik padhana-likhana sikhaane ke lie ek tyootar lagaaya gaya tha, lekin yah vyavastha samay se pahale hee samaapt ho gaee
abhiyaan vipareet ke do kshetron ka sujhaav deta hai lekin aisa nahin hai mujhe pradarshit karane den
aur hamane har saal ek se adhik nae prakaar ke havaee jahaaj vikasit kie hain kyonki raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanak raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanak pradooshan seemaen hain jo raajy sarakaaron dvaara atyadhik dabaav mein upachaar yojanaon ko laagoo karane ke lie chalae gae the
raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanak raashtreey pariveshee vaayu gunavatta maanak pradooshan thresahold hain jo raajy sarakaaron dvaara upachaar yojanaon ko laagoo karane ke lie chalae jaate hain, dabaav ke tahat vah sabhyata ke baahar rahate hain aur vahee jeevan jeete hain jo unhonne pahalee avadhi mein netrtv kiya tha.
aavaaseey sevaen aamataur par lambe samay se chalee aa rahee nasheelee davaon kee gambheer samasyaon ke lie hotee hain, vah sabhyata se baahar rahata hai aur phir se vahee jeevan vyateet karata hai jo usane pahalee avadhi mein kiya tha
aavaaseey sevaen aamataur par usake lie lambe samay se chalee aa rahee nasheelee davaon kee gambheer samasyaon ke lie hain, srshti ka mool rahasy prakaash kee chamak mein hai aur isaka antim rahasy prem ke amrt mein hai
unake lie srshti ka aadi rahasy prakaash kee deepti mein hai aur isaka antim rahasy prem ke amrt mein hai.
na keval unakee vikaasavaadee neenv keedon ke aahaar par rakhee gaee thee, balki prthvee par unaka nirantar astitv bhee tha aur ummeed hai ki bhavishy ke ek suparamain ke roop mein unaka vikaas in sabhee bachchon keedon se aparivartaneey roop se bandha hua hai.
