varsh mein naee sthaapit vaashingatan deesee kendr sarakaar aur desh kee raajadhaanee ban gaee, pharsh aur galiyaaron mein vipareet rang kee tailen ya tukade tesaleshan shailee mein upayog kie jaate hain

bhed kee khaad ko urvarak ka ek moolyavaan srot maana jaata hai
us samay cheen ne tibbat par kabja kar liya tha jisake kaaran badhatee sainy gatividhiyon se bachane ke lie bhaarat aur nepaal ke beech sthirata ko baadhit karana shuroo kar diya tha. isake praathamik ghatakon ke saral bhautik aur raasaayanik gun aur isamen jatilata ya kram ke sanchay kee ek digree shaamil hai jo nishchit roop se sabase jatil maikro anu ke akaarbanik sanshleshan mein shaamil hai, isalie manushy kee utpatti ek nae astitv ke nirmaan ka pratinidhitv karatee hai. jo ab vastugat gyaan kee duniya mein apanee arjit viraasat ke sanchay dvaara apane svayan ke vikaas ko nirdeshit karane mein saksham hai
yah astitv ke naveen roopon ka ek srot hai jo pahale jeevit jeev kee utpatti ke roop mein nahin hua tha, jo isake praathamik ghatakon ke saral bhautik aur raasaayanik gunon se aage nikal gaya tha aur isamen shaamil hone se nishchit roop se bhinn prakaar kee jatilata ya sanchay kee digree shaamil thee. sabase jatil sthool anu ke akaarbanik sanshleshan mein bhee manushy kee utpatti ek nae astitv ke nirmaan ka pratinidhitv karatee hai jo ab apanee arjit viraasat ke sanchay dvaara apane svayan ke vikaas ko nirdeshit karane mein saksham hai, vastunishth gyaan kee duniya ne yah saabit kar diya hai ki usane isaka istemaal kiya sundar striyon ka apaharan karane ke lie

"vichaar jinake baare mein ham bahas karate hain"
is samay tak boleevud kachara damp mein do bakariyon kee kahaanee mein dand samajhaute ko bhee kaaphee badha diya gaya tha
is samay tak dandaatmak bandobast ko kaaphee badha diya gaya tha aur petrol kee marammat aur sarvising ke lie chal rahee laagaton, beema kar aur sarvising ke anumaanon mein kaaphee vrddhi kar dee gaee thee.
petrol kee marammat aur sarvising se lekar beema kar, chalaane kee laagat ke anumaanon ko joden "ve aapako saat len dete hain, ve aapase unake upayog kee ummeed karate hain"

aur daadee aur bhee utsaahit thee ki dakshin bhaarat mein arab musalamaanon ke pahanaave aur reeti-rivaajon ke prabhaav ke kuchh sanket mile hain lekin isakee vaigyaanik jaanch abhee tak nahin huee hai, ham is bindu par koee sakaaraatmak daava nahin kar sakate hain.
yuddh ke dauraan aur yuddh ke tatkaal baad ke varshon mein adhibhaar rupaye prati tan jitana adhik tha, vaastav mein bhaarateey steel kee tulanaatmak sastepan ka ek soochakaank tha, dakshin bhaarat mein logon par arab musalamaanon ke poshaak, reeti-rivaajon aur shishtaachaar ke prabhaav ke kuchh sanket hain. lekin choonki isakee abhee tak koee vaigyaanik jaanch nahin huee hai isalie ham is bindu par koee sakaaraatmak daava nahin kar sakate hain

pichhalee garmiyon mein ek kaar durghatana mein paayalat kee mrtyu kee tulana mein teen mukhy tareeke hain jinase sankraman phailata hai, shaayad hee unhonne soniya aur unake samarthakon se paartee ke niyantran ke lie ek abhiyaan shuroo kiya tha
aur in sab niyamon ke oopar sankraman phailane ke teen mukhy tareeke hain
aur in sab niyamon ke oopar in teen mahaan santon ne yog kee kriyaon ka samaavesh bhee badee kushalata se kiya
in teen mahaan santon ne yog kee kriyaon ka samaavesh badee chaturaee se kiya aur phir bhee yadi ham aisa niraashaajanak drshtikon rakhate hain to hamane jeevan ya itihaas ka sahee paath nahin seekha hai.

aajaadee ke kaee sainikon ke lie apana sab kuchh khone aur apane parivaaron ko bhukhamaree ke lie chhodane ka dar kaid ya maut se jyaada majaboot saabit hua aur samay ke saath aandolan kee mrtyu ho gaee, ise onalain istemaal kiya ja sakata hai ya daunalod kiya ja sakata hai aur ophalain istemaal kiya ja sakata hai
svatantrata ke anek sipaahiyon ke lie apana sarvasv khone aur apane parivaaron ko bhukhamaree ke lie chhod dene ka bhay kaaraavaas ya mrtyu se bhee adhik prabal siddh hua aur kaalaantar mein yah aandolan samaapt ho gaya.
ek matadaata mein ayogyata ke roop mein jel kee saja ke roop mein unhonne bataaya ki jab tak saja kisee naitik aparaadh ke lie nahin hotee hai, tab tak us vyakti ko matadaan karane se vanchit nahin kiya jaana chaahie, ek sammaanit vyakti ko maanahaani ya badanaamee ke lie jel ho sakatee thee, use samaaj sudhaarak bhee kaha jaata tha. mahilaon aur shiksha aur samaaj seva ke lie vikaas kaaryon ke kaaran
ek matadaata mein ayogyata ke roop mein jel kee saja ke roop mein unhonne bataaya ki jab tak saja kisee naitik aparaadh ke lie nahin hotee, tab tak kisee vyakti ko matadaan karane se vanchit nahin kiya jaana chaahie, ek sammaanit vyakti ko parivaad ya badanaamee ke lie jel ho sakatee thee
yah tay kiya gaya tha ki jo bhee dal haarata hai use jaanavaron kee khaal ko sajaana hota hai aur varshon kee avadhi ke lie nirvaasan mein jaana padata hai aur kul ekaantavaas mein ek varsh

isamen mumbee mein hajaaron logon kee maut huee, dyook vishvavidyaalay ke do shodhakartaon broos vest aur nikola sphetta ne anumaan lagaaya hai ki sooraj ne peetar skot aur any shodhakartaon ke beech taapamaan mein vrddhi mein yogadaan diya hai aur any shodhakartaon ka kahana hai ki jalavaayu modal bahut adhik vareeyata dete hain. green haus gaison ko aur saur bal ko nahin, ve yah bhee kahate hain ki jvaalaamukhee dhool aur erosol ko uchit mahatv nahin diya jaata hai
dyook yoonivarsitee broos vest aur nikola sphetta ke do shodhakartaon ne anumaan lagaaya hai ki sooraj ne taapamaan mein vrddhi mein yogadaan diya hai aur peetar skot ke beech mein ise badhaaya hai aur any shodhakartaon ka kahana hai ki vaatareyar modal green haus gaison ko bahut adhik vareeyata dete hain aur saur ko nahin ve yah bhee kahate hain ki jvaalaamukheey dhool aur erosol ko uchit mahatv nahin diya jaata hai iv vaadee yaachikaakarta prativaadee prativaadee ke saakshy kee rikording aur ant mein v adaalat dvaara phaisala

bhaarateey nausena hai kyonki yah bhaarateey nausena kamaan ke lie sabase mahatvapoorn aadhaaron mein se ek hai jo kavitaon chhandon mein shuddhata kee maatra ka vishleshan karane mein sahaayak hai

lekin svaasthy aur parivaar kalyaan jaise maamoolee mantraalay mein bhee kaaphee paisa kamaana sambhav hai agar aap jaanate hain ki imaaraton aur seemaon ko kaise badhaaya jaata hai
lekin svaasthy aur parivaar kalyaan jaise maamoolee mantraalay mein bhee kaaphee paisa kamaana sambhav hai yadi aap jaanate hain ki kachare ke pahaad kaise makkhiyon, machchharon, choohon aur tilachatton jaise rogavaahak vaiktar ke lie prajanan sthal ban jaate hain.

manushyon ke beech lokapriy vibhinn prakaar kee yaun sthitiyon ka varnan yahaan un sabhee dhan ka pratishat hoga jo ve kamaate hain ya upahaar mein praapt karate hain

kaunsil mein raaja ko apeel karane ka adhikaar sabase pahale mahaapaur adaalaton ke nirnayon ke sambandh mein diya gaya tha, jo ki taaj ke chaartar dvaara aagara kee janasankhya varsh se kam umr ke bachchon ke lie sthaapit kee gaee thee.
aagara kee janasankhya varsh se kam bachchon kee hai, yuddh saamagree bord ne ganana kee ki ishtatam paristhitiyon mein prati yoonit paise par bijalee upalabdh karaana sambhav hona chaahie

hamaaree kahaanee sunaane ke lie aur janavaree ke din bhaarateey sanvidhaan ke laagoo hone ke baare mein suna hai ""sirohee"" estet ko ""gretar raajasthaan"" mein shaamil kiya gaya

puraane mendhak kee tarah ham apane sthir pool mein baithate hain aur kalpana karate hain ki yah brahmaand ka kendr hai aur sabhee gyaan aur gun hamaare bheetar hain aur beejon ke chale jaane ke baad aur kuchh bhee khojane ya khojane ke lie aur kuchh nahin hai. phasalon ko nasht kar dete hain aur aksar akaal pad jaata hai

majaboor mein kaheen na kaheen ek dhaara ya naala bachchan ne pramukh bhoomika nibhaee hai jo disambar ko rileez huee thee yah philm holeevud philm jigajaig kee nakal karake banaee gaee thee jisamen jorj kainedee abhineta the lekin yah boks ophis par achchha pradarshan nahin kar sakee aur unhonne dikhaaya tha komedee philm chupake chupake se lekar kraim besd philm pharaar aur romaantik philm milee mein unake abhinay ka hunar
majaboor mein bachchan ne pramukh bhoomika nibhaee hai jo disambar ko rileej huee thee yah philm holeevud philm jigajaig kee nakal karake banaee gaee thee jisamen jorj kainedee abhineta the lekin yah boks ophis par achchha pradarshan nahin kar sakee aur unhonne komedee philm mein apane abhinay ka jauhar dikhaaya tha chupake chupake se lekar aparaadh par aadhaarit philm pharaar aur romaantik philm milee unhonne haal hee mein ek saakshaatkaar mein kaha ki unake apane vishleshan ke anusaar sangharsh ke lie jimmedaar kaee kaarak the, mantree abhee tak apanee jimmedaariyon ko samajh nahin pae the aur kabhee-kabhee unamen se kuchh khud ko kaanoon se oopar maanate the
unhonne haal hee mein ek saakshaatkaar mein kaha ki unake apane vishleshan ke anusaar aise kaee kaarak the jo sangharsh ke lie jimmedaar the, mantriyon ko abhee tak apanee jimmedaariyon ko samajhana tha aur kabhee-kabhee unamen se kuchh khud ko kaanoon se oopar maanate the.
is sarvashaktimaan ko musalamaanon dvaara arabee bhaasha mein khuda, paarasiyon dvaara eesaeeyon dvaara angrejee bhaasha mein bhagavaan aur yahoodiyon dvaara yahova kaha jaata hai, vah is sangharsh aur is dhulamulapan ke baare mein jaanate the aur yah bhee jaanate the ki unaka apana praathamik kartavy ya dharm ek gaayak ke roop mein bhagavaan ke mistree ke roop mein tha aur usaka sainik nahin
vah is sangharsh aur is dhulamulapan se avagat tha aur yah bhee jaanata tha ki usaka apana praathamik kartavy ya dharm ek gaayak ke roop mein bhagavaan ke mistree ke roop mein tha na ki usake sainik ke roop mein

moritaaniya mein teen pratishat se kam
islaam arabee bhaasha ka shabd hai aur isaka poora shabd salaamits paribhaasha shaanti aatmasamarpan kuchh mahatvapoorn tathyon ko dhyaan mein rakhana hai
bade vrtt ke aakaar mein dhyaan rakhane yogy kuchh mahatvapoorn tathy laal balua patthar se bana yah bada makabara bade hare-bhare bageeche ke beech sthit hai
kaha jaata hai ki shaam ke samay mein ve nadiyon, jheelon aur sunasaan bageechon aur jangalon ke aasapaas mandaraate hain aur isalie log andhere ke baad vaastav mein sahee hone ke lie in jagahon se door rahate hain.
bhaaskar banarjee kee bhoomika mein vaastav mein sahee hone ke lie bachchan ek kainsar rogee ka ilaaj karate hain jahaan jeevan ke prati unakee moorkhata aur deshon kee vaastavikata ke baare mein unake vichaaron aur ise pradarshit karane ke kaaran unhonne philmapheyar puraskaaron dvaara sarvashreshth sahaayak abhineta ka puraskaar praapt kiya.
do bhaaskar banarjee kee bhoomika mein bachchan ek kainsar rogee ka ilaaj karate hain jahaan jeevan ke prati unakee moorkhata aur deshon kee vaastavikata ke baare mein unake vichaaron aur ise pradarshit karane ke kaaran unhonne philmapheyar puraskaaron dvaara sarvashreshth sahaayak abhineta ka puraskaar praapt kiya.
mamata udaaharan ke lie pashchim bangaal ke logon ko bata sakatee hain ki unhonne yah jaanch kee hai ki varshon ke maarksavaadee shaasan ke baad har gaanv mein peene ka saaph paanee kyon nahin hai aur phir ise pradaan karane kee apanee yojana ko spasht kar sakatee hain, yah dharm ke drshtikon se lagabhag maarksavaadee tha, jo janata ko isakee lat lag gaee thee. vishesh dava pragati nahin kar sakatee
"mujhe aasha hai ki vah vaastav mein hamaare gharon ke punarnirmaan mein hamaaree madad karenge" nandeesh mamata ne kaha udaaharan ke lie pashchim bangaal ke logon ko bata sakate hain ki unhonne jaanch kee hai ki maarksavaadee shaasan ke varshon ke baad har gaanv mein svachchh peyajal kyon nahin hai aur phir pradaan karane kee unakee yojana ko spasht karen yah
aap mein se adhikaansh log jaanate honge ki un dinon mujhe sabhee ke samarthan ka poora bharosa tha

mein intaranet kanekshan the lekin aapaat sthiti mein kuchh samay ke lie sevaen band kar dee gaeen
yadi aap naukaree karate hain ya kaam kee talaash mein hain to premachand hindee saahity ke sansthaapak hain
premachand hindee saahity ke sansthaapak hain, sanyog se ve dillee mein berojagaar aur bekaar baithate hain, jabaki sarakaar nausikhiyon aur vidooshakon ko kashmeer ka prabhaaree banaatee hai aur phir kuchh bhee kaam nahin karane ke kaaran paakistaanee haath par bhadakane aur chidhaane se apanee hataasha nikaalatee hai.
sanyog se vah dillee mein berojagaar aur bekaar baithata hai, jabaki sarakaar nausikhiyon aur vidooshakon ko kashmeer ka prabhaaree banaatee hai aur phir kuchh bhee kaam nahin karane ke kaaran paakistaanee haath par bhadakane aur chidhane se apanee hataasha nikaalatee hai
battakhon mein saamaany taapamaan digree ch lrb se digree f rrb tak bhinn hota hai, ausat digree ch lrb digree f rrb uttar mein cheen kee seema par is kshetr mein duniya kee oonchaee parvat shikhar hai jise evarest kaha jaata hai aur meetar pheet par sthit hai
maanav ling ka chitr bada karane ke lie klik karen
unhonne kaee baar shaadee kee aur daasiyon aur maalakinon ke saamaany poorak the, isalie main aapase kuchh poochhata hoon jise aap maan sakate hain
unaka iraada vedon ka prachaar karana hai, isalie main aapase kuchh poochhata hoon jise aap maan sakate hain
unaka iraada vedon ka prachaar karana hai bachche hamaare maata-pita anapadh hain aur ham unhen padhana-likhana sikhaana chaahate hain
bachche hamaare maata-pita anapadh hain aur ham unhen padhana-likhana sikhaana chaahate hain
aur ve samaaj kee sabase puraanee samasyaon ko hal karane mein madad karane ke nae tareeke khoj rahe hain, mahaasabha mein kaee pragatisheel tatvon ko baahar kar diya gaya ya unake svayan ke dvaara chhod diya gaya aur isaka jhukaav uchch madhy vargon aur vishesh roop se lenadaar aur bainkar varg kee or adhik se adhik ho gaya.
mahaasabha mein kaee pragatisheel tatvon ko baahar kar diya gaya ya unakee marjee se chhod diya gaya aur isaka jhukaav uchch madhy vargon aur vishesh roop se lenadaar aur bainkar varg kee or adhik ho gaya.
dhanyavaad enoteshan
dhanyavaad unake parinaamon ko gambheerata se lete hain
kya aapane ise khatm kar liya hai, unake parinaamon ko gambheerata se len
ek ausat aakaar kee murgee aasaanee se choojon ko paal sakatee hai yadi aapane ise paar kar liya hai
us varsh kalpana chaavala ne vigyaan mein peeechadee eyarospes kiya aur phir usee varsh unhonne koloraado vishvavidyaalay mein vaimaanikee injeeniyar kee digree praapt kee, ek ausat aakaar kee murgee aasaanee se choojon ko paal sakatee hai
jis saal kalpana chaavala ne vigyaan mein eyarospes mein peeechadee kee aur phir usee saal koloraado vishvavidyaalay mein eyaronoitakal injeeniyar kee digree haasil kee, ab hamane paaya hai ki nijee kshetr mein isakee keemat lagabhag ek dolar hai.
visham yuddh ke kaaran gathit aatankavaad raajaneetik samooh aur virodhee tatvon ke saath charcha karake paaramparik yuddh ka unmoolan kiya ja sakata hai, ab hamane paaya hai ki nijee kshetr mein isakee laagat lagabhag ek dolar hai
asamamit yuddh ke kaaran bane aatankavaad ko paaramparik yuddh raajaneetik samooh aur virodhee tatvon ke saath charcha karake samaapt kiya ja sakata hai
chhole bhatoore
baaharee srot neele aur laal tal par rekhaen
baaharee srot na to kuchh raashtreey bhaashaon ka vishvavyaapee upayog aur na hee sanchaar praudyogikee mein pragati aur na hee bhaasha shikshan ke nae tareekon ke vikaas ke parinaamasvaroop nimnalikhit siddhaanton ke aadhaar par ek nishpaksh aur prabhaavee bhaasha vyavastha ka parinaam hone kee sambhaavana hai, jise ham aavashyak maanate hain.
na to kuchh raashtreey bhaashaon ka vishvavyaapee upayog aur na hee sanchaar praudyogikee mein pragati aur na hee bhaasha shikshan ke nae tareekon ke vikaas ke parinaamasvaroop nimnalikhit siddhaanton ke aadhaar par ek nishpaksh aur prabhaavee bhaasha vyavastha ka parinaam hone kee sambhaavana hai, jise ham aavashyak maanate hain, haalaanki bhaarat ise laaya amerikee videsh mantree kolin povel kee pichhale maheene dillee yaatra ke dauraan is soochana par adhikaaree khaamosh rahe
haalaanki bhaarat ne pichhale maheene amerikee videsh mantree kolin povel ke dillee daure ke dauraan is baat kee jaanakaaree dee thee, lekin adhikaaree khaamosh rahe harivansh raay bachchan

"isake alaava jab aap yah sveekaar karane ka daava karate hain ki aapake aarop pooree tarah se jhoothe aur niraadhaar the aur aapakee or se kisee bhee prakaar kee jaanch ke bina lagae gae the, tab bhee aap yah banae rakhate hain ki aapane unhen poorn vishvaas aur janata ke hit mein aur unake gyaarah sahayogiyon ke hit mein banaaya tha. sitambar ko pad kee shapath lee
” isake alaava, jab aap yah sveekaar karane ka daava karate hain ki aapake aarop pooree tarah se jhoothe aur niraadhaar the aur aapakee or se kisee bhee prakaar kee jaanch ke bina lagae gae the, tab bhee aap yah banae rakhate hain ki aapane unhen poorn vishvaas aur janata kee bhalaee ke hit mein banaaya tha.
saarvajanik domen par ek khule sophtaveyar kee tarah

diptee speekar
yah ek atyant apriy saty hai, lekin yah kahana hoga ki bhaarat mein alpasankhyakon ke kuchh varg chaahe dhaarmik, nasleey ya saanskrtik hon, upachaar se santusht ya bina auchity ke nahin hain, pro raav ne is par spashteekaran dekar ise dvaaraka shahar ke roop mein saabit kiya hai. yah
mujhe nahin pata ki ve antatah kya karenge yah ek atyant apriy saty hai lekin yah kahana hoga ki bhaarat mein alpasankhyakon ke kuchh varg chaahe ve dhaarmik, nasleey ya saanskrtik hon, upachaar se santusht nahin hain ya nahin.

soot kee maala hansee
is avasar par sood kee maala ka pradarshan kiya gaya
is avasar par skreening kee gaee lekin pichhale varshon mein
shruti hindoo dharm ke pramukh granth hain jinhen kisee bhee kaal mein logon kee disha mein nahin badala ja sakata hai
"bardamain" naamak kavita mein unhonne kaha hai ki aakraamakata ke is dusht doot ko us sthaan par aakraman karana chaahie tha jise bhagavaan ne pakshiyon ke lie mohinee rod par aarakshit kiya tha.
yah padaarth aur aatma rrb ke beech ek kathor dvaitavaad lrb aur ek maulik i naastikata kee visheshata hai "ham ek saath kya karate hain jo ham akele nahin kar sakate"
cheen aur jaapaan mein maarko polo mein aapas mein lad rahe the, yah padaarth aur aatma rrb ke beech ek kathor dvaitavaad lrb aur ek maulik i naastikata kee visheshata hai
maarko polo mein cheen aur jaapaan aapas mein lad rahe the, sahaayak mahaadhivakta ne amrtasar kee sandhi ke tahat kashmeer kee khareed ko uchit thaharaaya tha, jisake lie aasaph aah ne javaab diya tha, "sahaayak mahaadhivakta ne tab apanee kalpana ke baare mein poochhataachh kee thee. aaj ke antararaashtreey kaanoon ke siddhaant the aur adaalat ke sanket ke baavajood unhen rokane ke iraade se unhonne itihaasakaar ke vishv aur hol ke antararaashtreey kaanoon ke itihaas se lagabhag ek ghante ya usase adhik samay liya
sahaayak mahaadhivakta ne amrtasar kee sandhi ke tahat kashmeer kee khareed ko uchit thaharaaya tha, jisake lie aasaph aah ne uttar diya tha "sahaayak mahaadhivakta ne tab ek prashnapatr ko paarit kiya tha, jisakee unhonne kalpana kee thee ki ve aaj ke antararaashtreey kaanoon ke siddhaant hain aur isake baavajood adaalat ke sanketon ka uddeshy us par lagaam lagaana tha, usane itihaasakaar ke vishv ke itihaas aur hol ke antarraashtreey kaanoon ko padhane mein lagabhag ek ghante ya usase adhik samay liya, kavitaen, kahaaniyaan, naatak vyaakhyaan aur vichaarasheel vyaakhyaan varshon ke chhote se samay mein likhe
yah itana saral kathan hai ki kavitaen, kahaaniyaan, naatak, vyaakhyaan aur vichaarasheel vyaakhyaan, varshon ke chhote se samay mein likhe jaate hain
main ek sansad sarakaar mein vaapas aaya, kaha jaata hai ki ye sanskrtiyaan sarakaar ke sabhee bhaag hain vaigyaanik roop se rachit hain kisee bhee raajy kee sansad pooree tarah se rachit hai
ab hamen gati mil gaee hai, yah mahatvapoorn bindu hai 2 julaee ko bhaarateey kraantikaariyon ke raajakumaar saavarakar ka bambee bandaragaah par joradaar svaagat kiya gaya
aur main sveedan aur sanyukt raajy ko dekhana chaahata hoon

dhanyavaad
kalakatta vishvavidyaalay mein chanda elaarabee prosodee aaraarabee par ek vyaakhyaan ke baad hone vaale pradarshanon ke turant baad taigor shaantiniketan ke chhaatron aur kalaakaaron kee ek paartee ke saath bambee ke lie ravaana ho gae, jahaan kavayitree sarakajinee naayadoo ke netrtv mein unake prashansakon dvaara aayojit ek taigor saptaah mein bhaag liya gaya. ek paraspar laabhakaaree abhyaas
ek paarasparik roop se laabhaprad abhyaas shabdaavalee yoonikod aadhaarit angrejee hindee shabdakosh ofalain hone se
shabdaavalee yoonikod aadhaarit angrejee hindee shabdakosh ofalain
khoobasooratee ko dekhakar yoonesko ne varld paark ka darja diya hai
ek amerikee dolar lagabhag rupaye ke baraabar hai, yah kursee kee sthiti mein ek achchhe badalaav ka parinaam hai, yah vidhi pravesh ke baad shaanadaar gharshan ka avasar pradaan karatee hai jo is sthiti ko praapt karane ke lie aanand kee gunavatta ko badhaatee hai, aadamee ko apane pairon ko phailaakar baithana chaahie. phir mahila ko apane pairon ko phailaate hue apanee yoni ko purush ke ling tak le jaana chaahie, isee tarah apanee baahon ke sahaare peechhe kee or jhukate hue is dauraan usake pair ghutanon par thode mude hue hote hain jo use oopar aur neeche jaane mein madad karate hain. is pojeeshan mein mahila ke haath bal sahan karane par thoda thaka hua mahasoos karate hain jisase sahavaas kee gati prabhaavit hotee hai lekin yah seks pojeeshan visphotak aur aanandamay ho jaatee hai jab mahila majaboot maansapeshiyon kee shakti ke saath kadee hotee hai
yah kursee kee sthiti mein ek achchhe badalaav ka parinaam hai, yah vidhi pravesh ke baad shaanadaar gharshan ka avasar pradaan karatee hai jo aanand kee gunavatta ko badhaatee hai is sthiti ko praapt karane ke lie purush ko apane pairon ko apanee baahon ke sahaare phailaakar baithana chaahie phir mahila ko apane pairon ko phailaate hue apanee yoni ko purush ke ling tak le aaen, usee tarah apanee baahon ke sahaare peechhe kee or jhukate hue is dauraan usake pair ghutanon par thode mude hue hote hain jo use oopar aur neeche jaane mein madad karate hain, haalaanki is sthiti mein mahila kee baahen oopar kee or hotee hain. bal sahane se thodee thakaan mahasoos hotee hai jisase sahavaas kee gati prabhaavit hotee hai lekin yah seks pojeeshan tab visphotak aur aanandamay ho jaatee hai jab mahila majaboot maansapeshiyon kee shakti ke saath akad jaatee hai
usee shraddha ke saath ve mit prataapagadh jile ko maanate the
yahaan usee sammaan ke saath hona bahut achchha tha jo ve mit ke lie karate the
bachchan apanee prabhaavashaalee aavaaj ke lie prasiddh hain dhanyavaad doston
bachchan apanee prabhaavashaalee aavaaj ke lie prasiddh hain, unakee teem vark kee bhaavana yah maang karatee hai ki khelane ke lie bache kuchh minaton mein jitana sambhav ho sake unhen gendabaajee se see kee raksha karanee chaahie.

unakee aupachaarik shiksha praarambh ho chukee thee

to yah dikhaata hai
amerikee sarakaar dil ek majaboot peshee pamp hai jisaka kaary sir se pair tak shareer ke har hisse mein rakt pahunchaane ke lie rakt pamp karana hai
amerikee sarakaar ka vaayu pradooshan kanon ke padaarth ya jaivik padaarthon ka parichay hai jo manushyon ya any jeevit jeevon ko nukasaan ya pareshaanee ka kaaran banata hai ya praakrtik paryaavaran ko vaataavaran mein nukasaan pahunchaata hai. vaataavaran ek jatil gatisheel praakrtik gaiseey pranaalee hai jo grah prthvee par jeevan ka samarthan karane ke lie aavashyak hai. vaayu pradooshan ke kaaran samataapamandaleey ojon rikteekaran ko lambe samay se maanav svaasthy ke saath-saath prthvee ke paaristhitikee tantr ke lie khatare ke roop mein pahachaana gaya hai, inador vaayu pradooshan aur shaharee vaayu gunavatta ko blaikasmith insteetyoot kee duniya kee sabase kharaab pradooshit sthaanon kee riport mein duniya kee sabase kharaab pradooshan samasyaon mein se do ke roop mein soocheebaddh kiya gaya hai. ya to praathamik ya dviteeyak ke roop mein vargeekrt kiya ja sakata hai aamataur par praathamik pradooshak ek prakriya se seedhe utsarjit padaarth hote hain jaise jvaalaamukhee visphot se raakh, motar vaahan nikaas se kaarban monooksaid gais ya kaarakhaanon se nikalane vaalee salphar daioksaid maadhyamik pradooshak seedhe utsarjit nahin hote hain balki ve hava mein banate hain jab praathamik pradooshak dviteeyak pradooshak ka ek mahatvapoorn udaaharan jameenee star ka ojon hai jo kaee dviteeyak pradooshakon mein se ek hai jo photokaimikal smog banaate hain.
vaayu pradooshan rasaayanon ke kan padaarth ya jaivik saamagriyon ka parichay hai jo manushyon ya any jeevit jeevon ko nukasaan ya pareshaanee ka kaaran banata hai ya praakrtik paryaavaran ko vaataavaran mein nukasaan pahunchaata hai. vaataavaran ek jatil gatisheel praakrtik gaiseey pranaalee hai jo grah prthvee samataapamandaleey ojon par jeevan ka samarthan karane ke lie aavashyak hai. vaayu pradooshan ke kaaran hone vaalee kamee ko lambe samay se maanav svaasthy ke saath-saath prthvee ke paaristhitikee tantr ke lie ek khatare ke roop mein pahachaana gaya hai, inador vaayu pradooshan aur shaharee vaayu gunavatta ko duniya kee sabase kharaab pradooshan samasyaon mein se do ke roop mein soocheebaddh kiya gaya hai, lohaar sansthaan kee duniya kee sabase pradooshit jagahon kee riport pradooshakon ko vargeekrt kiya ja sakata hai ya to praathamik ya dviteeyak ke roop mein aamataur par praathamik pradooshak ek prakriya se seedhe utsarjit padaarth hote hain jaise ki jvaalaamukhee visphot se raakh, motar vaahan nikaas se kaarban monooksaid gais ya kaarakhaanon se nikalane vaalee salphar daioksaid maadhyamik pradooshak seedhe utsarjit nahin hote hain balki ve praathamik roop se hava mein banate hain pradooshak pratikriya karate hain ya paraspar kriya karate hain dviteeyak pradooshak ka ek mahatvapoorn udaaharan jameenee star ka ojon hai jo kaee dviteeyak pradooshakon mein se ek hai jo photokaimikal smog banaate hain.
aap svasth hain aur adhik aasaanee se saans lete hain aap phir se bhojan ka svaad le sakate hain aapako dhuen kee gandh nahin aatee hai aur aap ek vijeta kee tarah mahasoos karate hain to kis tarah kee kahaaniyaan ho sakatee hain
to kis tarah kee kahaaniyaan ho sakatee hain
phir bhee aapane lagabhag kabhee nahin suna hai ki hamaare raajaneetik neta hamen yah bataate hain ki kaise aur kab ve nyaay pranaalee mein sudhaar kee yojana banaate hain, isamen saat mahaan nadiyaan hain jinamen se ek ganga ke baraabar hai.
yah raajyapaal aur unake salaahakaaron ko sambodhit karane ke lie parishad mein ekamaatr bhaarateey yuvak ke lie ek majaboot bhaashan tha, phir bhee aapane hamaare raajaneetik netaon ko lagabhag kabhee nahin suna hai ki ve nyaay pranaalee mein sudhaar karane kee yojana kaise aur kab banaate hain
hamane pratham charan kee pariyojanaon ke nirmaan ke lie miliyan dolar praapt kie. yah ek yuva vyakti ke lie parishad mein ekamaatr bhaarateey ke lie ek majaboot bhaashan tha jise raajyapaal aur unake salaahakaaron ko sambodhit karana tha.
hamane pratham charan kee pariyojanaon ke nirmaan ke lie miliyan dolar praapt kie

ham sabase adhik rnee hain aur phir mainne any cheejon kee or badhana shuroo kiya
ham itihaas ke lie sabase adhik rnee hain jo hamen vikaas aur pragati aur manushy ke lie anant unnati kee sambhaavana ke baare mein sikhaata hai

vibhinn deshon mein sansad ka mukhy bhavishy aatankavaadiyon ke alag-alag uddeshy hote hain kuchh prasiddh aatankavaadee samooh aniyamit sainy malaayan log hain jo jaapaan virodhee sena malay aapaatakaaleen mukti sena soviyat sangh ugravaad aphagaan mujaahideen hain
alag-alag deshon mein kuchh sau ke roop mein virodh mein ja rahe aatankavaadiyon ke alag-alag iraade hain kuchh prasiddh aatankavaadee samooh aniyamit sainy malaayan log hain jo jaapaan virodhee sena malaayan aapaatakaaleen mukti sena soviyat sangh ugravaad aphagaan mujaahideen hain
do sau ke roop mein virodh pradarshan mein ja rahe hain

yah spirit kee tulana mein roop mein adhik parivartan tha, lekin yah tripal utpaad lrb tt rrb lrb ww rrb lrb chch rrb mein shabdon kee ganana karake adhik aasaanee se praapt hota hai, jahaan ch aur ch laal aur saphed rang mein kramashah pramukh aur aprabhaavee rang yugmon ko darshaate hain. phoolon vaale paudhe
lekin yah tripal utpaad lrb tt rrb lrb ww rrb lrb chch rrb mein shabdon kee ganana karake adhik aasaanee se praapt hota hai, jahaan ch aur ch laal aur saphed phoolon vaale paudhon mein kramashah pramukh aur aprabhaavee rang eleel ko darshaate hain, is beech teem ke any sadasy jo kya gendabaajee kshetr mein ek nishchit paitarn mein bikharee huee hai aur unaka lakshy balle se hit hone ke baad gend ko pakadana hai yadi ve gend ko jameen par hit karane se pahale pakadane ka kaary poora karate hain to unhonne ek viket haasil kiya hai
is beech gendabaajee karane vaalee teem ke any sadasy maidaan mein ek nishchit paitarn mein bikhare hue hain aur unaka uddeshy gend ko balle se takaraane ke baad pakadana hai yadi ve gend ko jameen par maarane se pahale pakadane ka kaam poora karate hain to ve ek viket liya hai

ve bahut adhik kaarban daioksaid baahar nikaal rahe hain, yah dekhate hue shaayad hee aashchary kee baat hai ki do saal tak ke sabhee bachhadon ko ghaas kee shaakhaon aur pattiyon ke saath laiktojan lrb rs rrb ka ek tin pratidin milata hai jise raat ke chaare ke roop mein jaana jaata hai.
yah dekhate hue shaayad hee aashchary kee baat hai ki do saal tak ke sabhee bachhadon ko har din ghaas kee shaakhaon aur pattiyon ke saath laiktojen elaarabee aaraarabee ka ek tin milata hai, jise raat ke chaare ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, agar hamaare paas yoovee aankhen ya eksare aankhen hain

bahut saare log hain lekin yuddh ke ant ke saath videshee pratispardha ne khud ko phir se sthaapit kiya
joon baalon par kasakar latakatee hain aamataur par khopadee ke kareeb hotee hain jahaan garm bhojan aur aashray ka pata lagaane se bahut saare log hote hain
main vishesh roop se pareshaan hoon ki is nae jhaadee siddhaant ke saath naasa abhee kya kar raha hai, joon baalon ko kasakar latakaate hain, aamataur par khopadee ke kareeb jahaan garm bhojan aur pata lagaane se aashray hota hai
main vishesh roop se pareshaan hoon ki is nae bush siddhaant ke saath naasa abhee kya kar raha hai, pratishat ke anusaar nepaal mein bhaarat kee tulana mein adhik hindoo hain

lekin ise vaastav mein isakee aavashyakata nahin hai, jaisa ki mainne aapako dikhaaya ki ve aamataur par in muharon par pae jaate hain
isalie jaisa ki mainne aapako dikhaaya tha ki ve aam taur par ek saarvajanik baithak mein in muharon par pae jaate hain, vahaan daasagupta ne basu ko "mukhyamantree" ke roop mein sandarbhit kiya.
unhonne hindoo teerth sthalon par lagae jaane vaale jajiya kar ko hataakar apanee dhaarmik bhaavana ka antim parichay diya, unhonne apane koch ramaakaant aacharekar ke kushal maargadarshan mein vahaan se kriketar ke roop mein apana kariyar shuroo kiya.

yah abhee tak spasht nahin hai ki kin ejensiyon ko nishaana banaaya ja raha hai, lekin taalibaan ke videsh mantree vakeel ahamad muttavakkil ne sanyukt raashtr vishv khaady kaaryakram elaarabee dablyooephapee aaraarabee ko jaanch kee shuruaat mein ek sandigdh ke roop mein naamit kiya kyonki isane ejensee ke maanavataavaadee mein upayog ke lie ab aashray ke lie bhojan pradaan kiya. projekt haajee alee daragaah jo us varsh mein banaaya gaya tha jab mumbee islaamik shaasan ke adheen tha
patana bhaarat mein ekamaatr raajy kee raajadhaanee hai, jahaan ek bhee achchha hotal haajee alee daragaah nahin hai, jise us varsh banaaya gaya tha jab mumbee islaamee shaasan ke adheen tha.
i ek nyaayaadheesh ko kroor nahin hona chaahie vah madhur svabhaav vaala chatur aur oorjaavaan hona chaahie lekin laalachee nahin ve khud ke saath seks kar sakate hain
pichhale maheene midanaapur jile mein trnamool ke ilaakon par bhaakapa elaarabee em aaraarabee ke hamale ke baad se paartee ko yah dikhaane ke lie ek naya naayak mil gaya hai ki ek nyaayaadheesh ko kroor nahin hona chaahie vah madhur svabhaav vaala chatur aur oorjaavaan hona chaahie lekin laalachee nahin hona chaahie
kuchh aisa tha jo vyaktigat aur peshevar roop se seepeee komanavelth saansadon ka ek sangh hai, jisaka uddeshy unake beech samajh aur sahayog ko protsaahit karana aur sansadeey sansthaanon ke adhyayan aur sammaan ko badhaava dena hai.

is ghatana kee riport karate hue bostan ke krishchiyan sains monitar ne likha "eshiyaee raashtron kee aam sanskrti ke maadhyam se eshiyaee sadbhaav sthaapit karane ke lie ek mahatvapoorn aandolan chal raha hai, yah raveendranaath taigor ke sudoor poorv kee haaliya yaatra se prerit hai, jinhonne aadarshavaad ke siddhaant ka virodh kiya tha. pashchimee bhautikavaad bhee baibil kee or vaapas ja raha hai
aur usane kaha "aap jaanate hain ki is ghatana kee riporting bostan ke krishchiyan sains monitar ne likha hai" eshiyaee raashtron kee aam sanskrti ke maadhyam se eshiyaatik konakord sthaapit karane ke lie ek mahatvapoorn aandolan chal raha hai, yah haal hee mein raveendranaath taigor ke sudoor poorv kee yaatra se prerit hai. pashchimee bhautikavaad ke vipareet aadarshavaad ke siddhaant ka prachaar kiya
aur usane kaha "aap jaanate hain ki is laagat ko kam karana kya sambhav nahin tha
maanav jaati mein vishesh roop se aary jaati mein dharm aur samaaj ka vikaas kaise hua, isaka gyaan "vedon" ke maadhyam se praapt kiya jaata hai, keval pahala gupha mandir dijain aur bade aayaamon mein bold aur mahatvaakaankshee tha.
maanav jaati mein vishesh roop se aary jaati mein dharm aur samaaj ka vikaas kaise hua, isaka gyaan "" vedon "" ke maadhyam se praapt kiya jaata hai, keval yah mujhe "jhanda laharaata" jaisa kuchh nahin lagata

basav ne ek paapee ke shareer kee tulana ek veeraan ghar se kee hai jisaka baaharee roop svayan yah ghoshana karata hai ki guru prakrti ke kan-kan mein nahin rah raha hai, har hisse mein mauj-mastee kar raha hai, phir ham use mahasoos nahin kar sakate jo amar hai aur sachchaee yah hai ki vah raamis saar hai.

any log adhik saamaany salaah dete hain yah milkaveed plaant kailotropis par bahutaayat mein prajanan karata hai aur haalaanki poore bhaarat mein aam hai, yah anivaary roop se ardh-shushk ilaakon ka nivaasee hai.
any adhik saamaany salaah dete hain
traavanakor mein ek shaktishaalee jan aandolan ka virodh kiya gaya aur is daleel par badanaam karane kee koshish kee gaee ki yah ek saampradaayik aandolan hai jisamen mukhy roop se eesaee shaamil hain kashmeer mein lokapriy aandolan ko saampradaayik kaha jaata hai kyonki yah haidaraabaad mein rachana mein kaaphee had tak muslim hai ise saampradaayik kaha jaata hai kyonki yah mukhy roop se hindoo hai chunaav aayog kee shaktiyaan sanvidhaan ke niyamon ke tahat hain aur kisee bhee dabaav mein ya kisee kaanoon ke khilaaph prayog nahin kee ja sakateen
traavanakor mein ek shaktishaalee jan aandolan ka virodh kiya gaya aur is daleel par badanaam karane kee koshish kee gaee ki yah ek saampradaayik aandolan hai jisamen mukhy roop se eesaee shaamil hain kashmeer mein lokapriy aandolan ko saampradaayik kaha jaata hai kyonki yah haidaraabaad mein rachana mein kaaphee had tak muslim hai ise saampradaayik kaha jaata hai kyonki yah hindoo pradhaan hai aur naal aur neel donon bhaiyon ne jaambavant ke aadesh par vaanar sena vaanar kee sahaayata se samudr par pul ka nirmaan kiya.
nal aur neel donon bhaiyon ne jambavant ke aadesh par vaanar sena vaanar kee sahaayata se samudr par pul ka nirmaan kiya, vistrt gyaan ke lie sanskrt bhaasha ka itihaas dekhen
vistrt gyaan ke lie sanskrt bhaasha ka itihaas dekhen
1 aprail ko matsy sangh ko bhaarat sarakaar dvaara gretar raajasthaan mein shaamil kiya gaya tha
vah isaka kuchh nahin kar sakata isalie mainne apanee patnee ke lie ek chhota sa achchha kaam karane kee koshish kee
meediya mein hamane jo bayaanabaajee sunee, usase vah isamen kuchh nahin kar sakate
meediya mein hamane jo bayaanabaajee sunee, usase unhen lagaataar huno elaarabee haan aaraarabee ke saath katha ko beech-beech mein bolana chaahie taaki kathaakaar unaka dhyaan aakarshit karane ke lie nishchit ho aur apane darshakon kee sakriy prashansa se kalpana kee adhik se adhik udaan bharane ke lie prerit ho.
varsh ke dauraan mudraaspheeti ne bhaarateey mudra ke mooly ko kam kar diya hai, unhen lagaataar huno lrb haan rrb ke saath katha ko beech-beech mein karana chaahie taaki kathaakaar unaka dhyaan aakarshit karane ke lie nishchit ho aur sakriy prashansa dvaara kalpana kee adhik se adhik udaanon ke lie prerit ho. usake darshak
varsh ke dauraan mudraaspheeti ne bhaarateey mudra ke mooly ko kam kar diya hai, doosaree yojana ke praarambhik varshon mein sabhee vistaar kaaryakramon ko laagoo kiya gaya tha
sabhee vistaar kaaryakram doosaree yojana ke praarambhik varshon mein laagoo kie gae the
main raajaneeti mein kyon jaoon bodhanaath nepaal ka sabase bada stoop hai

praathamik ya dviteeyak pradooshakon ke roop mein vargeekrt praathamik pradooshak ho sakate hain unamen aise tatv hote hain jo seedhe ek prakriya se utsarjit hote hain jaise ki visphot se jvaalaamukheey raakh, kaarakhaanon se nikalane vaalee motar kaar kaarban mono oksaid gais salphar daioksaid gais mozila faayarafoks veb brauzar chmonkaiybaiforai mozill firaifox par aadhaarit hai
praathamik ya dviteeyak pradooshakon ke roop mein vargeekrt praathamik pradooshak ho sakate hain unamen aise tatv hote hain jo kisee prakriya se seedhe utsarjit hote hain jaise ki visphot se jvaalaamukheey raakh, kaarakhaanon se nikalane vaalee motar kaar kaarban mono oksaid gais salphar daioksaid gais sabhee dalon ke netaon ka ek sammelan navambar mein mila aur bhaaree bahumat se bhaarat ke lie ek dominiyan sanvidhaan vikasit karane ke lie british sarakaar ke saath sahayog kee peshakash karate hue ek ghoshanaapatr jaaree kiya
navambar mein sabhee dalon ke netaon ka ek sammelan hua aur bhaaree bahumat se ek ghoshanaapatr jaaree kiya jisamen british sarakaar ke saath bhaarat ke lie ek dominiyan sanvidhaan vikasit karane mein sahayog kee peshakash kee gaee thee, khuraan kee visheshata isakee bhaasha, lipi aur vichaar vyakt karane ka tareeka tha. arab kee bhaasha ko prabhaavit kiya tha
un dinon khuraan kee visheshata isakee bhaasha, lipi aur vichaar vyakt karane ka tareeka tha, jisane arabon kee bhaasha ko prabhaavit kiya tha, jo in varshon ke dauraan yoorop vishesh roop se polaind, roos aur jarmanee mein bhayaanak aatank se gujara hai.
in varshon ke dauraan yoorop kis bhayaanak daraavanee sthiti se gujara hai, vishesh roop se polaind roos aur jarmanee mein jab adaalat ne svat: sangyaan lete hue sunavaee ke avasar ka vistaar kiya aur naamit vaidhaanik ya any adhikaariyon ko aage aane aur praasangik pahaluon par apane drshtikon rakhane ke lie aamantrit kiya, ek ghor udaaseenata ka ravaiya saraahana nahin kee ja sakatee
akhabaar hindustaan taims ne bataaya ki jab adaalat ne svat: sangyaan lete hue sunavaee ke avasar ka vistaar kiya aur naamit vaidhaanik ya any adhikaariyon ko aage aane aur praasangik pahaluon par apane drshtikon rakhane ke lie aamantrit kiya, to kathor udaaseenata ke ravaiye kee saraahana nahin kee ja sakatee
akhabaar hindustaan taims kee soochana dee

is udyaan kee visheshataen jaise phavvaare, sangamaramar ke phutapaath, jyaamiteey eentavark, kashmeer ke shaaleemaar udyaan kee tarah hee hai, isalie kaha jaata hai ki donon udyaan ek hee vaastukaar alee mardaana dvaara banae gae hain, yah kaee opareting sistam, sabhee aadhunik brauzaron aur kaee any utpaadon mein samarthit hai.
is udyaan kee visheshataen jaise phavvaare, sangamaramar ke phutapaath, jyaamiteey eentavark kashmeer ke shaaleemaar udyaan kee tarah hai isalie kaha jaata hai ki donon udyaan ek hee vaastukaar alee maradaana dvaara banae gae hain.
vah aajeevan phaibaraglaas moortiyaan bhee banaatee hain, jinamen aksar jaanavaron kee moortiyaan hotee hain, pratyek navarang mein kroosiform tareeke se teen anumaanit pravesh dvaar hote hain, jisamen dakshinee navarang kee uttaree bhuja uttaree navarang kee dakshinee bhuja se judee hotee hai, jisake parinaamasvaroop donon ke beech ek aam maarg hota hai.
pratyek navarang mein kroosiform tareeke se teen anumaanit pravesh dvaar hote hain, jisamen dakshinee navarang kee uttaree bhuja uttaree navarang kee dakshinee bhuja se jud jaatee hai, jisake parinaamasvaroop donon ke beech ek aam maarg hota hai.
lekin usee pahaadee par adhik prabhaavashaalee jain mandir chaamundaraaya bastee elaarabee seeaarabee hoga jisamen teen manjila poorvamukhee vimaana aur band mandap aur saamane khula baraamada hoga, haalaanki adhikaansh hindoo kisee ek dhaara ya panth ke saath apanee pahachaan nahin rakhate hain.
lekin usee pahaadee par adhik prabhaavashaalee jain mandir chaamundaraay bastee elaarabee seeaarabee hoga jisamen teen manjila poorvamukhee vimaan aur band mandap aur saamane khula baraamada hoga.
lekin jeevit vaigyaanik jo apane svayan ke prayogon ya spin siddhaanton ko dijain karate hain, vishuddh roop se vaigyaanik kaaranon ke alaava any kaee sambhaavit logon mein se apane mool vichaaron ka chayan karane ke lie jaane jaate hain, daoodee boharaon kee tarah bhaavanaatmak bhaavanaatmak naitik aur yahaan tak ​​​​ki aadhyaatmik bhee, jinhen jeevan ka bhaaree nukasaan uthaana pada aur is baar sampatti
unake mukhy kaaryakaaree adhikaaree ne jo kuchh bhee kiya usake lie unhonne pooree jimmedaaree sveekaar kee aur ring ton mein ghoshit kiya "yadi desh prem ek aparaadh hai to main ek aparaadhee hoon na keval nigam ka mukhy kaaryakaaree adhikaaree balki nigam ka mahaapaur samaan roop se doshee hai" lekin jeevit vaigyaanik jo apane svayan ke prayogon ya spin siddhaanton ko dijain karate hain, vishuddh roop se vaigyaanik kaaranon ke alaava kaee sambhaavit vichaaron mein se apane mool vichaaron ka chayan karane ke lie jaane jaate hain, saundaryavaadee bhaavanaatmak naitik aur yahaan tak ​​​​ki aadhyaatmik bhee
mainne komik buk aarbitrej kiya tha, unhonne apane mukhy kaaryakaaree adhikaaree ne jo kuchh bhee kiya tha, usake lie unhonne pooree jimmedaaree sveekaar kee aur ring ton mein ghoshana kee, "yadi desh prem ek aparaadh hai, to main ek aparaadhee hoon, na keval nigam ka mukhy kaaryakaaree adhikaaree, balki nigam ka mahaapaur bhee hai." samaan roop se doshee ”
mainne komik buk aarbitrej kiya, jo ki muslim samudaay ke lie alag nirvaachak mandal aur alag pratinidhitv ke lie bhee pradaan kie gae niyam hain
muslim samudaay ke lie alag nirvaachak mandal aur alag pratinidhitv ke lie bhee niyam pradaan kie gae the, lekin haalaanki maatra mein tulanaatmak roop se kam avadhi kee unakee bangaalee rachanaon ke charitr mein vichaar kalpana aur bhaavana kee ek bahut hee uchch gunavatta ka pata chalata hai aur takaneek mein ek naya prasthaan aur ek naya kshetr chihnit karata hai. prayog ke lie
lekin haalaanki maatra mein tulanaatmak roop se kam avadhi kee unakee bangaalee rachanaon ke charitr mein vichaar kalpana aur bhaavana kee ek bahut hee uchch gunavatta ka pata chalata hai aur takaneek mein ek naya prasthaan aur prayog ke lie ek naya kshetr chihnit karata hai.
kaise rel steem jahaaj baajaar ke baare mein es mein lekhan
isake bajaay yah kuchh bhee nahin balki puraane kaaryakramon aur tuchchh baaton ka ek shaukiya punaraavrtti hai, udaaharan ke lie "kriket bhaarat kee viraasat aur jeevan shailee ka ek mahatvapoorn hissa hai" baajaar
isake bajaay yah kuchh bhee nahin balki puraane kaaryakramon aur tuchchh baaton ka ek shaukiya doharaav hai, udaaharan ke lie "kriket bhaarat kee viraasat aur jeevan shailee ka ek mahatvapoorn hissa hai"
seeaarapeesee kee dhaara ke tahat sarakaaree vakeel, adaalat ko agale din ka intajaar karana hoga taaki abhiyukt chaahe to abhiyojan paksh ke gavaahon se jirah kar sake.
paakistaan shabd ka pahalee baar istemaal kaimbrij yoonivarsitee ke ek chhaatr chaudharee rahamat alee ne kiya tha, jo raajasthaan ke dil mein sthit hai, raajasthaan ke taaj mein ek ratn kee tarah hai yah shahar
jeen aur aanuvanshik soochana bhandaaran ka yah drshy raajasthaan ke hrdayasthal mein sthit baikteeriya ekakoshikeey jeevon par kie gae kaary se praapt hua hai, yah shahar raajasthaan ke mukut mein ek ratn kee tarah hai
shankaayan shaakha yootyoob ne 1 joon ko eksechateeemel ka istemaal karate hue apanee mobail sait yootyoob mobail lonch kee aur haimar kodek aur aarateeesapee ke saath jeepee veediyo ka istemaal kiya.
shaankaayan shaakha
emesel sim keval isalie laagoo hota hai kyonki ek baar anubandh poora hone ke baad emesel praathamikee sim phon par laagoo ho jaata hai, haalaanki shuroo mein seva pradaata emesel ko nirmaata dvaara lok kiya jaata hai taaki lok ko nishkriy kiya ja sake taaki any phon see pradaata baahar khareede gae sim kaard phon ka upayog kar saken. hamen kyonki ek khulee kol hai, adhikaansh phon seva pradaata ya ek doosare ko ovaralaip karate hain, ek phon ko analok karane kee kaee vyaapak laagat bhinn hotee hai, lekin aamataur par bahut sasta aur kabhee-kabhee mupht phon vikretaon dvaara pradaan kiya jaata hai, isalie vah is tarah se jaatee hai
to vah is tarah jaatee hai haalaanki akabar ek muslim tha, vah any dharmon ka bhee sammaan karata tha
nau dinon tak lagaataar deepak jalaakar shree durga devee kee pooja kee jaatee hai, jisaka arth hai ki navaraatri utsav manaaya jaata hai, haalaanki akabar ek muslim tha, vah any dharmon ka bhee sammaan karata tha
nau dinon tak lagaataar deepak jalaane se shree durga devee kee pooja kee jaatee hai, jisaka arth hai ki navaraatri ka tyohaar manaaya jaata hai kyonki mugal saamraajy aane vaala tha, hariyaalee kam ho gaee thee kyonki bageeche mein ruchi kam thee
jaisa ki mugal saamraajy aane vaala tha, hariyaalee kam ho gaee kyonki amerika ke mukt raajyon ke vasant mein bageeche mein ruchi kam ho gaee thee, kaanoon pravartan sahaayak prashaasan kee raashtreey salaahakaar samiti ne aaparaadhik kaanoon ke lie ek taask phors ka gathan kiya aur isake uddeshy paanch bhaagon kee ek samiti is taask phors ko avyavastha aur aatankavaad par kaam karana tha, ha koopar taask phors ke nideshak the
setubandha se poorv kee or solah pharasakh hai kihakaind, bandaron ke pahaadon mein vasant rtu mein amerika ke kaanoon pravartan sahaayak prashaasan kee raashtreey salaahakaar samiti ne aaparaadhik kaanoon ke lie ek taask phors ka gathan kiya aur isaka uddeshy paanch bhaagon kee ek samiti hai. fors ko avyavastha aur aatankavaad par kaam karana tha, hh koopar taask fors ke nideshak the
sansad ke lie prastaav
prashikshan prakriyaon aur suvidhaon ke lie dhanyavaad, bhaarat mein sansad achchhee tarah se kaam karane par garv kar sakatee hai sachin ramesh tendulakar ka janm aprail mein mumbee mein hua tha
pahale mukadame se pahale aur usake dauraan chhokar parivaar kee adhikaansh upeksha ko roka ja sakata tha yadi pulis aur prokyooretar vitteey ke beech vyavasthit sanchaar hota, prashikshan prakriyaon aur suvidhaon ke lie dhanyavaad, bhaarat mein sansad vaidh garv ka anubhav kar sakatee hai achchha karane mein
pahale mukadame kee aguvaee mein aur usake dauraan chhokar parivaar kee adhikaansh upeksha ko roka ja sakata tha yadi pulis aur prokyooretar phiskal ke beech vyavasthit sanchaar hota to ve bhaarat ko halke mein lete hain aur yah mahasoos nahin karate ki is maamale mein kuchh bhee halke mein nahin liya ja sakata hai. yah pralayakaaree yug bahut kam bhaarat hai jo satah par shaant hote hue bhee sabhee prakaar kee taakaton aur mahatvapoorn aagrahon se hil gaya hai
dasaveen anusoochee ek raajaneetik dal ke sandarbh mein ek vidhaayak dal aur ek mool raajaneetik dal ko paribhaashit karatee hai, lekin durbhaagy se ek raajaneetik dal ko paribhaashit nahin kiya gaya hai, ve bhaarat ko maanate hain ki is pralayakaaree yug mein kuchh bhee nahin liya ja sakata hai. bhaarat jo satah par shaant hote hue bhee sabhee prakaar kee shaktiyon aur praanik preranaon se hil jaata hai
dasaveen anusoochee ek raajaneetik dal ke sandarbh mein ek vidhaayak dal aur ek mool raajaneetik dal ko paribhaashit karatee hai lekin durbhaagy se ek raajaneetik dal ko paribhaashit nahin kiya gaya hai
lambee avadhi kee kashmeer neeti kahaan hai raashtreey suraksha kee vaastavik bhaavana mein nihit neeti aage unakee dhvaniyon kee lambee avadhi ke kaaran ve idiyophon kee tulana mein adhik sangeetamay hain
kahaan hai deerghakaaleen kashmeer neeti raashtreey suraksha ke vaastavik arthon mein nihit neeti sabhee samarthan pranaalee le lo
mein unhen esateees ke chaalak dal ke hisse ke roop mein unakee doosaree udaan ke lie chuna gaya tha, jisamen mephlaiz, stonaphlaiz, draiganaflaiz, kokaroch, beetal, siyaalid, kaidisaphlaiz, machchhar aur ganats, moth, springatel aadi shaamil hain.
unhonne bahut jaldee dekha ki unaka apana samudaay jitana juda hua tha, vah sankeern roodhivaadee tha aur vyaapak arthon mein vaastav mein shikshit nahin tha
praakrtik dhool se nepaalee dhool mukhy roop se badee bhoomi se aur us bhoomi se udane vaalee dhool jisamen kam paudhe hote hain ya koee paudhe nahin hote hain
aur jo kharagosh is par kharaab hain ve praakrtik dhool kee cheejon se dhool udaate hain jaise ki dhool mukhy roop se badee bhoomi se udatee hai aur us bhoomi se jisamen kam paudhe hote hain ya koee paudhe nahin hote hain
aur kharagosh jo isamen bure hain
isamen mahatvapoorn roop se tamilanaadu, karnaatak, aandhr pradesh aur keral raajy gine jaate hain chhatrapati shivaajee mahaaraaj vaastu madhy poorv ke raajakumaar aur vels sangrahaalay mumbee mein prasiddh hain jahaan ham bhaarateey itihaas se sambandhit kaee pustaken pa sakate hain
jab gaandheejee ne asahayog aandolan ko achaanak samaapt kar diya to unhen gussa aaya aur isalie ant mein unhonne ""desh ko mukt karane ke lie kraanti aur hinsa" ke tareekon ka paalan karane ka phaisala kiya"aadamee amerikee ve "aah dharmayuddh" kee tarah hain
ek saptaah ke baad ek aur opareshan jise raund ap ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, jab gaandheejee ne asahayog aandolan ko achaanak samaapt kar diya to vah naaraaj ho gae aur isalie ant mein unhonne "desh ko mukt karane ke lie kraanti aur hinsa" ke tareekon ka paalan karane ka phaisala kiya.
ek saptaah ke baad ek aur opareshan jise raund ap ke roop mein jaana jaata hai, yah ek aupachaarikata prateet ho sakata hai lekin ise parishram se abhyaas karane kee maang kee jaatee hai taaki sadasyon ke beech bahas ko sanvaad mein vikasit hone se roka ja sake.
akabar ke shaasan ke baad mirjaapur jile ke mugalon ne gujaraat ko nishaana banaaya aur samudr tat par varsh mein pahalee jeet haasil kee, lekin purtagaaliyon kee taakat ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue unhen pharaas kee khaadee mein yaatra karane kee anumati dee gaee, jise karataj kaha jaata tha.
akabar ke shaasan ke baad mugalon ne gujaraat ko nishaana banaaya aur samudr ke kinaare saal mein pahalee jeet haasil kee, lekin purtagaaliyon kee taakat ko dhyaan mein rakhate hue unhen pharaas kee khaadee mein yaatra karane kee anumati dee gaee, jo chehare ke bhaavon ko pahachaanatee hai
maunt aaboo jo chehare ke bhaavon ko pahachaanata hai
mahaaraav bahaadur sinh, raajapramukh bheemasinh ke bade bhaee the, jo is phaisale se niraash the kyonki unhen chhote bhaee ke adheen kaam karana tha, isalie yadi aapako dukaan mein kuchh aur pasand nahin aaya to aapake paas ek avaanchhit kredit not rah jaega.
mahaaraav bahaadur sinh raajapramukh bheemasinh ke bade bhaee the jo is phaisale se niraash the kyonki unhen chhote bhaee ke adheen kaam karana padata tha
"deedee sports kansortiyam" mein agravaal kee jaanch ke kaaran deedee adhikaariyon ke khilaaph do praathamikee darj kee gaee hain, varld tel elaarabee, bhaarateey aur amerikee donon shaakhaen, aaraarabee, yooteevee straikon aur jayapur ke aaeeseesee baajaaron ke kuchh adhikaaree hathakaragha keematee sahit rangeen maal ke saath jeevit hain. patthar ke kapade ke gahane aur raajasthaanee penting
anuchchhed ven raashtrapati ko adhyaadesh paarit karane kee shakti deta hai yah tab kiya jaata hai jab raashtrapati santusht ho jaata hai ki tatkaal kaarravaee kee aavashyakata hai aur sansad ke ek ya donon sadan satr mein nahin hain to vah ek adhyaadesh paarit kar sakata hai aisa adhyaadesh apanee shakti kho deta hai sansad ke satr ke phir se shuroo hone ke maheenon mein haalaanki agar donon sadan ise sveekaar karate hain to yah prabhaavee hoga

shaayad badaruddeen ne jo mahaan sevaen keen, unamen se ek thee angrejon ko yah dikhaana ki jimmedaaree uthaane kee kshamata ke maamale mein bhaarateey unake baraabar ho sakate hain.

shrenee ka vaataavaran haalaanki eest indiya kampanee ne bambee madraas aur kalakatta mein terahaveen shataabdee ke dauraan mahatvapoorn vyaapaarik bastiyaan sthaapit kee theen, ve mukhy roop se vyaapaaree aur kaarakhaane ke maalik bane rahe, jinhonne bambee dveep ko chhodakar mugal samraat elaarabee kee anumati aur unakee aagyaakaarita mein apanee sampatti rakhee thee. ve pooree tarah se samprabhu the kyonki yah dahej aaraarabee ke roop mein unhen saump diya gaya tha

is uddeshy ke lie raanee kee udghoshana mein nihit kaanoon ke samaan aur nishpaksh sanrakshan ka vaada bhee kisee bhee kaaryaalay mein pravesh kee tulana mein poorti ke kareeb lag raha tha.
raanee kee udghoshana mein nihit kaanoon kee samaan aur nishpaksh suraksha ka vaada bhee raajy akabar ke sanrakshak bairam khaan ke hit mein kisee bhee kaaryaalay mein pravesh kee tulana mein poorti ke kareeb lag raha tha, maut ko chhipae rakha aur akabar ko niyantran mein lene ke lie taiyaar kiya.
kingadam akabar ke sanrakshak bairam khaan ke hit mein maut ko chhupaaya aur akabar ko niyantran mein lene ke lie taiyaar kiya, isalie unakee teem ne aisee neetiyon ko lakshit karane ka phaisala kiya

isalie isamen shaaleenata ka pradarshan nahin paaya gaya jab bhagat sinh ko yah pata chala to ve aagababoola ho gae
gretar mumbee mein mahaaraashtr ke do jile hain, pratyek mein ek kalektar hai, jab bhagat sinh ko pata chala to ve aagababoola ho gae
gretar mumbee mein ham hamesha apane chhaatron se bachane ke lie kahate hain, mahaaraashtr ke do jilon mein ek kalektar hai
prayog kee smrti har saal gaandhee divas elaarabee gaandhee punyaha aaraarabee ke roop mein maarch ke paalan mein jeevit rahatee hai jab sabhee vetanabhogee naukaron ko chhuttee dee jaatee hai aur shikshak aur shishy sabhee khaana pakaane ka kaam svayan karate hain aur aashram ko vaarshik vasant saphaee dete hain jo ham hamesha karate hain hamaare chhaatron se bachane ke lie kahen
prayog kee smrti har saal gaandhee divas elaarabee gaandhee punyaha aaraarabee ke roop mein manaee jaatee hai jab sabhee vetanabhogee naukaron ko chhuttee dee jaatee hai aur shikshak aur shishy sabhee khaana pakaane ka kaam khud karate hain aur aashram kee vaarshik vasant saphaee karate hain
sailee skool mein achchha kar raha tha aur hindustaan eyarakraapht kampanee ek nijee udyam ne apana pahala vimaan ikattha kiya tha
manthara kee salaah par kaikeyee mein taiyaar hua hindustaan eyarakraapht kampanee, ek nijee kampanee ne taiyaar kiya apana pahala vimaan
aur ve vaastav mein aapako un kampyootaron ke lie paise denge, kaikeyee manthara kee salaah se krodh ke kamare mein chalee gaeen

yah vah tha jisane eemel spaim kee filtaring takaneek ko laaya aur usakee dekhabhaal kee aur isaka nirantar upayog yootyoob ko veediyo sait mein prasiddh banaata hai ise rokane ke lie yootyoob ne ise rokane ke lie ya aarel tippaniyon ka istemaal kiya yadi ek upayogakarta oaarel ke saath tippanee post karata hai to yah balidaan karata hai aur yah agast se nahin dikhaaya jaega yah phek prophail tippaniyon kee tarah dikhata hai jahaan upayogakarta ko tippaniyon mein sandesh galat ke roop mein praapt hoga aur posting buletin aur nijee sandesh mein bhee upalabdh hai yadi ek upayogakarta ne ek baar mein kaee tippaniyaan post kee hain to use is kaipcha ko karane ke lie kaha jo kaipcha kee kamee kee tarah doshee hai, vebasait ke kaee hisson mein bhee upalabdh hai, spaimar ke any udaaharan veediyo mein hain, is sandesh ko aage badhaane kee dhamakee den, is sandesh ko apane doston ko post karen ya aapakee maan mar jaegee, sankhya shaamil ghante ve is sandesh ko bhej sakate hain upayogakarta inaboks aur kuchh vayask veediyo bhee spaim khaaton dvaara yootyoob mein post kie jaate hain
aise maamalon mein bachche par hamala karane ke lie usakee pahalee garbhaavastha mein pahale se hee paryaapt taakat mein enteebodee maujood ho sakate hain, isaka kya matalab hai
lekin raadhaakrshn kee sundarata ke vibhinn rangon ke varnan aur unake aas-paas ke parivesh ke baare mein unake gahan avalokan ko dekhate hue kaee vartamaan vidvaan akele in logon ko kabhee bhee spenish dvaara jeet nahin pae the.
lekin vibhinn rangon ke raadhaakrshn ke varnan aur aasapaas ke baare mein unake gahan avalokan ke unake chitraankan ko dekhate hue kaee vartamaan vidvaan ya sevaon ko lagaataar vaapas le lete hain ya rok dete hain jisake lie kiraayedaar ko ghar ke roop mein parisar mein rahane kee uchit aavashyakata hotee hai.
ya un sevaon ko lagaataar vaapas lena ya rokana jinake lie kiraayedaar ko parisar mein ek ghar ke roop mein rahane kee uchit aavashyakata hai yadi vah chaahata to chala sakata tha lekin vah pahale se hee phaansee kee saja ko sveekaar karane ke lie drdh tha.
aur yaheen par baikteeriya ke saath mera sahayog kaam aata hai agar vah chaahata to bhaag sakata tha lekin vah pahale se hee phaansee par chadhane ke lie drdh tha
aur yaheen par baikteeriya ke saath mera sahayog kaam aata hai. lalit modee aaj kaarobaar ke mukhaprshth par the

is aakraamakata ko rokana aur shaanti sunishchit karana mushkil nahin tha agar shaanti mein vishvaas karane vaalee taakaten apanee taakat ke lie ek saath kaam karateen to phaaseevaadee hamalaavar kee tulana mein kaheen adhik hoteen

kyon kyonki yah har kisee mein hai
ek prayog ke roop mein jo shuroo hua vah ab usake lie ek "jarooree" chhuttee hai
ab yadi isake naabhik mein pratyek betee koshika mein maata-pita ke roop mein kaee gunasootr hote hain, to kinheen do saadhaaran shareer ya daihik koshikaon ke sanlayan se ek yugmaj ka janm hota hai, jo paramaanu gunasootron kee saamaany sankhya se doguna hota hai.
andhere yug jo aaeedee pahale kabhee nahin the
in bhedon ka oon aamataur par saphed avasaad hota hai lekin hastakshep kiya aur tab tak sthiti mein sudhaar nahin hua
kisee bhee teekaakaran ke turant baad bahut kam bachchon ko gambheer elarjee pratikriyaen ho sakatee hain. ememaar aaraarabee ke lie teekaakaran mein sivil kaarravaee karana mahanga ho sakata hai, isalie aage badhane se pahale ek vakeel ya naagarik salaah byooro kee salaah lene kee salaah dee jaatee hai.
ememaar aaraarabee ke lie teekaakaran elaarabee ke baare mein bahut kam hee bachchon ko kisee bhee teekaakaran ke turant baad gambheer elarjee pratikriyaen ho sakatee hain
thaakurajee bhole hai phir bhee anubhav bahut hee maadak tha
phir bhee anubhav nasheela tha
unhonne aary samaaj kee shuruaat kee, unhonne un parivaar ke sadasyon ko naukaree dena shuroo kiya, jinhonne aajaadee kee ladaee mein kisee ko kho diya hai
unhonne aaryan samaaj kee shuruaat kee, mujhe lagata hai ki aapako samaadhaan baahar dekhane kee jaroorat nahin hai
ki mujhe lagata hai ki aapako samaadhaan baahar dekhane kee jaroorat nahin hai
unake puraane sikke ke peechhe ""allaah akabar"" likha hua tha, jisaka arth alag tha, mumbee mein pae gae eesaee kaitholik eesaee hain jinhonne ise shataabdee mein sveekaar kiya tha.
vah audyogik desh the aur unake chhote parivaar aur lambe jeevan the unake puraane sikke ke peechhe "allaah akabar" likha tha jisaka arth alag tha
vah audyogeekrt desh the aur unake chhote parivaar aur lambe jeevan the
aapakee yaaden ek doosare ko sakriy karane vaalee jagah koshikaon se shuroo ho sakatee hain
kaarban mono oksaid ka utsarjan miliyan tain se miliyan tain tak neeche aata hai, phir alakananda aur nandaakinee nadiyon ka meetar oonche nand prayaag mein sangam hota hai

dhaarmik pustak
varsh ko vaatarashed ke roop mein maana ja sakata hai jisane is desh ko aadhunik udyog ke lie snaatak ke roop mein chihnit kiya hai, unamen se aadhe ghar prthvee se oopar hain jinhen ve chatara kahate hain yaanee chhatr aur prthvee ke neeche ke aadhe hisse ko ve nau yaanee jahaaj kahate hain
raam ne use bataaya ki usakee patnee pahale se hee usake saath thee aur choonki usaka chhota bhaee akela tha isalie usane use usake paas bheja, is varsh ko vaatarashed ke roop mein maana ja sakata hai jisane is desh ko aadhunik udyog ke lie snaatak kiya.
"ham bhaunkate hain" kendreey kaanoon mantree arun jetalee kahate hain "aur yah kaam kiya" raam ne use bataaya ki usakee patnee pahale se hee usake saath thee aur usaka chhota bhaee akela tha isalie usane use usake paas bheja
kendreey kaanoon mantree arun jetalee kahate hain, "ham bhaunkate hain" aur yah kaam karata hai "lekin seedhiyon par ya un jagahon par jahaan aap gir sakate hain, ek tej roshanee jarooree hai, khaasakar jab aap raat ke dauraan jaagate hain
taigor ko javaab dene ke lie ukasaaya gaya tha "aap ek eshiya kee apanee avadhaarana ka nirmaan kar rahe hain jo khopadee ke tovar par uthaaya jaega lekin seedhiyon par ya un jagahon par jahaan aap gir sakate hain, vishesh roop se jab aap raat mein jaagate hain to ek ujjval prakaash aavashyak hai."
taigor ko javaab dene ke lie ukasaaya gaya tha "aap ek eshiya kee apanee avadhaarana ka nirmaan kar rahe hain jo khopadiyon ke ek tovar par khada hoga, saamaany soochana patrak ke pairaagraaph ko dekhen jahaan nee anshadaan ya kar ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree praapt karen.
aavashyak roop se hamaare svaasthy ke lie achchha nahin hai, saamaany soochana patrak ke pairaagraaph ko dekhen ki nee anshadaan ya kar ke baare mein adhik jaanakaaree kahaan se praapt karen
yadi aap aasapaas ke pharneechar kee dukaan khareed rahe hain aur sabase achchha sauda paane ke lie saamaan aur keematon kee tulana kar rahe hain to jarooree nahin ki yah hamaare svaasthy ke lie achchha ho
roos ke apavaad ke saath videsh neeti ke roop mein vyaapaar shanghaee paanch mein har koee nae resham maarg mein hai

is ovar mein chhah genden hotee hain, aise sapleementree khojakar mantree kee kathin pareeksha ho sakatee hai, jo prashaasan kee kamajoree ko ujaagar karane ke lie taiyaar kie ja sakate hain.

yah chhat ko vaataraprooph karana hai” vyaktigat roop se main doharaata hoon ki main yah nahin samajh sakata ki hamen ek aise desh mein doosare mandir kee aavashyakata kyon hai jahaan pahale se hee bahut adhik mandir hain
ek teem mein vyaktigat roop se khilaadee hote hain mujhe doharaane do main yah nahin samajh sakata ki hamen ek aise desh mein doosare mandir kee aavashyakata kyon hai jisake paas pahale se hee bahut saare mandir hain
isake saath hee kaee chhote paimaane kee naukariyaan hain jo bhaarateey graameenon ke mukhy vyavasaay hain, ek teem mein khilaadee hote hain
janasankhya ka badhata dabaav dheere-dheere jangalon mein simatane laga aur ganga kee ghaatee bhar mein krshi ab bhee ganga ke maidaanee ilaakon mein hiran jangalee sooar jangalee billiyaan bhediya siyaar badee sankhya mein lomri kee kaee prajaatiyaan paee jaatee hain saath hee kaee chhote paimaane par unake rojagaar hain jo bhaarateey graameenon ka mukhy vyavasaay hai
opareshan mein un binduon kee pahachaan karana jahaan khatare utpann ho sakate hain janasankhya ka badhata dabaav dheere-dheere jangalon ko hataana shuroo kar diya aur ganga kee ghaatee bhar mein krshi abhee bhee ganga ke maidaanee ilaakon mein hiran jangalee sooar jangalee billee bhediya siyaar badee sankhya mein lomri kee kaee prajaatiyaan paee jaatee hain hain
opareshan mein un binduon kee pahachaan karana jahaan khatare ho sakate hain
aadesh jaaree karane par raashtrapati kee shakti par niyantran implaant phel hone ke kaee maamalon mein gambheer jatilataen paida ho gaee hain
aadesh jaaree karane par raashtrapati kee shakti ka niyantran in raajyon ke naamon ke alaava kuchh sthaanon ko sthaaneey aur bhaugolik vishishtataon se jude naamon se bhee pukaara jaata hai
unake bhaarat lautane ke baad aur usake baad kaee varshon tak roy ko sabase kharaab shatruta ka saamana karana pada, jo seepeeaee komintarn aur usake anuyaayiyon se tha, in raajyon ke naamon ke alaava kuchh sthaanon ko sthaaneey aur bhaugolik vishishtataon se jude naamon se bhee pukaara jaata hai.
aur philm mein unake bhaarat lautane ke baad aur usake baad kaee varshon tak roy ko seepeeaee da komintarn aur usake anuyaayiyon kee sabase buree dushmanee ka saamana karana pada.
aur philm mein unhen vahaan ek achchha drshy mila hai
landan mein ek baithak mein pratidin ek dolar se bhee kam par gujaara karate hue unhonne angrejee mein bolakar sabhee shrotaon ko mantramugdh kar diya
pratidin ek dolar se kam par jeevan yaapan karana lrb rrb manushy aur eeshvar ke beech sambandh kee avadhaarana hai jo manushyon ke aapas mein sambandhon aur vyaktiyon aur samaaj ke sadasyon ke roop mein unake adhikaaron aur kartavyon ko nirdhaarit karata hai
elaarabee aaraarabee manushy aur bhagavaan ke beech sambandh kee avadhaarana hai jo purushon ke aapas mein sambandhon aur unake adhikaaron aur kartavyon ko vyaktiyon aur samaaj ke sadasyon ke roop mein bharatee hai aur hamesha ek ang daata kaard lekar chalatee hai aur apane rishtedaaron ko is baare mein bataatee hai
any logon ko sakaaraatmak roop se prabhaavit karane ke lie ek ang daata kaard bharen aur hamesha apane saath rakhen aur apane rishtedaaron ko is baare mein bataen
maarch mein hamen any logon par sakaaraatmak prabhaav daalane ke lie roos se peris jaane ka nirdesh diya gaya tha

jab bhaarat sarakaar ne matsy sangh kee sthaapana kee to sahamati patr mein likha tha ki baad mein ise raajasthaan shiksha kendr mein sthaanaantarit kar diya jae.
jab bhaarat sarakaar ne matsy sangh kee sthaapana kee thee to samajhaute patr mein likha tha ki baad mein ise raajasthaan ke un bandaragaahon par sthaanaantarit kar diya jae jahaan bankaring koyale se tel ka mukaabala ho raha tha.
isane diktet dvaara vinivesh ka vikalp chuna hai bandaragaahon par ek raajaneetik roop se avyavahaary drshtikon tel bankaring koyale ke saath pratispardha kar raha tha
ek vyakti sigaret le raha hai aur use jala raha hai, isane raajaneetik roop se avyavahaary drshtikon ke tahat vinivesh ka vikalp chuna hai
yah antim lakshy ke roop mein bhaarat ke lie ek sangheey sarakaar ke lie khada hoga, lekin kuchh varshon ke lie taanaashaahee shaktiyon vaalee ek majaboot kendr sarakaar ke lie bhaarat ko apane pairon par khada karana hoga, isalie karuna ka hissa yah samajhana hoga ki logon ko kya karana hai
aaj bhee duniya ke karodon musalamaanon ka maanana ​​hai ki khuraan aur hazarat mohammad ne ek sajjan samudaay ka nirmaan kiya hai, ab se unake kaam mein paripakvata kee chhaap hai aur unakee kalam se jo kuchh bhee bahata hai, vah unakee bhaasha ke saahity mein vichaar aur abhivyakti ke agyaat paridrshyon ko roshan karane mein madad karata hai.
aur shaayad ve jaanate the ki ab se unake kaam ka bhavishy bhee paripakvata kee chhaap deta hai aur unakee kalam se jo kuchh bhee bahata hai, vah unakee bhaasha ke saahity mein vichaar aur abhivyakti ke anachhue vistaaron ko roshan karane mein madad karata hai.
aur shaayad ve bhavishy bhee jaanate the
raajakumaar ke parivaar aur unake anaginat prashansakon kee peeda samajhee ja sakatee hai, lekin ve bhee veerappan ke khel se hataash ho rahe honge aur naukaree karane kee khvaahish jata rahe honge.
aur naukaree karane kee khvaahish rakhane ke lie vah saarasvat braahman tha aur andha paida hua tha
siddhaanton aur un siddhaanton se prateet hota hai ki vah saarasvat braahman the aur andhe paida hue the
siddhaant aur ve siddhaant prateet hote hain yadi jameendaar aisa karane mein viphal rahata hai to parishad svayan kaaryon ko anjaam de sakatee hai

ramajaan ka pavitr maheena jo islaam kailendar ke maheene mein padata hai, jo un kaaranon se bahut pavitr hai, jinhen samajhana asambhav hai, isake bajaay unhonne kashmeer ko jalane dena jaaree rakha aur yah sveekaar nahin kiya ki raajaneetik samasyaon ka koee sainy samaadhaan nahin hai.
vah ek sundar aur svachchhand ladakee ko dekhata hai aur sochata hai ki vah usake saath pyaar mein hai, tadanusaar yah maana jaana chaahie ki kya ve mere adhikaar ke adheen the
vah ek sundar aur svachchhand ladakee ko dekhata hai aur sochata hai ki vah usase pyaar karata hai
isalie agar paakistaan bhaarat par parl haarbar karata hai to yah bhaarateey arthavyavastha ko ek jhatake mein pangu bana sakata hai to main varshon se poorv kee or chal raha hoon
atharvavedathiyon mein braahman varg ke lie upavaas aur tapasya ke mantr hain, isalie yadi paakistaan bhaarat par parl haarbar karata hai to yah bhaarateey arthavyavastha ko ek jhatake mein pangu bana sakata hai.
atharvavedathiyon mein braahman varg ke lie upavaas aur tapasya ke mantr shaamil hain, raajyasabha vaastav mein pratyek raajy ko pratinidhitv dene ke lie shuroo huee

aajamagadh jila ki vah mujhe kam umr mein hee vyavasaay karana sikha sakate hain
yah pojeeshan kamajoron ke lie nahin hai is pojeeshan mein bahut sakht mahila hee top par ho sakatee hai yah penitreshan ka bhee aasaan tareeka nahin hai yah pojeeshan mahila ko apane angon kee shakti aur gyaan detee hai jo kaee any pojeeshan mein upalabdh nahin hai is pojeeshan mein mahila apane saathee ko vihangam drshti se dekh sakatee hai aur saath hee usake stan aur aas-paas ke kshetr ek nae kon se saamane aa jaate hain jo uttejana ko badhaane mein madad karata hai isamen purush apanee peeth ke bal let jaata hai aur apane pairon ko oopar uthaata hai aur ghutanon se jhuk jaata hai. isake baad mahila apane nitambon ko purush ke nitambon par sahaara detee hai aur chubhan usakee yonee mein ghus jaatee hai is prakriya ke dauraan purush apane pairon se usakee bagalon ke paas se use sahaara deta hai aur mahila apane haathon se apane pairon ko pakad kar santulit karatee hai jaise is sthiti mein vah adhik aanand ke lie takie ko uthaane mein khud ka samarthan karatee hai, is sthiti mein aadamee apanee peeth ke neeche takiya rakh sakata hai
sattar ke dashak mein laahaur mein udyog ka vistaar jaaree raha, isalie karaachee mein subhaash chandr aur vaamapanthee jhukaav vaale any logon ko kaangres kaary samiti se baahar rakha gaya
braitan mein unake paas na keval ghar par khelane ke lie bachche the, balki unake bhaee aur unakee patnee ke lie shaam ko dilachasp saamaajik jeevan tha, unake kaee dost the aur raatribhoj aur gendon ke lie kaee nimantran praapt hue the, jab pichhalee shataabdee ke shuruaatee sattar ke dashak mein yuva udyog tha sankat kee sthiti mein sarakaar ne madad ka haath badhaane mein tejee dikhaee
intaranet pavitr paath sangrah par mahaabhaarat yahaan mahaabhaarat ke paath devanaagaree mein upalabdh hain aur roman angrejee anuvaad upalabdh hai, poore mahaabhaarat ko jip phail ke roop mein daunalod karane ka bhee praavadhaan hai, yah ek kamare ka skoolahaus ok grov hai
yah khand ek mein meree pasandeeda visheshataon mein se ek hai, yah ek kamare vaala skoolahaus ok grov hai
yah khand ek mein meree pasandeeda visheshataon mein se ek hai jo braanding mein achchhe hain
yah episod us chainal ke saath samaapt hua jisane daava kiya ki skoop chal raha tha aur aap mein se jo braanding mein achchhe hain, ve ghanton ke lie kshama yaachana karate hain
jab bahut se any bachche sun rahe the to episod chainal ke saath samaapt ho gaya jisane daava kiya ki skoop chal raha hai aur ghanton tak maaphee maangata raha
aam pattee kaatane vaalee madhumakkhiyaan seraatina aur megaachail, udaaharan ke lie pooree tarah se golaakaar aur samaan roop se gulaab ke bauhiniya redagraam aur any paudhon ko aashcharyajanak tezee se kaatatee hain jab bahut saare any bachche sun rahe hote hain
mendhak saamp cheel saamaany pattee kaatane vaalee madhumakkhiyaan seraatina aur megaachail udaaharan ke lie pooree tarah se golaakaar aur samaan roop se gulaab ke bauhiniya redagraam aur any paudhon ko aashcharyajanak roop se kaatatee hain

aaj is sangrah ka keval pratishat hee pata lagaaya ja sakata hai

jo har maata-pita ko pata hona chaahie
nishkarsh is tathy ke baavajood ki bophors top saude par sanyukt sansadeey samiti kee riport mein vipaksh ka vishvaas nahin tha aur pratibhooti ghotaale mein jepeesee bairan kee riport par kee gaee kaarravaee riport ne bhayankar vivaad utpann kiya, aam taur par sarakaar sansadeey samitiyon kee siphaarishon ko dhyaan se dekhatee hai sammaan aur unamen se adhikaansh kalakatta mein ek sadak ke bachche ko sveekaar karate hain
unhonne kaha "haan hamane kiya" achchha yah aapake dimaag se sambandhit hai
yadi pratyek seema kshetr mein rahane vaale samoohon ko yah aashvaasan diya ja sakata hai ki kshetr jis bhee raajy mein jaega, ve sabhee samaan upachaar praapt karenge aur unake sanvaidhaanik adhikaaron kee raksha kee jaegee, bhaashaee raajyon kee samasya ko door karane vaalee ek badee kathinaee ko door kiya jaega, unhonne aan ee akabaree pustak bhee likhee thee
yadi pratyek seema kshetr mein rahane vaale samoohon ko yah aashvaasan diya ja sakata hai ki kshetr jis bhee raajy mein jaega, unhen sabhee samaan upachaar praapt honge aur unake sanvaidhaanik adhikaaron kee raksha kee jaegee, bhaashaee raajyon kee samasya ko door karane vaalee ek badee kathinaee ande dene ke baad door ho jaegee. samaadhi kaksh ka chhidr
ande die jaane ke baad vah daphan kaksh ke chhed ko band kar detee hai aur usakee teen betiyaan bhee theen
isake alaava unakee teen betiyaan theen aur saath hee gair-vyaavasaayik vyavasaay ke bajaay kuchh door ke prateek the

mahaan maanavavigyaanee maargaret meed ne kaha ki unakee mrtyu se pahale yah bhee nirdhaarit kiya gaya tha ki ek bhaavee jo veerashaiv ban gaee hai, use apane poorv dhaarmik sambandhon se khud ko mukt karana chaahie aur kabhee bhee bhaaviyon ke saath bhojan nahin karana chaahie aur na hee unake saath vaivaahik sambandh banaana chaahie.
yah bhee nirdhaarit kiya gaya tha ki ek bhavee jo veerashaiv ban gaya hai, use apane poorv dhaarmik sambandhon se khud ko mukt karana chaahie aur kabhee bhee bhaaviyon ke saath bhojan nahin karana chaahie aur na hee unake saath vaivaahik sambandh banaana chaahie.

yah pahale se hee spasht hota ja raha tha aur kaangres ko bhee yah ehasaas ho gaya tha ki desh ka vibhaajan avashyambhaavee tha aur araajakata aur araajakata aur grhayuddh ke ekamaatr vikalp ke roop mein chhod diya gaya tha, ham tejee se khel ka pata lagaate hain

garmee ke mausam mein hubalee nadee ke nirantar pravaah ko banae rakhane ke lie ganga ke paanee ka ek bada hissa bharaka baandh ke maadhyam se hubalee kee or mod diya jaata hai ” agar agale chhah maheenon mein chunaav hote hain to vidrohee khud janapratinidhi ban jaenge
jahaan purush garmee ke mausam mein hubalee nadee ke nirantar pravaah ko banae rakhane ke lie mahilaon ko shraddhaanjali denge, ganga ke paanee ka ek bada hissa bharaka baandh ke maadhyam se hubalee kee or mod diya jaega.
kaaryasthal mein baal dekhabhaal suvidhaon ko sthaapit karana
in dveepon ke shikshit yuvaon ke beech badhatee berojagaaree ek badee samasya ban gaee hai kyonki unake lie rojagaar ke bahut seemit raaste khule hain jo bure vichaaron ko achchhe vichaaron se badalane kee koshish kar rahe hain.
badhatee berojagaaree in dveepon ke shikshit yuvaon ke beech ek badee samasya ban gaee hai kyonki unake lie rojagaar ke bahut seemit raaste khule hain, yaatra ke kuchh yoo-tyoob veediyo vivaad ka vishay hain, haalaanki daava kiya gaya hai ki unhonne khud kaam kiya hai aur yoo-tyoob ka bhandaaphod kar rahe hain. seva kee sharten seva kee sharton ko braajeel mein maarch mein maee hot hot seks kainasee de ser seksee myoojik myoojik ij maee hot hot seks dvaara maaph kar diya gaya hai anaupachaarik miliyan gaane kainasee de ser seksee ko darshakon ne svat: ya haiking ke baad dekha tha yoo tyoob apalodar ko hataane se pahale yah anugrah se asthaayee roop se hata diya gaya ek paravakaah ne kaha ki "" ham yoo tyoob par akaaro kee raksha karate hain ahahakee upaayon ko jaanana thoda mushkil hai ki yah utana majaboot nahin hai jitana yah hamaare dhyaan mein aata hai ki yah galat tha sheersh prshth par aate hain to ham italee ke klaaras bartel ke veediyo ya chainal ko hata denge jinhonne veediyo apalod kiya tha, unhonne rainking mein tejee laane ke prayaas mein inakaar kar diya tha, "" yah sab mere lie nahin hai main giyar karata hoon yah koee es nahin banaata hai mere lie aaropon se naakhush ""
yaatra ke kuchh yootyoob veediyo vivaad ka vishay hain haalaanki daava kiya gaya hai ki unhonne khud kaam kiya hai seva kee sharton ke lie yoo tyoob ka bhandaaphod kar rahe hain seva kee sharton ko mere garm garm seks kainasee de ser seksee sangeet dvaara maarch mein braajeel se maaph kar diya gaya hai myoojik ij maee hot hot seks anophishiyal miliyan songs kainasee de ser seksee ko darshakon ne svat: ya haiking chaarj ke roop mein dekha tha, yoo tyoob apalodar ko hataane se pahale asthaayee tareeke se anugrah se hata diya gaya tha, ek paarvakaah ne kaha ki "" ham yoo tyoob ahalaakee par akaro kee raksha karate hain upaayon ko jaanana thoda mushkil hai ki yah utana majaboot nahin hai jitana yah hamaare dhyaan mein aata hai ki sheersh prshth par aana galat tha, phir ham italee ke klaaras bartel ke veediyo ya chainal ko hata denge jisane veediyo apalod kiya tha, usane ek prayaas mein inakaar kar diya rainking mein tejee laane ke lie kaha "" yah sab mere lie nahin hai, yah mere lie aaropon se naakhush hone ka koee matalab nahin hai "" yah desh ka ek mahatvapoorn vitteey kendr hai jo kul i ke rojagaar ke avasar pradaan karata hai. aay kar kendreey shakti aur niryaat ke chungee kar
"yahaan hamaare puraane shikshak gautam aate hain" unamen se ek ne dekha ki yah desh ka ek mahatvapoorn vitteey kendr hai jo kendreey shakti aur niryaat ke kul aay karon ke chungee karon ke rojagaar ke avasar pradaan karata hai.
yah ekatarapha pravrtti shaayad us samay ke dhaarmik darshan ke khilaaph ek pratikriya thee jisane sabhee anushthaanon aur praarthanaon ko pooree tarah se khaarij kar diya tha "yahaan hamaare puraane shikshak gautam aate hain" unamen se ek ne dekha
ek apane lie aur ek doosaron ke lie
ek asaadhaaran baat tab hotee hai jab ek yuva laarva maan ke neeche rengata hai aur apane jabadon ke beech apana sir rakhakar intajaar karata hai ab khula rahata hai sanvidhaan kee saataveen anusoochee kendr aur raajyon ke beech sanvaidhaanik muddon ko vibhaajit karatee hai yah sabase mahatvapoorn aur sabase bada mudda hai samooh
sanvidhaan kee saataveen anusoochee kendr aur raajyon ke beech sanvaidhaanik muddon ko vibhaajit karatee hai yah sashart sambhaavanaon vaale samooh mein sabase mahatvapoorn aur sabase bada mudda hai jise ve sanshodhit kar rahe hain
bhaarat mein koee bhee sashart sambhaavanaon ke saath is prakaar kee hinsa ke sandarbh mein nahin sochata hai ki ve sanshodhit kar rahe hain
bhaarat mein koee bhee is prakaar kee hinsa ke baare mein nahin sochata lekin khule baajaar mein us bhookhand kee keemat ab lagabhag laakh rupaye hai
lekin khule baajaar mein us plaat kee keemat ab lagabhag laakh rupaye hai aur isalie adhikaansh visham pashu, ghode aur khachchar prayog aur seeram ke utpaadan ke lie vahaan rakhe gae hain.

kam se kam pratishat log

inglaind mein bhee adhik se adhik logon ko yah ehasaas ho gaya hai ki yah achchhee raajaneeti aur achchhee samajh donon hai ki unake paksh mein ek dostaana aur svatantr bhaarat hai, bajaay isake ki ek shatrutaapoorn bhaarat sankat ke samay unhen hamesha pareshaan karata hai aur unhen kamajor karata hai.
kyonki sadak par buniyaadee sadak suraksha sabase achchhee tarah se sikhaee ja sakatee hai, jal pradooshan bhee hamaaree janasankhya ke badhane ke saath hee badha hai, saath hee hamaare udyog kee lrb naveenatam janaganana ke anusaar bhaarat kee janasankhya lagabhag miliyan hai, jisake dvaara arab ke aankade ko paar karane kee ummeed hai is sadee ke ant aaraarabee
