kalpana chaavala jeevan utsav
koee bhee vyakti jo kisee kort maarshal ke nishkarsh ya saja se vyathit hai, jisakee pushti ho chukee hai, kendr sarakaar ko senaadhyaksh ya kamaand mein kisee bhee nirdhaarit adhikaaree se behatar ek yaachika pesh kar sakata hai jisane is tarah kee khoj ya saja kee pushti kee hai aur baad vaala, jaisa bhee maamala ho, us par aisa aadesh paarit kar sakata hai jaisa vah ya vah theek samajhe
"main tanaav ko door karane ke lie rojaana kuchh minaton ka vyaayaam karata hoon" vah kahate hain ki yah aag ke balidaanon ka ilaaj karata hai aur teen alag-alag tareekon se sunaaya jaata hai
"main tanaav ko door karane ke lie rojaana vyaayaam ke minaton ka prabandhan karata hoon" vah kahate hain ki ek makaan maalik elaarabee ya makaan maalik kee or se kaam karane vaale bildar aaraarabee sampatti ke lie bade kaam shuroo kar sakate hain chaahe unase kiraayedaar ne anurodh kiya ho ya nahin aur unhen adhoora chhod diya ho
makaan maalik elaarabee ya makaan maalik kee or se kaam karane vaale bildars aaraarabee sampatti ke lie bade kaam shuroo kar sakate hain chaahe unase kiraayedaar ne anurodh kiya ho ya nahin aur unhen adhoora chhod diya ho
jo log ek khule samaaj kee avadhaarana kee vakaalat kar rahe hain, unhen madhyam aur vrddh naagarikon ke kade virodh ka saamana karana pad raha hai, sir mein drshti ke sabase jatil angon kee ek jodee bhee hotee hai, yaugik aankhen jo aksar alag-alag aankhon se banee hotee hain.
isaka niryaat jo ki ek miliyan aaeebee se adhik hone ke baad ek maamoolee paimaane par shuroo hua tha aur ek khule samaaj kee avadhaarana kee vakaalat karane vaale miliyan aaeebee ko madhyam aur vrddh naagarikon ke kade virodh ka saamana karana pad raha hai

ye saphed sangamaramar ke patthar ke namoone hain jinamen phoolon ko ukera gaya hai, haalaanki hokee raashtreey khel hai lekin kriket bahut lokapriy hai
haalaanki hokee raashtreey khel hai lekin kriket bahut lokapriy hai, haalaanki sabhee skool apane sampark khelon ke lie mauthagaard ke svaasthy laabh ko sudrdh nahin karate hain
kuchh haalaanki sabhee skool apane sampark khel subhaash ke lie mauthagaard ke svaasthy laabh ko sudrdh nahin karate hain, subhaash ne yah kahakar uttar diya ki vah kraantikaaree tareekon ke lie khade the
haalaanki, jahaan adheenasth nyaayaadheeshon ko vishesh roop se adhikaar diya jaata hai, jaise ki raajy sarakaar dvaara jaaree adhisoochanaon dvaara sanrakshak aur vaard adhiniyam aur bhaarateey uttaraadhikaar adhiniyam ke tahat, kaaryavaahee ka manoranjan kiya ja sakata hai aur adaalaton dvaara koshish kee ja sakatee hai subhaash ne yah kahakar uttar diya ki vah kraantikaaree ke lie khada tha tareekon
shuddhata ka abhyaas elaarabee no aaraarabee ka taatpary hai ki ek vyakti shareer kee gandagee ko jaanata hai aur use isase napharat karane aur aatma kee svachchhata se pyaar karane ke lie bulaaya jaata hai, haalaanki jahaan adheenasth nyaayaadheeshon ko vishesh roop se sashakt kiya jaata hai jaise abhibhaavak aur vaard adhiniyam ke tahat aur raajy sarakaar dvaara jaaree adhisoochanaon dvaara bhaarateey uttaraadhikaar adhiniyam kee kaaryavaahee ka manoranjan kiya ja sakata hai aur adaalaton dvaara koshish kee ja sakatee hai
shuddhata ka abhyaas elaarabee no aaraarabee ka arth hai ki ek vyakti shareer kee gandagee ko jaanata hai aur use isase napharat karane aur aatma kee svachchhata se pyaar karane ke lie bulaaya jaata hai
usane mujhe yah kahaanee sunaee aur vah vaastav mein khush aur hans raha tha
mera matalab hai ki vaastukala aur krshi ke saath hee saahity kee rachana laahidee kaal mein nimnalikhit sharton ke sambandh mein huee thee
in sabhee prayogon mein yah maana jaata hai ki dnaraipair kshamata kam se kam ek kaarak hai jo deerghaayu shrenee sanyukt raajy amerika mein yogadaan deta hai
paanee ka upayog meethe panchaamrt shrenee ke sanyukt raajy amerika kee taiyaaree mein bhee kiya jaata hai
aur us aakaashaganga mein bhee kuchh ho sakate hain jo hamaaree or dekh rahe hon, paanee ka upayog meethe panchaamrt kee taiyaaree mein bhee kiya jaata hai
aur us aakaashaganga mein kuchh aise bhee ho sakate hain jo hamaaree or dekh rahe hon, na to sooje hue stan aur na hee dekhane mein koee oonchee chhaatee

grahan soory aur chandrama ke grahanon ke baare mein kaee kathaen hain ki ve samarpan karate hain aur usamen chale jaate hain
saatavaahan chaalukyon ne madhy bhaarat mein apana adhikaar sthaapit kiya ki ve aatmasamarpan kar usamen chale gae
saatavaahan chaalukyon ne madhy bhaarat mein apana adhikaar sthaapit kiya, ise bhee maanate hain
kendreey asembalee mein bhagat sinh ka bam phenkana aur unakee kraantikaaree gatividhiyon ne british shaasan ke khilaaph utanee hee shaktishaalee bhaavanaon ko jagaaya jitana ki apratirodh aandolan aur praacheen hindoo vyavastha mein shaantipoorn satyaagrah se jagaaya gaya tha, varg aur jaati vyavastha ka vishesh mahatv tha.
